record.Creator: UDOO
record.Title: UDOO KEY: The Flexible AI Platform, From $4
record.Text:
Today, AI is all about algorithms running on remote servers. But it can be so much more. AI could be embedded in our everyday objects and truly change our daily life.
That’s where the UDOO KEY comes in. 







The UDOO KEY is a fully programmable Raspberry Pi RP2040 + ESP32 microcontroller with Wi-Fi, Bluetooth and Bluetooth Low Energy. It’s more than just a piece of hardware: it also gives you access to our AI platform, Clea, with pre-trained AI models to deploy your AI app in minutes.

And all this at a once-in-a-lifetime starting price of $4. 

In short, it gives you access to a new era of micro-computing. Not so long ago, microcontrollers were single-purpose devices. Not anymore with UDOO KEY! Physical programming and do-it-yourself electronics. Fleet management. IoT analytics, over-the-air updates. Telemetry. AI. 

Just imagine.











The UDOO KEY allows you to use either RP2040, ESP32, or both, building your AI projects on your own terms. And most importantly, both MCUs are of the highest quality.

The best part about it? Breadth of choice. 







The Pico-compatible part is built upon a Raspberry Pi RP2040 dual ARM Cortex-M0, with a QSPI 8MB Flash, a 133MHz clock and 264KB of on-chip SRAM. 







The UDOO KEY’s ESP32, an ESP32-WROVER-E, is based on a dual-core Xtensa 32-bit LX6, with a 16MB flash memory, an 8MB PSRAM, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth and BLE.

Mind you: the ESP32 on board is not just a Wi-Fi, BT & BLE module. On the contrary, it gives you full access to the firmware of ESP32 and you can program it as you please. 

The two microcontrollers can talk to each other via serial port. 

And that's not all. The two modules can also communicate via SWD interface.

You can program the board via USB-C and decide whether to talk with Raspberry Pi or ESP32 via jumper. Since the ESP32 does not naturally mount a USB port, we implemented a UART-to-USB bridge. 

Both microcontrollers can be programmed using different environments, such as TinyML, TensorFlow Lite, MicroPython, C/C++, and many more, giving you plenty of options to streamline your AI application.






 Best in class developer experience 





From the ground up, the UDOO KEY is designed by developers for developers, and it comes built-in with all the tools to make development as smooth as possible. The microcontroller comes with a dedicated, fully open-source firmware based on Free RTOS and with ready to use SDKs to make it as simple as possible to build your next big thing.

UDOO KEY is designed to natively support Clea.

Clea is an extensible AI & IoT platform.

It allows to gather and manage data from connected devices and create flows tailored to the user's needs. It also provides visualization tools to turn IoT data into actionable insights.

The platform is based on apps and an SDK that allow developer to quickly embed models pre-built by SECO Mind. Each model is optimized for UDOO KEY and Edge devices, either Arm or x86, with a tuned interface engine depending on the hardware.







Clea is built on top of two open-source projects we maintain: Astarte and Edgehog. 

Astarte allows the developers to manage and process IoT data: from collection to processing up to data orchestration. It features a full-fledged SDK for ESP32 based on the Espressif IoT Development Framework (ESP-IDF), so you can be productive with UDOO KEY and Clea in a matter of minutes and with just a few lines of code.

Edgehog enables fleet device management and OTA updates, enhancing ESP32's firmware with a full-fledged device lifecycle solution. We're in the process of making Edgehog available entirely Open Source, so watch this page for updates!






We believe that the key to unlock the power of Edge AI is the app model. The smartphone is so easy to use because of the multitouch user interface. But what made it so powerful was the possibility to download an app for every task. The very same model can be replicated with AI.







Let’s say you need a face recognition application. That very same app has probably been written countless times before by thousands of developers worldwide.

Imagine now being able to deploy a pre-built hardware-optimized version of this app on your devices - your UDOO KEYs, for instance.

That’s what we are building. 

No need to reinvent the wheel every time. Finally, AI becomes a platform.















Predictive maintenance is the capability to measure the lifetime of an object and detect a malfunction before it happens. It does so by analyzing data from connected devices through machine learning algorithms.

In the video, a predictive maintenance AI model is used to predict a possible malfunction of the fork due to excessive strength.

This project employs two UDOO KEY components:


The 9-axis IMU (Magnetometer, Accelerometer, Gyroscope) of UDOO KEY’s ESP32.
A Clea predictive maintenance AI model.


Mind you: the smart bike is just an example of predictive maintenance with UDOO KEY.
A predictive maintenance AI model can be used in countless industrial and non-industrial scenarios for LCA and to reduce downtime.





Sound recognition is the capability to identify a specific sound. In the video, sound recognition is used to identify a bird from the noise it makes.





This project employs the following UDOO KEY components:


The digital microphone of UDOO KEY’s ESP32. 
Wireless communication (Wi-Fi/BT/BLE) enabled by ESP32.
A Clea sound recognition AI model.
 

Remember: this is just an example of a sound recognition application. You can use UDOO KEY to test your sound recognition AI model in several industrial and non industrial scenarios or use our own. 











Have you ever desired to get a coffee just with the power of your voice? Now, you can.

This voice-activated coffee machine is the evolution of an old project of ours, UDOO Coffee Machine, and also takes inspiration from several Arduino Coffee Machines you can find online.

The concept is simple: you activate the coffee machine by spelling a command word - in this example, “Hey UDOO.” After that, the coffee machine asks a scripted question to confirm that you really want a coffee. If you confirm, coffee is coming!

This project employs the following UDOO KEY components:


The digital microphone of UDOO KEY’s ESP32.
The I/Os of Raspberry Pi RP2040 to easily hack your coffee machine.
The Grove Kit, developed in collaboration with Seeed Studio.
A Clea keyword recognition AI model.
 

Please note that this voice-activated coffee machine is just an example of keyword recognition with UDOO KEY.

Clea and UDOO KEY gives you everything you need to test your own keyword recognition AI model or use our own, which you can apply to hundreds of industrial and everyday scenarios.










Here is an example of object detection & classification made with UDOO KEY.

In this scenario, UDOO KEY gives your trash bins superpowers. Thanks to UDOO KEY, your trash bin can:


Verify whether the trash bin is full or not.
Identify the material of the piece of garbage you hold in your hand.
Open the proper container.
 

Basically, this is a combination of several open-source projects. Specifically:


 Arduino Trash Classification based on TinyML 
 Arduino Smart Trash Bin to check whether the trash bin is full or not.
 

This project employs the following UDOO KEY components:


The Cam KIT, developed in collaboration with Arducam.
The I/Os of Raspberry Pi RP2040 to easily hack your trash bin.
Pimoroni, i.e. a display compatible with Raspberry Pi Pico.
A Clea object detection & classification AI model.












Gesture recognition is the capability to detect a specific gesture.

In the video, a UDOO KEY is inserted inside a toy to turn it into a magic wand, giving it new abilities, such as:


Change light patterns of bluetooth-enabled LED strips.
Activate bluetooth speakers.
 

All of these abilities are gesture-activated thanks to UDOO KEY’s 9-axis IMU.
This project employs the following UDOO KEY components:


The 9-axis IMU (Magnetometer, Accelerometer, Gyroscope) of UDOO KEY’s ESP32.
The I/Os of Raspberry Pi RP2040 to easily hack your magic wand.
Wireless communication (Wi-Fi/BT/BLE), enabled by the ESP32. 
A Clea gesture recognition AI model.


Note: this is just an example of gesture recognition with UDOO KEY. Thanks to UDOO KEY, you can easily run your gesture recognition AI model or use our own.






Face recognition is the capability to detect and identify a face in a stream. Although UDOO KEY does not feature a camera, it mounts a camera connector and is compatible with Arducam.

There are several face recognition projects you can make with UDOO KEY, both in industrial and non-industrial scenarios, using our own AI model or one made by you. 










We built the UDOO KEY to empower you.

If you are a developer that wants full control with no bells and whistles, then the UDOO KEY Basic is for you: it mounts no sensors, so as to let you expand it with your favorite modules. Otherwise, pick the UDOO KEY PRO.

The UDOO KEY PRO mounts two powerful sensors: a 9-axis IMU and a digital microphone. It is ready to let you start with your AI project right away.

The 9-axis IMU sensor combines an accelerometer, a magnetometer and a gyroscope in a single module to streamline a wide array of projects, from robotics and RC cars up to smart bikes and automation. It is connected to the ESP32 via I2C bus. You can decide whether to access the I2C bus via ESP32 or RP2040 through the jumper switch.

The digital microphone, on the other hand, is designed for AI-powered sound & voice recognition as well as audio control a-la Alexa. It is connected to the ESP32 via I2S bus.










The UDOO KEY gives you plenty of options when it comes to interfaces.

First thing first, it features three LEDs - one blue, one yellow and one green. The blue one signals a successful connection to Clea, the second one is for Wi-Fi/BT activities, and it's managed by ESP32's IO33 (pin #9). The green one is connected to RP2040's GPIO25. All LEDs are fully programmable.

In terms of interfaces, you can use UDOO KEY the very same way you'd use Raspberry Pi Pico and ESP32.

Last but not least, the UEXT connector is accessible from the ESP32, which exposes the I2C, UART and SPI interfaces.












We built the UDOO KEY to empower you. If you are an embedded developer that wants full control and a minimal set of sensors, then the UDOO KEY Basic is for you: it mounts no sensors, so as to let you expand it with your favorite module. Otherwise, pick the UDOO KEY PRO.

In terms of pinout, the UDOO KEY is 100% compatible with Raspberry Pi Pico, both hardware and software-wise.










Mind you: all interfaces have ESD protection and are designed to be used not just by hobbyists, but also in industrial environments.











Thanks to the ESP32 on board, you get full WiFi 802.11b/g/n connectivity, Bluetooth® and BLE v4.2.










The UDOO KEY needs 5V of power via USB-C and consumes very little.
The cool thing is, the board can go into deep sleep, reducing the power consumption to a minimum. In this state it only awakes if triggered by a specific event, enabling scenarios where you need the board to function for several years.










The UDOO KEY can be powered via battery pack.
In fact, it also supports a battery!















The UDOO KEY is compatible with Raspberry Pi Pico, both hardware and software-wise. This means that each and any expansion hardware as well as each and any software built for Raspberry Pi Pico will work out of the box on UDOO KEY.












ESP32 is an incredibly versatile platform for Edge AI applications. It gives you lots of tools, demos and projects to start - and that's why we chose it.










The UDOO KEY opens the doors to Edge AI. Python, MicroPython, TinyML, TensorFlow Lite and much more: the sky's the limit.










We love Arduino. In fact, we made UDOO KEY 100% compatible with Arduino software-wise.
Yes: UDOO KEY’s Arduino IDE runs the Arduino IDE natively.
This means that each and any project that runs on Arduino Nano you can also run on UDOO KEY.






We are strong believers and supporters of open-source technologies. Because of this, we are going to release the BOM and schematics of UDOO KEY as soon as we start shipping.

This is not an empty promise. We have already released the BOM and schematics of each and every UDOO board - have a look at our website.

On top of this, the core components of Clea are already open source:


 Astarte
 
 Edgehog
 

Last but not least, we commit to open-source more Clea components in the future.








































To make UDOO KEY even more flexible we are making available three special kits.
The first one is Early Bird UDOO KEY PRO Cam Kit + Clea.





Made in collaboration with Arducam, it includes:

1x UDOO KEY PRO
1x 2MP SPI Camera
Access to Clea



The second kit is Early Bird UDOO KEY PRO Grove Kit + Clea.





Made in collaboration with SeeedStudio, it includes:

1x UDOO KEY PRO
14 handpicked Grove Modules, including 5 sensors/ 5 actuators/ 2LED/ 1 LCD display/ 1 Grove shield
Access to Clea
 


The third kit is Early Bird UDOO KEY PRO AI VISION KIT.






Made in collaboration with Arducam, it includes:

UDOO KEY PRO
UDOO VISION X5, i.e. a powerful single-board computer for computational-intensive computer vision tasks at the edge
1x 4K 8MP Autofocus USB camera
Access to Clea.
 

UDOO VISION X5 is the perfect companion for UDOO KEY.






It’s a powerful x86 single-board computer based on an Intel® Atom® X5-E3940 Quad Core. The board is built upon a Pico-ITX pocket-size form factor, the ideal platform for computer vision projects. It features a 32-bit Quad-Channel LPDDR4 soldered on-board, 4GB of RAM and 32GB of eMMC.
What’s more, UDOO KEY is natively compatible with Clea and unlike other development boards, UDOO VISION X5 natively runs OpenVINO™, a toolkit by Intel to quickly deploy computer vision and AI/ML apps at the edge.












You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00





































This is not our first rodeo.

We’ve already launched 4 successful Kickstarter campaigns - UDOO, UDOO NEO, UDOO X86, UDOO BOLT - raising over 2 million dollars from thousands of backers worldwide.
Since the very first UDOO board we’ve shipped over 100,000 single-board computers.





With UDOO DUAL/QUAD, our first single board computer launched on Kickstarter in 2013, we created a new playground for students to learn the basics of coding, electronics and physical computing with an all-in-one solution.






With UDOO NEO, our second single board computer launched on Kickstarter in 2015, we empowered makers, designers, startups and research groups all over the world with an IoT-ready all-in-one device for applications using motion sensors (rovers, drones, robots, automation).






With UDOO X86, launched on Kickstarter in 2016, we created the most powerful single board computer of the time. UDOO X86 addresses the needs of the average consumer that is looking for a very good, affordable media player, but also speaks to developers, makers and startups who want to invent today the world of tomorrow.






 With UDOO BOLT, launched on Kickstarter in 2018, we created a portable and powerful computer featuring an AMD Ryzen™️ Embedded V1000 SoC and an Arduino™️-compatible platform, all wrapped into one.











UDOO is a joint effort of SECO Edge and SECO Mind, both daughter companies of SECO.

SECO is a public company and a leading international player in the B2B embedded market. It has over 40 years of experience in the design and production of electronic embedded solutions.










Our community is a strong point of the UDOO world. It's based on Open Source values, where makers, developers, students, companies and privates share their ideas and problems. 

Our forum is daily updated, while our blog reports the news from the UDOO and embedded domains. Our social world is spreading as well: from Facebook to Twitter, YouTube, Github and Instagram. 

You can find all UDOO-based projects on Hackster on our dedicated page. On our website we also have all the resources you need (3D files, schematics, BOM, etcetera) available for free. 

All our products are available in our shop and distributors.







Corporate social responsibility is one of the key pillars of our approach to business. We base our work on passion and innovation. On commitment and the development of skills. On the value of each person, recognizing diversity as a resource and making respect, openness and participation the fundamental drivers of the Group.

For several years the SECO Group has been committed to reducing its environmental impact by monitoring emissions, transitioning to forms of renewable energy and reducing the volume of non-recyclable and non-renewable waste produced.
Since 2019 we've published an ESG (environmental, social, governance) report.

For more information, please read our Sustainability Report 2020.






To make UDOO KEY even more special we partnered with a few equally special companies.







The Espressif solution is one of the two cores of the UDOO KEY and provides, among several other features, wireless connectivity. Espressif gave us their support in working with their products.







We collaborated with Arducam to create a brand-new kit for computer vision AI projects. Arducam is a professional company dedicated to open-source hardware and software, designed and manufactured in China specifically for Arduino and Raspberry Pi camera solutions.







We collaborated with Seeed Studio to create a starter kit for UDOO KEY. Seeed has been serving the global developer community since 2008, by providing open technology and agile manufacturing services, with the mission to make hardware more accessible and lower the threshold for hardware innovation.





We'd like thank CUBIT for making this possible and Università di Siena for supporting us.

record.Creator: foolography GmbH
record.Title: UNLEASHED '22: Timelapse, Long Exposure, Remote & Geotagging
record.Text:
The Unleashed is the swiss army knife of camera accessories: It’s tiny, but packed with features. So much more than just a camera remote, it unleashes the full potential of your camera with expert level timelapse features, long exposure capabilities, geotagging and more - in a tiny Bluetooth module and an intuitive app that simply works.











 1. Turn on your camera and the Unleashed will instantly reconnect to your smartphone.
 2. Control any of the numerous features from the Unleashed app. Once you’ve started a shot, the Unleashed will take care of the rest, so you can just sit back and
 3. enjoy the beautiful results. It’s that simple! 







You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00




































Since our last Kickstarter campaign, we've shipped the Unleashed ’18 to thousands of happy customers all over the world. Now, by popular demand, we're launching the new Unleashed ’22, finally supporting nearly all mirrorless cameras as well as DSLRs: Sony, Fujifilm, Panasonic, Canon and Nikon! 



Unleasheds on Sony Alpha 7 III, Fujifilm X-T2, Panasonic Lumix S1, Canon EOS R, Nikon Z6 II












We designed the Unleashed to be incredibly smart in the tiniest package. With its low profile design, it's never in your way and you can leave it on your camera at all times - even when packing it in your bag. Thanks to Bluetooth Low Energy, initial pairing takes less than 10 seconds and reconnection is almost instant when you turn on the camera or open the app. It only uses a minimal amount of power from your camera battery, so you don't need to charge it, and it's always ready when you need it! 
Our beautiful app is just the user interface for the Unleashed, whereas the brains are in the tiny device itself. This means it will keep controlling the camera to finish your shot, even if you close the app, you walk out of range or your phone battery dies.






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00
































Incredibly tiny & flat on the side of your camera - can stay attached all the time
Bluetooth Low Energy - pairs in seconds, reconnects the instant you open the app
Powered by the camera battery - no charging, always ready to use
Smart hardware with app as user interface - the Unleashed keeps going, even when disconnected from app









An entire toolset in the tiniest device


The Unleashed gives you full control over your camera from the palm of your hand and adds a ton of features to your camera – easy to use from our app.

Remote triggering for tripod shots and family photos
Video recording, even with multiple cameras
Changing settings from our app, without touching the camera
Direct in-camera geotagging
Long exposures, perfectly timed up to 4.5 hours
Timelapses made easy, even advanced “holy grail” day-to-night transitions
Gallery with high resolution photo review
Photo sharing, right from our app

The Unleashed enables you to easily take pro-level selfies, breathtaking astro photos, creative light-paintings and epic "holy grail" timelapses.






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































The Unleashed ‘18 is already loved by thousands of customers, achieving beautiful results that continue to blow us away. This gave us a solid foundation to build on, and we took all your feedback and wishes to heart.





So for the new Unleashed ‘22, we reworked every aspect of our firmware and much of our app, further improving speed and reliability. And of course we added some great new features to make it the perfect all-round tool for any photographer!





IN OUR CUSTOMERS’ WORDS
“Unleashed has changed my life. I have two, one for each Z7, use them to about 10% of their potential and they’re still game-changing.” - Josh H.
“I have been taking pictures for about 50 years and have seen and tried many technical solutions for remote control of cameras. This solution from Germany is so far the most sophisticated, elegant and at an unbeatable price I have found.” - Blue Reef
“This technology for camera control is amazing and so small. It puts all others practically out of the picture (no pun intended).” - Dr. Stephen L.










Because it can always stay on your camera and is never out of battery, the Unleashed is the perfect remote control, be it for simple triggering of tripod shots, family photos or selfies. Or use it to remotely start & stop video recording - when your camera is mounted on a gimbal or you want to start multiple cameras at once. The Unleashed app can handle up to 6 cameras with ease.
But it’s so much more than just a remote - with the Unleashed you can change all the important settings of your camera, without having to touch your camera or dig through daunting menus.










We’ve all come to love geotagged photos on our smartphones, where you can easily find photos on a map in the “places” album, as well as check the exact location of individual shots. The Unleashed enables direct in-camera geotagging for your mirrorless camera or DSLR, using either your smartphone’s location or a dedicated Bluetooth GPS receiver.



Relive your vacation when browsing the photos of your trip on a map







Astrophotography, lightpainting and more
Our long exposure feature helps you take perfectly timed exposures up to 4.5 hours. When the camera is set to bulb mode, the Unleashed will hold the trigger down for you for the exact time you want it to. Or you can press once to start and press again to stop a long exposure of any length. We decided on continuing the scale of 1/3rd stop steps from the camera instead of you having to set hours, minutes and seconds separately. While it’s unconventional, this makes it much easier to work with the other exposure settings in the camera: Take test shots with high ISO to nail exposure, then decrease ISO and easily increase exposure time by an equal number of stops to keep the same exposure level.  



Milky Way by Derek Sturman @dereksturmanphotography


ND filter photography
We also added a setting that will adjust the shutter speed for you by the right number of stops when adding or removing ND filters, making ND filter calculators obsolete! 





The Unleashed makes setting up any timelapse a breeze, whether simple or requiring expert features. And we implemented lots of them!
Just use our default settings and hit start or choose your interval and shooting time - it’s that easy! We’ll show you the number of photos it’ll take, as well as the resulting clip length at your chosen frame rate. You can also decide to choose the number of photos to take, and we’ll calculate the shooting time for you instead.





Real exposure ramping 
The Unleashed brings “holy grail” timelapses within reach for everyone. During these day-to-night transition timelapses, the Unleashed will adjust exposure settings automatically, using one of several algorithms to choose from. We’re not limited to bulb-ramping, but can actually ramp the camera’s shutterspeed, aperture and ISO for daylight to milkyway transitions. 






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































Minimized dark-time
All normal intervalometers have unnecessarily long autofocussing and hold times. The former is how long the shutter button is half-pressed before the interval, the latter how long it is fully pressed and held on each interval. These times need to be long enough to ensure a photo is taken, with or without AF. So to be on the safe side, intervalometers usually half-press, then press and hold for way too long. This results in unwanted “dark-time” between shots where nothing useful happens, but you also can’t view the photos. Some more advanced intervalometers allow you to change the hold time, but this puts the burden on you to find the shortest possible but longest necessary time that will consistently work with your camera. The Unleashed knows whether the camera is set to autofocus, and on most cameras it gets the info exactly when the shutter opens. So it will only half-press when necessary and can stop holding the shutter button the instant we know the camera started the shot, leading to the absolute minimal dark-time for every camera, with no configuration necessary. 

Flexible intervals
So you don’t miss any shots when exposure times get longer, the Unleashed can optionally start increasing the interval. This is perfect for day-to-night timelapses as it enables you to have a nice short interval during the day, but still allows ramping down to 30s exposures for starry nights.



Unleashed in its element with Mike Ver Sprill - @milky_way_mike


Month-long durations
You can now set intervals of up to 24h and shooting times up to 365 days! 





External intervalometer support
Our autoramping will optionally work with external intervalometers, even sliders and other motion controllers.



Black Forest Motion PINE R controlled by Unleashed


Sync timelapses with the movement of motion controllers
Because the Unleashed knows exactly when a shot ends, it can tell motion controllers to move with perfect timing, in order to maximise the time until the next shot and therefore minimize vibrations. This will work wirelessly with selected manufacturers. We have already implemented support for the Black Forest Motion PINE controllers and are currently working on Syrp compatibility, with more to follow. With most cameras it will also work with a wired shutter cable from any other motion controller and the Unleashed set to external intervalometer.

Foolproof and fail-safe
All basic and advanced features are implemented in the Unleashed firmware, and the app just provides the user interface to configure them. Once started, the Unleashed keeps controlling the camera with precision and without missing a beat, even if you lose Bluetooth connectivity. Precise timing, complex "holy grail" calculations and camera adjustments are handled by the Unleashed itself, not the app! Even the Bluetooth connection to a motion controller is direct and independent from the smartphone. Of course you can open the app and reconnect at any time to see the current progress or make manual adjustments.






Gallery and photo review - now in HD
The new Unleashed got 10x faster. So you can now transfer high-resolution preview images to your phone! You can enable automatic downloading for quick review after each shot you take, and you can browse all photos in our new gallery view. The Unleashed quickly loads all thumbnails and you can choose to download your favorites in higher resolutions individually. To get the most out of the Bluetooth bandwidth, we added smart comparison algorithms to avoid unnecessary data transfers. We even implemented complex methods to add the EXIF data of the original image to the high-resolution previews you’re downloading! Because your GPS metadata along with all other shooting info is in the preview images when you save those to your camera roll, you’ll be able to see and search for those photos conveniently on a map in your “Places” album.





Share on location
Easily share your favorite shots taken with your camera right from our app. The new high resolution previews are perfect for sharing on Social Media or with your family and friends right on the spot.










We have a loooong wish list of our customers’ feature wishes for the Unleashed and our app. Reaching the following funding goals will enable us to develop some of these requests. So spread the news, tell your friends and together we’ll make these cool features become a reality!





Note that the last two stretch goals don’t guarantee we will be able to provide full support for all features on these camera brands! We still have too much R&D ahead of us to promise this. Also, as already written elsewhere, we only have a chance to support these Olympus cameras: OM-D E-M1 III, E-M5 III, E-M1X and E-M1 Mark II and these Pentax cameras: 645Z, K1, K1 Mark II and maybe the K3, KP and K3 Mark II. You can read the reasoning behind that in our FAQs.





Extended exposure bracketing.
When we say extended, we mean it. With the Unleashed, you can take exposure bracketed shots with up to 55 images and any EV stepsize: 0.3, 0.7, 1.0, 2.0… you name it. Set up your starting exposure, and select whether you want symmetric bracketing, only darker exposures, or just brighter exposures. Choose whether to bracket exposure by changing shutterspeed, aperture or ISO - or any combination thereof, in the order you choose! Set maximum and minimum for each of these settings, to keep your bracketed shots shorter, avoid noise or limit depth of field variation and diffraction. You have full control!
Capture scenes with high dynamic range to create HDR photos with tone mapping or exposure fusion. Or use it for image-based lighting of 3D renderings to realistically place 3D objects into the real world.





The new Unleashed '22 is compatible with 144 camera models. To fit all those different cameras, there will be 7 different Unleashed models, as well as 7 different cables to perfectly and snugly fit on your camera. Each Unleashed model is a mere 14x16x5.5mm in size (0.54 x 0.63 x 0.20 in, w x h x d, without the plug) and weighs less than 5g. The cables are custom made with extremely flexible wires and the smallest possible right-angled plugs to make sure they never get in your way.

N1 and N2 have Nikon specific 10 pin plugs and come with an optional USB cable. This is available with 4 different USB plugs: USB-C, USB-Micro, USB-Mini and USB-8P
M1 has a USB-C plug that’s reversible
M2 and M3 have USB-Micro plugs and 
M4 and M5 have USB-Mini plugs
All M models come with an HDMI cable. This is available with 3 different HDMI plugs: HDMI-A (Full-size), HDMI-C (Mini-HDMI), HDMI-D (Micro-HDMI). 






To make it easier, all we need to know is which camera you want the Unleashed for, and we’ll make sure you get the right Unleashed + cable combination. Just back this project and pledge to support us today, and a few weeks before shipping we’ll send you a survey through our pledge manager where you can specify your camera along with shipping details to get your reward. 





The following cameras are supported. Having covered all bases, we’re sure one of our Unleashed models will fit any new camera coming to market.

Sony Alpha: α7 IV, ZV-E10, α1, α7S III, ZV-1, α9 II, α6100, α6600, RX100 VII, α7R IV, RX0 II, α6400, RX100 VA, RX100 VI, α7 III, α7R III, RX10 IV, RX0, α9, α6500, α99 II
Fujifilm: GFX 100S, X-S10, X-T4, GFX 100, X-T3, X-H1, GFX 50S, X-T2, X-T1 IR, X-T1, IS Pro, S5 Pro
Panasonic Lumix: DC-GH6, DC-GH5 II, DC-S5, DC-S1H, DC-S1, DC-S1R, DC-GH5S, DC-G9, DC-GH5
Canon EOS: R3, R5, R6, 850D / Rebel T8i, 1D X Mark III, Ra, 90D, M6 Mark II, 250D / Rebel SL3 / Kiss X10, RP, R, 2000D / 1500D / Rebel T7 / Kiss X90, 4000D, 6D Mark II, 200D / Rebel SL2 / Kiss X9, 77D / 9000D, 800D / Rebel T7i / Kiss X9i, 5D Mark IV, 1300D / Rebel T6, 80D, 1D X Mark II, 5Ds, 5Ds R, 760D / Rebel T6s / 8000D, 750D / Rebel T6i / Kiss X8i, 7D Mark II, 1200D / Rebel T5 / Kiss X70, 70D, 100D / Rebel SL1, 700D / Rebel T5i / Kiss X7i, 6D, 650D / Rebel T4i / Kiss X6i, 1D C, 60Da, 5D Mark III, 1D X, 600D / Rebel T3i / Kiss X5, 1100D / Rebel T3 / Kiss X50, 60D, 550D / Rebel T2i / Kiss X4, 1D Mark IV, 7D, 500D / Rebel T1i / Kiss X3, 5D Mark II, 50D
Nikon: Z9, Z fc, Z7 II, Z6 II, Z5, D780, Z50, D6, D3500, Z7, Z6, D850, D7500, D5600, D3400, D5, D500, D7200, D810A, D5500, D750, D810, D4s, D3300, Df, D5300 , D610, D7100, D5200, D600, D3200, D800, D800E, D4, D5100, D7000, D3100, D3S, D300S, D5000, D3X, D90, D700, D3, D300, D2Xs, D200, D2Hs, D2X, D2H. With reduced features: D1X, D1H, D1, Coolpix P1000, Coolpix P950, Coolpix A, P7700, P7800, F6, F100, F5, F90X/N90s, F90/N90 - That’s right, we even support 5 different film or "analogue" cameras!
Please check the full compatibility table here, to see which features are supported on your camera.





There are some notable exceptions of cameras we don’t officially support. Check our FAQs for the reasons why.

 Sony: α7C as well as α6300, α7 II and older
 Fujifilm: GFX-50R, X-Pro2, X-Pro1
 Panasonic: BSH1 and BGH1
 Canon: M Series (except M6 Mark II) as well as 1000D and older
 Nikon: D3300, D3000 and older entry-level DSLRs







Yes, we know each one of those manufacturers has their own app ... but have you ever used one - and then used it a second time? From our own experience and for the vast majority of people we have talked to, the manufacturers apps are so frustrating to use, that few people will bother making a second attempt of getting the apps to work, let alone use them productively in the field. The biggest gripes everyone has with these apps is getting them to connect to the camera reliably. The Unleashed is the complete opposite: Even initial pairing only takes seconds, and reconnection in every day use happens instantly when you open the app. 
Check out a real-time comparison between the Unleashed versus the manufacturers' native apps from initial connection to first photo.






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00






























































"I've used a lot of remote triggers, but the Unleashed is by far my favorite. It's so small and unobtrusive that it nests inside my camera's L-bracket and I love the fact it needs no batteries or charging. The app has an intuitive, modern, well-designed interface. With the latest updates, it's a dream to use for low light remote triggering and complex timelapse. I’m really looking forward to all the features of the new Unleashed."










"Shutter release remotes are one of the essential components to sharp night sky images, so naturally I have used a lot of them. Some would call me a destroyer of equipment on the many trips I drag it through, so I’ve jumped from remote to remote for years. Well, since I’ve had the Unleashed that’s changed. Ever since I’ve had it, I haven’t used another remote at all, honestly. The thing just lives on my camera, I don’t think it has left my camera body even once since the day I got it. The greatest part about it is that I no longer have to constantly worry about forgetting to bring a shutter remote, or losing it along the way. I remember the constant stress of bringing batteries or forgetting them on multi day backpacking trips for other remotes. What is great about this remote is it uses your camera’s battery (which I have not noticed any difference in battery life) and now I can just focus on bringing camera batteries and keeping my phone charged which I would be doing anyway! I’ve also used a lot of the standard camera bluetooth apps like nikon's snap bridge and would go as far as to say that I am not alone in disliking them. The interface of the Unleashed app is easy to use and very effective. It’s also so nice to finally have an app that has real usable timelapse functions."










"For me, the thing I like about the Unleashed the most might be different than one would think. I love how easily I can use my camera remotely from my phone. I can control/change almost all settings from the palm of my hand. Since I do a lot of astrophotography and long exposure stuff, it really makes that so much easier for me. A lot of times I need to be able to start my camera and do light painting. I can set up a 2 or 10 second delay on my phone, hit start, put my phone in my pocket, wait for it to start taking the picture and do my light painting. It helps a lot more than one would think.
It's also very nice to be able to take "selfies" with something other than a cell phone when there's not generally people around that can run the camera for you. I have taken many family pictures with it remotely that don't look like they were set up on a tripod. I love the timelapse and holy grail timelapse features as well. I really like that I can see visually what multiple cameras are doing at any time throughout the timelapse too. I think my favorite "moments" I have with using them is taking my own astroselfies or self-family pictures. I don't always get the opportunity to be in the pictures because I'm usually the one with the camera taking the pictures. But with The Unleashed I can remotely control them, from a decent distance and even view the images if need be. It makes getting in front of the camera much easier and be part of the memories I'm creating."










"Hey all my name is Josh Morgan and I’m a rural electrician from New Zealand with a keen interest on Astro Photography and Timelapse. So I took a punt on the Unleashed in early 2020 to hopefully assist me with my timelapse work. After a long Covid wait it arrived and I couldn’t be more happy with it. Really transformed my D750 into a more modern machine, gave me extended long shutter durations for crazy long exposures, GPS tagging and more importantly full time exposure ramping shutter/aperture/iso for full time holy grail timelapse work which had been a sore point for me as I had to manually ramp every setting during sunset/sunrise which has its own problems if I was tryna run 2 cameras. But also more importantly it runs off Bluetooth which was critical to me as any wifi related systems absolutely chewed up battery life on the camera. So a very welcomed bonus and so far a hell of a product.
My favourite moment so far with the Unleashed is it finally allowed me to capture amazing holy grail timelapse work coming into our prime Astro season at my holiday destination of choice Great Barrier Island. What I managed to capture was some of the most intense levels of airglow I’ve ever encountered. I have family/time constraints there so having the Unleashed work hands off was really amazing."















Foolography GmbH, founded in 2009, is an international team located in Berlin, Germany, making use of the city’s great network and drive for technological innovation. Being engineers and photographers ourselves, we live and breathe our products. The Unleashed is not just another commercial product, it's our baby! We use it all the time and have devoted countless hours refining every detail for the smoothest operation in all edge cases. To do so, we reverse engineered protocols and learned to control every possible bit of the cameras! This translates to a hassle-free user experience which really sets the Unleashed apart. In an update we'll do a tech deep dive with the founder to highlight a few of those. Stay tuned!





The Unleashed is made in Germany and is the product of some serious German engineering! Of course some components are sourced abroad, but the Unleashed is designed, developed and manufactured in Germany. 





We’ve actively been working toward this new Unleashed for the better part of the last two years. In fact, to pave the way for the new features of the Unleashed ‘22, we refactored so much code that we found and fixed quite a few bugs in rare edge cases and made huge improvements to nearly all features of the Unleashed ‘18 along the way. After a long beta testing phase, we just released all these in a major 2.0.0 update of our Apps for iOS and Android including the 2.0.0 Firmware. So not only does the new Unleashed benefit hugely from all the R&D we did on the Unleashed ‘18, the reverse is true as well.
One of the most important things we learned from the last campaign: no matter how well you plan, you’ll always need more time! So we're only starting this campaign now that we got the Unleashed fully functional on all new brands. The current lead times for components are making it virtually impossible to promise a shorter delivery time, so we have not just included some buffers into our timeline - basically our entire timeline is buffer! So while we gear up for production and wait for components to arrive, we’ll have all that time to really polish all the new features.





After the campaign, a few weeks before we ship the Unleashed, you will get access to our pledge management system (via email) where you can pay for optional express shipping, buy additional Unleasheds or other accessories. 
Shipping costs are: Germany: 8€, Rest of World: 15€, express shipping can be added optionally.





We really appreciate your help in getting word out about the new Unleashed, be it to your photography buddies, your followers on Social Media or a media outlet you happen to work for 😉. Feel free to reach out to press@foolography.com or come have a look at www.foolography.com/press. 




Oliver and his Dad on their photowalk through Berlin





This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 2,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $900M raised between them.

record.Creator: Shortcut Labs
record.Title: Flic Twist: The Wireless Dial for your Smart Home
record.Text:
We have made smart buttons for over seven years. A common problem we see with smart home setups is that family members often don't understand how to control it.  





Flic Twist is our dream of a perfect smart home controller. It bridges the gap between advanced users and tech-averse family members.











Push and Rotate are easy to use and understand. Unlock advanced modes by pushing and rotating at the same time. 













Master controller in the hallway





Lights and blinds in the bedroom





Music and color in the studio





Fun and function in the kid's room











Mount it on the wall using the included magnetic wall mount with screws or adhesive, or put it on your table. Flic Twist has no wires and requires no installation. Two AAA batteries last up to 2 years.








Flic Twist introduces four functions never before seen in Smart Home: Smart Dimming, Advanced Dimming, Scene Blender and Selector. 



See examples and demos of these innovations further down! 








The Flic Hub Mini is a tiny yet powerful computer that takes your Flic Twist input and creates magic with your smart home devices. The optimized long range communication works on distances of up to 50m (150ft), makes the battery of Twist last for over 2 years, and has a ultrafast latency of less than 0.1 second. A blink of an eye takes 0.1 to 0.4 seconds.



Flic Hub is the brains behind it all. Read more about the new Flic Hub Mini further down.











*The Flic Hub operates locally and only needs internet connectivity if you connect an integration that requires it, such as IFTTT, Zapier, Alexa, or SmartThings.








We are part of the unifying smart home standard Matter that will bring all ecosystems and devices together when it rolls out in 2022. 



We are committed to making Flic products work with the entire Matter ecosystem, via a Flic Hub. 


With Matter allowing products to work seamlessly with each other, you can focus on building a smarter home and Flic Twist will allow your family to enjoy it. Matter is however not a requirement for using Flic Twist with your favorite brands.



Even if you have these connected to something else (e.g. Google Home, Homekit, or Alexa), a Flic Hub can control them in parallel with your current setup.











A Flic Hub LR or a Flic Hub Mini is required. Flic Hub Mini can be added in the checkout. 
















 Flic Twist comes in two colors that fit into any interior. Select your color after the campaign in the post-campaign survey.








Our last three products Flic 1, Flic Hub, and Flic 2, were created thanks to you and people like you. 





We invented the Smart Button and now we’re back again with a new innovation for smart home control!
















Smart Dimming just works. You can apply it to any existing setup in two simple steps: select the parameter (like brightness, volume, or window blind position) and the devices you want to control. Smart Dimming adjusts each parameter individually, maintaining the relative differences between devices. Even if you go all the way up or down, you will always be able to get back to where you were.
It also plays along nicely with other means of control, like voice commands or other apps. If something changes, Smart Dimming will observe and adapt to be ready for making smooth adjustments the next time you use it.



The relationship between the lights is kept while you dim the lights, even if you change the lights from an app or a voice assistant.





It works the same way for controlling the volume on smart speakers. Rotate to adjust volume in the same room. Push-Rotate to adjust volume on all speakers.





Adjusting window blinds is just as easy with Smart Dimming.





When showing the current status the LEDs start lighting up at 6 o'clock and light up clockwise until they reach 5 o'clock which represents 100%.








Advanced Dimming works the same way as Smart Dimming but with much more options. When rotating you can adjust brightness, color, or saturation simultaneously. Sequence the lights and even add events.



In the above example we add a sequence at 50%. When rotating up to 50%, only Colored Light 1 and 2 are controlled.  When you pass 50% the LIFX mini color starts lighting up and also toggles an IKEA wall plug and triggers an Alexa Routine.


Advanced Dimming Example 1: Adjust brightness and color temperature simultaneously



Advanced Dimming can increase the color temperature from an evening friendly Warm-White color to a Daylight-White while you are increasing the brightness. 





Demo of adjusting brightness and color temperature simultaneously using Philips Hue lights. 


Advanced Dimming Example 2: Sequencing



Use Advanced Dimming to turn on different lights in sequence one after the other. 





 Demo of Light sequencing using the Advanced Dimming mode. 


Advanced Dimming Example 3: Combine Sequencing with brightness and color temperature 



Go from darkness to a cozy warm color and then to a full brightness with energizing daylight color while turning the ceiling lights on half way.








Flic Twist's innovative Scene Blender mode allows you to preset up to 4 different light scenes. It fades smoothly between your scenes so you can select just the level in between that fits your mood for the moment. 



The software blends intelligently between brightness, hue, saturation, number of lights, window blinds level, and anything else you want to include in your scenes. The result is a smooth experience of sliding between moods and scenes in your home that all family members will love to use. 


Scene Blender Example 1: Blend Scenes and Adjust Brightness
Use Smart Dimming on Rotate and Scene Blender on Push-Rotate. This allows you to blend between your scenes and then Rotate to fine-tune the brightness of your scene to perfection. 

Scene Blender Example 2: Shift Music between rooms or to the entire house
On each of the 4 scenes you can set each speaker volume to 25%. Push-Rotate to blend between the scenes which will shift the music from one room to another or to the entire house. Use rotate to adjust the volume of the selected speakers.






The Selector allows you to select up to 12 custom things to Activate or Adjust. Each position is referred to as clock positions in the app, 1 to 12 o'clock.





Things you can Adjust
This allows you to select and adjust the settings of a specific room, the entire house or just a specific device that you want to adjust with Smart Dimming.
For example, Push-Rotate to:

 12 o’clock: Now you can rotate to adjust the bedroom lights.
 1 o’clock: Now you can rotate to adjust volume on all speakers
 2 o’clock: Now you can rotate to adjust only the bedroom window light. 

Things you can Activate
You predefine your actions and simply execute them. 
For example, Push-Rotate to:

 3 o’clock: Activates an Alexa Routine
 4 o’clock: Starts playing Jazz in the Kitchen
 5 o’clock: Opens all blinds

For even more advanced things you can also Activate custom internet requests, Zapier or IFTTT actions and more.
 
Adaptive fields
Depending on the number of actions you set the indicator lights will adapt accordingly. Selecting only two fields will be referred to as Left and Right. Selecting up to four fields will be referred to according to the image below.



When you use the Selector with up to 4 fields, each field is referred to as Up, Down, Left and Right as the example above. Choosing more will refer to each of the 12 positions instead, from 1 to 12 o'clock. 








When using the Scene Blender or Selector it can be helpful to visualize the scenes or functions that have been set to the different positions. The icon sticker-pack add-on comes with a wide variety of different icons to help visualize your scenes.  



The icon sticker pack is a pack of 35 different icons. The Sticker Alignment Template is included with each icon sticker pack and helps you place the icons on the correct position.













Flic 2 buttons are included in some of the rewards and can be added as add-ons. Flic 2 was successfully launched here on Kickstarter in 2019 and has since then been continuously improved. Flic 2 can trigger anything that Flic Twist can trigger, but it's just a button without the rotation of Flic Twist. You can assign 3 different triggers to Push, Double Push and Hold. It's really small, wireless and comes with an adhesive that allows you to place it anywhere. Flic 2 runs on a replaceable and included coincell battery, CR2032, that lasts up to two years. 



Some of many 5-star reviews of Flic 2 and the Flic apps











Flic Twist complements Flic buttons with more powerful features and they fit great together! 


Flic Twist and the Flic Hub Mini are fully backwards compatible with Flic Hub and Flic 2. 

Use Flic Twist with your existing Flic Hub
Use Flic buttons with the new Flic Hub Mini

Both Flic Hub LR and Flic 2 buttons will continue to be sold and maintained.

Flic Hub Comparison table



In this campaign we are only offering the new Flic Hub Mini. If you're interested in the Flic Hub LR you can upgrade your pledge after the campaign.








The Flic App for iOS and Android is only required when you set up your Flic Twist for the first time, and if you want to change your settings later. All settings that you make in the app are stored locally in the Flic Hub. 

Step by Step 
In the below video we demonstrate the simplicity of adding a Flic Hub and a Flic Twist to the Flic app to start configuring it. 






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































In the below video we demonstrate how your existing smart home products, in this case, a Philips Hue lightbulb, are added to the Flic app to be controlled with the Flic Twist. 






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































In the below video we show our test bench walking through the setup process step by step and demo the current state of the app and development. 






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00





































As a hacker, you never settle with the features that come out of the box. Flic has always been about empowering customers and provide a way to integrate our product into your personal projects. With HTTP integrations you can add smooth controls to just about anything that runs an HTTP server like your Raspberry Pi-controlled nerf gun turret. Twist to aim and push to shoot with unmatched precision. 






The one thing we knew before starting the design journey was that Flic Twist needed the ability to rotate. The majority of smart dimmers on the market have Up and Down buttons which are not user-friendly if you’re for example increasing the brightness from 10 to 100%.





We evaluated and tested different designs and realized that separating the button and rotation gives the best user experience.





We tested a variety of different sizes, from small knobs that you twist with your fingertips to large pucks that you rotate with your entire hand. After more than 10 design iterations we finally settled on the perfect size for the button and the rotating dial which is convenient to use for the entire family.






Flic Twist
The Flic Twist is designed with the same Nordic Semiconductor chipset as the Flic 2 button which has Long Range features that give an indoor range of up to 50m. It comes with two replaceable AAA batteries that last up to 2 years. 





Flic Hub Mini
The new Flic Hub Mini is a very optimized design of our already existing product Flic Hub LR. It uses Bluetooth 5 Low Energy Long Range to communicate with Flic Twist or with other Flic products. One Flic Hub Mini can handle over 60 simultaneous connections to Flic products such as Flic Twist and Flic buttons over a range of up to 50m (150ft). Flic Hub Mini then communicates with your smart home devices using WiFi. There are no limits in how many devices a Flic Hub can control using WiFi. 

A Flic Hub Mini or a Flic Hub LR are required, even if you use Flic Twist with Matter. The interaction is in the twist, and the brains and logic are in the hub. This setup allows Flic products to be extremely fast and battery efficient, while offering functions that no other products have, still with full privacy. 



The new Flic Hub Mini is much smaller and more affordable than it's predecessors. 













Everything you need to get started is included. Each Flic Twist comes with 2x AAA batteries and wall mount included. The Flic Hub Mini comes with the USB cable included. Below you'll find a list of all the available rewards.



A Flic Hub LR or a Flic Hub Mini is required. Flic Hub Mini can be added in the checkout. 





A Flic Hub LR or a Flic Hub Mini is required. Flic Hub Mini can be added in the checkout. 





A Flic Hub LR or a Flic Hub Mini is required. Flic Hub Mini can be added in the checkout. 










A Flic Hub LR or a Flic Hub Mini is required. Flic Hub Mini can be added in the checkout. 



























Shortcut Labs is a dedicated team of 14 with many years of experience in hardware and software development and with multiple products launched. The strong community that supports us in our mission by using our products day by day proved that our products bring value to the life of people. 





We'd love to invite you to join our community in the Flic Family. If you share our mission and what we are doing, back our product and help us to bring simplicity to the tech scene.

Mission
Shortcut Labs has been developing the Flic product for 8 years now. Our goal is to bring simplicity to the life of all tech users, from geeks to toddlers. Using your voice or various devices to control your smart home can become frustrating, tiresome, and anti-social. Voice is an excellent tool, but it does not work in all situations. 
With Flic Twist, we add more options to your hands yet retain the simplicity of the original Flic button. In addition, with Flic Twist, we hope that we can engage all your family members and guests to interact with your smart home while giving you more options to control your smart home.





Our Journey
Joacim, one of the Co-Founders of Flic, looked for a simpler way to track his nicotine consumption, so he decided to bring Flic to life. Shortcut Labs was founded in 2013 to create a simple interface - the world's first smart button. The first version of Flic was a great success, as almost ten thousand people backed its campaign.

Since the first Flic, we have completed two other successful crowdfunding campaigns. We have shipped over half a million Flic products to 85 countries around the world. Flic integrates with hundreds of technologies we all use daily. Every Flic user has a story to tell about how they use their button. From helping them start their morning routines to be the guardian that keeps their home safe, there are thousands of innovative and imaginative ways Flic is used. But underneath all of them, one thing always remains the same - Flic makes life simple. A shortcut and a life hack that brings smiles to millions of faces every day. Help us make Flic Twist a part of this journey and spread simplicity to even more people worldwide.

Privacy Policy
We take your privacy very seriously. This mindset is also relevant for Flic products. Our products do not have microphones, nor cameras. You can read our current Privacy Policy here.





The global supply chain is still recovering after the pandemic, and the prices right now are unusually high and unreliable. To avoid the current shipping costs we will not charge you for shipping now but instead wait until we are ready to ship your rewards.  

Shipping Costs will be charged upon shipping, there will be low cost postal and faster express options in the post-campaign survey.

Taxes and Customs
Your reward will be shipped either from the EU or the US depending on where you are. For EU and US, all taxes and duties are included in the rewards. For all other countries, taxes and duties may apply.

We can ship to over 100+ countries, except the countries and territories listed below



If you live in one of the countries or territories listed above we probably will not be able to ship to that destination. Feel free to reach out to us to verify.

record.Creator: UFactory
record.Title: UFACTORY Lite 6 – Most Affordable Collaborative Robot Arm
record.Text:
Nowadays, robots are widely used in big factories. They are expensive, large and heavy, they mainly work on heavy-duty tasks. However, few of them are designed for light and budget-friendly tasks. This raises a real challenge in keeping quick ROI in these tasks by using robots. A durable and affordable robot arm with industrial-grade accessories is key.












Fast Pick & Place
Designed with six axes, Lite 6 is perfect for simple, repetitive and monotonous tasks. It provides the speed and precision manufacturers require, meanwhile ensures quality and accuracy. The flexibility of Lite 6 allows manufacturers to optimize workflow, increase productivity, reduce floor space utilization, lower production costs. 







Lab Automation
Lite 6 helps researchers automate manual tasks and free up time to focus on more significant or pressing tasks. By using Lite 6 in lab automation, accidents and human error can be prevented. And above all, it can be customized easily to meet a lab’s needs.







Robotic Research
By taking advantage of open source SDKs, robotics research will be much easier. Moreover, in order to make robot integration relatively intuitive and smooth, we are working on ROS/ROS2 seriously.







Touchscreen Testing
Lite 6 is extremely versatile, it is able to gently test any type of touchscreen without leaving any traces or damage, and helps our clients to provide consumers with flawless products.






Coffee Machine
Lite 6 is lightweight and small, which is perfectly fit for space-saving applications such as robot bar, coffee machine. With a 500mm/s max speed and 1kg payload, it balances the efficiency and cost, especially for commercial applications.






Machine Tending
Compared with manual loading and unloading, Lite 6 drastically improves uptime. In addition, it's more accurate and repeatable, which increases the quality of parts produced, reduces the amount of human error in the machining process, maximizes throughput, and minimizes wasted materials and time. 











Ultra Cost-Effective Design
All new cost-effective actuators. The harmonic drive is a must to guarantee the repeatability of the robot, but it is also very expensive. So Lite 6 has hybrid actuators design to balance the cost and performance. In our design, the harmonic drives are for the high torque joints and direct drive motors are for the rest.







Moreover, crafted with carbon fiber, Lite 6 is 50% much lighter than other robots, which significantly helps to increase the payload up to 1kg.






Excellent Durability
Lite 6 is designed for 24/7 continually working. Combined with industrial-grade harmonic drive, actuators can execute the commands day and night without stopping.





The built-in 16-bit absolute encoder and FOC control algorithm, the customized brushless motor creates smooth movement, high torque capability, and delivers excellent repeatability.







Easy Programming
No need to spend additional money on training and software, Lite 6 offers users free software - UFACTORY Studio, even non-specialists can run it in 2 hours. Users can simply drag and drop to program and control it by a graphical user interface, which saves training cost and operation time. 






Users can teach the robot motions and positions easily and quickly, greatly simplifying robot programming, users can also program Lite 6 with Python, ROS, and C++. In addition, UFACTORY offers a free Simulator, users can try Lite 6 for free before they buy it.

Compatible Accessories

All-in-one Design Pneumatic Parallel Gripper

Taking advantage of the built-in pump design, the pneumatic gripper works perfectly without external air tubes outside. Equipped with a linear bearing, it provides a stable and smooth grasp all the time.








All-in-one Design Vacuum Gripper

Built-in pump design makes the internal wiring possible. And brushless pump motor enables the long-term lifetime for 24/7 continually working. Moreover, the air pressure sensor gives real-time feedback of pressure which makes drop-off detection possible.






Brilliant Compatibility and Extensibility
Thanks to a variety of I/O and communication interfaces, Lite 6 has excellent compatibility and extensibility, it can be integrated into various applications.






Fast Set-up
Lite 6 is user-friendly and pre-calibrated, which enables users to apply it to any process and in a different setting without professional training.






Plug-and-work
Lite 6 is a slave component rather than a master, thus it can be integrated easily via any computer or PLC











Compared to other robot arms in the market, Lite 6 is not only economical but also very excellent in performance.







You can also know the differences between Lite 6 and xArm 6.





















 Lite 6 SDK includes Python SDK, ROS/ROS2 SDK, and C++ SDK. A fully upgradable software platform that can grow in capabilities to make it a lasting and worthy long-term investment.





Lite 6 Studio supports multiple platforms that enable you to control it not only with PC but also with your iPad or Android devices.



















































We are a group of makers who make cool robots. Back in 2014, we created the world's first desktop robot arm, the uArm, and successfully funded it on Kickstarter. Last year, we made the uArm Swift campaign on Indiegogo and it becomes the most funded robot campaign in history. In 2018, we created xArm and successfully founded it on Kickstarter.
Our mission is to boost the digital fabrication industry, help human labor released from repetitive tasks, and focus on creative & more important work to create a better world to live in. And, we can have more time to enjoy wonderful life :)

record.Creator: Makeblock
record.Title: xTool M1 - Mini but Powerful Hybrid Laser & Blade Cutter
record.Text:
Normally, a laser cutter can perform very well on many materials such as wood, metal and glass. However, for some soft materials such as vinyl, which can be used for DIY T-shirts, sign making, logos and more, a blade cutter is preferable to avoid the burnt edge, discoloration and toxic fumes generated by laser cutting.





With xTool M1 which has both the laser and blade heads, you don’t have to waver between a laser cutter or a blade cutter (or breaking the bank to buy both). Your ideas can be realized on just one machine.






































To achieve adequately strong laser cutting and engraving power at an affordable price, we chose a diode laser instead of CO2 laser.

Numbers of digital design files for you to download. 
Multiple project cases with detailed instructions including digital design files, step by step instructions, materials checklists, and parameter settings.































Now, during our Kickstarter campaign, we are offering the best-ever price of xTool M1 starting from only $699. That is less than 1/5 of Glowforge's price, but still gives you about 80% of the functions of Glowforge Plus + Cricut Maker 3.


























The Rotary Attachment unlocks 360° engraving for cylindrical objects from 3mm to 70mm in diameter (with the raisers provided), with which you can customize a wide range of cylindrical materials.
*If you keep raising the machine, you can engrave objects in larger diameter.















Currently, due to worldwide supply chain issues, shipping prices are heavily inflated. To ensure you get the best possible rate, we will charge the shipping fee AFTER the campaign, closer to the shipping date.
Our current estimate is that shipping will be around 10%~18% of the order price, including tax & duties for most regions (Around 15%~25% for Australia and New Zealand). We can promise that the shipping fee we charge will be no more than 18% of most regions (no more than 25% for Australia and New Zealand), we will cover the excess part if it costs more. 










Note:
The safety class of xTool M1 is Class I (FDA Certified). We are on track to receive FDA/FCC/CE-LVD/EMC certifications before March 2022, which are necessary for delivering our products to the US, EU and most areas in the world.























Makeblock got its humble beginnings eight years ago. We launched our first project on Kickstarter, and thanks to the amazing Kickstarter community and our backers, we've been able to grow our business to where it is today - a company with over 300 employees...
From "one robot per child", our mission never altered. We continue to empower kids to enjoy the fun of creating.
This time around, with xTool M1, we want to bring powerful tools to everyone who enjoys doing things themselves. This first-of-its-kind machine is low-barrier, compact, and affordable.
The most important thing is not that we're presenting the world's first desktop hybrid laser & blade cutter and engraver, but that we always aimed to "WOW" our backers with our products.
We’re so grateful for all of your support along the way. Thanks for helping us bring xTool M1 to life.
