record.Creator: Clifton Roozeboom
record.Title: PocketLab G-Force: A science lab on wheels
record.Text:
PocketLab is trying to improve science learning around the world through our hardware products, apps, science lessons, and our community called Science Is Cool. Since the start of the COVID pandemic, PocketLab has been putting on free virtual conferences to bring science to everyone. Check out the video below to see what it's all about!













PocketLab G-Force is a toy-sized technology-packed sensorized car that empowers you to measure speed, acceleration, g-forces, and much more. You can create speed contests, design science experiments, and learn about engineering and physics. G-Force packs cutting edge technology in a rugged car chassis for tons of science fun.






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































It’s for every kid that grew up reading about science and wished more people would love the thrill of it. It’s for those collectors of endlessly cool tech gadgets. And it’s for those technophiles and inventors out there who know that supporting projects like these is to be part of something bigger. It’s science with the fun built in. 





Speed Racer: How fast are you going? PocketLab G-Force has a miniaturized odometer and speedometer that works just like a real car. The speedometer data transmits wirelessly to your phone, tablet, or computer in real-time.





Plays Well with Others: PocketLab G-Force can race through many types of HotWheels™ and other toy tracks for loops, roller coasters, and high-banked curves.





Cool Data: Crash cars together and measure the g-forces of a collision. PocketLab G-Force has an onboard inertial measurement unit (IMU) for advanced measurements, the same kind of technology used for autonomous driving.





Sparks Creativity: You can attach bumpers, parachutes, and pirate sails to the G-Force car to be creative with how you explore science.





Smooth Ride: Equipped with micro-ball-bearings, precision machined stainless steel axles, and fine-tuned mechanics- this is a lot more than a diecast toy car.





Love Learning: Science + Play = Life-long Learning





Get Nerdy: PocketLab G-Force is capable enough to investigate college-level science concepts in approachable ways. Who thought you could experiment with simple harmonic motion or three-dimensional kinematics with something that looks like a toy car?










PocketLab G-Force connects to the PocketLab App (called PocketLab Notebook) using Bluetooth for real-time data transmission. PocketLab Notebook enables you to control what the car is measuring and all the dials and gauges that show data like speed or g-forces. 





PocketLab Notebook also has hundreds of activities, lessons, and videos for exploring science and engineering. The activities are developed by a team of experienced educators and scientists and include collaborations with StarTalk with Neil deGrasse Tyson and other professional scientists and engineers working in the field. See some of the highlights below.






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































PocketLab G-Force, measures and transmits data for:

Speed and motion
G-Force 
Position and direction

PocketLab Notebook, the all-in-one platform for: 

Bluetooth connection and real-time data streaming
Digital lab notebook for students and educators 
Lessons, activities, and videos
Citizen science network

G-Force joins a growing family of PocketLab sensors used in hundreds of classrooms, labs, and homes across 60 countries around the world. G-Force joins our other award-winning products that enable anyone to be a scientist and explore the world around them.








































Picking out colors is the most fun part of buying a new car! PocketLab G-Force will be available in the classic color combination of white and orange plus other color schemes, and we want our Kickstarter backers to help us choose the other colors. During and after the campaign we will let all of our backers vote on the additional color options. You can see some of the ideas we’ve tried so far. 





We'll also include cool decals so that you can trick out your ride and make it your own. Get ready for some ghost flames, racing stripes, and maybe an F = ma bumper sticker!?










The journey to making PocketLab G-Force started in 2016 with our Need for Speed (Measurements)! Speed is a science concept that almost everyone understands, but it is actually really difficult to measure. We’ve been building roller coasters out of HotWheels™ track, K’Nex™, and anything else we can think of and using our sensors to turn them into science experiments. But it never quite worked well enough, so that’s why we built G-Force. Here’s an epic classroom roller coasters from some intrepid PocketLab physics teachers.





For the last year, we’ve been designing the hardware and mechanical systems that make up PocketLab G-Force. We have gone through many prototypes and we’re finally ready for production. The funding we raise on Kickstarter will go to the production costs of the product plus the up front costs for the machining and tooling needed for injection molding and circuit board assembly.





Here’s a raw, uncut video of the PocketLab G-Force prototype connecting to our Notebook app and streaming data in real-time. 






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00





































 Summer 2016: Experiment with methods to measure instantaneous speed of small objects in motion
 Fall 2018: Launch the PocketLab TurboTrack kit that enables science experiments to be performed on HotWheels™ track
 March 2020: Start hardware design of G-Force
 March 2021: Build first full prototypes of G-Force car
 October 2021: Launch Kickstarter campaign
 November 2021: Begin manufacturing tooling and production of G-force hardware
 March 2022: Production inventory ready
 April 2022: Final production testing
 May 2022: Ship complete products to Kickstarter Backers  








The PocketLab Team is a small group of engineers and teachers that believe in the joy of science. We believe that it is important for everyone to understand science and explore the world around them. We love our customers and users around the world and we hope you will join us.
PocketLab enables everyone to discover the joy of science and explore the world around them. 
The company started in October 2013 when inventor Clifton Roozeboom was developing new wireless sensor technology for his PhD. He was searching for a way to bring advanced sensor technology to science education. Now PocketLab is used by hundreds of thousands of people in 63 different countries.
By supporting our Kickstarter campaign, you are helping bring PocketLab G-Force to life, a product that we hope will inspire thousands of users to discover the joys of STEM education and citizen science.
Thank you!

record.Text:
The story is simple: BangProof was created out of need. There was no safety headgear for riders that wanted to keep their street credits. 

Basically, riders had to choose between feeling comfortable or protecting their heads properly with a bulky helmet. Not anymore! 

We packed technology into awesome streetwear designs, so the BangProof acts like a helmet, but feels and looks like the coolest hat ever!

The most reliable, action-sports-level head protection is ensured by anti-stab panels and high end technology materials that absorbs up to 95% of multi-impact energy!










Because, let’s be honest, tricks just look better in a street style, low profile cap! You gotta stay on fleek when flexing your skills!










BangProof gives you UV protection, stays on your head even after a duck dive, and if you somehow manage to lose it, it floats. We’ve got you covered, water-sports freaks! 





Bang-able, washable, unbreakable… A lot of „-ables” in BangProof’s repertoire to make your life easier. 
 Just wear it and go shred! 










When designing BangProof, we reached for state-of-the-art technologies  used by the military. Each layer of our cap was engineered to maximize its protective abilities, while not compromising with the fit and the feel.



































BangProof is designed as a snap back or  bucket and available in different sizes to fit your head perfectly!

Colour

Note: 
Many of the colours we are making for the Kickstarter will NOT be available for retail. If you see a colour combination you really like, now might be the ONLY time to get it. 















A water sports passionate and the current Polish wake-skating champion, undefeated for 3 years. Intelligent Decision Support Systems graduate, CEO of postproduction studio LocoMotive.pl, co-owner of GoMega and VRplanet. In BangProof, he’s responsible mainly for marketing activities, design, and technical solutions. 






Jan Olszewski is a snowboarder with over 20 years experience, lately fascinated with wakesurfing and splitboarding. He’s been into project management for 10 years and had founded 3 successful start-ups. Currently, the CEO of winter tour-operator Snowee.pl. His responsibility is finances, i.e. budget establishing and execution. 






Michal is from almost 3 decades on the snow, from skiing to snowboarding, still with the same joy. Has been dealing with Business Development and Commercial services for more than 10 years. record.Creator: The BLOK Team
record.Title: BLOK: Smart Cutting Board & Virtual Cooking Classes 🧑🍳
record.Text:
With BLOK’s embedded digital display and beautiful wood prep surface, you’ll learn how to cook delicious meals via live and on-demand cooking classes led by expert chefs. It’s a high-energy, engaging way to connect with friends and family all over the world.
...and it’s all from the comfort of your own kitchen!

































































Choose from a future library of fun, high-energy live and on-demand cooking classes led by expert chefs that fit your nutrition and dietary needs.










You’re going to love our super sleek digital display where you can watch video content, interact with friends and family socially, and follow along with recipes.
Even when BLOK is turned off, its chic design will make you want to leave it out on your counter for all to see.
Worried about getting it messy and wet? No problem. BLOK’s digital display is waterproof and scratch-resistant.










Prep your ingredients on the high-quality dark walnut wood cutting board while streaming cooking classes. When you’re done cooking, simply remove the digital display from the cutting board for easy cleaning.





The docking station includes speakers to stream the audio portion of your cooking classes, and a camera and a microphone to share and engage with your family and friends.
Once you’ve prepped all your ingredients, put BLOK on the dock so you can move throughout the kitchen while following the chef’s instructions and engaging with family and friends.
Plus, it has a wireless charger to ensure your BLOK is always fully charged!





All of the digital components in BLOK’s cutting board and docking station are controlled by our future app that will be compatible with both iOS and Android!
Plus, if you’re too busy to hit the grocery store before your class, you can order all of the ingredients in our future app and get your groceries delivered right to your home with a variety of delivery services.










High-energy, engaging live and on-demand cooking classes so you can prepare delicious meals in just 30 minutes! Here’s a sneak peek of what you can look forward to:

👋 Hi, we’re Tony and Alissa, creators of BLOK!
As husband and wife co-founders, it goes without saying, BLOK is a true partnership. Tony describes himself as a "reformed" lawyer who has spent the last decade of his professional life leading healthcare, wellness, and technology companies. Alissa has spent her entire career in digital media and television production. She also has two Emmys for her work sitting on the couple's mantle (Tony has no Emmys, but Alissa let him hold them once). Together, while working our separate day jobs and raising our three young children, we run BLOK from our home in the suburbs just outside of Philadelphia.
We spent a lot of time this past year cooking together at home. We quickly realized there were no fun and contemporary cooking classes that we could realistically stream with our family members in different locations throughout the country.
That’s when the idea for BLOK was born! We put pen to paper and started working on developing BLOK. We came up with an attractive custom-designed piece of hardware that creates a virtual experience for friends and family where they can learn to prepare delicious and healthy meals in a fun and engaging way. BLOK is so much more than a smart cutting board, it’s a community of foodies all over the world!






As one of the first crowdfunding marketing agencies, Enventys Partners has brought more than 750 crowdfunding projects to life through lead generation, campaign page creation, public relations, email marketing, Facebook Advertising, campaign management and more.



















Wireframe for our future app













BLOK’s founding principle is to cultivate a community in the kitchen-- to provide consumers access to real, relatable chefs while cooking delicious meals with friends and family. Without that community, and passionate, inspiring chefs, BLOK wouldn’t exist— and that’s why BLOK is committed to giving back. If BLOK reaches its Kickstarter funding goal, co-founders Tony and Alissa will make a personal donation of $2,000 to Careers through Culinary Arts Program. C-CAP is a workforce development nonprofit that provides underserved teens a pathway to success in the culinary arts in Philadelphia and across the country. As the BLOK community grows, Tony and Alissa look forward to growing their support for C-CAP. For more information about C-CAP, visit: ccapinc.org 










We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make BLOK a reality.
We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you can’t give a dollar or pre-order a BLOK, if you’re a supporter of BLOK, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of!

record.Creator: Fanttik
record.Title: X8 APEX Tire Inflator, Inflate Anything, Anytime, Anywhere!
record.Text:
Meet X8 APEX, a powerful, compact, and versatile tire inflator that provides super-fast inflation anytime, anywhere! Our new generation makes tire inflation more effective and easier than ever. With 150 PSI and 5 preset modes, it satisfies all your inflation needs such as car tires, motorbikes, bicycles, recreational inflatables, and all kinds of sports balls. If it can be inflated, X8 APEX can do it!



















































Maximum Pressure of 150 PSI is able to fulfill all your inflation needs. X8 APEX, your ultimate portable air compressor!






























Fast Inflation
Utilizing advanced technology, X8 APEX optimizes the inflation process by speeding it up 45% faster than before! Making tire inflation quick and easy. For example, a typical SUV tire can be fully inflated from 0 to 100% in less than 10 minutes!





Durable & Rechargable Power
With a built-in 7,800mAh rechargeable high capacity Li-ion battery, X8 APEX has a stronger battery capacity that makes it more practical. Imagine one charge lasting for up to 300 days standby!










With a maximum of 150 PSI pressure, X8 APEX provides 5 smart modes for specialized inflation of different items such as car tires, motorbike tires, bike tires, balls and also includes one customized mode.





 It also comes with an air tube and two adaptors, a schrader-presta valve, and a needle valve which make it compatible with any inflatable. X8 APEX - Your ultimate air compressor!

Auto-Shut Off Function
Once it detects the tire is fully inflated, it will automatically stop inflating to protect the item. No need to worry about over-inflating anything!





Adopting a cordless design, X8 APEX has only 5 touch buttons, one power key, one mode key, one light button, and a pair of +/- keys to adjust pressure values. It's so simple and easy to use that you won’t even need a manual to operate it.










Large LCD Display
X8 APEX has a large LCD Display that provides essential real-time information including tire pressure, battery life, and inflation modes. Even at night, the screen can be seen clearly.





LED Flashlight
At night or under extreme conditions, it can make tire inflation or tire change easier and safer.





Backup Power Supply
If your phone battery is dead, it can also be your emergency power bank that charges your phone right away.










X8 APEX is incredibly portable and easy to store. Keep one in your car for emergencies or take it along in your bag for outdoor adventures.

record.Text:
Enjoy more fresh-tasting cold brew coffee anywhere anytime you want. Super Sonic H, utilizing its innovative sonic wave technology, produces great tasting, low caffeine cold brew coffee in about 5 minutes! Not only that, with the Super Sonic H’s built-in Bluetooth speaker you can pair your favorite music or podcast with your beverage!





 The Super Sonic H Cold Brew Coffee maker is the next evolution of coffee, something we consider to be hybrid coffee. Fresher tasting healthier cold brew in moments.















Sonic Dutch is an innovation in cold-brewing coffee technology, making cold brew coffee in only 5 minutes, by utilizing the advanced sonic wave technology.
This not only saves your precious time when you are on the go, but also solves your typical ‘hygiene issues’ involved in the conventional cold brewing making process. The long steeping time, often more than 10 hours, means possible exposure to contamination such as E.Coli and other germs.
 What is more, Sonic Dutch technology does not compromise the taste and flavor of coffee. Because of the short brewing time, you can enjoy the very fresh taste of the coffee while the sonic waves extract the pure essence of the coffee, creating great tasting cold brew coffee.




















Waiting 10 hours for cold brew coffee is simply inefficient!  After that long wait time, you’re left with very little coffee. Worse yet, it doesn’t taste as good as it could.  The long steeping time invites taste-altering bacteria and germs.  Three wrongs simply don’t make a right.





With the Super Sonic H, you can taste the difference in a fraction of the time! Our revolutionary sonic sound wave technology allows to make cold brew coffee in as little as 5 minutes. This means you get much more great tasting cold brew coffee in less than a fraction of the time.
What is more, the low acidity, cleaner taste produced by the innovative Sonic Dutch’s built-in sound wave system will surely bring a smile to your face!





In 2020, we launched a Kickstarter campaign for our original machine the Super Sonic S1. It was a great success, and we have received many positive responses from our backers, which also include very helpful ideas and suggestions for future product development.
Using what we learned from our backers, we felt it was time for the next evolution.  We are proud to introduce The Super Sonic H.  It’s lighter, stronger (with the use of dual magnets) and more compact.
You can make amazing cold brew coffee in your home, office, or hotel room in just moments! Amazing cold brew coffee shouldn’t have to be a long and complicated process.





With our innovative sonic wave technology, you’ll be enjoying the great tasting, low caffeine cold brew coffee in about five minutes! Best of all with our system, it’s tastier and healthier than the conventional way of making it. 
Also, Super Sonic H has a built-in Bluetooth speaker that you can pair your favorite music or podcast with your beverage!  
In short, The Super Sonic H Cold Brew Coffee maker is the next evolution of cold brew coffee making, something we consider to be hybrid coffee. 










 The “magic” behind the Super Sonic H is the sonic sound wave technology.  This revolutionary innovation was created by Sonic Dutch Korea. 





Unlike traditional methods, this technique uses sound waves generated and the onboard magnetic circuits to create waves that mix the coffee as it’s being prepared. This combination of waves and vertical vibration create the perfect marriage to function and technique to create a quick and hygienic brewing process.










Simple. The longer the coffee sits, the more exposure to harmful bacteria may arise. This not only alters the taste, but may also cause hygienic problems! The quick and short extraction time of Super Sonic H eliminates possible exposure to harmful bacteria. What is more, the sonic wave cold brewing creates the perfect balance of caffeine and flavor. This ensures that every glass of cold brew coffee will taste as great as the last.










Many have asked. How can you extract coffee in such a short time? Does it really taste like coffee? Well, the answer is yes! And what is more, the taste is even fresher, richer and more flavorful. That's not all. With Super Sonic H, you can customize the taste by controlling the extraction time up to 30 minutes!





We undertook an experiment to measure the density of cold brew coffee produced by traditional cold brew extraction methods and Super Sonic H.  Results showed cold brewing for 5 minutes by Sonic Dutch is as dense as the results brewed for 10 hours by the conventional methods, and the coffee concentration increases even more as we increased the extraction time on Super Sonic H as shown above.










One of the key things that sets Super Sonic H apart is the lower caffeine. It has less caffeine than traditional espresso and conventional cold brew coffee.  
However, we understand that not everyone wants a lower amount of caffeine in their coffee all the time.  So with that, you are able to customize the level of caffeine by increasing the time setting on Super Sonic H, while still maintaining the refreshing taste of your coffee.  For the maximum amount of caffeine, you would simply need to have the Super Sonic H run for a longer cycle up to 30 minutes.





We requested the Korea Advanced Food Research Institute, the civil agency that inspects food, packing materials, herbal medicinal ingredients, and drinking water-related goods. The results were amazing!   





According to the report,  Super Sonic Cold Brew Coffee has much less amount of caffeine compared to other kinds of coffee including filtered and espresso coffee. While some of you prefer to have a certain amount of caffeine in your coffee, excessive caffeine is certainly not good for your health. Super Sonic H offers a way healthier coffee for you! 





With the built-in Bluetooth speaker, you’re able to create a cafe experience in your own home! Pair the speaker with your mobile device.  Listen to your favorite tunes while you are brewing up your favorite coffee!  










We designed the Super Sonic H to be sleek, futuristic and elegant.  It will be at home on any modern countertop.  The simple design includes a fold-out handle for easy transport. It also boasts a built-in Bluetooth speaker, three-button operation(One for Bluetooth, one for the timer and a start and stop button).















The Super Sonic H is currently being used in more than 1000 cafes in South Korea! So what do professional coffee makers think of our unique cold brew coffee making technique? The taste reviews are in: They love it!
Here is how an experienced barista described the coffee brewed by Super Sonic H, our previous product which essentially uses the same sonic wave technology:






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































 They found it to be “Very rich (in taste)” while “Not compromising the inherent flavor of the coffee”.










Another great thing about the Super Sonic is that it’s easy to use!  Too often people stay away from making their own cold brew coffee because it seems too complicated. 











You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00




































 We’ve been talking a lot about making cold brew coffee.  But that isn’t the only use for the Super Sonic H!





 This is a great device for wine lovers as well! What do we mean? Glad you asked! Using our Sound Wave technology the Supersonic can enrich the taste of your favorite wine by decanting the wine.  If listening to music on vinyl is how music should sound, then drinking freshly decanted wine is how wine should taste! The Super Sonic H unlocks that.










 It’s no secret that tea is one of the most popular drinks in the world.  With the SuperSonic H, you can enjoy perfectly made cold brew tea or milk tea in less than five minutes.  





 Tea Making





Milk Tea Making






  The device comes in either black or white.  With the outline of the speaker available in classic chrome, or elegant rose gold.  The internal LED light is available in either white or orange.










 Every story has a beginning.  The Story of the Sonic Dutch began with three coffee lovers sitting in their favorite cafe.   





As they often did, (Sonic Dutch’s soon to be CEO)Lee Sangjoon, (Sonic Dutch’s soon to be  head of mechanical design and product development)Meoungha Ji & (Sonic Dutch’s soon to be electronic circuit development) Taeyang Hwang discussed many things. With the most common topic of conversation being their favorite beverage: coffee. They loved cold brew coffee.

But much like the visionary Steve Jobs did when looking at archaic mobile phones, they knew where there was room to improve and innovate.  So a question was raised by a barista who posed us with a question: “what if we put cold water in a tumbler and used motion to extract the coffee?” This was the spark that would become the raging inferno of an idea.   This was the birth of the idea for Sonic Wave Technology. Millions of people have world-changing ideas. Only those bold enough to act on them are the ones who make history and change the world. To be totally honest, we weren’t looking to make history while sitting in that cafe. We just wanted to be able to make great tasting, refreshing, cold brew coffee in a short time.





It was with that spark that we first patented the technology in South Korea in 2015.  What followed was an international PTC patent. Thankfully dominos began to fall in the right direction. Followed by ten more patents.  Including 6 domestically, 2 in Japan, 1 in China and 1 in the United States of America.  These patents and the support of various governments opened the door to our current situation. 










We’re excited for you to help join us in bringing our innovative device to life. As such we’ve developed a tiered pledge system.















 Since the first conception of the product back in 2017, we have come a long way! Taking our expertise and years of trial and error refining the cold brew coffee making, we are proud that we achieved another milestone in the coffee industry, Super Sonic H.





Thank you very much for supporting us and we will keep our promise to deliver the product. Based on our current estimated timeline, we look to ship out the first batch in January 2022.

record.Creator: Matt Chang
record.Title: IVYCable - Self-Folding Magnetic Cable & Power Bank
record.Text:
We designed IVYCable to solve these common charging cable hassles. With magnetic sections and built-in batteries, IVYCable is an auto-folding charging cable & power bank with an on-board power-storage system. Say goodbye to messy cables and bulky power banks, IVYCable is here to free your hands and simplify your life.






















 Here is the unboxing video:













IVYCable instantly organizes itself as the magnetic sections join together into a neat compact shape. The automatic folding system turns the long cable into a non-deforming and non-tangling self-organizing unit, which is the perfect solution for eliminating desktop clutter.















Sorting out tangled cables for your smartphone is always annoying. But with IVYCable, this will never happen. Simply take it out, and plug it in. Power up your phone anywhere and anytime.















Cables tangle because they have redundant length that is not always needed. With IVYCable, you use just the length that you need and organize the rest of the cable via magnets so that it stays neat and tidy.






















Supporting pass-through-charging, IVYCable automatically recharges itself while being used as a charging cable.  It stores power in advance to avoid the frustration that results from dead power banks. The only thing you need to do is grab it and go.










IVYCable’s 3200 mAh capacity is perfect for all your daily needs and emergency use. With its small size and light weight, IVYCable is the best replacement for bulky power banks and goes with you anywhere.















Power banks are inconvenient to carry. They require extra cables and extra space in your bag. But with IVYCable, you can easily fit it in any pocket along with your phone.















To give IVYCable at-a-glance power level convenience, we designed an indicator light to show the battery status.












With IVYCable, you only need one cable to charge all your devices.
You can choose from 2 input types: USB-A / Type-C. Each IVYCable comes with three adapters: lighting, Type-C, Micro USB. IVYCable is MFi certified. 











The special section whip module design makes it not only the most useful workstation setup but also the coolest desktop toy. IVYCable is a must-have EDC for everyone.



























Built with TPE, IvyCable is durable enough for more than 3000 folds with excellent flexibility and strength. It’s also compatible for all environments with wear-resistant, high temperature-resistant, cold-resistant, and aging-resistant.











You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00
















































We are an experienced and passionate team from the Azurbit Company with 10 years of experience in the field of mobile device power accessories.
Matt Chang has been devoted to product innovation & design and obtained a number of personal patents and PTC reports.Louis Tong has been focusing on production management and operations.Mike Yan and Peter Guo are also engaged in OEM project management and R & D respectively.










IVYCable is the latest innovative product of the Azurbit team. Founded in 2011, Azurbit has been devoted to the research and development of consumer electronics, communication accessories, and smart hardware. We have cooperated with many global companies and have gotten more than 20 patents. Not only do we produce reliable products, but we also aim to innovate to offer customers a better way of living. We believe your life can be simplified with IVYCable’s self-folding and auto-power-storage system. 





























 This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 2,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $900M raised between them.

record.Creator: GREAT JOY
record.Title: GREAT JOY: Ultimate 1.8x Anamorphic Solution for Filmmakers
record.Text:
GREAT JOY offers a 1.8x anamorphic solution for a cinematic artsy look with true anamorphic characteristics. Born to create masterpieces, GREAT JOY has got what it takes to produce a Hollywood blockbuster: high-quality images without deformation, natural and saturated blue lens flares as well as buttery smooth elliptical bokeh. It’s the perfect way to use a full-frame coverage lens to achieve a wider perspective, higher quality, and more details without cropping, compared to APS-C or M4/3. With GREAT JOY, you are able to enhance the artistic appeal of your footage and immerse your audience in an anamorphic world.
































With 1.8x anamorphic squeeze, GREAT JOY highlights the anamorphic features and creates captivating oval bokeh and regular horizontal lens flare in an ultra-wide cinematic aspect ratio.










This distinctive, unique oval-shaped bokeh, and soft out-of-focus blur adds a sense of depth while highlighting the photo subjects, creating a stunning effect that makes your photos and video more artistic and interesting.





The clear & anamorphic streaks across the image give another layer of complexity to the shots.





































By optimizing the optical design and reducing manufacturing errors typical of other lenses, the distortion and lens breathing are well controlled.











GREAT JOY cleverly combines sharpness and film-like image quality together, revealing the subtle details of the picture and delivering stable and cinematic video.










GREAT JOY provides 4 mount options including Sony E, Canon RF, Nikon Z, and L mount. The copper mount with chrome coating fits seamlessly and snugly with works with all top brand cameras.





















With M67*0.75 mount, the GREAT JOY 1.35X Anamorphic Adapter allows you to use on lenses with 67 mm front thread diameter, providing 1.8x spot combined with GREAT JOY 1.33X Anamorphic Lens or giving all your spherical lenses the anamorphic look.


































Setting infinity focus on the main lens, the adjustment on adapter allows you to focus on subjects from minimum focus distance to infinity. 





GREAT JOY 1.35x Anamorphic Adapter focus distance down to a minimum of 70cm, great for close-up work
















The GREAT JOY Anamorphic Adapter provides a 264° ultra-wide focusing ring rotation for precision focusing





The adapter features a 77 mm filter thread so you can attach CPL, filter or matte box. Furthermore, the front lens element does not rotate during focusing. It also comes with self-locking ring to align with lens without damaging the surfaces.





























Made of top-grade aluminum alloy and the same glass used for high-end film lenses, GREAT JOY is lightweight yet durable enough for reliable shooting in any situation. The self-lubricating anti-wear surface and metal lens cover give it a substantial feel and balance during use.





For more stable shooting, a 1/4” screw has been added under the lens in order to provide solid support.





Featuring a standard 0.8 modulus, the focus ring, and aperture ring come with perfect movement and accurate controls, smooth enough yet with the appropriate amount of damping.




























































Born in China, Team GREAT JOY is a promising enterprise of senior professionals and engineers from various backgrounds. There isn’t anyone who is putting out this kind of quality at anywhere near this price. So here we are. We are dedicated to presenting inspiring images and connecting creativity and future technologies for moving images and professional productions worldwide with Exceptional Quality, Exceptional Value, and Exceptional Affordability.

Marketing Partner

record.Creator: Omar
record.Title: tether - Projecting safe zones around bikes
record.Text:
tether: safer roads, powered by cyclists 
A bike safety device that projects a safe zone around your bike, responds to road users around you, identifying safe and unsafe roads in your city. 





We believe cycling is the best way to travel around a city. It can also be really dangerous and stressful. 

Close passes by overtaking cars are the biggest cause of fatal or serious accidents involving cyclists. Road rage is on the rise as communication between cyclists and motorists is limited, and we have little understanding of the safest route to cycle across our city. tether was invented to solve this problem and connect to a new community that create safer roads for everyone the more they use it.





What it does     






 tether attaches to your handlebars and projects what we call 'The Bubble' a safe zone around your bike,  encouraging drivers to give you enough space as they overtake.
Embedded sensors continuously monitor and detect other road users and overtaking vehicles, publishing this in real time to a companion app.
Locations of overtakes are recorded to identify safe and unsafe zones in your city to help plan safer routing.

Functionality & experience
tether has been designed to attach to any handlebars, top stem or down stem giving a clear line of sight for the sensors and allowing the projection to display around the bike. 











You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































Current functionality and experience:

Turning on the device activates the projection and sensors which will trigger a change in the projection with an overtake within 1.5m.
Connect the app via bluetooth, the sensors pick up absolute distances up to 2.5m, that means it can identify all overtakes whether they are too close or safe. These readings are collected and sent to the app multiple times a second. At the same time GPS is recorded to identify the types of overtakes on different roads.
The app works in the background so you can lock your phone screen and put it in your pocket while you ride, but the readings are shown on screen to check everything is working before you set off.
At the end of your ride end the session on the phone and the data is automatically uploaded to the cloud with everyone else's.

The final refinements will include: 

Widening the projection so that it is easier to see when approaching a cyclist from behind. 
Replacing the current 3d printed (in SLS) with a really sleek aluminium machined casing, anodised in black and a limited edition of colours available.  
Replacing the bolt on the attachment with a quick release thumb screw to take your device with you easily when you lock your bike up.






Specifications

 Power: Prototypes are using a rechargeable lithium battery (though exploring the use of larger cells), the current prototypes last up to 6 hours for continuous use, taking around 1 hour to fully charge. Charging is by a micro USB (cable  comes in the box).
 Dimensions: 127mm x 74mm x 46mm
 Materials: The casing is machined aluminum, bead blasted back, looks great and subtle on the bike.
 Waterproofing: Sealed to ensure the internals are protected in the rain, definitely London proof. 
 Attachment: Attachments are provided to fix tether onto your handlebars, the top stem, or down stem with an easy bolt to unfasten by hand to easily take it off when you park up.
 Brightness: Super bright 10mW LED lasers. 
 Sensors: Sensors in the right left and front can detect objects distance up to 2.5m accurately able to distinguish the type of vehicle based on the profile of sensor readings.
 PCB: Our custom PCB designed, and lovingly hand soldered act as the nerve centre of the device, connecting via bluetooth to the app, and controlling the sensors and projection. 

Under the hood 










Our pre production prototype is fully functional and being road tested to iron out the final kinks, we have established relationships with component suppliers, with PCBs and casings being manufacured right here in London. Our assembly is also done in our workshop in Bethnal Green. We have spent a year developing prototypes, testing out different technologies, approaches and incorporating feedback from our early adopters. Narrowing down to a prototype that is easy to attach and universal to all handlebars.















 tether is designed, assembled and manufactured in the U.K. between our design studio in Peckham and our manufacturing shop in Shoreditch, good for product quality, ethically manufactured and good for our carbon footprint too.
What's unique about it?
tether is designed to connect you to a community to create safe cycling routes for one another. The more people have and use tether the more we learn about which areas of your city are safe or unsafe to ride through.
The sensors are the clever part, they are similar to the parking sensors in cars, they detect passing vehicles on either side and in front. Readings are taken and the distances of overtakes recorded (up to 2.5m) and sent in real time to the app.  We've even figured out a way to distinguish between people, cars, lamposts buses and even dogs... 





The app records the GPS location of where overtakes are happening, based on how safe (or unsafe) those overtakes are we can analyse and display routes for you to travel on safer and stress free. 





We found that there are lots of different types of handlebars out there, by working with our early adopters and attaching and testing it to multiple bikes we are confident tether can attach to any bike and any handlebar.





Early adopters 
Our pre production prototype is being road tested with everyday cyclists, couriers, and commuters with folding bikes. 





"WOW, there you go (when turning it on for the first time" C.O. Commuter, rides an old school road bike
“I spend so much money on bike tech, and this would actually make me safer and help me be on the front foot with letting drivers know, this is my space. All the drivers in London hate couriers like me.” Jeremy, courier, rides an ebike
"I think the projection of cyclist safe space is great but the idea of the community creating safe cycling routes for one another is something I've not seen before." J.K commuter and weekend warrior 
Our vision: What's Next
We are currently in testing with our early adopters and aiming to fund the 1st production run of 200 with the funds raised on Kickstarter. We have chosen to limit the first run to 200 to keep quality high, ensure manufacturing and assembly can stay in the UK and most importantly to ensure that the team can be dedicated to service and support our early backers, before moving onto the next stages of our roadmap.
We hope this first stage will prove the demand for a product like this and provide us with enough data to identify problematic or dangerous areas of the cities where our users are riding. In the long run we are interested in developing tether for other forms of micromobility from skateboards to scooters, and that the patterns we uncover can be used by courier fleets or planning better cycling infrastructure for cities.
Origin Story 
www.tether.bike
In March of 2020 - ether emerged as a skunkworks project from goya design studio with a small team of engineers and designers from Loughborough University (where Omar graduated from). Starting as an idea to help people socially distance during their outdoor exercise during lockdown we quickly uncovered the dangers cyclists face by closely overtaking cars. Omar the founder of goya was himself knocked off his bike in a similar way 20 years earlier, suffering a bad head injury.
Working remotely the team developed the initial prototypes, testing behind closed doors until we successfully applied for a patent protection which is currently pending.

record.Creator: Enkl Sound Copenhagen
record.Title: Danish design, tech & power in new Bluetooth speaker
record.Text:
Elegance & design combined with tech & power
Enkl Sound Copenhagen is introducing the first Bluetooth speaker with 80 hours battery playback time, multi-user access, phone as microphone,  quality audio up to 125 dB and functional Danish design.



Elegance & design combined with tech & power


The Enkl Speaker is a powerful Bluetooth that goes to 125 dB which is the level of a professional PA-system at a concert. The Enkl speaker combines Bluetooth-technology, battery-technology, app-technology, audio performance and design to make probably the world's most user-friendly Bluetooth speaker for an active life on the go.
Enkel means ‘simple’ in Danish and it reflects our ambitions of making sound simple to use, simple to share and simple to move. To make it even more simple, we have shortned enkel to Enkl.



80 hours battery, 1 hour fast charge & 125 dB


You can become a backer in just 3 easy steps:
·  Step 1: Click the large, green "BACK THIS PROJECT" button to the right of the video at the top of this page.
·  Step 2: Select a reward and fill in your information. It’ll only take you a few seconds!
·  Step 3: Once the campaign has ended, we will contact you for shipping information.





Let's get started zooming in on all the unique features...



For more info visit www.enklsound.com



80 hours battery playback time
With +80 hours battery playback time on a single charge, Enkl Sound is setting new standards for playtime.
The Enkl Sound Energy Management System has a unique configuration that optimizes and adapts energy consumption with the actual volume and type of music played.






1-hour fast charge
The Enkl Speaker has only 1-hour fast charge and you are quickly up and running again. 1-hour charge and 80 playback time takes the battery performance to a new level. For a charge of only 10 mins you will be able to play for 8-10 hours. You can even charge your phone in the USB-C and let your phone rest in the handle during charging.
You can charge the speaker or your phone while playing music on the speaker.

Audio that outperforms
We love sound and we care about good quality sound. The Enkl speaker exceeds expectations for sound quality in a Bluetooth speaker.  Our precision-engineered acoustics deliver clarity, depth and fullness that you would expect from wired Hi Fi speakers. 



Tested by acoustics experts in our anechoic chamber


Tech Insider: Bluetooth
We believe in 'Bluetooth First'. Because Bluetooth gives you ultimate freedom of movement and usability. Here are some of our takes on Bluetooth:

We use hardware based on BT 5.2. and a special implementation of BT Low Energy Audio (BLE Audio) sprinkled with proprietary knowhow. BLE Audio is the Bluetooth standard of the future and we are probably one of the first companies to implement. With all the improvements BLE Audio brings we see this as the wireless audio interface on which innovation will be based for the decades to come, and we are proud and humbled being one of the companies leading the way.
We want to make sound simple and with the advent of Bluetooth 5.2 this is now even more possible as BLE Audio besides very high efficiency and lower latency also allows for lossless audio codex. In audio applications where there was previously a need for cables or energy consuming wireless technologies to keep latency low and resolution high, these are now obsolete. Just the benefits remain.
With our implementation of BT 5.2 compatible hardware its possible to connect to unlimited devices which means that you can combine several Enkl Speakers as a sound system. With the Enkl App, you can choose which speakers should be right, left or centre.

Tech Insider: Sound
The Enkl Sound speaker is a one-point music system with immersive and powerful sound. 

The acoustic set up of comprises two 10'' neodymium woofer bass drivers for powerful bass performance and a one 1,5'' Ceramic Horn Tweeterall jointly developed with Italian B&C group and combined with a bass port. 
The acoustic system which is powered by 320 watts from two pairs of low distortion Multilevel Class-D amplifiersand controlled by an in-system DSP is expertly tuned and delivers exceptional clarity and depth, giving the user an up to studio-quality listening experience at home or powerful sound on the go.
The Enkl Sound speaker also uses our proprietary dynamic bass system which presents a big sound image at lower volumes, and the listener can thus hear the deepest richest bass notes. Most traditional speakers can’t do this, regardless of brand or price.

Audio interface – Bluetooth First
 The Enkl Speaker relies solely on BT as media interface. With the advent of Bluetooth Low Energy Audio (BLE Audio) introduced with Bluetooth 5.2, we believe this is right platform for the years to come. BLE Audio is not only highly energy effective – with the Enkl Sound implementation it also supports the Low Complexity Communication Codec (LC3)which promises a much greater audio quality at even lower bit rate levels than its predecessor; the standard SBC codecs. Some listeners even prefer the LC3 above third-party Bluetooth solutions such as e.g., AptX (Qualcomm) or LDAC (Sony) codecs. We do too.


Suppliers & partners



Working with renown partners in the industry


Easy to connect
Why should it be a hazzle for people in the same household or a group of friends to connect to their Bluetooth speaker? Enkl Sound marks an end of pairing your phone with the speaker and makes it seamless to shift between users. You as an owner can let multiple users connect to the speaker. When you and they have paired once, and you have accepted them once, all users are automatically on. 

Your phone and all users' phone is a remote control and all users can control the speaker. So your phone is your phone. There is no need to share your phone anymore - you just share the music. 

With the always-on function, you even don’t have to get up and turn it on/off.



Easy to connect and control the speaker with the Enkl app


First ever multi-user access
This is NEW and groundbreaking technology and we are extremely happy to make it possible to share the music experience and give access to unlimited users. Now Enkl Sound makes it possible with multi user access in Bluetooth speakers. Welcome to a new standard based on Bluetooth 5.2 and BLE Audio technology.

You as an owner can give access to unlimited users in the Enkl App. This means that:
- All users in your household or group of friends are automatically on and you do no longer need to pair with the Bluetooth device to shift between users.
- All users can control the speaker and get access to all functionalities. Simply download the app.
- You as an owner can control the users and give the limited or umlimites access.

Multi-user access will be available in early 2022 app update.



Connects unlimited users



Your phone as microphone
Always a microphone nearby that you don’t need to share. Use your phone or Bluetooth headset as microphone. Easy to give a speach, sing along or use for sport lessons. Simply turn on/off in the app. This is yet another great invention by Enkl Sound.
Phone as microphone will be available in early 2022 app update.



For speaches, service messages or even karaoke



Enkl Sound System with multi-speakers
Connect more than 10 speakers to an Enkl Sound System. Set right/left/mid/bass for a professional and powerful setup. Start sharing with multi users on multi speakers.



Connect 10+ Enkl speakers to an Enkl Sound System


Loud to the limit
125 dB – the level of a live concert with hundreds of people outdoor. Very powerful acoustic sound to go. However, there might be situations where you don't want your speaker to be able to play that loud. 
The owner can control the volume by setting a loudness limit in the app. This means that no users can play louder than the loudness limit set by the owner.



Set start level & loudness limit in the app. Volume also to be controlled on the speaker control panel or from your phone.


Extreme portability
The Enkl Speaker is the most lightweight Bluetooth speaker at 125 dB. With only 10 kg and less than 50L it is the smallest and most lightweight Bluetooth speaker at 125 dB. 

Materials are extremely durable, and are drop resistant and water resistant with IPX4.

An alu handle on the back makes it easy to carry your Enkl Speaker. And the handle is also made to be a perfect base for your phone.



Easy to carry in one hand





Dimensions: 559 x 451 x 282 mm / 22 x 18 x 11 in (H x W x D)


Theft protection
The owner can deactivate all users and lock the regular Bluetooth connection. Uninvited guests will not be able to use the speaker, and the speaker is thus not interesting to steal. Only the owner can re-activate the Enkl Speaker.
Also, you can chain the speaker in the metal handle for extra safety.

The app
The app is available for free download in App Store and Google Play (from February 2022). All owners and users can freely download and use the app. Only the owner will need to register. Registration is optional for users but will give access to more functionalities by registering.
The app is dynamic and we will constantly improve and app with new features. With a simple app update, you will get new features to your Enkl speaker.

Designed to move people
Our Danish design team has developed the Enkl speaker in a triangular shape that is extremely solid and at the same time elegant. All joints are made invisible and screws are hidden inside the cabinet. All three sides are with a smooth and even surface, and you can place the speaker on either side.





The Enkl speaker is designed for a social and active life whether it be in private settings, at the workplace or at events.



For every type of occation





Durable and practical design that you can easily sit on.





Designed to move people



The evolution of the prototype & functional test
A prototype is not just a prototype. It is several prototypes and the journey from the development of the first prototype to the final prototype has teached us a lot about sound and portability. Follow the evolution of the prototype here.

Sustainability & materials
We believe in design that improves the existing. We are commited to timeless and minimalistic design that is made to last. The design and the Danish design team is founded in the Scandinavian design tradition with focus on solid, durable and quality materials that improves and optimizes usability.



Enkl Sound is working actively with Sustainability Development Goals 7 & 12


We want to contribute to reducing energy consumption and make the world a greener place. With our energy efficient electronics and Energy Management System we reduce energy consumption by 3-7 times compared to a conventional Bluetooth speaker.

The speaker cabinet is made from one single piece of recyclable plastic. The fact that it is only a single piece also makes it easy to recycle. 

Join the portable sound evolution
We have created Enkl Sound because we want to move the boundaries for portable sound. We believe that the world needs a Bluetooth speaker that is shareable, longer lasting, and that looks good too.





Created by an experienced team of engineers in wireless electronics, Bluetooth technology and audio performance together with award-winning Danish designers, the Enkl Speaker is the new normal that takes Bluetooth speakers to the next level.





Timeline
 We are ready to ship to you from February 2022.





Enkl Sound Copenhagen: Who are we?
We are dedicated to improving the existing and challenging status quo. We are rooted in Denmark and our Danish and Scandinavian way of simple and easy living.





Besides the above, our team of engineers are top professional and have vast knowledge from wireless audio and Bluetooth technology.

Use of Kickstarter funding
Funds from this Kickstarter will be used to:

Finetune final tooling for rotational molding
Procure production quantities of parts and assemblies
Finalize app backend
Perform all necessary regulatory testing and certifications
Implement our proven manufacturing procedures at production scale
Deliver the Bluetooth speaker of tomorrow to our customers


Join the portable sound evolution - together we can make it happen!

record.Creator: Deeper Network
record.Title: Deeper Connect Pico
record.Text:
What is Deeper Connect Pico 
Deeper Connect Pico is the world’s thinnest, lightest, smallest, and yet the most unique and powerful cybersecurity hardware device, which integrates a 7-layer enterprise-grade firewall and the world’s one and only Decentralized VPN (DPN).





Pico continues the legacy of the Deeper Connect family of products with the same plug-and-play setup and all the familiar features, providing convenience for people who travel frequently. With an included Wi-Fi Adapter, you can enjoy a safe and fast private network anytime and anywhere whether you are at home or on the go.















 What Can Deeper Connect Pico Help with 






Absolutely No Annual Fees or Subscriptions
Coming fully loaded with DPN (Decentralized VPN), Ad blocking, and Cybersecurity features, the Deeper Connect Pico can save you over US$ 600 a year compared to subscribing to similar individual services. 





Plug-and-Play 
Zero Configuration
Deeper Connect Pico is a truly all-in-one solution requiring minimal configuration to connect to all your devices, with the included Wi-Fi Adapter simply set up the Pico at home or on the go to enjoy all of its amazing features.





One Device
Multiple Configurations
Access to Unrestricted & Secure Internet Anytime, Anywhere




















Decentralized Private Network (DPN)
It is not VPN, it is the better DPN





The worldwide network of Deeper Connect devices enables a fully decentralized VPN experience (DPN) with Multi-Routing, Smart Routing and unrestricted access to content from any country without sacrificing Internet speed. DPN is not VPN, DPN has no centralized servers, ultimate control over your own encrypted data, censorship free providing a democratic internet with no speed dropping.





*To learn more about DPN, please refer to this article "A 101 on DPN".  





In the Decentralized Private Network (DPN), each device serves as both client and server and their IP address will be automatically changed based on their routing rules. Deeper Connect can establish up to 16 tunnels to other nodes all over the world. By default, they will be established in the US, Europe, Singapore, and China.

Enterprise-grade Cybersecurity
Deeper Connect Pico comes with a fully-featured suite of enterprise-grade security functions to keep you safe while online and protect all your IoT devices. Never again worry about your and your family’s safety while browsing online and rest easy knowing that every device in your network is secure.





The lock-free operating system running on the Pico, AtomOS, provides a 7-layer firewall with deep packet inspection, anti-tracking, intrusion prevention and more. These features are typically found in enterprise-grade products costing several times more than the Pico.





Protect All Your IoT Devices
Deeper Connect Pico grants peace of mind and prevents malicious actors from gaining access to your personal information, IoT devices, personal computers, and anything else connected to your network. There is no configuration necessary, once the device is powered on your network will be secure.
Deeper Connect has been designed by top-level network security and distributed systems experts. The company's core technical team are veterans from Google, Palo Alto Networks, VMware, and other industry-leading companies.





Blocking All Ads
Deeper Connect Pico is capable of blocking ALL ads, even including pesky YouTube ads (save $144/year). Never again deal with annoying interruptions while you are browsing or watching videos.





Pop up ads, banner ads, suggested products, embedded ads; these all intrude on the content you really want to access and are targeted based on information about you. After blocking those ads by Pico,  you can enjoy a fast and undisturbed browsing experience. 






One-click Parental Control
Deeper Connect Pico offers simple and effective parental control.  Keep your children safe from inappropriate or dangerous content on the internet with a single click. Enable filtering to block those undesirable websites and even set up your own custom lists to control what content can be accessed.
Deeper Connect offers simple and effective parental control, by which a single click from you will enable/disable a filter for pornography and violence-containing websites.





Bandwidth Sharing
We do not own any centralized servers as every Deeper Connect is in essence a server and a client. All these devices distribute around the world to communicate and share bandwidth with each other.
Every user can set a limit to the amount of bandwidth he/she wants to share with other users. One advantage is that users can receive credits for sharing their bandwidth to later exchange them for Deeper Network services, which include monthly software updates.
This form of sharing economy has the advantage to benefit the users who contribute to the sharing, without the need of a middle man mediating the transactions or charging fees.










What's in the Box 






Deeper Connect Pico Evolution History 

























Time Line






About Us
Deeper Network represents the world's first decentralized blockchain network for building a truly private, secure, and fair Internet.
Deeper Network Inc. was founded in Silicon Valley in 2019 with the vision of leveraging blockchain technology to empower the real users of the internet and building both the Web 3.0 infrastructure of the future and an accessible gateway for everyone to join the revolution. 





We have world-class talent working on the project. Most of our team members used to hold important positions in Google, IBM, Alibaba, etc. Our technical core team members are from Palo Alto, Fortinet, and other companies that are world leaders in cybersecurity. 

Community





 Important Notice:  
*Shipping is currently unavailable for Mainland China
*CUSTOM DUTIES are to be paid by the recipient. Duties levied differ across regions. Deeper Network is not responsible for any duty charges.
*Please fill in your SHIPPING ADDRESS in English. Please also avoid using any special characters such as "Nº; º C".  
*Please find the USER MANUALs at http://deepernetwork.cc
*Deeper Connect Pico comes with a 5V2A USB-C POWER SUPPLY with US plug. Users located in certain countries and regions, please consider the need for an adaptor. 
*If you have any further questions, please contact: SUPPORT@DEEPER.NETWORK

Connect with Deeper

record.Creator: Glenn Fleishman
record.Title: Monotype Electro Type Matrix: 3D Model and 3D Print
record.Text:
This small campaign is focused on a single type artifact: the Monotype Electro Display Matrix, developed by the Monotype Company in the early 1900s to cast large multiples of individual pieces of type. The funds raised by the campaign cover the cost of producing an accurate 3D model of a single matrix, suitable for 3D output, and making 3D prints to fulfill campaign rewards.
Understanding the past often requires the means to study it. In my research over the last several years into the history of printing and typefounding and typesetting, I’ve collected many artifacts that give me insight into how things were made and how that affected publishing, design, and the spread of information.
Many printing artifacts are in short supply, as they haven’t been manufactured in several decades or much longer. To gain access to limited tools, you can make fresh copies of them—and 3D scanning, modeling, and printing is a fantastic modern technique that can bring the past back to life. 
I need your help to produce and refine a model of the Electro Display Matrix and release it in the world. 



A historic Electro Display Matrix with scuffs and marks from being in use and being idle


Campaign backers will receive the 3D file first. But to further cultural and technological understanding, six months after backers get access, I will distribute the file under a Creative Commons CC-BY 4.0 license, which permits any use with attribution, allowing its wide distribution. This will allow others with the interest to have a perfected model to reproduce or build from without starting from scratch.
Reward tiers include:

The 3D file, suitable for printing or sending to a service bureau to print
A 3D-printed version of the matrix in at least PLA, but possibly higher-grade material
A historic Electro Display Matrix (shown below), available in a limited quantity
A historic Super Cast matrix at the top reward tier, used for larger sizes of type

This project is the first foray into what I hope will be a future series of 3D models of printing artifacts. I drew inspiration for this project from the 3Dhotbed teaching tools developed as a collaboration of the Texas A&M University Book History Workshop, Cushing Memorial Library, and Texas A&M University.
Because I don’t yet have the model made, I can’t show you what they would look like. However, I can show an example of something comparable, the type punch from the 3Dhotbed project. In the image below, this is how the model appears in 3D-printer preparation software, as a print in PLA material, and as a 3D print in metal.



Example of a similar project: previewing the print (left), print in PLA (center), print in metal (right)





A case of historic Electro Display Matrices


This Artifact’s Place in Typecasting
The Electro Display Matrix is one of several kinds of molds (or matrices) used to create type by casting it in a liquid lead alloy, which fills the mold and quickly cools and hardens. The size and type of mold varied with the point size of the type. The Electro Display Matrix was used for display type, from 14 to 36 points.
A type-foundry worker would mount the Electro Display Matrix into a holder and place it in a specialized typecasting machine. They could then monitor the machine as it produced hundreds to thousands identical pieces of metal type per hour. Each piece would emerge in its nearly finished condition, ready to be added to a font—a set of metal type at a specific size in one style—and shipped off to a printer or put in storage for future orders.



Illustration of matrix (left) and casting machine (right)


The Electro Display Matrix is a thing of beauty, containing two types of metal and involving machining, stamping, and an electrochemical deposition process called electrotyping.
In electrotyping, a model of what the finished piece of metal type should look like is inserted into a cavity in a piece of machined and stamped bronze. The process deposits copper onto the model, forming the mold when the model is removed. See images for illustrations of this process.



An illustration of the electrotyping process to prepare to make a matrix from Electrolytic Matrices by Phil. T. Nuernberger



Each number on the mold refers to the font of which it is part, its width, its size, and other technical characteristics. The finished matrix’s dimensions are 1.125 by .75 by 0.094 inches. Beveled edges allowed it to be locked into place in the casting machine.
Electrotyping allowed a massive increase in the variety and production of type in the latter half of the 19th century and Monotype and other companies further accelerated that by creating a standardized mold to cast type.
Some modern experimenters have replicated the process on a very limited scale, as producing these molds in quantity required industrial operations.



Electro Display Matrices and other type molds produced metal type of varying sizes, like those shown here.


What the Campaign Will Achieve
This campaign will pay for the cost of 3D scanning, modeling, and prototyping a copy of a single matrix. I am working with an established 3D modeling firm that has produced work of similar complexity from original objects and has given me a firm estimate for the work to be performed.
Part of your pledge supports releasing the 3D model for broad use without fee or restriction.
The commitment of this campaign is that the matrix will be 3D-printed in PLA (polylactic acid), a hard plastic-like material. However, depending on the final costs of production and the volume of items ordered, I hope to be able to upgrade that to 3D printing in some form of metal. All backers who pledge for a 3D-printed matrix will receive the upgrade if the budget allows for it.
Many Monotype matrices remain in use at active type foundries around the world, such as M&H Type in San Francisco (part of the non-profit Grabhorn Institute) and the Bixler Press & Letterfoundry in New York. However, I regularly come across small sets of Electro Display Matrices that are not in the right condition for typecasting. A cleaned-up matrix from a recovered set is part of the higher-tier rewards, like the one shown below. (My intent is never to remove material from circulation that could be used by active letterpress printers or type foundries.) 



Front, back, and receding view of a historic matrix


This campaign will help preserve the past, spread knowledge about the technology, and give backers a unique replica or actual piece of printing history.
Backers at the top tier will receive two 3D-printed and two historic Electro Display Type matrices and one Super Caster master, of the kind shown below.



Super Caster matrix, part of the top-tier reward


Shipping and Taxes
Shipments within the United States: This project’s reward prices include sales tax for shipments made to addresses within Washington State in the United States.
Shipments outside the United States: I do not collect GST, VAT, or import duties for items shipped outside the United States. You may be required to pay the delivery company taxes or duties when physical items arrive in your country. These often range from between 10% to 25%, depending on the country.

record.Title: Rotolight NEO 3 and AEOS 2 LED Camera Lights
record.Text:
Welcome to our campaign for the most advanced LED lighting in the world: the brand new Rotolight NEO 3 and AEOS 2. Designed and manufactured in the UK for photographers, videographers and filmmakers, the latest products from our design team are amongst the most powerful around.





Just how powerful is the NEO 3 and AEOS 2?
Check out this awesome video of the NEO 3 and AEOS 2 in action on a recent shoot at Laredo Western Town in the UK.
