Live Event
We recently held a live event with Jason Lanier so that we could answer any questions you might have about the new NEO 3 and AEOS 2 - you can watch it again below and see just how amazing the lights perform.



Nothing beats seeing results - While on one of Jason Lanier's shoots, he captured this incredible shot of the beautiful Andrada using the AEOS 2 in continuous mode. 
Jason said "It's a MONSTER, and has already become my favorite light" 

Settings: Sony A9, f/1.4, 1/5000 sec, 50mm, ISO 100. Shot in continuous mode on the AEOS 2.










Here at Rotolight, we’ve been widely recognised and consistently awarded as one of the leading manufacturers in our field. Our goal has always been to offer innovative, revolutionary lighting that no one has ever seen before. This is your chance to be among the first to own the latest in Rotolight technology.












Packed with more world-firsts than any other light, the NEO 3 and AEOS 2 are LED lights that have been built to lift your content to another level. Each light packs a serious punch with its best-in-class output and features never-before seen technology that we are incredibly proud and excited to share in this campaign.





 NEO 3 Comparison Chart










AEOS 2 Comparison Chart 





With both the NEO 3 and AEOS 2 available for backing in this campaign, let’s look at each one more closely so you can see the extraordinary impact these 2 British-made lights will have on your photography and videography.





Rotolight NEO 3: small but mighty
A pocket-sized powerhouse, boasting a jaw-dropping 4541 LUX at 1m, NEO 3 is the brightest LED on-camera light ever made, so much so that it has almost twice the power of its nearest competitor. 
Experience unrivalled power and industry-first innovations in a compact form that you can take anywhere. Powerful and portable, this light is a hero for hybrid shooters - if you can dream it, you can shoot it.















This enormous leap in power output follows on from the game-changing NEO 2 back in 2017. Amateur Photographer had this to say about the NEO 2 on launch and we believe the NEO 3 will follow suit! 





High-Speed RGB Flash
For portrait photographers, the NEO 3 combines the shoot what you see benefits of continuous light with the world’s first High-Speed Sync RGB flash (1/8000th). With a powerful output of 10,700 LUX at 1m and zero recycle time, you can get up to 100,000 full-power flashes on a single battery. 





Shoot at any colour temperature from 3000-10,000K for a significant boost over continuous light performance. For the first time, you can also shoot in any one of NEO 3’s 16.7 million colours or 2,500 digital filters for ultimate creative lighting effects. NEO 3 can be wirelessly triggered at up to 656ft (200m) with the integrated Elinchrom Skyport flash receiver with Skyport transmitters, available as an add-on when selecting your pledge. Alternatively, you can use your existing triggers using the 3.5mm flash sync socket.







A World of Colour at your Fingertips
Featuring state-of-the-art RGBWW chips, NEO 3 offers endless possibilities to enhance your creativity. For the first time, you can flash in any one of 16.7 million colours or 2,500 of your favourite digital filters from brands such as LEE - never before has a light so compact packed such a colourful punch.





Industry-first Touchscreen Technology: Intuitive, Fast, Responsive
Revolutionise your workflow and save time on set with Rotolight’s industry-first intuitive, full-colour touchscreen. Navigate through menus, effortlessly access and adjust key features and recall your favourite settings at a moment’s notice, perfect for when creativity can’t wait. 
In fact, the NEO 3 and AEOS 2 are so advanced, you can switch the fans into "stealth mode" straight from the touchscreen menu so that when you are shooting video, there is no sound from the fans. 





Power You Can Depend On
With battery performance like this, you’ll never be left in the dark. With a bespoke, high-performance, USB-C rechargeable lithium battery, the NEO 3 is the creative companion you can always rely on. This unique battery can be charged via the USB-C port located on the bottom of the battery or with our brand-new fast charger which is included in the NEO 3 – Ultimate Bundle, or you can purchase it as an add-on when selecting your pledge.
Cutting-Edge Special Effects
The NEO 3 is packed with our award-winning suite of CineSFX™ (Fire, Lightning, TV, Gunshot, Paparazzi and much more), so you can add extra drama to a scene at the touch of a button. Our advanced technology allows you to customise, save and instantly recall your favourite settings, reducing time on set to make your shoot as smooth as possible. Designed in conjunction with Stefan Lange, visual FX veteran (Batman, James Bond Skyfall, Tomb Raider), CineSFX™ utilises NEO 3’s RGBWW engine to deliver realistic full-colour lighting effects.






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00




































Unrivalled Colour Rendition
Get the shots you need first time with Rotolight’s award-winning colour engine. With outstanding colour reproduction and a TLCI of 99, the NEO 3 reduces editing time by ensuring beautiful skin tones that give you fantastic results. You can even eliminate shadows and add a sparkle to your subject’s eye with Rotolight’s signature catchlight effect for perfect portraits.










Rotolight AEOS 2: The light you can take anywhere
With the AEOS 2, the world is your studio. The most portable 1x1 light ever made, this innovative LED light offers unmatched versatility for photographers and filmmakers.






















The Lightweight Heavyweight
When you need power and portability, there’s the AEOS 2. Weighing only 1.4kg, this category-leading, lightweight and ultra-thin design is the ultimate location light, giving you the versatility you need to easily achieve the results you’re searching for.
In fact, visual FX veteran Stefan Lange, had this to say about our original AEOS design.





High-Speed RGB Flash
For professional studio and portrait photographers, AEOS 2 combines the shoot what you see benefits of continuous light with the world’s first High-Speed Sync RGB flash (1/8000th). With a powerful output of 17,800 LUX at 1m and zero recycle time, you can get up to 100,000 full-power flashes on a single battery.





Shoot at any colour temperature from 3000-10,000K for a significant boost over continuous light performance. Alternatively, shoot in any one of AEOS 2’s 16.7 million colours for the ultimate creative lighting effects. AEOS 2 can be wirelessly triggered at up to 656ft (200m) with the integrated Elinchrom Skyport flash receiver with Skyport transmitters, available as an add-on when selecting your pledge.





A World of Colour at Your Fingertips
Featuring state-of-the-art RGBWW chips, AEOS 2 gives you the opportunity to light and flash your subject in 16.7 million colours and 2,500 digital filters from brands such as LEE, unlocking unlimited creative possibilities.





Reliable Power
If you’re looking for reliable battery performance with a low power draw, AEOS 2 is the creative companion for you. Its superior output uses only ⅓ of the power draw of its closest competitors, reducing your running costs but doubling your light output.
As well as the option to power the AEOS 2 from a PSU cable, you have the added benefit of fitting V-Mount batteries for combined portability and long-lasting use. Choose from 95 Wh, 155 Wh and 310 Wh batteries in our add-on menu when confirming your pledge.
In addition to V-Mount batteries, you can also add a conversion plate so you can use our brand-new NEO 3 custom batteries, also available in the add-on section.





Industry-first Touchscreen Technology: Intuitive, Fast, Responsive
Streamline your workflow even further with Rotolight’s industry-first intuitive, full-colour touchscreen. You can save time on set by effortlessly navigating through menus, accessing and adjusting key features, and recalling your favourite settings at a moment’s notice. Ideal for working to tight schedules and lighting safely and efficiently on location, the AEOS 2 gives you the speed to control features on the fly.
In fact, the NEO 3 and AEOS 2 are so advanced, you can switch the fans into "stealth mode" straight from the touchscreen menu so that when you are shooting video, there is no sound from the fans. 





Award-winning Special Effects
The AEOS 2 is packed with our award-winning suite of CineSFX™ (Fire, Lightning, TV, Gunshot, Paparazzi and much more), so you can add extra drama to a scene at the touch of a button. Our advanced technology allows you to customise, save and instantly recall your favourite settings, reducing time on set to make your shoot as smooth as possible. Designed in conjunction with Stefan Lange, Visual FX veteran (Batman, James Bond Skyfall, Tomb Raider), CineSFX™ utilises the AEOS 2 RGBWW engine to deliver realistic full-colour lighting effects.





Unrivalled Colour Rendition
Rotolight’s award-winning colour engine has outstanding colour reproduction and a TLCI of 99, with the skin tone accuracy reducing editing time, giving you realistic, impressive results. You can even produce perfect portraits with Rotolight’s signature catchlight effect, eliminating shadows and bringing a sparkle to your subject’s eye. 







 Masters of Light: shaping the next generation of technology 
We’re fortunate enough to be partnering with some of the industry’s best world-renowned photographers and videographers, including an extraordinary group of photographers known as ‘Masters of Light’. Not only do they skilfully portray just how beautiful each subject is when shot using Rotolight products, but they also help us shape the next generation of technology, much of which you will see in the NEO 3 and AEOS 2. 



Voices from around the world
Rotolight LED lights are used by thousands of photographers and videographers around the world. It’s their feedback, reviews and content that help drive us to achieve new heights with our technological breakthroughs. Take a look at some of their video reviews and content below.






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.

 SmartSoft™ - Now Available in Add-ons! 
SmartSoft™ technology was first introduced in our flagship lights, the Titan™ X2 & X1. This unique features software will be pre-installed in the AEOS 2 and will allow you to electronically adjust your light’s diffusion via an electric diffusion panel which is purchasable separately and will be available in the add-ons soon, focus and spread without the need for gels. Like a 216 diffusion on an adjustable dial, SmartSoft™ provides the flexibility of a beautiful soft output and a harder light source all-in-one, a technology we’ve integrated into our latest designs.

Rotolight Speedring Adapters - Available in Add-ons NOW!
Rotolight Bowens S Mount Adapter RRP: $69 (£49.99 ex tax) Campaign Price: $55 (£39)

Compatible with Rotolight NEO 1/NEO 2/ NEO 3,  AEOS 1/ AEOS 2
The Rotolight Bowens adapter connects using an innovative fast-mount bracket to a standard Bowens S Mount, allowing movement forward and backwards on a rail and tightened inside your modifier
With one small easy height adjustment, the same adapter can be used to mount the NEO & AEOS centrally in the modifier
Continued access to adjust light settings on the touchscreen or wirelessly control from the Rotolight App

Rotolight Universal Speedring Adapter RRP: $69 (£49.99 ex tax) Campaign Price: $55 (£39)

Compatible with Rotolight NEO 1/NEO 2/ NEO 3,  AEOS 1/ AEOS 2
Connects to the umbrella/softbox side of standard speedrings including INTERFIT, PROFOTO RFI, PHOTTIX and many more, placing the light inside your modifier
Once connected, the lights can be adjusted backwards and forwards on a rail and tightened, fixing them in position, centrally in the modifier
With one small easy height adjustment, the same adapter can be used to mount either the NEO 3 or AEOS 2.
Continued access to adjust light settings on the touchscreen or wirelessly control from the Rotolight App
Additional Speedring compatible adapters to be confirmed

Rotolight Speedring Light Stand Adapter RRP: $69 (£49.99 ex tax) Campaign Price: $55 (£39)

Compatible with Rotolight NEO 1/NEO 2/ NEO 3,  AEOS 1/ AEOS 2
Works well in combination with the Universal Speedring Adapter.
Eliminates the need to use Bowens S mount or other adaptors with users existing speedrings, and provides greater access to the back of the light for touchscreen adjustments.   
Connects to the rear of standard Speedring adapters speedrings including INTERFIT, PROFOTO RFI, PHOTTIX and many more.
Lightstand adapter provides a male 16mm baby stud or ¼ 20" mount to standard tripods, umbrella brackets or lighting stand
Once connected, the lights can be adjusted backwards and forwards on a rail and tightened, fixing them in position.
With one small easy height adjustment, the same adapter can be used to mount the AEOS and AEOS2
Continued access to adjust light settings on the touchscreen or wirelessly control from the Rotolight App

Rotolight Speedring Light Mount Adapter and Universal Speedring Adapter BUNDLE: RRP: $129.99 (£95 ex tax) Campaign Price: $103.99 (£75 ex tax)










Stay Connected
What better way to future proof the NEO 3 and AEOS 2 than to include integrated Wi-Fi and Bluetooth® technology. Not only will you be able to wirelessly control the functions of your NEO 3 and AEOS 2, but you will also be able to update each lights firmware using the integrated USB port featured in both lights when we launch new performance improvements, available from Rotolight's website, free of charge!
The Rotolight App
With the new Rotolight app, easily switch between lighting modes to adjust the colour, power, flash settings and much more right from the palm of your hand. You can create custom groups and projects on up to 20 lights - the perfect solution for staying on top of your setup.












To say thank you for supporting our campaign, and for being the first to own this new technology, we’ve put together several exciting pledges that you can select from. Not only will you be accessing amazing discounts from RRP, but we will also be shipping ALL pledges for FREE*
*Note: Please scroll to Shipping, Taxes and Duties for further details

Now that you have been dazzled by the Rotolight NEO 3 and AEOS 2 and realise you must own one, it's time to choose a reward. We have included this handy table so you can see exactly what comes in each pledge on offer. 















Instructions
DESKTOP
1. On a desktop, simply hover your mouse over the chosen reward and click "Select this reward" 
2. Select your shipping country
3. The pledge amount will automatically appear in the box, select continue 
4. On the next screen you can configure your reward and add optional add-on accessories to complement your reward at discounted prices

MOBILE
1. Simply tap on "back this project"  
2. Choose the correct reward level and tap on "Select this reward"
3. Change shipping location to match which country you live in
4. Configure your reward and add optional add-on accessories to complement your reward at discounted prices
5. Enter your card information or use a pre existing card and then click on Pledge


How do I cancel or change my pledge?
While a project is still live you can cancel your pledge by visiting the project page and clicking the "Manage your pledge” button on the right-hand side. From there, click "Cancel Pledge" next to the "Change your pledge" link.
Remember, a pledge can only be cancelled while a project is live. If the project has ended and pledge collection has started it is no longer possible to cancel.
Note: It is not possible to decrease or cancel a pledge during the last 24 hours of the campaign if doing so would drop the project below its funding goal.





Keeping our unique look and trademark form factor was integral to our campaign when designing the NEO 3 & AEOS 2 lights. Our current users of the NEO, NEO 2 & AEOS LED lights can use many of their current accessories with the NEO 3 and AEOS 2. What’s more, new-to-brand backers in this campaign will have immediate access to over 30 accessories at discounted prices in our add-on menu, further advancing the versatility and capabilities of the NEO 3 and AEOS 2.










Shipping, Duties & Taxes
That's right, worldwide FREE Shipping - During our continued research, we are fully aware of the temporary rise in global shipping costs, delays at ports and reduced container availability. This had originally placed a lot of constraints on the team, however with a lot of hard work and determination over the last 6 months and to show all our customers and backers our appreciation for the continued support, we will be committing to shipping all pledges and add-ons for FREE* worldwide!
*VAT, GST, Taxes & Duty – As we will be shipping pledges from locations within the US and UK, these pledges will not be liable for importation taxes and duty. Any pledges received from within the EU and other locations outside of the US and UK will be liable for local duty, taxes or GST and any other importation costs and will be the responsibility of the backer





Rotolight is a pioneering British technology company specialising in creating award-winning LED lighting products for photographers and filmmakers. Known for constantly pushing the boundaries of innovation, Rotolight strives to create products that provide unique tools to image makers, allowing them to realise their creative vision and aspirations with ease.





Leading where others follow, Rotolight has developed countless industry-first features and has been widely recognised with numerous global awards and accolades for its innovation, technical excellence, and product quality. As a family business, Rotolight has a unique long-term outlook that allows us to focus on continually investing in delivering outstanding quality products and a totally unique customer experience.















Ever since the launch of our NEO 2 and AEOS around 4 years ago, we’ve been working closely with our customers, Masters of Light and independent lighting specialists to bring you a whole new line-up of products brimming with technology. We knew that the NEO 3 and AEOS 2 had to be ground-breaking. We set about reviewing all the feedback we received, as well as reading through online customer reviews, to better understand what changes you wanted to see.















Rotolight Titan
We also decided to take a closer look at our $5000 Titan technology - what if we could fit some of that incredible technology into a consumer light? With our award-winning team behind the wheel, we were able to do just that with the NEO 3 and the AEOS 2, future-proofing them for our backers and customers.





Turning a sketch into reality
Creating an app simple enough to use, yet intuitive. The Rotolight app truly did start out as a sketch that brought to life the first Wi-Fi and Bluetooth® controllable on-camera lights from Rotollight.  





The moment the NEO 3 and AEOS 2 came to life! 
After all the design and hard work, there is nothing more exciting than witnessing new products being switched on for the first time! We get the same buzz every time and it never gets old. Here we share that memory with our backers in these raw and candid videos where you get to see the features of the NEO 3 and AEOS 2 come to life.
 Rotolight AEOS 2 



 Rotolight NEO 3 








We love content, pure and simple. Below you’ll find all the links to our social channels - head on over today and join our community of creative followers. We update our pages regularly with videos, offers, workshops and tips and tricks for using Rotolight products. We especially love to see the creativity and quality our customers produce when using our products, so don’t hesitate to share your work with us.






























Press
If you are looking for our latest press folder, follow the link below which contains images, logo’s, PR release and product information for the NEO 3 and AEOS 2

record.Creator: June Kinoshita
record.Title: Hyperscore: A new way to compose music
record.Text:
"The single coolest thing to happen to music ever." — Thomas O’Hara, age 12 
Hyperscore is a revolutionary music composition software developed at the famed M.I.T. Media Laboratory. Designed by a team led by Tod Machover (called by the LA Times "America's most wired composer"), Hyperscore is simple, intuitive, and fun to use while enabling children and adults to compose complex, original music without requiring years of training. 
Here's how Hyperscore works:



 Thousands of children have used Hyperscore in Machover's Toy Symphony and City Symphony projects, creating compositions that have been performed by renowned orchestras, rock and jazz bands, and numerous other artists. Hyperscore was previously available only as software running on Windows, which severely limited its use in classrooms and by the public. But we have now licensed Hyperscore from M.I.T. and redeveloped it as a Web app that works on any desktop, laptop, or notebook computer with an internet connection. Our mission is to empower children (and adults too) to find their voice through music composition using the web-based version of Hyperscore. 
This fall, we have been beta testing Hyperscore for the Web in two dozen classrooms in the U.S., Canada, and Germany. Teachers have told us that students are being creative, helping one another with tips on using Hyperscore and wishing that class time would not end. (Now that's music to a teacher's ears!)
By backing our campaign, you will enable us to complete the software development needed to release Hyperscore to schools as well as the general public. This backend software will position us to generate sales revenue so that we can provide Hyperscore to schools with limited arts budgets, while sustaining our operations for years to come. As a backer, you will receive access to Hyperscore for your personal enjoyment while helping to put this wonderful technology into the hands of budding composers everywhere.
 “The whole orchestra and I unanimously agree that [Toy Symphony] is one of the most important things we have ever done...”  – Kent Nagano, conductor, Deutsches Symphonie-Orchester Berlin

record.Creator: Dan Pastusek
record.Title: PiBox: A Modular Raspberry Pi Storage Server
record.Text:
PiBox is a sleek, ultra-fast, modular storage server, powered by Raspberry Pi.
PiBox is a purpose built storage server (NAS) designed for running self-hosted applications at your home & office, runs 24/7, and uses very little power. Storage is modular, and allows you to add any two SATA compatible SSDs.

Powered by Raspberry Pi





The Raspberry Pi Compute Module 4 is at the core of PiBox. Our standard bundle includes 8GB of RAM, 8GB of built-in storage, and WiFi. If you pick the hacker bundle reward (i.e. carrier boards only), you will need to supply your own CM4, which is available in 32 variants, with a range of RAM, eMMC Flash, and WiFi options. A Micro SD card slot is present on the PiBox boards, so you are able to use the "Lite" variants without onboard storage.

Hacker Friendly
With a Raspberry Pi at the core, PiBox is the most hackable NAS on the market. We broke out the GPIO pins so you can wire up sensors and Pi HATs, and even included a header for 2 extra USB ports in case you want to install it in a larger case. On the front panel, there's a user-controllable RGB LED and a 1.3" LCD that you can use for displaying any information you want.






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00
































Better than the Cloud
Replace expensive cloud bills with PiBox. PiBox lets you easily migrate from Google Photos to PhotoPrism, or from DropBox to Nextcloud, and many more. Pibox runs new self-hosted applications at the click of a button.

This video shows how you can install PhotoPrism on your PiBox:






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00
































Powered by KubeSail
KubeSail is optional software that helps you

Install and manage new software easily via templates 
Access the software on your PiBox anywhere in the world, securely, even behind a firewall
Backup your PiBox's software configuration and data regularly

We built KubeSail in order to make it easy to self-host apps, wherever they live. We ship KubeSail software with PiBox and hope you enjoy it, but you are never locked in or forced to use it. PiBox is deeply rooted in an open ecosystem and we have instructions on how to flash your PiBox from scratch if you enjoy tinkering!

Customizable LCD Display and LEDs
By default, the front of PiBox shows important stats about your PiBox. You can customize the screen to show anything else, such as the Weather, Tweets, or even your favorite cat GIFs. The top indicator is a tri-color RGB LED, wired to three separate GPIO pins of the Raspberry Pi, so its easy to customize. Install some software that takes advantage of these features, or write your own!






Silent Operation
The PiBox emits a PWM control signal so the fan only spins as fast as necessary. This makes it quieter than even the Official Raspberry Pi Case fan, and keeps the CPU from experiencing large temperature swings, which should lead to longer CPU life for your Pi. Typically this is done via a dedicated controller chip that is impossible to buy currently, due to the ongoing chip shortage. But thanks to some clever code from alwynallan on GitHub, we are able to ship a silent PiBox now, with no delays.





Open, Hackable, and Upgradable
The PiBox is designed to be opened. All the components are modular and upgradable, including the backplane and carrier board. For example, this means that you can continue to use the expensive Raspberry Pi Compute Module and SSDs, even if you later decide you need a PiBox with more ports, or a larger front display.






DIY Edition (Hacker Bundle) - 10 Minute Assembly Video
This video shows the assembly instructions for the DIY edition of PiBox. In this reward tier, we provide the carrier and backplane boards, and the rest is up to you. You will need to provide your own Raspberry Pi Compute Module 4, Cooling Fan, 15W+ USB-C Power Supply, CM4 WiFi Antenna,  1.3" LCD Display, Case (3D Printed or Metal), and one or two SSD drives.






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00
































Meet the Creators





Hi there! We're Dan and Seandon. After becoming friends while working and scaling up servers at Imgur, we founded the startup KubeSail with a goal of making home-hosting awesome. The most common complaint we kept hearing is that it was a hassle to get good home server hardware (existing options were too small and slow, or too big and loud). We designed a fits-in-the-palm-of-your-hand server based on the latest Raspberry Pi CM4 and ultra-fast SSDs, and you can customize it! - Buy the stand-alone hardware or combine it with KubeSail.com for apps, dynamic DNS, web-forwarding, backups and more!

record.Creator: Personomic
record.Title: Personomic — Custom-made bike grips with high durability
record.Text:
The bike grip from Personomic is the last grip you will ever need: 3D printed to fit your hand, made of 100% silicone to prevent stickiness and customized by you according to your design preferences.
Hand discomfort will be a thing of the past with your own custom-made bike grip.





During the development of the grips, we took advantage of our network of people specialized in ergonomics as well as people with a medical background.
Independent studies have shown that Personomic grips excel at reducing the pressure load on the hands, thus preventing and reducing common cycling-related hand issues. 
The grips fit on almost any handlebar because they are standardized and to top it off, they are 100% made in Germany as a guarantee for their quality.


Problem & Solution
As a cyclist, the problem is all too familiar: whether it's the saddle or the bike handle, you often have to deal with numbness, tingling or pain that can really ruin the cycling experience.





Until now, bicycle grips have only been offered in standard sizes, developed with an average-sized hand in mind. Therefore, these grips only constitute a compromise. For many people it is mostly a bad one, because every hand is different.

In addition, the vast majority of bicycle grips are made of rubber and start to become sticky after a short time. This is caused by the plasticizers contained in the material, which dissolve from the handle due to UV radiation and sweat.





Our solution turns the bicycle grip market on its head: a bike grip that is 3D printed to fit the individual cyclist with just a photo of the hand, therefore providing optimum support. The grip is made of silicone, which contains no plasticizers, therefore it will never become sticky and will last for many years.


Benefits & Features
 🤗 Numb hands will be a thing of the past 
The bike grip from Personomic is custom-made for your hands. We take the individual characteristics of your hand into account, such as the width and length of your fingers and your palm. This allows for a perfect fit. 





The force is distributed evenly across your hand and there are no pressure peaks that compress the nerves — similar to an orthopaedic insole.
The enlarged surface with the wing also supports your wrist and prevents hyperextension, one of the main reasons for numb or tingling fingers.

♻️ Silicone prevents stickiness 
Regular bike grips made of rubber quickly start to become sticky because of the plasticizers they contain.
We have recognized this problem and therefore use silicone, because it is extremely abrasion-resistant and guaranteed not to become sticky – you will be able to enjoy your grips for years.






 💎 Your own design 





We specify the shape of the grip and you design it. You can let your creativity run wild with the design and choose from over 350 design combinations. Choose the color, texture and lock rings. You can even have the handle engraved, making your dream grip unique to you. 

🇩🇪 Quality 100% made in Germany 





We use only the best materials and manufacture in Germany to offer a premium grip. With the company Rapid Shape, we have gained one of the world's leading manufacturers of 3D printing systems as a partner to guarantee the best possible quality in production.


📢 Reviews of our testers
— These reviews have been translated from German to English —
From the outset, we have developed the bike grips with passionate cyclists and have incorporated their feedback into the development. This allowed us to develop a grip that is tailored precisely to the needs of cyclists.
I have now tested the bike grips extensively and their shape is just incredible. I've never experienced such a pleasant grip before and I've run through lots in the past. I tore a ligament in my left hand 2 months ago due to a fall. With the bike grips there are no issues whatsoever. They support the injured hand really well. — Hjalmar P. from Bochum










I didn't feel any tingling or numbness in my hands. My problems stem from my thumb basal joint because of arthritis, but that also became much, much better. On longer tours they have always hurt a lot, but with the new grips there was a lot of improvement. — Silvia A. from Kirf





The different surfaces (asphalt, gravel) did not lead to any (negative) changes in my hands ... the bike grips simply "swallowed" the vibrations, which I personally find important.
... Conclusion: if the grips are positioned correctly, they bring (me) noticeable relief. The problems with my hands have become significantly better, even on long-distance tours. — Susanne K. from Muenster





On Facebook, the young start-up Personomic was looking for testers for their custom-made and ergonomic bicycle grips. With a bit of luck, I was chosen as a tester due to my history of rheumatism and have now been testing these grips for 4 weeks and about 400 km. I am absolutely thrilled how these grips have improved my "cycling life". — Andreas K. from Schwalbach












🖐 Real world studies prove the effectiveness
The reviews of our testers are confirmed by pressure analyses. In a study conducted by the University of Stuttgart, our custom-made bicycle grips were compared with six other ergonomic grips available on the market.





Force measurements showed that compared to conventional bicycle grips, our grips are the best at reducing both the pressure peaks on the palm as well as the surface pressure.


📦 Rewards





In addition to the grips, you can order end plugs and lock rings as add-ons to use them as spare parts if needed. 





This is how you get your grips:







💡 How it works
1️⃣  Scan your hands 





Before your grips go into production, we will ask you to scan your hands on our website. All you need is a smartphone with which you can take a photo of each hand on a sheet of paper. The photos will then be sent to us.





We are compatible with both DIN-A4 and US letter formats.

2️⃣ Customize your grip





After you have successfully scanned your hands, you can design the grip according to your own design preferences in the configurator.  

3️⃣  We measure your hands





We can measure your hand with just one photo. The sheet of paper serves as a reference object whose exact dimensions we know. With your hand measurements, we then create a freely movable 3D model of your hand.
Similar to orthopaedic insoles, our software creates a virtual imprint of your hand including the palm rest and grip recesses.
 
4️⃣  We create your grips





We then print a mold that has the shape of your hand and cast it with silicone. The result is a bike grip that fits your hand perfectly and will never become sticky.


✅ Fact sheet





* Handlebars are standardized. You can measure yours if you are unsure.
** We plan to offer shortened grips for grip shifters in 2022.

📦  What's in the box 





🧩  Textures  





🌈  Colors 





🔒  Lock rings 







⏱ Timeline







🚚 Shipping





Please note that you will be responsible for any potential import duties, taxes and customs fees after the shipment arrives in your country (not valid if you reside in the EU).
After the end of the crowdfunding campaign and before the start of production, you will be asked to scan your hands as well as choose the design of your grips. During this process, you will also be able to set your delivery address.


🧑‍🎄 The perfect gift





Do you want to give your loved ones a really unique present for christmas or their birthday? In this case, we provide you with a printable voucher in a design suitable for the occasion.
You will receive the download link in time by e-mail.


🚴 How Personomic was born
We love cycling and believe that bikes as a means of transport can contribute to climate protection and make our cities more livable. However, common cycling-related hand discomfort is a problem because it limits people's ability to ride their bikes. That's why we use high-tech 3D printers to enable people to ride their bikes without any discomfort.





When we met in 2020 just when the COVID-19 pandemic started, we were faced with the question of how to proceed in our lives. Due to the uncertainty, it was obvious that we should use the crisis to start our own company.






We created the first prototype of the bicycle grip using impression material that is usually used by dentists. Through these experiments, a rough shape for the bicycle grip emerged quickly. Finally, we set the final design after many iterations.





We were already on German national TV with our grips. Moreover, we were able to present our grips to thousands of cyclists at the VELOFrankfurt and Eurobike bike fairs. The feedback we received was overwhelming.
With your help, we now want to make the bicycle grips available to as many people as possible!









Deutsch 🇩🇪
Der Fahrradgriff von Personomic ist der letzte Griff, den du brauchen wirst: im 3D-Druck individuell auf deine Hand angepasst, gefertigt aus 100 % Silikon gegen lästiges Verkleben und außerdem von dir nach deinen Vorlieben designbar.
Mit deinem eigenen maßgefertigten Fahrradgriff gehören Handbeschwerden der Vergangenheit an.





Während der Entwicklung der Griffe konnten wir auf unser Netzwerk, bestehend aus Ergonomiespezialisten sowie Personen mit medizinischem Hintergrund, zurückgreifen.
Unabhängige Studien haben gezeigt, dass Personomic-Griffe die Druckbelastung auf die Hände hervorragend reduzieren und damit Handproblemen, die beim Radfahren häufig auftreten, vorbeugen bzw. diese reduzieren.
Die Griffe passen auf fast alle Lenkerstangen, da diese standardisiert sind. Außerdem sind sie zu 100 % in Deutschland hergestellt, was für ihre Qualität bürgt.

Bekannt aus: 







Problem & Lösung
Als Fahrradfahrer kennt man das Problem. Ob beim Sattel oder beim Fahrradgriff, oft hat man es mit Taubheitsgefühlen, Kribbeln oder Schmerzen zu tun, die einem das Fahrradfahren richtig vermiesen können.
Fahrradgriffe werden bisher nur in Standardgrößen angeboten, die im Hinblick auf eine Durchschnittshand entwickelt wurden. Dadurch stellen sie nur einen Kompromiss dar. Für viele Leute meistens einen Schlechten, weil jede Hand anders ist.





Darüber hinaus wird die große Mehrheit der Fahrradgriffe aus Gummi hergestellt und fängt nach kurzer Zeit an, klebrig zu werden. Das liegt an den enthaltenen Weichmachern, die sich aufgrund der UV-Strahlung und Schweiß aus dem Griff lösen. 
Unsere Lösung stellt den Markt für Fahrradgriffe auf den Kopf: Ein Fahrradgriff, der mit nur einem Foto der Hand im 3D-Druck auf den jeweiligen Fahrer angepasst wird und die Hand optimal entlastet. Durch das Aufgießen mit Silikon, welches keine Weichmacher enthält, wird der Griff nie verkleben und viele Jahre halten. 


Nutzen & Eigenschaften des Griffs
 🤗 Einschlafende Hände gehören der Vergangenheit an 
Der Fahrradgriff von Personomic wird für deine Hände maßgefertigt. Wir berücksichtigen dabei die individuellen Merkmale deiner Hand, wie z. B. die Breite und Länge deiner Finger und deines Handtellers. Dadurch entsteht ein perfekter Fit.





Die Kraft wird gleichmäßig auf deine Hand verteilt, und es kommt zu keinen Belastungsspitzen, die die Nerven in deiner Hand komprimieren — ähnlich wie bei einer orthopädischen Schuheinlage.
Der Entlastungsflügel stützt außerdem dein Handgelenk und verhindert so ein Abknicken, einer der Hauptgründe für taube oder kribbelnde Finger.

♻️ Kein Verkleben mehr dank Silikon 
Normale Fahrradgriffe aus Gummi fangen aufgrund der darin enthaltenen Weichmacher schnell an, klebrig zu werden.
Wir haben dieses Problem erkannt und verwenden deshalb Silikon, weil es extrem abriebfest ist und garantiert nicht verklebt — du hast jahrelang Freude daran.






 💎 Dein eigenes Design 





Wir geben die Form des Griffs vor und du designst ihn. Du kannst deiner Kreativität beim Design freien Lauf lassen und aus über 350 Designkombinationen wählen. Ob Farbe, Klemmring oder Textur — am Ende kommt ein einzigartiger Griff heraus. Dafür garantiert auch eine Gravur, die du wählen kannst. 

🇩🇪 Qualität 100 % Made in Germany 





Wir verwenden nur die besten Materialien und produzieren selbst in Deutschland, um einen wirklichen Premium-Griff anzubieten. Mit der Firma Rapid Shape haben wir einen der weltweit führenden Anbieter für 3D-Druck-Systeme als Partner gewonnen, um die bestmögliche Qualität in der Produktion zu garantieren.


📢 Erfahrungsberichte unserer Tester
Wir haben die Fahrradgriffe von Anfang an mit leidenschaftlichen Radfahrern entwickelt und haben deren Feedback mit in die Entwicklung einfließen lassen. Dadurch konnten wir einen Griff entwickeln, der exakt auf die Bedürfnisse von Fahrradfahrern abgestimmt ist. 
Ich habe die Griffe jetzt ausführlich getestet und die Form ist einfach mega. So angenehm war noch kein Griff und ich habe einige durch. Ich hatte vor 2 Monaten durch einen Sturz einen Bänderabriss an der linken Problemhand. Mit den Griffen habe ich null Probleme. Die verletzte Hand ist richtig gut gestützt. — Hjalmar P. aus Bochum










Ich hatte keinerlei Kribbeln oder Taubheitsgefühl in meinen Händen. Mein Hauptproblem sind aber immer meine Daumengrundgelenke wegen Arthrose, aber auch das war viel, viel besser. Bei längeren Touren haben die schon immer sehr geschmerzt, aber mit den neuen Griffen war das wirklich deutlich besser. — Silvia A. aus Kirf





Die unterschiedlichen Untergründe (Asphalt, Schotter) führten zu keiner (negativen) Veränderung meiner Hände … die Griffe haben das einfach „geschluckt“, was ich persönlich wichtig finde. 
... Fazit: Wenn die Handgriffe richtig positioniert sind, bringen sie (mir) eine spürbare Erleichterung, so dass meine Handprobleme deutlich weniger sind — auch über eine längere Strecke. — Susanne K. aus Münster





Bei Facebook wurden von dem jungen Start-Up Unternehmen Personomic Tester für ihre maßgefertigten und ergonomischen Fahrradgriffe gesucht. Mit etwas Glück wurde ich mit meiner Rheuma-Vorgeschichte als Tester ausgesucht und teste diese Griffe jetzt seit 4 Wochen und ca. 400 km. Ich bin absolut begeistert, wie diese Griffe mir mein „Fahrradleben“ wieder verbessert haben. — Andreas K. aus Schwalbach












🖐 Studien beweisen die Effektivität 
Die Erfahrungsberichte unserer Tester werden von Druckanalysen bestätigt. In einer Studie der Universität Stuttgart wurden unsere maßgefertigten Fahrradgriffe mit sechs weiteren am Markt erhältlichen ergonomischen Griffen verglichen.





Motorische Kraftmessungen ergaben, dass unsere Griffe sowohl die Kraftspitzen auf die Handfläche als auch die Flächenpressung am besten reduzieren.


📦 Belohnungen 





Zusätzlich zu den Griffen kannst du als Add-ons noch weitere Endstopfen und Klemmringe als Ersatz oder farbliche Ergänzung bestellen. 





So kommst du zu deinem Griff:






💡 So geht's
1️⃣  Du scannst 





Bevor deine Griffe in Produktion gehen, scannst du deine Hände auf unserer Webseite. Du brauchst dafür nur ein Smartphone, mit dem du ein Foto jeder Hand auf einem DIN-A4-Blatt machst. Die Fotos werden im Anschluss an uns übermittelt. 

2️⃣  Du designst





Nachdem du deine Hände erfolgreich gescannt hast, kannst du im Konfigurator den Griff ganz nach deinen Wünschen designen. 
 
3️⃣  Wir vermessen





Mit dem Foto deiner Hand können wir deine Hand millimetergenau vermessen. Das DIN-A4-Blatt dient uns dabei als Referenzobjekt, dessen Maße wir kennen. Mit deinen Handmaßen erstellen wir ein frei bewegliches 3D-Modell deiner Hand.
Ähnlich wie bei orthopädischen Schuheinlagen erstellt unsere Software einen virtuellen Abdruck deiner Hand samt Handballenauflage und Griffmulden.

4️⃣  Wir produzieren  





Wir drucken im Anschluss eine Gussform, die die Form deiner Hand hat, und gießen sie mit Silikon auf. Das Ergebnis ist ein Fahrradgriff, der perfekt zu deiner Hand passt und nie verkleben wird.


✅ Datenblatt 





* Lenkerstangen sind standardisiert. Miss gerne nach, falls du unsicher bist.
** Wir planen, nach dem Crowdfunding im regulären Verkauf verkürzte Griffe für Drehgriffschaltungen anzubieten. 

📦  Das ist im Paket 





🧩  Texturen 





🌈  Farben 





🔒  Klemmringe 







⏱ Zeitplan







🚚 Versand





Bitte beachte, dass du für eventuell anfallende Zollgebühren oder erhobene Mehrwertsteuer verantwortlich bist (gilt nicht mit Wohnsitz in der EU). 
Nach Ablauf der Kampagne und vor Start der Produktion wirst du nach dem Scannen deiner Hände und Konfigurieren deiner Griffe die Möglichkeit haben, deine Lieferanschrift zu hinterlegen. 


🧑‍🎄 Das perfekte Geschenk





Willst du einem dir lieben Menschen zu Weihnachten oder zum Geburtstag ein wirklich einzigartiges Geschenk machen? Für diesen Fall stellen wir dir einen ausdruckbaren Gutschein im passenden Design zur Verfügung.
Den Link zum Download erhältst du rechtzeitig per E-Mail.


🚴 So ist Personomic entstanden
Wir lieben Fahrradfahren und glauben, dass das Fahrrad als Fortbewegungsmittel einen Teil zum Klimaschutz beitragen und unsere Städte lebenswerter machen kann. Weitverbreitete Handbeschwerden sind da natürlich ein Problem, weil sie die Fahrer unnötig einschränken. Wir benutzen deshalb High-Tech, um Menschen beschwerdefreies Fahrradfahren zu ermöglichen.





Als wir uns 2020 kennenlernten, standen wir pünktlich zum Beginn der Coronapandemie vor der Frage, wie es beruflich bei uns weitergehen soll. Aufgrund der Unsicherheit war nichts naheliegender, als die Krise zu nutzen, um ein eigenes Unternehmen zu gründen.





Den ersten Prototypen des Fahrradgriffs erstellten wir noch mit Abformmasse, wie sie bei Zahnärzten Verwendung findet. Durch diese Versuche kristallisierte sich schnell eine grobe Form für den Fahrradgriff heraus. In vielen Iterationsstufen kamen wir dann zum finalen Design des Griffs.





Mit unseren Griffen waren wir drei Mal im Fernsehen zu sehen, u. a. in der SWR Landesschau und bei „Einfach genial“ im MDR. Auf der VELOFrankfurt und Eurobike konnten wir außerdem tausenden Fahrradfahrern vor Ort unsere Griffe präsentieren. Das Feedback war überwältigend.
Gemeinsam mit dir wollen wir jetzt die Fahrradgriffe einer breiten Masse an Menschen zur Verfügung stellen!







This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 2,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $900M raised between them.

record.Creator: bluetium
record.Title: The Almighty Smart Bluetooth Touch Controller, LitZERO
record.Text:
Our fingerprints are always present on the screens when using our smartphones, no matter how clean we keep them. When we try to wipe them away, they get even more dirty and foggy. Our arms get tired when using our smartphones with our most comfortable poses. And we always had to zoom in and touch our smartphones when trying something new. Finally, I bet you had your fingers and wrists ache from using your smartphone too long.





The smart controllers, currently sold in the market, are still helpful. But, they have to be used after a little break to use while driving or working out. Also, a mouse or a presentation remote is not very portable. Its clicking noises would get annoying in quiet places. LitZERO has solved all these inconveniences of smart controllers with just a touch of a button.










LitZERO is a controller that can be used with all smart devices with a Bluetooth system installed. Get your job done by swiping and touching LitZERO, instead of your smartphone. The soft-touch and response time it's not going to let you down.

























Mouse Mode
You can move around like a mouse cursor and select, run, scroll front/back, etc. It would be just like using a laptop's touchpad.
















Putting the Mouse Pointer on Hold (For Scrolling Through Webcomics/ E-Books)
Put the Mouse Cursor on hold, and you can drag top/bottom, left/right, drag, select, scroll back/forward, etc. When you push the button on the left or move to your desired spot, touch the center, and hold for 3 seconds, you can put the pointer on hold. (When using on the mouse mode)











We upgraded the select/run function and the scroll function to provide a smoother utilization of LitZERO. By doing so, it gives the users the exact same feeling of controlling with a mouse. Also, with the pointer holding mode, LitZERO was upgraded to handle tasks like scrolling through webcomics and pages with a single gesture.






Multimedia mode
This mode is most adequate for users when listening to music while camping or trying to listen to music, or answer a phone call while driving or working out. 





Take control of your music with simple gestures while moving or working out. 





Just simply attach LitZERO to your car, bike, or backpack.






LitZERO can also be used as a shutter for a camera, other than just enjoying a movie or some music.





LitZERO would be phenomenal for those that enjoy watching Netflix or YouTube. Skipping back to the previous screen, fast forward, volume control, they are just the beginning of what LitZEROcan does. Now, enjoy your music/ movie while you are entirely laid back.





 e-book / Video mode 
While reading your books (webcomics, stories) digitally, flip through your pages hassle-free. You can flip through your pages with LitZERO sensing your gestures instead of you having to physically go up and touch your device's screen. Which wouldn't limit the users from watching online courses, Netflix, and YouTube.





Page Mode
When presenting your PowerPoint during a lecture or a meeting, all you need is LitZERO. You can control your PowerPoint with simple gestures, without a bulky mouse or a pointer. It's because, LitZERO is programmed for Keynotes, PDFs, documents, memos, other apps, and etc.





Experiment mode
This mode is mapped with the directional key and a mouse. You can move and run the apps, visible on Android OS, and control videos. The Experiment mode will allow users to start mapping their keys via an app shortly.















To sense the user's fingers, LitZEROis equipped with high-sensitivity static touchpads. These static touchpads can sense over 80 touches a second to instantly respond to user inputs. When a user inputs a touch pattern, a signal intaking algorithm allows LitZERO to output 12 different touch gestures or different coordinates.






We went through countless challenges and tried to bring extremely sensitive and precise skills to life. And finally, it was able to be completed up to perfection











LitZERO's wireless Bluetooth connection can last up to 15M max. So even though the user might be distant from their smart device, its phenomenal connectivity allows you to take control. Not only  LitZERO can control your wireless earbuds' volumes, but it also enables users to leave their remote controllers behind when taking pictures.





If your smart device is equipped with standard Bluetooth technology, all of your devices are good to go with this multi-controller. Allowing up to pair with 8 smart devices is an even more crucial gadget for smartphone lovers like you! (Bluetooth enabled devices with Android 5.0 & up, MacOS, IOS 13 & up, Window 10 & up)





Smartphones are gadgets that we just can't live without. Well, the critical functions of smartphones and LitZERO are very closely connected. Users can answer a phone call by double touching LitZERO. If they are not in the right time to respond, they can swipe down on the touchpad.





If you left your smartphone in your car, or if you dropped it and walked away from it then, LitZERO would ring its alarm. With LitZERO's anti-theft functions, keep your smart devices nearby without the fear of losing them. Now you might think, what if I lost LitZERO? Well, if you lost your LitZERO, you can look up where its signal was lost on the LitAPP!





LitZERO is also designed with braille on its main body to allow the visually challenged to efficiently use the device. These were all made possible thanks to the constructive feedback we received from our visually impaired customers of our previous model. (Which they truly enjoyed listening to music and watching dramas). This design was applied in the hopes that every individual can enjoy using LitZERO. And it also functions as directional guidance for people without any disabilities.

Comparison With/W.O Braille Imprints
If LitZERO is running low on battery, then its red LED lights will flash. Or if it is fully charged then, the LED lights will turn blue. By upgrading LitZERO by installing USB C-Type plug-ins, it can fully charge within an hour and provides up to 3 days of use with a single charge. Also, if the users turn the On/Off only when they use the device, it can last up to 3 days. (Based on 100 touches an hour/ If the device is turned off, it would last up to 30 days.)

Low power usage/ high performance





For an even stabilized grip, LitZERO decreased its size and added the O-ring to use as a key ring for extra portability. Live and enjoy your life with the even smaller and portable LitZERO!
















How to pair with Bluetooth
1. Hold the button for more than 3 seconds. Then, a blue LED light will start blinking





2. Turn on Bluetooth, search Litsero2_xxx, and pair.





How to switch modes
Please switch according to the 4 different gesture modes. Press the side of the button to switch modes.










Gestures and Instructions





Mobile app (For Smart Phones)





The LitAPP provides functions to allow users to use LitZERO to the next level. With your smartphone, please download the 'LitAPP' on the Google PlayStore or the AppStore.
- Pairable with Android, iOS, etc.
- Provide firmware updates and set our goals based on our Backers' constructive feedback
- Display remaining battery levels and Bluetooth signal connectivity
- Other extra functions














































All of these specs are subject to change. But they are significantly less likely to.
* Due to an internal error, we initially said the plate was steel, not aluminum.  We're genuinely sorry for the mixup




































As we absolutely needed our remote controllers when we couldn't live without watching our TVs, smartphones are now our life essentials. And to use smartphones, tablets, laptops, and other smart devices was the sole purpose for the development of LitZERO. LitZERO can wirelessly control via Bluetooth, not like other regular controllers, and it can control apps by simply touching. It is designed like a key ring for more convenience and portability. Its Velcro allows users to attach LitZERO to backpacks or other clothing. We need our Backers' love and attention in our revolutionary leap.
*We are currently all set to develop an even better product based on our backers' constructive love and feedback*
















Bluetium had been developing wearable smart wireless controllers since its incorporation back in 2017. Starting from 2019, we began B2C selling on our online stores. From 2020, we have started developing our own products and carried out various collaborations with different online cartoons and fashion brands and are broadening our product line-up. We hope to develop further and come up with even more awesome smart devices on the market.











As one of the first crowdfunding marketing agencies, Enventys Partners has brought more than 750 crowdfunding projects to life through lead generation, campaign page creation, public relations, email marketing, Facebook Advertising, campaign management and more.






This project is boosted by BackerCrew

WARRANTY
- This device is internally equipped with a battery so, it may cause injuries or product malfunctions from explosions.
- Do not apply pressure or damage the product
- Keep away dust, liquid, metal, or other debris from the bottom charging port.
- If it starts to smoke or smell like it's burning, stop using immediately and contact customer service
- Watch out for children or pets may bite or chew on them.
-The adequate operating temperature is 0~35C. Suppose it is located in an area with temperatures lower or higher than 0~35C. In that case, the device may malfunction, or the battery life might decrease.
For questions regarding customer service, please email info@bluetium.com. We will make sure our backers use LitZero till the end.


RELIABILITY & FAST DELOVERY
After establishing a corporation in New York, we developed LitZERO with numerous designing and developing prototypes. We have signed a contract with a local warehouse in the States to provide time and cost-efficient shipping for our backers.
LitZERO, for sure, is a device at the completion stage after countless testing. It is ready to begin production as soon as our Kickstarter campaign comes to a close successfully. We promise that we will complete our production and shipping by the promised time frame to our backers, showing us their unfailing love and support.

record.Creator: Sniffy Labs Inc.
record.Title: Sniffy App: A Personal Dog Trainer in Your Pocket
record.Text:
Good for you. You found your dream puppy or you rescued an adorable new buddy. Now what? How do you make sure you both share all the good times you’ve imagined? 

Create a loving companion not a statistic.
In the U.S., about 1.5 million dogs enter shelters each year because of behavioral issues, and about 350,000 of them end up being euthanized. Those dogs were loved once, but some of their owners didn’t know how to prevent the behavioral issues that made life unbearable for both of them. Even though training is essential for having a happy pet-owning family, many owners cannot find the time or support for the training their dog needs.
That’s why we made the Sniffy App: to help create a loving companion not a statistic. You get clear guidance and personalized support you need in training, right on your phone.





A Revolution in Dog Training
The Sniffy app puts a professional dog trainer in your pocket. Build a better lifetime bond with your furry buddy and tackle the most common issues with the help of structured, personalized, positive reinforcement training. Now, you don’t have to add to your hectic day by scheduling training classes or searching through endless videos online. You can create a customizable training plan for you and your dog’s specific needs, and get all the guidance and personalized support you need in each training session, right on your phone.













* For more details about our planed training content for Sniffy 2.0, check out the Training Topics section on this page 👇👇👇




















Each dog learns differently and each owner has different training goals. That’s why Sniffy lets you create a customizable plan where you choose the training topics that fit your dog and interest you most instead of forcing you into one general training plan.
Dogs are smart and can learn more than one thing at a time. You can help your dog become a happy and polite pup with our core training topics including “Basic Manners,” “Polite Walking,” “Reliable Recall,” etc. We also have content for basic management of behaviors like barking and jumping. Sniffy includes special topics such as “Puppy's First Lessons” for new puppy owners and “Enrichment” for owners who have energetic dogs that need more exercise as well. We provide you with the essentials no matter where your new buddy comes from and what age they are.
























Not sure what skills to learn and practice in your training session? Wondering how often and how long you should practice to achieve your goals? Do you know what to do if your dog doesn’t learn as fast as the dog in the video? Sniffy has got you covered.
Training definitely takes time, and you need to be consistent for the best results. With Sniffy, you can easily plan your daily training session based on our suggestions, your dog’s performance and progress, or your interest and time. We help you establish a routine and achieve your end goal progressively. When things don’t work out right away, you can always refer to the "Not Working?" section in the app.





























Your training session is made up of watching video tutorials and practicing with your dog. Each tutorial includes a video as well as written instructions. Each of them is designed to teach you how to take baby steps toward success. Nothing more, nothing less. Our trainers and dogs will guide you through your plan and keep you motivated with their energy and demonstrated accomplishments. You will see the science behind positive reinforcement training instead of punishment, and learn how to apply these techniques yourself. You’ll even be able to use them to create your own tricks!



















You are not alone in your training. We know training can be tough, but we're here to help you out! We have certified trainers like Greg here, standing by to reach via the app and email.





















     Sniffy Labs' Co-founders, Howard and Ting, are best friends and have worked together for 5 years since their graduate program of Human-Computer Interaction at Rochester Institute of Technology. Howard majored in Computer Science at National Tsing Hua University, and worked as a Research Assistant at its Large-scale System Architecture Laboratory and published 2 papers on IEEE with other authors. Ting majored in Software Engineering at Sichuan University and worked as a web designer for startups in China before coming to the U.S..
Erica Wang focuses on Business Development and was top sales at AcBel with over 10 years of experience. Our developer Larry has a Ph.D. in Bioinformatics and is a lecturer at Taiwan Institute for Information Industry, with 8-year experience as full stack developer. The other engineer, Jim, has 6-year experience as a back-end developer. We also have 3 great certified dog trainers with years of training experience and are super passionate about this project.
At Sniffy, we all currently have our own pets and grew up with pets. Most importantly, we share a love for animals and acumen for technology. We believe that we can help pawrents build a lifetime bond with their pets through technology.

Our Training Experts
Greg Fiete

Karen Pryor Academy Certified Trainer
Certified Professional Dog Trainer-Knowledge Assessed (CPDT-KA)
American Kennel Club Canine Good Citizen Evaluator
Dr. Sophia Yin’s Low-Stress Handling


Becky Rene

Animal Behavior College Certified Trainer
Over 10 years of training experience
Has helped over 1,000 families & their dogs


Rebecca Giannavola

Animal Behavior College Certified Trainer
Over 5 years of training experience
Has helped over 400 families & their dogs
















You'll be able to activate your Sniffy App Membership within three months after the official launch of Sniffy 2.0. You won't be able to pause the membership once activated. 
You'll get full access to all current and future content and membership features if you choose one of the lifetime membership packages. We have several participating shelters, and we'll send you a photo proof of delivery of the free memberships given to shelter dogs. Thank you for your support! For the portrait, we'll be in touch soon after our campaign ends successfully. Depending on the number of portrait orders we receive, the delivery time may not be guaranteed to be January 2022. We'll work hard to try to get you the portrait as soon as we can.
Please do not hesitate to reach out to us if you are an organization and are interested in big packages.




















Get your unique referral link here:  https://forms.gle/oEQr23o4mhdFdjE18 











Links
Want to help us spread the word on social media? We'd really appreciate it!

Website:  https://www.sniffy-app.com/ 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Sniffy-Labs-102237001281677/

LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/sniffylabs 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/SniffyLabs 
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@sniffylabs? 









“How Sniffy Was Born” A letter from Howard Shyng, Co-Founder and President, Sniffy Labs

It started with one stray cat
One day in December of 2014, what started as an average day for me, was horrible for ZaiZai. The first time I laid eyes on my cat, he had just been run over by a car. Seeing him struggle to the median with his front paws dragging his bloody back legs behind him, I stood shocked by the fight in him. I decided I would take care of him until his last day.
As much as I saved ZaiZai that day, over time he saved me by shining a light on my future. After years of not knowing my purpose, taking care of him made me realize what I wanted was simply to help create better relationships between humans and animals. I wanted all animals, not just humans, to live with dignity and receive better care. ZaiZai inspired me to leverage the power of technology to improve pet care.
With this goal in mind, I came to the U.S. to pursue a master’s degree in Human-Computer Interaction at Rochester Institute of Technology (RIT). There I met my best friend, Ting. We worked together well on school projects and got good grades, but my heavy workload of school projects never got in the way of my ultimate dream.
My first idea of serving pets through technology was to build an app to make dog walking more fun. I knew that while at least two dog walks a day are important for dogs, many owners don’t make the time simply because of boredom. So I asked Ting to join me in developing an app that would motivate owners to walk their dogs. We named it Sniffy.
After interviewing 100 dog owners we learned that people would rather focus on their dog than an app while going for a walk together, and many of them mentioned behavioral issues that got in the way of enjoying that time and others. We pivoted our idea of a dog walking app into a dog training app. To turn the idea into a real product so it could benefit the most dogs and their families, we took programming and business classes, participated in student accelerators, and interviewed another 300 dog owners and trainers to investigate the current issues with dog training. We found that although many owners know their dogs need training, professional dog training resources are not easy to get. We knew an app could be the answer.
We found certified trainers who were passionate about this project and willing to collaborate with us. We made some training videos teaching dogs basic manners, built the beta app, and tested with 50 owners. 39 of them paid for our future product.
Our videos were highly applauded for helping dogs learn basic skills. Nearly 60% of testers had tried group training before but found they didn’t work because of distraction in class and both them and their dogs forgetting what to practice afterward. This is where Sniffy shines. Video tutorials show owners exactly what to do anytime and anywhere, and helpful reminders make training more consistent. Our testers saw their dogs’ progress and were very satisfied with the beta app.

Sniffy is Proven and Will Get Even Better
Positive feedback from early customers shows that Sniffy has the potential to shape more dogs into adored family members and enrich more owners' lives at the same time. Now our ultimate goal is to provide a platform that integrates training, pet care services, healthcare, nutrition, and other offerings into one streamlined service. We believe a system like this can reduce behavioral issues and pet abandonment and create happier pet-owning families. This is what drives us.
You can learn more about us at https://www.sniffy-app.com/about

record.Creator: Angelo
record.Title: PARADIGMA: fight against CLIMATE CHANGE easy way!
record.Text:
Fighting climate change has never been so comfortable! 
It all started when, after a trivial purchase, we wondered if our choice had really been the most sustainable for the climate.  We tried to find an answer but we realized that it is practically impossible in a reasonable time.
Therefore PARADIGMA #Pcool was born, the climate sustainability indicator that translates complex information into a visual message of immediate understanding.






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































HOW IT WORKS
The Paradigma indicator is based on the method of calculating greenhouse gas emissions recognized by the international scientific community:
GHG Protocol
It makes it possible to quantify the greenhouse gases emitted by them throughout their value chain.
This method identifies 3  emission areas:
Scope 1: Direct emissions from sources owned or controlled by it (use of fuels);
Scope 2: Indirect emissions from the purchase of electricity, steam, heat;
Scope 3: All remaining indirect emissions in the value chain (extraction and production of purchased materials and fuels, emissions from business travel, transport of products and material, waste disposal).
This data is made public by companies that have implemented a monitoring system of their greenhouse gas emissions. They are usually found in the annual sustainability reports that companies share with their stakeholders.
Sharing all this information is NOT MANDATORY.
But even if these data are made public, it is not always easy to compare them.
Following the principle of the International Standard, the GRI 305 PARADIGMA makes the comparison simple and understandable to everyone!
For more details visit the official website  on the site you can also see a demonstration page of the operation.

ROAD MAP





Step 1: from idea to product! 
 In this phase we intend to collect the resources to develop the service and consolidate the partnerships. The phase will be closed at the end of 2021. 
Step 2:  Pre launch! 
 At this stage we intend to launch the beta version of the service to all those who have supported us scheduled for June 2022. 
Step 3:  Launch! 
 At this stage it is intended to launch the service to consumers scheduled for November 1, 2022.
It's time to act do your part support the project!





Combattere il cambiamento climatico non è mai stato così comodo!
Tutto è iniziato quando, dopo un banalissimo acquisto, ci siamo chiesti se la nostra scelta fosse stata veramente la più sostenibile per il clima.  Abbiamo provato a trovare una risposta ma ci siamo accorti che è praticamente impossibile in tempi ragionevoli.
Ecco dunque che nasce PARADIGMA #Pcool l'indicatore di sostenibilità climatica che traduce informazioni complesse in un messaggio visivo di immediata comprensione.






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































COME FUNZIONA L'INDICATORE
L'indicatore Paradigma si basa sul metodo di calcolo delle emissioni di gas serra riconosciuto dalla comunità scientifica internazionale:
GHG Protocol
Esso consente di quantificare i gas serra emessi dalle stesse lungo tutta la loro catena del valore.
Tale metodo individua 3 ambiti di emissione:
Scope 1: Emissioni dirette da sorgenti di proprietà o controllate dalla stessa (utilizzo di combustibili);
Scope 2: Emissioni indirette derivanti  dall'acquisto di energia elettrica, vapore, calore;
Scope 3: Tutte le restanti emissioni indirette nella catena del valore (estrazione e produzione dei materiali e combustibili acquistati, emissioni dei viaggi di affari, trasporto di prodotti e materiale, smaltimento di rifiuti).
Questi dati sono resi pubblici dalle aziende che hanno implementato un sistema di monitoraggio delle proprie emissioni di gas serra. Solitamente si trovano nei report annuali di sostenibilità che le aziende condividono con i propri stakeholder. 
La condivisione di tutte queste informazioni NON è OBBLIGATORIA. 
Ma anche se questi dati sono resi pubblici non è sempre semplice il loro confronto.
Seguendo il principio dello Standard internazionale il GRI 305 PARADIGMA rende il confronto semplice e comprensibile a tutti!
Per maggiori dettagli visita il sito ufficiale sul sito potrai anche vedere una pagina dimostrativa del funzionamento.
ROAD MAP





Fase 1:da idea a prodotto!
      In questa fase si intende raccogliere le risorse per sviluppare il servizio e consolidare le partnership. La fase verrà chiusa a fine 2021.
Fase 2:Pre lancio!
      In questa fase si intende lanciare la versione beta del servizio a tutti quelli che ci hanno sostenuto  previsto per giugno 2022. 
Fase 3:Lancio!
      In questa fase si intende lanciare il servizio ai consumatori previsto per il primo novembre 2022.

E' tempo di agire fai la tua parte sostieni il progetto!

The CHICHI magic door opener,a product targeted at pet owners,can be controlled by a mobile app,smart speakers,and integrations with smart camera and sensors.



The camera application gives you the freedom to see your pet going in and out while you open and close the doors.





This sophisticated camera application also gives you the ability to communicate with your pet using the two way communication.

Automation gives you the ability to open the doors automatically when the camera sensor detect your pet is nearby the door. Product Developer.

record.Creator: HeliEngadin
record.Title: Regenerated TB47 and TB48 batteries
record.Text:
What is going on here
Back when released in 2014, the Inspire 1 was the first professional drone that allowed many more people to enter the UAV world for aerial photography and video shooting, without requiring high level skills on electronics and informatics that were the key for professional aircrafts at the time: it did just work.
Countless camera operators and directors based their fleet on this powerful machinery, leveraging the ecosystem of gimbaled cameras, lenses and accessories that offered great versatility at a reasonable cost.
In our company we still use and fly the Inspire 1 regularly as today, and we believe that’s still one of the most utilised drone worldwide; the reliability of this platform compared to its successor is drastically higher, and in a world of continuos, poorly-tested software updates, the fact that for years there were no more firmware upgrades is almost reassuring. Funny, isn't it?



They say "If you have one drone, you have no drones. If you have two drones, you have one drone...". We still didn't loose any to date. But we made a lot of repairs... and mods 😎


Unfortunately, DJI decided to forget this entire platform in favour of it's successor, the inspire 2, and with this, discontinue essential spare parts as the TB47 and TB48 batteries.
This leds to the grounding of thousands of perfectly working drones, and all the money invested in this ecosystems by many businesses around the globe is flushed down the toilet with them
Also, in this era of environmental awareness, where everything needs to be rethinked to cope with sustainability needs, it is not acceptable to throw in the trash such good electronic parts, generating more unnecessary e-waste.
Hating this unbelievable situation, we decided to research and work on regenerating the precious batteries on our own.

The interesting bits
As designers and manufacturers of electronic devices for a while, we went throught the rabbit hole of figuring out what is rotting badly in old batteries, why they stop working, perform poorely or even swell up.
Inside a TB47, TB48 and in general any other smart lithium battery you see around you, there is a big pack of lithium cells, and an electronic BMS that manages charging, discharging, balancing, temperature control and charge level.
The part that usually wears out with time and use is the cell pack; just replace it and... well, no.
First of all, the cells used in drones are very high performance, as they need to pack an enormous amount of energy in a very confined space, and operate over a very wide temperature window.
Then they are not in standard sizes, in fact standards don't even apply to lithium packs; we would need a custom made cell pack, assembled with custom made cells. Costly.



This is easy almost like building with Legos... but actually it is not.


And finally, when this is sorted out, you need to please the small little brain that is inside the BMS, as he remembers the old, worn out cells; you need to introduce him his new partner, the new pack that is now as powerful as the original one he was shipped out with.



It's exactly as difficult as it looks


You'd reckon all of this requires a non-trivial amount of research and development, some guesswork and a crazy amount of testing, in order to ensure everything is working and the various parts are playing nicely together.
And don't forget, even opening up these batteries is not a simple job, unless you want to end up with broken clips or warped plastics.

So...?
... we did it!



Hope you appreciate the white looks


We figured out the BMS.
We designed the cells to fit into the casing.
We streamlined the production workflow.
And we are starting to manufacture the cells! And this is also where the fun ends.
We do need to set up a production run for several hundreds of batteries, as we now manufacture the cells manually, which costs us a lot in terms of labour and materials.
TB47 line is already up and running, and it costed A LOT. But at least, we can regenerate your batteries right now!
We also managed to gather a decent amount of old TB47 and regenerate them, so if you want to purchase them, we have them in stock!






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































But for TB48, we cannot sustain the hand-crafting of cells anymore; the other parts of the regeneration process, which include opening, disassembly, cleaning, testing and reassembly, are still necessarily performed by our skilled operators, but at least the cell production needs to be automated.

Ok so why should I trust you?
Ours is a small company, but the KopterMax brand is quite well known in the drone industry; we've been the first manufacturing carbon fiber folding propellers for the Inspire 1 and 2, and the production is still active, with requests from customers happening regularly.
When we started regenerating the first batteries, the news run fast, and we have been contacted from all over the world.








Sometimes electronics DO fail, and repair is needed


Of course this has spurred us to create a product with an aesthetic appearance that lives up to expectations, but most importantly, with a very high reliability; we decided to offer a warranty of 6 months or 200 charging cycles, exactly the same as the original manufacturer provided.



Testing, testing and finally more testing. EACH battery we ship is tested.


We are taking care of the entire regeneration process here at the KopterMax HQ in Sankt Mortiz, Switzerland, to ensure that such a delicate and dangerous product is assembled in the safest and most accurate way.
Your help will ensure we can start a full production run for the cells, optimising cost and material waste, and guaranteeing a still long life to the Inspire 1 drone family!
For each battery you will send in for regeneration, we will discount 20€ (TB47) or 30€(TB48) from the listing price; you can also directly buy regenerated TB47, as we have plenty of stock; TB48 will need to wait for the new cells production run, but every purchase of TB47 will also contribute to the funding!
Shipping is calculated separately, but we encourage combining inbound and outbound shipments with your friends or colleagues to save on the cost.
Contact us at battery@heliengadin.com for more information about shipping and handling.
