record.Creator: Wesmart
record.Title: Wesmart, World’s First 3s Heat Up Jacket W/ Graphene Infused
record.Text:
We have been thinking what kind of jacket can be a day to day clothes but with whole bunch of coolest features？
We have been thinking what kind of jacket can be a day to day clothes but with whole bunch of coolest features.










It can keep you cool in summer and provide you with warmth in winter, just like a flow of air with your skin. It has waterproof, anti-fouling, wind-proof, anti-knife cut, storage bag, face mask, luminous, and good-design as well.
Wesmart is the world's first All-Weather Smart jacket. You can wear it to ski in the cold Alps, enjoy the sunshine in Hawaii, get out and explore the Amazon jungle, or as a daily streetwear.



Sports





Outdoor Activities







                                                                  Travel



Daily Commuting





Work

















Liquid nitrogen, at -196℃, can instantly cause frostbite on the skin. With its outstanding cryogenic insulation performance and internal heating system, Wesmart passes the liquid nitrogen insulation test, making it a suitable layer for protection from the most extreme cold.
In the past, if you were in the weather of -100°F, you needed to wear something as thick as a bear.






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00









































Other heated garments leave you feeling too hot or too cold with non-adjustable temperatures. Wesmart adjusts accurately with the App to the perfect temperature that suits any situation.
Open the app and preheat your jacket to make it warm before you wear it.















100℉-150℉ intelligent heating, support manual and APP two modes.










Wesmart is equipped with 4 built-in carbon fiber heating panels. Within 3 seconds, the heaters will begin to warm the jacket and its integrated graphene system will distribute the heat to your body instantly.





















Graphene is an excellent conductor of heat. It moves heat through its latticed structure, evenly distributing it around your body. In warm weather, it expels heat and wicks away moisture to keep you cool.





Wesmart uses a combination of 3 layers of technical fabrics, the first layer is a durable Polyester Fiberc, and the middle layer is a nano-film. Its density is smaller than water molecules and larger than air. It is waterproof and can achieve good breathability. The third layer is graphene, which provides extreme durability and heat conductivity.










Wesmart is powered by an external power pack via a USB cable located inside the side pocket. 
We use the fast-charging battery for the power bank with 6.5V output, it increases 60% of the heating speed when it's under -10°C.










































































































































ps. The power bank is optional. Use your own power bank to receive your Wesmart as soon as possible.

Wesmart perfectly combines technology and fashion to create the most futuristic high-performance clothing, providing users with an unprecedented new experience. The essence of science and technology is to serve people. Wesmart follows this principle and explores the relationship between clothing and body to establish a brand-new balance-sensory technology that is applied to all-weather travel, skin sensation, and sports experiences. Our designs create a new layer of intelligent technology for human beings.

record.Creator: Mackenzie Anderson
record.Title: SlingIt by Jaguar Wearable Technologies
record.Text:
People are on the Move
Some make seasonal migrations to feed themselves and their animals. Some are forced from their homes due to natural disasters or war. Others make their living traveling into dangerous territories. Others explore the harshest wilderness to invigorate their lives.
Our studies, commencing five years ago, determined that today's people-on-the-move require rugged, weatherproof, lightweight, long-life, wearable tools that can clean accessible surface water and continuously energize life-saving gear, like water pumps, area lighting, heat sources, and communications equipment.
1) Tools must enable users to operate independently of an electrical grid.  Users require "availability." Those in unpredictable conditions don't have a "reality pause button via which to take a break" while a tool is maintained or recharged. Users must have operational and maintenance freedom and never be tethered to a proprietary battery or proprietary water filter.  
2) Tools must generate a minimal amount of destructive waste. 
Our Mission is to provide access to clean water, air and power, to those in need, due to war, migration, natural disaster, or pollution without dependence upon proprietary maintenance / replacement / consumable schemes.
Our technology puts users in control.
Now, we need your help.
Our Goals
 Goal 1. Design and build rugged, portable, high-capacity and productive gear that delivers clean power and user independence.  
A. Bring sustainable energy to those in need.
Our mission is to help bring clean energy and clean water to those who need it most. Upon the sale of each 75 packs here in the U.S. we will send Jaguar technology to a family in need overseas. 
Each time 75 SlingIt packs are sold, we will send: 

1 SlingIt Portable Power System
2 Smart Chargers
1 12V-USB converters
12 rechargeable, protected, 18650 Li-ion batteries
1 rollable solar panel

After its launch in December, we will begin providing CleanIt water filtration systems. Each time 75 CleanIt filtration packs are sold, we will send 1 CleanIt to a family in need.





B. Eliminate needless battery waste.
It’s not discussed a lot in public consumer forums but lithium-ion battery degradation and lithium-ion battery recycling are big challenges. 
Its often published that high quality lithium-Ion batteries can be recharged and drained between 400 and 600 times before their capacity to store energy is degraded by about 20% or more. That’s why, generally speaking, regularly recharged batteries only remain productive for 2 or 3 years.
Various publications, even those trying to put a positive spin on battery use, admit that (only) about 5% of lithium-ion batteries are recycled; because recycling the battery components is more costly than the value of the materials rendered from the process.
One scary estimate shows China alone generates about 500,000 metric tons of used Li-ion batteries each year and that by 2030, the worldwide number will hit 2 million metric tons per year.
So where do 95% of these waste batteries and their associated poisons end up? They end up dumped in nature or in landfills, most likely.
The SlingIt is designed to reduce battery waste by empowering users to identify individual degraded or failing batteries, and then, selectively and responsibly, dispose of those individual batteries.
Traditional “battery pack" designs are very different from SlingIt's design. Traditional designs lock all a pack's batteries together in a proprietary plastic housing.  Batteries are wired or spot welded together.  Traditional designs turn the entire pack into a “consumable" product, only productive so long as its batteries are productive. Just 1 degraded battery in a pack can severely degrade overall pack performance. End users are unable to selectively use (remaining) good batteries in the pack after the pack has failed.  The designs increase the complexity and cost of recycling.
SlingIt's design puts the power to responsibly manage and dispose of batteries into your capable hands.
C. Minimize manufacturing waste via US-based manufacturing on demand. 
We rejected cost reduction methods dependent upon mass manufacturing, which is wasteful and slows the deployment of incremental product component improvements. 

Jaguar products are assembled on demand.  Product components, designed by the team, are fabricated in small batches as units are ordered.
We begin the process of building your system upon its purchase. 
We transport scrap copper, aluminum, and polyethylene pieces to recyclers.

Jaguar Wearable Technologies is located in U.S.
The SlingIt hardware components we design are fabricated in the U.S.
All our SlingIts are assembled by the Jaguar team, by hand, in the U.S.

Every SlingIT is tested after assembly.  Every SlingIT receives a unique serial number and every part version used to build each SlingIT is cataloged to improve service if ever you need support.

 Goal 2.  Design and build rugged, portable, and productive gear that delivers premium water filtration performance and user independence. 
In December the Jaguar team will release CleanIt.
CleanIt electrically pumps and filters water. It is dimensionally compatible with SlingIt. CleanIt can be powered by SlingIt or another 12 volt, 10 amp, DC power source and standard 12-volt socket.
CleanIt will possess all of SlingIts, rugged, lightweight and long-life characteristics.  
Like SlingIt, users will be empowered to operate independently of proprietary maintenance and consumables.  Of course, users will be able to purchase filtration packets from Jaguar, but we will publish filter packet materials and assembly methods so users can build their filtration packets.
CleanIt will sell for about $1199.00. Units will begin shipping in January.
About Us



(Left to Right) Sean Anderson, Co-Founder; Mackenzie Anderson, Co-Founder; Ricky Livingston, Co-Founder 


Presently there are 7 Jaguar team members. Members have worked for IBM, HP, Xerox, and the United States Air Force, among other organizations. We are a small, self-funded team of scientists, engineers, and manufacturing experts founded upon the belief that our time is best spent building gear that enables personal refuge and exploration within extremely harsh environments.
We have been studying the problems, exploring alternative solutions, building and testing prototypes, and refining plans for 5 years.  
We are in it for the long haul.
Our team members primarily reside in Southern California.  Presently we assemble all of our gear in Southern California. In the future, we hope to fabricate parts and assemble systems throughout the United States.
We have all been working full-time and/or part-time (at other companies) to pay for our own materials, fabrication, and testing. We all want to commit ourselves full-time to designing/manufacturing our gear, and doing the fieldwork required to evolve our solutions, while developing new ones.
Note: We shot and edited our videos ourselves but hired spokes people to deliver some of our key ideas because none of us are presentation professionals. Thank you for your understanding.
Our personal financial resources are not adequate to bring our gear to market.  We need a kickstart to staff and equip a:

Modest manufacturing center
Customer service team
Sales/marketing team

Please provide your assistance, via a purchase, so we can bring our gear to the world.
 Jaguar is pleased to introduce SlingIt. 



Recharge your batteries using smart chargers. Load charged batteries into SlingIt. Activate SlingIt. Once you’ve used all the power, empty SlingIt of drained batteries and load fresh batteries.
Take a look!



SlingIt is more than portable; SlingIt is wearable. Check out our unique storage design and how to wear your SlingIt here:



SlingIt; when loaded with just 6, readily-available, standard-size, rechargeable, lithium-ion batteries, transforms into a dependable power source. SlingIt provides 12 steady volts (and up to 10 amps) of power. Just swap out drained rechargeable batteries with your own re-charged batteries in minutes. SlingIt is:

Simple-to-use
Wearable
Sleek
Lightweight. Carry spare batteries and carry up to 3x the capacity for 1x the weight of a conventional battery pack.
Rugged/impact resistant
Weatherproof
 Fully replenished in minutes.  Just swap drained batteries with charged batteries. 

SlingIt Weight and Dimensions:

Overall weight of SlingIt (including its canvas carry bag):  12 pounds
Overall length:  27.75 inches
Diameter of power system's battery assembly:  2.5 inches
Outer diameter of the aluminum cylindrical battery assembly encasement:  2.75 inches
Diameter of power system’s protective end caps:  4.0 inches
Inner diameter of the cylindrical, canvas carry bag:  4.0 inches
Outer (uncompressed/uncinched) diameter  of the (uncompressed / uncinched) carry bag:  5.25 inches

 SlingIt is Power and Weight Efficient 
Via Just Six Batteries....

Six 3500 mAh batteries energized a WOW 2160 lumen LED work light for over 3 hours.
Six 3500 mAh batteries recharged a lower capacity internal mobile phone battery 7x (from 0% to 100%).
Six 3500 mAh batteries energized 1 of the water pumps we intend to deploy in our CleanIt water filtration system for over 5 hours.

Not bad for less than 12 ounces of battery weight.
 SlingIt puts you, the user in control; right where the control needs to be.
SlingIt shipments begin by Thanksgiving.  Order early and we will do everything we can to build your SlingIt and send it to you before Christmas.

 What’s in the box when your SlingIt arrives? 






A SlingIt, rapidly-replenishable power system
A dual layer, padded, 100% cotton canvas MOLLE compatible pack; treated for water and stain resistance.
 Two coated, aluminum, spare-battery storage tubes (holding 6 batteries each) with protective spare battery bands and MOLLE attachment accessories: all attached to the canvas pack at our facility.
 Two premium quality, padded shoulder straps

As a free gift we provide:

 Two 4-cell, USBC-compatible battery chargers
 One, 12 volt to USB convertor
 Twelve 18650 batteries: Read our Crucial Safety, Usage and Warranty Information

Charger’s, converter’s, and batteries’ brands may differ based on availability.
Scroll down to "7 Reasons to own a SlingIt" for a deep dive into SlingIt's functionality via Informational Videos and Text
 What’s in the box when your cylindrical, canvas, MOLLE bag arrives? 






1 padded, dual layer cotton cylindrical bag with 10 rows of MOLLE loops
2 premium padded straps 
2 hard UHMWPE end caps provide a strong bag bottom and lid
The bag will be treated for water resistance. 
The internal bag diameter is 4" and its length is 25."

 What’s in the box when your long-sleeved, "Don't pray to your wall socket" shirt arrives? 
Front:





Back:





Shirt Specifications:

6.0 oz, pre-shrunk 100% cotton
double-needle stitched bottom and sleeve hems for extra durability
S, M, L, XL, & XXL Sizes Available ("men's sizes")

 Links to Key SlingIt Topics on Our Website 
Building Your Own Spare Battery Supply - Availability, Safety Warranty Information
Why Battery Degradation is a Key Challenge of Traditional Battery Pack Design 
CleanIt Wearable Water or Air Filtration
Video Gallery
 7 Reasons to Own a SlingIt 



 1) SlingIt's Power is replenished quickly without a wall socket. It runs on standard-size, rechargeable batteries. Just swap out drained batteries with charged batteries in minutes
SlingIt is powered by SIX standard-sized, 5, 8 or 10 amp, rechargeable, lithium-ion, 18650 batteries. Many battery manufacturers consistently produce high-quality 18650 cells, including Panasonic, Samsung, Sanyo, and Tenergy. You find them all over the world in electric cars, electric bikes, power tools, flashlights, and battery packs. Keep spare, charged batteries on-hand. When batteries are drained, simply swap them out with recharged batteries and keep using your SlingIt.
Standard size 18650 rechargeable batteries typically advertise capacities between 2500 and 3500 milliamp hours (mAh). You load six of the same 18650 batteries into a SlingIt to generate 12 volts and up to 10 amps of power. When the system can’t deliver 12 volts via the power provided by the batteries, SlingIt shuts down the power to its 12 volt socket. When the power shuts down, swap out the drained batteries with charged batteries. Insert the drained batteries into smart chargers and they will tell you if any of the individual batteries are degraded or failing. 
Safely and responsibly discard any bad batteries. 
Your supply of spare, optimally operating batteries, will maintain peak SlingIt performance. Using SlingIt, battery degradation problems are resolved, not masked, as they are in conventional battery pack designs.
Why are we willing to let you quickly replace drained batteries with charged batteries rather then taking the pack off line to accommodate hours of pack recharging via "plug?" Why do we enable you to detect and replace degraded batteries? Because we are not in the business of selling batteries, whether or not those batteries are packed into packs. It’s not our goal to sell you multiple packs, so you can overcome hours long recharge times or overcome degraded pack performance.
We consider it our job to enable you to build a spare battery and smart charger supply that best meets your needs according to your own budget. We consider it our job to ensure you are free to have safe access to power almost anywhere and almost anytime.
Your SlingIt will arrive with 12 batteries and two battery smart-chargers as a free gift.
As mentioned above, via just six batteries....

Six 3500 mAh batteries energized a WOW 2160 lumen LED work light for over 3 hours.
Six 3500 mAh batteries recharged a lower capacity internal mobile phone battery 7x (from 0% to 100%).
Six 3500 mAh batteries energized 1 of the water pumps we intend to deploy in our CleanIt water filtration system for over 5 hours.

Not bad for less than 12 ounces of battery weight.



2) Keep track of your battery performance using readily available smart chargers.
You never recharge batteries in a SlingIt.  Charging individual batteries via a smart charger is much more efficient than charging a big battery pack. Smart chargers identify degraded or failing batteries so you can remove them from your battery inventory to preserve peak SlingIt performance.
You can read more about battery degradation on our web site. 
Why Battery Degradation is a Key Challenge of Traditional Battery Pack Design 



3) SlingIt is impact-resistant and has no fragile displays or external switches.
SlingIt doesn’t look like typical power packs, because it’s built to survive and remain functional through whatever rough conditions are served up during your journeys.
SlingIt's internal, shock-absorbing battery suspension system is housed within a protective, 2.75" diameter, 6061-T6 aluminum cylinder with 1/4" thick, primed, coated and waxed walls. SlingIt has no external switches or displays susceptible to contamination or breakage.



4) SlingIt is lightweight and wearable.
The SlingIt power system is lightweight and is designed to be worn like a pack or a cross-body “sling” bag. SlingIt is carried in a custom, padded, dual-layer, heavy canvas cylindrical bag, surrounded by 10 rows of MOLLE loops.
MOLLE stands for “Modular Lightweight Load-Carrying Equipment”; it is a common standard used by manufactures who build interconnecting packs and pouches. By weaving straps attached to MOLLE-compatible accessories through the bag's loops, you can construct your own custom pack solution. The bag's loop arrays are used to attach the bag's shoulder straps and enable you to adjust how your pack straddles your back.
SlingIt Weight and Dimensions

Overall weight of SlingIt (including its canvas carry bag): 12 pounds
Overall length: 27.75 inches
Diameter of power system's battery assembly: 2.5 inches
Outer diameter of the aluminum cylindrical battery assembly encasement: 2.75 inches
Diameter of power system’s protective end caps: 4.0 inches
Inner diameter of the cylindrical, canvas carry bag: 4.0 inches
Outer (uncompressed/uncinched) diameter of the (uncompressed / uncinched) carry bag: 5.25 inches




5) SlingIt is weather-resistant.
SlingIt has a single, standard size, 12 volt socket. The single socket is weather-resistant, as end caps protect the system from contamination. SlingIt has no delicate, leak-prone, displays or switches, which can be contaminated by water and soils. Applying a thin layer of non-conductive dielectric grease, to the battery assembly's disk shaped seals provides extra protection. SlingIt's bag is treated for water and stain resistance.



6) SlingIt is made from premium materials.
SlingIt is designed to have a long life and is primarily made from:

110 Copper
6061-T6 and 7075-T651 Aluminum
Ultra-high molecular weight polyethylene.

SlingIt is easy to maintain and, after a long life, recycle.

7) Jaguar sustainably builds products in the USA.
Jaguar team members have directed manufacturing efforts for 30+ years. We understand when automation is required and when a human touch is preferable.
As mentioned above, we rejected cost reduction methods dependent upon mass manufacturing, which is wasteful and slows the deployment of incremental product component improvements. 
Jaguar products are assembled on demand.  Product components, designed by the team, are fabricated in small batches as units are ordered.
We begin the process of building your system upon its purchase. 
We transport scrap copper, aluminum, and polyethylene pieces to recyclers.

Jaguar Wearable Technologies is located in U.S.
The SlingIt hardware components we design are fabricated in the U.S.
All our SlingIts are assembled by the Jaguar team, by hand, in the U.S.

Every SlingIt is tested after assembly.  Every SlingIt receives a unique serial number and every part version used to build each SlingIt is cataloged to improve service if ever you need support.

 Remember, CleanIt is Coming Soon. 

CleanIt is a portable, electrically pumped, water filtration solution.
CleanIt will be dimensionally compatible with SlingIt. CleanIt can be powered by SlingIt or another 12 volt, 10 amp DC power source and standard socket.
CleanIt will sell for about $1199.00. You will be able to pre-order CleanIt in December and units will begin shipping in January.




 Jaguar Wearable Technologies’ Limited Product Warranty 
We are responsible for SlingIt’s materials and manufacturing. We will repair or replace your SlingIt’s components due to materials or manufacturing flaws up to one year from date of purchase, so long as you use your SlingIt in accordance with SlingIt’s operating instructions. We are not responsible for damage resulting from misuse.
We give you the freedom to select your own 18650 batteries. It is up to you to use the batteries safely and responsibly.
JAGUAR WEARABLE TECHNOLOGIES DOES NOT MANUFACTURE, INTEGRATE, DISTRIBUTE, OR RE-SELL BATTERIES. WE DO NOT PROVIDE BATTERY WARRANTIES. WE ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR BATTERY PERFORMANCE OR THE USE/MISUSE OF BATTERIES BY THE END-USER.

Where to Buy Batteries for your SlingIt
You can buy 18650 batteries and smart chargers online from online retailers. Good places to start include: liionwholesale.com, power.tenergy.com, IMRbatteries, and 18650batterystore.com. These sites include detailed battery specifications and safety information. Some dealers offer “bulk” discounts.

When it comes to storing and using rechargeable Lithium Ion batteries, here are some notes you need to review carefully.
SlingIt supports “button-top” batteries exclusively. Button top style batteries are like the C or D cell batteries you commonly use in flashlights.
Always use 5, 8, or 10 amp batteries in your SlingIt. Never insert a battery claiming to support greater than 10 amps into your SlingIt.
Power your SlingIt using “protected” 18650 batteries. Each protected battery has its own small circular circuit board installed in its tip. Protection circuits are installed by battery component integrators and dealers. This protection circuit protects the battery from overcharge, or over-discharge.
Always use standard-length, 65mm-67mm, 18650 batteries. Protected, button-top batteries add about 2mm to the overall length of an 18650 battery.
Always install 6 batteries made by the same company, and which have the same capacity and amperage specifications into your SlingIt. You may have an inventory of batteries built by different companies, with different capacities, and which support different amperages; so make certain you keep your batteries sorted so you only have 1 type of battery installed at any one time.
Always follow the battery manufacturer’s/battery distributor’s directions for safety and handling.
Protected 18650 batteries from major US distributors include:

Protected, 10 amp, Button-Top Sanyo from IMR Batteries
READ THIS: IMR Batteries Warning

Protected, 8 amp, Button-Top Samsung from 18650 Battery Store
READ THIS: 18650 Battery Store Warnings

Protected, 10 amp, Button-Top Orbtronics from Orbtronics
READ THIS: Orbtronics Battery Warnings

Protected, 10 amp, Button-Top LG MJ1 from Liion Wholesale
READ THIS: Liion Wholesale Battery Warnings (scroll to “BATTERY WARNINGS” toward the bottom of the page) 

 READ THIS: University of Washington: Li-Ion Battery Safety (PDF file)
 READ THIS: Panasonic Battery Warnings


Lithium-Ion battery ingredients and circuits are contained in metal cylinders wrapped in plastic skins. Never install a battery with a damaged skin into your SlingIt.
Use 18650 batteries components made by reputable companies like Sanyo, Panasonic, Samsung and Tenergy; known for consistently delivering safe, high-performance products.
Use smart chargers to safely recharge your batteries, identify degraded batteries and to identify faulty and failing batteries.
SlingIt was brought to market, in part, to minimize battery waste streams. Please safely dispose of batteries and all e-waste responsibly.

Please Note:  During COVID lock downs, and now, following the (recent) end of lock downs, the highest capacity, protected, button top, name brand, 18650 batteries have been in short supply; but can be found among dealers with a bit of effort. Short supplies have led to slightly higher battery prices. If you can’t find the highest capacity name brand batteries you desire, we recommend you purchase lower capacity, name brand batteries, and resist the temptation of purchasing off-brand batteries, which may be unsafe or provide inconsistent performance, and longevity.

record.Creator: Globalscale Technologies Inc
record.Title: Mochabin-5G
record.Text:
Hello again we here at Globalscale are introducing Mochabin the next generation of open source embedded computing boards! Building upon the success of ESPRESSObin and the community around it, We are releasing Mochabin, a quad core networking powerhouse for advance wireless and networking capability. Building on top of this we have partnered with some ecosystem partners to develop open source solutions in the Firewall, NAS Storage, and  SD-WAN space.  
The Mochabin builds upon the ESPRESSObin community and experience by adding a fanless quad core ARM A72 processor clocked at 1.4Ghz. We have increased from the previous maximum of 2GB DDR3 to now 4GB or optional 8GB DDR4. Most importantly the Mochabin has native 10G networking via an SFP+ cage as well as flexible slots for M.2, PCI, and MiniPCIe interfaces.
Key Specification and Features

Armada 7040 quad core with 4x ARM72 cores at 1.4Ghz
4GB or 8GB DDR4 (optional soldered down)
16GB onboard eMMC
2x USB3.0
1x 10Gb SFP+, 1X 1Gb SFP 
4x Gb Lan, 1x WAN with POE in
1x M.2 for SATA 
1x M.2 for Cellular (we have tested 4G and 5G modules available as options)
1x MiniPCIe for Wi-Fi (NXP 9098 802.11ax+BT5 for Wi-Fi version)
1x JTAG 10 pin for programming
1x microUSB for Console
1x MikroBUS 16 pin connector for expansion and accessories

 Product Block Diagram






 Mochabin I/O






The Enclosure
 We will differentiate our product from the previous ESPRESSObin campaign by committing to a plastic enclosure tooling as part of the production. when we hit our goal we will make the commitment for injection mold tooling. Its design to house the Mochabin along with its accessories and to operate without a FAN.  Below is a CNC machined enclosure which we used for internal testing.



bottom side





I/O side





Front Side


Original ID renderings





Applications The Mochabin is designed for a variety of Firewall, Networking, SDWAN, and NAS applications. Its designed to support 4G and 5G applications via the m.2 interface. These can be used for cellular backhaul and communications to replace the ISP modem.  With the OpenWRT and Replica One software, the Mochabin can be a open source router with multi gigabyte support and 4x  Gb LAN.

Mochabin Prize Grid





Schedule & Timelines 





Mochabin with finished application software
Mochabin powered by Cubbit. CubbitCell is a  distributed NAS company that recently raised 7 Million Euro Venture Capital following up their successful Kickstarter campaign. The original Cubbit Cell used our ESPRESSObin platform as the networking heart of the device. We are following up on this partnership by porting the CubbitCell distributed NAS solution onto the quad core Mochabin opening up faster networking and processing speeds
We will also be shipping the device with a 2TB NAS grade HDD with options for 4TB drive if desired
Mochabin powered by Sartura.  As a vital software partner behind the ESPRESSObin, Sartura will provide critical deliveries to strengthen the Mochabin software ecosystem. The Mochabin platform will leverage mainline Linux, OpenWRT, and Replica.one support out of the box.

About Globalscale
Globalscale Technologies Inc is an ODM Original Design Manufacturer headquartered in Anaheim, California (We are close to Disneyland!) and with RD and manufacturing facilities in Taiwan and China.  We have partnered with our chip vendor Marvell Semiconductor for over a decade and remain a trusted design and manufacturing partner for customers large and small.  




This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 2,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $900M raised between them.

record.Creator: Mohammad Abu-Salma
record.Title: MyDiary Notebook
record.Text:
In a day before more than seven years, I was wondering about our journey in life, about the story of each one of us. I wondered about us, the seven billion humans that share this world, and even the generations lived before us, I wondered: Would our journeys vanish as our stories might, … and why our stories have to vanish after our time as never existed, as we never lived… why should the laughs, the cheers, the tears … stories of true moments of joy, true sadness, true happiness, stories of love…. all has to vanish. Why a story that meant the whole world to one of us during her/his life has to vanish as never existed, never lived. Why a story that might be the best story that any of us in mankind have ever lived had to vanish. I imagined if everyone wrote her/his diary in life and we have the privilege to know their stories, their moments as they wrote them, and to walk with them their journeys, if we can have just such ability…. at that time, the idea of MyDiary Notebook was born.



Where we are?

record.Creator: X-ONE
record.Title: X-ONE - Meet the World’s First 3D-Print Razor
record.Text:
Reimagining Razor





The X-ONE 3D-Print Razor is the first and only of its kind in the world at the moment. With a 3D-printed resin lightweight handle that feels like it was made to be held by you, meanwhile, the handles look elegant and can be customized by yourself with your own 3D printer. X-ONE puts the power of every shave into your hands – with a DIY razor that you can assemble yourself and make your own.





But What’s Wrong With Traditional Razors?





Most conventional razors on the market today are built using aluminum alloy, and one of the biggest problems with that is that it’s exceptionally uncomfortable to use in winter. It’s heavy, it’s cold, it’s simply unpleasant. And you deserve better.
The X-ONE Difference





We’re boldly steppe into your bathroom and transforming your shaving routine once and for all, with an advanced shaving innovation built from photosensitive resin. A hollow design is light in your hands, empowering you to groom and pamper in innovative style.

A Revolutionary Grip





We know we said it already, but we can’t reiterate it enough. You cannot truly comprehend the comfort and power of a photosensitive resin razor (built using the latest HALS polymer technology, which has peculiarity of high toughness and hardness) until you’ve put it to the test yourself. And once you have, you’ll never go back.





The Perfect Shave Every Time





While most conventional razors are heavy and leave you with itchy, unsightly razor burn, X-ONE features a ground-breaking 6-layer precision blade, leveraging advanced Sandvik technology produced in the heart of sweden. In fact, men just like you have confirmed with this razor can and will last 3 times longer than regular blades. A worthy investment? We think so!





Each tri-blade set contains two blades a piece, with a fine 0.85 mm distance between each blade and 1.4 mm distance between each set – guaranteeing the most efficient and effective shave of your life.





Designed For Your Face





Every sweep of this bad boy feels like it was designed for your face. Everyone is unique, which is why we’ve designed X-ONE’s head to be 30°+10°. In other words: while the handle is fixed to 30°,the ergonomic head can be adjusted by 10° depending on the shape and different parts of your face. This promises a unique and cleanest shaving experience you will not find anywhere else.
Surprisingly Lightweight





X-ONE packs in one hell of a punch for such a light razor. Its hollow design is based on humankind’s natural grippe style, making it more comfortable and natural to use without feeling heavy in your hands.
Grip With Comfort And Stability





X-ONE will never slip and slide around when smothered in shaving foam. A comfortable yet firm grip keeps your razor right where it’s supposed to be – firmly in your grasp.










Convenient Magnetic Storage





Don’t know where to store your razor in-between shaves? Neither did we. Conquer the chaos in your bathroom with a magnetic handle and stand that keeps your X-ONE safely stored for next time while ensuring efficient water drainage that prevents bacterial growth. With advanced magnetic storage like this, you’ll never be fumbling around to find your razor again. Perfect for those busy mornings when you need to clean up – fast. Moreover, any steel shelves can also be used to store the X-ONE, no matter standing or simply hang on it. In this way, the head will be even more hygiene.










A Breeze to Clean





Cleaning X-ONE takes only a few seconds, so you can get on with your day. A quick rinse will remove any stains and germs in a flash, all thanks to its special array of blades.

Replaceable Head





There’s no need to buy a whole new razor if your current head is worse for wear. Simply pop it out in a snap with one single press, and replace it in moments. We recommend doing so every two month.





DIY Handle

Ubunnys is an innovative health appliance company dedicated to redefining health and pursuing a better future.
Ubunnys is funded by employees of the world's top 500 companies. In the last a few years, it has won an IF award and many other domestic and foreign awards. We focus on health appliances and the comprehensive solutions assisted by Internet of Things and Artificial Intelligence.We integrate new manufacturing methods, combine hardware and software to form a new ecosystem of health science and technology.

record.Creator: ADDPLUS
record.Title: HiiTCHECK: Hospital-Grade Thermometer & Temperature Analysis
record.Text:
The current pandemic has taught us that something as simple as measuring our body temperature can tell us a lot about what condition our body is in. Even the slightest changes in our temperature can allow us to make informed choices such as whether we have to socially distance.  Although we may not need a thermometer everywhere we go, do you readily have access to one when you need it?  















With the HIITCHECK, you only need 1 second. We understand that speed may not be a priority for most cases, but if an emergency arises, HIITCHECK will be there to give you the information you need as fast as possible. 










HiiTCHECK focused on development for two years to resolve consumers' distrust of existing non-contact thermometers especially when it comes to temperature measurement accuracy.
Research and development was carried out to obtain a high-accuracy body temperature value by blocking the product's own heat and readings of non-relevant external temperature. Finally, after three rounds of product development, we were able to create the perfect infrared sensor that drastically minimized the margin of error. Now, we would like to present this technology to our Kickstarter backers before we fully release this to the general public.





 Most consumer-grade thermometers have large margins of error because they do not take into consideration the specific emissivity value of human skin. Therefore, accuracy of results will vary when using a single generic device to measure the temperature of variety of things.  





 HIITCHECK has maximized its accuracy and minimized the margin of error by developing a measurement algorithm that specifically takes human skin emissivity into account while measuring body temperature.
















The blackbody is  high-precision calibrator for the calibration of infrared thermometers. For the verification of medical thermometers, the temperature must be verified by a blackbody. ADDPLUS has received certification for the HIITCHECK through this method. 






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00









































Time of Flight Distance Sensor – The high-precision laser distance sensor will begin measuring the body temperature of a person once it is positioned within 3~5cms (1.2 ~ 1.9 inches) away from the skin. When the temperature sensor is out of range, HIITCHECK will send an alarm via vibration to notify the user to move closer or further away.





THE FDA recommends when using non-contact infrared thermometers to measure either the forehead, temples, or behind the ears. HIITCHECK should not be used to measure body temperature via wrist readings, but if necessary, should be used on blood-flowing arteries.





HiiTCHECK APP INCLUDED 

Automatically records body temperature, daily body temperature trend graph, daily/weekly/monthly body temperature trend analysis.







Record symptoms, body temperature check alarm, connect to Google Maps, find a nearby hospital, find a nearby pharmacy, record body temperature by location, mode for women (record menstrual cycle, record symptoms, track ovulation through body temperature information), issue code and share temperature.






Did you know that everyone has a different average body temperature?
With the HiiTCHECK thermometer, you can check the trend of your body temperature, and analyze the patterns to proactively maintain a healthy condition.
Up to 5 guardians can automatically receive and share the records of one HiiTCHECK user. The HiiTCHECK app can also connect to Google Maps so that you can find the nearest hospitals and pharmacies.
*All information stored through the HiiTCHECK app is available only to you. 





 Temperature management’ is the due diligence that we must all take when it comes to basic self care. The HiiTCHECK thermometer & app provides services that can be valuable to many different types of people.


Students who go to and from school everyday.
Office workers that frequently make business trips.
Elderly who need to keep track of their daily body temperature.
Who want to automatically record their body temperature or find the nearest hospitals or pharmacies
Women who want to keep track of their ovulation cycle, Parents who want to monitor their child’s medical status

 You can select and use the functions that are most convenient and suitable to your needs. Ex: Men who want a feature that automatically records their body temperature. Women who want to check their ovulation cycle.





 Young adults in their 20s and 30s who are active in staying up to date about their health condition during global health crises
 

Anyone engaged in business that requires them to frequently meet people
 At-home caregivers or parents of children 
















HIITCHECK is about the size of an Apple Air pods case and has been intentionally designed to be small so that you can take it on the go or place it in areas that will make it readily accessible to you at any point in time.





HIITCHECK can be extremely handy on trips that may put a lot of stress on your body. We recommend taking the HIITCHECK with you when traveling, camping, or going on overnight business trips.





Simply attach it to the back of your smartphone and use it as a cradle or carry it with you in case your condition happens to deteriorate while you’re away from home. 





HIITCHECK can be plugged in to your smartphone via a USB-C. Your phone will act as the power supply and automatically turn on the thermometer for immediate use.










Since the HIITCHECK uses a USB-C, our thermometer may not work with certain Apple devices since they may use a lightning cable. Apple devices also require a separate (Made For iPhone) certification which we currently do not have.

We are a company that develops health care products that can be beneficial to an individual’s daily life. Established in 2018, we developed a biosignal monitoring service through joint research and development with KEPCO KDN and K-Bio Health, and performed various government-supported R&D tasks. Our first product, HIITCHECK, was certified as a non-contact thermometer medical device in Korea and was first presented at the Korea International Medical & Hospital Equipment Show (KIMES). We attended Bio Korea 2021, and we plan to showcase our products at MEDICA2021.

record.Creator: Annabel
record.Title: Wisdom Applied
record.Text:
Hello,
We are Wisdom Applied and we are passionate about people becoming their best version of themselves in all areas of  their lives. 
So we decided to create an app the allows people to share and receive knowledge on a platform that is both free to use and free to voice your thoughts.
We are living in a day and age where people are reflecting on their lives and questioning should they be do more (especially as we see the 'Great Resignation taking place) and we would love to assist in your journey to becoming your best self whether that is in your finances, health, spiritual life, relationship and more.
The platform does this by allowing users to view content in their desired area, watch live events on timely topics, gives you access to a plethora of related books & resources and allows you to connect with people on the same journey so you can watch your life improve.
There are platforms out there but few are dedicated to personal improvement and knowledge sharing and this is our passion at Wisdom Applied.

record.Creator: Brandon Darnall
record.Title: Pool Rides
record.Text: Welcome to the Pool Rides Kickstarter! We're a new branch of carpooling devoted to expanding reliable transportation and making it safe and secure with a free-to-download mobile platform. Our platform is built on my co-founders' and my vision to make ridesharing accessible and enjoyable for users in all U.S. municipalities. Ridesharing in its current state is virtually featureless for enhancing the safety or enjoyability of a user's trip experience. Unfortunately, it has prevented many from reaching their destination peacefully. We want to eliminate awkward interactions among drivers and riders and bring users together based on what they have in common. Each trip on our platform is conducted by matching users by the compatibility of their profiles made up of their  interests and trip preferences. That's only scratching the surface of what we offer though. We've also created a model that maximizes the earnings for drivers and eliminates excessive fees and price surges for riders. We can also guarantee the safety of our rides will be far superior to our competitors by using groundbreaking technology to provide live route monitoring, user authentication, and immediate emergency service access. Check out our website www.poolrides.com to learn more. If you're interested, but don't want to pay anything (yet), that's okay! You can still apply for our waitlist on our "Sign Up" page to receive updates and be notified of when our app releases!

record.Creator: Christian López
record.Title: TuAyudaXpress
record.Text:
Imagina que tienes una fuga de agua en tu casa o una falla eléctrica, a quien vas a llamar?, en quien le puedes dar la confianza de entrar en tu hogar?
Existe una gran cantidad de trabajadores independientes que ofrecen sus servicios y también una gran cantidad de personas que buscan de ellos, TuAyudaXpress®, es un enlace entre el Cliente y la persona adecuada a tus necesidades.
TuAyudaXpress®, muestra una valoración del Trabajador Independiente que fue calificada posteriormente por cada Cliente de acuerdo a la calidad de sus servicios. De esta forma cada vez que tú busques un servicio puedas encontrar a la persona que cumpla con tus expectativas.
TuAyudaXpress®, se crea a partir de la idea de dar un servicio a la sociedad para ayudar a generar mayores fuentes de empleo  con trabajadores independientes y capacitados.
TuAyudaXpress®, fomenta la iniciativa de los trabajadores  independientes que desean aprender y capacitarse en nuevas áreas, acercándolos a instituciones públicas y privadas encargadas de la formación y certificación de las personas, ayudándolos a mejorar su servicio logrando ser tu mejor opción.
Por otro lado, el problema que enfrentan los ofrecedores independientes de servicios (mecánicos, plomeros, jardineros, electricistas, etc.) en la mayoría de las ocasiones carecen de seguridad social, lo que los hace más vulnerable al momento de un accidente, entonces se vuelve imprescindible contar tanto con un seguro de invalidez, un seguro que cubra gastos funerarios entre otras cosas, también necesitan apoyo para poder aprender nuevas profesiones o escuelas que certifique sus conocimientos, por esto TuAyudaXpress® apoyara a los trabajadores a desarrollarse profesionalmente ayudándolos a certificarse y a adquirir nuevos conocimientos en  convenio con empresas externas, al mismo tiempo se les dará una tarjeta medica que los protege con un seguro de invalidez, seguro por fallecimiento accidental, gastos funerarios y también servicio médico telefónico las 24/7, de esta forma, el trabajador podrá estar mas tranquilo y seguro al momento de enfrentar una enfermedad o un accidente

record.Creator: Seesaw
record.Title: DOCKCASE: The World's First USB-C High Speed Smart Hub
record.Text:
Compared with the previous generation DOCKCASE Visual Dock, the user interface of the new generation DOCKCASE Smart Hub(8 in 1) is newly upgraded to the DockOS operating system, which is the world's first hub operating system. 
The previous Visual Dock can only display real-time data information of the connected peripherals. On the new Smart Hub with DockOS, you can also choose the working mode of different interfaces, customize the working parameters, etc. to realize human-machine interaction. The DockOS is upgradable to make it compatible with more devices.





The newly added D-Key button is used for DockOS system operation to bring a more user-friendly experience, which is more convenient for personalized use and parameter settings than the previous pinhole.





 The previous Visual Dock used traditional heat insulation methods to prevent the internal temperature of the chip from being conducted to the outside as much as possible, which may cause loss of the internal chip after a long time of use. The new Smart Hub has a built-in full-chip cooling system and is equipped with a high-performance silent fan, which can preset different values to turn on the heat dissipation to ensure stable work.





The product size upgrade brings a larger screen, you can read data more easily and clearly.





Compared with the previous Visual Dock(7 in 1), two USB 3.2 ports are added to meet the people's demand for USB-A ports on the new Smart Hub. Meanwhile, as customer demand for USB-C port increases, we upgrade the card reader slot to a data USB-C port to take care of both card reader and other USB-C port equipment.










One button, multiple identities. D-Key, which allows you to control various functions, switch operation modes and rotate the screen intelligently to adapt to different working scenarios.





No longer worry about the visual experience. The innovation of HDMI technology brings a revolutionary change, two switchable HDMI modes redefines how real 4K@60Hz can be.
The DockCase Smart Hub can convert 4K@30Hz host to 4K@60Hz output in the Extreme Mode, which the 4K@60Hz compatibility improved by 92% compared with traditional hubs, bringing you a smooth and extreme HD experience.
You can also choose the Balance Mode to realize the coexistence of 4K@60Hz and 10Gbps USB data transmission. In addition, 0-8 signal levels are available to stabilize HDMI output when screen flicking, black screen or other situations.










Occupied Power of Hub: 5-25W can be selected to adapt to different power requirements, 5W can make the computer charge at the fastest speed (95W), and 25W can be connected to high-power devices such as external HDD and portable SSD. The built-in 24V CC high voltage protection protects the motherboard from burnt out,  so you can use it with confidence.
What's more, the NS-Switch option allows you to enjoy an immersive experience whenever you want to play games on a bigger screen.





Five stable data USB ports including the data USB-C port are adequate to the simultaneous use of multiple peripherals. Three USB3.2 Gen 2 ports transferring data at blazing speeds up to 10Gbps in no time.
It only takes 2 seconds to transfer a 2G movie in the High-Load Mode，Each data USB port can supply power up to 7.5W, which provides stable fast charging and data transmission at the same time.
Two additional USBA 2.0 ports make it easy to use traditional peripherals such as keyboard, mouse to save energy in the Eco Mode(the Eco Mode is available for subsequent upgrades).





Exclusive algorithm control, intelligent display of network connection speed. Gigabit Ethernet port supports 10/100/1000Mbps network speeds, which can provide a full play to the performance of the network, ensure connection instantly and smoothly for you to online gaming, working, video streaming, anywhere in a flash.





When using an ordinary hub, it is easy to heat up, which will cause unstable data transmission, performance degradation, even security risks, etc.
When using the Smart Hub, you don't have to worry about these problems. The full-chip turbo cooling system equipped with a high-performance silent fan, 65-85℃ optional fan control allows the system to automatically start the fan to cool down to ensure that the internal temperature is within the safer range for healthy work.





 Upgradable firmware optimizes your Smart Hub continuously and is compatible with more devices. 










DOCKCASE has been paying attention to provide you with a more user-friendly experience so that you will always be in a beautiful mood every day! 





The detachable cable is convenient for you to change cables in different usage scenarios, and it also solves the problem that the hub cannot be used due to the damage of the cable, saving unnecessary expenses.










The unibody design with the zinc alloy shield provides better protection for the internal components, and at the same time, you can feel the ultimate sleek and ice-cold texture when held in your hand.































This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarter launches with 1,400+ successful Kickstarter projects and over $500M raised in total.











If the backer fails to pay the customs clearance fee incurred in receiving the goods, resulting in the return of the goods, we will deduct it from the backer's crowdfunding amount.










The following video demonstrated a fully functional pre-production DockCase Smart Hub with all ports working.

DockCase by Seesaw was founded in 2016 and by a team of excellent engineers and designers motivated by making the lives of USB-C device users easier and hassle-free. 
We have successfully launched three campaigns from August 2017 to January 2021, over 4,000 backers on Kickstarter were delivered. Influential media, including CNET, Business Insider, and Unbox Therapy, highly recommended our products.   
The concept of “making things easier and improving your efficiency” leads us to the release of the Smart Hub to show all the detailed info of the connections that allows you to master ahead and achieve the best possible performance.

record.Creator: X-ZIBIT
record.Title: X-ZIBIT
record.Text:
X-ZIBIT provides students and alumni from over 100 and beauty fashion institutes worldwide, in multi-disciplinary courses, with an innovative and developmental experience, as they engage in challenging and practical scenarios, such as networking and collaborating. The platform provides students with the opportunity to share knowledge, gain experience and develop interpersonal skills. It uniquely integrates teaching and development, as students apply their academic knowledge and skills and put them into practise through collaborating with other users. As users will sign into the platform with the credentials given by their institutions, an algorithm will be set to frequently show them portfolios of users from different courses and universities, in order to encourage them to collaborate with new people. The platform will also include some traditional social media features. (like, follow, etc). Including, a ‘Collaborate’ and ‘Invite’ (to collaborate) button when posting projects.





In response to the long-term impact of the pandemic, fashion students from around the world have had to adjust to the digital transformation of the campus experience. Many institutes have adopted distanced learning and virtual tools, during a time where students are demanding for more networking and collaborating opportunities. X-ZIBIT is a student-oriented platform that enables students and alumni from over 100 fashion and beauty institutes worldwide to connect. At present there are no other platforms that offer students the opportunity to showcase their work, network and collaborate with each other. As such, X-ZIBIT is a platform that addresses a clear market need with prosocial objectives. As students are at the start of their careers, by actively engaging, can develop the quality of their work to meet industry standards. Furthermore, gain experience which is valued by employers, but can also forge a network and relationship with their future peers. The platform encourages students to actively collaborate with creative students from multidisciplinary courses, which include Fashion Design, Styling, Textile Design, Fashion Photography, Retouching, Fashion Illustration and Graphic Design, Hair and Beauty artists, etc in order to enhance their portfolio and gain experience within an industry known for being notoriously competitive.

record.Creator: Peterest
record.Title: Peterest: The World's 1st No-Power Scoop-Free Cat Litter Box
record.Text:
Love your cat, but hate the unpleasant routine - scooping? If you use a traditional cat litter box, you need to scoop at least once a day, and probably replace the plastic litter box itself at least once a year or wash the box thoroughly with detergent. And then on top of that there’s the unavoidable dust, litter scattered everywhere, and smelly odor all the time.
You could go for a fully-automatic cat litter box, but those have to be placed close to the power supply, the noise of the machine may frighten your cat, and what’s worse, you’d be surprised at how many cats are actually die from mechanical failure of those fully-automatic litter boxes. Yikes! Luckily, Peterest has none of these problems and is here to save the day!










Pull the handle, the rake will slide to scoop the waste into the waste receptacle beneath. Out of sight, out of smell.





Whether it’s little poops or clumps of pee, the Peterest effortlessly scoops it with it’s proprietary scooping systems, so you don’t have to! No more scooping by hand.





Peterest works with any kind of clumping litters such as clay litter, crystal litter, and more.





With the Peterest, the smells and odors of your cat box are significantly reduced. You can place the box right in your front room and still not smell it because the smelly clumps are quickly scooped into a sealed container that keeps odor trapped.





The extra-large waste bin allows up to 7 days free of scooping for one cat​. Moreover, Peterest offers a spacious interior with the capacity for cats of all weights and ages.










The best thing about Peterest is the whole process is contact free. All wastes and odors are segregated within the small container, so you don’t have to touch it or scoop it out yourself.
Everything you hated about scooping and cleaning has been fixed with Peterest!










The litter box is deep enough so the waste doesn’t stick to the bottom and there’s plenty of room for your cat to maneuver around inside and do their business.



It filters bad odor, you breath in pure air.





Enclosed design and replaceable charcoal filter accomplish odor control.


Equipped with a enclosed design, Peterest can keep the litter inside, reduce litter loss and contain the odor. 
Along with a replaceable charcoal filter, the odor control system is reinforced and your cat is more pleasant to use the litter box.





The rake combs through the litter removing all the clumps but still leaving the litter behind and raises to 3.5 inch to leak the litter. That means your litter lasts longer because you’re not scooping all of it out with the poop and pee!





The rake can be detached easily and cleaned thoroughly. It doesn’t hold any odors or get stained in any way. Just a quick spray off with some water and it’s completely clean and ready for action.





Easily remove the top and dispose of the waste bin whenever you feel the need, and when you put every part back together, it keeps all the odors nicely contained in a mostly sealed environment. Besides, the detached bottom can be used as an open litter box and stacked for convenient transportation.





Peterest tells you when it’s time to scoop. The short plastic pole will pop up when your cat enters the box automatically. Then, you know it’s time to scoop. You can press the pole back down after you’ve completed the job to reset it.








No electricity is needed. You can put Peterest anywhere.


When it comes to litter boxes, electric (or fully-automatic) sounds good, but there are actually quite a few drawbacks.










It doesn’t matter if your cat is big or small, Peterest is a great litter box where it can easily fit and do it’s business without any troubles. Even if your cat is Savannah, Maine Coon or Highlander, it can stay in the box comfortably.





There is a transparent front window so you can always keep an eye on what’s going on and see the level of the cat litter. But the other walls are not transparent so your cat can feel safe while it goes to the bathroom and also has some privacy.





One of the worst things about typical litter boxes is all the litter that gets scattered around the box. With Peterest, there is a built-in litter trap under the swinging door that catches most of the litter from your cat’s paw as they exit the box. That way the area around your litter box stays clean, and your cat isn’t tracking litter all around the house.





Start your effortless cat litter scooping journey, and enjoy a happy life with your lovely kitty.








































Most people like pets and yearn for a harmonious life where they can play with their pets. Pets have become part of our family members. This also means that pets need to be taken care of like our family members. The owner will naturally take some responsibilities in daily care. The Peterest Team hopes to share the responsibilities with pet lovers, reduce work, make pet raising easier, and let every pet family have more time to enjoy the fun of life with pets.

record.Creator: Josh Van Metre
record.Title: Accession v2: A Prototype Computer That Subverts Ransomwares
record.Text:
Accession v2 (version 2) is a complete computer system designed with one purpose in mind; integrate new, innovative ideas and methods in cybersecurity relating to design, hardware and software to take a more aggressive stance against ransomwares and viruses.
The focus of this project is to build a prototype of Accession v2.

What Innovative Ideas Will Accession v2 Use?
Accession v2 is an all inclusive way of looking at security for your computer and network. It is a combined hardware and software solution designed with the following features:
1. easy migration of your current system into Accession v2;
2. makes your computer completely inaccessible when you are not using it;
3. employs a philosophy of compartmentalization in computer, hardware and software design;
4. integrates a multitude of security software;
5. contains double encrypted partitions on all storage devices;
6. multiple backup, data recovery and remediation systems;
7. uses the weapons a hacker employs against them;
8. utilizes a USB "key" to run the entire system;
9. compartmentalization of data, software and hardware.
None of these may seem “revolutionary”, but how we use them is.

Why Have All These Security Features?
Why integrate all these security features into one computer? To answer that, let’s look at the weaknesses of current cybersecurity philosophy and computers in general and how Accession v2 solves them.

1. Centralized Protection and Detection of Endpoints
Using a centralized IDS (Intrusion Detection System) to protect the endpoints (end-user computers) actually removes protection away from the main point of attack, which is the endpoints. Why not have each endpoint monitor, protect and recover itself? Accession v2 accomplishes this with integrated software all run by a separate operating system, giving the illusion of multiple centralized IDS systems to confuse and deter would-be hackers while still protecting the main points of attack.

2. Standard Structure of Computers
All computers, whether PCs or MACs, follow the same basic structure. A main hard drive for storage of data with services running to operate that computer. This is like a maze where you already know the correct path to take. It’s basically pointing hackers to where your sensitive data is stored. Accession v2 compartmentalizes the entire system, hardware and software, to change the maze up, creating confusion because your data is not where it’s supposed to be.

3. Standardized Recovery Systems
Having standard, centralized recovery and backup systems makes it easier for hackers to find and encrypt or even delete your backups. And by having a centralized backup, it gives the hackers one target to hit, which is much easier than the several targets created by Accession v2 due to the separation of their multiple backups and each endpoint within the network having the ability to recover itself.

4. The Current Focus in Cybersecurity Philosophy
The current philosophy in cybersecurity methods is to focus on the unknown. WHAT could the next breach be? WHAT will the next vulnerability or exploit be? WHAT new method of infiltration will hackers use? Why? Why focus on the guessing game. This is a REACTIVE posture and causes the industry to play catch up. A new breach happens, the industry races to patch it. Another new breach happens, the industry races to patch that, and so on and so on. Let’s focus on what we KNOW a ransomware does, instead of GUESSING what it will do. We KNOW a ransomware encrypts your data. We KNOW some ransomwares delete your data. We KNOW some ransomwares steal your data. By focusing on the KNOWN instead of the UNKNOWN, this creates a posture of ACTION instead of REACTION. Accession v2 accomplishes this by focusing on remediation of your encrypted or deleted data and wields tools to prevent your data from being stolen.

Compartmentalization
Compartmentalization- the division of something into sections or categories. Also a military term for separating the details of an operation between operatives to prevent the entire operation from being compromised if any one operative is captured.
This is the philosophy behind Accession v2.






How Does Accession v2 Compartmentalize Hardware to Protect a Computer?
At the core of Accession v2 is a USB flash drive that it uses as a "key". This flash drive houses RiseOS, our own operating system that runs the entire computer. When this "key" is removed, it "bricks" the computer, making your data completely inaccessible as there is no operating system to hack. This flash drive will also be the “key” to accessing OmniscentOS, our specially designed operating system that contains the multitude of security software to protect the system as well as detect any breaches or intrusions. In addition, the basic structureof Accession v2 starts with two separate encrypted solid state drives with multiple partitions to store specialized operating system files (not actual operating system files) and the data from the two separate remediation systems.
Imagine being able to physically secure your computer in something as simple as a lock box when your work day is over. Accession v2 allows you to do this and more. These "keys" can even be assigned to employees if multiple people use the same computer, further increasing security and control of your network. This “key” can also be used as a killswitch for the system, stopping the spread of a dangerous ransomware in its tracks.
This USB “key” will also contain EpioneOS, named after the Greek goddess of healing, a third operating system designed specifically for data recovery, repair and remediation on Accession v2 that can be booted to instead of RiseOS as a last line of defense. EpioneOS will also be completely hidden from RiseOS and all other operating systems working within it, making it virtually invisible to any viral or ransomware attack.

How Does Accession v2 Compartmentalize Software to Protect a Computer?
Accession v2 doesn't rely only on its unique structure for security, it will contain software solutions to help protect your data. This includes encryption on all hard drives, primary and secondary remediation systems to recover your entire computer in the event of a catastrophic viral infection (including ransomwares!) or other disastrous failure, such as a system crash. Accesssion v2 also contains OmniscentOS, a secondary operating system within RiseOS, that includes real-time monitoring, intrusion detection, wireless intrusion detection, file integrity monitoring and other security software. All these features are separated between RiseOS and OmniscentOS, so if one operating system fails, you can still remediate Accession v2 through the other. And, as mentioned above, Accession v2 will also have EpioneOS that can be booted to separately, just in case everything else fails.





You Mentioned Easy Migration?
Accession v2 will have the ability to not only run RiseOS and OmniscentOS, but another operating system that can be a migration of your current Windows® system, or a fresh installation, all simultaneously. This migration process, housed on the USB “key”, has been designed to be as easy and stress free as possible. This means your current computer, programs AND data can all be transferred into Accession v2 with no loss of functionality.
All this compartmentalization combined with your data separated between multiple encrypted physical locations, which are only accessible through the USB "key", decreases the chances of any of your data becoming compromised.

Didn’t We Say Something About Using a Hacker’s Tools Against Them?
Yes we did. Why should a virus only be detrimental to a system? Can a virus protect your data as well? Yes it can. Accession v2 will employ a triggered virus that will destroy your data to prevent it from being stolen if a breach is detected. There is nothing to worry about though, as within RiseOS and OmniscentOS, there are primary and secondary remediation systems to recover your data within Accession v2 after the threat is over!

The Project As It Sits Now
As of the writing of this project, we currently have two "working models" of Accession v2 (NEITHER is an actual prototype, as these "working models" are not built using the planned form factor, CPU, RAM or hard drive specifications of the actual proposed prototype system, however, RiseOS is installed on, and working from, a USB flash drive on both "working models"). These "working models" were built so we could begin the coding and building of the operating system and additional security features, and to start preliminary testing. The images above contain actual screenshots of RiseOS. We added the monitor to make it look fancy. We have secured a vendor, and contacted numerous others, to manufacture the prototype computer (without the operating system) and the finished systems.
RiseOS is 90% complete as of this writing. It is based on another operating system, SanctumOS, we created for another solution, SanctumNE, offered by Archai Solutions, LLC, so the basics are already in place, what is remaining to complete is additional in-depth coding to enhance the security software and remediation systems and to tighten up the look and feel of the operating system to make it more familiar and user-friendly. We are also developing a simpler graphical interface for unlocking the encrypted drives. OmniscentOS is about 50% complete, with the virus “booby trap” still under development. EpioneOS is almost complete as well, due to it’s singular focus, it has been the easiest to code.
The "working models" of Accession v2 have gone through preliminary testing of the primary and secondary remediation systems against ransomware infections; specifically Petya, NotPetya, WannaCry and Ryuk. We believed this was essential to complete as soon as possible as this is a primary feature of Accession v2. These remediation plans have been used successfully on other solutions offered by Archai Solutions, LLC, but not with this complex of a design. They have performed admirably in all preliminary tests and recovered 100% from each infection. The recovery process took between 32 and 53 minutes depending on the infection and whether it was the primary or secondary remediation system. We project that the actual prototype recovery time will be quicker due to the higher proposed hardware specifications. Below is a screen capture of a ransomware infection on Accession v2 and the recovery process through the primary remediation system. This video has been edited ONLY for time constraints. We don't believe ANYONE wants to sit through a 53-minute video of a bar slowly moving across the screen, although we will make the complete, unedited video available to any backer who wishes to see it. The secondary remediation system does take the computer out of the operating system, so doing a screen capture of this remediation system will be a little difficult. This secondary remediation system is planned only to be used as a last ditch recovery system.






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































Plans for Funding
The funds we are raising will be used for the following:
-  The materials for, and construction of, an actual prototype system, this includes all the proposed hardware (i.e. form factor shell, CPU, motherboard, RAM, hard drives and USB drive);
-  The hiring of one or two additional employees for additional coding, both controlled-environment and "real world" testing, and other responsibilities;
-  The filing of a provisional patent and of the actual patent once Accession v2 is completed;
-  Expenses associated with testing Accession v2 in a "real world" business environment. This includes the cost of commonly used business software such as Quickbooks, MySQL, CRM software, etc. to ensure Accession v2 does not inhibit any such software;
-  Expenses associated with testing Accession v2 within different business network structures. This includes, but is not limited to, virtual servers, VPNs, networked drives, NAS systems, cloud storage, cloud computing, etc.;
-  The writing, editing and printing of a "quick start" user's manual and the creation of a troubleshooting website;
-  An additional "slush" fund for unexpected expenses. We have tried to take into account any and all expenses associated with this project, but as any creator or developer will tell you, there is always something unexpected that appears.

The Team
We are not new to technology. Our team has a combined 60 years working with, building and designing computers, hardware and software. We are fully versed in multiple forms of coding for Windows and Linux. The principle architects of Accesssion are:





Josh Van Metre, Owner and Chief Innovation Officer
Josh started his own computer repair and service company, Trust Tech Management in 2015 geared towards providing honest, inexpensive and quality computer services for small businesses and residential users. Realizing there was a need for innovative cybersecurity solutions for businesses, he started Archai Solutions, LLC (www.archaisolutions.com) unofficially in 2020 and officially in 2021, absorbing Trust Tech Management in the process, with the philosophy that standard cybersecurity techniques were not working and new, revolutionary solutions were needed. If the accepted solutions were enough, hackers and ransomware attacks would still not be the threat they are.





Leah Streepy, Director of Client Services
Leah is relatively new to the technology and cybersecurity industry, joining Archai Solutions, LLC in 2020 as Director of Client Services, but her enthusiasm, intelligence, drive and refreshing ideas have been indispensable to the development of this project. “Techie” people have a tendency to forget that not everyone has their level of knowledge and Leah’s wealth of experience with clients and marketing has kept this project grounded and focused on the ease-of-use feature that is vital for this system.

record.Title: The counter top spin brush
record.Text:
This i how easy it will be to clean it off, the results will vary based on how large the cup is, you notice that all the chocolate is on the counter its all no longer something that you have to scrub. This cup wasn't a perfect fit I'm thinking about including multiple brushes for different size cups. as of right now I'm only going to sell the two brushes.






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































Hello there my name is Eric. I had originally created this invention it was supposed to be a push button motor that used batteries or plugged into your wall. It also used a gravity fed soap distributor and had a water line attached to the side. Part of me wanted to release this product but I thought what’s more eco-friendly, one product that uses electricity or something that doesn’t consume electricity and can be used thousands of times before it breaks down. (Plastic breaks down over the course of several hundred years.) I went with this eco-friendly idea because deep down inside I am a tree hugger at heart, I want future generations to have a life as good as previous generations. (I develop these types of products to make everyone life better.) Back when I was a kid, I was always stuck cleaning the dishes at my house and I always thought that there's got to be a more efficient way to clean cups. Fast forward to the present day, I learned about gears and gear ratios, and I decided to combine both a brush and a gear-based object and behold now we have the countertop spin brush was born.

Just to show you without any load the current spring does in fact work, but for the final product the spring will be much larger and it will be optimized to function more desirable than it currently is. When the final product has this spring active capability to make it will make your cup cleaning life EVEN easier.

This video shows it in action. please take note how much chocolate was removed from the cup after pulling the lever 4 times. I made it so the chocolate is visually on the sink so you can see how much chocolate it actually removed. When you go to use the spin brush you will want to place just next to the sink so that the food particles fall inside the sink. I left it on the counter top for visual representation.
