 this is how simple it will be to clean the brush.

The second attachment cleans bottles.






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































It takes 15-30 seconds to clean a cup normally. 
The countertop spin brush lowers this down to 3-6 seconds with the help of gear ratios. Each time you pull the lever it should rotate 3 times. (because it is a 3 to 1 gear ratio)

Let's say you have 20 cups*30 seconds=600 seconds to clean normally/60 seconds per min=means you waste 10 mins of your life every week. this is assuming you are cleaning 20 cups that day.

3*20= 60 seconds
6*20= 120 seconds
It depends on how many cups you produce every week, you could save a significant amount of time for people with large families.

Who is this Product aimed toward?
1). People who are prone to arthritis. Older people might not have enjoy turning their wrist while washing cups and my product is here to make their life easier.
2). Households with large family’s that go through many cups and your average household. (I don't want kids to waste their time scrubbing cups and this was one of the reasons why I invented this. They should spend less time washing cups and more time with their family.)
3). Restaurants that use cups.

What else can it be used on?
Protein shaker bottles

This is how it works
Step 1 Pick up the cup
Step 2 Rinse the inside 
Step 3 Pull lever 1-3 times (It took me about a second and a half in the video.)
Step 4 ???? (Gears aren't magic, they are mechanical engineering, so it's not really a mystery by any means.)
Step 5 Profit ?!? (Some people say time is money, so I'm here to help you save it. I like to think that your time is far more valuable than any amount of money in this world. The fact that life is so short makes time a very valuable commodity. )
Step 6 Put the cup in the dish strainer/dishwasher.

Safety Features
That square box=Prevents bodily damage by acting as a barrier between you and the gears. The box is rounded so that it won't cut the user.
There are no sharp external edges in my design, everything is smooth.

Other Features



1 There are 4 suction cups attached to the bottom of the spin brush. 2 The base has a carrying handle.





The base has pegs to hold the gears housing container.





The gear housing container and base are notched to help seat the gear housing container better.



Things that will change before product launch






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00
































The current spring size will be changed to make cup cleaning even easier.
After recent feedback
I have decided that I'm going with the quick release pin to the shaft so you can quickly swap between the cup brush and the bottle cleaner. (I realized that people would likely loose the lock pin and now that wont be a problem because the quick release pin will be a part of the shaft.)


Things that might change before product launch
The delivery date may be earlier assuming i get help along the way, if not i am trying my best to get you your spin brush by next year. ill update you as much as i can if I'm successful.




The spring might attach in a fashion like this.  A hole in the gear lever and a hole in the base or the base could remain the same.


 We will just have to wait and see what it will be like upon optimization.

Multiple Versions
In the future i wanted to create multiple versions if this is successful.
The other versions
The second Version will be intended for a handicapped person. This version will hold the cup for them, it will use water along with its spinning ability.
I want to get market validation for the first before I start advertising the second version and third versions.
I want to make an alternate version where the plastic is recyclable(petg). Right now its not going to be made out of recyclable plastic because if it were recyclable then the plastic alone would cost 11$ and i cannot afford this i was making 20K 3 years ago and my pay check has only increased so much since then.

What happens if its not successful?
I guess I’ll probably hang my prototype on a wall and stare at it. I think what really matters here is that I had the courage to leave my comfort zone and try advertise my product. With my current trajectory this idea was going nowhere fast. At the end of the day I think the only thing that matters is that I tried.

While I’m on the topic of my company named NÜDDEN ill go ahead and post my company goals while I’m here.

I'm currently developing a phone based application. In the distant future may release an invention that would potentially help dispose of all the worlds plastic pollution. One day I hope to release a video game similar to D&D.

record.Title: ViVi II | Music Reactive Light Show System

Prototype Demo Video

































We are creating an all new controller, which requires all new tooling (large steel molds to produce 1,000's of copies of a part), which has a large upfront cost.  A Kickstarter is a great way to get a large quantity of orders waiting to put that tooling to use right away so it quickly pays for itself by producing valuable parts, rather than sitting unused.
Our first controller was successfully launched with a Kickstarter, so we decided to do it again for the ViVi II. This time we put in even more time and effort planning our Kickstarter, and used all the lessons and skills we learned to better prepare for manufacturing to scale up our volume to be able to offer a new, lower price.
Finally, while the funding raised by a Kickstarter campaign is important for covering the costs of tooling and a large initial order, it's not the only reason we chose to launch on this platform again.  The value we received from backers of our first campaign, the interactions, feedback, and lasting relationships, played a monumental role in our long-term success and to this day continues to have an impact driving innovation and improvements with our technology.

record.Creator: Caroline Hughes
record.Title: Reform
record.Text:
What is Reform?
Reform is an iPhone application including a real-time feed containing posts on environmental and social issues the user cares about and trending issues. Posts are intended to inform the user about an issue and/or show ways they can help. Posts are made by individuals, organizations (i.e. non-profits), and public sites (i.e. news, Go Fund Me, etc.) via RSS feeds. The opportunities to help span multiple avenues - advocacy, protesting, policy/petitions, donations, volunteering, etc. Doing so, makes collective impact more achievable. Additional features include: subscribing to verified users only, upvoting content, share options to other social media platforms, a rewards system to drive user engagement, and ability to filter to global and local content.
 
What problem is Reform trying to solve?
The missing intersection between information about current social and environmental issues and a diverse offering of solutions to address those issues. There’s a knowledge gap across the United States about the issues many communities are experiencing today and why those issues are problematic. Secondly, there is not one cohesive platform that educates people on these issues while providing solutions that a population at varying income levels and ages can take action on. In order for change to happen, we must learn and take action in whatever capacity we can.
What do I need funding for?
I currently have wireframes and a video prototype for the app. I'm looking for funding to turn these wireframes into an app that can be found on the Apple app store! I have a qualified engineer ready to work on the development, all I need is help with funding.

Any support is appreciated!!

record.Creator: Olga Kurilenko
record.Title: 2 Single-Digit Clocks with the Jubilant Nixie lamps
record.Text:
2 Single-Digit Clocks with the Jubilant
Two single-digit clocks with neon lights for a laid-back lifestyle. Meet the largest and most elegant Nixie lamp in the world ever produced for the public! 
If you want to live a more relaxed life, you will love these clocks. They literally combine time and leisure.

The ZIN clock shares 2 vivid traces of Nixie technology. Nixie numerical indication technology makes very accurate counting and applies in space flights.  Also, beautiful Nixie neon discharge technology applies in light advertisements on shops and illuminations in Disneyland and Las Vegas.



Ready-made Nixie Tube


We believe that you can enjoy this beautiful indication technology more often.
The largest Nixie tube in the world:
1. The gas is evacuated from the tube.
2. A little but well-measured amount of neon or argon is infused in the tube.
3. The tube represents a well-sealed bulb with electrodes coming out of its base, anode mesh and cathode filaments.
4. When a voltage is applied to the two electrodes, the gas in the tube allows the current to flow.
5. The digits light up and one can observe the plasma or gas discharge around the digits.






Product line of Clocks


ZIN clock is an art piece
1. The glass and the mechanism of the clock have been elaborated with remarkably high precision.
2. ZIN18 and ZIN70 Nixie clocks represent a new variety of IN and Z types of Nixie lamps. This contributes to historical Nixie tubes’ development.
3. ZIN70 clock has the largest ever Nixie tube in the world produced for the public. It more resembles Z-type tubes - z568m.
4. ZIN18 clock has the most elegant Nixie tube. It is elongated and neat. It more resembles IN-type tubes - IN18.





ZIN clock for the house and laid-back lifestyle
You can place this clock on the shelf or the table of your living room, bedroom, or kitchen.
Apart from showing the time in an easy format, it will brighten any room and make it more vivid.





Single-digit neon clock for chalet cabin and beach house.
Nothing will bring more style, history, and laid-back air into the room as this one-digit neon lights clock. It is perfect for the houses where you go to recover your energy. Looking at this clock sometimes feels like looking at a fireplace. In the mountains, in the forest, by the ocean or the lake, it shows the time in natural[EL2]  lights of electric current.




















Single-digit neon clock for creative workshops
This clock fits well in creative workshops and studios for artists, writers, photographers, and sculptures. It is also the best for scientists and researchers. In general, you will enjoy it if time is not a constraint in your work. This clock does not give you extra information, it is not pressing, and it is creative.





ZIN Nixie tube is almost eternal
The ZIN Nixie lamp is made of stainless steel. We annealed the glass of the lamp to make it super strong. Also, we flawlessly crafted the mechanism of the tube. The envelope of the lamp is securely sealed. It is only the aging of the components that can impact its functioning. That is why the lamp’s service life is unlimited.



In the office


Time synchronization
For time counting, this ZIN clock uses an HV5622 micro scheme and displays one digit. The most fascinating fact lies in the most accurate numeric display technology not requested to be the most precise.
The ZIN clock has an alarm. You can set it for the morning or any other time. With this clock, you can always be on time and never miss your schedule.
The clock that only counts hours can also chime to announce each new hour. We created stylish chimes in diverse themes.



Rewards


Tweak ZIN clock
● Tweak RGB of underlights
● Tweak gradual switch of the digits
If you are a Nixie tubes enthusiast, you can use the ZIN70 lamp  instead of your z568m lamp on your own devices. You can easily disconnect the ZIN70 lamp from the clock.





“Slot machine” for lamp protection
The clock, by default, protects “relaxed” filaments from the particles of active filaments. Once in a while, it flips through all the digits. This process is called a “Slot machine.” It successfully solves the issue of cathodes poisoning and protects the lamp.
Supply voltage - 12V
Average consumption of current - 1A
Highest consumption of current - 1A
Highest power consumption - 14W
Input voltage - 12V DC





Easy setting
The setting up process of this clock is  extremely easy and intuitive. You can set the clock with the two press buttons that you can find on its base. You will need to follow the Table of settings that is given in the clock’s User guide. First, you will need to select a parameter and then assign a value to it.
The ZIN70 and ZIN18 lamps can serve forever. They have а 15- year  warranty. The
electronic part of the clock serves on average for 5 years.





About the team
We are a small company that produces Nixie devices such as clocks, watches, and thermometers. We love beautiful and historical technologies that are gas discharge numerical indication. We want to make it more advanced, adapted, and affordable for the public. We have a new laboratory with the most modern equipment for Nixie tubes production. There, we design and produce Nixie clocks. We are happy to have already had a successful experience in new Nixie clocks production.










Project timeline
We discussed and planned all the project stages and are optimistic about being on time with all deliverables.



Product Stages







Risks and challenges
We have been making Nixie lamps for a long time now and are quite sure of what we do. Even
though if any project’s stage goes out of the schedule, we will inform you here on this campaign
page. We will try to cope with any issues as soon as possible to get your rewards
in time.


Global Shipping
We happily offer shipping to anywhere in the world! The shipping rate to your country will be indicated in the check-out menu when pledging to this campaign. We've negotiated with international carriers - FedEx, UPS. That's the best price we can get with discounts. Please note that the price of the item does not include additional duty and taxes that may apply as per local laws of importation. If taxes and/or duties apply, we will contact you to accommodate your local laws.
We have been in the Nixie business since 2012. Our customers are from all over the world, including the USA, Canada, the UK, France, Germany, China, and many other countries. We have a great deal of experience in getting our products safely into our customers’ hands around the world.

record.Creator: StenoKeyboards
record.Title: The Uni
record.Text:
This is the Uni



United States design patent pending







The Uni is sleek, ergonomic, and economical. This little keyboard has the potential to be the world's fastest keyboard. It uses a system called stenography which is a system of writing word by word through strokes and chords.
If you want to type faster, sure, you can practice Qwerty every day, or maybe learn a new keyboard layout such as Colemak, Dvorak, or Workman. But you are limited by the keyboard itself; you can only achieve so much with a keyboard that lets you type only one letter at a time. Qwerty was actually designed to slow you down to prevent jams in the typewriter machine!
Stenography is different. The system was developed with the sole intention of keeping up with the speed of human speech. The average person speaks at about 180 WPM and the average court reporter (people who use stenography to transcribe court proceedings) can type at 200 WPM easily for up to several hours. 





Origin Story
Prototype Uni v1:
February 2021: Green PCB without even a backplate. Fully functional, but could use some design upgrades.
Uni v2:
May 2021: Matte Black PCB with backplate compatibility. This design allows for greater flexibility when designing cases in the future.  Uses a pro micro (the blue rectangle), just like the v1 so it uses a micro USB port. 
Uni v3 (now):
September 2021: Integrated brain, no more pro micro design. Uses a USB Type C connection. Still uses the same backplate, but provides better aesthetics and reliability due to the lack of a pro micro. It has built-in electrostatic discharge protection. The PCB is only compatible with MX switches.





More Specs

248mm x 76mm dimensions
13u x 4u
28 keys total
Gateron Clear 35 gram switches
MX Spacing (PCB is only MX compatible)
12x M2 Screws 4mm
6x M2 stand-offs 4mm
Uses QMK open source firmware
 Comes with a backplate made of FR4 material (the same material as the main PCB)









Plover Discord Server






Plover Subreddit






Learn steno right now even without a keyboard!



Learn More
Here is a great video explaining in depth what steno and Plover are (she is using the Uni v2):




Collaborators
This project was brought to you by:
Peter Park: The voice in the video and designer of the Uni.
Sophia Park: Graphic design.
Sarah Park: Graphic design.
Website: https://www.stenokeyboards.com/

record.Creator: James
record.Title: Making a Prototype for a Laser Lawnmower
record.Text:
*** This is the UPDATED Project for the Laser Lawnmower ® .  We initially had started the project with a target of over $400,000.00; however, we had some freelancers whom were interested in the project.  We decided to go with these freelancers/consultants to have the prototype built.
Since, we are going with these independent people, our goal has dropped and we wanted to share it with the public.  We are able to drop our funding goal and still get everything done.  ***
J & M Inventions, LLC is a family owned business (father and daughter team), based out of Fargo, North Dakota, which focuses their attention on making people’s lives safer and avoiding injuries and deaths. We are excited to bring this opportunity to the public and seek their support to SAVE LIVES.
James and Maria are reaching out to the public seeking funding for their invention. They have filed non-provisional patents with the USPTO for their invention along with trademark applications for the name.
They invented a new way to cut the grass, the “Laser Lawnmower”, and are seeking funding from the public.
They have contacted a large well-known company (we are unable to say which company due to signing a Non-Disclosure Agreement, NDA) and they have shown interest in the laser lawnmower; however, they are wanting a prototype and proof of concept. We are needing the money for the creation of a prototype.
We are confident once we have a prototype that there will be a deal and you will see this invention in a store near you.
For almost 100 years the lawnmower has not changed in design with its spinning metal blades.
Each year, thousands of people in the United States go to the Emergency Room, due to lawnmower injuries and deaths.
This is costing Millions of dollars a year, just in injuries and deaths. Plus, several Millions in property damage from things being broken from items being kicked out from the spinning of the metal blades.
People are injured and property is damaged from the spinning blades from a lawnmower. These blades kick out (from under the lawnmower), rocks and sticks at high rates of speed.
"We still see too many foot injuries from power lawnmowers," says foot and ankle surgeon James Thomas, DPM, FACFAS. "The blades whirl at 3,000 revolutions per minute and produce three times the kinetic energy of a 357 handgun."
“American Academy of Orthopedic Surgeons: “The energy transferred by a typical lawn mower blade is equivalent to being shot with a 357 magnum pistol.”
A study released in 2018 by researchers at Johns Hopkins Medicine found that lawn mower injuries, most of which require surgery, cost an average of $37,000 per patient. The study examined lawn-mower-related Emergency Room visits from 2006 to 2013.
We NEED your help to raise this money so we can help prevent injuries and deaths. PLEASE help us to help others. EVERY dollar gets us closer to the goal.
This lawnmower could prevent you or one of your loved ones from being injured or killed.
God Bless everyone who took the time to read this and for those generous few whom provided funding.
Take care,

FREQUENT ASKED QUESTIONS (FAQ)
1. How do I know this is legit and not a scam?
a. We are a real company based out of Fargo, North Dakota, and registered with the North Dakota Secretary of State. This is real and NOT a scam.
2. Who is the company that is interested in the invention?
a. We can not answer that question because when businesses enter into negotiations both sides want to keep the details a secret. It is a way to protect both parties, when there is a deal made, eventually it will be public knowledge, but once again the details will be secret.
3. Will the Laser Lawnmower catch the grass on fire?
a. Most people will only cut their grass when it is healthy and growing, hence forth why they are cutting the grass. Healthy normal grass is made up of mostly water 70%- 85% water. There is no fear of it catching fire.
i. Click on the link for more facts about lawns:
1. https://www.mowmore.com/blogs/news/lawn-and-turfgrass-facts-and-stats
2. https://www.nytimes.com/2002/04/10/opinion/l-need-water-try-grass-468401.html
b. There are some people whom would cut “dry” or “dead” grass. In theory, that could cause a fire hazard. With that said, we have made modifications and designs to the patent.
c. *** We have added several water jets (found after the lasers have cut the grass) which will spray water onto the clippings to prevent any possibility of catching fire. This is an OPTION which can be turned off by the user. If they are cutting healthy grass there is no need to have the jets spraying on the clippings.
4. Is the Laser Lawnmower really safe? What if I get cut by the Laser Lawnmower?
a. It is important to note that IF a person were to get their foot or fingers under the lawnmower deck, it will be cut off no matter if it was the metal blade or a laser.
b. The BIG difference between getting cut be a laser and a metal blade is how the wound looks. From a medical point, it would be easier to attached a severed finger, toe, hand or other body part when it was cut off by a laser. A Laser will make a straight “clean” cut, which a medical surgeon will be able to attach it much easier.
c. However, in the same situation of a body part being cut off by a metal blade, the wound would be different. The edges will be jagged and torn. It may or may notbe able to be attached as easily as a laser wound.
d. Another issue is the infection possibility. The laser would NOT have any germs which would enter the wound when it is cut, because of the intense heat. Where as a metal blade would have grass, dirt, and germs on the blade.
e. Another point will be that IF a person were to get their foot or hand under the deck of the lawnmower, the normal spinning metal blades covers the entire area under the deck of the lawnmower.
i. But the small area for the lasers will be about 1 inch from the left side to the right side of the lawnmower deck. So, unless that person who accidentally went under at the exact point of the laser’s they will not get injured.
ii. There is a 100% chance of a person getting injured from a spinning metal blade IF they get their body part under the lawnmower deck.





iii. There is a 10% chance of a person getting injured IF they get their body part under the lawnmower deck, because the lasers ONLY go from one side of the deck to the other side. There is 90% of the area which would be safe IF a person got under the lawnmower.





5. How safe is it IF a person fell off while driving a riding lawnmower?
a. As you can see from the diagram a person who accidentally fell while riding on the riding lawnmower will have a less of chance of injury or death with the Laser Lawnmower than the spinning blade mower.
b. It would be more likely a person whom fell (while sitting on a riding lawnmower) will miss the lasers, since the lasers are stationed further forward on the mower. While on a traditional spinning blade mower the person would 100% be injured by the spinning blades.
6. How many lives will be saved by using the Laser Lawnmower?
a. 100%of the people (would be affected) whom would have been injured or killed by an object being thrown at them from the spinning blades. Laser lawnmowers do NOT have spinning blades.





b. Roughly 80%-90% of people (would be affected) whom would have been injured or killed when they accidentally fell under the push or riding lawnmower, since the danger area of the lasers will greatly be reduced by 90%.
7. How will the Laser Lawnmower save lives?
a. The Laser Lawnmower will NOT have any spinning blades which will kick out objects at the speed of a .357 magnum handgun. People will not be struck and harmed by any spinning blades.
8. How many people are injured/killed from lawnmowers each year?
a. For those wondering about the REAL numbers of injuries from lawnmowers: Here are the facts from the Government website of CPSC.gov and the American Hospital Association aha.org.
b. Here is the link to the NEISS Data Highlights for Calendar Year 2019: https://www.cpsc.gov/s3fs-public/2019-NEISS-data-highlights.pdf?ZU3YoE6xnBRIICuP8BvBRpsXMV7Tb9sg
c. The report stated the following: “The 2019 NEISS estimates have been produced from a sample of 96 hospitals, including children's hospitals. Information from NEISS is available to the public through CPSC's National Injury Information Clearinghouse  (phone: 301-504-7921) and online at www.cpsc.gov/en/Research--Statistics/NEISS-Injury-Data/“
d. ***NOTE: This is an estimate of injuries from ONLY 96 hospitals.***
e. On page 3 of the report, it reported 77,244 injuries from lawnmowers.
f. Since, this report ONLY took a sample of 96 hospitals we must look at how many hospitals there are in the United States.
g. Here is the link to the American Hospital Association: https://www.aha.org/statistics/fast-facts-us-hospitals
h. As of 2021 there are a “Total Number of All U.S. Hospitals 6,090”
i. To get the rough estimate of injuries from lawnmowers per year FROM ALL HOSPITALS, we will use the estimate from the 2019 NEISS Report of 77,244 (From 96 hospitals).
j. There are 6090 hospitals and divide that by 96.
k. 6090 divided by 96 equals 63.
l. IF we are to estimate how many lawnmower injuries there are in the entire United States, we will have to multiply the 2019 NEISS reported lawnmower injures of 77,244 by 63.
m. That gives us an estimate of 4,866,372 injuries from lawnmowers from ALL United States Hospitals EACH YEAR.
9. Will the Laser Lawnmower SAVE me MONEY?
a. YES! It will SAVE you MONEY!
b. You will NOT have to buy spark plugs, gas, and air filters,
10. Will the Laser Lawnmower SAVE me TIME?
a. YES! It will SAVE you TIME!
b. You will NOT have to sharpen any metal blades before using the lawnmower.
c. NO changing the oil.
d. NO need to clean the air filter.
11. Is the Laser Lawnmower healthy for my grass?
a. YES, IF you were to look at a blade of grass (under a microscope) after a metal blade cuts through the blade of grass, you will see a jagged edge.
b. If a laser were to cut that same piece of grass the edge will be a “clean” straight cut. This is LESS traumatizing to the grass and will be healthier for the grass.
12. Is the Laser Lawnmower environmentally friendly?
a. YES, it is environmentally friendly!
b. NO need for oil.
c. NO need for gas.
d. NO pollution in the air from the engine.
News articles (all over the world) from people injured or killed by the spinning blades of lawnmowers.
** These injuries and deaths could have been avoided IF a Laser Lawnmower was being used.**
FROM UNITED KINGDOM
https://metro.co.uk/2010/03/03/woman-decapitated-in-lawnmower-accident-143259/
FROM IRELAND
https://www.irishtimes.com/news/item-thrown-by-lawnmower-killed-man-1.199074
FROM THE UNITED STATES
https://www.foxnews.com/us/south-dakota-woman-survives-freak-lawn-mower-accident-that-left-her-neck-sliced-open
https://www.orlandosentinel.com/news/os-xpm-2006-09-01-mbellybutton01-story.html (18-year-old)
https://www.kansascity.com/news/nation-world/national/article254209068.html (6-year-old)
https://www.kenoshanews.com/news/local/riverview-school-student-injured-by-lawnmower-projectile-flown-to-hospital/article_018b571f-ac68-50e3-92bb-198db97fa424.html (6-year-old)
https://www.star-telegram.com/news/state/texas/article252453483.html
https://nypost.com/2021/04/16/man-gets-metal-shard-propelled-into-eyelid-while-mowing-lawn/
https://www.wisn.com/article/wisconsin-boy-in-coma-after-rock-kicked-lawn-mower-hit-him-in-head-recess/37613140#  (6-year-old with a brain injury)

After receiving the inquiry, the platform carefully selects the best Master for you, who then based on details in the question, will decide whether to help you or to recommend a different supervisor. Rates may vary depending on the Master’s preference and start from 0€. If you do not accept any of Masters’ offers, it will expire irrevocably at no cost to you.
Your paycheck depends on your knowledge, preference for pay rate, and availability!





What if a request for knowledge is not in line with your expertise?
The platform MasterMatch uses AI to match someone’s request for knowledge with a Master’s knowledge and expertise. That’s why you must keep your Master profile updated and filled out with areas of your expertise. 
Before someone is officially connected to you, we give you the privilege to review an anonymous question that you can always reject or accept. If it is rejected, then a request for knowledge is directed to the second most suitable Master. The user doesn’t see that you rejected that request.






Knowledgeable individuals who want to monetize their expertise by providing paid advice in business areas such as finance, investments, law, business strategy, process management, people management, business mentorship, online marketing. 
Managers and business owners who are motivated to dedicate their time and 	business experience to help others grow,
Investors looking for start-up connections and investment opportunities,
Entrepreneurs who appreciate learning from smarter people directly and fast,
People who value quick and unique information to take competitive advantage.






 We already have +50 CEOs and owners of companies, inspiring entrepreneurs and corporate specialists from the UK, Belgium, Edinburg, Poland, India, and others 
– check privilege online interviews to know them better!
























 ....and join this fast-growing community of Masters!










The MasterMatch VIP Group is a self-regulating community - the value of each Master is measured by the quality of each individual consultation. This is important because thanks to this, VIP Master Group consists only of reliable and competent people who are sincerely committed to helping others.
Once you are registered on the MasterMatch platform you have the status „unverified”. You need to wait till there is a verified, VIP Master already in the community who needs your knowledge and asks you for a consultation. You need to give three consultations. After each consultation, you will be evaluated on a scale of 1 to 5 on 5 dimensions, to assess if:

You were knowledgeable on a given topic
You gave knowledge dedicated to his/her specific problem
You provided the required level of details
You had understandable language skills
You demonstrated professional behavior

After three consultations, the system checks if you earned enough scores. If yes you will be accepted by the Master community and you can start giving paid consultation to everyone around the world. If you don’t earn the desired level of the score, you can still have a chance to join by giving more quality consultations until you finally reach the golden score.
MasterMatch guards the quality of members, so once you start providing paid consultations, you need to keep your quality high at golden score; otherwise, your membership at the MasterMatch platform will be discontinued. If you want to reactivate your Master profile again, you will be asked to go through the same verification process in the same way as when you first joined MasterMatch as a Master.










The value of MasterMatch platform will come from VIP Masters, which is a closed community of trusted people who can be consulted and learned from, due to their qualifications and experience.
Not everyone can get VIP status.
You must keep the quality of your knowledge-sharing process high if you want to stay on the platform.
The highest overall average score you receive the more clients want to talk to you. The level of your scores also unlocks new application features for you.
Platform MasterMatch is not a people search engine like Linkedin, nor is it a job offering marketplace like Fiver. 
It is a well-equipped program that matches a person who needs your knowledge here and now. Using our single platform you can:

get targeted clients for your price and expertise 24/7, 
set your own price (no costs for an intermediary agency!),
earn without a limit, 
arrange a time for clients based on your calendar availability, 
both parties can sign any contracts or documents if that's required,
collect the expected payment immediately after meeting with a client,
generate an invoice which is automatically received by the client, 
see all of your past consultations,  
invite your friends to join a network of Masters on special terms and earn money on each new member! 
 learn and develop from others VIP Master in this prestigious community.






Everything is in one place.  Simple. 
Save your time and money on others.





In the MasterMatch application,  a Master will have a feature to upload digital documents/contracts and sign them by using an electronic signature. That feature promotes a paperless office idea. 
We also have a paperless billing process that provides easy access to past bills in digital form.





Because bills and contracts are delivered online, we reduce the need for physical delivery, and thus we reduce carbon emission to the atmosphere by carbon-fossil courier vehicles.





 You don't pay for submitting a request for knowledge. 
You would pay:

49€/monthly (or 39€/monthly in advance for a year), if you successfully complete the process of VIP verification and want to be a VIP Master who gets an unlimited number of paid requests for knowledge around the world and raise your earnings without a limit,
0,25€ for each started hour of consultations for technical platform maintenance,
the amount for the money you agreed with your Master for knowledge transfer,
transactions costs of processing payment,  as per your agreement with the bank.

Get a VIP worth 588€ as a reward!





We are Finalists of The Young Transatlantic Innovation Leaders Initiative (YTILI) 2021. The YTILI Fellowship Program is sponsored by the U.S. Department of State with funding provided by the U.S. Government and supported in its implementation by WorldChicago. 





YTILI uses entrepreneurship as a tool for economic empowerment to promote mutual understanding, enhance business and leadership skills, and build lasting partnerships between business leaders from Europe and the United States.





We have also taken part in Unicorn Pitches in Poland, organized by the Startup Network. 





We have a great network of clients, business partners and we drive for technological innovation. Being business consultants and engineers ourselves, we live and breathe our product. MasterMatch is not just another mobile app, it's our baby! We want clients to use it all the time and we have devoted countless hours refining every detail for the smoothest customer experience in all cases. We’ve actively been working toward this application over the last year. Much of the time was spent on customer interviews and prototype testing.  Based on feedback from our clients, we created the website MasterMatch.online in March 2020, where first users can already sign-up for free and feel the initial experience of our upcoming product. If we reach Kickstarter financial goal in December, we’ll have all that time to really polish all features for the application, with help of our first VIP users.  After the successful VIP account launch in April 2022, we will go deep into more advanced features like payments, invoicing, and e-contract signing. Because we are both highly experienced in approaching aggressive timelines, strong planning, and risk management for large companies in different business domains, we are confident that we’ll be able to overcome any challenges that come up on our way and find out creative solutions.
MasterMatch has two offices: one in London, United Kingdom, and the second in Poland, Warsaw. The product is designed and developing in Poland, and we are open to expanding globally.










The designer moment for you! 29€
Be our boss, create this app by yourself! Get 1-day VIP access to its first version and share your input on what to change!





Video – Kickstarter Special Edition 35€
Learn some business life-hacks with a special video containing 3 IT tips, designed by our very own Co-founder Marek.





E-book – Kickstarter Special Edition 49€
Kickstarter Special Edition of e-book with collections of interviews with top managers about team management strategies, authored by our very own Co-founder Joanna.





Get VIP in MasterMatch – Early Backer Pre-Order 167€
Get VIP access to our app and save 421€ (71%) - off EU retail price (588€)! Including:

Yearly VIP status in MasterMatch community,
Access to VIP clients across the world to grow your business and connections,
Automatic and quick matching of clients with your service,
No charge for upcoming features: a calendar containing your availability, automatic invoicing, instant payments, fast contracts upload, and signing.






Exclusive 1:1 interview to promote your business and brand across the world – Kickstarter LIMITED! 299€. Including:

10-minute online interview,
promote your business and brand across the world via MasterMatch YouTube and Linkedin,
promote your brand in the VIP community via private e-mails.






Secret VIP party – Kickstarter Special LIMITED! 499€
Secret VIP cocktail party including:

entrance ticket to executive Warsaw Stock Exchange venue,
rare opportunity to meet our VIP Masters from all over the world,
food & drinks.






Deluxe VIP dinner with two at Rooftop restaurant with one of Co-founder LIMITED! 899€. Including*:

enjoy the benefits of VIP status in the MasterMatch community, access to VIP clients from around the world, and be the first one to experience all the new and exciting upcoming features (value of 600€),
2 hours table reservation in a deluxe Rooftop restaurant in Warsaw
stunning view of Warsaw panoramic
1:1 conversation with a co-founder
main course
drinks
 *optional pick-up from Warsaw airports/nearby place of residence.











Are you tired of looking for business partners,  doing administration tasks around clients, and looking for high-quality advisors for your business? US TOO!
We are Joanna & Marek and we decided to create a simple and easy solution for that. 





Joanna is CEO of MasterMatch and she successfully went through all career levels of multi-national organizations (worked in USA, Canada, Poland).  During over 7 years of practical experience, she managed a portfolio of +40 complex IT projects and 10+ business strategy initiatives and coordinated diverse IT teams (developers, analysts, testers, project managers).  She is a trainer, speaker, and mentor. She gained her international business knowledge through studies of Finance in Poland, Financial Engineering in Sweden, Agile Development at the University of Virginia, USA, International Investment Funds Services, Ireland, and MBA at Asbiro in Poland.  Her competencies are reinforced by the Certification of Capability in Business Analysis™ (CCBA®) & Chartered Financial Analyst level I. She loves strategic thinking and has a data analytics skillset (QlikView, BPMN, UML, SQL, C++).
Marek is CTO of MasterMatch and is a software engineer with over 14 years of experience, mainly as a backend developer.  He has built from scratch a start-up www.RecipeShop.pl that allows users to turn recipes into a shopping cart in online grocery stores.  He also successfully created mobile applications for the Android platform: Ortogratka (~100K downloads) and Traffic cameras (~7K downloads).  During his career, he served multinational corporations in building and maintaining systems in domains such as CRM, public sector, pharma, and finance/banking.  He is particularly interested in natural language processing (NLP) and its application in business through MasterMatch platform.  





We really appreciate your help in getting the word out about the MasterMatch, be noticed by your business friends,  partners, investors, clients, by your followers on Social Media, or a media outlet you happen to work for 😉 If you need more details contact us via mail info@mastermatch.online. LET'S MAKE IT HAPPEN NOW!

record.Creator: IMPACTIVE SOLUTIONS
record.Title: WITALOGY SPEAKER
record.Text:
Truly Crystal Clear Sound Experience
Amazing Revolutionary Sound - Discover the World's First Witalogy Speaker System that combines two types of enclosures for crystal clear sound with specious highs and mids. Plus you get thumping, room reverberating lows with the 30 watt woofer. Enjoy unbelievable realism. You will feel like you're in the same room with the musicians.
Stylish Minimalist Design With The Point
Each enclosure has its advantages and disadvantages. We combine them to overcome their disadvantages and get the best of both worlds. The disadvantage of an open baffle is the reduced bass reproduction. This is balanced by sound with more openness, less sound distortion and greater speaker efficiency due to the same pressure on both sides of the speaker membrane. The perfect sound characteristics are completed by a subwoofer in minimalist body which is tuned for an authentic low end.





Highly efficient transparent open baffle design with two aluminum cone 15 W speakers designed in the USA, delivers clean spacious highs and mids, along with a 30 W woofer in the rigid aluminum body for deep precise low-end.





Open-baffle speakers





Woofer in aluminum body















Use the classy leather handle with stainless steel frame to take the speaker with you everywhere you go. Instantly connects with your phone to play your favorite jams loud and proud. The low profile of the speaker is also ideal for use as a TV/PC soundbar, thanks to analog input.





You'll love the minimalist, easy operation. Simply connect via Bluetooth 5.1 Audio Apt-X HD with your phone's Bluetooth for fabulous clear, full bodied sound that stuns friends and passersby. The High-End 3-channel Class D Audio Amplifier kicks out lots of volume with plenty of headroom and zero distortion.





Enjoy WITALOGY Multicolor LED Backlight. A lighting system that fills your space with mood and creative energy. Enjoy WITALOGY Multicolor LED Backlight. A lighting system that fills your space with mood and creative energy. Simply set the color, intensity and mode you like best.





Technical Features

Bluetooth® 5.1 wireless technology / Qualcomm® aptX™ HD audio
3 channel class D power amplifier
Frequency Range: 50Hz-20KHz
WITALOGY Multicolor LED backlight 
High performance 21 V Lithium-ion battery 
12 hours playtime from a single charge
Leather handle with stainless steel frame
Simple one-button operation

 MAGMESH is printed from resilient polymer resin. The layering of the polymer ensures great sound permeability, but still retain high ability to stop sharp objects. Polymer 3D mesh is flexible, impact resistant and does not affect sound quality.

record.Creator: Beverley Johnson
record.Title: Hi Tech Hi Fashion Heated Puffer Coat
record.Text:
LAST WEEK $299 - Save $200!











LAST WEEK $299 - Save $200!





Winter warmth with the addition of hi tech and hi fashion.  It's hard to find a heated puffer coat that is both fashionable and functional so we have designed one!  
A Heated Puffer Coat that is stylish with lots of additional features, like an attachable bag, removable sleeves, lots of hidden pockets and a unique art lining.  Made from 100% recycled nylon on the outer and 100% recycled poly for the lining we have not compromised on fabric quality and hardware.  
At Consequence of Change we collaborate with artists to create unique products for our community and we believe that we have created the most versatile Heated Puffer Coat.































Our Puffer Coat has four nano heating pads.  Two on the back and one in each pocket.





The Nano Heating Technology pads are made from carbon nano tube film and  created to be soft and lightweight.  You will not know the pads are there!  They have been safety tested by our supplier and we can provide certifcation if required.










You choose how warm you want to be with the touch of a button (inside the coat). Press once for the lowest temperature and up to four times for the highest temperature.















We tested our coat out, this is what our customers had to say.










Battery Charger: We have added a pocket 3/4 of the way down the coat for the power pack.  Every coat comes with a FREE battery pack with universal adaptability.





Detachable Bag:  The first Puffer Coat to feature a detachable bag with magnetic attachment to make it easy to put on. The bag is reversible, features two pockets on each side and has an adjustable strap.





Removable Sleeves: Zip off your sleeves for those not so chilly days and turn your coat into a vest.





Handy Sleeve Pocket: We have added a convenient pocket on the sleeve to carry your cell phone, credit card, keys or whatever you want.  Easy to reach!





 Ear Pod Pocket: We have also added a neat little side pocket on the sleeve to hold your ear pod case.

























When it came to chosing an artist to work with for this project we really wanted to collaborate with an Indigenous artist.  So after much searching we engaged Niketa Law a contemporary Aboriginal artist. Her inspiration for Barambah Winds came from her home in the Australian Hinterland and has been created exclusively for us. 




















 Hi, my name is Beverley and I am the Founder of Consequence of Change.  We are a small but mighty brand.  Our purpose is to support the arts with our art collaborations.  We commission each piece of work to ensure the artist  is paid fairly. We also do this so that our customer has something truly unique.  
We are small batch so only offer very limited numbers due to the costs and also wanting to keep our products one of a kind.  This coat has been my dream since visiting Iceland and my Puffer Coat just did not do it's job.  So by supporting  us you are going to receive something truly special.






It is really important that you follow our recommendation on how to choose the right size for you:
As you are going to be measuring for a coat we recommend taking your measurements over your regular clothes.  
Chest measurement:  The chest is the most important body part for coat measurements.  Stand up straight, relax your arms at your side.  Ideally ask someone to help - wrap the tape measure around your chest area making sure the tape measure has some room (max 1"/2.54cm) to move.  If you want the jacket to fit looser you should add an additional inch/cm.  Measure horizontally around the body at the strongest part of the chest.
Hip measurement:  The hip is measured in the same way as above.  Measure horizontally at the widest area.
See our chart below for more guidance:










When we reach our goal, you will be sent a survey to ensure you get the size you requested.





Shipping costs will be charged after the campaign is finished. The reason for this is that due to COVID there is massive volatility on shipping prices and fixing them months in advance from our side could translate to higher costs for everyone.  Our  estimation is that the cost will be around USD $20.  We will be working hard to achieve the best balance of shipping speed and cost efficiency for you.  We will remain 100% transparent regarding shipping costs and will pass on any potential savings.  We don't profit at all from shipping but actually subsidise part of the shipping costs.  We are working with our 3PL supplier to get the best rates possible.  Please note that your battery and coat will come in separate shipments as the battery has to be mailed through a different shipping channel and doing it this way will make it as cost effective as possible.






If you need to exchange your coat due to size not being right you will need to ship the coat to us at your expense however we will re ship to you at our expense.  Coat must be returned unwashed, in same condition you received it.  It cannot have been worn.




We acknowledge that we are on the lands of the Wurundjeri people of the Kulin Nations who have been custodians of this land for thousands of years, and acknowledge and pay our respects to their Elders past, present and emerging.

record.Creator: Dominique campbell
record.Title: neighborfood
record.Text: Hey all, Tired of having restaurants closed early? or are you even just tired of eating the same food all of the time? This is where our app will come into place. Food trucks will have to submit their menu's the night before so that daily polls can be set up to see what neighborhoods are interested in having which food trucks come to their neighborhood. Meaning if Susan's neighborhood has 10 people that would like hibachi and frank lives in another neighborhood and has only himself interested, the truck would go to susan's neighborhood. Would also offer online ordering so you can pick up your food instead of having to wait in lines. This eliminates boring regular food pick up, eliminates having the same meals everyday because the menu would change daily or weekly. How Nice would it be to be able to step foot out your house and to be able to get different meals daily....without having to drive or shop. Customers could also vote on food choices they'd like available on the trucks.

record.Creator: LiONCooler
record.Title: LionCooler Pro: Battery & Solar Powered Portable Freezer
record.Text:
For nearly a decade, LiONCooler has been known for its battery-powered solar fridge freezers and our dedication to providing off-grid and portable power solutions to consumers. We’re so excited and proud to introduce the LiONCooler Pro, the newest technology in the portable, fridge, freezer, cooler market - designed with more versatility with a battery that also functions as an external power bank so you can power on-the-go.











Everyone knows that when the ice melts, there’s condensation, water drips everywhere and food gets soggy. Those are the old days, the LiONCooler Pro needs no ice. The integrated compressor allows the cooler to function as a refrigerator or freezer except in a portable and cordless design.





The LiONCooler Pro has all of the advantages of your home’s refrigerator but it’s designed to be completely portable, battery-operated and cordless so you can take it with you in your car, RV, boat, camping, fishing, tailgating and you want to enjoy cold food and drinks.

















When you’re on the road or the outdoors, you want a reliable, portable, cooler. The LiONCooler Pro features a powerful temperature control system that can maintain a steady temperature even in the most extreme environments engineered with a DC compressor and a long-lasting Lithium-ion battery, giving you up to 12 hours of uninterrupted chilling.
















The LiONCooler Pro lets you quickly recharge its removable battery in 3 convenient ways: using the AC wall outlet of your home or hotel room, a DC 12v socket from your vehicle and using solar power panels. For a complete off-grid experience, pair the LiONCooler Pro with solar power panels from ACOPower to enjoy cool drinks and food in the backcountry. The charging cycle takes 4 to 6 hours and the battery holds power for 12 hours with two batteries you can enjoy 24 hours of battery-operated cooling.
















Unlike other fridge-freezer coolers, the LiONCooler Pro is 100% mobile - no need to keep it plugged into your vehicle our electrical outlet. The powerful battery stays operating for up to 12 hours and can be recharged in the car or with a solar power panel at the campsite, beach, tailgate or park.










That’s right: you can finally forget about those messy coolers that require ice to keep food and drinks cold and can quickly become a soggy mess. The LiONCooler Pro puts the ice in the past, offering you a smart, dry, realizable and portable fridge and freezer experience.











While you want some things frozen, some other things should just be refrigerated. LiONCooler Pro features both functions powered by its high-quality DC Compressors. Simply adjust the desired function you need it for at any time using the device’s digital LCD display—choosing from -20℃ Freezing to a milder adjustable Chilling function, without having its temperature affected by the weather.
















Since the Lithium-ion battery is removable, you can take it out and use it as a standalone powerbank for your phone, laptop, outdoor lighting and other devices with USB ports.















LiONCooler Pro is designed to be as convenient as a trolley bag. Simply pull the telescopic handle and you’re good to go. Seamlessly take your LiONCooler Pro anywhere, without lifting or holding it, and enjoy its robust all-terrain 6 inches extra-large wheels that will literally let you take it off-road.















































The removable multi-purpose lid provides more access to your cooler and can also be used as a food prep table. Plus, you can easily remove to wash and clean.  
















Another key feature that makes LiONCooler Pro innovative is the ability to charge through solar power. Just connect the cooler directly to a solar power panel and enjoy the green and environmentally-friendly charging and keep drinks and food cold completely off-grid.











Want even more convenience? If temperature changes outdoors or if you simply want to adjust the chilling temperature of the device, you can adjust the cooler’s temperature on the digital LCD display or remotely, from its free Bluetooth App available for iOS or Android.









Crowdfunding is not new to us, we successfully funded our first project here: the 3rd generation LiONCooler. Since then, the LiONCooler has been tried and tested by thousands of consumers, it has even been used in the most sensitive medical environments, transporting medicine and organs, where reliable and steady temperatures are critically important.





So what’s new? The LiONCooler Pro has a better 193Wh/52000mAh battery, that not only functions as a battery for your cooler but as a power bank for all devices. Plus, the battery is equipped with a double-sided type-c PD 60W and LED light so you have a flashlight when you need it.






#Review for LiONCooler 













LiONCooler Pro comes in three available capacities that you can choose from, according to your requirements: PX30 (30L), PX40 (40L), and PX50 (50L).

What's in the box?
















90w Compatible Solar Panel



*Available as an add-on

















LiONCooler products are all designed by our parent company ACOPOWER.  ACOPOWER is dedicated to making off-grid living easy with its solar and mobile power products for auto, caravan, RV, boat, tiny home and cabins. We proudly design our products from Los Angeles, leading the way in developing advanced yet easy-to-use battery solar freezers, portable solar panels, solar generators and off-grid solar systems.

record.Creator: 平山章三
record.Title: "Beeboard" a doodle book that glows when you touch it.
record.Text:
"Beeboard" is a dream board that allows children and adults to freely express their imagination.

  No need for chalk or ink anymore. The electric display is easy to see even in the dark, and it is easy to erase! Since it is dustless, it is completely harmless and hygienic to children even when used in restaurants. You can choose your favorite pen, brush, or stamp to freely express your creativity. 





























































You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00











































It is easy to write with just a light touch of a finger, pen, or brush, and is easily erased by simply bringing the eraser magnet closer. 
















The backlight LED is white. When used in color, a color filter can be inserted between the backlight and the screen to change the color into seven different colors.





















"Beeboard Tub" has 7,000 dots and "Beeboard Graffiti" has 14,000 dots. After the overall outline and composition is drawn, each stroke is carefully added to achieve a delicate expression.
















The magnetic sheet on the surface and the eraser are permanent magnets, so they can be used indefinitely unless they are damaged. The LED backlight has an endurance of 30,000 hours.
















Unlike chalk, there is no dust when erasing, so you don't have to worry about inhaling chalk dust.
















 It is notebook-sized and takes up very little space, even in limited spaces.

















At first glance, Beeboard looks like digital technology, but it is actually "analog" technology, using no semiconductor chips other than LEDs.
   Therefore, you cannot connect to a PC, save, or transfer data, but you can enjoy the intuitive freedom of expression that only a no-chip, no-manual system can provide. 











How it works
There is a small indentation on the surface where a large number of steel balls are magnetically adsorbed, blocking the light from the backlight.





By touching it with a brush or something, the steel ball is removed. Only the area where the balls fall, appears to glow through the light of the backlight.





To erase, bring the eraser magnet close to the surface, and the fallen steel balls will be attracted to the original position, blocking the light from the backlight and erasing them.







Stamp
The material of the stamp is a hair-planting cloth, with fibers planted all over it. By pressing it, you can drop a steel ball and make it glow.





 If you make a letter or logo cut from a planting cloth, you can easily display it at any time.























Backlight Module







Magnetizing machine (to magnetize the panel surface)







Precision Press Machine
The high technology of Japanese companies to precisely process materials that are difficult to process.































Beeboard Tab
The tablet size is easy to use, and you can choose your favorite color from black, red, or white.

Surface ：W200mm   H140mm

You can place it on your desk and use the wide screen to draw freely.

Beeboard Graffiti
