※ Standard equipments with an AC adapter, color filters, and a set of accessories.
(Included writing set contents)

Writing set (3 Stylus, 2 Erasers)
Alphabet stamp sheets (2 sheets)



















Technical Artists develop and manufacture products that everyone can enjoy, based on the concept of "the joy of drawing for everyone.”
Through Beeboard, we provide the pure joy of expression to everyone from children to the elderly.
Although digital technology has become the norm in many fields around the world, the analog method is not yet abandoned. Our goal is to help people understand the fun and enjoyment of the Beeboard method of drawing, to develop a new generation of blackboards, and to expand the ability of people to communicate with each other through visual recognition by spreading the use of free and flexible electronic displays that can be written on by hand. In addition, the project aims to provide an amenity to the educational field.
In addition, the project will improve the amenity of educational facilities and increase the productivity of education. In particular, the Beeboard series promotes brain development in children between the ages of 3 and 6, which can be called the “drawing” period.
Our goal is to make the Beeboard series available to as many people as possible in the world, so that we can reconfirm the beauty of analog technology and create a future that is friendly to people and the earth.

record.Creator: Infinity3D
record.Title: Infinity3D: Deformable 3D Belt Printer
record.Text:
Infinity3D is a 3D belt printer that features a unique design, continuous printing, and stability. Infinity3D is a large-size 3D printer that considers both 45° and 90° printing modes and is genuinely designed for constant printing in large quantities. It is an innovative product that leads the future.























 Unboxing Review



Infinity3D supports 45 ° and 90°  printing. This fantastic 2-in-1 design makes Infinity3D more practical and exciting. Just quick-change Infinity3D to the preferred mode, you will immediately get a unique creative space to realize different ideas. 













You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00





































You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00




































The base of Infinity3D is a rolling conveyor belt. The conveyor belt gradually rolls during the printing process, which can realize the continuous printing of batch models, as well as the printing of an infinite length model. With Infinity3D, you seem to have a small processing plant. 















The high-strength fiber woven conveyor belt allows the model to stick firmly and will automatically peel off when the model is transferred to the end. This is the key to realize batch printing without manual operation in the whole process. 















Need a larger printing area? Infinity3D was designed to print extra-large projects that fit the size of big dreams—supporting to build volume of 250*215*∞mm in 45° mode and 250*220*323mm in 90°mode. The users can print whatever they desire on a large creative scale. 











With a 3.5-inch full-color touch screen, you can check the printing status, function display, parameter setting at a glance. Furthermore, Infinity3D is compatible with U disk and SD card offline printing. So, everyone can start work quickly. 















Infinity3D is equipped with filament interruption detection and print resume function. The photoelectric induction will timely remind if the filament runs out or breaks midway. In case of power off, Infinity3D will continue to finish printing after the power supply is resumed. 










Infinity3D combines with industrial linear guide rails and TMC2209 motor drivers. Compared with low-end 3D printers with rollers and  A4988 drivers, Infinity3D provides higher printing accuracy, longer life, smoother movement, and lower working noise. 















To provide efficient and convenient printing, we optimized the slicing function，and added a continuous printing typesetting plug-in based on the Cura high-speed slicing engine. So, the operation is simple and easy to use. Even a beginner can operate the printer skillfully.
























































 As senior 3D printer lovers, we are troubled when printing 3D models in large quantities. Because the current 3D printers cannot print continuously, we bought many 3D printers and set an alarm clock to remind ourselves to get up at midnight to shovel the print model and start a new print. But, unfortunately, this kind of work around the clock gives us a headache. So, based on years of experience in 3D printers, we decided to develop a 3D printer that can continuously print for 7*24hours. 
We are a group of young, passionate, and creative 3D printing enthusiasts. To make 3D printing technology better meet the needs of various industries, we designed and developed infinity. We believe Infinity3D is the right product for education, healthcare, architecture, business, or hobbyists. We were hoping you could join us to lead the future with Infinity3D. 










 This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 2,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $900M raised between them.

record.Creator: Tierranova, LLC
record.Title: The Move Alert APP
record.Text:
The Move Alert APP identifies the Crime Statistic, Covid Cases and Critical Communications around your immediate location so that you can make informed decisions about your safety. Using GPS technology the APP moves with you and updates you on the surrounding safety conditions as you move from around your city, your country or around the world. Currently, We have identified and captured crime data within the U.S. and Covid-19 data within 180 countries world-wide, however we are seeking funding to expand our data collection efforts so that we can offer this app to all nations.
Imagine travelling to a new City in which you have never been and trying to navigate the streets not knowing if it is safe, not knowing the crime rate, what is the Covid rate, where is the nearest police or hospital, how do I contact emergency services if I need them, and if in a foreign country, where is the nearest embassy? The Move Alert APP answers all of those questions by simply pressing the appropriate button and seeing the information you need. Further, you will be connected to local law enforcement and receive voice, data and video alerts informing you of adverse activities in your area. With your help we can provide this information not just to citizens who travel within their own countries but as individuals travel to all parts of the world the APP will immediately sync with the crime and Covid data in those regions.
We are seeking a community of supporters that can provide feedback to us over the lifetime of this project as we seek to put this APP in the hands of over 1 Billion People World-Wide. Whether your donation is $1 or $10,000, you will join our flagship supporters program and will be given periodic updates about our APP as it expands from country to country.
The Basic Move Alert APP will be provided FREE to every Citizen world-wide and includes all of the health and safety functionality. The Premium Move Alert APP will include all Basic features and additional communication features with expanded data for foreign travels.
Another exciting feature of the Move Alert APP is that Schools, Communities, Cities, Law Enforcement Agencies and Governments can use a secure web based Communications Portal Page to direct message its Citizens using voice, data and video messaging. 
Created by Tierranova, LLC based in the United States with the support of  a local University and a local Technology Funding Group, the company worked with an India based Company to develop this APP for the past 24 Months. It is worth noting that the US and India are among the top 3 countries in the world with the highest cases of Covid outbreaks, which intensified the relationship of our two companies.
The inventor, Ron Daniels, is a technology professional with over 30 years holds a Masters Degree in Engineering and is an expert in database technology and analytics. He initially created the APP to address the growing crime rates within the US in particular mass shootings. In 2020, the APP was upgraded to include Covid data as this pandemic affected the health and safety of all humans world-wide. He is passionate about getting the APP to all corners of the world because his life has been touched by both aspects of Crime and Covid, having lost a brother to violent crime at a young age and most recently losing his Father to Covid in 2020.

record.Creator: BioBrain
record.Title: BioBrain - Bite sized Science for EVERYONE
record.Text:
OVERVIEW

BioBrain creates awesome interactive STEM learning tools for  everyone for Biology, Chemistry and Physics.  BioBrain explains exactly what you need to know in simple, bite sized chunks using easy to understand terms, with heaps of quiz questions. There is an illustrated glossary to help you understand all the difficult terms.   
To see our entire library of courses you can go to our site.






 What is BioBrain?

BioBrain is a globally accessible education platform that enables anyone to learn STEM independently or collaboratively in a classroom.
There are 300 million secondary school students in the world studying STEM (science, technology, engineering and mathematics). Accessing high quality STEM resources in an interactive online format can be difficult, if not impossible. This makes it challenging for students to prepare themselves for post secondary education or the skilled jobs of the future.
For teachers, BioBrain is an excellent tool to use for flipped learning or formative assessment. Teachers can assign short quizzes at the end of each section, enabling both students and teachers to quickly identify where there may be knowledge gaps. BioBrain allows for adaptive and personalised learning with teachers able to assign work to the whole class or just a few students.
Many teachers are currently using BioBrain at the start of their classes to assess understanding of the scientific concepts covered in the previous lesson by assigning quizzes for the students to complete or as a tool to determine what topics to cover before the end of year examinations. Other teachers are using BioBrain to help plan their lessons.
You can easily use BioBrain on the go, as they catch the bus, train or tram home from school or alternatively, at their desk preparing for end of year examinations.

BioBrain is being used in over 30 countries and has been receiving excellent reviews from teachers and students around the globe.







How was the app and its content developed?

BioBrain has been developed by a team of content developers from their respective disciplines, Biology, Chemistry, and Physics. These professionals are all experienced teachers and scientists with the highest academic rigour and have front of mind the needs of today’s digital learners and teachers. All our subjects, Biology, Chemistry, and Physics, are curriculum aligned and contain scientific diagrams to aid understanding.
The BioBrain content is graded over three levels and broken in to short bite sized chunks to facilitate short interactions with the learning materials. BioBrain also contains an illustrated glossary that is linked to throughout the learning material.


Is the age of the textbook coming to an end?

Modern teaching recognises that everyone has a different learning styles. At BioBrain, we believe that the current digital native learners and their teachers want to use technology to facilitate their learning and teaching. They have grown up using digital tools on their phones for a variety of needs, such as reading the news, watching sport, checking the weather, and communicating with friends through social media. Today’s learners expect to find all their information on mobile devices as a source of truth. They dip in and out of different platforms and activities frequently. BioBrain’s short quizzes and learning material broken down into small chunks allows for this. The BioBrain products are extremely visual with each subject having different colours and all scientific diagrams match the corresponding subject colours.

Subjects available:

Biology, Chemistry and Physics


ABOUT OUR FOUNDER
Caroline Cotton is the founder of BioBrain, an Edtech platform with the mission of providing learning tools, accessible to anyone with a desktop or mobile device. As a Biology and Chemistry teacher, Caroline noticed that students where less interested in reading textbooks. She is now focused on getting students excited about STEM and making learning fun and engaging for them. 

FUNDS AND TIMING
We are now working towards developing additional STEM subjects, beginning with Year 10 Science and continuing with Mathematics and other STEM subjects. We are also perfecting the web-based platform and tailoring the curriculum for different geographies around the world.

We need your help to create the Year 10 Science content for the app and the web-based platform. We have secured 60% of the funds required for the development however, the Covid situation has made it difficult to work with the developers in the usual way. This campaign aims to collect the remaining 40% of the needed funds. Most of the raised money will go to content creation and building the web page. 


 November: Kickstarter campaign
 December: Kickstarter releases funds
 December - January: Year 10 Science content development 
 February: Final editing and quality control
 March: Release of BioBrain Year 10 Science!

REWARDS
While Year 10 Science is the principal item on offer, other reward tiers include access to BioBrains existing content for both students and teachers. 

FIND US ON SOCIAL MEDIA
BioBrain - Instagram, Facebook, YouTube, LinkedIn
Caroline Cotton - LinkedIn

THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!

record.Creator: Oladance
record.Title: Oladance Wearable Stereo: Epic Sound. Open Earbuds
record.Text:
Feel the music, not your earbuds.
This is the promise of the Oladance Wearable Stereos, the comfort-focused earbuds that deliver high-quality sound without ever going inside your ear.





Unlike traditional earbuds, Oladance features a completely Open-Ear design that rests gently and securely on top of your ear. There are no tips, so they’ll never go into your ear. That’s how they deliver superior sound in a natural, comfortable way. 





Great sound shouldn’t have to hurt
While many brands race to improve the noise-canceling and premium sound quality, designers have forgotten the most important part of any wearable technology - comfort & health. 





Check out this article from Whittier Hospital Medical Center about how traditional earbuds may damage your hearing and casue ear infection.
What good are earbuds if you can only wear them for 1 hour before they make your ears sore - or worse, cause hearing damage and inner-ear problems?
That’s why we are here
To change all of the pain points of traditional in-ear headphones, other open earbuds, or bone conduction earbuds. 





First, we believe the product should be a truly open earphone to achieve the best level of comfort, hearing protection, and transparent experience.





At the same time, using your ears’ natural curves, a pair of powerful 16.2 mm drivers channel epic sound exactly where you need it —  leaving your ears open and never plugged. Let alone the unrivaled continuous playtime of up to 94.4 hours.
Epic sound. True comfort. Together in an earbud at last.





Reaction Video
We did random street interviews at Toronto, Ontario in Canada. Let’s check out how people are reacting with our Oladance Wearable Stereo!



Sneak Preview
We’ve sent out prototypes to experts in the fields of audio devices, technology, outdoor or sporting equipment, etc to give their professional and unbiased opinion on the features of our Oladance Wearable Stereo. Do stay tuned for more unboxing and review videos!












 Also Seen In















Many reports have emerged about the risks of earbuds that go inside your ear – everything from skin irritation, to tinnitus, to long-term hearing damage. 





The Wearable Stereos avoid all these because they never actually enter your ear. There is no pinching of the auricle, no blockage of the ear canal, no pain or damage to hearing. So you can enjoy precision audio without worrying about ear discomfort.










Chat with your running buddy while listening to Beethoven’s 5th symphony. Who says you can’t have both? 





Oladance keeps your ears open, so you’ll never lose track of what’s happening around you — whether you’re running down a city block, cycling on the road, or waiting for the airline attendant to call your row. Keeping you safe, while keeping you in the moment.















The right fit, for all your moves. Molded to fit the natural curve of your ear, Oladance has a multi-point support system that spreads the weight of the buds evenly across your ear, eliminating sore spots. So you can wear them all day without discomfort. It also offers a stable fit that offers reassurance whatever the day brings.  





The Oladance Wearable Stereos move when you do, and where you do.  So jump, skip, flip… Or just relax. And they are made with soft, skin-friendly silicone, easy to keep on even during your longest workouts. Your earbuds aren’t going anywhere. 





Plus, the Oladance features an extra-strong memory titanium wireframe, which has a certain degree of elasticity and can return to its original shape after bending. This means you won't have to worry about the inconvenience to put on your ear, or dropping one while you’re on the move. 















There’s a reason we call them the Wearable Stereos, not just earbuds - wearing them is like having a home stereo wherever you go. Oladance lets you feel that the sound is coming from everywhere outside in a natural way, a totally different listening experience with nothing blocking the ear. 





It's also a stereo that only you can hear. Oladance channels rich, full sound towards you and away from others. 





Two powerful 16.2mm drivers combine to bring you acoustic brilliance. With drivers three times the size of Apple’s Airpods, they create an audio experience that’s more like an intimate concert setting, and less like a pair of earphones. And the top bio-diaphragm technology offers a rich, consistent listening experience at any volume, from crisp and clear highs to excitingly powerful lows.





 Keep your bass tuned with Oladance’s virtual bass and dynamic EQ technology. Using automatic hearing compensation, they deliver even sound at different frequencies. Indoor and outdoor, providing a stronger sound quality experience at any time.










Most bone conduction and other open earbuds place their sound unit at the top of the ear, resulting in a distance from the ear holes. 
We improved the structure to make sure the earbuds accurately cover the ear holes without going into them, cutting down on sound leakage effectively, maximizing the sound you hear, while minimizing what everyone else does.  
You hear it all, while they hear nothing at all. 










Better conversations start here. The Oladance’s microphone system is designed to lift and amplify your voice while putting a lid on other ambient noise in the background. The patented environmental noise canceling (ENC) algorithm rebuilds the sound of your voice even when external noise threatens to stifle it. 





And with nothing stuck in your ear, your conversations feel natural, as though the person is right there next to you…Even when you wish they weren’t. Is that your boss calling?










With the 160mAh large capacity battery, plus the breakthrough low-consumption algorithms patents, we optimize the battery life of the stereo to provide up to 16 hours of continuous play per charge for unbearably long flights or workouts that go all night.










While the Oladance comes with a non-charging carry case, you can also grab an add-on charging case to extend the performance. With this large battery capacity case (2550mAh), the total playtime is extended to 94.4 hours! No need to recharge the case in 2 months if you use it for 1.5 hours a day. 










With the unbeatable battery performance and comfortable design, the Oladance is made to stay in place all day – even during those jump-rope sessions and backcountry cycling trips. 










Play and pause your music, skip tracks, adjust volume, and take calls — all with only a tap. The Oladance Wearable Stereos feature a touch control glass panel that puts you in control, so you never miss or press the wrong button even when you’re on the move. 





That means that whether you’re chatting with Siri or browsing your newest playlist, you can control everything simply by tapping your Oladances with one finger.
Product Comparison
As the product is such a unique innovation in every detail, we find it quite difficult to succinctly explain its advantages.  We hope this comparison table is helpful for our early supporters. 





 A Dash Of Colors
Say what you want to say - without speaking a word. With four dynamic colors to choose from, including Interstellar Blue, Space Silver, Martian Orange and Cloud White, there’s a color for every character. We will collect your color preference for each unit after the campaign ends through the Kickstarter survey. 





 What’s In The Box 
Please note that the Oladance Wearable Stereos have a non-charging carry case in the box. We have included a Type-C cable for you to charge the Wearable Stereo with that carrying case. Otherwise, you can purchase the extra charging case as add-on.





Rewards
We will collect your specific color preference for each unit after the campaign ends through the Kickstarter survey. 
For most of the main countries and regions, we offer free shipping and cover all the customs fees, including the US, UK, CA, AU, most countries and relations in EU and Asia. 






For other countries and regions, due to the pandemic, there has been a large increase in shipping costs. We will be covering a significant proportion of the logistics fees and charge an additional part for each parcel. Your tracking number will be provided at the time of shipment. For the shipping details, please check the link: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1EjTlCNnHCQqpGzWNHcbpj1dfKbxUwyPlvhn91hNIsCc/edit?usp=sharing
*Please note that the add-on charging case will be shipped out separately in January, as we decided to develop it just a month ago based on valuable feedback from our early supporters. But don't worry, you will receive your Oladance Wearable Stereo before Christmas!*





Choose the reward you want, than you will have the option to purchase the add-ons of extra wearable stereo and charging case on the next page before you check out.
If you would like to purchase more than two units, please feel free to contact us via the Kickstarter comments, inbox or our customer service email at global@oladance.com.

Add-On
Please note that the Oladance has a non-charging carry case in the box. You can choose the combo reward to add-on reward to grab an extra charging case to get 94 hours battery life in total. 
After you choose the reward tier of the Wearable Stereo, you will have the option to buy the add-ons on the next page.





 Product Demonstration 
This is the unedited demo video that demonstrates the full range of our product's functionality without any post-production editing. 



Who We Are
We are Oladance, a group of enthusiasts who strive to create wearable audio products that are truly transformative. Our top talents came from BOSE and other high-end brands with more than a decade of experience in the audio industry. We get together with a common goal - to bring high-quality audio and comfort-focused designs together in an earbud. At Oladance, we believe that product design and quality determine your experience.






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































We believe that product design and build quality will determine your experience and went ahead to design the Oladance Wearable Stereo Open Earbuds, a healthier option for music lovers who enjoy using earbuds. It combines beneficial designs from traditional TWS earbuds, open earbuds, and bone conduction earbuds, and takes ear pain and hearing loss away from the music. 





Production Updates
We are now in the small-trial production stage, and we will soon enter the mass production stage after the campaign goes live.  We've also sent out some sample products to Youtubers to do review tests. Also, we plan to start shipping in November. All the backers' shipping information will only be collected through the Kickstarter survey after the end of the project. We will keep you updated about the shipping status in the project update section.





 Specifications 





Warranty
We stand behind our products & services with confidence. The Oladance Wearable Stereo is covered under a 1-year limited warranty and free replacement of the Oladance if any defects are due to faulty materials or workmanship, performance for a period of 12 months from the date of delivery. 
Please note that the warranty period complies with the applicable consumer laws in the consumer’s country of purchase. Please email us at global@oladance.com  if you would like to know more about the warranty details.


















Project timeline






*According to Oladance's laboratory test results, the Stereos provide up to 16 hours of continuous playtime at 30% loudness.
*Experts recommend keeping sound levels at somewhere between 65 and 85 decibels to minimize the damage your ears are exposed to. According to Oladance's laboratory test results, sound leakage could not be found at 74dB of loudness in the quiet indoor environment, and the decibels could be adjusted to higher levels in the outdoor environment, which is significantly better than other products on the market. Note that actual performance may vary depending on environmental conditions and music types.













We were named one of  ProductHype's  Best Kickstarter Projects of 2021

HOW?

Evolution Bikes Engineering will launch in June 2022 to offer the most sophisticated e-bike at a reasonable price for the elderly of the world... The unique "Evolution Bikes Seniors Edition". Nothing like this in the market at the moment.
Any e-bike in the world reach that level of spphistication, the Evolution Bike Seniors Edition is unique.
These e-bikes are innovative. Nothing quite like them exists at the moment and it's just a beginning for us! They will be first to the market. The chance of success of this project is near 90%+ as most of the technology we plan to adapt for our e-bikes already exists for different applications or need to be custom made. We will design our prototypes by adding the desired technological improvements to the e-bikes we already manufacture.
Our actual manufacturing plant can produce 10,000 units per month.
We believe all micromobility projects should be supported because they are the future... The e-bikes it's a trend and the market are wide open!

 STUDIES:

The benefits of e-bikes for seniors are tremendous! Cycling on an e-bike when you are older might be the only way that you can continue to ride a bike. Relying on pedaling alone might just be too much! Having a battery to assist you makes cycling easier and more enjoyable as you age.
Many studies agree that e-bikes for seniors would have a very positive impact as they allow for better lifestyle, morale, and socialization as well as lower blood pressure and many other benefits. The researcher Dr Tim Jones PhD qualify the e-bike ride as a "MICRO ADVENTURE"! (below).






THE STUDY BELOW ARE GUIDELINES THAT SUPPORT, BY THE VOICE OF SCIENCE, THE CHALLENGE AND THE IMPORTANCE OF OUR PROJECT FOR SENIORS (Please click for the full report):



This study is an important study if you like to learn more about E-Bike and elderly. Please click here.



Any contributions received in excess of our base funding goal will be used to purchase e-bike inventory to be offered to seniors at a lower cost.

Evolution Bikes Inc. is a Canadian company that has been manufacturing and assembling high-quality electric bikes for five years. We now aim to create a prototype model expressly adapted to the needs of seniors. To our knowledge, nothing like this currently exists on the world market. Seniors have been totally ignored, yet studies have confirmed that an e-bike can provide a better quality of life by increasing mobility and access to the outdoors. We need your help to foster the technology necessary to tailor an e-bike to this underserved population. 

We believe all micro-mobility projects should be supported for a better the future..

"Several years ago, I tried to buy an electric bike with a throttle, but was told by the salesperson in the bike shop that such bikes were for “lazy people”; they only sold bikes that suited their mission of encouraging people to exerciseI was disappointed, but I continued searching and finally found one with a throttle. As today, they change their mind and understand the needs of the elderly".
However, this bike had the drawback of a small, 10-amp battery that would only power the bike for around 25 miles before dying. This would mean that if I started a ride on a beautiful Sunday morning, traveling at 15 miles per hour, I would have to turn around after 45 minutes to get back home or face having to pedal for 25 miles, which is more than I can do. It was a no-win situation—I would either return exhausted or frustrated by the short trip.
This e-bike did not meet my needs, but I was passionate about pursuing the freedom that micromobility can offer. After talking with friends and other elders, I realized that I was not alone. Everybody was interested but expressed legitimate fears—getting stuck far from home and having to pedal farther than was comfortable, falling, or becoming lost in the labyrinth of bike paths.
After six years of e-biking and studying the question, I joint Evolution Bikes Inc., and little by little, we continue to refine our e-bikes. Now, after eleven total years of engineering, manufacturing, and selling e-bikes while remaining constantly on the lookout for emerging technologies, my team and I have identified the components that will make an e-bike appealing to seniors. We are ready to put together the right technologies and produce the first e-bike for senior citizens at a reasonable price.
We plan to finish the first ten prototypes by June 2022. Next, we will push for worldwide sales to end users.
We need your help to make this happen.

 THE FINAL ASSEMBLY, THE HIGHLIGHTS: 
 5 LEVELS OF ASSISTANCE + THROTTLE 



THROTTLE


BATTERIES:

The average battery in the market is 8 to 10 amps, which translates to 10 to 15 miles of autonomy—this is too little for seniors, who also need power for the ride back home. Our planned batteries will provide 17 to 20 amps, which should allow the user to ride between 50 and 99 miles, easily. This is a major factor for the elderly. At the moment, lithium batteries are predominant, but LiFePO4 (also known as lithium iron phosphate) batteries are a huge improvement over lead acid batteries in weight , capacity, and shelf life, and far better than lithium ion batteries. The LiFePO4 batteries are the safest type of lithium batteries, offering more millage with less charging. We are currently studying the exent of these benefits, with more information to come... LiFePO4 batteries are an improvement on standard lithium batteries, offering higher capacity, longer shelf life, and lower weight.

record.Creator: Enhanced Robotics
record.Title: World’s FIRST Exoskeleton for Consumers | SPORTSMATE5
record.Text:
Meet the Wearable Robotic Taking Hiking&Fitness to New Extremes
Introducing SPORTSMATE 5, the world’s first and lightest portable wearable robotic exoskeleton made for consumers. It’s form-fitting functionality makes every stride comfortable with controllable resistance and assistance to achieve your fitness goals. From distance to strength-training, SPORTSMATE 5 covers it all.     





SPORTSMATE 5 entirely transforms the notion of wearable robotics. 
Exoskeletons of this nature have existed for decades for military, industrial, and rehabilitation fields. Those designs are bulky, heavy, expensive, and designed for singular use cases. We’re applying exoskeletons to daily life, altering the way you interact with the world！





Super Early Bird Offer











Media Coverages & Reviews 
Major tech media MUO highly appreciated the fitness mode of SPORTSMATE 5



Read full reviews

















How does SPORTSMATE 5 apply to your daily life?
It’s easy. There are two powerful actuators at your hips on the exoskeleton. These provide assistance when you need to save energy and aim to go physically further, or resistance when your goal is training muscle. Two modes are designed for quick usage.         

Outdoor mode: Switch between Assistance & Resistance
Fitness mode: Switch between Resistance in forms of extension & flexion






Outdoor Mode: Get easier for a long-distance walking






 Up to 18 Nm assistance torque 
Up to 3 hours / 6.5 miles of full power

Assistance from the 2 actuators lift your legs and push them forward to make every step light as air. You will feel much easier while walking, going upstairs and uphill. Get rid of gulping air, sweating all over, and slow walking. Resistance in outdoor mode increases your stability by holding your body and absorbing the shaking while going downstairs or downhill. In a word, outdoor mode of SPORTSMATE 5 helps decrease strain & increase distance and lets you enjoy the fun of outdoor activities, like hiking, trekking, backpacking, even mountaineering!

Fitness Mode: Burn More, Gain More






Up to 10 Nm resistance torque
Wide applications: from Pilates to outdoor training

Here is where our resistance actuators shine. Fitness Mode focuses on burning more calories and gaining more muscle strength in less time than a traditional workout routine. Resistance comes from different forms for our exoskeleton: extension and flexion. You are free to choose the resistance that fits your routine best for incredible results, for example, choose extension resistance while doing half-squats to train your gluteal muscle or use flexion resistance on leg raising training to strengthen the hamstring tendon.






More applications with customized SPORTSMATE 5 accessories






 Weight Lifting Accessory: Quick detachable, Up to 15kg weight lifting assistance.  
 Knee Brace: Customized detachable knee braces for SPORTSMATE 5 to protect your knees when working out.


How SPORTSMATE 5 Works？
SPORTSMATE 5 has three subsystems: the gait controller system (central controller), the actuator system, and the energy system. In outdoor mode, your gait behavior will be detected by sensors and processed by our AI algorithm. Then the controller will send signals to the drivers so that motors can deliver appropriate assistance to you.



In fitness mode, motors can provide different levels of resistance for burning more calories. Meanwhile, our intelligent energy system can harvest the energy from your movement and recharge the battery to achieve a longer duration.




 An AI-based Control System: Adapt to Complex Environment 

We've developed our innovative torque-based AI algorithm to adapt to complex environments compared to traditional exoskeletons, which used trajectory algorithms for medical rehabilitation purposes. More agile and flexible.   





AI algorithm analyzes data from the motor encoder to detect the wearer’s gait behavior, providing precise torque support with every stride. Depending on the gait pattern, SPORTSMATE 5 can detect the user’s activity (e.g., hiking, jogging) and intuitively adjust the upper-level algorithm. The lower-level controller receives that reference and sends the proper signal to the motor drivers.


 Quasi-Direct Drive Actuation: Extreme Low Mechanical Impedance 

Unlike traditional exoskeletons using high ratio transmission systems for patient stability, we implemented our quasi-direct actuator system, consisting of high torque density motors with low ratio transmission systems. Users can have more participation while in use without the traditional result of high mechanical impendence.     





In terms of assistance, our actuator system can provide 50% of torque required by hip joints during a gait cycle for normal males.






SPORTSMATE 5 Perfectly Fits Your Body with Cyber-Fit  System      

Quasi-Soft Robotic Architecture

Our consumer wearable robotic exoskeleton uses adaptable rigid elements along the waistbelt to perfectly adapt to a wider range of body shapes.    






Electric Inflatable Airbag

To further fit the belt around your waist, an electric inflatable airbag fills the gap between your waist and the exoskeleton, providing better stability and more comfort.
Single air pump inflation lasts for 10 seconds. 





The Most Compact, Easy-to-Wear Robotics Ever   
Weighing in at just 2.5kg, the SPORTSMATE 5 is ultralight wearable robotics made for consumers. It’s composed of multiple high-strength composite materials including carbon fiber reinforced plastic and aerospace aluminum alloy.
It’s compact form factor makes it easy to pack up and carry just as easy as it is to wear, taking about 1 minute to put on.





Adaptable Energy System for Extended Use
In hiking mode, the battery provides steady and sufficient power output for different use-case scenarios. With our QDD actuation, less energy is wasted by the inconformity between use and device, thus achieving better sustainability.
Depending on user movement, our smart energy system can harvest energy while in use. Going downstairs, training, hiking, and more can recharge the battery making SPORTSMATE 5 last even longer. 





An Extended Interface for Developers





We believe the future of consumer-friendly wearable exoskeletons is just breaching the surface. There’s so much more potential. To help further the application and development of wearable robotic tech, we’re providing a developer box with an extended interface with 2 UARTs, 8 DIOs, and 4 AIOs. You’re free to develop any application and run your own experiments. Welcome to the EXOSKELETON WORLD. We expect great things from you! 











3 Sizes, Unlimited Potential
Choose the size that fits your body most closely to get the best experience out of SPORTSMATE 5.





What’s in the Box 















Perks for Early Supports  





















The Enhanced Robotics Team Story
We’re a startup that focuses on the research and development of exoskeleton robotics. We seek to improve the quality of life by providing people with accessible, user-friendly robotics that enhances mobility. After 4 years of research and clinical verification, we are launching our first exoskeleton, SPORTSMATE 5, dedicated to outdoor and fitness enthusiasts.  





Leon Zhu, CEO of Enhanced Robotics, shows us how ER has improved the prototypes of SPORTSMATE in the past four years.



















Timeline  
We offer global shipping to anywhere in the world, and we've cooperated with carriers like FedEx, UPS, DHL, and USPS. Please note that the price doesn't include shipping costs, taxes, or additional duty. COVID-19 is still delaying international shipping in many places, but things are better now, and we hope that by the time we start shipping, the delivery time can be back to normal. We will update you with the whole shipping process continuously.

record.Title: Learn Business Analyst - A hands-on and interactive course
record.Text:
Hello, I'm Wen. I started my career as a developer, then QA and then BA. I've been a BA for more than ten years now. I am through many different industries, like education, Real estate, construction and retail, etc. I get a deep understanding of what kind of BA is highly demanded in the market. And what kind of skillset BAs needs to have to accelerate their career.
I'm also passionate about sharing my knowledge to help people transforming their career to BA and mentoring junior BA to dive deep into this role. I helped lots of my students to find their dream job. 
Nice to meet you, and wish I can help you as well.
I designed this course step by step,





The first part is the basic knowledge for you to master BA core skillsets. I separate them into small sessions, so you can buy the ones you are not confident in. For the units you've already learnt, you do not need to buy them, but if you are not sure, you are welcome to renew your knowledge.





In the second step, you can use what you learnt to try for small feature analysis.  80 dollars for each practice, including,

The business context of the feature, what is the expected output from you 
Explanation on the analysis process
Analysis outputs

In the third step, you will experience the analysis of a significant feature. If you want to accelerate your career to mid-level or senior-level BA, you can have a try. 280 dollars for each practice, Including,

The business background, the high-level requirement
Explanation on the approach
Proposed solution and outputs

In the fourth step, you will learn how to design a discovery/inception workshop. This capability is very hot in the market now, especially for start-up companies or companies with lots of initiatives. You will be able to find more creative jobs if you can gain this skill set. This part costs 1200 dollars, including,

Methodologies behind the scene
Your warehouse of workshops
A hands-on practice to design workshops
An actual workshop for you to host with Stakeholders, developers and UX designers.

Finally, the most interesting part is for you to join a real team to work with Product Managers, Developers and UX designers for 2 months to gain a real internship.

Thanks for all your support.

record.Creator: Tina Johnson
record.Title: Accountability Buddy App
record.Text:
Good Day
I have been in an extensive knowledge base training for the last five months under Dean Graziosi and Tony Robbins. I recently became a life coach, and I am developing a Course at Mastermind.com to assist young adults who aged out of the foster care system, secured housing and employment but still need guidance to strengthen their confidence and independence to build a fulfilling life through simple mindset techniques, basic life skills and career mentorship. As I build this Four Week Course, I realize one of the most important factors to getting through this course is having an accountability buddy. I too have an accountably buddy as I continue my training and I know I could not have gotten this far without the accountability partner. So, this is where the idea of creating an app for finding an accountability buddy came about. Since I use this technique and the young adults, I will be coaching will also be using this technique I feel it’s a need for many. 
This app will help you determine what it is you are looking for accountability on and match you with another person looking for the same kind of accountability. The partners will decide how often they will need to meet virtually to go over what they accomplished thus far and what they intend to be accountable for next. The app will be used for goal settings, showing progress and reward system for completing tasks.
Studies found that people who commit to their goal in front of another person are 65 percent more likely to achieve it, as reported by Entrepreneur.com. Likelihood of success rises to 95 percent when those same people commit to ongoing meetings with those accountability partners, to check in on their progress.
I truly feel this is a necessity for the many who are trying to set goals and accomplish them. I think having a user friendly app to help with the process of finding and keeping an accountability buddy will help this technique thrive.

record.Creator: Bitstream Audio
record.Title: Pulse Trio - Music Collaboration Audio Interface
record.Text:
What is PULSETRIO?
PULSETRIO is the world’s first collaboration audio interface – delivering true production collaboration workflow, a digital audio mixer with three independent USB-C inputs, and the ability to synchronize production software across all connected devices, in real time. The most advanced audio interface devoted to improving collaboration and workflow between music producers.
Designed as a compact 3in-1out audio interface with stereo analog output. Combined with a  software utility application for full control over hardware properties and synchronization settings.





Multi-USB input digital audio mixer
With 3 USB-C inputs, PULSETRIO also functions as a true digital audio mixer allowing for simultaneous listening of up to audio sources.  A  3 x 1/8 Headphone and 2 x 1/4inch main output connections give maximum audition versatility  whether working in the studio or collaborating on the road.
This means you can use PULSETRIO as a standard audio interface with the ability listen to audio from all connected USB sources at the same time! 





DAW Synchronization Technology
PULSETRIO's patented technology consists of a single audio interface device with multiple USB-C inputs and a utility software application that interacts with the connected users' DAW application. Capable of connecting several computers with any of the supported DAW platforms and synchronizing them to each other, allowing real-time simultaneous collaboration.  As a result, all the users will be able to listen to their combined audio, and individual collaboration parts, while also being in sync with each other. This results in smoother collaboration with less time spent rendering files. 

Every modern producer has experienced the difficulties of collaboration in its current form. Its un organized, cumbersome and repeated rendering of files takes up valuable time that could be used for creating. As a result, its apparent a major challenge in modern music collaboration is the diversity of software [DAW] applications music producers use to create.  





The PULSE utility control application allows for smooth integration of the hardware and DAW. Synchronizing with the controls on the hardware the utility application is a complete collaboration control center designed to synchronize music production workflow.





Multi-DAW Compatibility
PULSETRIO works natively with the latest version of FL Studio for OSX. Additionally, 
the device is compatible with many DAW programs that support MIDI external sync.
Supported DAWs include:

FL Studio* - native OSX integration, windows support in development.
Ableton* -[MIDI] Link native integration in development. 
Reason - [MIDI]
Cubase - [MIDI]
Reaper - [MIDI]
NI Maschine- [MIDI]
MPC Software- [MIDI]
Protools* - In development
LogicX* - on roadmap for future integration. 

 *Early bird units will be upgraded at no cost.





Improved Workflow
PULSETRIO can be used in multiple configurations. Each port can connect up to 3 FL studio, 3 MIDI compatible DAWs, or a combination there of and efficiently synchronize their workflow. 










Project Status 
We have produced 30 working Early Adopter units that are ready to ship. However, due to worldwide chip shortages, availability and minimums, we need backers like you to be able to source enough components to produce our product in volume. We also want to give the opportunity for early backers to get their hands on a unit as soon as possible, as they help us shape the experience going forward.  
We have ambitious goals to integrate not only OSX but windows computers into a universal workflow. With backer support we can  focus on windows development. We are also in preparation to begin development to natively integrate Ableton Live, another milestone in our roadmap. This and many other great upgrades and features are top of mind. 




Team
We are a team of developers, software engineers and designers who have a passion for music.  Founded by Mario "Wizzo" Fernandez, Grammy nominated producer engineer and Co-Founded by Mark Seel, a firmware and software engineer [musician] with over 25yrs of experience in software architecture ranging from multi-threaded PC applications to low-power wireless communications firmware.





Timeline

 May 2016: Bitstream Audio was founded. 
 May 2017: First patent was granted. 
 April 2018: Second patent was granted. 
 Sept 2019: Pulse prototypes are completed.
 March 2020: Software development begins.
 April 2020: Early bird units in production. 
 Jul 2020: FL Studio Integration.
 Sept 2021: Limited  first edition Pulse Trio units are done and ready to be shipped. 
 Nov 2021: Kickstarter campaign starts.
 Jan 2022: Early bird units ship.
 Early 2022: Ableton integration .*
 Mid 2020: Windows support.*
 Late 2022: Kick Starter supporters receive units. 

*these updates will be provided to early backers at no additional cost. 
Funding / Budget
This product represents a long devoted journey to improve the way musicians create in a modern environment.  The good news is we've done most of the hard work. All that's left to do is the final production, and your funding helps us with this process. Funds will help us purchase components in bulk, keep cost down and will also help improve the software and hardware's compatibility with more DAW manufacturers and operating systems.

With your support, we'll be able to start production and get PULSETRIO out to you quickly. 
Your contribution will help to fund:

Large production component ordering
Production of the PCB boards
Software and Firmware updates 






User Submitted Content



 Our Story 
Traditional music sessions often involve live instruments, in which the brand, or manufacturer of the instrument is a non-factor to the instrument's ability to produce a tone in a group setting.  In current digital music production, laptops and computers have become instruments modern musicians use to create. Since there is no one-size-fits-all DAW, or Digital Work Station, music producers have a variety of choices when selecting a platform. 

Current DAW platforms all have a unique workflow, file structure and often completely different computer operating system compatibility . These differences in DAW platform, result and manifest themselves as digital barriers in the creative musical process.  Modern music producers are often handy capped when collaborating due to the difference in their music production software.  Contrary for example, a traditional musician would not worry about a Fender guitar not being compatible with a Pearl drum set when in a jam session.   

Nowadays, music producers have to be resourceful to collaborate efficiently. Often having to use multiple audio interfaces,  audio mixers  and other clever ways to synchronize their workflow. More often turning into a situation where producers are detached, yet all somehow still working together. This workflow is counter productive to a free flowing synchronized collaboration session, where each user is collaborating from their own workstation.

The concept for PULSETRIO was born in a real life studio session. Bitstream Audio founder and Grammy nominated producer engineer, "wizzo" collaborated along side multi-platinum producers, 'Mike Free' and 'LilJon'. All three participants had different DAW platforms: Ableton, Reason and MPC2 software. By a combination of  synchronized start button pressing, wireless transfer of files, multiple aux connections into multi-channel analog audio mixers, they achieved that which now you can do with one PULSETRIO.  The inefficiencies in music production collaboration and issues experienced that day, and many other sessions occurring all the time, paved the foundation that would become PULSETRIO. Conclusively, the need for a more efficient workflow was born from necessity to collaborate more efficiently. 





Spread the Word
Thank you for your support!   We would be forever grateful if you would share PULSETRIO with your audience to help this project come to life!






Features
Multi-Input Digital Audio Mixer
DAW synchronization technology
Pulse Utility Application

DAW Sync Compatibility
FL Studio – Native Integration
Ableton - Native Integration in development
Reason
Cubase
Reaper
NI Maschine
MPC Software

In the Box
PULSETRIO
Travel Case
USB-C Cables



Travel Case





Pulse Trio 





USB-C Cable



Warranty
We stand behind our products & services with confidence. PULSETRIO is covered under a 1-year limited warranty and free replacement if any defects are due to faulty materials or workmanship, performance for a period of 12 months from the date of delivery.
Please note that the warranty period complies with the applicable consumer laws in the consumer’s country of purchase. Please email us at support@bitstreamaudio.com if you would like to know more about the warranty details.

System Requirements
OS: OSX 10.0 ;  Windows [Available Q2Y22]
Recommended: OSX 10.14
CPU: Intel or M1;  
Recommended: 2.8 GHz or faster processor
Disk Storage: 4 GB of free disk space
Internet: Internet connection required for software upgrade
Ports: USB-C
Device Specifications

Input: 3 x USB-C
D/A Resolution: 32bit/384 khz audio conversion*
Analog Output: 2 x 1/4”  Balanced Stereo Output
Headphone: 3 x 1/8th

Height: 1.2″
Width: 4.25″
Depth: 4.25″

As the Founder and CEO of LuvHut®, our mobile app and mission are designed to:

record.Creator: Sam Motevasselian
record.Title: Web 3.0 - DWeb, DSM & DGames
record.Text:
Web 3.0, the next generation of the internet 
Before anything, I would like to mention that you have the option to follow on by reading the texts or watching the videos. I have tried my best to explain everything about Web 3.0, from its components to how it functions. Every topic has a headline, video and text, diving deep into the subject. I would recommend watching all the videos from start to end if you want to have a complete understanding of Web 3.0 and DWeb. Otherwise, the why section will explain the main reason behind this project. Thank you.








 What is Web 3.0
In the early 2000s, with the introduction of Web 2.0, we began communicating with each other and sharing information through centralised services provided by large organisations such as Google and Facebook. We are always relying on these third-party giants to connect us. They are in control of our data in ways that many will not consider ethical. We must have the choice to control our data in sovereignty.
With the introduction of Web 3.0, we look forward to an environment where no central authority, censorship and downtime exist. We will be able to log in anonymously and interact with each other using cryptographic (hack-resistant) methods.
All of this can become true by introducing DWeb. A Decentralized Web will allow us to finally integrate Web 3.0 into our lives.








 What is Decentralization
Before explaining decentralization, we need to understand what centralization is. When a user wants to connect to another user or website, they will need to first connect to a server. A server is just a huge computer that manages clients' requests. The main issue here is that these servers may record every data sent or received. Another issue is that we are relying on this one server to manage everything. If the server were to stop working, the whole system will halt. A recent example could be Facebook's 6 hours downtime. In addition, these servers are the main reason we are not the sole owner of our data.
Decentralization, on the other hand, does not depend on servers to operate. The network is known as a p2p network where users are connected directly and every user is also a server. As a result, instead of one huge server, the network has many small servers. Smart contracts will be used to achieve a p2p network structure. 
Smart contracts are simply programs stored on a blockchain that run when predetermined conditions are met. They typically are used to automate the execution of an agreement so that all participants can be immediately certain of the outcome, without an intermediary's involvement or time loss. 
~https://www.ibm.com/topics/smart-contracts









Privacy: In a decentralized network, no central authority exists so your private data can never be used by large organizations/governments.
Equality: Smart contracts will always treat users in the same way. Programs cannot discriminate between users whilst organizations can.
Security: Hackers will need to hack 51% of the network to gain access. Since all users are servers, hackers will need to hack more than half the users of the network versus one server. In addition, we will be using cryptography to encrypt data, which has been proven to be the most secure encryption method today.
Trustworthy: The network is not dependant on any intermediaries. Therefore, the system will be functional with no downtime.
Immutability: Data on our DWeb is going to be immutable, i.e once a data is created no one can delete it, not even the creators of the network. 
Quality: Web 3.0 is ought to be faster than Web 2.0 as there are many servers involved in processing requests.









DWeb is the technical term used to describe Web 3.0. Decentralized Web (DWeb) is the infrastructure needed to gain from all the aforementioned benefits and build a DWeb browser, DWebsites, DSM and DGames.
As already mentioned, DWeb will not be relying on servers/hosts to run.
DWeb browser is the medium through which users will be able to access the DWeb and DWebsites.








DWebsites or Decentralized Websites are websites that do not rely on a single server/host.
After developing the DWeb, we will concentrate on building a platform for all users to upload their webpages and run a DWebsite as well. Users who run a DWebsite are called an administrator. They will be able to control their DWebsite through the DWeb browser. 
As a result, any person will have the chance to own a DWebsite by simply uploading files to the network, with a click of a button.








 Decentralized Social Media
With the development of DWeb, DSM will not be so far fetched. A social media with no downtime or censorship. A social media where you, as the user, are in full control of your data. With the use of smart contracts, users will be able to connect directly with no third-party interference. 
Imagine being able to share videos, pictures and messages in a decentralized network. For this section, we are planning on developing a page for content creators to share their videos, a page for sharing pictures and another page for sending messages (literally direct messages).
Lastly, I should mention that DSM is going to be more global than the social media we are using today. I explained this in full in the Why section.









 Decentralized Games
Decentralization has many benefits but one of the most important ones for this section would be speed. Online games are usually slow and laggy because one server is responsible for many users' requests. In the case of DGames, with every user that joins the network, a server is also added. This will increase speed but we want to go a step further. We want to make sure that users do not face any lags at all, whilst playing. Users or in this case DGamers will download a huge chunk of the DGame onto their localhost/device and the rest will be streamed to play online. Instead of streaming large files such as pictures and sceneries, users will access them through their devices.  The difference in speed would be the same as the difference in downloading a video and streaming it. Therefore, the result should ensure a fast and smooth experience.
We are planning on developing a DGame called Psur, which is briefly explained in the video above. 
Note: To develop the DGame, DWeb browser, DSM and Smart contracts, we will need to hit our stretch goals. More on this in the stretch goals section. 








 Democracy
Decentralization does come with risks as well. One of the most important risks is a lack of control over users' data. Although it is a benefit for users as it provides privacy, security and ownership, it may be misused in a way that puts other users in danger. Some users may see this as an opportunity to sell illegal products such as weapons. Meanwhile, they can stay anonymous and never get tracked. What's worse is that their data is immutable as well. To overcome such problems, we came up with a concept called DC or Decentralized Centralization! 
A group of people known as voters will be responsible for making the DWeb safe and secure. Any user who wishes to become a voter will have to be verified through a KYC verification. We will be responsible for verifying users, to ensure genuine voters. Hence the term DC. 
Nevertheless, what do voters do? Voters have the power to hide data or even a user. As mentioned, data or users are immutable, so voters can only hide content. 
The process is simple as well. Any user, not necessarily a voter, can report another user or his/her data. We as voters get notified of this report and choose between hiding, not doing anything and changing. When the majority of voters vote for the same option, then the change occurs. Otherwise, the reported content is considered safe. Note that, voters cannot change data/content but rather tags.
DWeb ought to be global, so some may consider content to be ethical whilst others think otherwise. To address this problem as well, we will be using tags. Every content on the DWeb must have at least one tag attached to it, which summarizes the content. The tag can be a word or an emoji (you may watch the video for a better demonstration). These tags will then be used to separate wanted and unwanted contents. For example, some may consider alcohol as inappropriate content, so they will choose to filter out any content that has an alcohol tag attached to it. 
What if a tag is inaccurate? Voters will ensure that all tags used are as accurate as they can be. Voters can change the tag of any content. Only in this case do voters have the power to change data on the DWeb. 









 Click here. 









 Please watch the video above for a complete explanation of the rewards and what rewards to expect later. 








 Why
~ The Golden circle








 Don't forget to follow us on Instagram, where we will be the most active.

record.Creator: Vincenzo Ingrao Jr.
record.Title: The Scientific Place
record.Text:
The Scientific Place
The Scientific Place is a social network dedicated to scientists and those who love science. The platform is still in the early stages of development, but in the current plan its final version will include an app for Android and iOS (using React Native), desktop apps for Windows, macOS and Linux (using Electron), and of course a web app (built with React.js). The idea is the development of a social network that allows users to share research papers, graphs and opinions regarding the various disciplines of science.



The Scientific Place is a social network that allows easy and immediate communication between scientists, students and amateurs.



The project was born when I was looking for a social network where the main theme was science, but I did not find a social that for design and stability was at the levels of Twitter or Reddit: so, I chose to build it myself, using new and stable technologies, supported by large companies.



The Platform is built with React.js (a trademark registered by Facebook) and GraphQL (a trademark registered by The GraphQL Foundation).



The platform will give scientists and science lovers the opportunity to communicate with each other through group chats, video calls and a great support to the insertion and sharing of graphs, large files and texts composed with LaTeX.
You can find out more here. If you want to see the progress of the work, you can visit the GitHub repository of the social network.
Personal email: vincenzo@thescientificplace.com

 Real printing video 













Mixware is a high-tech enterprise focusing on the R & D, manufacturing, and sales of innovative 3D printers. Today, we’re very excited to introduce the Mixware Hyper-S, A Desktop High-temperature FDM 3D Printer. Suitable for various types of filaments, Nylon glass fiber, Hi-temp Nylon, Nylon carbon fiber, PLA, ABS, TPU. Hyper-S provides you a more powerful, faster, larger and better printing experience.









































Hyper-S is a desktop 3D printer for HI-TEMP & Flexible and Nylon filaments, the maximum printing temperature can reach 350℃, you are able to print with more advanced, engineering-grade materials that require higher temperatures. Making gears, hinges, or other plastic parts with superior resistance.










With a specially designed double gear deceleration extruder, printing flexible filaments like a pro. Smooth and stable, make successful prints at first use.





















 Giveaway from Mixware 

















The intelligent auto-leveling system and non-blocking nozzles provide superior accuracy and detailed 3D printing. No more wasting time fiddling with the bed and Z height. Furthermore, non-blocking nozzles will reduce the waste of filaments, making Hyper-S more eco-friendly and economical.





















The ability to print bigger is a boon for your creativity. The build volume of Hyper-S is 300*300*400 mm. It’s perfect for the needs of the whole family, from hobbies to professional products, you can unleash your creativity and enjoy some quality family time. Get Hyper-S for premium 3D printing at an affordable price – you will be amazed at what it can do for you.
 


























For a better user experience, Mixware Hyper-S comes with an intuitive UI design touchscreen. You can control the XYZ three-axis easily with a few taps. Spend less time on setup and more time printing.










If the power is interrupted or shut down in the middle of the printing, you can recover your printing anytime the power is back on. Get perfect printing anytime, anywhere with Mixware Hyper- S.










No confusion, no professional skills needed. Hyper-S is ready to use out-of-the-box. With an all-in-one structure, you can assemble it easily within minutes and then start your creation at the touch of a button.





















With only three buttons, it’s easy to use with the one-click. No need to assemble, use it directly out-of-the-box. It is the easiest way to start 3D printing with your family. Mixware Wand is suitable for all people who are interested in 3D printing, no matter if you’re a professional or a beginner. It is simple to use - just click the start button and wait for your 3D prints to finish.
 










 Easy to carry
At only 5KG in weight, you can take it to work, school or anywhere you need.










 Ultra-quiet and safe
The whole printer is a closed-structure design with Trinamic’s chopper. The safety lock ensures that the printing process is safe and silent. 





Fun times with Wand
















Dry your filament in a smarter way
A filament dryer is necessary for Nylon or Nylon composite filaments, it can effectively improve the appearance of printing and enhance the intensity of prints. Two ports are provided so that KD1 can be compatible with more 3D printers. Internal circulation of hot air with dual air ducts, effectively ensures that the internal heat is evenly distributed. Heating and humidity are two independently controlled systems, and users can freely choose.
 





 Refit your 3D prints easily
          After the 3D printed model is completed, the size needs to be polished and other post-processing, just put in the filament dryer, and heat to a specific temperature. The 
model can be evenly baked, so that it is easier to assemble after the model is softened, with no polished trace.
