record.Creator: Heyup
record.Title: Boxe: Portable 1080P Mini Smart Projector On the Go
record.Text:
Don’t let its cute and charming appearance fool you, Boxe has the power to create immersive big screen HD cinema for you anywhere. Combined with easy wireless connection, this tiny portable projector is the best for fun family time indoors & outdoors.
Boxe, the most adorable projector ever, is ready to meet you!







Viewing the fresh Heyup Boxe Youtube Review from Museecoco!



Watch Berry's Daily Vlog and check the review of Boxe starting from 3:39 of the video.



Sneak Peek at the Cute and Aesthetic Tik Tok Unboxing of Boxe from @museecoco! 



 Check out the Heyup Boxe - Unboxing & Reviews from GABBIAGUAYO!



Join Nathan's room Tour and check the review of Boxe at 4:50 of the video.



















You will fall in love with Boxe at the very first glance. Its sleek curves and smooth rounded corners give it style and its warm yellow color gives it charm. With its delicate design, it’s like a cute little pet, that you will enjoy having around!















When we were kids, we could only dream about having our own theater. Now, Boxe makes your dream come true. With 1080P support, excellent contrast ratio and accurate colors, it’s ready to cast a stunning image into a giant 120-inch screen size. Incredibly impressive movie nights are now easier than ever and it’s time to savor the brilliant visual experience delivered by Boxe!










An exceptional visual presentation requires extraordinary sound. Boxe fully understands the significance of highly immersive sound and offers two customized guide tube cavity speakers to provide outstanding audio. The system delivers stereo surround sound with vibrant bass and incredible sound quality that is dynamic enough to bring out the charms of the melody and vibe of the rhythm to engulf you in the music.










Unlike other projectors that are extra loud and distracting when they are on, Boxe focuses on providing the optimal cinematic experience by using an innovative ultra-quiet cooling system. Thanks to this great feature, it produces noise as low as 30 dB, making your room feel as quiet as a library. Now, you can enjoy a peaceful viewing session without unwanted distractions in the background.















Exposing your eyes to TVs, phones, monitors, or other types of screens can cause eye strain and fatigue, as well as harm your eyesight. With the diffused light from Boxe, your eyes will have a gentler and more relaxed experience.















If you're planning on carrying your projector around a lot, then Boxe is definitely a great choice. This compact, palm-sized projector is portable and lightweight and weighs less than 3 pounds. You can put it in your backpack or bag to conveniently take it to the backyard, bedroom, balcony, classroom, meeting room, or any place where you want to view big-screen multimedia. 











By utilizing an internal 7800 mAh battery, Boxe allows for general viewing without recharging and lasts for 90 minutes, enough for most movies. For longer viewing sessions, it features a universal Type-C port, perfect for an external 65W power bank to extend entertainment time. 










The 4-point keystone correction is an essential feature that makes Boxe perfect for viewing in many different projection scenarios. By correcting the image angles and adjusting image corners, or permitting growing and shrinking of the image manually, Boxe achieves the perfect picture anywhere without any limitations. 















Boxe connects easily with devices and networks using Bluetooth or Airplay wireless connections, making it convenient to use and flexible for many situations. Displaying Netflix movies from your phone, showcasing PowerPoint presentations, or Singing Karaoke has never been easier and everything is smoother and more effortless than before.















As a smart projector, Boxe comes with 2GB DDR and 8GB storage that is fully utilized by its Amlogic T972 chip. This same chip is adopted by most smart TVs and significantly increases operating speeds while reducing power consumption. With these advanced technologies built into Boxe, an enhanced operational performance can showcase its versatility. These superior standards help Boxe to give you the best user experience.  










Underneath this cute shell, Boxe has countless amazing qualities. Boxe is exceedingly safe from dust due to its insulated lens, which prevents dust from falling onto the lens. As a result of a built-in advanced LED light source, it has a lifespan of 25,000 hours. Boxe is here to add endless enjoyment to your life. 























































































































We are a group of tech enthusiasts that believe that tech should not only benefit and improve your day-to-day but also complement and enhance your environment. Every aspect of a piece of technology should enhance your life, from the purpose and features to the very design and way you interact with tech. It is our goal at Heyup, by building a community with you, the customers, to provide technological answers to your daily needs and wants to give you a holistic tech solution. Working with For movie, Boxe is our first product in our entertainment line and is designed to complement its environment, wherever that may be as you take it with you and at the same time to give a relaxing and amazing tv show or movie watching experience.

record.Creator: Anton Ooms
record.Title: Ketaiki: Wooden wireless phone chargers
record.Text:
Hi hi everyone! And welcome to my first kickstarter!
I am so happy to present my venture into kickstarter to make a self-designed useful item a reality.
My initial idea with designing these chargers started from a simple starting point. I did not particularly like any of the designs I saw.
 So I set out to design and make my own!






Design philosophy:
I went into designing this with a few core design choices in mind
    - It needed to fit into a bedroom or office environment
   -  It needed to have a form factor which neatly holds your phone in place
  -   It needed to be useable without much hassle

From these choices came about 3 designs!
Each design is manufactured using computer-controlled machining to maintain the single piece aesthetic. This also allows the freedom to design shapes which would be more complicated to achieve using more conventional manufacturing methods.
Another conscious choice was that the user's phone is not supposed to lie on top of the platform, but in the device.
And finally, the decision to use wood has allowed it to fit most interiors and rooms.

The results are the ones you see below!

The Standard type charger





This design is the largest of the three.
It has a recessed centre area in which you can place your phone. The gently sloping sides prevent it from sliding out, yet allow you to easily retrieve your phone out whenever so desired. 
The outer dimensions are approximately 28 by 18 cm (11" by 7") and will comfortably seat a 6.2" size phone (my own) however I have made sure it will fit a up to a size 6.9" phone without issue!







The Angled type charger






The next type came from the idea of having a design where the charging surface has a small angle, as to allow you to see your phone's screen from a sitting position.
The charger also holds the phone in place with the raised edges, which eventually level out at the top of the charger.
I was especially pleased when I received this make, because the wood gives such an unexpectedly interesting pattern!
The outer dimensions of this type are approximately 19 by 9 cm (7.5" by 3.5") and will also comfortably seat a 6.2" size phone however you can again fit a 6.9" size phone without trouble.







The compact type charger





This final design came about after I was suggested to make a smaller version of my first design. I came up with the same phone platform size, however the edges are smaller in size, yet do not hinder phone accessibility.
In terms of a smaller more space saving size, I was quite pleased to see how it turned out!
The outer dimensions of this type are approximately 20 by 11 cm (8" by 4") and will, quite a shocker I know, also comfortably seat a  6.2" size phone. It may not look like it, but I have verified that it will also seat phones up to a 6.9" too! 





The circuitry and specs
It is of course good to know what to expect for performance of any device you have. Without it these would be more akin to bowls and less like chargers.

Fast charging is a must and will be possible. 
The Qi standard for wireless charging will be used. 
The power output will be 10W.  
Power input is by a USB-C type port on the charger.

As the charger is made of wood, a concern could be that wood does not mix with electricity. However, wood is an electrical insulator and will not conduct electricity. 
Also the charger is in use it may heat up due to use. However as the circuit board has a thermal cutoff, much like a computer does, and will power down for a while to make sure it does not damage itself in case it ever gets too hot!

Dutch design
The idea of Dutch Design is to design something reflecting the Dutch spirit of innovation and creative thinking. 
The wood, parts, machining, packaging and components will be sourced from the Netherlands, allowing me to hold myself and my manufacturers to a high standard of quality. I always aim to make something I would want to use and see and by doing it this way I try to maintain this standard.
The wood used for this project is multiplex, which resulted in the awesome pattern when machined across it's layers. I hope to eventually try other types of wood and get just as good results as these turned out! 
The USB port installed will be a USB-C port, as this standard will be the most commonly used in the forseeable future, and will be located on the short end of the charger.
The arrows in the image below indicate on what side the USB port will be placed.





And finally, I will have every charger marked with a serial number SPECIFICALLY for this kickstarter, so these will be distuinguishable from any subsequent follow ups!

The name
To embody the project I wanted to come up with a name which would be able to describe what it was, without being too on the nose. I came up with combining two pieces of Japanese to form the name. 
"Ketai" means cell- or mobile phone, and "Ki" can be written with the characters for tree, device or spirit. And when combining the former and latter part I had found my name!

A little backstory
I went into this project with the intention of designing a charger which I felt would be a better result than the ones I've seen. 

After having scribbled a bit in borders and scraps filled with other work, I got onto using one of the most useful tools in my designing arsenal. The access to CAD software. The result of my first attempt into making a charger which would fit my phone, and hold it there with a recessed area might look very familiar!





Now after the 3D model satisfied me, I got to translating this information to paper to make my first prototype!





The first prototype I made started life as a stack of wooden slats. I cut those into smaller segments, glued them together and then cut and sanded the whole into a workable piece. (I was hoping the irregularities in the wood would create a nice pattern!). After that I went to work with my trusty dremel tool to cut out the shape of the segments to match the drawings. And while I wasn't fast nor totally accurate, it did actually work. You can see the actual circuitry for the prototype used in one of the pictures, which was later fitted inside. Also my first attempt at treating the wood was with a varnish. However I wasn't satisfied with that and have decided to use staining as a result!





In this picture, you can see the result of the first attempt (Which was mostly proving that the charger would work fine through wood). And while it's not the prettiest, and the varnishing attempt didn't work out too well, I'm still quite happy I made it, as it was one of my first steps in this undertaking.





The next prototype was much closer to the eventual design I decided upon. It is handmade too, but like the first prototype very much functional. The body is made from angled segments of wood with a flat top for the center area. It also has a small window which lights up blue when a phone is charging on it! However this may still change in the final design. It has the dimensions of the normal sized charger.











You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































Having handcrafted two functional prototypes, I felt so energized I tried my hand at making a few more designs. And as you can see below I've had quite some fun doing so! You can recognize which ones I've picked for this campaign, however maybe there is some future design I can work out too.





After having made these extra designs I went searching for the possibility to machine the chargers from a single piece. And as it turned out I could! The resulting prototypes you can see here are the results from having them machined at a CNC shop, and I must say I was extremely excited to see the results. It was also really cool to see how the layers of multiplex revealed themselves because of the machining. This was the chargers when I got them from the shop, before the finishing and staining.





I couldn't pass up the chance to line up a set of tries to show some of the evolution!





And the look of the wood once it has been sanded and stained multiple times! 





Image and style
Now with the chargers so far along, I still needed something of a logo. Having thought of the name, I was given a few suggestions. Which I eventually narrowed down to two choices. And to find which one would best suit the chargers, had them engraved into wood, in a similar fashion as the serial numbers will eventually be! 





And for making this project look good, some nice pictures! The results should be recognizable in the various shots used in the presentation itself. 










Shipping and taxes
Sadly even over here we aren't exempt from the increased cost of shipping things across the globe. I've tried to find the most reasonable shipping I could find. As the constraint here for a small package is 2 kg, multiple chargers will not increase the cost up to this point. An extra heavy package will sadly jump the cost.
I will ensure that every package has a track & trace code when shipped. As this in included in the pledge.
Please do note that I take no responsbility for any import duties or fees which may occur in your country. 

Thank you all so much for reading up to this point and I hope I've had the chance to show you what this project is all about. Either which way, thank you so much for your time and I wish everyone a lovely time!

record.Creator: Hamza Khan
record.Title: Choreable
record.Text:
Hi, firstly I want to thank you for taking the time to check out our Kickstarter.  We are raising funds to develop Choreable, a platform that we think is still very undeveloped in our new digital age. I am a young entrepreneur inspired by promoting technology and employment at the same time.  Our mission is to connect everyday people to a marketplace of skilled freelancers to help consumers with odd-jobs and errands.
Choreable is the easy way to take care of all your chores from cleaning, handyman work, moving, lawn care, deliveries of groceries, and dinner from your favourite restaurant!
We want to create an easy to use platform that you can instantly book services with freelancers that are verified. You can choose the individual by reviews, skills, and price. You can schedule when it works best for you and you can chat, pay, tip, and review all through one platform.





We want to be a marketplace providing opportunities to people around the world to earn a living by connecting with others in their community. We are working to generate change and we are committed to playing a role in increasing underrepresented populations in the tech industry.
Everyday work is important, but it also is time consuming. Get more done in less time with Choreable.





HOW WILL FUNDING BE USED:
We are currently asking for a pledge total of $2883 CDN to support Phase 1 of our project's development. All the funds collected will be used in their entirety to carry out the necessary platform, marketing and acquire equipment to be able to carry out the work and hire employees to work with this great project.

record.Creator: Devonian Apps
record.Title: The Daily Coding Challenge
record.Text:
Get great at coding interviews by solving 1 problem each day.  
😔 Do you waste your time on social media? 
😔 Do you wish you could have a better job and grow your self esteem?
Instead of doing Sudoku, crossword puzzles, or wasting time, why not do a fun coding challenge? 😊

record.Creator: Shirt Lab srl
record.Title: Et Alia Sapientia - The Italian Ethical Living Brand
record.Text:
WE ENVISION Italian  artistic craftsmanship to become THE ETHICAL LUXURY of tomorrow, stemming from a desire to push the boundaries of estheticism.





OUR IDEAL PARTNER is the TRUE CONNOISSEUR, the ENLIGHTENED CUSTOMER who is not simply looking for a branded item but rather for a PERSONALIZED EXPERIENCE and the opportunity to explore a new paradigm: handcrafted creations which are the ARTISTIC EXPRESSION OF THE AUTHENTIC SELF. 





The platform uses BLOCKCHAIN technology which enables real-time tracking of the product, from order to delivery.
The user is therefore able to CHECK EVERY STEP OF THE PROCESS. Each item is carefully selected in accordance with rigorous criteria of quality, traceability, environmental sustainability and ethical standards.
We adopt the highest level of transparency and a made-to-order system, therefore production begins when an order is received. This model ensures a significant reduction of waste and a FULL CUSTOMIZATION of the products.





ET ALIA SAPIENTIA portrays the contemporary man's world with 7 NEW, WEEKLY-PUBLISHED CAPSULE COLLECTIONS, in limited editions and for special prices. After a week, the presented products will remain on the ONLINE SHOP PERMANENTLY.
The magazine constantly strives to address luxury needs through a PAINSTAKING RESEARCH of Italian products that are impossible to find on the web.
Each item is carefully selected by a TEAM OF EXPERTS and complies with THE MOST RIGOROUS CRITERIA of QUALITY and TRACEABILITY.
ET ALIA SAPIENTIA adds an ingredient to the e-commerce formula: the RESEARCH SERVICES HUB. Are you an artist, a stylist, a designer or a collector looking for a specific manufacturing technique or simply for a product that you can't find on web? We will find it for you! Are you planning a trip to experience authentic Italian living off the beaten track? We'll take care of it! Are you simply searching for nonna's recipe of a local, traditional meal? We'll find that too! 





We are confident that there is a WORLDWIDE AUDIENCE craving for NEW INSIGHTS, ORIGINAL STORIES AND PRODUCTS, as well as opportunities and experiences that only Italy can offer and the entire world is waiting to see and hear.





Due to the current Great Supply Chain Disruption we cannot guarantee on-time delivery of orders. On the other hand, what WE CAN GUARANTEE is that purchased items WILL BE DELIVERED. Backers will be able to track every step of the process, from the sourcing of raw materials to the shipping.





 All displayed prices include international shipping charges and customs duties. As soon as our Kickstarter campaign ends, you will be able to book a chat with us and choose size, model, fabrics and all other eventual customizations.
The VIDEO CHAT plays a pivotal role as it enables a DIRECT COMMUNICATION with the backers, thus facilitating our understanding of how italian culture is perceived and, more specifically, its regional/local history, peculiarities, arts&crafts etc. Our commitment to keep you fully informed starts right now! You will never miss an important update thanks to our notifications and newsletters.
We have carefully designed THREE DIFFERENT OPTIONS which we believe can suit our backers the best:

- a PLETHORA OF CULTURAL CONTENT featured in a magazine and a top-notch hardcover book, to satisfy even the most demanding culture buff;
- a COMPLETE COLLECTION OF BESPOKE AND HAND-TAILORED CLOTHING, from underwear to suit, made from the finest fabrics in the world;
- last but not least, OUR UNCONVENTIONAL RECOMMENDATIONS that truly reflect our nature, for the trailblazing investors always eager to push the boundaries further.






 Et Alia Sapientia Printed Book, Hardcover, 29x38 cm (11,41”x15”) 2,20 kg, 254 pages
This book is not a compendium of theories on Italian art... It is an EMOTIONAL JOURNEY into those authentic Italian gems that are too often underrated. Every corner of italy hides something that takes your breath away. It is this plethora of jaw-dropping, and yet UNKNOWN, marvels that we wish to depict in this book.
It it s a genuine portrait of a country of infinite pleasures that are waiting to be discovered by the patient observer. Every discovery sparks a new desire to deep dive into this treasure trove of unparalleled beauty. Let yourself be guided by this longing, carrying a sense of incompleteness that is inevitably amplified in a country like Italy, so rich in artistic, architectural and natural wonders.
Beauty is a quest for sense, a catalyst of metaphysical explorations, the foundation of those intangible values forming our culture. Beauty is the ultimate creative force, the core element or every timeless creation. Beauty goes hand in hand with right and fair. These concepts are part of the same equation and there is no exception to this rule. Therefore beauty is objective, never subjective. claiming the opposite would be rather presumptuous.
The stories we present in this book will provide you with a hands-on knowledge of things that take a lifetime to discover. LET BEAUTY BE YOUR CHAPERONE...





Et Alia Sapientia e-magazine, Monthly, 12 x years, 100 p. in pdf format.
Et Alia Sapientia is a MONTHLY MAGAZINE focusing exclusively on the MALE UNIVERSE and its passions. It boasts ARTICLES, COMMENTARIES, REVIEWS, ESSAYS AND GUIDES OF ALL KINDS FOR ITALY: all you need to inspire each step of your journey and lifestyle. Its reviews and events are often focused on Italian cultural life, traditional products and off-the-beaten path places. We look at what’s happening in Italy and what’s coming up. 
Inside you’ll find exclusive interviews, thought-provoking arguments, long reads, stunning photography, insights from experts, design and the up-and-coming places to put on your next travel itinerary. Written in an INFORMED BUT INFORMAL MANNER, each magazine has 100 pages in pdf format, readable on any device.
We have faith in luxury’s ability to transform its operations and redefine its purpose to meet new goals of sustainability and new customer demands while retaining its relevance, especially for younger generations.
The TRAVEL GUIDE SERIES reveals our favourite places in Italy, from the ideal route for an early-morning run to the best spots for high-end retail stores run by Italian people.
We will take you on a journey around the “Bel Paese” that we call home, leading you designing the hidden, hiding the obvious. Full of surprises and quirks, the guides are also characterized by detailed design, art and architecture pages, to take you away from the crowd and to explore our favourite places and savor local specialties: from tasty street food to something truly gourmet. This is for those who want to make the most of their stay, FEELING LIKE A RESIDENT rather than a tourist.

THE CULT OF THE NIGHT, which has been put aside for a pair of boxers and a cotton t-shirt (except for a daywear-version appearence on city streets), returns to the limelight. 4 hero fabrics:

record.Creator: Anthony McShea
record.Title: Electronic Receipts
record.Text:
Why do we still get paper receipts?
When you purchase merchandise at retailers such as Target, CVS, Best Buy, Walmart, etc. you always leave with a paper receipt longer than a trip to the moon which more often than not you immediately throw away or lose. Did you ever think to yourself why in the digital age we are in today do we still use paper receipts to keep track of our purchases and for returns. Not only is it inconvenient when we try and return an item we purchased but it is also bad for the environment. Every year it is estimated that the United States ALONE consumes 3.3 million trees and 9 billion gallons of water, while emitting 4.6 billion pounds of CO2 in the process of paper receipt production. These chemicals don't just stay on the paper, but can make their way into our bodies as a result of simply handling receipt paper. 

My idea to change it all!
What I would like to build here is an app that will allow generate and allow you to scan a barcode on your phone and get your receipt sent to it digitally to that app. Then from there be able to organize it by either store name, dollar amount, date, etc. within the app itself. I am not looking to create receipts within the app I want them to be digitally sent to the app just like how they are sent to your email at times. Your email gets too clogged this way and not every retailer provides that option. In the future I wish to have app features such as retailer coupons which can be claimed and clipped within the app. Many of these features will streamline your checkout process saving you time and money and helping the environment by cutting down on paper, ink and water waste.  

My Goal!
My hope and idea is to partner with the major box store retailers and credit card companies to gain access to the stores transaction detail and allow it to be uploaded right to the app and skip the paper receipt.

Why Receipts are Terrible
Receipts come from the lowest quality paper, and the ink may begin to fade few hours after printing in some cases. In many instances, the thermal ink will start falling off with time, and you will be left with a blank paper, so again why are receipts not digital?

Thermal paper uses heat from a printer head to make letters and numbers appear; no ink is used. This process requires the addition of bisphenol A (BPA) or bisphenol S (BPS) in their "free form", which means that the chemicals are not bound to the paper or polymerized. The chemicals can easily transfer to anything a receipt touches your hand, the money in your wallet, or even the groceries in your shopping bag.
BPA and BPS are known hormone disruptors that can affect brain development, heart, lung and prostate health, mammary glands, and reproductive abilities. They can be transferred from fingers to the mouth via food, or absorbed directly through the skin when held.
Worst part about these receipts is you can't even recycle them they must be throw away in the garbage!!

Apps and retailer with the right ideas
Sure a few retailers allow you to have your receipt sent via email such as CVS but this clogs your inbox making it difficult to filter and sort through all the junk you may have. 
All the apps currently available on the app store do not offer this service I wish and hope to bring to our society. The only services these apps provide are for you to take a picture and upload it after you've gotten your receipts or create a new receipt to give to a customer in exchange for goods or service. All these apps have very low star reviews and are old and outdated. I want to digitalize the receipt process for every single cash register there is at all businesses across America and then the world! 

Please help by donating today, if you aren't able to donate don't worry because the 2nd best thing is to share this! If you have any helpful insightful ideas then contact me as well.

record.Creator: Edward hodge
record.Title: Wireless fuel automation system
record.Text:
After being in the tanker industry for 11 years, I have seen multiple spills resulting in EPA fines & hazardous cleanup 
The system I have developed will prevent spills when the driver is unloading into a above ground storage tank 
The pump will stop automatically if the driver hits the overfill probe, once the pump  stop the flow stops preventing a spill 
If the driver never hits the probe the pump will continue to run
The system is powered by 12 volts through the trucks electrical system 
No batteries are needed for the wired version 
Batteries are needed for the wireless system which can last up to 9 months 
Optional feature would be a solar panel attached to the battery pack, the batteries would never have to be replaced 
The wireless system also has a handheld remote up to 600 ft range 
The wired system has (2) emergency stops 
One placed at the truck 
One placed at the fill line for the above ground storage tank 

In the future,  this system will be universal for all pumps & fluids

record.Creator: PURRIT
record.Title: PURRAIR, Fresh Air for Fresh Life
record.Text:
How clean is your home really? Does it smell or feel stuffy sometimes? You've probably experienced bad odours at some point in your house. PURRAIR has been created to solve those problems most effectively and efficiently. Discover the life-changing magic of PURRAIR!










Why choose PURRAIR over other products in the market? Unlike the other existing air purifiers, PURRAIR is permanent, convenient, simple, and most importantly, different. Regardless of the environment or situation, PURRAIR will get the job done and outperform competitors.






































You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































Periodic Spraying - the spray type air fresheners we are so familiar with, for example, Febreeze, do not have a long-lasting effect.  The effects dissipate a few minutes after spraying and bad odors return. PURRAIR is different from those temporary relief sprays. PURRAIR will refresh the air by eliminating harmful substances floating in the air. 















One of the most impressive features of PURRAIR is that it barely makes any noise. While it has an impeccable performance, the fan embedded in the device allows for a soundless performance. Individuals or pets sensitive to noise will feel at ease while PURRAIR is doing its job.
























PURRAIR does not require any replacement. Therefore there's no additional or hidden cost.  PURRAIR's plasma unit is permanent, so you won't need any replacement filters. Improve your air quality and let your savings grow.

















PURRAIR's compact size and flat design make it portable. You can drop it into your backpack and take it anywhere with you. Bring the heavy performance with you while keeping your backpack light. Make your work desk an air-safe zone or board a flight without any worries about cross-contamination.  















Conventional air purifiers cannot reach hidden corners such as shoe cupboards and pantries. PURRAIR's magnetic installation and high-capacity internal battery make it ideal for taking control of these difficult to reach spaces. Let PURRAIR work behind doors and improve the air quality everywhere. 




































PURRAIR's simple and minimal aesthetics are designed to fit all interior spaces, from mid-century to victorian style. We have prepared six beautiful colors so that you can choose the right fit for your home and office. 





















































The hidden LED indicator shows the battery status. You can use it with the USB adapter connected or disconnected. The internal high-capacity battery will provide up to 20 hours of disconnected use. It only takes two and a half hours to charge fully.












Simply touch and enjoy clean air. If odors are severe then touch one more time for the boost mode. The fan will increase its speed up to 8,500 rpm and complete the difficult task of severe odor removal.
























No need to replace anything and no need to wash anything. You just need to swab the plasma pins every three weeks, which only takes 30 seconds. A cotton swab and 30 seconds every three weeks are all you need for maintenance. 





































Chemical residue can be harmful to self-grooming pets and curious children. Unlike spray-type odor removers, PURRAIR leaves no residue while cleansing the air. The Ozone occurrence rate is only 0.008 ppm, significantly lower than the FDA's requirement of "No more than 0.05".

























































































Due to COVID-19, problems such as shipping and logistics around the world continue to grow. Due to the shipping crisis, customers' parcels are often lost or delayed, and some of them are not being tracked. Purrit has negotiated with several carriers to resolve this issue. Finally, we have decided to ship all packages via air transport. To all customers who purchase PURRAIR on Kickstarter, we ship the product by air courier to all regions of the world. This shipping method is one of the fastest. It takes 2-5 days for these flights to arrive at the customer's destination. It also provides accurate tracking information until the customer receives the product. Customers will be able to receive the product within a week after the production of the PURRAIR production is completed.  All staff will do their best to not only deliver but also advance the announced production schedule.  PURRIT is made up of engineers with extensive experience in development, design, software, production and delivery.

record.Creator: Sheldon Goodheart
record.Title: ClickTrim will change the way you look at interior finishing
record.Text:
1. Overview of the Product 
ClickTrim eliminates the hassles associated with conventional interior trim products through a superior design, premium look and finish, while taking less time and money. Builders and the Do-it-yourself (“DIY”) individuals often juggle tight deadlines, budgets while balancing a professional finish. Our patented/pending ClickTrim solution can solve this problem with our ready to go 3-step solution while saving you time. We estimate that you can eliminate up to 70% of labour costs from utilizing ClickTrim.






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.

Replay with sound

Anyone can utilize ClickTrim to easily transform rooms, windows, in less time than traditional installation, and lower costs in comparison to other ‘complete’ trim solutions on the market. ClickTrim achieves this by completely eliminating:
     ● Nailing through the face of the trim
     ● Filling/hide nail holes or joints with putty
     ● Cutting mitres
     ● Paint preparation and clean-up
     ● Painting trim 2 – 3 times to achieve the professional look

We have a solution that is as easy as clicking on a reward package below.



Tray Ceiling

2. Product Offering

ClickTrim Window Casing






5.25" & 3.25" Profile views of baseboard and some specialty pieces

 3. Our Story 
ClickTrim started out with a few guys with big ideas to revolutionize the trim industry. Major industry suppliers have tried (and do) offer ‘pre-finished’ products, however, these products still require effort cover up nails / miter cuts resulting in additional time and money. Our product is constructed in a way that allows an individual to avoid any nails in the prefinished product by using our two-part base track & finished trim.



Prototypes & Designs



The design transformed from paper sketches to various 3D designs, ultimately working with MDF to test the designs until the solution was redesigned and perfected. The product is now ready to be shared with the world as we have the internal capabilities to scale up production and patents(or pending) & trademarks in place.



Redesigned Gripping Base Track



The founder has over 20 years in plumbing, electrical and building experience, he has worked in both the commercial and residential space. His entrepreneurial drive has built up companies, employed up to 60 employees and has made his mark in every community that he has called home.



Test Production



The co-owner has both construction and managerial experience. With over 10 years of construction experience and 15 years of CPA, CA experience in strategic, management and governance experience.



Installing ClickTrim



At ClickTrim, we understand that teamwork is essential for every successful business and we have established a network of partners in marketing, legal, business mentoring and distribution to ensure that the company is ready to achieve the goals outlined below.

4. Use of funds
Short -term
As a small manufacturing company, ClickTrim believes that the best way to achieve our goals is through crowd funding support to ensure a successful launch and be able to compete in the market. While we can produce trim in small volumes currently, we are looking to the crowd to gain interest and support, executing our production scalability plan and generate momentum to be able to deliver our innovative product into your hands.
Our initial goal is to raise $200,000. Achieving this goal will allow us to:
     ● Achieve economies of scale on raw material purchases to ensure competitive price points
     ● Purchase more sophisticated manufacturing equipment to improve automation efficiencies and prototype lines such has additional CNC machines
     ● Progress software enhancement
     ● Progress further R&D for expanding our product offerings
Thus all contribution will be utilized in executing our business plan to achieve what we believe is a revolutionary product and a new step forward in the trim industry.
Long-term
Our manufacturing patent allows for endless possibilities of product applications and offerings. We will look to maximize the innovative solutions capabilities.
     ● Further enhance automation

record.Title: Goal Symmetry
record.Text:
Why do we need capital and what will it be used for?
The purpose of this fund raising project is to generate sufficient capital that will primarily go towards the pre-launch & launch app-marketing campaigns of Goal Symmetry (the product). There's certainly no use in having a great product if nobody knows about it. We've already consulted with a few of the top app marketing companies so that we could understand what they'd be able to deliver for us and what their services would cost. The reason we do not plan on trying to do all the marketing ourselves is because it's simply not our area of expertise. So, ideally we'd like to outsource that work to the professionals.

Half the battle has already been won!
The good news is, the first production version of the app has already been created, thoroughly tested and been approved by both Apple App Store & Google Play Store. But until we've been able to run several app marketing campaigns to build interest, we do not plan on prematurely launching the app.

What's special about this particular app and why would people want to use it?
The discipline of setting goals, many would agree, is an important one to have especially among those who are, or are on their way to becoming, massively successful. However, why is it that so many people don't set goals? Our understanding, is that firstly, it takes TIME and secondly, it forces you to stop and think about what you really want and then plan out how you're going to make it actually happen. 
Well, nobody can do your thinking for you, but there are most definitely ways to make the planning steps and progress-measuring along the way a lot easier. 
Goal Symmetry is unique (at least until the competitors catch up) in the goal setting sphere, as the focus is geared toward the documentation of your journey, not just setting and achieving your actual goals. So, when creating goals for yourself or your business, you're able to easily create/edit notes attached to any goal, let alone all the other cool things such as multiple ways to track/measure your progress, set and check off milestones (or sub-goals if you prefer) and more. Each goal you create, has all you need attached to it - stored in a database that can be accessed from any of your Apple or Android mobile/tablet devices. Additionally, the architecture was carefully designed with the understanding of probably the most highly recommended and successful goal-setting methodology. We mostly want to take the pain out of setting goals and help make the process as easy and helpful as possible, because we know the power and value of the discipline of goal setting.
No more notepads or journal books that will inevitably get lost or misplaced overtime along with all your important goals and notes you've made. The digital way is definitely the way to go. All your carefully planned and thought-of ideas, goals & ambitions will be all in one place, easily accessible (by you), backed up as well as username & password protected.

Who are we?
We're a brand new startup company called Sagacious Apps Limited. We're based in the UK and we're in the business of productivity app development and solving problems. 

What else can we (the backers) hope to expect in the future for Goal Symmetry?
Great question! Without divulging too much information right here, there are plenty of plans and ideas in the works for future updates. We don't want to give away the juicing stuff for our competitors to steal, but we can at least say that there's a lot of room for growth such as a web app version and a more business appropriate package that we plan to add. So, hopefully I won't be too optimistic to say that if the project gets over-funded, we can put those funds to good use and great upgrades.

Lastly, we can't forget to attribute the free resources used to present Goal Symmetry to you here.

record.Creator: Chanda Lowrance
record.Title: Bredcrums Antisocial Media Platform
record.Text: We live in a day and age where 'Googling' your name or phone number can bring up a lot of personal information about an individual including addresses, siblings, etc. Not only that, a person's internet history can be damaging to their reputation. We need a way to secure and even erase our internet footprint to provide security. Breadcrumbs is a new social networking platform that allows a user to privately and securely input their personal information and obtain daily generated reports on where their data is located across the web. Machine learning and data scraping will be used to accomplish this task. Even better, your data will not be sold to data firms!

record.Creator: Sidney Laurvick
record.Title: The Meter Box: A Custom Made Enclosure For Crypto Miners
record.Text:
Who am I?
Hello, my name is Sidney! I am an entrepreneur at heart who loves to create products that fill a direct purpose, whether that purpose be to bring joy or to solve a problem! This will be my 2nd Kickstarter launched and hopefully just as successful as my 1st!
In my free time when I'm not working my day job or spending time with my family, I love to golf during the summer and play hockey during the winter as anyone in Minnesota normally will do. I love to tinker on different product designs or ideas that come to mind and over the last few years I've spent a lot of time learning about cryptocurrency.
What do I plan on making and why?
I plan on manufacturing my own custom made enclosure through a process called injection molding, this process helps produce things as cheap and quick as possible! In this Kickstarter I will only be offering the meter lid and meter box for purchase in single, bulk and reseller quantities as listed in the pledge options.





The Drok Voltmeter Display & L6-30R are not included on Kickstarter!
Why create this product? Well, I have been seeking a way to know my accurate electrical usage in live-time for my mining rigs? I'll give you a bit of background; crypto miners need to know their electrical usage so they can measure real costs from electricity and better gage their return on investment and what they're profiting.
After determining my problem and searching far and wide online, I found the DROK Voltmeter Display to be the best product for the job in terms of measuring electrical usage and the L6-30R for 30amp, 240v electrical use. After I found the items I needed to help me successful measure my power usage, I couldn't house either of them!
 Check out the initial models below! 





With both the meter and plug, the new problem was that I could not find a quick solution to house both items - I found some 3D printed options but I didn't have time to wait the 3 months for the product to be produced from someone online. After a bit of designing and testing around the two products I came to the conclusion that I would be able to produce this enclosure as shown above without any issues at all.
What’s my plan, and what’s my schedule?
With my background in injection molding and experience sourcing products I am able to offer a product that can be created in masses but still at a low price. My hopes are to not only solve a product demand but a supply demand as well, when you order from me this will be delivered in days, not weeks at a reasonable price.





If you back my project today - together we will make this product become a reality as early as November 2021 as shown in my timeline above! I have the parts secured through the manufactures directly so I can offer the lowest pricing possible, injection molds are ready to be cut so they can begin filling with plastic, and the logistics are in place to get this into your hands days after being produced in North Carolina!
What's my budget for this project?
As shown in the chart below, I breakdown exactly where the Kickstarter funds (if funded successfully) need to go in order to make this product become a reality. Through Kickstarter I do not plan on making a profit but making a product become available to produce and provide to you, the initial backers!





How can I support this project?
We need backers to support our Kickstarter! Our Meter Lid and Meter Box is sold as a set as shown below for the low price of $35, this pricing is only available to the first 300 units sold, after that it will resume it's normal MSRP of $45 per unit.
Bulk Options Are Available But In Limited Quantities Shown.

record.Creator: Piotr
record.Title: OpenBike - DIY foldable electric micro scooter
record.Text:
Open bike is a small, foldable electric micro scooter. 
I created it for myself but I'd love to share it with you, because we all have right to clean, safe, cheap and sustainable transport.
You can use it to move from place to place or just for fun.
Thanks to it's shape it is safe and comfortable.
Simple construction allows you to built it by yourself with cost below 300 Euro (final price depends on your configuration and component prices in your country).
Experience the freedom of mobility with a scooter built by you and customizied to your needs thanks to Open Architecture. Open Architecture means that you can adapt it to your needs and use the components that best meet your requirements.








Can't find anything on the market that suits your needs? 
No chance to buy anything due to pandemic period? No problem - do it yourself!

The goal of this campaign is to create video tutorials that will allow you to build it yourself. You will receive all documentation, all knowledge and all necessary CAD files to build it.

You will learn a lot and you will be proud of your vehicle. You will see how simple it is.

You can modify and apply your changes according to your needs - different wheels sizes, different battery capacity, you can use different motor type or even change frame shape. The mounting of the saddle is adapted to standard spacing, so you can easily use any model.
You can decide how much you will spent on this scooter. You can significantly reduce costs if you already have some parts - you can use them with ease.

You can achieve up to 40km on single charge - depends on how many battery cells you will use. The battery is easily removable.
Maximum speed depends on you final configuration (motor power and wheel size). Currently it is up to 30km/h






The entire frame is easily adaptable to any changes that come to your mind.
Note that in this type of project, the key is to adjust the proportions of the vehicle so that it is neither too big nor too small, and the position we take behind the wheel is as comfortable as possible. So if you would like to refine these sizes yourself, you have to spend a lot of time on it and make a lot of tests.
So if you want to cut corners - I've already done it for you.
Now anyone can take advantage of my work and build their vehicle based on the documentation provided.







Vehicle can be constructed without any special tools, such as welders, migomats, etc.
It is important, because not everyone has such devices and not everyone is able to use them. Moreover, these operations are rather time-consuming and this generates costs. Therefore, only bolted connections were used in this construction.
It does not even require welding to the battery. Thanks to my special design you can built battery with ease.






Non-standard parts, for example all connecting elements, folding mechanism, etc. can be done with 3D printing and laser cutting.
You can easily order elements from 3D printing everywhere for very little money and probably some of you also have such printers at home.
Laser cutting is also affordable and the services are easy available.
You can also completely abandon laser cutting and cut each sheet and drill yourself.

Even if you feel that construction is not for you, you can still support this project. 
With your support I will provide better documentation and then you can ask someone else to build it for you.




 Current specification:
- weight: 11,4kg
- top speed 30km/h
- electric motor: BLDC 250W 
- front wheel 12 inch 
- rear wheel 8 inch with hub motor

When recording tutorial, the scooter will be built from scratch based on new parts to show that all parts fits together perfectly. All parts will be 3D printed and laser cut. You will get 10 to 15 video tutorials and  more than 50 CAD files, all dimensions and a list of parts to buy.
If it there is over funding - some new options will be also tested and recorded - different motors and wheels, different controllers etc.

This license is for personal and non-commercial use only. If you want to sell this product, ask for a separate license - it's very cheap.

record.Creator: NurseLifeApp
record.Title: NurseLife app
record.Text:
This project was already in our pipelines in 2019 thanks to our working and academic experience but, only after the COVID-19 pandemic global outburst, we decided to create our dream from zero and to share it with all our friends and colleagues.

Why this? Because the pandemic put in front of our eyes not only the professionalism of every healthcare staff but, first and foremost, that we are not only nurses but also human beings with the goal to guarantee the health and wellness of everyone.

The pandemic has brought under a new light the role of nurses placing in the public eyes of our communities the existing criticality of this profession. In fact they are the first getting in contact with anyone in need of health care and they are the first encounters in the hospitals.




Brand



Nurselife is a team of nurses with a keen to grow this profession.
Our mission is to facilitate the learning curve, studying and preparing for the exams by contributing to improve the quality of health care. Within the app, you can find everything you need in regards to nursing. The topics covered are:
- Basic and advanced nursing.
- Critical care.
- Maternal and Infant care.
- Surgical care.
- Management.



Screeshot




The objectives of Nurselife are:
1. Make available all sort of informative material for all the Italian nurses and not only, by translating to English, French and Spanish;
2. Provide a positive change in the nurse role also from a social and cultural point of view;
3. Simplify clinical care practice via an easy-to-use tool and clarity of contents;
4. Help in review or preparation for university exams or for work.



T-shirt





Nurselife, therefore, looks to the future with the respect and the teachings of a noble past which, across all its history, has shown the ability to shape the healthcare assistance, to manage it and to point it towards perspectives and solutions which they have been recognized only after years and years from their enunciations.
And, as Florence Nightingale used to say, a nurse who, in the past, was already living in the future: “Caring is an art; and, if it is considered as such, requires a total devotion and a hard preparation, as per any work from a painter or sculptor; with the only difference being as to work not on a canvas or on icy marbles but on the human body.”.
Do you study nursing? Are you freshly graduated? Or do you simply need a quick review while working? Nurselife is the app for you!! Help us growing and spreading all our knowledge not only for Italy but for the entire world.




Mug



The app is already available in Italian:



Available for Android and Ios

record.Creator: Jure Šunić
record.Title: FixIT - find a handyman in your area and fix a house problem
record.Text:
Mockups of the application


Description: The application should be able to connect users with workers and help them find needed help with the occurred problem.

Opportunity: A major problem in-home repairs and construction services is the lack of effectiveness of the system and the non-transparency of workers.
Currently, there is a wait of up to three months for certain works, which is the problem for anyone in a living or a business place, which leads to high opportunity costs.
The goal is to simplify and make home repairs and construction services more accessible.

Solution: Imagine a person who has damage in a household or business facility. In the digital and modern world of service availability, we solve the problem that the user finds the desired handyman at a given moment through the application and solves a problem as quickly as possible. Here comes our application, which through geolocation at a given moment gives available workers and reviews of the same, history of their completed works and the reactions of the users of the application. The customers have the opportunity to choose the most suitable ones. The deal is settled within the same day, compared to the current long-term wait for repairs. FixIT offers a better relationship between the supply and demand of consumers and workers through an online system, as well as price competitiveness (wider choice of service).

Secret Sauce: It currently takes a very long time to find a worker. Thus, the possibility of repair is extended and the user is in an uncomfortable situation of wasting their precious time and money. Here comes our application with the code used by various other applications that contain the geolocation and user database. It gives us a quick and easy way to choose the best and most affordable worker, while on the other side it gives the worker the choice to accept or reject the job application. This process improves the entire supply/demand relationship, speeds up the process and saves everyone time and care in finding handymen and consumers. Our main goal is to connect and save time for both parties.

Users: Since repairs cover a wide range of jobs, our customers can be anyone who needs a specific home repair or construction service. The application is based on the smooth connection between consumers and handymen, where a quality and sustainable business model would be provided through a quality service fee model (advertising, monthly subscription or low fee when charging for the service provided). The goal is to cover a larger international market and become a global application for mediation between handyman and consumer. The target group is any person who needs repair.

Spread the Word
Thank you for your support! We hope you love FixIT as much as we do!  We would be forever in your debt if you would share FixIT with your audience to help this project come to life!

Share FixIT on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and TikTok.

https://fixitapp.medium.com/
https://www.instagram.com/fixitapp.co/
https://twitter.com/fixitapp_co

record.Creator: Ahmed Elsokary
record.Title: 8bottle: Your Next Generation Smart Water Bottle
record.Text:
8bottle





Say hello to the 8bottle, a smart water bottle designed and proposed to help keep track of your hydration in one durable, eco-friendly package. 8bottle plans to help improve your water intake by tracking your water consumption and displaying useful information on its LED display.





8bottle's features
8bottle will have features to allow a seamless transition from a regular water bottle to a smart bottle.  8bottle considers form, functionality and future technology in its easy to carry and convenient bottle design. 





Hydration Tracking
8bottle will be equipped with an advanced range of smart features such as our personalized dynamic hydration tracking, sipping verification, LED display and wireless charging capability. It will be your perfect companion on any adventure. Just drink and we’ll do the rest. Convenience in your hands, designed smartly.





Sip Verification
Our patent-pending sipping verification technology is designed and planned to detect your lips, enabling truly accurate tracking of hydration levels. 8bottle is designed and planned to be equipped with advanced human lip detection sensors that work in three simple steps. Sip, verify, count.  





LED Display
The LED display will be on your 8bottle showing your daily goal target % and battery life. Want to check how far along your daily goal you are? Just tap the LED display to see your completed percentage. Tap again to check on battery life.





 Vacuum Insulation 
Designed and planned to be made with 18/8 pro-grade stainless steel to ensure pure taste and no flavor transfer, our durable construction stands up to whatever life brings.





 Wireless Charging - 15 Days Battery Life





The hydration must go on. 8bottle is designed and planned to last for up to 15 days on a single charge. When you need to power it up, just sit it down on the wireless charger included in the box. 

 Tracking App





Our 8bottle app is designed and planned to help you track your water consumption throughout the day with all the metrics to keep your body firing on all cylinders. 8bottle plans to also allows you to compare with friends and view the positive impact you’ll have on the global water crisis.





Take control of your hydration, it's in your hands.





 Three sleek and stylish colors to suit your style. 
Choose from Matte Black, Pearl White or Thirst Blue, for a smart and sophisticated look, find a finish that's perfect for you. Take control of your hydration, it's in your hands. 





Health App Integration 
Get planned customized hydration goal and tips when syncing with health apps. Planned to sync with Fitbit, Apple Health, Google Fit and Samsung Health.





The Ethical Choice
In the U.S. alone, 38 BILLION water bottles end up in landfills each year. Bottles take over 1000 years to decompose and 80% of them are never recycled. 8bottle not only keeps you healthy but by choosing to reuse, you can help preserve the environment.





8bottle X Water Project
8bottle and Water Project have joined forces to end the global water crisis. By raising awareness, we can build freshwater projects to areas that need it most. We care about making the world a better place and by galvanizing the support of our army of world changers, we can make a major impact together.

You will also be able to track your impact on the world through our 8bottle app.

 It's Waterproof! 
The designed and planned IIP68 waterproof rating means 8bottle is protected inside and out. It’s not afraid of a little coffee, tea or a run in the rain. And dust? No worries. 8bottle is designed to be waterproof and water resistant. Need to hand wash it, go ahead. Want to take it out on a hike in a rainy day, be our guest. We thought of your convenience and designed for it.





Retractable Hook
The perfect blend between comfort and durability. Designed to be carried easily everywhere and anywhere you go. 






Durability
Have form and function. Designed and planned to be built with 18/8 pro-grade stainless steel the durable construction stands up to whatever life brings.





Built for Hydration and Beyond
Our proprietary technology is planned to provide precise hydration measurement methods. The bottle is designed and planned to smartly detects your lips and measures hydration seamlessly. The app is planned to dynamically program your hydration goal based on presets settings and situations. 





Brilliant Design 
8bottle is designed and planned to be equipped with advanced technology and sensors that measure your daily water intake. No need to worry about incorrect tracking, our patent pending technology verifies human consumption of water. Available in three beautiful colors that look just right. with a soft touch finish that feels amazing to the touch.





Project Timeline
8bottle is currently in the final prototype phase. After finalising the design of the mold opening, 8bottle will go into mass production and be ready to deliver to backers next year.







What's in the box?
Every 8bottle plans to be shipped with a wireless charging dock, USB-C and a user manual. With a choice of three beautiful colors, you can have a bottle to match every style.





 Our Story



8bottle founders, Ahmed (left) and Mamoon (right)


8bottle founders, Ahmed and Mamoon share a lifelong passion for fitness and a desire to help provide clean accessible water to all. 8bottle is the first step on a journey to use technology for large scale benefit and real application.

8bottle was originally born out of a need to track hydration accurately without compromising convenience. The name was inspired by the recommended hydration goal; 8 cups. Once we started testing pre-existing methods of hydration track we noticed accuracy and convenience had not been given enough thought. This is when we set to work on designing 8bottle.

After going through a rigorous testing period we found a combination of features that made a great smart bottle. This meant designing sipping verification technology that detects human lips for accuracy, LED display and wireless charging for everyday convenience as well as a rugged waterproof exterior so this was the only water bottle you would ever need.

We want to thank you for considering backing our project!

record.Creator: Jeremy Cook
record.Title: JC Pro Macro 2 Mechanical Keypad
record.Text:
I2C GPIO expander, fan header, OLED screen? Just the tip of the iceberg!


The JC Pro Macro 2 is a USB keyboard device that emulates keystrokes and mouse movements, saving you precious computer interface time. A swappable Arduino-programmable ATMega32U4 Pro Micro (clone) powers it, and the board provides GPIO/I2C breakout pins for unlimited tinkering and customization.

 Why Use a Macro Pad/Deck/Aux Input?
The keyboard/mouse combination is a fantastic general purpose tool for interfacing with a computer, which has nominally done the job for decades. But it wasn't made just for you and the way you work with a computer. The JC Pro Macro 2 adds an extra input device that can be customized to your liking for a huge productivity boost!
Using the JC Pro Macro 2, without any add-ons, one could implement:

Keyboard combinations with a single keystroke (e.g. ctl-alt-insertkeyhere)
input lots o' text with a single button
 Media control (literally crank up the volume via rotary encoder)
Program and change key functionality using the Arduino IDE 
8 main input keyswitches with programmable lights for each, plus programmable under-lighting
No software installation needed on host computer for standard operation. Plug in and go!




Did I mention lights?


...but you'll find many of those features in other macro pads. What's unique to the JC Pro Macro 2 is that it's:
Built for Tinkering, Making, Experimentation
The JC Pro Macro 2 features a number of unique hackable features, including:



Control a fan with your macro pad!?!



 GPIO pins broken out, including I2C pins for virtually unlimited control of external devices
ATMega32U4 Pro Micro (clone) controller. Socketed for easy swap-out. Should be able to swap out for Pro Micro footprint boards like the nice!nano or Elite-C, but this has not been tested.
Individually addressable lighting for each keyswitch, along with underlighting for awesome ambient effect.
Can be used independently of a computer as a standalone controller
Optional OLED display 




GPIO Pins Broken out + additional SDA/SCL not shown


Notably, the device is an enhanced-features sequel to the original JCPM, which has been successfully built and sold here.
Why I Love My JCPM2
I made the first JC Pro Macro, as well as other experimental devices that came before, in a large part because I wanted a rotary controller for my computer. After many iterations, and inspiration from others, I finally have something that I'm willing to put up on Kickstarter. 
But why do I like mine? Why will you find yours indispensable? First off, being able to literally crank up tunes with an encoder knob and play/pause/skip songs with dedicated hotkeys is much better than mouse-based alternatives.
I also personally love using this for editing video in Final Cut Pro X. The customizable shortcuts let me make quick work cutting clips free of sub-par content, and the encoder allows me to advance clips frame-by-frame. In fact, I produced this project's Kickstarter video using the JCPM 2. How recursive!
Finally, being able to control the 5V PC-style cooling fan at the touch of a button is much fun. I can start, stop, or adjust a cooling breeze with a simple keystroke!



8 extra keyswitches ready to do your bidding!


Of course, you could use it for just about anything else: gaming, robotics control, home automation, video production, music production, CAD modeling, EDA, EDM (whether dance music, or discharge machining), video conferencing...



 In the above video, friend and prototype tester Pat Regan shows off some amazing Linux functionality: changing its lighting based on the program in focus, modifying external lighting, and working on video in DaVinci Resolve. Below, he's even shows off another JCPM set up as a CNC pendant!



 Much of what he's showing in the first video is beyond my Linux/home automation know-how–and will require user setup–but it demonstrates just what is possible with this hardware, specialized for tinkering and experimentation. 
Example firmware will be available, and the current (standard) version is found on GitHub. The device's functionality is still under development, and a nascent community is developing around this little board that you can be a part of!
Hackable Design and Structure
My background slants towards mechanical design and electronics, and I've put a large amount of time into developing what I consider a great looking and flexible platform:



It's all abou that base


Hackable Electronics:

 Pro Micro board socketed underneath the main circuit board, allowing more real estate for controls, while still being easily swappable.
Power, ground, and GPIO pins broken out on board for limitless expansion. 4 power/ground pins are configurable via solder bridges for easy mounting of accessories on headers. Another GPIO pin and power/gnd is planned
Mode and reset buttons can be mounted on top or below PCB as convenient when self-assembled.
Space for optional I2C pull-up resistors.

Structural Elements Include:

Clear acrylic base
Standoffs/screws
Optional acrylic switch plate

The knob comes in two formats: 

plastic–functional, but basic
Enhanced knurled and anodized aluminum, to look and feel spectacular.

Development Process 





This isn't my first try at a macro keyboard. In fact, as seen here, a simple volume control knob eventually morphed into a 3D-printed device. This became a PCB-based original JCPM device that I have successfully used and sold, before settling on the JCPM2 design. Since deciding on this 8-button form factor, it has gone through multiple revisions.



Keep your computer on, even in the dark with Rando Mouse!


Tested!
As of this writing, the device has been tested to work with Windows, Macintosh, Linux, and Raspberry Pi systems in a variety of situations.

 Volume, media control, etc (Windows, Mac, Linux)
 Mouse jiggler: to keep computer active (Mac, Windows)
 Video Editing: Final Cut Pro X (Macintosh), DaVinci Resolve (Linux)
 CNC: control pendant: cncjs (Raspberry Pi Zero)
 MIDI Interface (without computer)
 PWM Fan control (standalone)
 Rotary gaming control (slither.io) (Mac)

Of course, this is really just scratching the surface of what's possible with it. I'm looking forward to seeing what people do with it!
Programming and customization are via the Arduino IDE, and it can theoretically run QMK firmware for custom layouts without Arduino knowledge. Preliminary testing with QMK has been successful, and full functionality can hopefully be developed further.
Meet the Creator
I'm Jeremy Cook–The "JC" in "JC Pro Macro," an engineer who simply can't help making new contraptions. After several auxiliary input devices, I'm proud to present this one for crowdfunding. You can see more of what I make and do on:

YouTube
Twitter
jeremyscook.com

Also, a big thanks to those that helped make this possible:

Pat Regan, inspiration and product testing
Gürkan Dogan, and Physics Anonymous for Kickstarter and product advice
The folks at Tampa Hackerspace for inspiration, advice, and encouragement
The Butter What? Discord folks for lots of input on the project
Video music by midierror 
And many more!

Why Can I Deliver?
While this is my first Kickstarter, this is not my first time selling custom electronics online. I've delivered well over 200 items from my highly rated Tindie store.
Additionally, I spent a decade in manufacturing automation, making me intimately familiar with the processes needed to create many copies of one device. When in charge of manufacturing lines, failure is not an option, and I hope to bring that experience and attitude to bear here. 
If and when help is needed, I have a wide range of contacts that I can call upon, especially if funding and demand becomes abundant! To that end, I hope you will support this project's goal, and that I can ultimately provide you with an awesome computer input device.
Working Prototypes! 



Pull over for macro-tinkering fun!


After testing the JC Pro Macro Original, along with a JCPM2 prototype for several months, I've had a chance to work with it, and morph it into something that works really well.
PCBWay was used to manufacture the various prototype iterations of the device's main board, and has even agreed to a discount on the final product in exchange for mentioning them here. They've always delivered in a timely manner, so I'm quite confident in this aspect of the project. I also plan to use their matte black finish on the boards, which I think looks awesome.
More info on the JC Pro Macro Original can be found here on GitHub, and code etc that can be used with the JC Pro Macro 2 will be stored in this repository as it develops. While the prototype device is currently functional, its final form may change from what is shown here. 
To be clear, what is shown in the videos here is possible with the device, but much of that functionality will take external hardware and/or software to set up. You currently need to use the Arduino IDE to change key functionality around. If you enjoy that sort of thing, I think you'll love it!
Project by Jeremy Cook Consulting LLC
Reward Notes:

 Kits and Boards come with surface-mount components (LEDs) pre-soldered. Soldering in keyswitches, and encoder, and connecting GND/Power pads with solder if used will need to be done, as well as some mechanical assembly. Solder/soldering iron is not provided.
 Assembled means that soldering of all components and standard programming will be done. For shipping reasons, there may be a few screws that need to be fastened, and/or accessories that will need to be plugged in.
 Optional keyswitch plate option is similar to the base, but has cutouts for the keyswitches to constrain them nicely. Shown in some parts of the video.
 Optional OLED screen can be used to display device data.
 Normal knob will be plastic and potentially 3D-printed. Aluminum knob can also be selected as an option. Note that the color/style of both are subject to change in order to avoid any supply chain and/or fulfillment issues.
 Keycaps will likely be a translucent design to allow light to shine through, though this is also subject to change. Very easy to swap as desired.

record.Creator: NextScent Inc. Team
record.Title: Ventus Home & Ion: Purify & Scent Your Home 🏡
record.Text:
Wouldn’t you love to experience a pleasant and wonderful aroma throughout your home? We certainly do, but candles, plug-ins, wax melts, diffusers, and room sprays only cover a small area and most contribute to indoor air pollution. 
 
That’s why we created the Ventus® Home & Ion - patent-pending air care solutions for your entire home. These revolutionary solutions purify the air and distribute natural fragrances with unmatched performance and safety. Unlike conventional scent products that are expensive, use flame, heat, or messy oils and wax, the Ventus solutions are safe, smart, affordable, and eco-friendly.




















The Ventus Home and Ventus Ion systems are the world's first and only home systems that purify the air and distribute natural fragrances throughout your home!





For about the cost of a large candle, each scent-filter cartridge can safely scent your home up to 1,500 ft² for up to 3 months.
Our proprietary technology ensures consistent performance for the life of each specific scent-filter cartridge.





The Ventus systems use dry-evaporative technology to release natural fragrance into a filtered air stream, just like mother nature does on a breezy day. The systems are safe for use around kids and pets, and there’s no messy oil or wax residue that can damage furniture.
Plus, NextScent is the first company to offer over a dozen fragrances that are certified allergen and CMR-free!





The Ventus systems’ scent-filter cartridge is 99.7% effective at removing most airborne pollutants to purify the air in your home.
The Ventus Ion system also includes a digital air quality sensor and a high-output plasma ionizer for enhanced purification.





Scent your home when you want and how you want – from anywhere!
The Ventus systems are easily controlled with the free NextScent smartphone app as well as  Alexa or Google Home.
You can set schedules, adjust the intensity and elect to receive alerts of changes in air quality, cartridge depletion, or lost connectivity. Test our app now!





The Ventus scent-filter cartridges are made with plant-based, biodegradable materials.
Plus, NextScent is a proud member of the US Green Building Council and a sponsor of OneTreePlanted.org, which funds reforestation projects around the world so we can all breathe cleaner air.





The Ventus devices can easily be placed anywhere in your home, including a table or shelf, installed over a wall outlet, or mounted under a shelf. With the optional Battery Holder Kit, your Ventus system becomes portable for up to 20 hours. 
































* Please note, we're able to confidently estimate shipping to the U.S. and Canada during this campaign. Due to fluctuating international shipping costs, we will charge international shipping and VAT (where required) fees after the campaign ends. International shipping is via DHL at approximately 50% off list rates and will cost approximately $24 - $54 for most destinations.
















👋 Hi, I’m David, founder and CEO of NextScent! The idea for Ventus Home and Ventus Ion all started when I was living in Hong Kong. I realized the poor indoor air quality was affecting my 7-year-old son, so I began to research the contributing factors of indoor air pollution. I learned that in addition to outside air pollution, home scent products are a major contributor!
Since I had expertise in developing commercial scent systems, I realized that I could combine air purification and scent diffusion to provide a better way for people to enjoy fresh air and clean scents.
I assembled a team of scent industry experts, put pen to paper, and started working on developing Ventus Home and Ventus Ion along with safer fragrances. We came up with the world's first and only hi-performance home systems that purify the air and distribute natural fragrances throughout the home. It’s smarter, eco-friendly, and affordable to use.
