We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you can’t give a dollar or pre-order a Ventus Home or Ventus Ion, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of!

record.Creator: Adam
record.Title: Neural network to detect useful plants or trees in your live
record.Text:
Hello,
 Imagine that you are in the middle of nature while camping, or you are walking with your family in the woods, or you live in the countryside,

 For you, we offer three applications for smartphone and PC that allows you with your smartphone or a simple camera or camcorder to identify in real time trees or plants.
 These applications will help your teenagers who spend their day on their smartphone to love nature!

 These three applications have one thing in common: there is no need to have a network so if you plan to move to a cabin in Alaska these applications will be very useful,
 These apps all have the same goal: to learn more about nature and appreciate its benefits, to show you why to preserve it.

 Whether you live in the city, in the country, by the sea or isolated without civilization more than a hundred milles away, the first application is made for you, it can save your life or help you to treat your little boo-boo.
 This application allows you to identify in real time medicinal plants and to give you their usefulness. Like the chelidonia which treats warts with its sap, the wild thyme or the plantain which helps to relieve respiratory problems,...

 Whether you are an amateur or professional gardener, the second application is for you, it identifies the diseases that can be found in a vegetable garden and gives you a solution to eradicate it. For example, mildew can be treated with horsetail manure or a mixture of baking soda and black soap...

 The third application is for anyone who wants to know a little more about trees, those who want to know about edible fruits or berries and also for forestry professionals
 Whether it is fruit trees or trees of our beautiful forests.
 It allows to identify trees from their leaves, their fruits or their trunk,
 For example the oak with its leaves and acorns, the hazelnut tree with its delicious nuts...

 These applications are compatible with Android smartphones, IOS smartphones and PCs or tablets under Windows,

 It will be possible to record the GPS position, this feature will be very useful to find a plant to treat you from one year to another,

 The names of the plants/trees will be given in English and French, but it will be possible to give your own names according to your language or customary name, via a configuration file,

 Garonix is a startup created in 2017 with the objective of making a revolutionary machine for the production of electronic boards with real-time recognition of the position of electronic components in vac. The project was stopped because it was too far ahead of existing technologies and in particular because of the slow learning of neural networks.
 The creator of Garonix has 20 years of experience in industry, he is an electronic engineer at the base, but has skills in mechanics, electricity, low and high level computing, so technical above all.
 We are not a big team, we could have taken a picture of a meeting of friends by giving them a jersey with the same logo as some do on this site ...

 If you want some particular plants/trees to appear in the first release, you can send us your request with at least 50 pictures (leaves, flower, fruit, trunk, general appearance, small, medium and large size and if there are plants/trees that look like but are not the ones you want) per plant you want

 Why we ask for money in Kickstarter:
 -To validate the development of the applications by asking your interest, a kind of market survey.
 -To buy a big computer to make the learning of the neural network which is very greedy in resources and time.
 The experts could tell us to use the Google servers which propose in rent by the hour of the servers to make the training, but as everyone knows Google is a trader before all, the confidentiality for Google does not mean anything, it is placed above the states and the laws...

  Please note that the designer is not responsible for the use of these applications.
 The data provided will be extracted from the internet or provided by an amateur, they are given as an indication, the user is the only one responsible for the possible consequences of their uses.

FOR SALE BY DRIVER was created in first instance, based on the Uber Houses model www.uberhouses.com, as our unrequested proposal to Uber.










Nevertheless, we are to launch our real-time real estate software in coordination with real estate associations around the world, prior to enter the U.S. market, rebranded as FOR SALE BY DRIVER.

Introducing For Sale By Driver. A challenge to traditional real estate franchises. A new opportunity for drivers, bikers and anybody to generate income. This time, from real-time real estate services.





No previous contact, just request a free pick up now and a Driver or Agent Driver will take you to showings immediately.
NEW Investors: Low-cost investment model in real estate services avail. to public.

record.Creator: LuckyBot
record.Title: LuckyBot – An Affordable Food Extruder for FDM 3D Printer
record.Text:
Just One LuckyBot, Turn Your Original FDM 3D Printer to A "Food 3D Printer" !
Printing food is an interesting idea, but the food 3D printers on the market are too expensive. What we want is a flexible solution for food 3D printing, so we create LuckyBot - a replaceable 3D printer extruder. You can easily install it on your original 3D FDM printer, and print food in the shape you want in a flexible & affordable way.




















Not everyone could cook like a Michelin star chef, but what if we bring the 3D print technology to your kitchen? You can print all the exquisite desserts with your 3D printer, easy same as you use it to print filament.
That's why we create LuckyBot. It is compatible with most of the FDM 3D printers on the market. Just take a few minutes to install, then you can have a food 3D printer at a small cost.











LuckyBot is designed with a perfect size that is enough to fit most of FDM 3D printers on the market and utilize the printing size of the original 3D printer to allow you to print bigger size models.
Only 675g weight makes it fit your FDM 3D printer and not exceeding the limits of the motor's capacity.













Frosted texture shell





3D Logo





Digital Screen Display





Magnetic Temperature Control Door and High-Precision Screw





Metal Plunger





Stainless Steel Nozzle







1.  Remove the original extruder
2.  Replace with LuckyBot
3.  Connect LuckyBot and original 3D Printer



LuckyBot Installation


LuckyBot Installation Video Based On Creality Ender-3 3D Printer:







You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00




































Three buttons to handle temperature control, lead screw adjustment with ease, no matter you are a professional or newbie, it only needs few minutes to get started.
As for the software part, you can follow the same procedures as you print filament to operate LuckyBot.










LuckyBot supports the printing of a variety of ingredients for any model you create, so you have more choices and more creativity. Whether it's an expensive ingredient like chocolate, or a widely available ingredients like jam, cream, mashed potato, salad sauce, etc.










We've tested various major brands' 3D printers to make sure that LuckyBot could be installed on most of FDM 3D printers.
LuckyBot can be installed on:










What makes LuckyBot unique is the technology inside. With our years of development, it has better temperature system, motion control system, and advanced circuit control system. You can print more complex and precise objects than using other food printers.

Precise Temperature Control System

The temperature is the most important factor when we print food. With the advanced temperature control algorithm, we have improved the temperature control accuracy within ±0.5℃.



LuckyBot Precise Temperature Control System




Advanced Motor Control System

Food is different from filament in many physical properties. We will need a better motor control system to print food with the same accuracy.



LuckyBot Advanced Motor Control System







LuckyBot is designed for food printing. Safety is the priority when we design LuckyBot, and all the materials are food grade. However, to make it could be used by everyone, we have enhanced the safety in power supply and temperature control. We ensure all ingredients completely sealed and do not touch the outside world during the whole printing process.


Auto stop

LuckyBot will automatically stop heating when open the door.







Lower temperature

Unlike the normal FDM 3D printers, which use filament as materials, needing a higher temperature to print, LuckyBot works under a much lower temperature (≤40℃ ).

record.Creator: Joseph Issa
record.Title: CREATE A FUNCTIONAL 3D PRINTER WITH BUILDING BRICKS
record.Text:
ULIO 3D Brix ™  is truly an awesome fun project for everyone to enjoy playing with and learn from. 
We merged our childhood passion of brick-building and modern era 3D printing into a functional model 3D printer that you build brick by brick.

BEAUTIFUL BRICK MODEL (360) 





EASY TO ASSEMBLE 





Our step by step instructions will guide you through the entire assembly process just like any brick kit you've assembled when you were a kid.

COMPATIBLE WITH ALL MAJOR BRANDS






Our brickset contains over 850 parts of different shapes and sizes which are entirely compatible with all major brands.

PREASSEMBLED PARTS SNAP TOGETHER





No need to assemble any mechanical parts of the 3D printer. We've done all the heavy lifting for you so you can enjoy a hassle free assembly process that snaps together.

PREWIRED ELECTRONICS 






No need for wiring or soldering. Everything has been prewired. Once your 3D printer is assembled you only have to plug seven (7) terminals.

 A CAPABLE CARTESIAN 3D PRINTER 






We meticulously designed every piece of this Brick-built 3D printer to make it high quality and easy to use at a reasonable price point. Even though it's made out of bricks, it still delivers exceptionally high quality prints.                                     

 QUIET 3D PRINTER





We use Trinamic stepper drivers in order to enjoy a very quiet 3D printing experience.

TIMELAPSE




Music by Bensound

 PRINT QUALITY 





You'll be surprised by the print quality of this brick-built 3D printer. The layer resolution can be as low as 50 microns. (PRUSA mini on the Left, ULIO 3D Brix ™ on the Right)

DEFAULT SAFETY FEATURES 




We've included several safety features into the printer such as thermal runaway protection, steel baseplate printbed, Heat shield on the hotend, enclosed rack and pinion as well as fan guards.

STANDARD FILAMENT





You can use non-proprietary 1.75mm PLA filament which you load and unload automatically into the 3D printer. 

MADE IN CANADA 





ULIO 3D Brix ™ is designed and manufactured in Canada. Our capable team has experience in building and delivering 3D printer kits.

HAPPY BRICK BUILDING & 3D PRINTING





We sincerely hope you'll enjoy ULIO 3D Brix ™ as much as we loved creating and building it for you!

SPECIFICATIONS

Approximate physical dimensions: 10’’ x 10’’ x 16’’ 
Approximate weight : 9 lbs 
Power supply: cULus , CE certified
Power input : AC 110-220V,50-60 Hz 
Power output : DC 24V, 2.75 A 
Connectivity: USB 
Electronics: 8 Bit board with silent stepper drivers
Build platform: Buildtak sheet
Printing technology: Fused filament fabrication (FFF) 
Build volume: 4’’x 2’’x 2.5’’ 
Layer resolution: 50-300 microns 
Filament diameter: 1.75 mm 
Nozzle diameter: 0.4 mm 
Firmware: Marlin 
OS compatibility: Windows and Mac 
File type: STL, OBJ

 BACK US TODAY!

record.Creator: Sequent Microsystems
record.Title: Raspberry Pi Learning Kit with a Complete Node-RED Tutorial
record.Text:
I/O Interfaces using Raspberry Pi and Node-RED
Although the variety of sensors and actuators is almost unlimited, they can all be grouped in three categories, based on their electrical interfaces:
1. Serial communication - RS-485 is the dominant choice, due to its ability to support multiple devices with excellent noise immunity at long distances.
2. Digital inputs and outputs - From find simple switches, contacts and pushbuttons, to any circuit which can be powered by a relay.
3. Analog inputs and outputs - Temperature, pressure, humidity, level, position, light and other sensors. Motors, linear and rotary actuators, and many many other devices have analog inputs and outputs. The industry standards are 0-10V and 4-20mA current loops.
Raspberry Pi is a powerful and inexpensive programming platform, but it cannot connect to the physical world without additional hardware. 
This project brings to Raspberry Pi all the common interfaces needed to connect to the automation world:

One RS485 serial port
One PWM output capable of driving  a 5VDC/100mA motor
Four optically isolated contact closure inputs
Two relays capable of driving 8A and 24V loads with LED status
One 0-10V input and output
One 4-20mA input and output
On-board push-button
Four general purpose LEDs


Node-RED Programming
Node-RED is a programming tool for wiring together hardware devices, APIs and online services in new and interesting ways. It provides a browser-based editor that makes it easy to design flows using nodes from a large library covering a wide range of automation tasks.
Learning Kit native Node-RED nodes included in the repository make it easy to interface with the hardware.
Learning Card Block Diagram



I/O Learning Kit Block Diagram


Card Layout



Board Layout


Power Supply
The Learning Kit Card needs 5V/50mA to operate with the relays off, or 200mA with both relays on. It is powered from the Raspberry Pi through the GPIO connector.  A Raspberry Pi power supply able to provide minimum 3A is recommended.
RS485 Communication
The Card contains a standard RS485 transceiver which can be accessed by the serial port of the Raspberry Pi. MODBUS protocol can be run on Raspberry Pi to access industry standard sensors and actuators.
Pluggable Connectors
Pluggable connectors ease connecting the card to external devices.  All the connector plugs are included in your kit.
Display LEDs
Nine LEDs on the bottom edge of the card show you the status of the inputs and outputs. The leftmost LED shows when the power is connected to the board.
The next two LEDs, labeled IN1 and IN3, show the status of the corresponding opto-isolated digital inputs.
The middle four LEDs are general purpose. They can be connected in software to show the status of any input or output. They can also be programmed to light at a certain input or output level. For example, you can learn how to turn on a LED when a temperature reaches a threshold. You can also blink a led slower when a temperature is relatively low, and faster as it approaches a preset limit.
The two rightmost LEDs are routed to the corresponding relays and show when the relay coil is activated.
0-10V Input and Output
Zero to 10V Input can be used to sense voltage levels from devices such as thermistors, humidity sensors, or photoresistors. Zero to 10V output can be used for actuating industry standard devices such as lighting controller.
4-20mA current loop Input and Output
Widely used industry standard 4-20mA current loops can be used to control remote devices over long distances with high noise immunity.
Push Button
A pushbutton is provided to be able to add manual input to any system. The button can also be used by Node-RED or other Raspberry Pi programming in an arbitrary manner.  The first Tutorial lesson gives some examples from saying "Hello World" to sending SMS or email messages.
PWM Motor
The Motor port can drive a 5V/100mA DC Motor. You can learn how to control the speed and the direction of the motor from the command line, Python or Node-Red graphical user interface.
Last Moment Adition: Two Servo Interfaces
See Update #2
What's in your Kit
1. Raspberry Pi Learning Card



Learning Kit Card


 2. Connector Plugs

Two 2 pin plugs for the RS485 port and micromotor.
Eight 3 pin plugs for the inputs and outputs




Learning Kit Connector Plugs


 3. Brass standoffs, screws and nuts



Mounting Hardware


 4. Self Test Loopback Cable



Self Test Loopback Cable


DOWNLOADS
1. Command Line Interface
2. Python Interface
3. Hardware Schematics
4. User's Guide
5. Node-RED Tutorial
I/O Accessories Add-on
The optional Add-on kit contains six cable assemblies which let you experiment with the I/O interfaces of the Learning Kit. The Node-RED tutorial will have ample description of each interface, teaching you how to interact with it without writing a single line of code. Command line and Python drivers will also be available for each assembly.  Simply plug in the accessory plug into the corresponding port and run the software
1. ON-OFF-ON Switch. The switch can be used to read the contact closure inputs. 



ON-OFF-ON Switch for the I/O Learning Card


 2. Thermistor.  The thermistor can be used to measure ambient temperature using the 0-10V input. 



Thermistor for the I/O Learning Card


 3. Photoresistor. The photoresistor will let you measure light. You can use it to turn lights on at dark, to see when somebody enters a room, or for any application which needs light. It can be read also with the 0-10V input.



Photoresistor for the I/O Learning Card


 4. Potentiometer.  Used also with the 0-10V input, the potentiometer will let you simulate the analog output of a sensor which you can display in Node-RED.



Potentiometer for the I/O Learning Card


5. RS485 Temperature and Humidity Sensor.  Plug it into the RS485 port for data, and the 4-20mA port for power, and use Node-RED to interface to it.



RS485 Temperature and Humidity Sensor for the I/O Learning Card


6. Micromotor. Plug it into the MOTOR port and control the speed and direction from Node-RED.



Micromotor for the I/O Learning Card


Project Requirements
In addition to the I/O Learning Kit, you will need the following:
1. Raspberry Pi. The Learning Card will work with any Raspberry Pi version 3 or 4, but we recommend using the latest (4). Make sure you get a power supply and an SD Card. If you have never programmed the SD Card, you should get it pre-programmed for the Raspberry Pi of your choice.
2. USB keyboard and mouse.
3. Monitor or TV with an HDMI port.
4. DVM multimeter.
5. Optional IO Accessory Add-on Kit
Self Test with the Loopback Cable
The I/O Learning Card can be self tested with the loopback cable included in your kit. The Loopback Cable can be plugged into corresponding connectors on the opposite sides of the card. After inserting the Test Cable in one of the four possible positions, you need to run the Self Test command  from the command line, or from Node-RED.
1. Test digital inputs IN1 and IN2 using RELAY-1.



I/O Learning Kit Self Test #1


2. Test digital inputs iN2 and IN4 using RELAY-2



I/O Learning Kit Self Test #2


3. Test 0-10V-IN port using 0-10V-OUT



I/O Learning Kit Self Test #3



4. Test 4-20mA-IN port using 4-20mA-OUT



I/O Learning Kit Self Test #4


Analog Inputs and Outputs Calibration
All the analog inputs and outputs are calibrated at the factory, but firmware commands permit the user to re-calibrate the board, or to calibrate it to better precision. See the User's Guide for calibration details.
Node-RED Tutorial for the Learning Kit
The Tutorial will help you use the Learning Kit with Node-RED without writing a single line of code. It will show you how to use Node-RED to control each of the interfaces of the Learning Kit. It will start by building simple flows using the pushbuttons and the LEDs and advance to the point where you can control devices over the internet. 
You can start learning Node-RED today without waiting for the Learning Kit. You will start by sending "Hello World" greetings to your screen or your speakers, and advance to sending emails and SMS messages to your smart phone.
CLICK HERE TO DOWNLOAD THE FIRST THREE CHAPTERS
Node-RED Tutorial Table of Contents



Node-RED Tutorial Chapters 1-3






Node-RED Tutorial Chapters 4-7





Node-RED Tutorial Chapters 8-12


 Learning Kit in the News
Raspberry Pi add-on teaches Node-RED I/O programming

record.Creator: Bubl
record.Title: Bubl Music
record.Text:
What is Bubl?   
Available in 2022 for Android and iOS devices, Bubl combines intelligent discovery, next generation music content streaming and social features designed to bring fans, artists, labels and (in the future) venues from around the world together over their love of music. Think Spotify x Facebook x Patreon x Tinder (for music, not love!). 
Bubl's design means that music tracks / videos, photos, videos, events, tickets, merchandise, live streams, group chats, fan content and more are all under one 'roof'. No more switching between different applications to find that song you wanted to share with your friends, no more missing those important releases or announcements. 
For artists, there's a free platform for exposure to global audiences, versatility in how you make your music available and new ways to engage with your fans. On top of that, we pledge to put more in your pocket with unique, innovative revenue opportunities. 
It's time music fans really had something to sing about!



Share your music as well as your music content with friends and followers





Artist can now share they music alongside their social content


Why Bubl?
Let's start with our mission statement:

To make discovering and enjoying music easier and more flexible for listeners
To give artists better opportunities to grow their fanbase and revenues
To create a safe, social space that fully supports the music community

In early 2021, Bubl was born; largely out of frustration. Frustration at the lack of a centralised app for all your music needs, and frustration with music streaming and social media platforms. 
Regardless of what tech companies developed, finding new music, supporting your favourite artists, and connecting with fans of the same kind of music we love wasn't easy and meant switching constantly between several apps. 
Meanwhile, artists are seeing their revenues cut, promotion only seems to go to the top 1% and social platforms have become hotbeds for hate and vitriol. And the owners of these existing platforms? Well, they seemed to be getting richer off the very artists (and rights holders) who are often struggling to make ends meet.
At Bubl, we believe it's time for change; time to better look-after the music we love and cherish so much. None of us at Bubl want to be billionaires and we aren't looking to exploit artists in the pursuit of wealth. Our business model reflects this, and has been designed and created to ensure as much of the money from sales and streams goes straight back to the artist. 
Discovery mode generates NO revenue for Bubl; we don't charge artists or listeners, nor will you find adverts. It is simply a product born out of desire - the desire to make connecting artists and new fan bases less challenging. 
We have spent the past 6 months designing, specifying, and planning this project meticulously. It's hugely ambitious. But so are we.

The Bubl Team 
Headquartered in London, and with remote offices in Brighton and Serbia, Bubl was founded by music lovers and technology industry 'veterans' who are passionate about creating better opportunities for music fans and artists alike. 
With backgrounds in social gaming (EA, Warner Bros, Microsoft, Zynga), artist management, TV / broadcast and development of live music streaming platforms (one of our team built the Apple iTunes Festival streaming service) and dating / community tools, we have the tools, skills and know-how to deliver what we believe will revolutionise music streaming and social media. 
For more information about the leadership team, please visit our LinkedIn Page: 
Bubl on LinkedIn 

Why Kickstarter?
At Bubl, we chose to launch on the Kickstarter platform for two main reasons: 
1) The Kickstarter platform gives us access to a global, engaged audience of early-adopter consumers looking for the next big thing. Our team and our supporters believe Bubl can change how we consume, share and support music for the better, and we think the Kickstarter platform is a good place to find like-minded folks.
2) By raising funds via Kickstarter, we are able to retain our independence and engage in a meaningful way with our backers. This seems particularly relevant in the context of music, but we want to only answer to the community we pledge to serve and support; no external bias from investors or those with an interest beyond supporting ALL artists. 

What Is The Funding For?
The money raised through this campaign will be used to pay for the following:

Developmental costs - manpower in the form of our team in Serbia building Bubl
Ongoing system costs - data centre / server costs, various business systems
Operations costs - Bubl will need legal, financial and licensing support. Not cheap!
Artists Revenue - Bubl Credits sold translate to artist revenue as music is streamed


Beyond our £350,000 goal, we have stretch goals which will expedite the development and release of future 'modules'. For more on this see below (Timings & Release Plan) 

Core Product Features:
Bubl is built around three core features: discovery, streaming and social engagement

Discovery




For Listeners
Bubl’s takes music fans on a journey to unearth new artists and tracks - for free.
Enter your search criteria and let Bubl’s intelligent Discovery Mode find new tracks and artists to fall in love with.
Create different Discovery ‘journeys’ and discover a variety of new music. As time passes, Bubl will update your journeys with new tracks, ensuring there’s always new music to enjoy.

For Artists
Bubl gives artists the opportunity to be heard on what is the world's first free music discovery platform. 
Reach new audiences and showcase up to five songs to a global audience whilst providing background information, lyrics and meaning to songs.
Discovery Mode is optional, ad-free, and Bubl will NEVER charge artists to be heard, nor charge listeners to enjoy new music in Discovery Mode. 
Note: Listeners will only be able to listen to tracks once in Discovery mode, and no royalty payments are paid for plays in this feature. 

Streaming




For listeners
Music lovers can listen to songs, watch music videos, create and share playlists with friends and groups, and enjoy other artist-exclusive content. 
On top of enjoying music for free in Discovery Mode, Bubl offers music made freely available by artists for a limited time or number of plays. 
We understand that not everyone wants, or is able to purchase a recurring subscription, which is why we have created Bubl’s unique pay-per-play ‘Jukebox’ system. This allows music fans to purchase Bubl Credits from the app store and enjoy all premium content. 
Last but not least, fans can now get even closer to the artists they love with Artist VIP Passes. Gain access to exclusive content as well as early access to new music, gig tickets, merchandise, live streams and more. 

For Artists 
Bubl gives artists and rights holders multiple ways of hosting music, as well as the opportunity to earn industry leading royalties. This flexibility gives less-established artists further opportunities to grow their audience easily and for free. 

 Discovery - The effortless way to reach new audiences. Artists can showcase up to 5 songs at a time. Each song in Discovery can only be heard once per listener.
 Free - Artists can choose not to monetise portions of their catalogue, allowing new listeners the chance to enjoy their music freely for a period of time or number of unique plays (streams).
 Premium - Bubl Credit holders, Bubl subscribers* & VIP Pass Holders**
 VIP Pass - Exclusive content available only to artist VIP Pass holders

VIP Pass brings a new revenue opportunity and genuine ways to reward your most loyal fans. Give VIPs early access to music, merchandise and tickets, access to your exclusive content such as tracks, interviews, music videos, rehearsals, live streams, Q&As and more. YOU are the artist, YOU are in control.   
*Subscription launch TBC
** Access to artist catalogue via VIP Pass dependent on rights holders permission. 

Social



Built for the global music community, Bubl is designed to bring like-minded music lovers, artists, fans, labels, venues, music instructors and more together to discover and share new music, to support musicians, and to help better plan events.
Bubl makes the sharing and celebration of music safe and easy, while providing artists a meaningful way of growing and engaging with a global fanbase.

Revenue Opportunities
Bubl provides new, unique revenue streams for artists and increased royalty payments for rights holders.

JukeBox (Pay per play)
Rights holders will earn a penny per stream* via Jukebox mode. Founding artists will benefit from an existing 'economy' from day one, with Bubl Credits being awarded with listener and artist tiers.
*UK penny (£0.01) / US $0.014¢ (at time of press)

VIP Pass (£3.99* / month per artist)
For the most loyal fans, VIP Passes grant access to all Exclusive content, and in many cases, access to the artist's entire catalogue. Artists will earn £2.50 / VIP Pass holder per month, with £0.44 going to Bubl, and the rest going to the taxman / payment provider. Think of this a bit like Patreon, but alongside your music and social content.
*US $5.49 / month per artist

For Labels / Rights Holders
Quite simply, Bubl pays more per stream than other established platforms. Add unlimited free uploads for 12 months / life, meaningful social interactions with label followers, the support for physical sales in the future, and you've got a platform designed to fully support you and the artists you represent. 
For more information please visit our artist page.

Timings & Release Plan*
Nov 30th 2021 - Kickstarter Campaign ends
April 2022 - Beta Live - access for those with a Backstage pass
May 2022 - Music content upload opens for day one Artists / Labels
June 2022 - Day One release to all day one Listeners / Artists and Labels
July 2022 - Remaining backers (non-day one) invited in & Bubl available globally 
August 2022+ - Further features added based on Bubl community feedback
* FullTimings TBC & subject to change

Minimum Viable Product (MVP)
Reaching the funding goal will enable the completion and release of Bubl's MVP, consisting of the following features:

Discovery Mode - Find and enjoy new music for free
Streaming - Listen to artists, share music and playlists within Bubl
Social - Basic features (add friends, follow artists, post engagement)


Beyond the MVP / Feature Voting
Beyond this initial funding goal, we will commit to developing additional features post-launch including: 

Subscriptions*
Merchandising & Physical sales
Video live-streaming
Music venue integrations
Deeper social functionality (event planning, creation of listening circles etc)

Each of the above features is roughly the same in terms of integration / development, so Bubl can commit to building and supporting one of these for every £100,000 we raise beyond our campaign target. 

Example - Kickstarter campaign raises £650,000, we commit to delivering the MVP in August 2022, and three further features, as chosen via a vote by the Bubl community. 

The order they will release in will be up to the global Bubl community, and how members choose to exercise their vote, which will take place in-app. (Bubl members must have Voting right in order to vote) 

Why are we doing this? Well, we are confident we are building a beautiful, easy to use app, but we are also conscious that the Bubl community will have their own ideas and needs - so we want to make sure that we are addressing those needs and supporting the very community we are building in every way possible.

*Subscriptions will go live when Bubl has a set volume of content on the platform vs as a result of a vote.

Rewards
Back Stage - Limited access to pre-release, Beta versions of Bubl. Help our developers ensure a stable, premium experience by providing feedback and reporting issues.
Jam Session - You're invited to a video meeting (or two) with the founder of Bubl. We will give you the chance to learn more about the platform, to share your thoughts and ask any questions you may have. Guitars optional. 
Gold Circle Ticket - Download and experience Bubl from day one as a listener. Make friends and discover new music before the rest of the world is let in.
Main Stage Slot - As an artist, this gives you day one access and the chance to be one of the first to be heard on the Bubl*. 
Day 1 Label Status - We're not just another DSP, and you're not going to want to miss the chance of being on Bubl from day one.* 
General Admission - Once all day one members have been granted access, those with General Admission permitted to log in and use Bubl.
VIP Pass (1 Month) - A month's access to any artist's VIP content. For those purchasing tiers with multiple VIP Passes, you can choose to support one artist for several months, or several artists at once - the choice is yours.
Jukebox Plays - Bubl Credits allow you to listen to Premium content on the platform, without the need for a subscription. 1 Credit = One play. Like a digital Jukebox.
Distribution Deal - For artists, labels and rights-holders, we are offering fee-free uploads for 12 months and for life. Quite simply, it won’t cost you any money to upload your music tracks - whether that’s an EP or a host of compilation albums.
Voting @ Band Meeting - As described above (Beyond the MVP / Feature Voting) we will ask the Bubl community to make decisions around the design and development of the app. If you have a vote, you are invited to help decide how Bubl grows. 
Name(s) on the List - Bit like a nightclub, but without the scary bouncers. If you have this, you will have your name / artist name / label name in the credits. Forever. It’s a small thing, but we want to ensure the world is aware that you helped bring Bubl to life.
Ticket for a Friend - What would a social platform be without your friends? With an extra invite you can introduce your friends to Bubl and get them discovering great new music in no time. All invited friends will have day one access, but NOT voting rights.
Exclusive Merchandise - Unique, digital items to adorn your listener, artist and label profiles. Show the world that you were one of the first on the platform. Badges and their designs will vary by tier. The designs are still TBD, but these launch badges will not be available once the Kickstarter campaign ends. 
Bubl Fanzine - Our music newsletter to keep up to date with all the goings on at Bubl with band features, development updates, offers and news.
*Labels and Artists will be invited to upload content 1 month prior day one.

record.Creator: Christian Gentile
record.Title: Psykoboard
record.Text:
Psykoboard is an innovative multifunctional electric skateboard/scooter that respects the environment, built by hand by means of the AUTOCLAVE processing, it is entirely in Carbon fiber (material that can be reused indefinitely, light and performing) the powerful electric motors are placed in the wheels and the battery it is easily replaceable and recharges in a short time. The Design is Made in Italy, the peculiarity also lies in the design that allows it to be used also as a wake skate or snow skate, moreover from this year Psykoboard has an added value: we have created the stick / handlebar, to transform it into a perfect scooter.


























You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.

00:00




































It can also be used when it rains and with puddles, as its peculiarity is that it is the first electric skateboard in the world with integrated splash guard, that is, you do not get wet when riding in the wet.
 It is a perfect SMART MOBILITY.






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00
































 The electronic system and electric motors are completely waterproofed since the motor is housed inside the wheels, with a cooling system and self-regenerative braking, to recharge the Li-Poly battery.
 A comparison with the internal electric brushless wheel motors, and the brushless motors of other existing electric skateboards, Psykoboard's motors generate less heat, are protected from dust and water (waterproof level IP65), with better performance, efficiency and reliability, therefore safety. at the top.
 The two brushless wheel motors guarantee an acceleration of starting torque and formidable climbing performance (climbing grade 25%) and the drive wheel tires are replaceable.
 The lightweight battery can be quickly replaced without any problems.
 Psykoboard skateboard is controlled by a remote control with excellent ergonomic design of modest size, it has multiple functions, such as two speeds, including normal and sport. The remote control directs forward or reverse gear equally. Due to this peculiarity Psykoboard can be used to drive with front or rear wheel drive depending on the needs being a "Twin Tip".
 The Psykoboard skate comes with a replacement tire for the drive wheels, battery charger, battery, rechargeable remote control and key to adjust the trucks.
Last year we had the honor of participating in a small appearance of the wonderful film "La Vita davanti a sè" by Eduardo Ponti with the great Sofia Loren who had an Oscar, golden globe and David di Donatello nomination.

record.Creator: Ben Izen
record.Title: Samurai 120 CNC Machine
record.Text:
We are back! After our last 2 Kickstarters failed over a year ago we went away and grew our Instagram page and continued to work on improving the machine.
We currently have a few generous people who have decided to spend over double the normal price on a machine just to help get us started. Thanks to their efforts we have already raised a total of £35,000! We decided to do a kickstarter because there may be other people who want to join in on the initial funding and any more sales will help us reduce the cost to manufacture and increase our chances of success.

If you would like to pay extra for an early machine please contact us first.







Gap in the market
For a long time Tormach and Taig have been the well know providers of small hobby cnc machines. We think its time for change.
While these two companies aim to provide beginner friendly, high quality, hobby machines, and do a great job at it, we want to sell a low cost, mini vmc.
Also lots of people are wasting time and money on their 'DIY CNC' or 'CNC Conversion' and we want to stop that. It sounds exciting at first but halfway through you realise that its going to take much more time and money than you expect and the result won't be as good as you expect.

We want to make a machine so affordable and desirable, that there is no reason to attempt a DIY CNC anymore.





VMC Prototype
























Featured on
















CNC Conversion Kit
Its basically a manual milling machine that you can convert to CNC by adding steppers and electronics. It can be shipped as a kit or mostly assembled so you can still get to experience the fun part of making your own machine. Assembling the machine yourself has the added benefit of teaching you how it works so if something needs to be replaced later, you will know exactly what to do.
The idea for the CNC Conversion kit actually came from a YouTube comment on our video. We think its a good place for us to start because there are few things to go wrong compared to making a complete vmc. It will also be the cheapest option and we want everyone to be able to experience this machines capability.




Nema 23 motor mounts









What can this machine cut?
This machine will cut practically any material a large VMC will cut, its just a question of how fast.
Below shows a production run I did of 100 airsoft gun parts in 7075T6 aluminium. This kind of job is normally left for the big VMC's to handle but this machine did it.



QTY100 7075 Aluminium G17 Slides







It took 7 minutes to rough out each of these parts, the final weight reduction was 80%.
We have tested this machine with hundreds of parts over the years, check out @izenengineering and @samurai_machine_tools to see just some of the parts we have made.
















You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.

There have been stressful times where I was late with an order and had to rough twice as fast to get it delivered the next day and this machine always just gets the job done. 
You can count on this machine for when it matters. Its earned its VMC title for that.



 This machine can pay for itself!
CNC machining has the potential to make you a lot of money. Whether you offer a service where you machine other peoples parts or you manufacture your own products at a fraction of the price, you could make a living with a machine like this. 



Xometry's partner program makes 16k in 7 days possible




Now I'm not gonna pretend that you could pay for this machine in a day, or a week or even a few months, especially if you are new to this, but if you are willing to put in the work it will be possible.
Unlike most DIY CNC's, you can be confident that the Samurai 120 will perform exceptionally, and will not suddenly stop working, which is crucial when using a machine to make money.


Servos
We know the struggles of using stepper motors so all our machines that include motors use JMC servos. They are tuned to optimise performance and improve crash safety.
Servos don't ever lose steps, and if they lose position (due to a crash) they send an alarm signal to the controller which e-stops the machine. They are also silent.



100w JMC Servo






180w Servo with brake









You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00


































Shielded way covers
Protecting the motion components is one of the most important aspect of any metal cutting machine. Leaving ballscrews exposed to metal chips will very quickly destroy them and give you low quality parts.
The prototype machine has accordion way covers on the Y axis and they work ok but its a bit annoying having to clean them constantly. For me it is not acceptable to sell a product that has an inherently annoying aspect so we are using covers with stainless steel shields.


















Machine Software
We will be using Mach 4 on all our CNC machines because it is the best software that runs on Windows in our experience. Mach 4 gives us the option to write our own scripts and design custom UI without having to spend thousands developing our own software.
Newfangled solutions also offer great support which is crucial to selling a CNC machine.






Motion control
We spent years looking for a motion controller for this machine and couldn't find one that was good enough so we are developing our own with the help of PoLabs. 

It will be capable of 8 axis Step/Direction control. 5 Axis for machine, 2 for the ATC, and 1 spare for anything you want. Maybe a parts loader...
20 outputs expandable up to 80
30 inputs expandable to, well infinity really.
USB or Ethernet connectivity
Galvanically isolated IO ports
Pendant support
LCD Port
PoBlocks graphical programming software









Prototype
This machine has been through hundreds of iterations over the years. I used this machine for a job shop business so any time there was something I didn't like, I would change it. I repeated that cycle for years and thats how we have ended up with an exceptional machine.
Apologies in advance for the poor quality images and messy workshop but when I was making this machine I had no intention of selling it so I didn't bother with fancy photos. I was also 18.
I should also note I built this entire thing by hand and with a £100 drill press. All the machined components (excluding spindle) were made by a crappier version of this machine.

Do Not try this at home... it was not fun. All the next machines will be made on a large VMC.














Frame assembled after about a week of drilling










Desperate times call for desperate measures 















Z Axis





All 3 Axis complete

This machine made this machine

Making parts for the door





Yes it actually looks this cool in real life, no colour editing here





Specs


























Initial batch
The initial batch price is double the normal price and for that you get a more rigid machine with servos and it should arrive much sooner, especially if you live in the UK. It won't be the best value for money, so only choose this option if you really want to support us and be a part of something new. This will be done separately to kickstarter.
Please contact us for more details.
samurai.machine.tools@gmail.com














Samurai Machine tools merch








Samurai Machine Tools Emblem





Similar example






BT30 Spindle






The hardest part of making a DIY CNC is the spindle. The market is currently full of large spindles from China, so if you need a small BT30 spindle for your machine look no further.


XYZ Axis
Don't want to pay full price for a machine? Pledging for just 1 axis at a time might be the best option for you.
The idea is that you buy the Y axis (base) for example and only pay £800. You can then assemble it and assess the quality and if you are happy you can order the rest of the machine. This is great for people who understandably don't want to risk all their money on kickstarter. 
Alternatively you could use it as a way to slowly upgrade your current DIY CNC. You could buy the spindle and attach it to your machine, then when you have saved up you could buy the Z axis (column) then base e.c.t.



Table and base (X and Y axis)





Z Axis (Column) Render*





X & Y Axis (Base & Table)  Render*





1.2Kw Spindle head




Samurai 120 CNC Conversion Kit
This is the first version of the machine we will be making because it is the cheapest and there's fewer things to go wrong. 
When you receive this machine you will have to assemble everything apart from the spindle. Then to get it working as a CNC machine you will need to add your own electronics. We will support you through this process.






What's included:

XYZ Axis and spindle head

Samurai 120 CNC

Automatic precise homing on all axis and spindle
Automatic tool height probe
Automatic crash detection
Overheat protection
USB or Ethernet PC connectivity for increased reliability

5 Axis capability
PoKeys 8 Axis CNC motion controller, with 80+ outputs and 100+ inputs
Mach 4 hobby licence
E-stop, start, pause buttons included
BT30 6000rpm
Pneumatic drawbar
Linear rails on all axis
C7 Ballscrews on all axis
High performance grease lubrication
Flood coolant capable
Rigid tapping
Steel clad way covers
Fixture plate built into table
280x190x220mm XYZ travel (11x7.5x8.6")
350mm (13.5") Spindle nose to table




Samurai 120 VMC
This is the full package. ATC, enclosure, flood coolant, touchscreen, lights, chip management, stand. Basically everything you would find in a typical VMC, just much smaller and much cheaper.
We are currently not making this version of the machine, but it will be available Q3 2022. 
However if you pledge for a cnc or conversion kit you will later have the option to upgrade to the VMC.





Standard VMC Features (coming later):

Water-resistant enclosure
Chip management
Infinite life chip filter
Flood coolant
14 Position ATC
Machine stand
Touchscreen
Built in computer
WIFI
Internal monitoring camera
Remotely control machine from anywhere in the world
Email / text alerts for crashes or other errors
2 Lighting modes
Power monitor



Add-ons
ATC - £1500
The ATC is something we are currently developing and it is in the early prototype stage. When complete it should be capable of tool to tool in 6 seconds and hold 14 tools.
You will be able to attach it to any of our cnc machines.

Servos - £400
2x 100w JMC integrated servos
1x 180w JMC integrated servo with brake

First part kit - £500
Includes everything needed to make a part, which is a tool tightening fixture.
1x Precision Vice
1x BT30 tool holder
5x Vertex ER Collets
5x High quality end mills appropriate for the job
5x Aluminium billets
1x Small air compressor
Support through the process and instruction videos.











Right to repair
We think customers should have the right to repair any product they own. Also with a CNC machine it is much easier to find faults and fix them with new parts unlike a smartphone or any other device.
This machine has been designed to make assembly and disassembly relatively easy, but more importantly, the most expensive component on this machine costs just £200. That means if there is ever an issue with anything, its likely that you will only be set back £200 at most, and thats something completely new to the industry.
Also the total cost of all the bearings is £200, that means in a few years when the machine is near the end of its life you can replace all bearing components for £200 and the machine will be as good as new.






Unlike most companies, we charge less money for replacement parts than they cost us. That way if you need to buy a replacement part, we lose money, and therefore there is no conflict of interest. Many other companies charge way too much on replacement parts, essentially making money from that, therefore they have no interest to make a more reliable product since they make money when something goes wrong.




What is required for us to make the machines?
We are past the prototyping stage, and the final CAD models are mostly completed, but there is still some work to do to ensure the models are perfect. The next thing to do is order the components from china, give the go ahead to our UK manufacturers, and make some of the aluminium parts ourselves. The only thing we haven't decided on yet is the material for the sheet metal. Its likely to be 5051 but we are considering SS304 or Aluminized steel for increased durability.



Mild steel base that will be CNC Machined


A production prototype will be made and tested to ensure all the improvements from the prototype don't have any negative effects and if all is good the rest of the machines will be made.






Failure
We all know Kickstarter is notorious for having failed projects and we don't want to follow that trend. With the initial batch, we can actually guarantee your machine will be made, and if not, you will get a full refund.
For the Kickstarter machines to be made, we will need to make a total of 40 sales by September 2022. Previously it would have been difficult for us to guarantee that but we are very quickly growing our Instagram page and are finding new potential buyers every week. Also when the Initial batch machines are delivered that will convince a lot more people to buy.


Payment
Kickstarter payments are done through bank transactions and there is not the option for PayPal. You will only be charged at the end of the campaign so please make sure your card has sufficient funds by that time (1st December).

Payment for the initial batch will be done via PayPal invoice and there will be the option for financing. 


Shipping
While we do offer worldwide shipping, there is currently a huge supply chain issue in the global economy and that will slow things down. As a result, we are not including the shipping price in the pledge amount so you will have to pay for that after the campaign. The price may range from £400-1000 and lead time is not guaranteed right now. If you need a machine urgently you may be able to pay extra for faster delivery.
What we can guarantee however is that the machines will be made in just a few months so if the situation does improve you may receive a machine much sooner than you expect.

Warranty
You will get one year warranty on your Samurai for parts that unexpectedly fail. However it is expected that ballscrews and other bearings will wear down according to how you use the machine.
All parts to the machine will be available on our website and installation instructions will also be available.

record.Creator: Benjamin Enrique Alvarado
record.Title: Chronicle - Keep Track of Your Chronic
record.Text:
Chronicle is a quick, simple approach to logging and rating your favorite strains of cannabis. Keep track of what you like, weed out what you don’t.







You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































What we are building:
A digital journal that keeps track of your chronic, Chronicle simplifies the cannabis rating and logging process. It’s easy to access your favorite products and strains, so you are prepared for your next dispensary visit.



1 Type in Strain or Product; 2 Give Your Rating; 3 Log Added to Library



Step 1 Type in your strain or product
Step 2 Rate your high
Step 3 Log is added to your Library


As the cannabis industry evolves, there has been an increased understanding of cannabinoids and their effects. Simply put, cannabis affects everyone differently. The typical sativa, indica and hybrid indicators generally aren't enough to help you figure out if you’ll enjoy a particular strain. Two common responses from people who have tried cannabis are that they’ve felt sleepy or paranoid. Keeping track of strains they’d rather avoid would make many people’s cannabis journeys much smoother.

Some Features Include:

Ability to Add More Details to your logs




Add more details about your high, the type of high and much more.



Badges & Rewards 




Earn Badges and Rewards as you log your strains and more.



Browse Your Strains and products with various filter systems




Filter through your logs by rating, date of purchase and much more.



Activity Feed




Activity feed for updates from your favorite dispensaries, brands and your friends!



Discounts On Swag + Chronicle Tokens 




With earned Chronicle Points, get discounts on Chronicle Swag in the shop.


More Features To Come:

Analytics & Report Read Outs of your Favorite Strains/Products
Grocery List
Terpene Profiling


Why we are building Chronicle:
Twenty years ago, cannabis was illegal in all 50 states. Two decades later, we are inching our way closer to federal legalization, with more than a third of U.S. states legalizing both medicinal and recreational adult use. What does that mean? An influx of cannabis information, products, strains and terminology have made their way into everyday conversation and consumption.
When I moved to Colorado, I experienced this firsthand; I was completely overwhelmed by the amount of products available. I thought, how can one keep track of every product they consume? How can you remember to not purchase a strain that once made you feel paranoid? I wanted a quick and easy tool to keep track of what I like, and with the incorporation of a rating system, weed out what I don’t.
My partner Travis's late father attempted to learn more about medical marijuana but found it uncomfortable to walk into a modern dispensary with no cannabis knowledge. He was overwhelmed by all of the products. The information given to him by budtenders did not match his personal experience with cannabis strains and products, and he began journaling his cannabis journey to discover his preferences himself.
Together, Travis and I felt Chronicle was a product that could benefit all types of cannabis consumers — even the experienced cannabis user. We've been running the cannabis design agency Resin Refinery together for three years, with the goal of reducing the stigma surrounding cannabis brands. We have helped dispensaries and brands appeal to the modern cannabis consumer and now feel that we can make a larger impact directly helping cannabis consumers. Our design and development skills allowed us to create Chronicle with no starting capital.
At this point, 75% of the base functionality is in the Chronicle app, with just minor backend work remaining. We have our app flow finished and now just need to clean up the design and experience.
Our budget will primarily be used for marketing purposes. Because cannabis isn't federally legal, social media platforms have yet to update their content policies to reflect legalization in large portions of the country — making it difficult for cannabis-related companies to effectively market their products. Therefore our efforts will be accomplished by partnering with the right influencers and promoting posts.


Early Bird Supporter:



For our limited Early Bird Supporters- You will receive our Limited Edition Orange Chronicle Hat, A personal thank you from the founders, Access to our Discord group + our Chronicle Sticker Pack


Early Bird Super Fan:



For our limited Early Bird Super Fans - You will receive a personal Thank You Note from our founders, BETA Access to Chronicle(Prior to official launch), Access to our Private Discord Group, Chronicle Swag Backpack, Black Beanie, Limited Edition Orange/Grey Hat, Black Chronicle Ceramic Campfire Coffee Mug, Orange Chronicle Coffee Mug, Limited Edition Orange Chronicle Hoodie



Tier 1 Rewards:



Tier 1 Rewards will receive early access to Chronicle prior to our official launch as well as their name in the credits of the app


Tier 2 Rewards:



Tier 2 Rewards will have their profile added to our community page, receive a Chronicle sticker + Tier 1 Rewards


Tier 3 Rewards:



Tier 3 Rewards will receive a Chronicle Fanny Pack and a Founding Member Badge + Tier 1 & 2 Rewards


Tier 4 Rewards:



Tier 4 Rewards will receive an embroidered Chronicle hat, a personal thank you from the founders, access to our private Discord group, a Chronicle sticker pack, + Tiers 1-3 Rewards


Tier 5 Rewards:



Tier 5 Rewards will receive a Black/Orange Chronicle Hoodie, Black/Orange Chronicle Hat, Black Chronicle Ceramic Campfire Coffee Mug  + Tiers 1-4 Rewards [MASON JAR SET NOT INCLUDED PER KICKSTARTER POLICY]]


Tier 6 Rewards:



Tier 6 Rewards will receive a Limited Edition Orange Chronicle Shirt, Black/Orange Beanie, Exclusive Wall Art by one of Founders, Orange Chronicle Coffee Mug, Exclusive Chronicle Branded Duffle Bag  + Tiers 1-5 Rewards

record.Creator: SUNLU OFFICIAL
record.Title: SUNLU FilaDryer S2: Effective Support 3D Printer Creation
record.Text:
Countdown to Start















      ───── "Hi, Kickstarter! This is SUNLU official group. As a good supporter of the 3D printing industry, SUNLU strongly recommends all 3D fans join our New FilaDryer S2 crowdfunding because we try our best to bring high-quality machines to everyone as the vision of SUNLU“Technology Enabling Creation Easier.”

SUNLU appreciates all people who accompany us growing up on the 3D road together. As the development in the 3D industry, SUNLU has more than 30 warehouses across the countries. We try to reach every 3D lover from the whole world by setting up the website: www. sunlu.com. 

Also, we expand social media into Facebook, Instagram, Youtube, Twitter, Tiktok, Reddit, and Snapchat as well. You can find us by searching @SUNLUOFFICIAL. Please join SUNLU's big family!










To prevent moisture, each 3D printing filament is dried and vacuumed before shipping. Because of the printing effect, the dampened filaments are unsatisfactory. However, we cannot predict if the filaments can be finished at once, so the rest of the filaments will be dampened. When using the remaining filaments again, it feels like you are having bread that has been exposed in the air all night long. You can have it, but the taste is terrible.





1)   360 ° constant temperature










Because of the printing effect, the dampened filaments are unsatisfactory. Therefore, as we expected, SUNLU created New Filament Dryer S2.  Compare to the first generation, S2 has a round inner box that has 360 ° constant temperature and uniform heating

2) All-around Double Heating Plates Increase the Temperature Up to 70 Degrees










Moreover, the design of upper and lower double heating plates increased 30% heating efficiency, so the heating temperature was from a standard 50° C to 70°C which is 20° C higher than similar products on the market. Because the heating speed is more complete and fast, the limitation does not restrict the filament surface. Also, S2 can accept more kinds of filaments and is not limited to several common types. Also, S2 not only can shorten the length of drying consumables into two hours but also dry high-end filaments such as PA/PC.

3)  Touch-screen 










3.42*2.87inch smart touch screen within 0.1-second touch feedback. It can be accurately set even under poor lighting conditions. You can set up the temperature, duration, consumable type, and lighting as well.

4)  Automatically Setting Temperature and Times















After the test, the best drying time and temperature are summarized, like PLA, TPU, and PETG, etc. Which reduced the workload of searching consumables setting dates. Cutimazize temperature and times at the touch of a button through the touchscreen.

5)  Anti-skid-properties










Increasing the bottom-supported by adding four feet in the bottom can improve the function of anti-skid.

6) Avoid the Heating Conduction










The four feet in the bottom does not only improve the functionality of anti-skid but also avoids the heat conduction to other objects by adding more space between product and surface.

S2 has even more accomplishments. I'm keeping it a secret as long as crowdfunding develops. We are very welcome your perspective, suggestions, and comments. Also, your advice motivates us to improve!































 SUNLU has its own proprietary intellectual property patent formula and its own professionally developed production line. It has a wide range of applications. The product has successfully passed RoHS and other test certifications. Through independent innovation, it has obtained several national technology patent certificates and awards in the 3D printing industry at an international leading level. Moreover, SUNLU has over 30 warehouses across the countries. It continues to expand the business area. 

























                                   TIMELINE






































This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 2,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $900M raised between them.

record.Creator: Step2Gold
record.Title: Ta-Da Chair | Smart Folding Chair That Keeps Pace With You
record.Text:
When it comes to outdoor activities, we all know how much we appreciate gears that are efficient, lightweight and versatile to save us from hassle.
Whether you want to take a short break during the hike, stay put to capture the perfect shot or wait patiently while fishing, it is when quick and comfortable seating comes in handy. Ta-Da Chair Series 2 is the ideal essential for those who seek portability and functionality. 





When stashed, It serves as a hiking stick with a comfortable grip; and to make it a chair, it takes only a second to set up. Let us show you how fast and easy it is to set it up!





Ta-Da Chair Series 2 is perfect for all kinds of outdoor activities: camping, hiking, beach trips, picnics, festivals and concerts - you name it!
It folds slim into a hiking stick that boasts extra mobility and won’t occupy any precious space in your backpack when you’re out there venturing. Grab a chair and enjoy the moment. Wherever, whenever!





Key Features

 Instant Set Up: Easy unfold & take down in 1 second
 Lightweight Durability: Aviation-grade aluminum alloy material weighs less than 1kg (2.1 lbs)
 Robust Structure: Steady & high weight capacity that holds up to 130kg (286.6 lbs)
 Ergonomic Seating Height: 50cm (19.6") above the ground, effortless sit down & quick get up
 Solid Seat: Firm seating without sinking in
 Versatile Use: Double as a hiking stick that takes no extra space in your backpack
 Easy Storage & Carry: Every chair comes with a FREE storage bag







A simple design is not equal to compromising on the details. In order to be comfortable from sitting down to getting up, the seating height is 50cm off the ground, while most camping chairs and stools sit low, so no need to overly bend your knees and scrunch your legs to get up!





When sitting down, your legs are in a natural position with sufficient space to keep yourself comfortable.










Most foldable camping chairs come with fabric seats that allow you to sink into it, it is difficult to get out of and could be uncomfortable for your legs and knees, or it gets saggy after some time of use. When you sit down, The solid texture seat provides a firm seating; and it is also a breeze to get up when you need to act fast on the move.















With its special design, setting up is easier than ever, just like opening and closing an umbrella. Simply release the seat lock, push the switch grip down and secure it. It takes only a second, and you’ve got yourself a comfy seat!





To take down and stow it, pull the seat up and lock it back into a slim stick.










Ta-Da Chair Series 2 is a compact yet heavy duty chair. The aviation-grade aluminum alloy structure allows the chair to hold its position and prevents it from collapsing easily. Combining the reinforced stainless steel rim and the safety buckle, it weighs only 1 kg (2 lbs) yet supports weight up to 130kg (286 lbs). The anti-slip and anti-sink rubber feet with a spiral pattern that provides more stability, allowing the chair to be placed anywhere from pebble path to smooth surface.





The seat and the plastic components are UV resistant, and the frame is made of top quality aviation-grade aluminum alloy, making it not only strong, but also corrosion resistant, waterproof and easy to clean. No matter the weather condition or the terrain, this is the perfect essential for all your outdoor activities!










Aiming to provide great portability and extra mobility, it is light in weight and comes with an ergonomic handle that is made easy for taking it on the go and serves as a hiking stick, taking no space in your backpack or luggage.





With every Ta-Da Chair Series 2, we offer a free storage bag. The bag is made of nylon and it is laundry machine washable and strong. You can toss it in the back of the trunk or carry it another way using the strap to bring it over the shoulders. 


























Color and size options will be confirmed via the Kickstarter survey after the campaign ends.


























There are lots of foldable chairs on the market, but we noticed that many of them or the camping gears require taking more time and several steps to put together. If less time is spent on set up, the more time is saved for enjoying.
Another seemingly inevitable issue with most foldable chairs is that no matter what kind of chair you bring along to the outdoors, even the lightest ones take up space in your backpack, it's still the burden for space-conscious people, so we wondered if we could give the chair another purpose when it’s folded. Therefore, we came up with the idea of combining these functions and Ta-Da Chair was born.





We made operating the chair super fast and easy, just like opening and closing an umbrella - absolutely effortless, perfect for users of all ages. However, it’s not easy to make a simple and one-piece design that is as steady and durable. From the structure to the material, we spared no detail and worked hard to overcome the challenges. After months of tests and adjustments, we managed to create the folding chair that met our standards, and we sincerely hope you will find it amazing, too!
About Ta-Da Chair Series 2
We call this project Ta-Da Chair "Series 2" as this is the upgraded version of our previous design. In hope of bringing convenience and comfort, but without sacrificing on the experience, we have created the 1st generation of Ta-Da Chair earlier. We valued the feedback from every user and we knew that this product had the potential to be even better.
Here are some major upgrades and improvements that we made for Ta-Da Chair Series 2:

Reinforced stainless steel rim

The structure of Series 2 is simpler but it provides more sturdiness and durability than the 1st generation. After the hard work on research and tests, we designed a reinforced stainless steel rim to hold the structure better and provide more stability. With this new design, the weight capacity has been increased: Series 2 can support up to 130kg, which is 30kg more than the 1st generation (around 100kg capacity load).






Seat surface enlargement

The area of the seat surface of Series 2 is larger and wider by 15% than the 1st generation for extra comfort.

Push-to-open switch grip

In the 1st generation, the lock has to be twisted to unlock and expand the chair. For Series 2, we made a refinement of the lock and changed the way from twisting to clipping, and the new switch grip is made for easy operation: push it to unfold, and pull it to pack up - saving you force and time, with much smoother movement. 






Closed loop handle

The handle of Series 2 is shaped into a closed loop for a comfortable grip, and you can also hang it for easy storage.





After one year of numerous brainstorming, refinements and tests, we’re proud to present Ta-Da Chair Series 2 with the enhanced features that allow you to venture out with ease and flexibility, and we’re sure that you’ll be satisfied with it!















Here in Step2Gold, we have accumulated years of solid experience and techniques, all products are made with precision down to every detail; and with our own factory in our homeland, every process during the manufacturing is carefully planned and monitored to hold the best control of production and quality. It is our goal to develop innovative and top quality products to improve outdoor experience and make everyday life more convenient and joyful.
We’re proud to be recognized by several international design awards: Good Design, International Design Excellence Awards, Concours Lépine International Paris, Geneva International Inventions etc.  
 Press Kit｜YouTube 









This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 2,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $900M raised between them. 






This project is boosted by BackerCrew.

record.Creator: Jay Prab
record.Title: HandyDandy
record.Text:
HandyDandy, The Most Fun You'll Have Washing Your Hands!
HandyDandy is a device that quickly and simply attaches to a faucet, much like one of those water filters.



HandyDandy attached to a typical faucet


HandyDandy solves three problems that are inherent in the way people are cleansing their hands.
People have been told they need to wash their hands frequently due to the pandemic. The guideline is to wash for 20 seconds.
Well, humans are very bad at estimating time and what they think is 20 seconds, is really about 5 seconds!
In addition, while they scrub their hands with soap, the water is usually running, which is very wasteful. Now, I'm a person who cares deeply about saving water and even have a product that helps reduce water waste! You can check it out at  https://SensiTap.com and watch the brief video on the home page.
Lastly, I watch children do a half-hearted job of scrubbing, given their short attention spans.
I decided that I would make a product that would help solve all three problems:

Ensure that hands were scrubbed for the required amount of time
Save water while doing so
Entertain children while they washed

We plan to make the device transparent, so folks can see how HandyDandy works! They will be able to see the valve moving back and forth, lights go on and off. They will see a turbine spin when the water goes past the vanes.
The result of all this, is HandyDandy!






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































We have a very advanced prototype running (you can see it in the demo video).
What we need to do now is to make it into a marketable product.
We need your help to do that.
The money you pledge will go towards:

Securing Intellectual Property (patents and trademarks)
Completing a production-worth design (known as DFM - Design For Manufacture)
Designing and making the tooling for the various parts that go to make the HandyDandy
Ordering an initial run of parts
Assembly
Test
Order fulfillment

Our proven track record of products should give you, the Kick Starter Patron, a sense of confidence that we have an above-average chance of succeeding.
I am a dyed-in-the-wool engineer, with over 40 years of experience, almost 30 of those as a consultant. I have always been thinking of how things work and how to make them better. I have 5 patents to my name and am named on a few others. I even teach a, "tinkering lab", for a university in India!
My colleague and partner in this venture is Gerry Friedman and he is also a multi-talented mechanical engineer with vast experience. Gerry is also a gifted sculptor, specializing in, "found object art". You can see some of his work at  https://www.torchandpalette.com/ 
As a matter of fact, we are offering some of his one-of-a-kind works as a reward for a certain level of pledge!

record.Creator: Freyja Perez
