HOLA, MI NOMBRE ES FREYJA PEREZ, SOY CRIMINOLOGO, TENGO 45 AÑOS VIVO EN ESPAÑA!!  SE ME OCURRIO ESTE PROYECTO, PORQUE SUELO CORRER CADA DIA (NO SOY ATLETA PROFESIONAL ... MAS BIEN SOY ATLETA NORMAL, VOY MUY LENTA! PERO ESO  NO ME DESANIMA, TRANQUILO.
UN DIA AL TERMINAR DE CORRER Y VER LO QUE HABIA ACUMULADO EN ESE MES, ME DIJE QUE HAGO YO CON TODOS ESTOS KILOMETROS, ADEMAS DE CONTARSELO A MIS  AMIGOS, MIS HIJOS A MIS PADRES ... PUES NO HAGO NADA MAS!!!! 
Y ASI NACIO SNAILSTEP, CON EL OBJETIVO DE APOYAR A LAS PERSONAS A EVITAR EL SEDENTARISMO Y QUE SEAN ACTIVAS CADA DIA, NO IMPORTA QUE CAMINES MUCHO O CAMINES POCO, LO IMPORTANTE ES QUE ESTES ACTIVO!!  Y  ESE ESFUERZO EXTRA QUE HACES POR ESTAR ACTIVO Y ELEGIR CAMINAR CADA DIA SEA RECOMPENSADO!!!
EN SNAILSTEP  PODRAS UTILIZAR TUS PASOS  PARA DISFRUTAR CON TU FAMILIA, TU MASCOTA, TUS AMIGOS O COMPÀÑEROS DE TRABAJO Y LO MAS IMPORTANTE: SNAILSTEP ES UNA APLICACION MOVIL GRATUITA  QUE NO TE PEDIRA NI SUSCRIBIRTE NI SER NIVEL PREMUM!! 
LO RECAUDADO EN ESTA CAMPAÑA, SERA UTILIZADO  PARA HACER EL DESARROLLO Y PROGRAMACION DE LA APLICACION. LA TENGO ACTUALMENTE TODA ESCRITA EN PAPEL ( CON SUS FUNCIONES, DETALLES, ) ... Y LOS PRESUPUESTOS QUE ME HAN ENTREGADO SON INACCESIBLES PARA MI, POR ESO ACUDO A USTEDES!!.
NO HA SIDO FACIL TOMAR ESTA DECISION, DE HACER ESTA CAMPAÑA, PERO ESTOY CONVENCIDA DE QUE SNAILSTEP PUEDE BENEFICIAR A MUCHAS PERSONAS E INCENTIVAR A OTRAS A ESTAR ACTIVAS, ADEMAS TODOS  HEMOS PASADO UN AÑO MUY DURO DEBIDO A LA PANDEMIA, Y ES EL MOMENTO DE RECONECTAR CON NOSOTROS MISMOS Y CONVERTIR CADA PASO QUE DAMOS EN UNA RECOMPENSA!!!

record.Creator: WinterCocoon
record.Title: Humid-i-Fire™: A Wood Stove Fountain and Humidifier
record.Text:
The Idea
Create warm winter memories by bringing your wood and gas stove to life with the Humid-i-Fire fountain and humidifier. It will delight family members and friends, and add a spark to holiday gatherings.

The Humid-i-Fire is a high-tech fountain and humidifier that you use on wood or gas stoves. It can even operate on your gas kitchen stove. It humidifies the air while adding a tranquil and decorative touch to any stove and requires no power cord or batteries.
Several prototypes have been tested, and now it’s time to bring this amazing idea to your home.






A thermoelectric generator in the base of the fountain produces all the electricity the Humid-i-Fire needs to run efficiently and quietly. When the fountain base contacts the hot stovetop, it generates electricity that powers the fountain’s pump.
The patented Humid-i-Fire is functional and practical. Yet the sight and sound of the fountain bubbling away on your stove also adds a lovely ambiance to the room, whether you are reading a book, playing games with family or friends, or just relaxing on a cold winter night.



The Humid-i-Fire humidifies the dry winter air



While we can't do much about the snow or cold weather, gathering with family and friends around the wood stove is a great way to create warm winter memories. My friends helped inspire me to build the Humid-i-Fire, and with the encouragement and support of the Kickstarter community, you can enjoy a Humid-i-Fire in your home too.

We Can’t Do This Without You
After two years of developing the Humid-i-Fire, we are ready to bring it to market. Funding the rollout and initial production run is a costly undertaking. To get the Humid-i-Fire into production and into your and other customers’ homes, we'll need to invest a lot of money in the production plan and buy all the components. By pre-ordering your Humid-i-Fire, you are helping pay the upfront production costs.
With generous people like you and Kickstarter on our side, we have the chance to make the dream of the inventor come true.












You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00
































We believe in the Kickstarter community of people who support each other.
Each dollar pledged will help bring this innovative, appealing stovetop fountain and humidifier to life!
With your generous support, we plan to ship the Humid-i-Fire in September 2022.

Prototypes



rectangular prototype





round and rectangular prototypes


Note: All humid-i-Fires used in the videos and pictures are prototypes. The shape , size and design of the final product might change.
The Thermoelectric Generator
The Humid-i-Fire uses a thermoelectric generator, which is a device that converts heat directly into electrical energy. German physicist Thomas Johann Seebeck invented the thermoelectric generator in 1821. Recent advances have improved their energy efficiency and lowered their cost, so they are now common in many industries. For example, they generate electricity for remote pipelines, communication towers, and even the Mars Rover Curiosity has one!



Thermoelectric generator


What’s Included
For this Kickstarter campaign we are launching the Humid-i-Fire, which includes a metal bowl, slate tile, polished stones, a water pump and a generator, all shown in the video and pictures above. The fountain holds one gallon of water, for approximately 8 hours of operation, depending on stove temperature and humidity levels. 
Unlike any other humidifier on the market today, all that’s needed to operate the Humid-i-Fire is water and a hot stove (wood or gas!). Dependable, eco-friendly, and unique—the Humid-i-Fire will bring you many years of enjoyment!
Note: All humid-i-Fires used in the videos and pictures are prototypes. The shape , size and design of the final product might change.




Final production schedule (2021/2022)




A word about Ken Adler, the inventor of the Humid-i-Fire
The inventor, Kenneth, has worked on projects to protect wetlands, minimize pesticide runoff into rivers, and reduce air pollution and greenhouse gas emissions from old diesel trucks. He has used the same knowledge, experience, and passion for creating the eco-friendly patented Humid-i-Fire for you.
He had the idea and skills, and he brought brainstorming, tinkering, and testing. This is his first patented product, and he couldn't be prouder of it.



Ken Adler, inventor of the Humid-i-Fire


THANK YOU for your Consideration
At Wintercocoon, we are very excited about this project and it’s potential and we hope you share the same energy and passion to make it happen! 
Don't forget to spread the word about the Humid-i-Fire by telling your family and friends about my campaign.
We look forward to watching our Kickstarter community grow!
Together with Kennet, we sincerely thank you for your consideration of our project.

record.Creator: Domus Bonus
record.Title: Copy.Cab - your uniquely smart, error-free card/drive Backup
record.Text:
Work files or vacation pics. 
Now you have a card or a drive full of files. You need to back them up, quickly and error-free.

...But then problems start popping up. Have you already backed up this particular card or not?? One card gets backed up twice but the others never get copied… Individual files and time-lapse sequences get mixed up or corrupted… Same-name files overwrite the older ones you still needed... Drives disconnect; copy never resumes... Stress. Stress. Stress!

Please. Stop doing it manually. 

...Yes, but the dedicated backup devices are rather expensive! - you might say.
Yup. And rather limited in features, too - by design. 
But Copy.Cab has no issues like these.

Copy.Cab intelligently inspects your files and automatically processes them - the way you want it.
Delegate all the tedious stuff to Copy.Cab, and keep your data safe and sound - without the $500 expense!






Copy.Cab checks for all kinds of gotchas before they even happen. Not enough space? Duplicate files? External drive disconnected during offload? Copy.Cab alerts you to all that and offers one-click solutions.

Copy.Cab actually can work as a dedicated backup device, too (without the high price tag) - just install it on your mobile or a "stick" PC. Turn it on; Copy.Cab starts automatically, ready to back up your cards. Awesome!






How is Copy.Cab different from just copying your data manually?

Copy.Cab:
- Automates operations, remembers the last drives and folders you worked with
- Perfectly copies your card, drive, or a single folder by checking on possible errors BEFORE they happen!
- Pre-flights your backup with visual snapshot, alerts you beforehand with exact issues, offers good solutions. Just press the button - the worry is ours, the choice is yours.

- Fast! As fast as your OS!

- Backs up any digital files: photos, videos, documents, anything.
- Backs up (offloads) any card or drive.
- Synchronizes any folder to any other folder.
- Makes an Exact copy, OR Incremental copy - whichever you like.







- A full copy of your card/drive structure, with all its files and folder tree, is a default. But you can also choose what files to include in (or exclude from) the backup. (see LEVELS)
You see, sometimes you need the perfect mirror of your directories and files, including service/sidecar files… while another time you don’t!







- Copy.cab can intelligently process your files. Missing time/date stamps? Missing Geolocation? (see LEVELS) Files with the same names but different content that would normally just overwrite your older ones, leading to lost data? No worries. Copy.Cab can handle and fix all that!
- Detects and organizes time-lapse image sequences automatically (see LEVELS)
- Remembers what went where, and can instantly remind you

- Shows you Previews of your content, plus lists your file data, for better assurance that you are, in fact, working with the right files
- Uniquely renames files to prevent name clashes, or leaves everything untouched - your choice, just click on settings

- Very stable. Does not crash, leak memory, or do other bad things. This is a result of our quality design.
- Completely private: never spies on you, never sends your files or activity reports anywhere - Copy.Cab does NOT talk to the outside servers!





- Ready for future enhancements and added features. Like AI image auto-tagging for ease of finding your files! (Privacy first: all the new features will be under your control.)

- Sustainable operations: if our servers go down, your Copy.Cab continues working. If our business disappears, your Copy.Cab continues working. You are safe.

- Based on decades of digital file wrangling experience by our developers.  Just like you, we know what needs to be done, and here we give you the complete solution based on our vast experience. 
- Use Copy.Cab in the field, professional environment, or home.

Why is it called Copy.Cab?
Cab stands for both file cabinet in Windows, and for a fast vehicle that professionally transports you from one point to another. Seems like a fit for this software!
Oh, and we were lucky to get a domain name Copy.Cab as well, for our upcoming website! (see LEVELS)

Is Copy.Cab suitable for home use? 
Say, if I wanted to back up my camera memory cards with vacation photos and videos??
Yes!

Is Copy.Cab suitable for professional use? 
For example, by a data wrangler on a photo or film set?
Yes!

Can Copy.Cab be installed on a tablet, desktop, notebook, Windows phone?
Yes, yes, and yes!







What are the requirements?
- Windows 7/8/10/11 (or a virtual environment if you are on iOS or other operating systems)

Think of Copy.Cab as your perfectly attentive, fast assistant that never makes a mistake in handling your files. It will:
- Show you the contents of the card visually so you'd instantly know whether this is the intended one or not
- Allow you to choose Full backup (a new copy of all the contents) or Incremental backup (just the difference from the last time you copied your data from this source.)
- Check whether there's enough space on the destination drive to complete the operation.
- Detect whether there are any file name clashes and offer to apply an automatic fix. So you won't lose your older data by simply writing it over if it's actually different!
- Detect if there are any time-lapse sequences and offer to put them into a separate folder; as well as make a draft video preview for you. What a time saver!
- Alert you if either the source or destination drives disconnected during the transfer
- Actually continue writing long files from where it left off (after the transfer resume or on drive re-connect) - instead of just starting anew! A huge time saver.
- Use multi-threading to complete the job ASAP for you
- Verify the backup
...and more!

There are so many things you'd have to manually do, each being an opportunity for human error to creep in, and some taking an extremely long time.  Why do it the hard way?
Copy.Cab just does it all for you natively, quickly, and error-free every time!






UNLOCK the Levels!
- $1,300: you get your Copy.Cab v1.1 download
- $1,900: the website is designed and maintained with the Versioning, Support, and Download zones
- $2,400: a feature to fix the missing Geolocation and Time-Date stamp is added
- $2,900: a feature to include/exclude certain file types from the backup
- $3,500: the automatic time-lapse processing feature is added!
- $4,700: a certified Installation package is obtained


Please support this project and get your Copy.Cab soon - or give it as a gift to someone you know may need it!
Thank you very much.

record.Creator: EDGENITY Inc.
record.Title: FIT CYCLE -The World's Best Indoor Cycling Experience-
record.Text:
The FIT CYCLE is a next-generation fitness machine with built-in multi-functional sensors that is fully compatible with multiple virtual cycling apps, allowing you to ride the world's most spectacular courses from the comfort of your own home.











It is recommended for those who are interested in the latest technology and the most advanced and fulfilling "home training".






Virtual Shift to maximize your training effect.
The first launch of our amazing Virtual Shift. You can incorporate shifting gears from major manufacturers such as Shimano, SRAM, and Campagnolo with virtual shifting. By selecting the exact number of sprockets and gear ratios, you can maximize your training effect. 
















 What is the popular Virtual Cycling App?
The Virtual Cycling App is a cutting-edge home training program that allows you to enjoy cycling indoors. You can experience the virtual cycling world as if you were riding there yourself.





Participants from all over the world can train and compete in the virtual world. Participants from around the world train, compete and ride in friendly competitions with their friends. Recently, the world's premier road bike race, the Tour de France, was held in a virtual space and generated a great deal of excitement.






Tour de France // First Steps - Watopia Hillery Rivers YouTube






Automatically applies a constant load determined by the algorithm according to the difficulty of the workout set by the player. The cadence sensor and torque sensor allow for accurate FTP measurement.

FTP mode is a program used by professional athletes for high-intensity training.
The FTP training mode allows you to train quickly and efficiently according to the level you choose. You can also measure your own FTP.











FIT CYCLE is compatible with a variety of virtual apps, allowing you to play apps right away without the need for complicated settings. Virtual apps can be broadly divided into two types: those that ride on real, live-action scenery and those that ride on 3DCG scenery.

The appeal of virtual cycling lies in its realism. The system automatically changes the load by interfacing sensors with the app, and the load reflects the slope of the hill, air resistance, and other details of the surrounding environment, making it very close to the actual ride.

You can ride on real roads around the world in the comfort of your own home with your smart bike, and the high-resolution 4K live-action scenery will make you feel as if you are really there.






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































Apps that support live-action scenery

Kinomap
Kinomap is an app that allows you to ride real courses taken by cyclists around the world. The number of courses is over 100,000! Of course, there are also Japanese courses taken by Japanese cyclists.






ROUVY
This is an app that allows you to ride with live-action scenery from around the world + your own 3DCG avatar. It also supports parameters such as automatic load, cadence, and heart rate, making it the perfect app for training.





FULGAZ
This is an app that allows you to run in real-life scenery that supports the highest 4K quality. The picture quality is so beautiful that you can experience the seaside of Los Angeles or the Hawaiian Islands as if you were there. It also supports various sensors, making it ideal for training.
Apps that support 3DCG scenery





ONELAP
You and your friends can run together in a 3DCG world. There are many game elements such as various missions and avatar customization, so you can gamify your training to avoid boredom!






Zwift
Zwift is said to be the best virtual bike app. It has a whopping 3 million members worldwide and 100,000 players in Japan! Zwift was also used by Corona to stage the Tour de France. Not only can you train with professional riders, but you can also customize your avatar, road bike, and more.





Comparison List of Various Applications






I want to try it!
 But... the hurdle to play is too high.
Currently, there are two major combinations of equipment needed to play with Zwift.
In this case, the cost of the smart trainer alone is $900 to $1,800USD, and you also need to prepare a road bike to attach to the trainer.





In the second case, the cost is lower than in the first, but you need more equipment and more time to set up. In addition, both of them require a road bike as a prerequisite, making it difficult to get started. 










All you need is your smartphone and FIT CYCLE
In the midst of all this, a spin bike-type trainer called "Smart Bike" has appeared overseas this year. 

Smart bikes, which can be optimized to your own position without the need to set up a bike, have been attracting attention, but they are very expensive, costing around $4,500USD, and are only for professional use.

Because of this, we have set an affordable price so that everyone can enjoy Virtual Cycling at their homes. We have developed Japan's first integrated fitness machine with various built-in sensors.
Furthermore, it is possible to experience virtual cycling indoors at a low cost!
Virtual training for everyone! As people spend more and more time at home, why don't you enjoy exercising with FIT CYCLE?










This is a record of the weight loss of a customer at a gym that installed this product. This is the result of comprehensive guidance by the trainer.
















Virtual training lifestyle with FIT CYCLE.
As explained earlier, the sensors and control CPU necessary for virtual training are integrated, so you can start immediately as long as you have a device such as a smartphone and the main unit.

Virtual training apps such as Rouvy and Bkool, provide the experience of riding in the real world. Kinomap, lets you ride through videos taken and posted by other cyclists, and TrainerRoad, which specializes in upping your game. Choose the app that best fits your goals and motivation, and enjoy cutting-edge training!

ROUVY offers a real-world riding experience
Multi-functional sensors are compatible with virtual training apps.





FIT CYCLE is equipped with the following advanced sensors and CPU. This allows you to take full advantage of the app's features for an enhanced virtual ride.
Automatic load function (power meter) that realistically reproduces gradients on hills and other slopes





Automatically adjusts the load on the virtual ride to match the course. The trainer automatically adjusts the load according to the course on the virtual ride. When the course on the app goes up a hill, the load on the trainer automatically changes to match the slope of the hill, giving you a realistic ride.











You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00




































 The load is applied by changing the voltage on the electromagnetic magnet. This happens by moving the electromagnet closer or further away from the flywheel. 
Since it is a non-contact system, the unit is very quiet.
It can apply a stronger load than ordinary magnet load systems and allows a wide range of load adjustments.










Equipped with a sensor that measures the cadence (number of revolutions of the crank per minute) of the bicycle.
When you ride, be aware of keeping the cadence constant and choose a gear that does not strain your legs, which will reduce the burden and make your cycling more comfortable.
Finding the right cadence for you is an important point when riding, and depends on the individual's physical strength and build, the type of bicycle, length of the crank, situation, and more.





Manage your exercise record with smartwatch and healthcare integration
Although the heart rate sensor on the handlebars can be used, using a smartwatch will allow you more freedom, accuracy, and integration with your health care system (*specifications may vary depending on the app). Keep track of your exercise records along with a variety of other biometric data to keep track of your overall health status in life.











We designed FIT CYCLE to become a fitness partner in your daily life.  "no noise" is a point that cannot be overlooked.
The FIT CYCLE is so quiet that it can be compared to a whisper or a late night in the suburbs. This means you don't have to worry about disturbing your neighbors.





Enjoyable on a variety of devices
As explained in the beginning, you will need a device such as a smartphone to run the virtual training app.
Depending on the situation, you can choose the best way to use the device according to the size of the room and the device you have, such as using a computer, projecting on a TV screen, or using a projector. Can be used as a standalone machine.

Even if you don't use the virtual cycling app, you can use the FIT CYCLE app to set the load that suits you best and checks your calorie consumption.
You can also update the machine’s software through the app.
The FIT CYCLE app will be available for download from the App Store and Google Play Store.





Please note that the design is in the development stage and is subject to change.

Fine adjustment of the saddle and handlebars
The saddle can be adjusted from 81cm to 98cm, and the handlebars from 97cm to 108cm. (The saddle can also be moved forward and backward by 0-5.5 cm)
The height range is 145-190cm, so it can be adjusted to fit various body sizes for comfortable use.










The legs in front of the main unit are equipped with wheels for easy movement. This makes it easy for a single person to move it around, such as when redecorating or rearranging the room.










There is no need for complicated setups required in conventional virtual training. The minimal number of parts eliminates the need for complicated assembly.











You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00





































Please note that the design is still in the development stage and is subject to change.
Specifications






























Pedals For Barefoot Use
The included pedals have an uneven tread for better grip and are designed to be used with shoes. Therefore, you cannot pedal barefoot or with socks. To use it barefoot, you will need the optional barefoot pedals.





Anti-vibration and soundproof mat to reduce vibration
As mentioned above, the main unit alone is quite enough, but for those who are concerned about the burden on the floor or want to reduce vibration, even more, we have prepared a custom-designed anti-vibration soundproofing mat as an option!
Be considerate of your surroundings and the environment, and enjoy your virtual ride to the fullest!





Virtual Shift to maximize your training effect.
You can incorporate shifting gears from major manufacturers such as Shimano, SRAM, and Campagnolo with virtual shifting. By selecting the exact number of sprockets and gear ratios, you can maximize your training effect.


























We can not keep count of how many meetings we have held during the process of creating the FIT CYCLE.
We have had many sleepless nights and have put hundreds of hours into planning, designing, and programming. It truly is our blood sweat and tears. 
But one thing we can say for sure is that we enjoyed every second of it!
We are continuously holding meetings always working to improve so we can deliver the FIT CYCLE  to your home at the highest quality possible.





After many trials and errors, we are now confident to present the FIT CYCLE to the world.  We have displayed the FIT CYCLE in exhibitions overseas, and the customers who had the chance to experience the FIT CYCLE truly enjoyed the ride!










Q: Do I need to assemble the product after it arrives?
A: This product will be delivered to you approximately 90% complete.
You will need to install the handlebars, pedals, saddle, and other parts, but anyone can easily assemble it in about 30 minutes or less.

Q: Can I use the product late at night in my apartment or condominium?
A: The noise level of this product is less than 30dB, which is equivalent to the sound of falling leaves or a whisper, so it can be used safely in any residential environment.

Q: Do I need to do any maintenance?
A: Since this product is a frictionless type with electromagnetic load, there are no consumables and it is maintenance-free.

Q: How much electricity does it consume?
A: The rated power consumption will be 10W. If you use it for 30 minutes every day, your monthly electricity bill will be only about 4 yen. (30cents USD) (*Calculated at the unit price of electricity, 27 yen/kwh)

Q: Is there a manufacturer's warranty in case of failure?
A: The product will be repaired free of charge under the manufacturer's warranty for one year after arrival. However, there are some items that are not covered by the warranty, so please refer to the warranty card that will be sent with the product for details.

Q: Is it necessary to use a floor mat when using the product in an apartment or condominium?
A: The product is virtually silent, so there is no need to use floor mats for soundproofing, but a waterproof floor mat is a good idea in case of sweat or water spills from the bottle. It also helps to protect the floor surface.

Q: Can I pedal barefoot or only in socks?
A: The included pedals have an uneven tread for better grip and are designed to be used with shoes. Therefore, you cannot pedal barefoot or with socks. To use it barefoot, you will need the optional barefoot pedals.

Q: The unit has a built-in heart rate sensor, but do I need the optional armband?
A： The heart rate sensor is built into the handlebar, but for more accurate monitoring of the heart rate, the armband is required.

Q: Is there a Technical Regulations Compliance Mark (Technical Regulations Conformity Certification) or PSE Mark?
A: In accordance with Japanese laws and regulations, the technical conformity mark and PSE mark are attached.

*This product contains a sensor that is compatible with the virtual training applications but does not include the service itself. You will need to sign up separately for the services of the various applications.

*All logos and play screens belong to the corresponding KINOMAP, ZWIFT, ROUVY, FUGAZ, and ONELAP.

Proper nouns are product names that appear in, for example, KINOMAP, ZWIFT, ROUVY, FUGAZ, and ONELAP, and are registered trademarks or trademarks of their respective companies.

record.Creator: Dimitris Eleftheriadis
record.Title: Dog Assistant
record.Text:
The Idea 💡
Three years ago a member of our team became a dog dad. Like most people when they become a pet parent, for the first time, he had almost no idea what to do. In order to find answers to his questions he surfed the internet and asked around (mostly veterinarians). But he realized that he had to visit multiple websites to find simple solutions and he couldn't ask a vet all the time. That's when the idea was born.
 
What if there was an application that would have all of these answers and more, in one place? 
And that was the turning point.  The answer to these questions and doubts summarized through our application. 

THE APPLICATION 📱
At this point, in the state that the whole project is in, we need your assistance in order for it to be implemented in perfection.
Below, there are some features that the app contains :


Detailed information about 350+ dog breeds
Information about what foods they can or can't eat and recipes
Scheduling (for vet visits or daily reminders for eating, playing, walking etc)
Finding places of interest nearby like vets, pet shops, pharmacies, parks, dog hotels and grooming services

Networking:

Find friends nearby
Chat with friends
Create posts for dogs that were lost, found, or are up for adoption
Create a profile for each of your dogs and see how much they should eat daily, upload photos to keep as an archive
Create a QR code with your information to print and put on your dog's collar in case they ever get lost

Future stuff (with your assistance):

Become a dog walker or find dog walkers near you
Create an electronic medical booklet to keep track of vaccines and treatments for each of your dogs.
Keep track of how many steps you walk with your furry friends
Detailed ways of how to train your dog and play with it (with videos)
Virtual assistant that will answer your questions
Video recipes
Find the breed using image recognition
Current laws, concerning pets, per country


YOUR ASSISTANCE 🤝
As mentioned above, your assistance will help the app expand beyond its current state. We are just a team of 3 members and we are looking forward to getting bigger, becoming a company that will be able to hire people to work with us in order to bring you a great experience and services. So what are you waiting for?
Help us today, so we can assist you tomorrow!

 GALLERY 🖼️

record.Creator: Rodney Zimmerman
record.Title: Assessdo: Keeping You Connected To Thoughts That Matter
record.Text:
Because human behavior is so unpredictable, clever, creative and incredibly brilliant, understanding outliers of behavior can be challenging. When humans behave irrationally, with anger, through deception, or other jarring actions that many times may cause harm the origin/intention of the behavior sparks curiosity. Inspired by the intention of various forms of human behavior, I wanted to create a platform that embraces the process of understanding behavior without bias, judgement or stereotypes. I wanted to see if there was a way to disrupt the classroom to prison pipeline, clean up policing in underserved communities, change behavior modification of youth in schools, and help organizations improve performance in the workplace.

As a graduate of UCLA and a former NBA athlete, my collective experiences, skill sets, and visions to create behavioral solutions have evolved and allowed me to create cutting-edge solutions that shape the body, mind and behavior of student-athletes. My new software Assessdo, created by Barin Technologies, not only offers the opportunity to support student athletes, but ideally become an interface for entities such as: educational institutions, law enforcement agencies, justice systems, healthcare providers, human resources and youth programs. Assessdo uses proprietary AI technology to predict, interpret, observe and ideally transform behavior. It can be a gateway to facilitate honest discussions with groups of any size and create a turnkey breakthrough of powerful dialogue.





According to our research, there are two major challenges that interrupt behavior: 1) confirmation bias and 2) stereotype threats. Understanding why implicit bias exists and how to tackle the problem was one inspiration for creating this software. Other inspirations for creating Assessdo was: 1) noticing the influx of young people becoming incarcerated at an early age, 2) learning about the correlation of prison reform with mental health, 3) how police training is affecting rates of incarceration, wrongful deaths, and the unnecessary mistreatment of civilians, and 4) how the relationships between teachers, faculty, students, communities, and districts negatively affect school systems. We invite you to learn about our platform, as we believe there is power in understanding the whole of every person, not just parts. Our users will experience fair equity while having the ability to think and feel freely.










































 Message From The Assessdo Creator



 Contact Rodney Zimmerman - rodneyzimmerman14@gmail.com

record.Title: Swingers and roundabouts - A swingers dating website
record.Text:
Thank you for looking at our project.

Swingers and roundabouts is a UK website for the swingers community and people who share similar interests.

The site was created by two friends,one of whom who has been part of the community for over 5 years now who feels there are a lack of sites out there that are committed to the community.

With this in mind,swingers and roundabouts was created.

Our belief is that a website for this scene should be interactive,safe and fun. 

Our intention through kickstarter is to carry on developing key features to the site to make it more interactive. With your donations we will add the following:
-News feeds for posts and 
-Forums 
-Video calling 
-Group chats 
-Blind erotic chat,match online members looking to talk live.
-A daily,weekly,monthly hot list that will win prizes.

We believe all members should be able to interact in an environment where there is a committed moderation team that isn't run by site volunteers or run partially throughout the day meaning that reports are not dealt with immediately or without lack of action.Thats why the site will be ran by the creators to ensure everything is at it should be.No harassment,no abuse and certainly no time wasters. 

We hope this is something you want to donate to as we believe with our commitment and determination for continued development we could be the number one site and hopefully expand outside of the UK over time.

Thanks for reading.

record.Creator: Steven Alderete
record.Title: The H₂OBO™ System: Our Hydration System Dryer!
record.Text:
Introducing H₂OBO™ - Our hydration water system dryer!
We call it the "H₂OBO™ System" - short for Water Bladder Obliviator - think about it! When used properly, the H₂OBO™ can accelerate the drying process of your hydration system by circulating ambient air throughout the bladder, drink tube and mouthpiece.
Using the H₂OBO™ can reduce moisture content in the hydration system, lessen the chance of mold & bacteria growth, and help extend the life of your hydration system. This process takes approximately 30 minutes, depending on the size of the bladder, and will leave your hydration system ready for storage without the possibility of mold and that funky smell.





Key Features
Get ready to use your hydration system even more while you enjoy your outdoor activities. Afterwards, don’t worry about drying out your hydration system thanks to the new H₂OBO™ system. The H₂OBO™ System:

 Keeps your hydration system dry.
 Reduces the chances of mold and bacteria growth!
 Eliminates the hassle of using awkward hangers to dry out your hydration system.
 Reduces the use of chemicals to clean your hydration system and eliminate that “chemical taste”.
The H₂OBO™ unique cap system is designed to work with CRUX Camelbak hydration systems. In the future we plan to make the H₂OBO™ compatible with most popular hydration systems. We plan to make attachments available for different hydration systems starting in January 2022.
 The H₂OBO™ is lightweight and easy to use!

 How Does It Work?

2.    A/C wall adapter
 Design

Each H₂OBO™ System comes with a full one-year guarantee.

record.Creator: blip energy
record.Title: blipOne: Reliable Smart Battery for Any Apartment or Home
record.Text:
blipOne is a backup power station for every home. It's designed to help in emergencies and save money. 
















It intelligently charges up when energy is cheapest. In the event of an outage, the 2.2kWh battery saves the day, powering a fridge for 1-2 days, or keeping the WiFi up for weeks.

























This is the first home battery truly designed for portable apartment use and living. With no permanent installation you can take it wherever you live, and it can easily be used throughout your home.
















After a quick account setup, plug blipOne into any standard outlet to immediately begin storing energy. It’s that simple: no landlords or electricians necessary. Set it and forget it.  

































Using advanced algorithms and the free app, blipOne connects to your utility rate system. It reviews your rate plan and  takes advantage of electricity prices that change throughout the day.
By storing energy overnight or when the price is low, and using it to power your devices during the day when the price is highest, blip saves you money without having to turn anything off.
This can save you money when energy is expensive. Don’t pay for high cost electricity when you could be using cheap, stored power.







Don’t be caught unprepared when blackouts or emergencies happen. Power your priority devices, some for days on end. 





* Listed hours are an approximation from standard device energy ratings and based on continuous use. Exact runtime for your devices will depend on the efficiency of your device.







Keep yourself, your home, and your family safe with easily accessible backup power during rolling blackouts or severe weather. 
















































blip energy has worked tirelessly to ensure blipOne exceeds all safety and environmental standards. It’s undergone 40 reliability and safety tests and meets all required certifications.
AC equivalent pure sine wave provides safe, quality AC power to protect your devices and electronics. We've built multiple layers of safety into the power electronics of blipOne, to go above and beyond industry safety protocols. 












Keep an eye on your energy usage and savings while controlling blipOne, all through the app. 





Check out the blip algorithm yourself--head here and calculate the potential and projected  savings you could experience. This calculator uses the same technology as the blipOne app.

















By storing power, and using it during peak hours, you'll reduce your reliance on dirty energy from peaker plants, the source of most daytime power and stressors on our environment. 

















Using blipOne will help reduce your carbon footprint without disrupting your daily routine. Each blipOne unit can eliminate 100kg of CO2 emissions per year on average. If we each help a little, together we can accomplish a lot. 









































At blip energy, we believe everyone deserves access to energy storage. Energy storage is a powerful tool for controlling your energy usage and building outage resilience for your home - and it should be widely available, not a luxury. 

We've been working on blip energy since January 2020, and in that time have won the Clean Energy prize from ASUio, filed patents and mapped out a path to certification and scale manufacturing for our first product blipOne. We've built our functional proof of concept, and are now working to lock down the final bill of materials, send out for product certification testing, and manufacture our first run of product.

The team has technical and business backgrounds in hardware development and energy. Our CEO Sophia was a Mechanical Engineer at iRobot building Roomba before receiving her MBA and MSDI from Northwestern. Chance our COO has a background in Federal Policy at GE, and has worked in real estate, energy consulting, and more. Our cofounders and advisors Dennis and Thibaut both have experience in energy consulting at Bain and BCG respectively, and Thibaut holds a masters in Electrical Engineering.






























Where We Ship
We are able to ship to the United States, Canada, and Mexico.  VAT, taxes, duties, and GST not included. 

When We Ship
We plan to ship starting in July 2022.* We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order. 
*Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date.

Why Order Now
By backing now, you’ll get to own one of the very first blip batteries at the lowest price we're offering.







In order to ensure you receive the lowest possible shipping costs, our team is withholding shipping prices until after the campaign ends. 

Right now, because we don't know all our shipping destinations, oil prices are fluctuating, and the global shopping crises, we can't give you an accurate number. You will be sent a link to pay for shipping costs net year, right before your product ships. 

As of November 2021, shipping prices are expected to be close to the following for single units: $US: $73; Canada: $35; and Mexico: $225. 

Please note that these prices may change, but we will be transparent when and if this happens.

record.Creator: IFITDO
record.Title: IFITDO : We connect service seekers with service providers
record.Text:
We are making it easier for service seekers to find service providers in seconds using IFITDO APP 
pitch deck
imagine visiting a country, not knowing anyone, and needing services immediately...Or Imagine traveling back to your home country and expecting services to be readily available all the time since you are now used to that...or imagine living in a country where it is sometimes difficult to find services quickly when you need them.





This idea started during dinner with my five brothers and my mom. My mom said her kitchen cabinet was broken and couldn’t find a good carpenter…That night it looked like destiny was beckoning us to think outside the box; because all of sudden the broken kitchen cabinet also had a broken leaking pipe. Our dining room was flooding…We tried to reach a plumber we knew but we could not get hold of him. So we called an aunt, who called a friend, and the friend called a cousin, who called a neighbor…When they finally got the plumber, they asked him, can you fix this issue tonight...his response in pidgin was, "I Fit DO" That was the eureka moment.

So we thought that there should be a better way for Ghanaians, both at home and Abroad, and Foreigners visiting Ghana, to get Services quickly without the Difficult Task of trying to CONTACT A FRIEND'S UNCLE'S SISTER'S NIECE'S BROTHER FOR A PLUMBER to fix a leaking pipe among other services..."
So we decided to create an app called IFITDO (pidgin English) which means "I can do it". :





We are solving a problem which was previously unsolvable. For many foreigners who visit Ghana, and also Ghanaians living abroad, and at those at home it is a problem finding certain services easily, quickly, and efficiently. 
1. Difficulty in quickly finding a service provider when you need one:
Ghanaians at home and abroad, and foreigners need some service when visiting the country.  However, it is not easy to quickly find someone to provide a service. 
 2. Quickly finding someone within a 3-mile radius:
Most people find it difficult to get someone quickly when they need service in an immediate area in a 3mile radius
 3. Service Providers not targeted to Service Seekers:
Service providers in most cases find service seekers by chance or through word of mouth referral which often limits provider's chances of getting a job. or providing a service.





1. Quickly and efficiently help people find services :
A quick and efficient way to get services is by connecting service seekers with service providers.
 2. providing opportunity where there is none:
An easy way for students, professionals, and the unemployed to make some cash is by readily connecting them with service seekers.
 3. Community aspect:
The community focus on where locals are doing work for locals.















Creating a truly unique user interface and experience for everyone who uses the app 
Our app is bi-dimensional. Meaning we are developing it in such a way that you can be both a service seeker and service provider and experience the same exceptional experience. 















The Journey










 We have bootstrapped this project by developing a unique app for finding services but now we need your help to get to the finish line and make life easier for you and anyone seeking services in Ghana and eventually Africa. 

Marketing: We need to get the word out there.
Include additional features to provide an amazing user experience.
Infrastructure support to ensure that the app runs smoothly for you and everyone.
Providers onboarding: hire a small team to onboard providers. 

There is so much more to do in order to successfully bring the app to users on both ios and android, and we need your help to make this happen. Thank you in advance.

REWARDS:

record.Creator: Piotr Daniszewski
record.Title: Giveit4free - mobile application for giving unwanted things
record.Text:
WHAT IS THAT? 
If You do not have enough space in your home, garage or attic, maybe You should think about getting rid of some of them? These things still can be used by other people to help protect the environment. Perhaps something that You have already got bored of is the dream of many people who would like to accept these items.

WHY?
Some people tend to cumulate things at home that they no longer need. If you are not planning to sell them, maybe You should think about giving these things to someone?

HOW?
We create an application that allows You to easily and quickly donate items that You no longer need. The interested person will be able to come for them himself and pick them up at any time suitable for You. You will arrange the way of passing things to him.
We create an application that will save You not only time, but also Your privacy which becomes more important nowadays.  The application will only be used to transfer things to other people, so this information will not appear in any social media. You will also be able to view the list of people interested in receiving these items and see the audience scoring and comments about them, so you can choose to whom You want to donate Your item.

Our huge, patented touch screen was designed exclusively for Apple Watch NightStand mode.

Amplify Sound
Integrated sound channels amplify your alarm so you'll never miss a wake up call again





Premium Materials
NightWatch's heavy base and beautiful design is created from a single-piece, solid lucite that's hand polished to a mirror finish.

The Apple Watch charger fits perfectly into NightWatch. The cord chamber enables left and right positions on your desktop or bedside table. Once installed, just drop in your watch into the chamber to charge it and the face will instantly convert to NightStand mode displaying a full clock face.





Perfect Fit
Fits perfectly with Apple Watch Charging cord and organises your space.

Patented tap display lets you wake the watch face with just a touch.
Integrated sound channels amplify your alarm so you'll never miss a wake up call again.

record.Creator: Tevin Fitzgerald
record.Title: Culinect
record.Text:
My idea for this project started about 3 years ago. I’m an aspiring chef in the culinary field and while trying to put myself out there and gain business, I ran into slow spells. Not because my food is bad, because it’s not but because nobody knew who I was or how to get connected with me. So I thought of ways that I could gain some type of exposure with something as simple as a search. I’ve done research on platforms I could join or Facebook groups I can be apart of, however none of them met my needs. So that’s what brought out my innovative side and I came up with Culinect, which stands for culinary connection. Culinect not only helps aspiring culinary artist like myself but also helps customers in need of culinary services. I mean think about it right, how do you currently go about getting a baker for your kids party, or getting a food truck to come to your office because you’re sick of the same ole cafe food, or hiring a chef for a huge cooperate event. A lot of it is word of mouth, which is fine but let’s say that artist is booked up for that date, now what ? Back to the cafe, right?…. Wrong! With Culinect you can search up Culinary artist in your area for whatever it is you require services for and get connected with a pro.

record.Creator: RENCOLOR
record.Title: Rencolor DM-10 Worlds First FDM Two-Color Mixed 3D Printer
record.Text:
RENCOLOR DM-10 was created for you, the creative entrepreneurial spirit who keeps moving every project forward and bringing it to life. That’s why its structure has been designed to stay simple, easy to carry, and easy to assemble. 










If you’re making anything with your new 3D printing sidekick, then keeping the filament running in any direction is extremely important. RENCOLOR DM-10 lets you automatically load and unload the filament of the printer in a simple click of a button. No complex instructions, no lengthy start/stop processes—just straightforward convenience!










Forget about limited monochrome 3D prints that don’t offer you other options, forcing you to only create boring monochromatic designs. Rencolor DM-10 FDM Color 3D Printer allows you to explore the following different 3D printing modes that will literally power and brighten your creativity:





 Print different layers, gradient colors, mix colors at any proportions, or go monochromatic — unlike other 3D printers, Rencolor lets you print more, better, and in more diversified ways! 










No project is the same. Some require finer details while others not so much. That’s why Rencolor DM-10 doesn’t force you to use only one precision level. You can instead choose from 3 precision modes of 0.1mm/0.15mm/0.2mm, adjusting the precision according to the specific requirements of your project.

























Rencolor DM-10 features Dual Z-Axis rods and motors that dramatically improve the performance and stability of the printing process, making every movement extremely smooth and accurate.















You won’t need to read lengthy user guides or watch hours of tutorials to operate your Rencolor DM-10. Equipped with a clear UI touch screen interface, this sweet 3D printer is a sophisticated device that anyone can seamlessly use.















Your Rencolor DM-10 doesn’t need to be online in order to print your creations since it supports offline printing.





Also, if your suddenly face a power outage, your work and materials won’t be lost. Rencolor DM-10 will stop when the power goes out but will conveniently resume printing precisely where the project was interrupted, re-starting the printing process as if no unexpected interruption had happened.





The simplicity of metal and the unique features of aluminum alloy frame are given a special charisma by the striking artistic design of Rencolor DM-10. The exterior of the remote extruder is marked by an iconic red: the red color card board printing surface. The black tones of the actual machine will appeal to your aesthetical sensitivity as the contrast between two colors will support a fertile creative horizon while you use your Rencolor for spectacular creations! 















While portable and easy to assemble and use, Rencolor DM-10 is robustly built to last. This printer offers you something truly unique: a lifetime warranty. There’s no better offer than that, so we hope you’ll take us up on our offer!















Shenzhen Ren Cai Tech Co., Ltd. has been a key research and development player in the 3D printing industry since 2016. The company's research has made great progress in 3D printing technologies such as FDM hot melt, light curing, and metal powder printing, among other technologies. We have proudly improved the FDM-3D full-color printing technology, we solved the high-precision FDM 3D printing challenges, and we made seriously important improvements to the FDM-3D printer extruder. All that work is now reflected on what we can offer you with Rencolor DM-10.

record.Creator: Fortuna
record.Title: Fortuna
record.Text:
Why we are here:
Hi there, Kickstarter community, hope you're all well and achieving the goals you set out when joining this online community of thinkers, creators and innovators.
The reason why I am here is to change an idea and a beta app into a new solution for the ever-changing business world.

A short story:
A couple of months ago two colleagues and I began our journey working on a market innovation for the bricks and mortar retail market; we call this little innovation Fortuna.
We plan to use Fortuna as a means to foster a greater sense of community between consumers and their local enterprises, both from their local and nearby markets. This will be done by providing an inexpensive service that reduces the barriers to engagement, giving the little guys a chance to thrive in an ever more competitive and centralised environment.

The Idea:
The concept is simple and best said in a paraphrase of Steve Jobs' announcement of the iPod. Whereas the iPod "fit a thousand songs in your pocket", we want to give local small brick and mortar stores the ability to "promote their products in a thousand pockets in an inexpensive way." Sounds boastful, I know. :)
All the above probably sounds great, but at the same time very much like a sales pitch. I guess your team is more interested in knowing where we currently stand and our understanding of the market.

The Business:
Fortuna is an application that is intended to provide an enhanced consumer purchasing power by locating, pricing and discovering local businesses while assisting them in increasing their sales without a substantial increase to their marketing budget.

The Market:
Fortuna's target market consists of two key consumer groups: 1) the paying clients, which would be enterprises classed as micro to medium, employing anywhere from 1-49 staff, of which there are currently 256,000; and 2) Ireland's digital citizens aged 18 and above, which amounts to 2.9 million people and growing. (This is our initial market; we have eye on global opportunities).

Progress/Proof:
Fortuna is currently progressing through the late stages of bug fixing and application tune-up with a market release capacity within 2-3 months.
Fortuna is looking to expand the existing digital services for local enterprises nationwide, to facilitate a competitive market at a low cost. Examples of this could be your local takeaway or barber, spending hundreds of Euro a month on Google and Facebook marketing to get leads marketing to people which may or may not want their service, while with Fortuna it would be €10-20, with customers looking for their service based on the criteria stated above.

Objectives/Future:
Fortuna's objectives are simply to provide local businesses such as corner shops, independent grocers and sole traders the same opportunities to market and promote their goods and services to their local community in a cost-effective way, giving them a level footing with the big guys.
Within 18 months of our launch, we plan to have a domestic consumer base of 450,000 app users with 4,000+ businesses on our platform, with further expansion globally with an end goal of 160 million users and 1,400,000+ businesses using the platform by the end of the 5th year of operation.

Positive steps:
- MVP undergoing debugging, with market release capacity within 2-3 months.
- Due to external market conditions the market we are entering is growing.
- Experienced team with 15 years of working in Software Development.
- Our team has a combined experience of 5 years of working in direct sales, marketing, customer support and problem solving (not software related issues).
- We have a vision that goes beyond just Fortuna, but a vision for a better, more competitive market, where the business currently left behind will actual get a chance to be the best they can be.

record.Creator: Nicholas J. Hott
record.Title: The Instant Hot Towel
record.Text:
My name is Nicholas Hott and I came up with the idea of an instant hot towel that you could have just about anywhere in April 2020.
I started experimenting with different types of containers, heating elements, and towels which took about a year come up with a working prototype. I then contacted a patent attorney and in July 2021.In September 2021, I received a 
The idea is simple and revolutionary:
 Imagine camping or hiking out in the middle of the woods, it's cold and rainy and there's no hot water nearby. However, you do have water and a towel, with this product, you could have a steaming hot towel within five minutes.
Instant hot towel is perfect for anybody that might be outdoors or in a situation where they need to quickly wash up with no access to bathroom facilities. Hunting, camping, hiking, fishing, playing golf, at the beach, stuck in traffic. 
The Instant Hot Towel will provide a warm refreshing way to rejuvenate yourself after a long and arduous adventure.
The Instant Hot Towel comes with detergent and tongs already included and comes in a variety of colors, fragrances and sizes. The container is made of  vacuum sealed double insulated clear plastic and a unique pop-up lid that prevents accidental spills.

record.Creator: Kyle Krantz
record.Title: Autastic Education
record.Text:
https://www.autasticeducation.com/home

Look, I don't know you, and yet I can pretty much guarantee that you know someone with autism. That’s because roughly 1 in 60 people will be on the autism spectrum. It might be a family member, a friend, a classmate.  Almost universally, these people and their families have to fight tooth and nail to get basic access to resources like mental healthcare and education. Unfortunately, this is especially true for children with autism.  Children on the autism spectrum need a lot of therapy.  A lot!  On average they are recommended 36 hours of ABA therapy per week but at $120 per hour that would cost $225,000 per year.  No one can afford that, so these kids miss out. When they get that therapy at an early age, they make more friends, they are more likely to get a job, and they live longer. But it's a full-time job, and most insurance companies aren't going to cover those costs. 

Virtually all of the cognitive skills a behavioral therapist teaches can be taught through software. Memory,  language, and  attention, contrary to our collective intuition, are the easiest tasks to teach at an early age. I worked with kids on the spectrum from 3 -23 years old, and with them in mind, designed a curriculum that can teach kids regardless of severity and regardless of age. With Autastic Education, we can give children all the therapeutic lessons they need, for $20 a month. Don't get me wrong, in-person therapy is the best option, but for most kids on the spectrum, they just aren't getting what they need. Talk to the parents, they will tell you how stressed they are, how short on time they are, and how hard they have to work to get their kids fairly basic access to healthcare. 

Our team consists of Jack Seagle who has helped design and scaffold much of the core curriculum within Autastic Education, he put together our Kickstarter, and he is the co-founder of Autastic. Katie Clark is the Regional Behavior Analyst for Northeastern Utah Educational Services. With a decade of experience and several degrees and certificates behind her name, she oversees 9 school districts and 4 charter schools. In the clinic, she would be checking to make sure I am doing my job right, with our app, it's pretty much the same thing.  We go to her for data analytics and to make sure our algorithms are on point. The curriculum needs to be very precise in order to work with all kinds of different folks. With Katie and Jack, it couldn't be more precise. Finally,  me. I'm Kyle Krantz and I’m a Board Certified Behavioral Technician, I work directly with the kids in the clinic. After a few years of working with kids on the spectrum, I started working on this project to help close the gap that all my clients were experiencing.

I know the numbers can be confusing but try to stick with me here. We are asking for $30,000, Kickstarter is an all or nothing platform, and if we dont get all of that than we get nothing and your money is given back. With $30,000 we can cover the remaining costs of our minimum viable product(MVP). Our MVP would be roughly $60,000, for 6 lessons and several minigames, this may not sound like much but this could be roughly 1000 hours of therapy (that would normally cost $120,000) But we need much more financial backing to build all the lessons we have planned. Each lesson averages roughly $8,000. We have the algorithms, and lesson designs worked out for 25 lessons taught through a process called discrete trial training.  All of these lessons will be provided at $20 a month.  With Kickstarter funding, we can help get this ball rolling.

 A good app needs to be fun, so we have lots of minigames designed and ready. A good app needs to be evidence-based, so running peer-reviewed research will be integral to our process (I'll be doing this initially but we will need to outsource later on). Our app is designed with low functioning autism in mind, but high functioning people with autism at a young age will benefit greatly.

We prioritize the lessons we build based on their utility. The first ten lessons we will build focus on attention and memory. These lessons increase how well kiddos can learn in the future, and research metrics for these lessons are more accurate. We then begin to focus on verbal and emotional understanding. If we can get enough funding, after those 25 lessons we start working on more sophisticated approaches involving echoics, facial and voice recognition, virtual reality and much more. Much of this will require a fairly extensive amount of research and is planned for the mid to long-term. 
If you would like to learn more about some of the technical details, check out our website at  https://www.autasticeducation.com/home

record.Creator: Simon Nicolas
record.Title: SYT - THE KARAOKE SINGING BATTLE APP
record.Text:
OVERVIEW
SYT is a karaoke app that you can sing along with that plays music. Aside from the common functions of karaoke, this app has special effects that can enhance your visual and audio experience. The main feature of this app is for you to invite and challenge other singers. This is where you can earn points from the voters and whoever wins the challenge. The main concept of this is app is to sing, invite, challenge, and let other voters decide on the winner to earn points. Another way of gaining points while using this app, is when other people can request for you to sing their favorite songs. People can buy a virtual gift card where they can donate or put it in the challenge pot for the singers to earn points. Upon reaching certain points, the singers can exchange the points for cash for minimal fee.

 Mission & Vision
⦁	 Our Mission is to help young and old people to show their  talent and to even challenge their friends or family to a music competition. 
⦁	To eradicate loneliness and depression, we help people work past their barriers, goals and insecurities.
⦁	Our Mission is to create an enjoyable and challenging app for fun. 
  IMPACT
Social media have taken an insurmountable impact in people's lives, and here comes SYT which provides people with the tools to overcome their Goal, insecurities and barriers so as to show their  talents, and ultimately to make more money and have fun.

                                                  HOW IT WORK





                            SING, RELEASE AND LET THE AUDIENCE VOTE.
Users selects their favorite songs from the song lists. Once its uploaded to the database and the user decides if they would like to keep the performance private or share it with the community. Once uploaded, users then can release to the feed for a challenge. Set how much is the wager and how many days is the challenge will be. Invite family and friends so they can VOTE and add coins to the pot money.

 CAMPAIGN OBJECTIVE 
What we need 
Right now, we are turning to you for helping to raise the funds to get our movement of the ground to operationalize our business to help inspire change, continue a movement in our world and perhaps go viral in our approach, we need $5000 for IOS and Android development and getting music license collection, be apart of this and help us spread the love.

Our goal through this campaign is to raise $5,000. What we are asking from you today is an open heart, open donation, and helping hands. 
Even the smallest of contributions will make a big difference for us - for every pledge, above $5 we will send a Personal Thank you email to you as a token of appreciation along with other rewards given for the donation.

     ABOUT ME
Hi i am Simon Nicolas The CEO and Founder of Karaoke Battle App, Former  Electrical Engineering student in University of Nevada, Las Vegas. Currently, I am a skycap for American Airlines. and I am committed to offer my knowledge to improve the experience of lovers of karaoke.

                                      RISKS & CHALLENGES
We strategically partnered with vender's that will help us achieve our movement to inspire change and meet all product deadlines happen.                                            
Things can happen outside out of control that may delay shipments but we will do everything in our power to ensure products are delivered in a timely manner. Our commitment is to be fully transparent.

     IF YOU LOVE TO SING AND UP FOR A CHALLENGE, SYT IS JUST FOR YOU.

 OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP
In addition to supporting this project with your donation, you can also show your support by sharing a link to this campaign on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media platforms you use. The more people that are aware the more it will make this campaign a success.










 We appreciate all your support, both monetary and non-monetary, and we thank you for taking the time to read about what we are doing.
