record.Creator: dwayne@2DKits.com
record.Title: LED Cube 4x4x4 and Tower 8x4x4 kit.
record.Text:
We created the original cube kit back in 2012. We are taking what we learned in the original design and shifting to a 32 bit processor, adding WiFi and Internet of Things functions. Our goal is to achieve the volume needed to make the target pricing.
The kits have all the parts except solder, power supply and tools.
Both the cube and tower have:

Multiple patterns
pattern selection buttons
powered via the micro USB connector
WiFi to connect to the internet
WiFi hotspot, to access and config it.
web server UI
DFU (Downloadable Firmware Update)
Cloud based Pattern Library
command line interface (USB serial)

Tower kit has

12 PCB boards
128 LEDs
ESP32 module
driver chips

Cube kit has

8 PCB boards
64 LEDs
ESP32 module
driver chips

Dale and Dwayne started creating kits and running learn-to-solder workshops 16 years ago. We noticed it was getting harder and harder to do home projects. The kits and parts market we used in our youth was gone. At some point the general public’s view of soldering shifted to something too dangerous. Kids can bicycle, ski , or toboggan, but don’t use that soldering iron. It’s too dangerous. The era of build and repair it your self was dying and companies like Heathkit and Radio Shack have faded into the sunset. Even today with the new emphasis on STEM education, we still hit multiple obstacles. Many events have to clear our appearance with the fire marshals, lawyers, building inspectors, etc. We are working to prove soldering is easy, and not a deadly activity.

record.Creator: Directa Textile Solutions
record.Title: Graphene Plus STARSHIP JACKET
record.Text:
Graphene is known as the wonder material: it is the lightest, the strongest and the best heat and electricity conductor material ever known.
Thanks to its outstanding characteristics and its ability to operate as a super-additive Graphene Plus is a quantum-leap for traditional applications. G+®  enhances textiles and ensures new perfromance meaning it is a PLUS.





The Starship Jacket aims to build an innovative and technological experience around customers. G+® means no compromise: ultimate clothing performance & sustainability.
















 External fabric: a state-of-the-art black hydrophilic and elastic polyamide fabric (water column >7000mm H2O). This external layer is tunned with an exclusive Graphene Plus coating that delivers antibacterial and antiviral properties, tear & wear resistance, and UV protection. Since details matter, the Graphene Plus coating has been specifically engineered in highly exposed areas: shoulders, bust and all zip guards. Aesthetically the coating creates a three-dimensional effect as of a raised metallic and iridescent grid, enhanced by the unique grey color of Graphene Plus.
 
 Internal layer: Graphene Plus 20-micron membrane. This is the technological heart of the Starship Jacket, allowing optimal management of the heat naturally produced by human body. In fact, the Graphene Plus membrane creates a thermally conductive path that allows heat to move from the hottest to the coldest points, thus homogenizing the temperature inside the garment. When the membrane is coupled to an insulating fabric, the G+ membrane absorbs body heat and re-radiates it towards the user, generating greater insulation and increasing the temperature of the microclimate inside the garment, while maintaining the characteristic of breathability. Our Graphene Plus membrane overperforms every traditional technological sportwear ensuring a dynamic interaction with the body and adapting the temperature to the evolution of the user thermal profile.
 
 Internal fabric: a smooth, luxury-feeling white lining. We took the highest attention to all aspects of the Starship Jacket; in fact, all internal stitching has been welded together with special orange tapes. This recalls the Graphene Plus logo and further increases thermal isolation.





















Where do I choose my size and give my delivery address?  A couple of days/weeks (depending on your reward level) after the campaign is finished, we will send you a survey where you’ll need to choose your size and input your desired delivery address.

record.Creator: Marine Infinite Sailing Spirit
record.Title: AquaX10 - Water Filtration for Sailing Boats
record.Text:
Imagine sailing without thinking about the management of your water supply. 
Imagine being totally independent because you have a system on your boat that 
up-cycles your used water and returns clean water.
Imagine the freedom of sailing wherever you want with an AquaX10 on your boat.  





















Being free to sail wherever you want, whenever you want, while protecting the local resources is our definition of freedom. 





As we are sailors ourselves, we permanently think about improving the sailing experience and the ecological impact of our beloved passion.
Making your sailing experience more exciting, smooth and sustainable is the goal that we're dedicated to. 
Using the shower on a boat can be a challenging experince. As water is scarce you have to shower as quick as possible.  And even by shortening the timespan of this beloved luxury, you will run out of water as your crew also has to wash the salt out of their hair and skin. It's always a limiting factor.
For us and our sailor friends it always saddened us when, we had to leave a beautiful sunset in a bay to sail to a crammed, expensive Marina, just because we've run out of fresh water.  





So, our idea was: 
Let's start to improve the largest water consumer unit on a boat. 
And this is your shower.
What if we could multiply the amount of  water on our boat? Maybe by up to 10x ? 





We can reach this goal by adjusting the way your shower works!
Our concept states:
If we don't want to dumb precious water in the sea we need to close the water cycle in your boat. This will be done with our system.
Finally, this concept will give us way more options in terms of flexibility and sailing destinations.
So we developed the AquaX10 . 






Your solution to multiply the amount of clean and fresh water on your boat. 
With the AquaX10 you extend the freedom of your sailing trips.  
No longer will you have to leave a bay or that magic spot where you want to stay. 
Multiply your fresh water and be free. 
This is our take on sustainable sailing. 





We offer an environmentally-friendly product which recycles sweet water that would otherwise be pumped into the sea and therefore be lost to the salt water.
The AquaX10 is our contribution to saving precious sweet water whilst sailing. 
Giving you the freedom of having a big topic off your To-Do list. 
How to get fresh and clean water. 
The AquaX10 takes care of that for you. 





For a long time electricity and water have been the major resources that limited our sailing experience. In the last years, the electricity issue has been widely solved with solar panels and wind generators. 





Now we will solve the last limiting factor on your boat. 
Water!





Backing this campaign and supporting the AquaX10 will give you the opportunity to contribute to a better personal sailing experience and a cleaner environment. 
Using our advanced filtration techniques will give you fresh and pure water on your boat for an entire trip. And the best is yet to come. 

Prototypes of the AquaX10 are already installed on sailing boats.
Now we're in the process of testing, improving and adjusting them on our sailing boat and the boats of our families and friends. This means, we're going through the final R&D process.  Our system produces fresh water and the Prototype is working as planned. If we achieve our funding goal on Kickstarter, we can start to develop this system into a  smarter and automatized version for you. We will develop a system that is more comfortable and includes an easy to use Touch-Display System.
We'll finish the process of testing and adjusting the Prototypes, finetuning  of the filters and development of our controller in the end of winter 2021.





Our confidence in the projected timeline is strong, With your backing, we'll be on track to start shipping products to backers during Q2/2022. We are excited to see Kickstarter backers with our AquaX10 in harbours around the world soon!





With the AquaX10 we focus on the water cycle e.g. in the shower of your boat. We make sure that every drop of water is used.  The setup provides you with a specialized system which includes active coal filtration techniques to clean your water to the size of 0,01 µm. 
This is even smaller than the size of bacteria or, in times of COVID, the size of a virus spore.  
Our system and its single components are designed and optimized for boats.
We tested many setups considering major factors of the marine environment like energy, water flow, internal pressure, outside temperature, humidity and many more.
This iteration process brought us to the setup we're now using in the AquaX10.
All the substances in your waste water have to go through multiple filtration and cleaning sequences in the AquaX10. 
The waste water will be filtered and the clean result goes back to your fresh water tank. Through this internal cycle, we make sure that the system will be clean and you get up to 10 x the amount of water from your tank.





With the integration of the AquaX10 you create a water circuit within your boat which will provide fresh water for you and your Crew. Wherever you are. Whenever you want. The filters can clean up to 10.000 litres of sweet water before they have to be changed. You can be sure to have clean water on your boat that can be used to shower, etc.











You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00




































First things first: Our shipping guarantee to you
We've already negotiated resources for production facilities and we work with an experienced partner from the industry. 
As we've mentioned above: 
We'll finish the process of testing and adjusting the Prototypes, fine tuning of the filters and development of our controller in the end of winter 2021. 
With your support we'll be able start the production of the AquaX10 systems.

The revolutionary size and positioning of the AquaX10 system
We all know one thing for sure.
Size matters.
Especially on a boat.






 Ca. zum Gewicht und den Abmessungen schreiben

The AquaX10 system is designed in accordance with the space limitations on sailing yachts. We took great care in making sure that we develop a system that is as small and flexible as possible. Using the limited space you have on your boat to its best possible use.
But we didn't stop there. We constructed the inner life of the AquaX10 as solid as possible. 
The AquaX10 is as flexible as you need it to be.
To make life easy for you, the AquaX10 is a fully deployable solution.  
With our package you will be able to set up a functioning system on your boat.  
If you want to, you can do this by yourself. 
We provide the following components in the Starter Packs offered here.

The complete projected package in one picture 





Our goal with this Kickstrater Campaign is to get enough funding for the next step in the development of the AquaX10.  Through your support we will go further to make the system smarter and easier to use. 
As a part of the kIckstarter campaign your package will include the next evolutionary step of the AquaX10. The components listed below will be additionally realized through the funding of this campaign.





All the components you need to set up the whole system, like tubes, fittings, connectors, technical equipment etc. will be in the package that we deliver to you.
All parts have generously been calculated to make sure that you don't run out of tubes, connectors, etc. Backups are included.
All our backers will receive a packing list, installation guide and installation assistance and services. If you face an obstacle we'll be there for you. 
In the unlikely case that something is missing or too short, send us an E-Mail and we will send whatever is missing.




















Water Analysis Certificates (Prototype)










Waste, pollution and microsplastics have become a massively increasing problem in the ocean.   





Making sure that sailing will be as sustainable as possible, it is our mission to create solutions that protect the environment and benefit you - our sailor friends.
The AquaX10 is one big piece of the puzzle to make your sailing experience sustainable and comfortable. But we don't stop there.
Our company supports water protection NGOs like Viva con Agua on a monthly basis.





We see it as our obligation to contribute to the change that is necessary to protect the environment.










Products and post campaign purchases
The AquaX10 is only the start of our journey. 
We believe that sailing and everything that accompanies this experience should be as smooth and easy as possible.  Therefore, we launch the AquaX10 as the building brick of the Marine Infinite Platform. On our Website you will find selected products that have been chosen and tested by us and our sailor friends.
We believe in the beauty of simplicity and clarity. So we will only offer what we believe will make your life happier and your sailing experience more beautiful.
Giving you the security to know that you've chosen a great product instead of wasting precious hours of your life researching endless Websites.
Watch out for more products in the next months on our Website. If you want to stay in contact with us, just subscribe to our Newsletter. As we hate Spam ourselves, you can be sure we will get in contact with you on a monthly basis. 

Addendum: Taxes & Custom Tariffs
Please note:
The European VAT is included in the Kickstarter price. If you order outside of the EU, it is likely possible that there are higher VATs &  custom tariffs in  your country. These higher VATs and tariffs are not part of the Kickstarter price that we offer. They have to be paid separately by the customer.

Do you have questions?
If yes, drop us a line to info@marine-infinite.com

record.Creator: Alex Eastick
record.Title: Test In Your City: Find and book a COVID-19 test
record.Text:
COVID-19 testing will become normalized. I want to make it easier.
We're are doing great in the fight against COVID-19 so far, but the battle may have just begun. In order to stop further outbreaks and save lives, testing must continue for the foreseeable future. And experts recommend COVID-19 testing becomes routine. 

“As more contagious coronavirus variants emerge and lockdown measures are relaxed, the nation needs to intensify, not scale back, nationwide testing efforts.” - Dr Jennifer B. Nuzzo, Emily N. Pond, epidemiologists, Johns Hopkins Coronavirus Resource Center (https://www.nytimes.com/2021/03/12/opinion/need-covid-tests.html)

“If someone’s at an increased risk for severe illness or has close contact with someone who’s at an increased risk for severe illness, I think getting tested regularly is smart,” - Suzanne Pham, MD, medical director of the COVID-19 response team at Weiss Memorial Hospital, Chicago  (https://www.health.com/condition/infectious-diseases/coronavirus/covid-testing)
 
"Eventually, testing will be normalized" (https://www.health.com/condition/infectious-diseases/coronavirus/covid-testing)
 

It is still possible to contract and spread COVID-19 when you are double vaccinated, and the Delta variant of the infection is more likely than other variants to spread through unvaccinated people (https://www.nature.com/articles/d41586-021-02187-1)

Currently, the only way to book a COVID-19 test is from a computer or mobile browser. There are a few problems with this:

You may be away from home, at work, or just sitting on the couch and don't want to fire up your computer for what should be a simple task. We're not always near our computers, or we may not own a computer.
Mobile browsers aren't user-friendly for this type of task
Finding an available COVID-19 test and booking it takes time. You have to search for an available test, search for a test that is close to you, and then there are forms to fill in.
Overall, it's currently a complicated, stressful, and time-consuming task


*If you are uninsured, it is also significantly more complicated to locate and book a COVID-19 test, because some healthcare providers will not allow patients to book without insurance*

Test In Your City is the first free mobile app of its kind dedicated to finding and booking a COVID-19 test. 

            Connected to a nationwide database of every Hospital, Urgent Care, Community Health Center, Pharmacy, and COVID-19 testing site, Test In Your City will let users easily find and book an available COVID-19 test based on criteria that are important to them: convenience, location, test availability, waiting time for results, and other criteria.

            My goal is to make the future of COVID-19 testing as accessible and simple as possible, for everyone.


























(App prototype. The team of expert developers we'll be working with will finalize designs)







You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































**I am aiming for future versions of Test In Your City to include simple, fuss-free ordering of FDA-approved at-home COVID-19 testing kits. This feature will include price comparisons to find the lowest cost at-home testing kit available. We want COVID-19 testing to be as accessible and simple as possible, for everyone**

Your backing will go towards having Test In Your City developed, marketing, and HIPAA approval. 
The majority of the $80,000 will be spent on HIPAA compliance. HIPPA compliance is important to keep your details safe and secure -- this is a priority.

Hi Backers! Alex here, from Test In Your City.
I understand that you're not always near a computer, or own a computer. I understand that you may not have insurance or may prefer to attend a drive-thru testing site. And I definitely understand it's important to be tested regularly for COVID-19. Most importantly, I understand that time is important, and you don't want to waste it searching for an available COVID-19 test, filling in forms to book the test, and traveling out of your way to the test location.

 
Test In Your City will be completely free and will not contain ads.

Let's make the future of COVID-19 testing as easy as possible, for everyone.

Your backing will go towards having Test In Your City developed and available to everyone, ready to make going forward with the 'new normal' a little simpler. 

I'd love to show you the timeline for having the app built and its projected costs, so please contact me directly on Kickstarter or at alex@testinyourcity.com if you would like to see these.

If funding is successful, I'll keep you up to date on the development of Test In Your City in the 'Updates' section here.
And even if you can't back the project here on Kickstarter, you can still help by sharing with your friends, family, and colleagues!

Please feel free to reach out with any questions or comments using the 'contact me' link at the top of this page -- this is our project. 
 
Stay safe,
Alex

record.Creator: Quantum Robotic Systems
record.Title: QBii: The Multi-Function Service Robot
record.Text:
What if everyone could have a robot that was actually many robots in one?
This exciting idea led us to create QBii, an affordable, multi-functional and expandable service robot. While most other robots are limited to only one function, QBii performs a host of useful tasks to make your life easier.

Capabilities
















You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































Carry: For such a small robot, QBii can carry surprisingly heavy items (up to 50lb). This allows QBii to help you move things like groceries, boxes, laundry, bins and furniture.






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































Clean: Like many service robots, QBii can clean your floors. The difference is, QBii will let you use the brooms, mops and dusters you already own. QBii is able to clean floors in workplaces as well. 
You will need the Broom Adapter Kit add-on to attach cleaning tools to QBii. 
QBii has been tested with vacuum cleaners as well. A separate adapter for wand-style vacuum cleaners is planned (not part of this campaign) and will become available in the near future.






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































Cart: Amazingly, this 9-pound robot can tow up to 200 lb. This lets you convert almost any utility cart (like this one) into a robotic cart.
You will need the Cart Hitch Kit add-on to attach utility carts to QBii. 






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































Climb: QBii is expandable, allowing you to use it as a platform to develop your own projects. In fact, this expansion capability has allowed us to develop ROSA, the Robotic Stairclimbing Assistant.
ROSA is under development and is expected to be available by mid-2022. ROSA is not part of this campaign.

Expansion Kit



Expansion Port





Lidar Sensor Array





Action Camera mounted to Expansion Port


QBii's optional Expansion Port allows you to connect external electronic devices (e.g., sensors), an auxiliary third motor, and an external power port. Mounting holes (1/4-20) let you mount auxiliary hardware, such as an action camera (not included) for teleoperation or inspections tasks.
A Lidar Sensor Array allows QBii to locate itself in its environment in order to improve path following performance. These sensors also enable advanced capabilities like Simultaneous Location and Mapping (SLAM).
The Expansion Port (including third motor controller) and Lidar Sensor Array are part of the Expansion Kit add-on.

Control App



Control App on Smartphones and Tablets





App Screens


Overview
To operate QBii, you will use the QRS Control App, which runs on smartphones and tablets (not included). The Control App allows you to run QBii in teleoperation mode ('joystick' mode) or in autonomous mode ('path following'). You can use the built-in Path Editor to create and run customized paths.

No lines on the floor! No embedded cables! QBii can operate autonomously without any infrastructure changes to your home or workplace.

Current Functionality
The current functionality of the Control App and how it relates to QBii's various capabilities is illustrated in the series of videos below:






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































Accessing the App: The App can be installed on a smartphone or tablet. 






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































Connecting to the Robot: The App and robot interact using a Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) client/server protocol. You will need to connect the App to your robot in order to operate it.






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































Joystick Mode: In teleoperation (or 'joystick') mode, you can use the App to drive the robot directly.






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































Joystick Mode in Cart (or Any) Configuration: Joystick Mode works regardless of how the robot is configured, i.e., by itself, carrying a load, cleaning the floor, or towing a cart. Joystick Mode lets you operate the robot directly in any of these configurations. To illustrate this point, this video shows Joystick while in 'cart' configuration.






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































Creating a Path: The most powerful feature of the Control App is that it lets you create, save, and run robot paths. Using the Path Editor, these paths are built up as a series of from simple segments (e.g., "Drive", "Turn"). You can name and save your paths to be reused later. In this video we create a simple path called "Zig" to illustrate the process.






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































Running a Path: Using its Path Running ('Map') screen, the Control App provides a graphical representation of a saved path. You can then "press play" and have the robot run this path. The App shows you a real-time update of the robot's actual position as it executes the path.  This video shows the robot running the simple 'Zig' path.






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































Using a Path to Carry a Bin: As with Joystick Mode, Path Following Mode is independent of how the robot is configured. To illustrate this point, this video shows how the simple 'Zig' path we created in an earlier video can be used to direct QBii to deliver a bin to a specific location.  






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































Using a Path to Clean the Floor: In this example we've equipped QBii with a floor sweeper. We then ran the 'Zig' test path to show how reusable paths can be used for any purpose, including cleaning the floor. In an actual application, more complex floor sweeping patterns can be constructed. Different patterns can be used for different parts of your house or building.   






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































Using a Path to Tow A Cart: In this final example we've attached QBii to a cart. Again, the 'Zig' test path is used to show how a robotic cart can be sent on a specific route from A to B.    

Planned Improvements to the Control App
The functionality of the Control App (Rev 2), as shown in our project videos above, exists and has been tested. However, we are in the process of making improvements. 
Plans for Rev 3 include the following:

 Platform Migration: Completion of migration to a multi-platform App in React Native. Rev 2 represents the mid-way point of this migration. Rev 2 has been tested on Android smartphones and tablets. Rev 3 is planned to operate equally well under iOS as well.
 Refinements: Refinements to existing screens and functions.
 Localization using Lidar Sensors: We demonstrated the ability to read a sensor array consisting of three fixed-point (non-rotating) lidar sensors, in order to get range measurements between the robot and its surroundings (e.g., walls, fixtures). We have also demonstrated the ability to use this data to localize the robot, i.e., update its running estimate of where it is in the world. We have used this to generate a point-cloud map of the robot's surroundings. This is a precursor to Simultaneous Mapping and Localization (SLAM). However, these demonstrations currently exist as stand-alone pieces of code that are not yet integrated into the Control App. Plans for Rev 3 call for adding the code into the main Control App, thereby providing support for lidar sensors and localization. 
 Simplified Path Following: We are working towards a simplified One-Click Destination capability, which will allow you to specify a destination, letting the App will do the rest. 

Our goal is to have Rev 3 of the Control App coincide with delivery of Rev 3 QBii units as part of this campaign.

Who Can Benefit from QBii?



Users who can benefit from QBii


Since QBii is uniquely multi-functional, it is ideal for both home or work, and is a versatile tool for educators and hobbyists alike.

QBii Robot Kit
To offer you the best possible value, we are providing the option of selecting the QBii Robot Kit as your pledge reward.  The Kit includes all the components needed for a complete, fully functional QBii robot, which you can assemble yourself. The Kit comes together using simple hand tools and no soldering is required. 

This option is ideal for hobbyists, DIYers, STEM educators/students, or anyone who enjoys hands-on projects.

But don't worry. If assembly isn't your thing, we'll do it for you (see Assembly Add-on). 

*Important note* Battery charger AC plug is compatible with North American electrical outlets. Adapters for non-North American outlets are not included.



QBii Robot Kit


Support for STEM Education with Kit Donations
Most of our junior engineers and developers have participated on high school robotics teams. Our founder, Dr. Frank Naccarato, was also a robotics mentor for many years. We have benefitted from STEM-based curriculum. This campaign is an opportunity to give back. That's why we've added a reward tier that allows backers to contribute towards our donation of QBii Robot Kits to schools. For every 10 backers at this level, we will build a Kit for the express purpose of donating it to an academic institution.



Pledges will allow QRS to donate QBii Robot Kits in support of STEM Education


Reward Tiers & Add-Ons













QRS's stylish and extremely sought-after keychain


Development Roadmap
For the past year and a half, we have designed, fabricated and tested two prior generations of prototypes: Rev 1 (proof-of-concept) and Rev 2 (fully functional). 
In fact, all the photos and videos you see here are of Rev 2 prototypes.
A successful campaign will allow us to reach the following development milestones:

Update of the Rev 3 design to incorporate the lessons learned from Rev 2
Add important refinements to the Control App and onboard embedded software
Refine the Expansion Kit


About Quantum Robotic Systems (QRS)
Tasks involving lifting, pushing and carrying (e.g., lifting laundry, carrying groceries, cleaning the floor) are often challenging, especially for seniors and people with limited mobility. On stairs, performing these tasks becomes laborious at best and dangerous at worst, potentially leading to serious injury (falls, back strain, etc.).
Quantum Robotic Systems Inc. (QRS) is a Toronto-based company that addresses this problem by making unique mobile autonomous robots. QRS has developed and patented a novel stair-climbing technology that allows users to carry heavy, bulky loads up and down stairs in an easier, faster and safer way. The company has incorporated this technology into its Robotic Stairclimbing Assistant (ROSA), a service robot that can carry things while climbing up and down stairs. 
QRS was founded by Dr. Frank Naccarato. Frank is an inventor, entrepreneur, consultant and professor with over 30 years’ experience in R&D and product development. After completing his doctorate in robotics at the University of Toronto’s Institute for Aerospace Studies, Dr. Naccarato worked as a research engineer, designer, project manager and director of R&D. His past projects include a control algorithm developed for the International Space Station and a robotic testing machine for medical laboratories. 



Frank Naccarato, Ph.D., P.Eng., founder and president of Quantum Robotic Systems


Why Kickstarter?
One of the toughest challenges for a small technology start-up is finding a way to get early products out there, into the hands of real users, in a cost-feasible way. 
A successful campaign for QBii will give QRS just that opportunity. 
Kickstarter will allow us to realize our production ready design (Rev 3) and introduce it to the world on a large scale.
We will also be able to demonstrate early market traction, which will allow us to leverage the sales realized through Kickstarter into further outside investment and additional government support for R&D.
We will also be able to start negotiating volume rates for parts and materials, which will bring our manufacturing costs down.
So, your support will have a major impact on our future success. 
It's a big deal! 
Thank you!

record.Creator: Airshield solar power car fresher
record.Title: A solar-powered aroma diffuser for your car!
record.Text:
No Batteries! A solar-powered aroma diffuser for your car!
Are you looking for car aromatherapy so that you can enjoy a pleasant smell while driving? Our Solar power car Aromatherapy Air Freshener quickly and effectively replaces aromas such as cigarettes, food, and other odors with a fresh, long-lasting smell
A fully solar-powered aroma diffuser that uses a Galaxy planet ball top to help spread aroma quickly and widely!

 1.non-traditional gifts.
 New explosive gifts to help children interested in  space exploration 

 2. Low MOQ for customizing your logo


Only need 30 pcs can make your own logo on the aroma diffuser

 3. Innovative products that guarantee the uniqueness of the gift

 
Welcome to visit our website airshield.life for further information







An Eco-friendly aroma diffuser that runs solely on solar power no batteries required!!
A large part behind the design of the  Airshiled X3 Galaxy solar power car Aroma, and the use of no batteries was in order to fit with the UN Sustainable Development Goals. By using solar power, we can help to reduce the waste that occurs from using
multiple batteries with devices and allows us to harness the natural resource of the Sun. We want to go forward with all our projects with these SDGs in mind, trying to help change the world one product at a time.

Product Parameter












· 【Compact Size】：Airshield Car Diffuser: 5.5x Ø 6 cm, 0.125kg





【Solar      Powered】：This air freshener auto rotates anywhere with the      sun, no batteries needed, so you can make it a great decoration of home or      your car







· 【High quality & Environmentally Friendly】：The aromatherapy tablets directly extracted from plants, not harmless to children and pregnant women;






·  All parts are made of high-quality material Aviation AL alloy







【Illusory galaxy】 Blue-green auroral planet put the universe in your car easily





【Anti-focusing design】Sphere anti-focusing design, You don’t have to worry about the fire caused by the focus of the sphere. You can rest assured


【Whole connection】The anti-falling structure make sure the product is stable on rough roads



【Variable posture】The halo can swing up and down and the angel can be changed at will






【High conversion and long shelf life】As long as there is enough light and heat,it can rotate automatically, Aeronautical light-sensitive energy concentrating board, No need to recharge



【Pure copper-bearing motor】Bulit-in low-voltage brushless motor, Strong power, Durable






【washing runs as usual】
It is made of aerospace-grade aluminum alloy and is not afraid of high-temperature exposure. Aerospace aluminum alloy, cold and warm, Water resistance






【Zero friction】 avoid rattling noise when goes on bumpy roads and also shaking on off-road





【Environmental protection incense ring】French original incense is available for pregnant babies
The car aroma is made from plant-derived essential oils with an elegant and long-lasting fragrance


【Easy to Operate】： unscrew the cover, put the perfume pad in, and screw the cover, tear the tape to fix the air freshener





How We Designed the X3 Galaxy solar power car Aroma
My name is Wu Qun
The horror that gripped the entire society during the SARS period is still vivid in our minds. There were 8,422 cases of SARS worldwide, and the disease death rate was nearly 11%. It took the lives of 919 people and caused irreparable pain to the families concerned for the rest of their lives.
After marriage, I welcomed the birth of my children, and whenever there was an infectious epidemic, a sneeze, a cough, I was touched by how many times I went in and out of the hospital, queues of people...
Bird flu; influenza; Ebola, each time more motivated to research and development to achieve...






One of the things that we wanted to make sure of was that we could use solar energy to make it work. One of the big reasons is that by doing so we can make a portable compact base that doesn’t rely on batteries. Not relying on batteries means that wherever you are you can use them, as well as being kind to the environment.





【Illusory galaxy】 Blue-green auroral planet, but the universe in your car easily, As well as this, we wanted to Stimulate children's interest in exploring the universe so we use a Galaxy crystal ball, 
As some car fresher, the ball is separate, so it is very easy to fall at the rough roads, And We use the whole connection anti-falling structure make sure Product is stable in rough roads







Returns:

record.Creator: Tim
record.Title: Magic Message Box
record.Text:
Due to the pandemic, many couples, friends and relatives have had to separate from each other. So I came up with an idea to build something to alleviate this situation. And I call this the "Magic Message Box", which should simply receive a text message and present it on an OLED display after you open its lid. 
Yeah, it practically does a simple function that even the oldest cellphone could do. But it is a small box with an attractive appearance and because it's a box, you may keep some tiny meaningful things in it. You may stick an old photo to the inner side of the lid to remind you of who sends you this box or the precious moments of your life.
The message sender could be anyone who knows the serial no. of the box and is able to use the internet. Actually the sender would usually be the one who gives the receiver this box as a gift. 

It can be a gift sent to your grandparents, who may not know how to use a smartphone but always have your photo safely kept in an album.
It can be a gift sent to your lover, who loves all kinds of expressions of romance.
It can be a gift sent to your kids, who like toys and like playing different magical games with you all the time.
It can be a gift sent to your close friend who you always have little secrets to share with.

After all these thoughts floated in my head, I started to draft the sketch and all its relevant components. 





Then I started to buy things. I was thinking, there might be some existing attractive boxes being sold in the market and I didn't have to design a new one which would consume unnecessary resources and wouldn't be environmentally friendly. So I purchased the box, display, power module, Wi-Fi module...everything online.
Upon receipt of those components, I started working on the programming of the website and the control module respectively.  










Finally, I started to build the prototype.   






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































Then, fortunately, it worked!
I would like to share this prototype with everyone, so I decided to launch this project on Kickstarter, and hopefully, with the support from you guys, I would be able to commercialise this product. And I definitely know, from prototype to mass production, there is still a long way to go.
And I also want to improve the design by adding other functions & modules.
Lastly, it would be much appreciated that Magic Message Box could be on your list when you are considering sending a gift to someone you care about most.
You may also scan the QR code or click on the link to take a glance at the website: 
https://qrgo.page.link/KMGsb  















The videos below illustrate how to upload a message to Magic Message Box. 









You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00

record.Creator: Kernom
record.Title: RIDGE: the first Augmented Analog overdrive pedal.
record.Text:
WE INVENTED AUGMENTED ANALOG
Analog Morphing Core is the name of a new and unique patented approach to electronic clipping circuits developed by Kernom. An Analog Morphing Core equipped device, like the RIDGE, controls the nonlinear elements of the clipping stage (traditionally diodes) by changing in real time their threshold, making them behave like a new kind of diode.
It allows musicians to have access to a virtually infinite number of clipping options: symmetric, asymmetric, high headroom, very compressed, etc. in a single analog circuit, controlled by the unique Mood knob. Completely different from approaches such as modeling and switches between different diodes.
The result is an extremely versatile and unique analog circuit. 
Analog, Augmented.























This is an animated gif. Give it time to load.


Use the mood knob to select from the ultimate clean boost to a fully compressed overdriven sound. Ever dreamed of a heavily distorted sound, that would still react to your playing?
Symmetric, asymmetric, high headroom, compressed … you decide.
A never-ending journey through overdrive sound flavors.










Choose between ultimate transparency at any grit level with the three EQ knobs at noon, or colour your sound using the powerful EQ section.
Change the way the pedal reacts to your guitar with the PRE knob, how it interacts with your amp with the POST knob, how you cut through or blend in the mix with the MID knob. 





Punish the front end of your amp like never before thanks to the 30V maximum output voltage of the RIDGE and experience extreme dynamics.










Here are some samples of how the RIDGE sounds. Just to make you wait until you get yours.
















































Connect the RIDGE to your expression pedal and explore new possibilities. 
Adjust drive level, boost your mids, or blend two completely different tones together. The possibilities are endless.



This is an animated gif. Give it time to load. Illustrative purposes only : knobs don’t physically move, only settings do.







The RIDGE features an internal preset that can be used without the need to use an external device, accessible via the Preset footswitch. Rhythm and lead tone, clean and dirty, or any other combination: you have access to two sounds at any time. Simply hold the Preset footswitch for 2 seconds and save the current position of the knobs for later use.










The RIDGE is entirely MIDI compatible. You can plug an external MIDI switcher to the RIDGE via mini jack to save and recall up to 128 different presets and cover all your overdrive needs. 
You can also connect the RIDGE to a third party controller (like the incredible Erae Touch from our friends at EMBODME) and change in real time its internal parameters to explore new ways to interact with overdrive.










You can use all your instruments with The RIDGE: guitar, but also bass, synths and vocals. This is made possible thanks to the pedal’s adaptive input gain. You can choose between instrument level or line level at any time to use the RIDGE on all your tracks.










We showed the RIDGE to professional musicians. Here is what they had to say about it!
















"Want endless overdrive flavours from an analog circuit? This new pedal from the French startup aims to provide just that"






"…the Kernom products are being made in a state-of-the-art factory in France that works on medical projects, so I’m expecting great build quality."






 " ...this control could give you access to symmetric, asymmetric, high headroom, and compressed drive tones. That’s a lot of useful overdrive tones in one pedal."






"Kernom nous propose avec la RIDGE une nouvelle approche grâce à sa technologie brevetée Analog Morphing Core. Il s'agit pour faire simple d'un circuit d'écrêtage du signal qui reste 100% analogique et sur lequel Kernom a ajouté un variateur d'intensité numérique sur les éléments non-linéaires."







"RIDGE can provide unlimited clipping options and operate within 30V to obtain greater headroom."






 "The circuitry includes their new Analog Morphing Core that is a new approach to clipping circuits."






"Le nom de cette très, très jeune entreprise innovante française pourrait vite entrer au panthéon d'une foule de musiciens à l’affût de solutions et matériels susceptibles de leur ouvrir de nouveaux champs de créativité."






"La marque française Kernom fait une entrée en fanfare dans le monde des effets avec la Ridge, une pédale d'overdrive augmentée."






"Unlimited clipping options in one analogue circuit"
















The RIDGE comes in a vibrant and iconic color called Summit White. White is the sum of all colors, just like the RIDGE can deliver all the flavors of overdrive we all know and love.
To celebrate the launch of the RIDGE on Kickstarter we also created an exclusive dark red finish that reacts beautifully to different lighting setups, going from a beautiful brown to a deep blood red. We called it Blood Rust. The Blood Rust RIDGE will only be available to Kickstarter backers. Grab one while you can!



Backers will be able to pick the color of their RIDGE shortly after the end of the Kickstarter campaign












The casing was inspired by the architectural design language of modernism. It has a strong personality, but remains easy to operate. Every detail on the Ridge was a conscious decision. We started from a blank page to design an iconic product that would withstand the hardships of the road and decades of abuse.















Kernom aims at providing musicians with the most reliable and performant products possible. 
Kernom products are manufactured in a state of the art factory in France that works on medical projects, a field where precision and reliability are of paramount importance.

record.Creator: Kehinde Fasehun
record.Title: PLATFORM
record.Text:
Introduction

Hi, my name is Kehinde Fasehun and I am a junior and Entrepreneurship and Innovation major at Clarkson University where I am working on a project called Platform. Platform is a freemium service aimed at being a creative and collaborative social networking application aimed at connecting individuals with projects and ideas to individuals that have the skill/monetary-based resources needed to make those projects and ideas a reality. It's a centralized virtual space for project collaborators (ex.  Artists, Designers, creators, and Visionaries). It's almost like Kickstarter as well, except people cannot only support projects financially, but they can also contribute to them with their skills.

In a sense, Platform is a mix of Reddit's communal section, Instagram's interesting content, Tinder's matchmaking algorithm, and LinkedIn's job recruitment section; combined in hopes of creating a relaxed or perhaps creative community for people to diffuse and collaborate on projects big and small.

Our team is comprised of 4 co-founders, 3 of which are recent Clarkson University graduates and one undergraduate. We started Platform because of a common issue all 4 of us faced from prior projects. The issue of finding project collaborators. Because of that shared issue we faced, we quickly realized that in a broader sense, other people also shared similar pains in finding people with shared interests who are passionate enough to join them on the adventure of creative collaboration.


Revenue Generation

Upon the completion of the first iteration of our mobile app, we intend on generating revenues through access fees. access fees will be charged to Patent Attorneys, Studios,  Engineers and etc. These firms and occupations will be charged an access fee to provide their services to collaborators on Platform.

Why service fees?
 So let's say a user has an idea for a book then connects with another user to write the book. What will they need? A publisher. So publishers could pay to have access to Platform collaborators who may need their services.  Patent attorneys and a variety of other people who will need access to Platform users. 

 


Road Map

My team and I have been working on Platform for the past 2 years, but due to a variety of factors such as being underskilled and lacking access to financial resources we simply have no option other than to turn to the Kickstarter community for financial aid. We are currently looking to raise $262,780 in funding to kickstart our development and deployment of Platform for the duration of a year. Below is a list of our projected expenses:


Development and Maintenance (Continual) : $150,000
marketing (Continual): $50,000
Web hosting (Continual): 5,000
Legal and professional fees: $5,000
Rewards shipping: $5,000
Kickstarter fee: $13,140
Payment and Processing fee:$13,140
Margin of error: $21, 500




Upon reaching our funding goal, we will be hiring two full-stack developers within two weeks of reaching our goal.  Upon the success of our beta test, depending on how many users and connections are made on Platform, we'll start reaching out to Venture Capital firms for more funding to scale up development, marketing, and formally become a legal entity.

We intend on giving out T-shirts with the Platform logo on them as a reward for your donations.

record.Creator: SIKAKEYB
record.Title: SIKAKEYB SK3-Ultra-Compact Customizable Mechanical Keyboard
record.Text:
If your mechanical keyboard doesn’t create an addictive typing experience, you haven’t been using the right one. Built for quality, comfort, and satisfying key presses, the SK3 is the world’s most compact wireless mechanical keyboard and laptop companion. It can be placed directly onto the keyboard of any laptop under 14.9 inches without interacting with the original keyboard, increasing speed and accuracy, saving desk space, and keeping your screen closer to you.






Its 65% layout makes allows you to position your hands more naturally with less movement, and with bluetooth, 2.4G, and wired connectivity, it can be connected to a maximum of 5 different devices at the same time. Switch between devices with a single key press for a more efficient multi-device workflow.  





SK3s also include high-quality Gateron hot-swappable switches, so you can customize whether you hear a click, how smooth your key presses are, and how much force needs to be applied to activate a key.











At 65% the size of a typical keyboard with 68 of the most common keys, the SK3 has minimized size while maximizing functionality. Where other laptop-compatible mechanical keyboards require desk placement, remove touch pad functionality, or insert the wrong characters at the slightest shift, SIKAKEYB SK3 fully enhances your current typing experience, so there’s no need to compromise.
In addition to maintaining touch pad functionality, the SK3 allows the area beside the touch pad to be used as a wrist rest.










The SIKAKEYB SK3’s main body is made from durable yet lightweight aluminum that has gone through CNC machining and a careful anode oxidation process. With its translucent black ABS bottom, out of the box, the SK3 is an instant classic, merging that fun, retro feel with elegant, clear-cut design choices.











SK3 has wired and wireless modes that allow you to connect with up to five devices at the same time and switch between them with the press of a key. At full capacity, it can interface with  (1) Type-C device,  (3) Bluetooth devices, and  (1) 2.4G device.






 Type-C wired connection






Wireless connectivity. Connect to one 2.4G and three bluetooth 5.0 devices. Use FN+Q/W /E to bluetooth 5.0 devices，FN+R to 2.4G devices.















SK3 is compatible with Mac, Windows, iOS, and Android system, so you can switch between your phones, laptops, and tablets. When using a Mac and Windows device, press FN+A/S to switch between modes.















 SK3’s compact design takes up 65% of the space of a traditional keyboard and includes the 68 most common keys.










SK3 uses Gateron hot-swappable switches and plate-mounted stabilizers so you can DIY a typing experience you’ll love.

Typing sound of silver switches

The SK3 is compatible with most switches on the market, including plate-mounted and PCB. Mix and match. The possibilities are endless. 





The default plate-mounted style costar stabilizer offers a great touch experience right out of the box, and creates minimal noise so your typing won’t be intrusive. Replacement with a screw-in stabilizer is simple and straightforward.










SK3’s double-color keycap design is both sleek and functional. Your fingers will sit comfortably on each keycap as you type, and the cherry height sitting will allow you to transition smoothly from key to key without accidental touches. This was achieved via a special over-molding technique using PBT material.



Keycap shape of SK3






















The 5 Gateron switches available with your SK3 include the Blue PRO,Brown PRO, Silver PRO, Yellow PRO and White PRO.

 The SK3 comes with 3 default configuration settings, but allows you to customize your keys any way you like using your computer. You can also use the quick-switch function (FN+Z/FN+X/FN+C) to switch between the different configurations and maintain your optimal workflow at all times.










One of the best features of mechanical keyboards is their customization, and each SK3 offers full-color RGB background lighting to fit your aesthetic. Choose from 18 different preset light effects, or take things a step further and customize your light effects using the software and driver. Sound-activated light effects are available as well.

About us
SIKAKEYB is an innovative application team composed of senior engineers in the keyboard and mouse industry. The team engineers have more than 10 years of experience in keyboard, mouse and computer peripheral products. They are a peripheral brand that integrates product development and design, program and software development, and brand operation. , The operating headquarters is located in Dongguan, Guangdong.
The founder of SIKAKEYB has extensive experience in industrial design, product development and manufacturing, and has more than 16 years of field experience in keyboard, mouse and computer peripheral products.
SIKAKEYB adheres to the concept of combining software and hardware products and complementing each other, combining with high-quality manufacturing supply chain resources to provide end consumers with high-quality products, while striving to provide players with better hardware, software and service experience in the future. record.Creator: CYFantasy3dp
record.Title: CyFantasy Light-Curing LCD 3D Printer
record.Text:
If you have ever thought that LCD 3D printers should support large-scale industrial precision printing, with extraordinary user-centric smart functions, then we built a CyFantasy LCD 3D printer especially for you!










We call it Cyfantasy LCD 3D Printer for good reasons. So far, the general LCD 3D printers on the market do not support large format requirements and usually sacrifice quality and precision to save costs. This is why we spent years developing prototypes and testing them until we came up with a tested and perfect final success formula: CyFantasy3D CY-OS01 is a light-curing LCD 3D printer for large format projects. Provides industrial precision and high-end smart functions at unprecedented speeds.
Printing Videos(Keep Updated)
#1






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































#2






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00









































It’s not just the speed, large format printing or the industrial precision performance. Those are definitely features that make the CyFantasy LCD 3D Printer unique. However, we’ve gone beyond that, adding five intelligent functions to a 3D Printer like no other.










When the box of materials of the CyFantasy LCD 3D printer is running short of whichever material you’re using (it supports common resin, strong toughness resin and elastic resin, among other possible materials), the printer will automatically detect this shortage and it will also automatically refill it. What does this mean to you? You’ll save time and, more importantly, the consistency of the printing process and the integrity of the printing results are not affected by a sudden interruption and a disruptive refilling process.










Removing the box of materials from a 3D printer to replace them is so old school. With the CyFantasy LCD 3D Printer’s world's first flash material replacement program, you can literally replace the material you’re using with a single click on the operation panel. Yes, really!





3D printing should be a clean and precise process, leading to a pristine result. However, most 3D printers are not stable enough to do that—but the CyFantasy LCD 3D Printer is! The connecting rod of the printer's forming platform adopts an exclusive ball screw design that provides a steady printing experience, dramatically reducing vibration while printing, and extraordinarily improving the quality and detail of printed objects. 










 It looks like a scene from a futuristic science fiction movie, but it is actually another user-centric feature of this excellent printer. The cover of the CyFantasy LCD 3D printer is flipped in a smart way, with no need to manually open and close, so you can enjoy it more easily, and at the same time feel that you are using cutting-edge technology from the future to help your creative projects come to life!










Technical features and functions make CyFantasy LCD 3D printers very smart and efficient. However, we also believe that the printer you use should be outstanding and amazing in every respect, which is very important. Therefore, unlike the typical and rigid rectangular box structure of ordinary 3D printers, we designed the printer as a high-end cyberpunk helmet. The point is: no matter how you look at it, there is no 3D printer like CyFantasy LCD 3D printer!





You shouldn’t have to run a large manufacturing operation to enjoy industrial-grade precision. In our view, that’s not a luxury—it’s a requirement that any 3D printer should have. That’s why we tested the CyFantasy LCD 3D Printer for three months in dental clinics. We had to create a superb printer that could deliver superb results. We can now proudly say that the surface smoothness of what you create with our printer comfortably meets industrial-grade standards that can cater to different business needs.





On the other hand, the LCD light-curing printer platform is also extremely sturdy and compact, offering industrial-grade durability and reliability, strengthening the printer’s capacity to meet the requirements you have for your creative project of business.










CyFantasy LCD 3D printer allows you to monitor and modify the printing process during the printing process: from the printing time to the remaining time, you can view the data displayed on the screen at any time, and you can change to adjust the items. Real-time display through the operation panel.









































We’ve spent a few years looking into the challenges of 3D printing until we came to our presently successful formula. We no longer see extremely high prices for printers and consumables, and we’ve been seeing FDM technology and SLA machines and consumables becoming increasingly accessible and affordable. Still, we knew that low-cost technologies such as the new LCD sacrificed accuracy and size to generate savings for the buyer. That was not satisfactory, so we decided to develop a large-size, high-precision, low-price LCD 3D printer.

























It sounded great, but we hit a technical wall when we realized that 3D printing LCD moulding technology is extremely layered, namely when the moulding area becomes larger. The bond with the bottom layer is so strong that, when we separate layer by layer, model separation is problematic and may even lead to model deformation. This explains why there are so many LCD machines on the market—but none in the large-size field. We decided to solve this problem by running a lot of tests until we finally got our CyFantasy LCD 3D Printer. It now includes intelligent functions such as one-key automatic flip, one-key refuelling, and automatic feeding, and it’s tried and tested to deliver spectacular large-format results, even being in the LCD camp. In other words, problem solved! Now we need your support to manufacture this large-size industrial-grade precision 3D printer!










This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 2,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $900M raised between them.

record.Creator: Maria from TrooIDs.
record.Title: The Sovernty - Cookies solution
record.Text:
We are TrooIDs, and our mission is to make the internet safer and more accessible to everyone.

That is why we are happy to announce our latest innovation - the SOVERNTY software, which are we currently working on - to help you protect your privacy.









The Sovernty is a cookies manager software, which could be used as a plug-in for the internet browser

The application will allow the internet user to customize his web experience by reading the cookies notifications for the user and making them not appear on the websites anymore.






While you are experiencing faster and less irritating internet browsing, the software works in the background. You will not see any cookies notifications.
But does it mean that the cookies are ‘gone’ or that your privacy is in danger?

No, it does not.

The software will do all the most annoying job for you!
The application will accept or deny the processing of the cookies, depending on the chosen settings/preferences.
The application does this by giving users the possibility to independently choose cookie settings, to compile them and then to make them known to websites, applications, and other digital services in a fully automated way.

Tired of reading cookie - policies?

Currently, the Internet users must indicate their will separately for each website or application, usually in the form of reading and accepting (or not) abysmal cookie-policies.

This makes web browsing less convenient, as those policies vary, and are written in a complex language. The lack of time or desire to read the cookie settings makes them often being unseen.

The current situation limits the freedom of movement, freedom of choice, affects exercising the active right to the protection of personal data and puts people in a dependent position.

With the Sovernty - cookies manager there will be:

✓  Lack of the long cookie policies
✓  Leaving the software to read them
✓  Lack of complicated, hard to understand terms
✓ No more fear of being a product without a permission






It can be so much easier
Interested HOW? See the video below.






No more being a product ?

The titans like Google, Amazon, Apple, Facebook, or Microsoft are unstoppable.
Their profits are surging.

Thanks to the processing of more and more data, the Internet user has become not only a consumer, but also a product.

By employing more and more new technologies, but also clever tricks, users are sacrificing their privacy without getting much in return.






The legal regulations introduced by the European Union, such as ePrivacy, or the GDPR, are intended to limit this practice, giving users more rights.

These regulations, however, do not contain simple, ready-to-use tools.
Without appropriate applications, despite extensive protection enshrined in legislation, we are not able to enforce our rights. This is putting us on an equal footing with companies that are making profits by using our data.






To balance this position, it is necessary to introduce solutions that will easily help the Internet user gain control over what data he is going to transfer and to whom.






5,000 - Basic version of cookies manager scheduled on time within 6 months after the successful campaign 
10,000 – Improving and caring for the product with ongoing marketing






Gratis download to all Kickstarter Backers. 

HELP US – We need your help!
 So we can help internet users regain control over their cookies and data.





- Please, donate.
- Don’t want to donate? It would be great if you could share this page!






We are a start-up, located in Amsterdam, that develops activities in the field of flexibilization, facilitation, and optimization of transparency, partly for more efficient market forces, as well as the development, stimulation, and provision of online tools and services.

The team consist of members with different experience and has an international character, connecting people from different backgrounds.

A part of the tasks is done by students from a variety of disciplines (such as legal, marketing, or science) which makes it possible to collaborate and exchange ideas between people with different interests and expertise.

Our mission is to make the internet safer, and more accessible to everyone.
Our main goal is to give the internet user more control.

record.Creator: Laview
record.Title: LaView #1 Long Lasting 4G GPS Tracker, Always To Be Found
record.Text:
An estimated 8 million children are reported missing worldwide each year, and someone is reported missing every 55 seconds. The figure doesn’t get any better in the animal kingdom, over 6 million owned pets are lost every year in the United States alone. The average person loses more than 3,000 items and Americans spend $2.7 billion annually to replace misplaced possessions.











Meet the LaView, the shepherd of the lost! A Universal GPS Bluetooth tracker that offers a smart tracking solution for kids, seniors, pets, and goods. Battery lasts up to 15 months per charge and 5 connectivity technologies under the hood, a manifestation of the Geofencing revolution.



Fits All You Needs


The LaView is a universal GPS tracker created to fit your tracking needs wherever you are. Bringing in the multiple protocols with a dedicated Qualcomm chip, the LaView allows users to navigate those who matter the most or lost items through GPS, Bluetooth, Beidou, and WiFi positioning, as well as LBS. Ultra-lightweight and waterproof, its 600mAh battery offers 15 months of unprecedented lifespan per charge. With the LaView, you can conveniently keep a track of your pets, kids, or vehicles to get peace of mind anytime.





With a cutting-edge positioning system, the LaView enables real-time positioning with high precision,  delivering an unparalleled all-weather barrier-free tracking solution. Other features include historical playback, geofence, and SOS alarm, it allows you to do less but achieve more!




















Bluetooth 5.2 station


Thanks to the optimized power consumption of Bluetooth 5.2, the LaView can last up to 15 months on a single charge. To push our positioning solution to the next level, LaView allows you to switch between Bluetooth beacon and cellular data when your 4G network isn’t available; the device will automatically turn off CAT1 under the Bluetooth mode, realizing an ultra-low power consumption of 1.3mAh per day.




















Besides the power consumption of Bluetooth 5.2, the station also worked as a magnetic charger, which means that you will no longer have to fumble around to charge your tracker. A tiny magnetic adapter is provided to protect your tracker from scratch.  Its magnetic charger is made out of military-grade material featuring abrasion and tear-resistance, specially crafted for heavy everyday use.










With longer range Bluetooth technology, the LaView Universal GPS Tracker has a range of 1200 feet, it leverages both indoor positioning technology and unlimited 4G GLOBAL outdoor location tracking,  providing fast and precise position updates wherever you are. 











Strengthen the bond by always knowing the exact location of your furry friends directly on your smartphone. The LaView comes with waterproof and leather housing and it is compatible with any flat collar and harness.










To activate the real-time tracking, simply tap the wake-up function on the APP. LaView also features a virtual fence that allows you to set a boundary for your pets to ensure their safety. If they make a sneaky escape and go beyond the fence radius, you will get notifications right away. 












You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.

Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































LED Flash Light
The function of waking up the LED flashing light through the APP at any time allows you easily to find it in the darkness.






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































Buzzer
Even when the tracker is hidden by other things, the buzzer allows you to quickly find it.










Outdoor adventure can be fun but can also be dangerous without planning. A GPS tracker is a safety tool that plays a crucial role in the wild. With LaView, you can share your real-time location with friends and use the one-click SOS function in the face of emergencies.










LaView GPS can also be used to track your personal belongings such as small bags and purses, it allows you to pinpoint where your stolen key or missing cash is. With LaView’s mini design, it can fit in the palm of your hand, let you experience incredible portability.











GPS has significantly changed our environment and lives in several ways. A good tracker will make sure you or your family safely arrive and return to a location. Also, track your vehicle right away if it's stolen. The LaView GPS Car Tracker tells you where it is and where it has been and updates REAL-TIME TRACKING with an auto-refresh feature. Our world is a much safer and easier place to travel.
















You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound

00:00


00:00































Ultra-lightweight design with the free perfect-match silicone accessories, easily attach to anything you want! It fits all of the collars, helmets, bikes, e-skateboard, and drones on the market.



IP67 waterproof


With an IP67 rating, LaView is dust-tight and will serve in up to one meter of water, it is perfect for all kinds of environments.















If you have kids or an aging loved one becomes disoriented at times you may want to consider utilizing LaView to track their whereabouts and find them in an emergency. Using the LaView as a GPS tool to track your loved one by no mean restrict their freedom but allow them to live an independent life while staying connected.



Tracking history whenever you want


Lview GPS Tracker also allows you to navigate back in time and view prior days' tracking history. You can enter a custom time range to whichever time range you would like to view the history of, and even look hour-by-hour this way.  








Tracking your health anytime


Laview can also be a one-of-a-kind fitness tracker. Monitor your biometric data, physical and mental activity and know what you need to do to improve your self-care routine and achieve peak performance while staying safe. Laview monitors all-important health and lifestyle data points, simply check through the APP, revealing your physical and mental state. Armed with these insights, you can make improvements to your health and productivity.



Track your pet's activity anytime


 Oh, it works on pets as well. Track your furry friend’s health on the Laview app without worries.










With 5 network protocols 4G-LTE/GPS/WIFI/LBS/Bluetooth 5.2. LaView GPS tracker will automatically search for the best available network, which means you can stay connected wherever you are indoor or outdoor, or anywhere around the world.










And... Did we mention that we have 5 color options? Choose the one you like the best.






















 EXTRA FREE SUBSCRIPTION?? 
LaView GPS requires a cellular plan to work, however, the subscription fee is not mandatory. 
We bundle the 1 month of FREE SERVICES in your first one-month subscription. And 2 months of FREE SERVICES in your first half-year subscription.  (No time limit for opening time)
Kickstarter Special Price @ $6.99 USD p/mth per device with international coverage (normal retail estimate is $10 USD p/month).





































LaView is the result of nearly 2 years of hard work and dedication. Developing from scratch, our team has spent numerous late nights on craftsmanship and optimization. To address the shortcomings of common trackers on the market, and provide real-time, precise location tracking with long standby time, our team has conducted extensive design studies and performed trials. LaView puts our backers first, everything we do, we do for the good of the end-user, we want to make sure our tracker works and delivers on its promise.






Every day since 2013, every one of us at LaView has only one goal: offering you the best security and tracking solution to protect you, your loved ones, and your belongings. Utilizing LaView means you are putting your trust in us, thereby, we take you seriously and are determined to give you greater peace of mind.





Reliability, Family, Respect, and Compassion are the fundamental values of our company. You have our promise that we will do our best to be constantly updated our tracker with cutting-edge technology, we spare no effort to offer you the best tracking solutions available. We strive for excellence and your satisfaction with our lifetime technical support and product warranty.  











After two years of honing and planning, October is the perfect time for us to start our Kickstarter journey. We plan to start the mass production in November and ship at the end of December/early January. Everything has been properly arranged.
