record.Creator: Uniarch
record.Title: Uniarch Unear A30: AI meeting camera with 360° speaker
record.Text:
Why Unear A30?





How will you prepare for an online meeting? Turn on the camera, test microphone, volume up the speaker and blah blah blah…That’s too much work. We want to make virtual meetings as easy as ABC. So, we have Unear A30 here. It is an all-in-one device that covers all functions of the camera, mic and speakers.

 Smart, Fast, and Efficient
The foundation for the ideal meeting. 
With the most advanced AI technology in the capture and analysis of sound, Unear A30 aims to make its professional debut by providing the best acoustic experience. That notwithstanding, it enhances image performance and clarity through specialized features. Unear A30 is easy-to-use and compatible with online meeting platforms.






Wide-Ranging Applications





In addition to meetings, Unear A30 can greatly improve video conferencing quality under different scenarios.















Unear A30 is safe and user-friendly. With Unear A30 you can say goodbye to freezing or choppy video calls. A direct USB connection focuses on mitigating unstable signals.





Privacy is our top priority with Unear A30. A simple and secure Plug-and-Play connection via USB with no third-party data processor removes a point of weakness for potential security threats.





Forget about constantly shifting the camera to keep everyone in the room in frame. With an ultra-wide angle camera, Unear A30 makes it easy to host a meeting with multiple people in the same room. Each of the two Unear models feature ultra-wide viewing angles. Unear A30T, which is in pearl white, is equipped with a 100º ultra-wide-angle camera, while the more advanced Unear A30 is equipped with a 115º. Each ensures that everyone is captured by the Unear A30 / A30T panoramic view during the meeting.















With a 4-element omnidirectional microphone array, no details are missed.
Scanning for all voices in a 5-meter range, Unear A30 is able to detect and pick up the details that matter most in a meeting.





360° wideband speaker ensures clear and precise human voice output. This full-range speaker will ensure that the speaker is heard well, and the meeting can move along smoothly.





Embedded in Unear A30 is an enhanced AI, making it possible to intelligently process sound by suppressing common environmental noises in a meeting such as air conditioning and typing clatter.





Expert echo cancellation can be necessary in large meeting spaces. With higher echo return loss enhancement (ERLE), Unear A30 minimizes these common meeting interruptions that can waste time and participant’s mental energy.










Providing a headache-free experience, Unear A30 is compatible with most mainstream online meeting platforms such as Zoom, Microsoft Teams, Google Meet, Skype and others. Unear A30 supports mainstream operating systems like Windows, Mac OS and Linux without the need for an adaptor.










Unear A30 utilizes a 4MP high-definition camera. Equipped with a suite of image corrective functions, Unear A30 ensure users have a great online meeting experience.

Self-adaptive toning
Lens distortion correction
Anti-flickering
Automatic exposure
White balance.






Instant mute, camera on/off toggle, and volume adjustment can all be achieved by Unear A30’s sophisticatedly designed touch panel, saving you time to effectively manage online conversations and video calls.





Easy to understand colored lights on the circular status indicator on the top of the Unear A30 provide clear indications of device status.

Yellow light: Device is powering on
Red light: Microphones are muted
Orange light: Camera is turned off
Blue light: Normal Unear A30 operation






Unear A30 supports full-duplex communication mode, which allows for more natural simultaneous communication with others. The comfort afforded by this allows for more communication efficiency that boost productivity in bidirectional communication.

























 Unear A30 is narrow at the top and wide at the bottom. It is tip over resistant by design with its rubber base. The elegant black and pearl white bodies of Unear A30 and A30T are coated to make them fingerprint and stain resistant as well.















About Uniarch
Uniarch is a sub-brand of Uniview, the company that commits itself to video monitoring research and development, bearing the mission of making smart life easier through reliable video technology, one-stop smart products and friendly services for the customers. The core values of Uniarch are beliefs in openness and integrity, which are incentives for them to refine their product design and manufacture. Uniarch builds business with the support and trust of others and accumulates reputation step by step. The brand has a strong awareness of protecting the environment. It is certified by ISO14000 and RoHS. The team insists on being eco-friendly during production and manufacturing.





 About Uniview
         Uniview is a leading global manufacturer of professional video surveillance devices and solutions. As the first to invent the network camera in China, Uniview has continued to bring cutting-edge technologies to the industry. 





Uniview provides complete product lines including network camera, network video recorder, storage, transmission, and display devices. With integrated solutions for various industries including retail, healthcare, finance, transportation, industrial park, and more, we are committed to bringing better security to the marketplace for building a better world.

record.Creator: Sascha Müller
record.Title: Software gegen Betrug
record.Text:
Hallo Zusammen!
Ich möchte eine Software entwickeln die Betrügerische Absichten im Alltäglichen Online-Shopping erkennt.
Die Software soll (aktuelle Idee) mit Bildschirmerkennung sobald eine Shopping App oder Website geöffnet wird starten und Chatverläufe mit Käufer & Verkäufer sowie die Anzeige des Artikels "scannen".
Um dies umzusetzen werden Verdächtige Wortlaute, Texte, Sätze etc. in die Software
eingelernt.
Bei erkennung einer Betrügerischen Absicht soll das Programm (wenn es Datenschutzrechtlich genehmigt wird) die Daten des "Verdächtigen" wie zb.
-IP Adresse
-Nutzername
-Chatverläufe 
etc.
auf einer Datenbank speichern um evtl. Ermittlungen für die Polizei bei einem "erfolgten Betrug" zu erleichtern.
Dazu soll es aber natürlich nicht kommen.
Bei einem erkannten Betrug wird vorher eine Warnung abgegeben und der Nutzer gesperrt.

Ihr wollt so wie ich SICHER im Web Surfen?
Unterstützt mich!
Mit freundlichen Grüßen
Sascha Müller

record.Creator: NEPUS
record.Title: Trudego: We revolutionize traveling and deliveries.
record.Text:
Haz click aquí para ver la campaña en español. 


Trudego: We revolutionize traveling and deliveries.


A new way of earning money while you travel, and a better solution to international deliveries. 


I’ve always liked buying online, for me, it’s the most comfortable and simple way to do it. I find annoying the process of going to a physical store to buy whatever I need, sadly delivery hasn’t changed or improved in the last couple of years, outside of the united states getting a package delivered can take up from a couple of weeks to months, and let's not even talk about the ridiculous fees than cant rack up to 200% of what you are trying to buy, When I lived in Bolivia I became frustrated because every time I wanted to buy my favorites item from platforms like amazon I realized that the price of the delivery surpassed the price of the product, which is ridiculous. So I did a little research and found out that these companies had a monopoly on the global market, and they didn’t give a real price to their customers. So inspired by business models like those from Airbnb and Uber I thought of a solution for international deliveries. It took me many days of researching models and many hypotheses so that my idea could work, and I came to realize that a model of the shared and collaborative economy in the world of international deliveries was the perfect one. Having that information I began the real work of trying to put everything together. I began designing the app, trying to think of all the functionalities that it could have and everything that took to make the idea of Trudego a great tool for travelers of the world. This process took me about 2 months which I spent programming what would be the start of the platform. Then I started validating my idea, asking my relatives and friends if they would like to receive their packages way faster and cheaper, they even told me they would buy much more if something like this existed, so 16 years old me decided to go and make this project a reality, 2 years later I’m launching this crowdfunding campaign to show everybody that a model like Airbnb or Uber can be applied to international deliveries.






Trudego is a platform that aims to become a community of people that want their products to be delivered in hours rather than weeks or months, meanwhile, we also want to become a way for people to make money out of their travels.
The concept is quite simple. Do you want to make money while traveling? have some free space in your luggage? use Trudego and make some money without doing much. We live in a world where people are constantly searching for ways to generate income, and many times our community will prefer to give money to an individual rather than a company, thus creating a sharing economy.






The soul of the project is much deeper than the objective, and it’s split in half, The first from the traveler's side. The concept is that by taking a couple of other people's packages you can pay for a good part of your trip. the more you deliver the more money you earn, that way we want to make sure that many Trudego fans would be able to travel the world for free. In the second part, we side with the buyer. A person who is in some part of the world and who is buying a product online from another part of the world, it doesn’t even have to be something you bought, it could be a gift from your grandma, that she wanted to arrive on a certain date and international shipping couldn’t deliver. The idea is that the moment you make your purchase you can connect with a traveler who is in the city of purchase and who has a destination to your city, thus achieving something no intercontinental shipping can do at a decent price, getting your package in under 5 days.
To summarize, our sole objective is to build a community that loves using Trudego and uses it to finance their journeys through the world. On the other hand, we got people a control panel Trudego to get their products worldwide, becoming one of the fastest shipping methods. The more people use it, the more we can change the world.






Nowadays the market of international deliveries has become lazy, and companies like Trudego could move the foundations of the current market, sending a wake-up call to these companies that lost their ambition for innovation, and disrupting their ridiculous business practices.
The fact that people could win money traveling is utopic and sounds fake, but with Trudego, something as simple as taking a package with you to the airport could become an opportunity to make money, is a concept that allows people to enjoy traveling more often, and with better quality of trips. One of our greatest innovations is the fact that we are going to create a tool designed for the consumer. In other words, the main problem that we solve is not that people need new sources of income, since that is only a consequence of our creation. The main problem is the time it takes to get the package and the security of that package. At Trudego we are really about your experience and wish that Trudego is your number 1 option when it comes to delivery.
I am not looking for Trudego to be a small platform that competes at a minuscule level in the market. But on the contrary, a very interesting alternative to traditional shipping options.
The platform has two types of functions: Trudego integrates into  Ecommerce and the sending of packages from person to person.










Let's put ourselves in the place of a customer, the customer enters an online store and buys the products, then the store itself tells the customer that they use Trudego, then if the store doesn’t cover the delivery, the client pays for it through the store, and the store pays Trudego, from a customer's point of view they will only make 1 payment when the total to pay is shown, and the store will make the arrangement with Trudego, the same applies when the store offers free shipping.
The client then receives a mail from Trudego that notifies him that our platform will manage the delivery, and the mail will tell the client the approximate day and time the package will be delivered, according to the store and the traveler that will be making the delivery; Once that’s done they will receive a link with the current status of the package and the route of said package. Then the agreed day the traveler will arrive at the door of the buyer with the packages.











The traveler must register, filling in some important questions that will be shown to anyone on the platform, this information will help us notify the traveler of packages from stores or people,  that the traveler might like to deliver, the information of each package will be shown, information like the weight or dimensions of each package, the exact pick-up location and any photos there are; if everything is correct the traveler will make an offer and negotiate the fee and the time it will take to deliver the traveler could work with a suggested fee or they can negotiate the fee themselves. assuring the traveler that he/she can benefit from their travels. Trudego’s commission will be 15%.
If the offer is accepted, a customer’s communication tab will open where the traveler and the store/ person will be able to communicate better and arrange the details of the pick-up. This communication is optional because stores can give the information beforehand to expedite the shipping process. Once everything is sorted the traveler picks up the package and travels to the destination, the day it is arranged the package will be delivered and the status of the package will be updated.
To ensure the safety of the package and its safe delivery the traveler must leave a warranty and make a 2-step verification, The first step is that the travelers have some money as a warranty, and in case of the package not being delivered Trudego will cover all the damages, the next safety step is, in case the package is of high value the traveler must give and extra monetary warranty, all the money will be returned to the traveler when the package is delivered, thus giving the customer and the store and extra layer of protection against any problem, even in cases of fortuitous events, the company will cover any damage through insurance.
The travelers will also have many tools at their disposal like maps and information about the packages that will help them plan their journeys. Something important to emphasize is that Trudego won’t cap the number of packages a traveler can deliver,  as long as all the safety regulations are met with their airline of preference.






Let’s imagine that we want a package delivered from Barcelona to Miami, said package is a laptop that we sold through our eCommerce website, and at the moment of the purchase the customer added the shipping address, automatically a petition is generated to deliver the package, the petition is then sent to every traveler with a scheduled trip from Barcelona to Miami, a suggested price will generate automatically, and the only thing that changes is who will deliver the package, then the travelers will try to negotiate the conditions of the delivery. Trudego also offers an automatic mode that can be set according to our preferences, maybe we want the cheapest delivery, maybe we want the fastest or the traveler with the best score available, once that’s done a chat will open, giving us direct communication between us and the traveler, there we can coordinate everything, to the date and time of the pickup to more specific details that might make a better experience.
The advantage Trudego offers is that if you need an express delivery you could contact someone that travels the next day, making an intercontinental delivery in just 2 days!
The store could choose to only work with Trudego or offer Trudego and other traditional shipping companies. The store will have a control panel showing every order, payment, pending travelers, delivery offers, and many more tools at their disposal.






So maybe two people want to use Trudego? let’s assign them, person A and person B.
Person A wants to send a package from California to Paris, Person A enters Trudego and makes a new offer detailing everything about the package, this way an order is placed the many travelers available can interact with a said offer, then Person A chooses which traveler wants to work with; then Person A decides if they want to pay for the delivery or Person B could be in charge of paying, then the traveler picks the package up and, everything is set in motion, and every aspect of the process is identical to the rest.









In this image we can observe our catalog, this function is for the stores that want to manage their products.







In this image we can observe the order's management tab, here we can see the status of each of our deliveries






In this image, we can observe the Collaborator’s tab, where a store can manage all the travelers that will deliver the packages.





This is the chat, where customers collaborate, and stores can have direct contact if needed ensuring the safety of the process





This is the payment tab. This tool is provided by trudego. It allows stores and people to keep tab on how much money they are investing in deliveries.


Tiers:
- Raise your hand! If you want to make this project a reality, back how you can! $1
- A special Mention! A thank you digital letter from the Trudego team! A mention in our backer’s list and a thank you digital letter from the Trudego team, also you will become a member of our Facebook group, which will help you connect with travelers and stores from around the world. 5$





Client-oriented:
- Client’s plan: Get 25% off on the delivery fees of your first 10 deliveries on Trudego. Also, get a mention in our backer’s list and a thank you digital letter from the Trudego team, also you will become a member of our Facebook group, which will help you connect with travelers and stores from around the world. 35$
- Silver client’s plan: Get 50% off on the delivery fees of your first 15 deliveries on Trudego. Also, get a mention in our backer’s list and a thank you digital letter from the Trudego team, also you will become a member of our Facebook group, which will help you connect with travelers and stores from around the world. 60$
- Gold client’s plan: Get 75% off on the delivery fees of your first 15 deliveries on Trudego. Also, get a mention in our backer’s list and a thank you digital letter from the Trudego team, also you will become a member of our Facebook group, which will help you connect with travelers and stores from around the world. 120$
- Diamond client’s plan: Get 100% off on the delivery fees of your first 25 deliveries on Trudego. Also, get a mention in our backer’s list and a thank you digital letter from the Trudego team, also you will become a member of our Facebook group, which will help you connect with travelers and stores from around the world. 500$





Traveler oriented.
- Premium Partner traveler plan: Win more money with Trudego and free yourself from our fees for 10 deliveries! 50$
- Gold Partner traveler plan: Win more money with Trudego and free yourself from our fees for 20 deliveries! 130$
- Diamond Partner traveler plan: Win more money with Trudego and free yourself from our fees for 30 deliveries! 200$






EARLY BIRD
- Premium EARLY BIRD Client’s plan: Get 100% off on the delivery fees of your deliveries for life! Also, get a Special mention in our backer’s list and a thank you digital letter from the Trudego team, you will become a member of our Facebook group, which will help you connect with travelers and stores from around the world. 1000$ 5 spaces available
- Premium EARLY BIRD Traveler’s plan: Free yourself from our commission for life, use Trudego as a way to travel around the world. Also, get a Special mention in our backer’s list and a thank you digital letter from the Trudego team, you will become a member of our Facebook group, which will help you connect with travelers and stores from around the world. 700$ 10 spaces available.









This is the Budget of the project.








1.  Creation of a very basic design for the platform.
2.  Launch our crowdfunding campaign
3.  Start team recruitment
4.  Start platform development
5.  Launch the platform in 6 to 9 months.
6.  Develop the Android and IOS apps
7.  Obtain external investment to continue growing.
 











I'm Amir Lima, I'm 18 years old from a middle-class family, I was born in La Paz- Bolivia. Since I was a little kid I was interested in all things about business. I was involved in the business. I used to put a price on things that most kids would not even consider, for example, I didn't sell you candy, in school, I sold you the thrill of eating candy in class and laughing with your friend from the little mischief.
The way I was, wasn't formed naturally, it was due to the way that I was raised, many things that I considered unfair, like helping my family business while the other kids played. are the things that made me who I am today.
I know I'm the right person to make this project a reality. I have the experience and the passion to do everything that's in my power to make Trudego successful entrepreneurship. I've funded Nepus, a crowdfunding advisory agency. Nepus gave me the experience I needed and made me come into contact with experienced people that have given me a lot of knowledge.

record.Creator: Antonin
record.Title: ByteMe: the safest way to store your data, photos and files
record.Text:
This fact kept us awake at night, so we developed ByteMe. 
A unique technological application that will secure your data so that it will never be accessible to anyone unless you give users permission to access it themselves. 
The data will not even be made available to the police and cannot be misused for target ads.







On ByteMe you can save any file, be it photos, videos, PDF documents, folders, pieces of code, archived mailbox, music files, etc. And you can then view and organize them into folders. For example, you can create albums from photos, view videos, or read documents.












At ByteMe, you only pay for the data you actually store and there are no hidden fees. We as the provider can only see how much data you store, but we do not see what data you upload. You get charged once a month for the amount of data you store. By backing us on Kickstarter, you get a life-long subscription to the ByteMe app.

ByteMe is 100% transparent.

Your precious memories are for you and your loved ones, don't share them with strangers!

                                How does it all work? Let's have a look. 










































How does it all work? We will show you what this amazing app does! Think of a photo that you have taken and see what you can do with it.

Whenever you take a photo with your phone, it will get automatically uploaded to ByteMe and it will get deleted from your phone's library, so there is only one version of the photo. You can organize the photos into files, create photo previews and choose the privacy setting. Only you decide who will see your data and who you share it with. The photos and videos stored in ByteMe do not get compressed, the quality stays the same. You can upload any file type - pictures, videos, PDF documents, … 
If you want to share any file, just tap on “Share”. You can always change the setting and make the file private. It is sooo simple, so what are you waiting for? 
Get ByteMe and keep you data protected.

























We have a developed application and we are working hard to complete it. We want to get it amongst as many people as possible so that everyone can use secure storage for their data and experiences. 
That is why we need your help.

record.Creator: Fingoti
record.Title: Pebl - the complete IoT package for makers and hobbyists!
record.Text:
We're back baby! 
…and we're even stronger than before!





You may remember the Pebl from 2019? Despite not meeting our target funding goal, we were overwhelmed with the support from our original pledgers! Thank you!
We wanted to show our appreciation by giving a 10% discount to be used in our Store for all previous supporters that re-pledge, if the campaign is successfully funded. This will last for a full month and can be redeemed by signing up to our Portal. Don't worry, we'll let you know when you can do that!
When you boil it down,  we're just a bunch of enthusiastic nerdy guys, working long hours in a converted dentistry lab, in the southwest of England. We're trying our absolute hardest to make the IoT a place that allows anyone with an idea, no matter how big, to make a go of it and hit the ground running! Your trust in us and your generous pledges will give us the chance to make that a reality :)





We're all mostly excited to see your creations and wonderful ideas, spawned from the ability to implement IoT into your project, overnight. So get that imagination flowing and read on...
If you're not familiar with Pebl, you may want to skip to the "What is a Pebl?" section!


During our time away, we've been busy.
We were being asked left, right and center if we'd be offering the Pebl for sale on our website despite not meeting our goal. Unfortunately, the answer was no as we just couldn't afford to do so :(
However, immediately after our last Kickstarter campaign, we managed to secure funding which enabled us to further develop the Pebl product and supporting infrastructure to a point where it is now firing on all cylinders and waiting to be used by you!





After learning so much from the last campaign, this time around, we're going to try our hardest to provide more information about HOW the Pebl can be used to enable your products to become part of the IoT!
Scroll down, take a look and please get in touch if you have any questions!


So what has been improved or changed?
With the feedback we've received over the last couple of years, we have been able to improve and develop our offering further, and we now believe it is far better than before and overall, a more complete and well rounded solution.


Pebl Hardware

The Pebl hardware has been completely redesigned to cater for new features, better reliability and higher performance.





We have redesigned the power management system to allow for a wider range of input voltages whilst consuming lower power and generating less heat. We have also optimised the WiFi antenna location to provide a longer range and better performance. A fully featured UART serial bus was squeezed in for even more flexibility. The RGB led control now has more stability, allowing improved visual performance by fixing a known flickering issue.


 Pebl Evaluation Board

An exciting new addition for our pledgers is an easy to use and handy Evaluation Board for the Pebl, so straight out of the box, you can get to grips with the way that it works and what it's capable of!





Find out more information below and take a look at our Virtual Pebl Evaluation Board to get a taster of how it works!


 Portal Development 

We have worked extremely hard to build the user front end to the point where it is now useable for everyday management and control of all your devices. This was something that was not readily available before, but is now raring to go!





We're really pleased with it and hope you get an opportunity to use it! We have built in multi tenancy for our commercial users and a full account management system, which is further explained, later on.


 API Implementation 

We're most proud of this achievement, being the backbone of device control and usage. The final outcome is awesome! The newly reworked API allows for no fuss usage, with no tiresome hoops to jump through, no manufacturer lockdowns and best of all, it's completely documented! All this whilst of course being fully authenticated.





The Fingoti back end has full multi tenancy support allowing users to not only create multiple organisations for their devices but also for a partner/tenant relationship with customers. More about that later... 


What is a Pebl?
At Fingoti we are striving to provide a simple, out-of-the-box gateway solution to the Internet of Things (IoT). We wanted all the research and development to be done for you and encapsulated it in a smart, secure, flexible and reliable package as standard.
And so the Pebl was born.
Pebl can connect with and control electrical equipment, from making sure the kettle is boiled for that first cup of coffee in the morning, to collecting analytics to track production efficiency for your business. The possibilities are endless.





The IoT is a place where everyday physical items are quickly becoming part of the virtual world that is the internet. These items can be controlled and monitored from a distance to, for example, improve your life at home, increase productivity in the workplace or improve performance and reliability in industrial equipment.





The IoT is already a very big and daunting place, especially if you are just starting out. Trying to manufacture and provide an IoT solution can be an expensive and drawn out process, requiring technical and specialist expertise. We believe it should be intuitive and simple, so we've done all the hard work for you. Our product can be used by everyone and anyone. Pebl provides an end-to-end solution for enthusiasts, business owners, education, home automation projects and... well, anything!





The Pebl is a standalone IoT device that requires no assembly and no programming.  Following a simple two minute setup procedure, your Pebl is ready to be incorporated into your project providing IoT functionality that will bridge the gap between the virtual and physical world, from and to anywhere in the world!





We really are providing the complete IoT solution.  We offer the hardware, software and back-end infrastructure,  supporting all that you will ever want to do. All you have to do is provide the power of imagination!


And what can I use the Pebl for?
Now that we've looked at what the Pebl is and how it works, now let us explain what it can be used for and why we think it's such an incredible little tool that unlocks so much potential...
The Pebl is designed to be used as a component within custom hardware. You can think of it as a secure IoT bolt-on for your existing and exciting new projects. You can simply implement the Pebl into your project or solution by modifying existing or creating new circuitry to meet the demand of your application.





We believe that by implementing the Pebl into your existing or new development project or product, you will see fast and large returns. This is due to the lack of upfront setup costs, as we provide the entire solution.
Preventative maintenance, remote monitoring and assistance, data processing and management packages are all contracts that you can provide to your customers, at the price of a single device, the size of a sugar cube!





Pebl is designed to remove any requirement for central control hubs, is completely self-reliant and requires almost no technical knowledge to set up. Simply download our app, enter your WiFi credentials and that's it. You are connected to the IoT and ready to begin making your own ripples in the internet.
Every Pebl can be set-up wirelessly, using our USB Adapter or pre-configured at time of manufacture. Once the Pebl is configured, you can let your imagination run wild and build the next big thing, streamline your factory, teach your STEM pupils or monitor your heating from work.

So why use a Pebl and not an Arduino or Raspberry Pi instead?





First and foremost, security. The Pebl, unlike other similar devices on the market, comes with enterprise grade security as standard.
Additionally, the Pebl is pre-programmed.  One of the challenges with the Arduino, Raspberry Pi and similar devices, is creating the code you need to achieve your application's goal. More often than not, this rarely proves easy or reliable. The Pebl simply responds to predetermined commands.
Furthermore, as the Pebl is a fully encapsulated device, you don't have to worry about electrostatic discharge (ESD) or moisture damage as you would with bare board devices like the Arduino and Raspberry Pi. The watertight housing provides a barrier for use in almost any scenario, protecting against harsh environments.










Four GPIO pins and a data bus for communication with I²C and UART sensors and accessories is made available. This allows makers to produce and market their own IoT peripherals that the Pebl can simply plug into. The Pebl device can be used for multiple applications by easily removing and reinserting into another product.





For enthusiasts and inventors, we provide a breadboard breakout adaptor,  to enable you to easily implement a Pebl into your projects for quick and easy development and testing.
We are offering a wide range of rewards that we hope will spark your imagination and get your ideas flowing!


Okay, but how do I talk to the Pebl?
Good question. I suppose it's not much use just sitting there looking pretty!
The Pebl will accept, execute and respond to a predetermined set of commands from various methods of communication. There's something for everyone here and regardless of the method you choose,  the requests and responses are identical.





Please visit the Developer section of our website to learn more about and try out the Pebl commands for yourself.

















Right, but where can I use the Pebl?
We designed the Pebl to be as flexible and versatile as possible so that it could be used in most environments...

Industry





Hobbyist





Education





Domestic





Security





Marine





Medical





Agriculture






Say hello to the Fingoti Portal, finally!
The Fingoti Portal is a secure place to manage, monitor, control and interacts with your and your customer's Pebl devices.





The Pebl can be used with or without our Portal. The vast majority of customers will use the Portal for its convenience and ease of use. However, the Pebl can be used in many other different ways, which of course, are free of charge, as explained previously.
We've designed the Portal to cater for everyone from enthusiasts to small business owners and even large commercial applications. We have implemented our own infrastructure on the Microsoft Azure platform, resulting in a user experience that is intuitive, concise and rewarding.





If you decide to use the Portal, we charge for the use of communications called 'Ripples'. A single Ripple is a full device request and response cycle. Ripple usage is either based on a pay-as-you-go or subscription basis.





You'll get 1,000 free Ripples with every new account, but if you require more for your application, then you can choose to pay from just £1.00 for 5,000 additional Ripples. This essentially means you can query your device every 10 mins for an entire month, for just the price of a cheeseburger!





If you are using our API as a commercial customer or as a third party developer, the charge is issued in the same manner, however, high usage of the Portal can result in a cheaper monthly contract if desired.





Our payment terms are completely transparent and you can pay for as much or as little as you want to use, with or without a subscription.





From our Portal, users can claim devices using just the serial number. Once the Pebl is linked to an account, the owner can monitor activity, manage settings and connect with other Pebl devices, including virtual devices.





The back end infrastructure is centred around an organisation. Users can be members of multiple organisations by either creating a new one or being invited to an existing one, through a very simple email invitation process.  
Every organisation has its own set of roles that can be assigned to a user, in order to grant access to certain areas. Either make use of the system roles provided or create custom roles.
Your devices are then claimed by the organisation. That way, users can be added and removed without affecting the use of any device. All of this can be easily managed on our Portal or via the API.





You can also apply to become a partner which gives you the ability to create organisations as tenants. This allows you to set up organisations for your customers whilst maintaining the ability to manage everything for them, from their devices to their subscriptions.






Please take a look at our Usage Calculator above to get a clear idea of our pricing, should you wish to use the Portal.


Using our super new Pebl Evaluation Board
We're really excited about this :)
We hope that you'll support us and pledge for one of these boards, as they are an excellent way to discover and explore the Pebl's capabilities and how it can easily be implemented into your application. Your pledges will also fund further Portal development and help to boost our product's market introduction.





The Evaluation Board allows you to try out all the following features:

Push buttons to trigger events
Shine a large LED torch 
Spin a vibration motor 
Snap a 250VAC 10A relay for switching mains devices
Sound a buzzer 
Read the temperature and humidity 
Check the light levels 
Store data in an EEPROM flash memory chip
Send and receive UART data via USB
Connect your own prototypes to an external header
Provide an external power supply

Take a look for yourself...






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































Or, if you'd rather have a play, check out the Virtual Evaluation Board we put together!






The ideal on-boarding tool
Now it's even easier to set up your Pebl! You can simply use the USB Adapter to connect the Pebl to your laptop or computer and send the commands to get your credentials loaded onto the Pebl.





Not only that, but the USB Adapter can be used for testing and debugging, with built in GPIO indicators for easy trouble shooting. In addition to being able to send requests and receive responses, you can also stream raw serial data across the internet using the UART bus mode!


Tell me more about the Pebl's awesome features!
Wow! If you've got this far, you must be keen (or just really nerdy?!)
There is a lot of exciting stuff packed into such a small little gadget. Here are few amazing things that the Pebl is capable of, with a bit more detail to explain...





The Pebl's onboard 160MHz 32-bit processor is used in conjunction with a WiFi engine as its primary network connection method. The WiFi connection has a range of up to 50 metres.





The 2.4GHz WiFi engine uses the standard 802.11 b/g/n protocol and provides an extremely reliable connection to a router or access point. WiFi connections are WPA, WPA2 and WEP compatible as standard and incorporate a variety of TKIP and AES encryption, as required.
In simple terms, the Pebl's WiFi provides secure, powerful and reliable performance, resulting in a lightning fast response to user requests.





The biggest risk for IoT devices is the lack of security. The Pebl provides peace of mind where this is concerned. Its WiFi is fully capable of end-to-end encryption when using our Fingoti Portal.





We use Microsoft's Azure platform to provide a robust and proven method of transmitting data over the internet, securely. Using a SHA256 encrypted SAS key, communication to the Portal from the device is protected while in transit and at rest by Microsoft's firewalled servers.





With the IoT world requiring clever, reliable and varied sources of power, we didn't want to limit the device to a particular voltage.  Instead, we've made the Pebl tolerant to a wide range of voltage inputs. This allows you to power the Pebl with a USB output, solar panel or even a car battery, just to name a few.





With a built in voltage pump, the Pebl will operate on a wide input voltage range of anywhere between 3v and 16v. The onboard voltage smoothing ensures that the GPIO outputs aren't electrically noisy and provide a steady 5v output regardless of the input voltage. The voltage regulation does generate a small amount of heat, but this is properly dissipated, with efficient built-in heat sinking.
Simply, the Pebl can be used with many different power sources, allowing a wide range of applications.





The 4 user-configurable GPIO pins on the Pebl act as inputs or outputs as required in your application. They each provide an output of 5v with up to 25mA of current which is more than enough to power logic, LEDs or relays, amongst other things.





These GPIO pins can detect a change in GPIO state every second, instantly reporting back the information to the user.





The Pebl acts like a secure, remote middleman in serial communication, simply passing bytes onward via the bus and handling incoming data to be relayed back to the user. Making use of the serial bus, allows users to communicate with external processors and modules in two different ways...


Firstly, as an I²C master:

Using the Pebl's serial bus as a master for high-speed I²C data bus applications, serving over 100 slave modules is an extremely useful feature. The data bus is 5v tolerant and incorporates the necessary pull-up resistors.





I²C is a globally recognised communications protocol that uses just two wires for data transfer. This allows for a vast range of sensors and devices, such as an RTC (real time clock) above, to be monitored, read and written to, from anywhere in the world.
There is an abundance of I²C modules and devices on the internet at extremely low prices, that are very well documented for easy implementation.


Secondly, as a UART serial port:

The Pebl's serial bus can also be configured to be used as a fully featured UART serial bus for your application. This is useful for applications that require external communications to GPRS or GMS modules.





The UART serial mode allows the user to send and receive serial data instantaneously! All standard serial communication settings are exposed, for example, baudrate, parity and flow control, for use with many different UART applications.





The Pebl includes a 16 million colour RGB LED that can be changed to any colour using a single command, visually communicating with users for many different purposes.





The device also incorporates a 'blink' feature that allows you to adjust the flashing speed, duration and colour. This provides additional flexibility and uses for the Pebl device.
Pretty cool, eh?





Want to use the Pebl outdoors? No problem.  The device is immune to dust, dirt, rain, moisture and extreme weather. 





The Pebl is designed to be IP67 rated,  which certifies that it's waterproof and we're working on getting this officially assessed as soon as possible after our campaign.





Ask the Pebl to do the heavy lifting for you to perform tasks automatically. Set a timer to read the temperature every hour, or turn a heater on at 5:00pm ready for when you get home from work, using the scheduler!










Okay, okay, we know it doesn't have a battery,  but believe it or not, that was a conscious decision. A battery limits you to use devices and peripherals that are low powered which can limit your IoT application - not what we want to see!





We believe that for an IoT device to be truly reliable and ensure that its data reporting is as accurate as can be, then it should be continuously powered. We have an environmental responsibility to provide the best performance we can, so, we made the Pebl as power efficient as possible. It consumes approximately 350mW on average.





Isn't it irritating when new software gets released and you have to individually update every device you have? Not with the Pebl, it's actively checking for updates.





We release software updates after passing an extensive customer acceptance testing process, so we're confident they won't interrupt your IoT application and cause any hiccups. You can opt for scheduled automatic updates when they are available or if your application is mission critical, update manually via the Fingoti Portal at a time that suits you.
If your Pebl is connected to our Portal, you'll never miss an update, forever.





Using the Pebl via the Fingoti Portal is easy and seamless. The Pebl can connect itself to our Portal (if you wish) which allows you to access,  monitor, change and update it using our friendly Portal user interface.
But, don't worry, that's not the only way to use your Pebl...
The ways in which the Pebl can communicate with the outside world are extensive.





For those budding entrepreneur and/or nerds amongst you who are looking for a more commercial, industrial or custom solution or you'd consider yourself an advanced user then the Pebl will respond to other methods of communication.

 MQTT - Connect to a custom broker
 HTTP - Issue local POST requests
 WS - Stream responses through a websocket
 UART - Onboard UART for serial communication







Our API can also be utilised for direct communication, securely, via our Portal, but implementing your own user interface and back-end. This solution can be useful for third-party developers and custom applications that require high security and minimal fuss/cost setup.
Please take a look at our API Reference Documentation and Device Commands





Yes, we get that a lot, it really is that small!
Requirements for the size of the Pebl were defined early on to be as 'small as possible' but remaining 'beautifully tactile' - not an easy one.





It was important that the Pebl was both minimal and self-contained.  This compares to the IoT hardware that is currently available, often being bare-board with exposed electrical components. Every cubic millimetre of the device has been utilised. All components are internal and self-contained with a chemical and water resistant resin, which acts as a heat sink as well as protection from environmental factors.


What rewards can you get your hands on?






We're friendly so please get in touch!

record.Creator: Apollo Audio
record.Title: Eclipse: Audio visualizing ferrofluid speaker
record.Text:
Introducing the Eclipse 
The Eclipse speaker is the first of its kind ferrofluid audio visualizing Bluetooth speaker. With the power of electromagnets, the Eclipse translates your audio into magnetic pulses that push the ferrofluid creating a stunning display of real fluid animations.
*The version shown is a prototype and the final version will be refined and upgraded.










Message from our Head of research and development  






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































 Demo video






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































This is our demo video for our current working prototype of the Eclipse. Please note on the final version the LED strips will be hidden, the glass bottom will be removed and perfectly round, LED strips will be brighter, and the speaker drivers will be tuned. Additionally, the ferrofluid animation and coding are still being optimized.
This is basically our rough draft speaker and as RND continues the Eclipse speaker on release will be refined and perfected.  We are still sourcing materials and parts to guarantee the Eclipse speaker has incredible build quality.





Sixty-one years ago, NASA engineers created the first magnetic fluid called the ferrofluid. This invention made it the world's first truly magnetic liquid. Inspired by this feat, we formed a team and created the Eclipse speaker. The Eclipse is a first-of-its-kind speaker that uses a ferrofluid and an electromagnet to create a stunning audio visualizer.
For ferrofluid to even be visible in a glass bottle, just like traditional ferrofluid containers, the glass has to be specially treated to prevent staining. The manufacturing process for a ferrofluid bottle can be time-consuming and costly to ensure the glass is properly treated.

  How does it work? 





Your device > audio analyzer > electromagnet > ferrofluid movement
The Eclipse speaker works by taking audio transmitted from your device and converting that audio into digital signals. Those signals are then sent to the electromagnet where it pulses those signals as magnetic forces. The magnetic forces meet the ferrofluid causing a magnetic reaction and thus the ferrofluid movement.
We've fine-tuned and refined our firmware through countless hours of testing and coding all in a pursuit to add features to prevent dead spaces, obtain the best visuals possible, and regulate the electromagnet's sensitivity. 





Utilizing the ferrofluids magnetic property the Eclipse’s audio is enhanced with our Fluid Mass Bass boost system.
Fluid Mass Bass Boost takes advantage of the mass of the ferromagnetic fluid by exactly matching the speaker output phasing to the movement of the fluid.
This results in a physical alteration to the center of mass of the speaker cabinet and allows for a more solid and realistic bass sound than would typically be achieved with a speaker of this size and specification.
tl;dr the ferrofluid makes the bass sound good.










 Key features
Capacitive touch controls: At the top of the Eclipse is our control module for the speaker. Flat and touch-sensitive controls similar to a touch screen to control volume, Bluetooth, pause, and many more features.
LED lighting: Inside the Eclipse's main chamber is LED lighting for the ferrofluid bottle. The LED is RGB+W allowing you to display just about any color imaginable including pure white. LED is controllable via our smartphone app included with your purchase.
Electromagnet: Inside the Eclipse is a 500N electromagnet synced with the audio analyzer chip. Music sent to the Eclipse is converted into electromagnetic pulses rhythmically moving the ferrofluid.
Removable panel: On the bottom of the Eclipse is a removable panel for swapping out ferrofluid bottles. We plan on offering additional ferrofluid colors in identical glass bottles you can switch into your eclipse.
Bluetooth: No wires needed the Eclipse is 100% Bluetooth allowing you to play your music wirelessly.
Fluid Mass Bass Boost: Upgrade your bass with the power of ferrofluid. Our custom-designed system utilizes ferrofluid unlike any other speaker to create a sensational bass quality.










Speaker Colorway stretch goals: With a variety of colorways; you can choose a speaker that is truly yours.
Front panel customization: The ellipse also has a removable front panel creating opportunities for different colors and possible artists collaborations for the most personal product possible.
Colored ferrofluid stretch goal: By achieving the colored ferrofluid stretch goal we can deliver a fairly wide range of colored fluid for greater product personalization.
Style is personal and the Eclipse speaker was created with the purpose to give users a better way to express themselves and create memorable experiences. Our mission is to make the Eclipse's customization seemingly endless leaving nearly nothing to be unattainable. 
App features 





Lighting settings: Adjust your LED lighting with full-spectrum controls to change the color and brightness.  Plus, there are tons of color-changing lighting modes for you to choose from.
Genre selector: Optimize ferrofluid animation by matching your music with a genre. Our presets are custom made to enhance ferrofluid animation for the specific genre.
Sound equalizer: Customize your audio to your liking with our built-in sound equalizer. Take control of your settings and fine-tune your audio down to the finest details. 
Animation presets: Experiment with your ferrofluid's movement with our animation presets. Preset animation modes that change how your music is translated to ferrofluid movement. 
Ferrofluid control: Control your ferrofluid with no audio required from the power of your smart device. In-app controls for you to activate the electromagnet and move the ferrofluid.
…And plenty of bonus features!





 Capacitive touch controls 





Located at the top of the Eclipse speaker is the capacitive touch control panel. Capacitive controls are like touchscreens where you don't have to click a button to use a feature. Simply tap the icons and you can use any of the features on the panel. 
Features currently include volume up, volume down, Bluetooth, and power on/off.
The capacitive controls are easy to use without having to worry about analog buttons breaking down or getting stuck.





We didn't just stop at making a ferrofluid visualizing speaker, we made sure it sounds phenomenal too.
With a max volume output of 86db, the eclipse can get as loud as a lawnmower (90db) or a vacuum (80db) at peak volume.
 With dual premium speaker drivers tuned to perfection, an acoustically engineered casing, and our custom Fluid Mass Bass Boost system, we can promise you the audio quality is out of this world.




















Designing a ferrofluid speaker isn't really something that has been done before. Unlike conventional speakers, we have numerous extra bells and whistles that need to fit inside. Not only do we have an electromagnet on the inside but speakers drivers are naturally magnetic. Forcing us to get creative and keep the ferrofluid from being drawn in by the drivers. 















Coding the firmware for the speaker was the next obstacle to overcome. Translating audio to magnetic pulses was another obstacle in the pursuit of perfection building this beautiful machine. We were able to generate code that synchronized pulses whenever audio hit a certain volume threshold. Then we had to refine our code to adjust for pauses in music and varying levels of volume. We didn't stop there and continued coding to make sure any song could be visualized perfectly.





The code listens to and samples the music many times per second and isolates peaks in the audio at different frequencies. Then, using a self-optimizing logic, it decides which frequencies will then trigger the electromagnet.
In a nutshell, our code sets a threshold for each frequency band from the audio playing. These thresholds automatically adjust and modify pulses for the audio being played. Once a threshold is broken that triggers a pulse from the electromagnet. The hold time for the pulse is determined by the audio playing.  Hold time is the length of the magnetic pulse or how long the magnet is actively holding the ferrofluid.
The settings are also adjustable and customizable inside of the Apollo Eclipse app.
After tons of testing and prototyping, we finally settled on a design that met our strict standards of quality and runs effortlessly.





Power type: Wired (Due to the electromagnet power requirements this is NOT a portable speaker)
Weight: TBD (We are still finalizing inside components)
# of speakers: 2x speaker drivers
Connectivity Tech: Bluetooth & WIFI 
Electromagnet strength: 500N 
Front panel material: Acoustic fabric  
Controls: Capacitive touch controls 
LEDs: RGB+W LED strips with Bluetooth connectivity for control via Apollo app  (all spectrum colors and full white)
Ferrofluid bottle: 250ml anti-stain solution and 20ml ferrofluid 










Since its inception, a combined amount of well over 2,000+ man-hours have been put into this project. Our team has been responsible for designing, prototyping, engineering, sourcing, and funding the project. 
This isn't our first rodeo in the eCommerce and product development space. Our small executive has a track record of developing eCommerce brands into 7-figure giants in as little as a year. Our proven strategies for digital marketing, product dev, social media, and customer support enable us to turn customers into super fans.  With over $3,000,000 in revenue and over 200,000,000+ organic social media views to show.
We've found it's much easier to sell to existing customers so our secret sauce is to create the best possible customer experience.  Fast and accurate shipping times with quality so good you rarely need customer support. We don't need any business secrets to scale just simple customer satisfaction.
The Eclipse is more than just a Kickstarter for us; we're looking to turn this into a community of Apollo fanatics. We've learned a lot from developing the Eclipse and have tons of ideas stored in the bank for our product roadmap.  We can promise you there are even bigger projects to come from the Apollo team.










 As well as biweekly updates we will additionally be making frequent posts on our social media platforms to keep our community updated. Posts will include prototype photos, manufacturing updates, concepts, and tons of other content. 
Additionally, our team of customer support agents will be replying to comments and questions on Kickstarter and social media. As well as updating our FAQ page and Kickstarter with relevant information regarding the Eclipse.
We're committed to staying transparent with our process and allowing customers to be informed about their products.   





 Pledges may vary (these are the items included in the 1st tier pledge)

record.Creator: Maggie Sullivan
record.Title: SkiAvec: A new invention for Nordic skiers!
record.Text:
I'm not sure where the concept came from--perhaps while mowing the lawn. Regardless, it originally took shape as a solar-powered machine. However, sun power turned out not to be a viable energy source. Hence the evolution to e-Bike technology with the expertise of a mechanical engineer. 






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00





































You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































Feedback has been very good, including people's personal stories. Here are a few...

"That looks exactly like what I need. You're right, I won't sell my skis just yet." --Jim
"I have had two knee replacements which have slowed me down, mainly because I don't have the confidence to ski like I used to. If I fall down, it is extremely difficult and frustrating to get up again, not to mention embarrassing. I love the adventure of cutting my own trails. I look forward to seeing this thing happen. You have my whole support." --Casey
"Balance isn't my strong suit. Last winter a little patch of ice took me down and I pulled two hamstrings. Something like your SkiAvec would have spared me a lot of pain and six weeks of physical therapy." --Tom
"We went skiing a couple weeks ago. There was one set of tracks and the snow was about 18" deep. Breaking trail was hard work and this might have helped. I could see that Nordic ski areas might keep some rentals for novice skiers." --Dawn
"The idea of having a machine make the trail is great...It has been years since I did any cross-country skiing. I like the idea of having a route laid out. I just remember that managing the poles was feat enough for me." --Danette
"Do you want a cardiovascular workout in fresh winter air away from the crowds? Then the SkiAvec is the perfect tool for creating new trails, using low-impact and quiet e-bike technology! I'm a XC skier who loves to find remote unpopulated natural areas, and this will provide more opportunities for me and my family to enjoy back country skiing adventures!" --Lisa

The next steps

Funding. Our next step is to manufacture and test three prototypes in the Pacific Northwest. Why three? Because more testers of varying abilities in different regions will provide a wider array of actionable data points to ensure that the SkiAvec will perform in a variety of winter conditions, such as snow textures, temperatures and terrain. Our request for $28,850 will cover the cost of producing the prototypes, including a mechanical engineer's labor, design and drawings, plus hardware, fabrication, assembly and testing.
A Vision for SkiAvec. Following development and testing, we will be revising our design plans to incorporate feedback, and then move into production of a retail model for individuals, ski resorts, etc. Our goal is to offer a simple-to-use, affordable machine that instills confidence in our customers' ability to pursue cross-country skiing in new and continued ways.
Thank You! Your pledge says you like what we're doing. Please share this project with your family, friends, neighbors, and coworkers. All backers at any contribution level will be acknowledged and will receive updates. With your supporting pledge, the SkiAvec will become a reality!

record.Creator: KB Devices
record.Title: open·control
record.Text:
A customizable Control Surface for Ableton Live 
After successfully launching State Of The Loop in 2018, I am excited to present you my new creation, a more flexible and powerful MIDI controller. 
➜ HARDWARE DESIGN :
As a successor to State Of The Loop, I wanted to create a controller with a brighter and clearer display, that could properly show Looper names, Scene names, Arrangement Markers names, and more. 
I also wanted that the user could decide how many foot pedals he could use. Sometimes 5 is too much, sometimes 2 is not enough. 






After making the first prototypes, I found it so cool and useful, that I decided to make a version that could be controlled by pressing buttons instead of pedals.
So open·control was born.





➜ SOFTWARE DESIGN :
After designing the hardware, I had to choose which actions each control should perform. But again,  it was hard to decide which functions would benefit the majority of users.  So I decided to let the user decide what's best for him as easily as possible.

Right now open·control is optimized for Ableton Live, with its own Script and Editor.
But being Open Source, it could evolve and encompass software like Logic, Bitwig, who knows ?






Bright LED Matrix display

min. 6 Buttons / Switch pedal inputs 
6 RGB LEDs for visual feedback

min. 2 Endless Knobs / Expression Pedal inputs

MIDI In and Out ports
Standard USB






 open·control is available in 3 formats





The Pocket version has 6 Buttons with visual feedback and 2 Endless Knobs with Push buttons, bringing it to a total of 8 buttons. It comes in the most simple yet elegant form of a printed circuit. It is the perfect companion to your mouse and keyboard to control Live and provides easy shortcuts to your favorite actions. 
A 3D printed cover is available if you want to protect it.





With its 8 Jack inputs, the Boxed version allows to plug up to 6 Foot Switches and 2 Expression Pedals. But if you only need half, that's not a problem, you will still enjoy its bright display and solid built.





 If none of the models above suit you, and you have the skills for it, you can always build your own enclosure. The Maker version has all the features of its brothers (6 buttons with visual feedback, 2 "sliders" and 2 endless encoders with push buttons), it is up to you to imagine the best box for your own use.





open·control is fully customizable through an easy to use Web interface (also available offline).





You can decide what each button will perform (long and short press), and what the  LEDs and main Display will show.

Here is a list of some of the actions already available (the list will grow with User Requests) :





 You can also use the buttons to do "standard" MIDI mapping. 

Here are a few examples of possible set ups :



Displaying Scene names





Set up examples



You can find more details on the open·control website opencontrol.me, or see the Web editor for yourself.





Of course, open·control, like its predecessor, is capable of controlling Live's Looper, except that it is now much easier:

no more Max For Live: open·control doesn't rely on Max For Live anymore, the Script takes care of everything
in order for a Looper to be detected, just add (LOOPER#) to the name of the Looper device, or simply press a button on your controller.
you can monitor up to 6 Loopers simultaneously on the 6 LEDs






 Watch a little demo of open·control :








In order to make it ready for the stage, and not be limited to the USB cable length, open·control has mini-jack MIDI In and Out ports. The USB cable will then only be used to provide power to the unit. 





 open·control can also be controled by your favorite Pedal or Pad controller (for instance Behringer's FCB1010, Roland's SPD-SX, KMI's Softstep,...). 
If you have a controller with MIDI Out that can send temporary CC or Note messages, just plug it in and let open·control know which Note/CC to listen to.










A 3D-printed cover is available for the Pocket version.
It was designed by Bruno Tognin and is made out of recycled plastic bottles.




















 Display:
     • Bright 6x32 LED Matrix
     • 6 RGB LEDs 
both have adjustable brightness 

 Inputs / Outputs:
     • 6 Switches (Buttons or Pedals)
     • 2 Sliders (Knobs or Faders) 
     • Mini-Jack  MIDI In and Out  
     • USB

open·control is based on a Raspberry Pi Pico (RP2040) chip.  It is programmed in C/C++ using Arduino, but can be programmed in CircuitPython / MicroPython.
Each of the components (LEDs, buttons, matrix, Analog Inputs) can be accessed through the I/O pins.





open·control already has a long story, at least in the lab...
Watch it evolve from a Teensy-based "State Of The Loop Mk2" to a fully original and integrated device.







The box itself has mutated from the first prototype of "KBD Multifootswitch" to the final enclosure.





You can also be part of this story by supporting open·control !

record.Creator: Echelon
record.Title: ZVE : Zero Vulnerability Electronics
record.Text:
We're Building The Perfect Phone For Your Safety, Security, And Privacy Online
Welcome To The Digital Age.
The age where we fear 

worry over cyber security 
our ex's and spouses spying on our phone
The government leaving the public open to malware attack
local police abusing spyware to steal your personal contacts, your texts and even your nudes

And there's no way for you to know for sure..
Have you ever heard of something like this?
The NSA simply warns the public to prepare for cyber attacks and without a solution - why? 
Because they're exploiting your devices weakness to build a dossier about you.
"Big Tech" will always sell you "terms & conditions" that allow them to legally spy on you to sell you junk you don't need.
But Here's The Truth.
No one want's their neighbor spying on their phone, 
No one wants their ex to know the way they talk to their new lover,
No one wants big companies using the data they collect on you - "for free" - using your data for "research" or profit.
Welcome To The Digital Age - Where Your Neighbor Can Easily Spy On Your Phone!
Where your electronics are built to be insecure, the software is engineered to be insecure so that strangers can exploit you and your home life.
Have you ever wanted to secure your electronics for work or business purposes?
What if we want to share with you a way to ensure that you're secure?
Have you ever wished there was a way to know for certain that you're not being spied on?
What if we knew of a way to know for certain?
Have you ever wanted to hide something from someone important?
Do you need a certain level of professional discretion and privacy when you're using your electronics?
Because of the current state of electronics...
Did you know that your local law enforcement can splice into your camera, microphone and location on your phone and watch you or someone you love change their clothes?
Did you know that private organizations can splice into your camera and microphone easily today?
They have so much money- and it's easy anyway- We'll tell you why - 
Did you know that your boss or your coworker can upload spyware to your phone without your consent and without you knowing?
That's right, they can tune in at night to see your sensitive photos- they can even do the same to your family because they have access to your contacts!
What if we told you...
That passwords and lock screens are just a false sense of security? And that because of "big tech" companies and their terms and conditions, you're subject to "research" and development projects- 
Everything you do online is being tracked.
And it's especially scary and overwhelming when you don't have a clue about how software works!
A good friend of ours tells us all the time that 

"they're oblivious to how hackers work"
"they think they're being spied on by their boss"
"They're afraid that their ex is going to find out"
"They're terrified that some sensitive business info might get "leaked""
"They believe that their phone is insecure or hacked"

And we always respond with the same,
You're Not Alone.
Hundreds of millions of people have the same concerns about their "smart" phone.
They want and need 

privacy
security
and a safe device to use everyday

The fact of the matter is that- 
The world is dangerous. 
All it takes is one leaked electronic document and suddenly your privacy is public.
Imagine an imaginary window in front of you where any number of people can watch or listen to you through 24 hours a day - seven days a week, where strangers could see the inside of your bedroom, the inside of your life, the inside of your mind, the inside of all of your relationships for free, stealing it to make money of their own...
That's Your Phone. 
Anybody with the appropriate software can come along and take control of your microphone and camera- they can snoop and see everything that you don't want them to see...
All major brand "devices" are built to be insecure so that people like "big tech" can exploit you for advertising, so that the government can exploit you for spying, so that organizations can see inside without you ever knowing.
We saw a problem with that- 

it's too risky
it's too costly
and it's too unethical!

All it takes is for your neighbor to meet a software engineer expert and before you  know it- your neighbor is smirking because they know what you and your spouse look like naked.
Welcome To The Digital Age.
Where your average joe programmer has access to software like the infamous 
Pegasus Spyware
Pegasus gives strangers access to all of your contacts, call logs, messages, photos, web browsing history, settings including apps like imessage, gmail, instagram, snapchat, facebook, whatsapp, telegram, and many more. 
The spyware Pegasus and others can be installed on your device with the push of a key on a keyboard remotely. 
All they need is your phone number- 
The spyware can be installed on the latest versions of Apple and Android

without your consent
without your permission
and without you knowing! 

And with the push of a button.
Every Apple, Samsung, and other major brand phone is 100% vulnerable!
It's a sophisticated world we live in-
And software is certainly a part of your life whether you think about it or not. 
The infamous Pegasus exploits what's known as a zero-click vulnerability.
Which means your neighbor can upload spyware to your phone without any interaction from  you!
Doesn't matter if you click anything - 
Once they send it to your device by email, sms, phone call, whatsapp, facebook, or any other way, your device is programmed to automatically pre-download the malware- because it's a pre-downloadable file. 
They call it Pegasus because these viruses are like a Trojan Horse! Nothing you can do!
Software like the infamous Pegasus Spyware is extremely dangerous and more common than you think- 
In fact- you might already have it on your phone and you would never know that strangers are on the other side of your cell phone- judging you, watching you, and financially making a killing because you agreed to their terms and conditions of their application or software.
And if that doesn't make you sick to your stomach- then by all means...
Welcome To The Digital Age- where someone you care to impress can look through everything you've ever done with your phone- 
- Where someone you once knew can look up your phone number and then cyber assault your electronics with spyware
- Where local law enforcement can look at your wife's sexy photos- or your families sensitive photos - or even worse, they can get a free look at your daughters photos!
One of our good friends said this was happening to them for months, and once we directed them to one of our trusted cyber security experts- they busted them and got revenge!
Major Brand software and electronics are far from safe!
Welcome to the digital age where the fact of the matter is that all "major brand" technology is completely insecure, all of your favorite technology is totally and completely vulnerable to cyber assault.
Cyber Assault by Strangers.
Are you worried or afraid that someone might be monitoring you through your electronics but you don't know what to do?
Our very good friends have said the same and that's why we created Zero Vulnerability Electronics.
ZVE is exactly what you think it is- The only solution on the market that makes it impossible for anyone to spy on your electronics. 
ZVE is a smart phone that has very smart terms and conditions, and functionality that allows for everything on your device to encrypt automatically!
Meaning no on can spy on your text's, no one can log your calls, and no one can splice into your phones camera and microphone!
With ZVE you're guaranteed security, privacy and most of all - you're guaranteed safety.
Our Principles
We believe you have a right to:

digital privacy
a safe place to store your digital information
control your own data (who can access it, and when)
have conversations online with the same privacy of being alone and in person
not be monitored by big tech, the government, or anyone else


Our Technology: The 4Privacy Engine
We're working on technology that:

is end-to-end encrypted with AES-256
is distributed
has a strong, passwordless identity system
facilitates easy and secure data storage
gives you control of your data even after it has been shared with others
is zero-knowledge - no third parties can see your information, not even us
generates your encryption keys on your device so they stay private and only accessible by you
affords you the benefits of the cloud, while preventing cloud providers from seeing your information
can improve and change as cryptography and technology evolve
doesn't make you choose between ease of use and strong security

How we keep your information secure
1.) Industry Leading Encryption 
2.) Completely Private, Even from Us 
3.) Authorized Access Only

Securely share and privately communicate
The moment anyone tries to spy on you- your ZVE phone will wipe the bug out immediately. 
ZVE phones are perfect if you need 

anonymity
privacy
security
safety
peace of mind!

ZVE is exactly what's needed to finally secure your privacy and feel good knowing it's done.
This smart phone is for your privacy, your security and your safety.
You also have the capability to back your phone up to a 100% encrypted cloud service - where absolutely nothing is used for "research" - nothing is ever looked at by strangers- and where it's impossible to spy on you!
So Get Your Credit Card Out And Ready And Never Second Guess If You're Being Spied On Again.
ZVE smart phones are set to hit retail stores in 2027.
Because you like Zero Vulnerability Electronics - Go ahead and join our community by pledging as much as you can today, only as fast as you're ready to feel relieved that your smartphone is completely and totally secure. 
We want to help you achieve more privacy in your digital life.

To Be Noted:
(Developing new products and hardware can be especially complex for creators and rewarding to backers. Please understand that this project is in its prototype development. We plan to manufacture and distribute a complex smart phone. This is a Kickstarter campaign focused around the creation and development of a prototype.
