record.Creator: Giovanni Marquez
record.Title: FreshLedge
record.Text:
With online ordering and deliveries increasingly common, people may lack proper space near their front door to receive a delivery. Items may be placed in a disorganized manner near a front door and be at risk for blowing away due to inclement weather, being stolen, and the like. Placing items on the ground leaves the item at risk for dirt, debris, insect infestations, etc. which can be especially unfortunate when it comes to food deliveries.
FreshLedge is delivery shelf system capable of being placed near a front door or window on a home, office, or other building. The system is comprised of a shelf with a hinged mechanism near its rear edge used to firmly secure the shelf to the building exterior. The hinge allows the shelf to be placed in a vertical position for storage when not in use and a horizontal, deployed position when a package is ready to be received.
Delivery personnel can pull down the shelf when he or she is delivering a box or other package to a building. The shelf accommodates the item(s) and keeps them elevated, safe from dirt, debris, insects, etc. There can be extensions or attachments to support different sizes of items ranging from boxes, beverage containers, food containers, and more. Optional smart home features could also be integrated in which the shelf can automatically deploy to a specific length when a package delivery is nearby.
The system can be constructed using metal, plastic, and other suitable materials. The shelf and other components may feature custom colors or designs to accommodate all user needs and preferences. Exact size, measurement, construction, and design specifications may vary upon further development and manufacturing. I currently hold a provisional patent on "FreshLedge" and will obtain a non-provisional patent by early next year.




Here is my current prototype at my home. I made it out of wood, hinges, magnets and chains. We use ours by noting it in the comment section of our deliveries. 
For example: 
We order fresh baked cookies to take to work sometimes and they deliver them fresh as soon as 8am in the morning. When we place the order the night before on the app, we note in the comments, "Please do not place on floor, please pull down FreshLedge on wall by front door and place there, thank you."
What has happened in the past is,  they place the box on the floor and leave (contactless delivery) and we don't notice the "delivered" notification on the app, since we are either in the shower or getting ready. By the time we notice, even if it's just a few minutes after, a trail of ants has made its way into the box and you know the rest lol.











 The future of  FreshLedge could be very cool, ESPECIALLY when it becomes a SmartLedge and can be something that could be a touchscreen/camera/doorbell/ledge all in one. Pretty much your own concierge, it even holds your bags. 

Thank you for taking the time to read about my idea, have an amazing life and continue to be great!

record.Creator: Open Source Diabetic
record.Title: CLIP - Closed Loop Insulin Pump
record.Text:
Who am I?     
       I'm McKenzie Lovegood, founder of Open Source Diabetic.



What is Open Source Diabetic?
       Open Source Diabetic is a non-profit organization whose goal is to produce Open Source hardware and software to help Diabetics manage their Diabetes.



What is Open Source?
       Open Source means that the source code for the software, and design files for the hardware is open, for everyone to see, share, contribute, use to build their own device, or even use in their own projects.



What are we making?
       We are going to make C.L.I.P. - A Closed Loop Insulin Pump that will be designed to work with existing hardware and software.



What is a Closed Loop?
       Closed Loop means that the insulin pump gathers data from your Glucose meter, or Constant Glucose Monitor (CGM), and automatically gives you insulin to keep your blood glucose readings level, just like a real pancreas! 



Where did this project come from?
       This project started as something I was making for myself, to keep my own Diabetes in control. I couldn't find what I needed in any commercial product (and I've tried them all). What I did find was a great community that feels the same way. A community that has started hacking their own insulin pumps, and writing their own software to achieve their goals. 



What’s your plan?
       My plan is to make an insulin pump that brings these features to the every day user, safely, and securely. Eliminating the need to hack old insulin pumps, and instead creating an open insulin pump that anyone can make at home, buy, and change as they see fit.



What’s your budget?
       Ive set the goal to this campaign rather low, $90k, the bare minimum I need to get started. Just barely enough to get the design out there, make prototypes, and get the final product into people hands. The ideal goal is closer to $200k. This would cover manufacturing on a much larger scale, legal fees, start FDA approval, and would allow for more time and resources to get the best product out to as many people as possible.

record.Creator: ADV.SOUND
record.Title: ADV. Eartune Fidelity – Custom-fit Ear Tips for AirPods Pro
record.Text:
We are a team of passionate creators revolutionizing the sound and hearing technologies using the power of 3D-printing, AI, and decades of ear-related experience in pro-audio, hearing aid technology, and consumer electronics. 
Alongside six successfully delivered crowdfunded campaigns, with years of experience in development, manufacture, and mass shipment/fulfillment, we are confident in delivering the rewards to our backers.
To pre-order your Eartune Fidelity and bring to life our vision of an affordable, high quality custom ear tip adapter, click Back This Project, or scroll on.














































































Convenient carrying case for AirPods Pro + Eartune Fidelity custom tips available now as an add-on.  Made in the USA.








You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00



















































SPEK stands for "Self Precision Ear-impression Kit" and it's a patented system co-developed by ADV. and SPEK Research Inc.  It's a system that allows you to create an accurate, physical ear impression safely at home without needing to visit an audiologist.  Once we receive your ear impression, we'll be able to make any custom-fit ear pieces you want in addition to the Eartune Fidelity custom ear tips. Check out a full list of available custom tips and earplugs here.




































































How much do they protrude out? AirPods Pro with Eartune Fidelity (left) and stock ear tips (right).





Do the ear tips affect the sensors?  Eartune Fidelity tips are designed to work with the built-in sensors flawlessly.





Any kind of color options?  Yes!





How to install Eartune Fidelity tips?  Is it hard?  It's totally simple.





How does 3D-printing get utilized in production? The outer shell is printed, then the silicone is injected into the shell.





Is Eartune Fidelity ideal for sports? Yes, it's even secure enough for extreme sports like mountain biking.
























Justin met Giuseppe (Joe) and Peter at an audiophile trade show in 2018 as professionals coming from different industries.  With sound and hearables as a common denominator, they quickly found their visions aligned to develop a solution that democratizes custom-fit ear pieces for the masses.  Relentless development ensued and resulted in the revolutionary Eartune series custom ear pieces that utilize the patented SPEK system  (Self Precision Ear-impression Kit) which allows users to create their own, accurate physical ear impression safely at home.










It was the respect for all musicians of the past, present and future.  It was for the struggling instrumental buried under the heavy bass  line. It was for the audiophiles craving that crystal clear and  mind-blowing detail.
ADV. began as a small Kickstarter campaign in 2015 and naturally grew into a bigger body that  thrives on the enthusiasm and passion for music. We design, develop and  produce ground-breaking audio products that span widely from earphones,  headphones, DAC / amp to musical instruments. We are focusing on staying  in the forefront with the latest proprietary audio technology, while continuing to explore creative ways to allow everyone to experience the  audiophile-grade sound.





As our core principle, there is respect for all musicians as creators and facilitators of content so deeply rooted in human emotion.  We recognize the importance of music and the impact it has in our lives.  We actively collaborate with and support those who practice, create, and perform around the globe.

We are raising funds to develop a Healthier Social Media App that is more user centric, does not use their information or show them advertisements, and gives them a courteous and positive space to interact with each other. 

We care about it because we believe current social media options are contributing to world problems like Mass Narcissism, Polarisation, Misinformation, Information Overload and Addictive Use. 

Our platform aims to solve these problems by abandoning current social media's advertising based business model, that prioritizes maximising engagement for serving business interests, in favour of a membership based business model designed to serve people well. We plan to use the money from kickstarter to complete it's development and then invite users for beta testing. 

We are entrepreneurs in humane technology belonging from America and India.

record.Creator: Ensemble LLC
record.Title: mRPG - Second Edition
record.Text:
Welcome to mRPG - Second Edition 
mRPG Second Edition is the evolution of our beloved chat and dice rolling RPG app, aiming now to bring much more fun to apprentices, players and GMs.
 
This new mRPG, as of the delivery of this project, will be offered in new formats: Including a free and three Subscription Models with lots of fun new and revised features.

In this version you can expect a big improvement on the overall design of the platform, several improvements in gameplay and stability, and new ways to use your creativity to lead and participate in much richer campaigns.

Support the Second Edition!
Starting at $25 you will have early access to the Beta versions of the new mRPG, which will be available to supporters of this track starting in November!

Beta access and the possibility of participating in the organization of the new features in the app are some of the gifts that our team offers you, as a supporter of this funding.

See now a more detailed description of the features we've been thinking of bringing to you: 



Take a look at the new features we're planning



 WHOLE-NEW EXPERIENCE, IMPROVED VISUAL

A new mRPG deserves a completely new look and feel. We've heard all your feedback, and are planning to build, from the ground up, a totally new and modernized user interface, designed to bring more immersion, accessibility, ease of use and fun to everyone.


 TOTALLY REDESIGNED CHAT 

Beside the all new and revamped visual, we focused on redesigning the chat screen so that everything you need is within reach at anytime. Quickly access things like your inventory, character sheets, dice and many other GM actions. Take a deeper look on what we're planning.



New Quick Action and Dice Trays



BETTER DICE ROLLING

Our world famous dice calculator is still here, but in a much more visual way!
Now you see the dice you are going to roll, keep the most used ones within reach, and also use them with your macros and scripts if you wish!


CAMPAIGN INVENTORY

We wanted to build a place to keep all your character's and party stuff organized: Things like items, notes, equipments (with macros and stats) or money that you will need on the journey.
GM's, you can take a step further and use a personal library - and unleash your creativity - or the New mRPG Trade Market to always have what you need at any time for your campaigns. 






 SHARE AND REUSE CHARACTER SHEETS 

We're reimagining our approach on the character sheet to be possible to make them more customizable and, more importantly, to share with your friends and reuse in any campaign of your choice. We also focused on a more welcoming creation flow for new players. Expect also more immersion and new ways to bring your characters to life with the new visual.



Character Sheets will have lots of new features, ease of use and share options



 PERSONAL LIBRARY AND TRADE MARKET 

And speaking of reuse and sharing, let's talk about it! Everyone will have access to a Personal Library - to keep items stored for reuse on future campaigns -, and also to a Trade Market - to share or search for other users packs of assets. So how all this works?
- Users will be able to create, edit and share a pack of assets with System Sheet Template, Pre-built Character Sheets (ie. classes and specializations), Inventory Items and Weapons and Well-known NPC's (like monsters and enemies with simplified sheets).



Check out the new ways to share your packs of sheets, items, weapons and more


- After creating a pack, you'll be able to store it on your own library or share it with the community in a Trade Market so everyone can add to their personal library and you on any campaign they see fit. 
- The market will have a public and an internal mRPG moderation based on a Reputation/Voting System meant to keep the market a healthy place. So you'll up or down vote packs and have a clear and better understanding of what you're using.


MUCH BETTER WAYS TO FIND CAMPAIGNS TO PLAY

In this new version of mRPG we want to put a lot of effort in the Home Screen. So, we're planning on creating a new Discover Tab containing curated sections to show campaigns more likely to match your tastes (i.e. the systems you like, campaigns that fit with your level of play, number of players, and so on). We'll also redesign the Find Games into a News Tab, where you can search for recent and fresh campaigns.











Currently, mRPG Web is Beta and is now only available to our Patreon supporters. But in mRPG Second Edition we will bring mRPG Web to everyone, so every player can experience roleplaying using full-sized Keyboard and Mouse and experience a user interface totally adapted to bigger screens, making use of all available screen space to allow still quicker and easier access to all the tools you need while playing.











 INTENSE BUG AND ARCHITECTURAL REVIEW 

We scanned the app and collected your feedback to map the root causes of bugs and flaws on mRPG and also find out those that most impact the user experience. 
The New mRPG will come to the stores with a smoother operation, that’s for sure! And for that, we're aiming to work on better structures to increase the overall stability of the system.
These are some of the improvements and steps we're taking towards better quality of life:

Improved reliability on our messaging system. Expect better chat experience, and no more glitches when loading your campaign messages;
New notification structure. Including better user control, faster and more reliable notifications and overall stability;
Overall app stability to reduce those annoying crashes. This will include broader device compatibility and better monitoring of bugs and issues.
Review of our search and index services, so you can find what you need on the app
Rewriting most of the code base for a more cleaner and unified debug and develop process






Keeping the mRPG community healthy is not an easy task, but it's one we're definitely planning to work on to improve how things work and ways to achieve a more coherent and efficient moderation system.


USERS REPUTATION SYSTEM

Track yours and other players’ reputation based on: positive or negative votes received for your participation in campaigns and trade market content quality.


BETTER MODERATION PRACTICES

- Extensive review of mRPG's Guidelines to clarify key points for players and moderators.
- Reports on campaigns and users will be further analyzed and faster taken care off.
- New tools and information for moderators to make better decisions on bans and suspensions.
 

PARENTAL CONTROL

See the available content based on your age, and on your mobile configurations.





With this new version of mRPG you'll be able to experience the App in four different ways:
Free
In this plan, with ads, you'll be able to experience all the new features described above for free! It's a great way to start your journey! And if you want a cleaner and more immersive experience, you can remove the ads for US$12/year.
Premium For Players
Now things get interesting. For US$ 5/month you get access to new ways of playing and interacting with everyone!
See what you can expect on Premium For Players:
NEW GAMEPLAY ACTIONS

 Edit, delete and reply messages.
 Story mode, where you can see only characters talking.
Send GIF's to everyone
New ways to express yourself with your profile. Write a Bio, upload a Banner and choose multiple badges to display

Premium For GM's
And if you are a GM, and are looking for ways to enhance your campaign, this is the plan for you! With a subscription of US$ 8/month you can get everything described on the Premium For Players tier, plus the following features:
NEW CAMPAIGN ACTIONS
Some improvements to make your storytelling much richer:

Campaign status control (paused, playing).
 Allow players to Whisper messages, to talk secretly to you, other players, and characters within a campaign.
 Split the party into groups so players from different groups can't talk to each other
 Initiative control: GMs can say and control which player plays and roll dice first, and also keep track of editions made.
The ability to use advanced scripting to enable conditions to trigger certain actions and results (like updating a status on a character sheet after rolling the dice).
 LFP Improvements: GMs enroll one campaign per month to our moderators to be highlighted on the Discover Tab.
 Extended campaign controls to determine better ways for players to interact with your story






So, if the campaign is successfully funded, we prepared some stretch goals (with more to come) to make this new edition of mRPG even cooler with more features for everyone. Here they are! 






Interactive and synchronized maps in real time.
2 Layered Map (Tokens and Background)
Integrated Chat interface on the map screen
Pan, zoom, resize, ping, select and move (drag and drop) commands
Available for Free 
Extra Time to Release: 1 Month 







Record and Send in-chat audio messages as a player or character.
Available for Free 
Extra Time to Release: 2 weeks




Stream your campaign so everyone can enjoy it!



Go Live with your campaigns, so people around the world can view your stories
Select if you will stream the full or the story chat
Available for Premium GM's only
Extra Time to Release: 2 weeks







Export any campaign so you can read it any time!
Available in the following formats: PDF (perfect for reading) and XLSX (better for manipulation)
Available for Premium Players only
Extra Time to Release: 2 weeks


What’s mRPG, today?
mRPG is a platform that was initially developed in the form of a mobile application, with the objective of bringing together players who share the desire to play RPG and principle could not be together, in person.
In addition to the mobile version, mRPG also has a web version with reduced functionality, still in beta, and available only to Patron supporters.
The platform now has a campaign publishing and search engine, categorized by systems, and also a chat focused on the mRPG experience, with dice scrolling and active characters.
Furthermore, it is now possible to work with custom scripts for more complex dice rolls, split character sheet templates and add secondary characters to the campaign.

How can I try it?
The current version of the mRPG application is available for download from Apple and Google stores, just search for mRPG or go to one of these links:
iOS: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/mrpg/id1330423639
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.adrianocola.mrpg
The app is free, and today our infrastructure is financed by ads and contributions from our dear Patrons. The web version of mRPG currently exists in Beta mode, available only to Patrons, with a reduced number of features.


A little bit of history
Did you know, mRPG started as a very unpretentious project?
Firstly, it was made to gather a bunch of friends which shared love to RPG but couldn't reach each other in person to play.
But then dreams got bigger, the app started to grow and the community followed the rhythm.
In few more months, mRPG started to shown as one of apps which people search for when they really want to enjoy good RPG. That also meant more attention from us to the app itself, to make it more enjoyable to our users and this was the point which transformed this small project into big teamwork!
New aspirations, new possibilities… And this huge need to make it real for all users, based on our experiences and desire to create something for each of you, unique players, the perfect place to express yourself through own characters and life, in one handy application.
Now pack your things, we're moving to a new version with much more fun, are you ready for the New mRPG?
Free version of mRPG will still be with us, with all the features you know already, wrapped up in a new and better model. But you will also be able to have a full mRPG experience if you decide to be a Full mRPG usar, with a paid plan, in a very affordable price and lots of fun in it!
That's why we started project on Kickstarter, we count on you, our community, and we deeply believe that even with the smallest amount of help we are able to make great changes! All the feedback's, all the directions, we know you were showing to us how to make this app better, and we listened.
This application exists for you all, for the community, and we will do everything to make it more and more interesting.
We want you to enjoy it fully, have fun with us in it!
Several changes are planned for new phase of mRPG, the new era is coming. We count on you and your support to let it begin sooner! 

Why did we choose to develop this campaign on Kickstarter?
To take new steps and bring our community a richer and more interesting RPG experience, the mRPG project, involving the platform improvements and closer involvement with the community, needs a little more investment.
Our desire is to upgrade the design and user experience, update the programming and research, so that the wishes of our community and also the values ​​of our team can be translated into an app that is fun to use that provides moments of genuine fun to our players.
We opted for a crowdfunding campaign so that we don't need to submit to external investors, who might not share our desires and appreciation for the mRPG community. We chose Kickstarter because it is a consolidated platform for this type of action and very focused on creative entertainment.
With this crowdfunding campaign, we are taking a very important step towards our dream of transforming mRPG, as a platform, into the best environment of transcendental digital RPG experiences, and for that a lot of work has to be done. Our team is ready and excited. Would you like to join us on this new adventure?

record.Creator: Vladimir Kulyukin
record.Title: BeePi: Honeybees Meet AI: Stage 3
record.Text:
Hello,
Our BeePi Project is back with Stage 3! We are a research team in Logan, UT, USA working on electronic beehive monitoring (EBM). EBM integrates hardware and software methods to monitor honeybee (Apis Mellifera) colonies with various sensors in and around the hive. We're enhancing EBM with AI.
Why EBM? Because the bees are dying and the climate is changing, and EBM provides continuous monitoring of bee colonies without invasive hive inspections that disrupt natural bee cycles. EBM also supports environment/climate studies, because the behavior and health of bee colonies tell us a great deal about the environment and the climate.
BeePi is an open design EBM platform we've been developing since 2014. BeePi is unique, because it 1) does video analysis to measure bee traffic in the vicinity of a hive and to generate hourly, daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly traffic graphs; 2) does ambient audio analysis to separate bee buzzing from noise and to correlate ambient audio with traffic and weather data; 3) respects the sacredness of bee space -- no sensors are placed on the bee or inside the hive.
Our goals for Stage 3 are: 1) to port all our video/audio algorithms to the raspberry pi platform so that all data processing is done on a single pi with zero computation/storage in the cloud; 2) to continue and enhance the curation of large video, image, audio, and weather datasets from over half a terrabyte of raw data accumulated in Stages 1 and 2 of the BeePi Project; 3) to make BeePi hardware and software available to researchers, practitioners, citizen scientists, and enthusiasts through project rewards in order to make BeePi  a global EBM platform.
If you're not a techie, there are rewards for you to show your passion for pollinator health/sustainability/Open Science with limited edition seed packages, cool bumper stickers, and slick T-shirts.
By backing BeePi you support Open Science -- the practice of science that aims to increase transparency and impact of scientific research beyond the peer reviewed article. Open scientists engage communities worldwide in grassroots collaboration and discussion of scientific research through direct participation.
Don't confuse Open Science with Open Source (free software). Open Science is not free! BeePi requires funding for hardware, data curation, algorithm design, bee hives, and field experiments.
DISCLAIMER: Any opinions, views, and positions, expressed or implied, in this crowdfunder do not reflect any opinions, views, positions, or policies of Utah State University or any unit thereof in whole or in part. This crowdfunder has not been endorsed, supported, or promoted by Utah State University or any unit thereof in whole or in part.

record.Creator: My Shared Studio
record.Title: My Shared Studio, the collaborative audio creation platform
record.Text:
Photo : WKYT


At My Shared Studio, we are convinced that the two words "musical collaboration" are not only a technical thing, but a philosophy of openness to the world allowing sharing and intercultural exchange between all musicians. Our goal is to remove borders and make possible collaborations between artists all over the world.






The problem
Many creators, often remotely, contribute to the production of a musical recording: singers, musicians, producers, artistic directors, sound engineers ...
Communication here is essential and physical distance is a real brake on productivity!
Remote collaborations are still very archaic: Many exchanges of huge audio files are necessary and just as many emails to complete a project!
30% of your production time is spent on these cumbersome, time-wasting exchanges ...
So, how can we improve your remote collaborative music production experience?





 My Shared Studio is the solution 
My Shared Studio (MSS) is an online collaborative digital audio workstation (DAW), directly accessible from your web browser.
It’s a real-time collaborative audio sequencer so that you can create your music together, everywhere, instantly!
 My Shared Studio presentation (ENG) 



Now you can use My Shared Studio with your favorite DAW Pro Tools®, Live®, Logic Pro®, FL Studio® etc... , by dragging and dropping your audio files from your DAW into MSS.
But soon, thanks to your contributions, My Shared Studio will be fully integrated into your favorite sequencer with My Shared Studio plugins!



The MSS plugin (available soon) is compatible with the most popular DAWs


Pro tools®, Live®, Logic Pro®, FL Studio ®, and their logos are respectively registered trademarks of Avid Inc., Ableton Inc., Apple Inc. , Image Line Software NV, in the US and other countries.

My Shared Studio, what has been done, so far... 
My Shared Studio is a shared environment allowing real-time audio creation and collaboration. Users have access to all of the necessary tools to collaborate:

An audio sequencer shared among all the collaborators of a project.




Collaborative audio editing environment with project status shared in real time



 Chat and video conference tools, fully integrated into the sequencer, for more efficient and faster communication between collaborators.




Tools to communicate easily within a project



 Tools for monitoring the progress of your artistic project also allowing users to create and assign specific tasks.




Monitor the progress of your project


My Shared Studio allows musical collaborators to intuitively, efficiently, remotely compose, in real time!

Thanks to your contributions, My Shared Studio will gain increased compatibility & functionality!
The goal of this campaign is to develop a plugin allowing any audio player to make the link between your usual audio editing environment and My Shared Studio.
As an audio creator working within your own editing environment, My Shared Studio will create a direct link between your favorite sequencer and My Shared Studio.
Two types of plugins will be developed and soon be available depending on the subscription chosen :



MMS Sync and MSS Connect plugins


MSS-Sync (PREMIUM subscription)
This plugin will send, with a single click, the audio content of a track from your usual sequencer to your collaborative MSS project. You will thus preserve your working environment, while using the collaborative features of MSS.
My Shared Studio Premium subscription will be available from December 15, 2021. 
The MSS-Sync plugin will be delivered in June 2022.
 
MSS-Connect (PRO subscription)
   With this plugin, it will become possible to access all My Shared Studio features within your usual sequencer.
All the advanced collaborative functions offered by My Shared Studio will be integrated directly and accessible via a window in the most widely used audio sequencers on the market: Pro tools®, Live®, Logic Pro®, FL Studio®.
Pro tools®, Live®, Logic Pro®, FL Studio®, and their logos are respectively registered trademarks of Avid Inc., Ableton Inc., Apple Inc. , Image Line Software NV, in the US and other countries.
My Shared Studio PRO subscription will be available from December 15, 2021. 
The MSS-Connect plugin will be delivered in December 2022.

 What you pay and what you get 



My Shared Studio subscriptions


 My Shared Studio team 



The team - Photo by Charlotte Anfray for NETIA


The team is made up of four enthusiasts of sound in all its forms. Edouard Lauret and Baptiste Janvore, the two co-founders, are longtime musician friends and both grew up in a very rich musical and cultural context on Reunion Island.

 Edouard Lauret , musician and software development engineer, created his own music production company, he is responsible for the development of the solution.
 Baptiste Janvore, musician, graphic designer and audiovisual technician, is passionate about video and supports interface design and user experience.
 Gilles Scotto di Carlo, engineer passionate about audio, former start-up manager, joined MSS in early 2021. His skills are business development and partner search.
 Anh Cao, passionate about music production, new recruit of My Shared Studio, has been our second developer since the end of 2021.


 My Shared Studio collective
At My Shared Studio, we are lucky to have been able to bring together an amazing artistic collective for this Kickstarter campaign!
For certain contributions, talented musicians from the MSS collective have generously agreed to offer you a collaboration with one of them for a composition, an arrangement or a mixing session via MSS. We are very proud to present them to you, and extend a big thank you to all of them for joining us for this campaign:

Bastien Picot



Bastien Picot


Songwriter-composer originally from Le Tampon, Bastien Picot now lives between Paris and Reunion Island and has multiple collaboration credits; many artists have already called upon him as lead singer or as backing vocalist: Fabrice Legros, Cunnie Williams, Roger Biwandu but even more recently Stevie Wonder for whom he sang backing vocals for three concerts during his summer tour in France. Bastien has already opened for artists such as Nneka, Grace, and LokO.
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/aurusmusic

Maya Kamaty



Maya Kamaty - Photo by Cyrille Choupas


Cradled by African and Indian sounds, Reunionese Maya Kamaty has chosen to take her time to talk about herself and her island. This young artist has ended up forging her path between traditional maloya and more personal flavors. She plays an inhabited music, mixed between Maloya and modern folk, carried by her crystalline voice and assertive guitar playing.
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MayaKamaty

Mathéo Techer



Mathéo Techer


Mathéo Techer grew up in a family of musicians, rocked by local and international music. He entered the CRR at age seven and then, with a Diploma in Musical Studies and a Bachelor's degree in hand, he moved to Boston, where he continued his musical training at Berklee College of Music. Mathéo surrounded himself with musician friends to present a project consisting entirely of original compositions, which blends modern jazz with the world of pop and electronic music.
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/matheotechermusic/

Edouard Lauret



Edouard Lauret


Edouard Lauret grew up in a family of musicians from Reunion Island. Guitarist and drummer in several bands (Maya Kamaty, Andemya ...), he started to work with various production studios as an arranger and a composer in Montpellier, France. He specialized in world and electronic music. He works now for My Shared Studio and wants to share his audio skills with you.
Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/larlik






Surprise! Another famous musician will join the MSS collective. It will feature a musical collaboration for the Black Diamond and Champagne Diamond rewards. 
He / she will be announced during the campaign!

Thanks
Big thanks to the musicians who contributed to the production of this Kickstarter video! In order of appearance in the video:
Edouard Lauret: Kalimba
Julien Rivière: Guitar 
Emy Potonié: Saxophones
Germain Lebot: Percussions
Bastien Picot: Vocals
Julien Didier: Bass
Co-composers: Baptiste Janvore and all the musicians.
Composition powered by My Shared Studio
All the tracks have been recorded in collaboration remotely with My Shared Studio!

Other thanks: 
- Fabrice Lau, for the shots in Réunion Island.
- Morgan Dufour, Gaëtan Theyssier, Audio Workshop Montpellier recording studio.

record.Creator: Lattepanda
record.Title: LattePanda 3 Delta - Faster than Ever, Still Pocket-sized
record.Text:
LattePanda 3 Delta features the latest Intel 11th generation mobile quad-core processor N5105 with up to 2.9GHz burst frequency. Compared to its previous generation, the CPU speeds up to 2x faster, and the GPU speeds up to 3x faster. With so excellent performance, you can use it to watch 4K HDR videos smoothly and even play some heavy games.










In addition, we make every effort to keep almost the same connectors and layout , which will simplify your projects’ making, migrating and upgrading.










More memory means more efficient multitasking. LattePanda 3 Delta uses 2933MHz high-frequency LPDDR4 RAM — up to 8GB, 2x larger than the previous generation — for a superfast, smooth performance whether you’re loading a large amount of web pages in Chrome, or running multiple virtual machines.
We also double the storage — up to 64GB — for more software and data can be installed without any external storage.










LattePanda 3 Delta is compatible with both Windows 10 and Linux OS.
Windows 10 has a perfect peripheral driver, software compatibility and development ecosystem, making it the most suitable to develop GUI applications, while Linux is better for microservice applications. 
It is worth mentioning that Windows 11 can also be run on LattePanda 3 Delta. You can select various OS freely based on your project.










LattePanda 3 Delta uses WIFI 6 whose transfer speed is 2.7 times faster than WIFI5. It is also equipped with a USB 3.2 gen2 x1 port that has an ultra-high bandwidth, delivering up to 10Gb/s of throughput which is twice faster than USB3.2 gen1 x1 (previously known as USB3.0).
Besides, LattePanda 3 Delta has a Gigabit Ethernet port onboard, which can connect to the Internet at extremely high speed.





LattePanda 3 Delta uses M.2 B Key instead of M.2 E Key, and can connect to 4G or 5G module.  You can access to the Internet anywhere, anytime.





The improvement of both wire and wireless transfer will bring you extremely fast transfer speed experience.






No matter what operating system you use, the blue screen or crash is inevitable. To make the system recover itself without any human intervention, we add a “Watchdog Timer”. When some problems occur, LattePanda 3 Delta will restart automatically and go back to work normally.





We also add the auto power-on function. When the power goes off , no matter in emergency or under normal conditions, the system will boot up automatically once the power is back on.
We call these two functions "unattended operation", and hope you can use the board with ease.





For those applications relying on battery, independent control of the power of all the USB ports and other power connectors are essential.  
Now LattePanda 3 Delta has made it possible. You can control the USB power and 5V power ON or OFF based on your project.










The cooling fan of LattePanda 3 Delta has been redesigned, featuring 50% larger cooling area.  The resulting gain in cooling capacity ensures LattePanda 3 Delta best performance all the time.










 LattePanda Delta 3 has 2-channel audio output with 2W amplifier. Now you can directly connect two speakers to hear the wonderful sound.








































We developed a variety of expansion board, such as UPS, RS232, RS485, etc. All of them are carefully designed and tested, allowing you to quickly build projects.
We’ve also customized a variety of enclosures, cameras, and touch screens, making it possible for you to focus on stunning ideas.





UPS Hat





This UPS hat is an uninterruptable power supply expansion board  specially designed for LattePanda 3 Delta. It would provide steady power supply when a sudden power outage happened,  to avoid system damage and data loss and improve your project's security level. 

7-inch IPS Touch Display





This IPS touch display has 1024 x 600 resolution and high color saturation, which provide excellent picture for you. It adopts eDP interface, capacitive touch pannel, and is perfectly compatible with LattePanda 3 delta.
Due to the extremely thin thickness, it can be easily embedded in your device, which will be your best chocie for the GUI and portable projects.

 12.5-inch 4K IPS Touch Display 





This IPS touch display has 3840 * 2160 ultra high resolution and HDR feature, which can present you all the details with extremely vivid colors and delicate pictures, present the real world to the utmost extent on a 12.5” screen. It supports up to 10 touch-points, bringing you an extremely touch experience!
This display provide two USB Type C and one mini HDMI port, which ensure the best compatibility with LattePanda 3 Delta and other devices.







































































We have a strong supportive commucity, where makers, developers, companies and other enthusiastic users share their ideas, projects, problems and tutorials. With these combined strength, no project is out of reach!
Our forum is daily updated with new posts, threads, while our blog share LattePanda projects and news in time. In addition, our wiki docs provide detailed  guides and documentations. Besides, on our github, You can also find all the resources you need, such as 3D files, BIOS files, drivers and etc. 
Our social world is abundant as well, you can interactive with us on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram.

record.Creator: Alex
record.Title: Lying Down Desk
record.Text:
I have chronic back issues and have dreamed of lying down while using a computer for years. Yet the only option I could find to buy cost a few grand. Last year, I designed my own, got a prototype made, and have been using it for six months. Now, I want others to be able to have a Lying Down Desk too.
The Story
I've had problems with my back since I was a teenager, which included surgery. Thankfully, I am still quite physically able, but sitting or standing for more than a short period of time are a big problem for me. I can run, climb, do backflips, etc, but chairs are painful.




My back before surgery


For years I've been trying to find a way to use a computer lying down, yet all I could find that already existed were some expensive models based on reclining dentist chairs with extendable apertures.
Then, I had an idea: put a monitor under a table, facing the floor. It's simple, but I couldn't find it already done or available online. I tried it out using my tablet, a cardboard box with a hole in it, and a couple of chairs:





I sketched a design for a desk, asked a friend to make it, and have been using it for half a year. It’s been as good as I imagined it might be, and I’m in much less pain than before. And I’ve only come close to falling asleep in a meeting once!





Now, I want to make it available to as many people as possible, and thought Kickstarter would be the best way to get the first set of orders. 
About the Desk
The Lying Down Desk is primarily aimed at anyone with physical impairments which affect sitting, such as upper and lower back issues. That said, I suspect there will also be a few unimpaired chair users who would also find lying down more comfortable.
Most tables are about 80cm high, so to get the monitor to be at the right height, there is a hole in the table and a shelf-like unit placed on top of a table which has the monitor installed beneath it. This top unit allows the monitor to be about 95cm from the floor so that it is about 75cm from the user’s eyes. The user has a keyboard either on their lap or on the floor, my recommendation is a split keyboard with half on either side of the hips on the floor. This does mean that the user has to be able to type without seeing the keyboard – or they have to set up a periscope or video feed to see their hands!
I do not yet have a finalised design with an agreed person to make it -- I am in discussions with a couple of potential makers. So you will receive a desk which matches the design specification, but will probably be a different colour, style, etc, than the CAD image or my prototype.
Want to make your own?
If you see this and think "oh, I'll just make my own" -- well that's great, and I'm going to make a PDF document with design, guide to making it, accessories, etc. My main aim is to get desks into the world, not be filthy rich. With the PDF, you can DIY or hire someone to make it bespoke for you.
I do have a patent pending on this design, so it would be an infringement for someone else to make and sell this design at a profit. 1 licence would come with the PDF so that someone can lawfully make it for you. 
If you are someone who makes desks and you want to make and sell the Lying Down Desk, please get in touch and we can explore working together!

The Kickstarter
I already have a finished design and a complete prototype, so am ready to go to potential makers to get quotes and discuss designs, materials and timelines.  
Timeline: I've planned for three months to find and finalise a manufacturer(s), three months for manufacture and delivery, and three months safety time.
If it turns out that the tables cost less to make than I am budgeting for, then I will use the surplus to give away some desks for free to people who couldn't afford to buy one.
PDF
With the Desk will come a PDF that includes:

Full list of accessories to buy with the desk, such as monitor, keyboard, mouse, USB extender, etc.
Tips on using the desk, different positions for lying down, things to think about with ergonomics.

Typing
Typing is obviously a big deal for using a computer. You have to be able to generally type without looking to use it while lying down. If you can already do this, then it will just take a couple of days to get used to it. The only problem is when you first lie down, or when you move your hand between mouse and keyboard, you have to find your place again. Most of the time it's alright, but sometimes I hit the wrong key and have to figure out where my fingers are and re-place them. 
It's pretty alright though -- maybe sometime I will do a demo video showing me typing and swapping in realtime!
Size
Each desk will be adjusted to the height of the user for the standing surface.  A standing desk surface should be at or just below elbow height, so that the elbow is at 90-95 degrees.  After the Kickstarter is completed, I will contact backers to get everyone's details. 
You can either measure your elbow height yourself or plug your height into this size guide for an estimate: https://www.ergotron.com/tools/workspace-planner
Long-Term Aims
If this Kickstarter gets completed, then I'll be really happy that I designed something that other people use!
Hopefully, I will also continue to make and sell more Lying Down Desks and set up as a small business. This initial set of orders will allow me to establish a relationship with one or more cabinet makers who can continue to make them as orders come in. 
If it goes well, I will also expand to be able to sell just the top unit, so that someone can use a desk they already have or buy a second-hand one, and the 2-in-1 Model, which is just for standing and lying, which I expect some people might want because it takes up less space and they already have a table. 
My Values
If it goes well, I'll incorporate as a B Corporation, a type of social enterprise which is about positive social impact and not just profit. 
I care about disability justice and will be glad to make a project that can help people be in less pain. Anything we do to reduce chronic pain, impairments and disabilities and make people's lives better is a win.
I care about poverty and economic inequality, and do not like the fact that in our current economic system, people without money have to go without. Nobody should live without their basic needs being met, and if that means needing a Lying Down Desk to be able to use a computer, then these should be available! I will make sure that some Lying Down Desks will be available for free for people or organisations who cannot afford them.
I care about the natural world. As well as political efforts I am involved in to reduce ecological destruction caused by human activity, when making desks I will investigate how this can be done with as little ecological impact as possible. This will include either reclaimed wood or sustainably sourced wood, and in the future I might also look into using existing or second-hand tables. 
FAQs
- What exactly will it look like? Don't know exactly. It will be the same 3-in-1 design as shown in the CAD images and photos of the prototype, but it may be a different colour, have different legs, etc. If there are colour choices, I will ask everyone for their preferred colour. 
- I can just make it myself? Quite! I support this, I like the idea of people making something I designed or modifying the design. If you want to just copy it, nothing stopping you and I don't mind. To make it easy for you, I've prepared a PDF which has drawings of the design, a guide for making it, and a list of all the accessories, and my tips on using the desk, which I think is fair to sell for a small amount.
- What else would I need? As well as the desk (and a computer!), you would need a monitor to have in the desk and a keyboard and mouse to use while below the desk. If people want, I can buy those in bulk and bundle them together with delivery of the desk to save you the effort (which everyone would have to pay for!).
If you are going to swap between lying and standing/sitting a lot, I would recommend having a keyboard and mouse set that stays on the floor, and a keyboard and mouse set that stays on top of the desk. That way you don't have to keep picking and moving a keyboard and mouse! I have the split keyboard on the floor and an easy bluetooth keyboard on top of the desk.
- Bit expensive? I think it's a fair price. It's a higher price than a standard desk because it is two components, almost like a shelf or coffee table on top of a regular desk. The price is comparable to an electric motor desk that swaps between sitting and standing.  That being said, I would love for there to be a cheaper version in the future.
- I'm not in GB? Get the PDF Design download to either make it yourself (either DIY or take the design to someone to make it bespoke). Or if enough people are interested, then we could try finding someone who would make a set of them to make it easier. 
- What about accessories etc? Buy: monitor plus keyboard, these may be a bundle if people want it to see if we can get them cheaper. Additional things, USB extenders, mouse, etc, I have suggestions which will be in the PDF.
- Won't it look a bit weird in the office? lol.
- What about using a webcam? If you're happy to be on video lying down, then you could get a webcam to use face-down by the monitor. 
- What's in the PDF? The PDF which comes with the desk includes: a full list of accessories, eg keyboard, mouse, cables and tips about how to use the desk. The DIY PDF Download also includes design images and a guide for how to make it.
- The 2-in-1 Lying/Standing Design? This isn't available at the moment, though in the future I hope to be able to sell it. However it is included in the DIY PDF Download if you want to make it yourself!
- how is the monitor attached? Using a standard mount. They are pretty solid and you can always give it a tug and a wiggle to check it is solid.

record.Creator: REZRV
record.Title: REZRV: Smart Network Software
record.Text:
According to a report by Statista earlier this year, there are around 4.66 billion active internet users on earth. That is 59.5% of the global population!





It would be an understatement to say WI-FI is a part of many people’s daily lives, especially in the ongoing pandemic. Do you rely on WI-FI? Sometimes WI-FI, as we all know, can become the cause of serious frustration.





All internet users know how frustrating it can be when one minute your WI-FI is working flawlessly, and the next minute, no internet connection is available. This issue is usually caused by bandwidth congestion.





The problem is that this issue is mostly invisible to the end-user. Rarely do we have the means of prioritizing bandwidth usage to tasks, apps, and devices that matter the most. TANTIV4 routers with pre-loaded Rezrv software, though, give you all the control you need at the tap of a button, and even via voice command. Let’s dive in!





Rezrv simplifies the management of your network, giving you expert-level control of your WI-FI and internet usage without needing a degree in network management.















Firstly, we would like you to know that ANYONE can use Rezrv, the web-based Rezrv app that allows tech-savvy users to dive into the more complicated settings that ordinary users would not be too concerned about. Tech-savvy or not, we cater to anyone with an internet connection.










REZRV  applies bandwidth management policies to your critical applications ensuring that 100% of your Wi-Fi bandwidth is utilized efficiently, as you need it.





Our router and software can link to any ISP. It enables you to prioritize applications to eliminate glitches, hangs, and distortion. Policies are easy to configure and adapts to your every bandwidth need.
Know who are connected to your Wi-Fi network
USERS
Group devices and assign them to users, to know if they are online or to check insights of their data usage.
DEVICES
       View devices connected to your network, know if they are online or when they were last connected.





BANDWIDTH PRIORATIZATION
Having a stutter-free Zoom call is probably more important to you than downloading a big file. Customize and select the apps that you want to prioritize as per your need.
Complete freedom to set schedule to prioritize specific apps at specific time so your busy does not get disturbed.















When you have set your priorities, all of the above happens behind the scenes!






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































 Reliable Mesh Coverage 
No more dead zones at home or dropped connections. No more buffering. Rezrv’s Mesh technology is designed to deliver high Wi-Fi speeds to every corner of your home, including the backyard and outdoor smart home devices.










WI-FI at home can become a battle between family members sometimes as we all know. Whether you work from home, game, stream movies or music, or anything else, there always seems to be one device that drags the WI-FI down!





INFORMATION IS POWER
ANALYTICS
REZRV gives you a variety of powerful analytics into your network usage and activity.
Wondering who’s using the most Wi-Fi data in your house? You can check which device, which user is using the most data. You could also see which app has used the most data. 
REZRV also gives information of current top bandwidth hogging apps.











So, when you are in a Zoom meeting, for example, and your children are constantly on Instagram or YouTube dragging your internet connecting to the ground, simply grab your phone, set Zoom as a priority, and continue to hustle undisturbed!

Another useful scenario: You are having dinner as a family, and you find that your kids are just ALWAYS on their phones! Open the Rezrv app, whether on mobile or web and deprioritize their devices completely while you spend valuable family time with them!





You can even set times. So, you can set the priority for one hour in the app settings. Do your kids need to do homework? Set your app to prioritize their phones for exactly one or two hours. TANTIV4 routers with Rezrv make your life simple.










Are you running a business that relies on internet connectivity? (Which business doesn’t nowadays?) A TANTIV4 router with Rezrv software will be your savior! We all know there is always that one person that is watching YouTube when they should be working. Or, let’s not assume the worst, maybe you need to make urgent calls and the WI-FI seems to be lagging.










The Rezrv apps and software may sound complicated to use, but it is no more complicated than using Instagram or any other app. Rezrv is here to put you back in control of your internet.










You can use our mobile, or web-based application to personalize internet policies or prioritize apps or devices. You will be just a few clicks away from having COMPLETE control of your internet connection.





As an example, let’s use Alexa. When you are on a zoom call, tell Alexa: “Alexa, prioritize Zoom.” And that’s it!










Are you familiar with delving deep into the complicated world of tech? The Rezrv is the perfect internet management software for you! There are tons of special settings on the Rezrv control waiting for you!
Here are some of the key points that Rezrv controls, as well as what you can do!















Easy to use parental control for monitoring kids' devices & internet usage.
Manage every Internet-connected device on your REZRV network.
APP FILTERS
There are contents that you would not want your kids to access. You can easily Block such application or websites and customize content.
TIME LIMITS
         Managing screen time now in your fingertips, parents can take back control of the Internet and limit screen time for their kids.
PAUSE INTERNET
Turning off a device’s internet is as simple as clicking pause.










Identify user preferences in real-time for determining allocations.





Maintain reliable real-time connectivity to the Cloud for vital operations.





Prioritize conference calls & video call meetings for work.





Prioritize Emails and work-related streams over entertainment.
Additional Benefits Include:





Rezrv is always in the background. Our high-powered algorithm software will also know where to send bandwidth and keep out the unnecessary data-eating links, web pages, and apps. So, ads, for example, are a headache for most users on their own! Our adblocker will ensure you are paying for what you can see. There is no point in paying for apps and other internet-based things you do not want or need.
And that is Rezrv! We cover all of your WI-FI needs!

OTHER FEATURES
SPEED TEST
Check your internet speed anddiagnose issues with broadband connection and wireless device speed tests.
WEBSITE BLOCK
Although App Filters are impressive, you can enter any URL to block website you want to restrict the users on your network.
DEVICE FINGERPRINTING
Identify each device on your network to approve, or pause internet access.
NOTIFICATIONS
Connectivity alerts, changes to network settings, and more.
ADBLOCK
Improve your experience by removing the unwanted pop-up ads.
AUTOFIRMWARE UPDATE
Automatic firmware update delivers latest features and security patches to the router.

Hardware Agnostic Software
Rezrv works on different routers:





NETWORK SMARTWARE ROUTER SPECIFICATIONS:
•10/100/1000M Ethernet WAN interface for a modem connection
•Four 10/100/1000M Ethernet (LAN) interfaces for LAN connection
•Supports 2.4Ghz with up to 300Mbps wireless transmission rate and 5GHz up to 1200Mbps wireless transmission rate.
•Encryption supported:WPA2-PSK, WPA2-EAP,WPA-PSK/WPA2-PSK Mixed mode, WPA-PSK, WPA-EAP etc. Ciphers Supported : TKIP and CCMP
•Four External 5dBi non-removable antennas for extended range
•Dual-core 88Mhz Chipset: MT7621A+MT7603+MT7612E
•SPI Flash 16Mb
•SDRAM 128 MB
•Supported network protocols: IEEE 802.11n, IEEE 802.11g, IEEE 802.11b, IEEE 802.3, IEEE 802.3u, IEEE 802.11ac
•FCC certified
•Wireless RF power
•11b:18db(max)
•11g:16dbm(max)
•11n:15dbm(max)
•11ac:15dbm(max)
•Receiving sensitivity
•11N_MCS7_20M: -70dBm@10% PER;
•11N_MCS7_40M: -65dBm@10% PER;
•54M: -70dBm@10% PER;
•11M: -85dBm@8% PER;
• Working frequency
• 2.4 ~ 2.4835GHz
• 5.15 ~ 5.35GHz
• 5.47 ~ 5.725GHz
• 5.725 ~ 5.825GHz
•Colour Black
•L x W x H : 143*100*27, N.W : 0.29 kg
•AC input : AC100-240V
•DC input : 12V 1.5A Maximum power consumption : <12W





$10 
BACK IT BECAUSE YOU BELIEVE IT!




































Tantiv4 is the brainchild of Lokesh and Kishore. We are a team of like-minded individuals who share the same values, passion, and drive to create revolutionary Smart solutions that help our customers stay on top of their game.

Lokesh Johri - Co-Founder & CEO
Lokesh is passionate about tennis, hiking, and writing code every day. He has a master's degree in business and CS and has an undergrad degree from IITB. His childhood obsession with “tinkering” has finally found expression in his expertise in the entire technology stack of the Internet of Things.

Kishore Moturi - Co-Founder & Chief Revenue Officer
Kishore has a passion for thrills. This passion drives him to excel, whether it be bringing cool, innovative Smart Technology to everyday life, or tinkering with fast motorcycles and cars. Kishore holds 20+ years of International experience in Sales and Marketing, where he has created strategic partnerships and nurtured several Fortune 500 customer relationships for SMSC, InvenSense, Broadcom, Genesis.

record.Creator: Henry Lackey
record.Title: Stainless Steel Tetrahedron Ball Sculpture
record.Text:
Welcome to Metalik Artz's third Kickstarter! Thank you for all the previous support and also for joining us on this continuing journey as we bring you another awesome project to add to your collection.





What we have available this time on Kickstarter is an all stainless steel model of a ball tetrahedron sculpture.

record.Creator: TOPWORK TEAM
record.Title: BEATDROP: Place-N-Play Induction Wireless Speaker for Phones
record.Text:
Sometimes the speaker on your phone just isn't loud enough if you're in a large meeting or people are sitting at a distance.





And what about when you're cooking with the hood fan on or other kitchen appliances making so much noise.  How can you hear your cooking tutorial on your ipad?







Test Video:







You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00
































Meet BeatDrop, the best induction speaker/sound amplifier out there!  It uses a groundbreaking technology that instantly plays music, videos, or calls from your smartphone at a louder volume and higher quality, while keeping all your devices charged wirelessly at the same time - with no Bluetooth, Wi-Fi or any other kind of connection. Simply lay and play, and you can immediately hear songs, news, or calls loud and clear without draining your phone’s battery.
No more troublesome syncing, pairing or wiring. Yes, we’re welcoming you to a new world where music no longer has borders! It also doubles as a power bank, an alarm clock, and a Bluetooth speaker when you need it.















Instantly and automatically amplify the sound of any phone on the sensor contact. 





BeatDrop is a clever application of electromagnetic induction that applies Faraday’s Law, which is also known as “Near Field Audio”. The speaker contains a piece of transducer that creates a magnetic field and converts energy into electrical signals. When you place your phone on two sensor contacts of the speaker, the sound from your device will be immediately amplified.




















Whether you’re chatting on Facetime, watching a cooking tutorial in the kitchen, or watching TV on your phone, the phone is charging at an ergonomic viewing angle, giving you a more comfortable experience.





Keeps powering up your phone, so you don't have to worry about your battery dying while you are chatting, watching videos or enjoying music. It's phone case friendly!






BeatDrop utilizes two overlapping charging coils to maximize the charging area to ensure the phone will charge at full speed in both vertical and horizontal positions.





BeatDrop works with all Qi-compatible phones.  It's easy to place your phone down with one hand and charge it fully within 2.5 hours.





The tilted surface makes BeatDrop a perfect stand to prop up your phone.





Another HUGE benefit of BeatDrop is that it holds phones and tablets of any size, even the ones that are much larger than it. Whether it's iPhone, Samsung, LG or iPad, everything fits.





Keep all of your electronics charged in one easy place. BeatDrop charges other devices or accessories through its USB charging port.





BeatDrop is equipped with a 5W 5V/1A Type-A output port, and can quickly charge devices with wires like a power bank. It will charge your iPhone 13 from zero to 100% in approximately 3 hours. Get the play time you want with a 2500mAh rechargeable battery. You can enjoy about 20 hours of music at 50% volume.










You can use the default music of the speaker to wake you up.





You can also use the music from your phone instead and keep the phone charging wirelessly at the same time.
Upgrade your old bedside companion, leave stress and your phone behind, manage your life much easier.










Another benefit of the BeatDrop is that you can switch to Bluetooth mode and amplify your video or audio. Whether you’re listening to music, watching videos, or making speakerphone calls, it lets you crank up the volume.





This all-terrain speaker provides rich bass without distortion, even at the highest volume. It’s built to emit an extremely high sound quality that sounds just like high-quality speakers.





BeatDrop has been tested and is proven to deliver stunning sound with enhanced bass, tight mids, and crystal clear highs without distortion at any volume.










We built BeatDrop to look sleek and cool so it goes great with your modern décor and fits in anywhere.  Put it in the kitchen, by your bed, or on your desk, in your office, and it will look incredible and sound amazing!

































We come back again, The first product Topwork workstation won people's back. 2276 backers pledged $272,239 to help bring this project to life. Creation and innovation are what we pursue. People will never give up on discovering and trying new technological stuff. Our designers put so much effort into the development and innovation of electronic devices and their accessories to satisfy the great demand for new technologies. We will always go before people find out what they need. We’d like to invite you to join us again and create new changes to our lives.
