record.Creator: SciLynk
record.Title: SciLynk: A New Era for Science
record.Text:
We are at the forefront of scientific communication and discovery
“The hardest problems of pure and applied science can only be solved by the open collaboration of the worldwide scientific community.” (Kenneth G. Wilson, Nobel Laureate in Physics). Dr. Wilson was without a doubt on to something. However, even with the creation of the internet, a global collaborative research community has never been done before. Sure, there are online databases of scientists and papers out there, but there’s no global vibrant community for ALL science-lovers to communicate, interact and share research.
And that’s where SciLynk comes in - it is YOUR complete science academia, whether you’re a student, professor, scientist, or casual science enthusiast. We believe by building a bridge between industry professionals and prospective future researchers, we can create a bright future for the world of science. If you are a student seeking to connect with industry professionals, SciLynk can do it. If you are a researcher looking to track research metrics and papers, SciLynk can do it. SciLynk can truly do it all - and we are extremely proud that our network was built meticulously around the feedback of dozens of researchers and students. The feedback we have gotten from them has taken months to develop, and finally, create the best possible platform tailored to their needs. We sincerely hope you can join us in this journey of building the most extensive science network out there!

The Vision





Our goal is to create an open-access network where the physical barriers of institutions no longer separate the most brilliant minds in the world. Imagine a world where the research departments of Stanford, Harvard, MIT, Oxford, and more, are all connected; where they can share research and find the discoveries of tomorrow. Where students worldwide can share their ideas, ask questions, and further their scientific knowledge.
Not just a network, but a hub that embodies the purest values of research, collaboration, education, and connection.

Open to everyone - Including you (Guaranteed)!
Imagine John, a curious student looking to get involved with the world of science. He goes to a massive site full of researchers and papers. He tries to create an account, only to see that he cannot access the network without being affiliated with a research institution. He is unable to verify that he is a researcher, and isn’t even able to access the site content - all because he was just a student ☹️
Luckily for John, Scilynk, unlike other science networks, won’t be restricted by your level of education or research. We believe the best way to spark students’ interest is through interactions with professionals in their fields. Everyone should be able to access open research papers, and viewing research profiles shouldn’t be disallowed just because you are not a Ph.D.
Open research means EVERYONE should be able to read and learn from papers, not just researchers, which unfortunately isn’t implemented today. SciLynk will fix that through our free-to-use science platform.

Making Research Enjoyable





One of our personal favorite features on the site is the gamification system. It combines an element of fun with profound research and collaboration and has been custom-developed using feedback from scientists and professors. In essence, the system uses a well thought-out list of triggers to award different types of points, scores, badges, ranks, and more! The system counts several different points, points for legitimate research and indices for industry professionals, and credits for STEM beginners using the site and collaborating with one another. Points can be used to buy perks and badges on the site. We believe that combining our science platform with a gamification system will allow our users to legitimately enjoy using our site, versus it being a dull hub of articles!

Research accuracy





Although we want this platform to be available to everyone, we want to ensure our researchers have the best user experience possible on SciLynk. After surveying several professors and scientists, we noticed an overall trend about their dissatisfaction ares with research tracking methods. Large databases use aggressive web scraping and often upload duplicate papers, wrong citation counts, and sometimes even upload the wrong paper to the wrong author. When we asked one of these researchers how many papers they’ve published, they gave us a number in the low 100s. However, their ResearchGate and Google Scholar profiles yielded 400-500 more results. That’s pretty damn inaccurate!
How can we possibly fix a problem that companies as large as Google aren’t able to fix? The answer lies in using non-commercial databases that do not profit from the data they collect and use more accurate tracking methods. SciLynk plans to change this - Cambia, the creator of Lens.org, our official Partner, is one of the world’s largest and most accurate scholarly databases!

STEM Opportunities - Now easier than ever
Remember our good friend John? Now that he’s gotten a bit more familiarized with the science community, he thinks it's time to level up his game - internship time! Finding a lab internship wasn’t as easy as he thought.  It meant scouring the internet for contact information and applications, sending hundreds of emails, and then hoping for a couple of replies. Not efficient.
With SciLynk, these prehistoric methods are going to be a thing of the past. With simple searches and mutual connections, you will be able to quickly contact professors and researchers and send over your information/resume after introducing yourself! Almost all your relevant information will already be saved to your profile, so you don’t need to worry about copy-pasting and editing dozens of messages to different people.

A new way to connect and grow science





SciLynk is built off the uber-important human medium: Connection. Online networking has shown tremendous potential, and with that, we have innovated, thought, and put countless hours into the development of our features. On SciLynk, users will be able to join domain-specific groups, ask and answer questions with our advanced discussion forums, share research papers and track important research metrics, message individuals, and/or participate in group threads, view their activity feeds to see the content that matters to them, and so much more! In addition, we already have plans for podcasts, workspaces, and in a sense, anything the community wants. Science lovers should have a platform where the possibility for collaborative scientific discovery and exploration is customizable and unique.
With SciLynk, connecting is as simple as a click:

Find a profile and click connect.
 
There is no Step 2!
 

We hope to enable meaningful connections between students and researchers to expand their knowledge, and researchers can pass down their knowledge. We also hope to see researchers worldwide collaborating to further progress in science and students working together with others, creating long-lasting bonds.

IntraLynks - A new way to network





SciLynk features several science-specific groups and subgroups known as IntraLynks, in which users can join and share updates, media, documents, and more. Users can also create groups, which act as communities of their own with several components to help users communicate with one another!
SciLynk also features discussion forums, where users can ask, answer, subscribe to, save, and create meaningful discussions. This system features a nested reply system to organize answers and help users individually reply to specific topics. SciLynk’s forums are a great way for users to effectively support each other, whether it is a topic you are struggling to learn in college or an advanced research question pertaining to a paper.

Who we are





SciLynk was co-founded by high-school students Arnav Chakravarthy & Arvind Kumar. Two close friends and science enthusiasts, both co-founders are driven to scale SciLynk to be the standard of open research and the go-to platform for anything science. We (Arnav and Arvind) have worked with several researchers and students to get the platform to where it is today, and give our heartfelt thanks to everyone who was with us for the journey.
Arnav, the CEO, is a 15 year old sophomore at Homestead High School. He wants to pursue a career in Biotechnology/Bioengineering and loves reading about general Biology and Chemistry. He manages all aspects of the company, specifically the development and outreach. He spends his free time reading, developing, playing basketball, and watching too much TV. Arnav also happens to be the much cooler co-founder ;)
Arvind, the COO, is a 16 year old Junior at Lynbrook High School. He honestly doesn’t know what he wants to do yet, but he knows it will pertain to tech and medicine or law. He loves playing soccer and reading science fiction books, his favorite being ender's game. He manages the business side of SciLynk including, revenue management, advertising, partnerships, and general operations.

record.Creator: Craig A. Brice
record.Title: The Web Wallet
record.Text:
A wallet like no other...





Hi, I'm Craig and welcome to my Kickstarter! This is the official launch of my new company - Tessellation Studio - and my first product - the Web Wallet.

Inspiration...
My profession and my passion is additive manufacturing - you might know it as 3D printing. Currently I am a professor teaching additive manufacturing to the next generation of engineers. My students frequently express interest in starting their own companies and launching their products through Kickstarter. As much as I wanted to help, I didn't have the experience to guide them. So I decided I would run a Kickstarter myself so I could learn the process and pass on the knowledge I gained along the way. 
How did I come up with the Web Wallet? Well, quite simply, I wanted to put an additively manufactured product in everyone's pocket. What better way to do that than to create a stylish, one-of-a-kind wallet that everyone wants in their pocket? In the manufacturing world we talk about "form, fit, and function." Throughout most of my career I have focused on function - performance is king, especially in the aerospace world (and rightly so). For my product, however, I wanted "form" to be front and center. First and foremost, it had to be visually appealing. I spent a few months sketching my idea on paper, erasing it, re-sketching, erasing again, and on and on until I landed on the design that a) appealed to my asthetic and b) was both additively manufacturable and economically viable. Meeting both requirements was more challenging than I thought it would be. The result is the Web Wallet.





I then had to turn my pencil sketch into a 3D model using computer aided design software. Next, I had to turn my model into a solid titanium part using a metal powder 3D printer. Of course that was just one piece of the wallet - I also had to design the two carbon fiber parts that hold the cards, the clip that provides tension and the pieces that fasten it all together.





Prototype...
Additive manufacturing was born out of the world of prototyping. So I prototyped my initial design and pieced together an 80% solution with machined aerospace-grade carbon fiber, off-the-shelf high-strength steel fasteners, and spring steel. The result is shown in the video below. The wallet holds about four credit cards, one driver's license or ID card, and one insurance card. This was designed around how much I typically carry in my wallet. You can carry less, though you need about 4 cards minimum to hold tension on the spring. You cannot put more than about 6 cards in the wallet, as there is a set distance between the front titanium piece and the back carbon fiber piece. There is still some engineering to do for the final production item - a few modifications to the carbon fiber pieces, custom steel fasteners for the front, and a few other minor design tweaks. The prototype is good - the final design will be even better.






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































Customization...
I have tested some finishing options like iso-polishing and anodized tinting. Some people prefer the as-printed finish that clearly shows the layer lines. Others like the polished or tinted options where the layer lines are smoothed out.  And because we are using 3D printing, we can do fun things like customize the front panel with your name, initials, or other design of your choosing.





Tessellation Studio...
The Web Wallet is only the beginning. I have other high-end consumer products in the works that will follow. The proceeds from this Kickstarter will help establish my business and grow my product line. In addition to carrying around the Web Wallet, you can wear our company swag to show your support. 





Check us out on tessellation-studio.com and follow us on Twitter so you are kept up to date on new product offerings.
Oh, and in case you were wondering, the standard 3D printing computer file is  ".stl" - which stands for standard tessellation language. A solid model is converted into an .stl file by covering the surface of the object with a tessellation of triangles. Hence the name and the logo. And now you know!

record.Creator: Remie Mayfallia
record.Title: Securmo: An On Demand Security Guard Hiring Tech Application
record.Text:
Click To Access Securmo Interactive Prototype  































































































Did you ever think about the importance of personal safety?
We believe it's essential to implement and maintain security measures by hiring private guards to protect yourself, your family, and your assets and avoid criminal attacks.
It’s highly significant to implement and maintain security measures by hiring private guards for protecting yourself, your family, and your assets to avoid criminal attacks.
Every day while skimming through the newspaper, we find headlines of robbing, mass shooting, and female harassment cases. These are just some of the reasons why we need private security services. There’s a lot more.
These heart-throbbing headlines could have been completely different if proper security measures were taken. We cannot alter our past actions, but we can surely make our future safer and better.
We aim to build a secure community by providing a security guard app, Securmo. It’s a platform where every person can hire one of our guards for a wedding, birthday party, business events, and for their home or family’s security. This app has been designed out of a strong desire to establish a safe environment where people can freely enjoy peace of mind knowing that their hard-earned money and loved ones are protected.
We are dedicated to offering people a reliable and easy-to-use security application that will provide them protection for everyday life.

 About The Creator 
“I am Remie Mayfallia, the CEO & Founder of Securmo. The story begins with my strong desire to establish a secure society for everyone where we don’t have to worry about our business, property, and family all the time. A lot of negative thoughts come up every day because we live in a society and age where we don’t feel protected. Therefore, I feel the necessity to take security services for my son and family if they’re traveling somewhere. But then a thought crosses my mind that this issue is not limited to a single house and as I have a family, I can sense the pain a person experiences if something happens to his/her loved ones. That was the moment when I decided to provide people with an easily accessible security guard app so that not only big corporations but every common individual can get security services whenever they need them for a very reasonable and fair price.“

Vauable Creative Minds Of The Securmo Team

Saba, Lead Designer of Securmo
“Hey, I‘m Saba! I am the UI UX designer & working as a lead Graphic designer for Securmo. Here my role was to turn this amazing and unique idea of Securmo into a reality. I enjoy seeing this project comming together from start to this point and working on all type of UI assets for Securmo: Wireframes, Prototypes, Social media posts —whatever designs we have needed, I have done it!
I revel in the opportunity to work creatively every day, and I enjoy working on a team of vibrant, motivated and talented people who give  all of their %100 best working on their part for Securmo and desire to establish a secure society where nobody has to worry about his/her security. We hope to bring Securmo to you guys soon. Much more to come!”

George Mico, the Director of Marketing 
“Hi, I’m George Mico, the Director of Marketing at Securmo, where I oversee the development of the existing client base and manage our marketing communication strategy. I also create content on our website, blog, social media, press releases, and email campaigns.
I've previously worked as a digital marketer for various companies, where I developed my skills in digital marketing strategy and execution. My area of specialization is in strategic planning, brand communication, product marketing, and social media marketing. I am a highly motivated and results-driven marketer with a proven track record of successfully implementing marketing campaigns.
Securmo is one of the fastest-growing mobile security companies, and I am delighted to be part of this team. We sure have an exciting future ahead of us!”

 Why Securmo? 

We all want to be safe and at ease!
Securmo is here to help you with that. We want to create a safe and inclusive community where everyone can experience world-class security and protection, designed for them - and this starts with an understanding of their everyday issues.
Your safety is our priority. We are determined to examine and verify the background documents of every guard to provide reliable and secure services. We will give proper training to the guards regarding the safest and effective ways to safeguard you and your family.
Securmo helps you pick qualified candidates based on their qualifications and reviews from other customers in a transparent feedback system. We strive to build a trustworthy model, where the customers have control of everything during the hiring process of security guards.
It’s a user-friendly app where you can instantly request a security guard for any occasion or everyday travel. You can enjoy life to its fullest with no gravest threat to life.


 How Does Securmo Work? 

Using Securmo app is a piece of cake.
Let's take a quick look at its steps.
Begin by creating an account.
You can then see a list of nearby guards on your screen.
Select the one around you and view the guard's profile as well as reviews.
Confirm your request and pay for it.
You can then track him or chat with your selected guard until he reaches your location.
That's all. 
Every individual can easily access the app and request the services of a security guard in a few minutes.
Anyone can hire our high-quality security guards instantly.
There is no need to wait in person for an interview with a security company, nor do you need to meet criteria or undergo background checks. It’s safe and easy. Use the app to connect with the guards, view their work history and skills, then decide who will receive the job.


 Help Securmo Grow 
We are looking to raise $500,000 that will cover the cost of tools used to educate our team of security guards about the professional and effective ways of protection. We will promote this platform at the international level through marketing and launching strategies with the extra money. The raised funds will also go directly into finishing the development and management team of the application software.
With your funding, we will be able to better train and educate our guards and provide you with exceptional and long-term security services as we bring Securmo to market.

 Rewards Structure For Securmo
We are offering some exciting prizes for the backers to express our gratitude.
● Pledge $10
Receive full access when the app releases and pay no service fee for the first month.
● Pledge $50
Receive full access when the app releases and pay no service fee for the first month.
Also, you will receive a 50% discount for the second month.
● Pledge $100
Receive full access when the app releases and pay no service fee for the first 2 months.
● Pledge $200
Receive full access when the app releases and pay no service fee for the first 2 months. Also, you will get access to our premium guard services, where you can begin as a five-star user.
● Pledge $300
Receive full access when the app releases and pay no service fee for the first 2 months. Also, you will get access to our premium guard services, where you can begin as a five-star user. In addition, you'll be allowed to set up premium accounts for two of your family members for free for the first 2 months of app usage.
We want to ensure that we are taking every possible step for the complete security of your family.
Share our app with your friends to help us protect every ordinary human as every life is worth defending.
With your funding, we will be able to better train and educate our guards as well as provide you with exceptional and long-term security services.

record.Creator: Kimmie Schiffel
record.Title: Bottled & Blended
record.Text:
Having used essential oils for several years and surrounding myself with a community of like minded individuals who have countless recipes and stories to share, I've found myself with an ever-growing collection of blends captured in screenshots, post-it notes, reference materials, and Pinterest pins. 
As a software Product Manger by day, I've found myself dreaming up the perfect digital solution for saving, searching, and, most importantly, sharing my favorite recipes and blends. For over a year it was merely a dreamy "what if" conversation amongst friends that gained enough traction and support for me to go all in. 
I've spent the last several months writing requirements, interviewing development teams, and finalizing the design of an app that I cannot wait to give back to the essential oil community. It's a beautiful thing when two worlds collide. 





SAVE
Save all of your favorite blends and recipes in a single place. No more scrolling through screenshots, searching Pinterest boards, or digging through post-it notes stashed in a drawer.
Bottled & Blended allows you to create a recipe box with your favorite blends by capturing photos, sources, ingredients, and notes for every recipe that supports you and your family. 
SEARCH
We want to make it quick and easy to find the blend you're looking for. Robust search options not only allow you to search and filter by ingredients and categories, but also by keywords within your custom notes section. 
Your recipes are YOURS to save and share. We only surface search results for recipes you have created or saved into your own box, ensuring you have the freedom to notate exactly what each blend supports, uncensored.
Think of this as your family recipe box handed down from generation to generation.
SHARE
Arguably the most important feature of the app for us is the ability to share. The foundation of the natural wellness community is the passion to share experience and knowledge. How many times have you been asked "what oils do you use for this?" or "what was that amazing blend you were telling me about for that?" 
We've designed this app so that you can quickly share your blends and recipes with anyone - even if they do not have the app - via standard text, email, and copy/paste functionality. 
We also make it seamless for the recipient to save recipes that are shared with them directly into their own app for future reference. 
SHOP
Click on any oil or ingredient within a recipe to add it to your wishlist. Pull up your list when shopping so you never forget an oil again.
When you grab that missing oil add it to your inventory with a single tap so you know what you've already purchased and have on hand. 





THE REWARDS
We mean it when we say we couldn't make this app a reality without you and we want to thank you for your generosity and belief in our dream.
We worked hard to create rewards that would maximize funds raised while giving back to this amazing community. I'd be lying if I said I didn't have an absolute blast working on these designs and hope you love them as much as I do.
Rewards will be fulfilled as soon as our project is fully funded. We accounted for unknown shipping delays in our delivery estimate, but plan to deliver as soon as we possibly can!







Be sure to follow us on Instagram as we have lots of surprises and giveaways up our sleeves to thank you for sharing our story. We really couldn't do this without you!

record.Creator: Warmee
record.Title: Warmee - App-Enabled Blanket
record.Text:
Maybe you’re used to piling on blankets, layering on clothes, or cranking up your heater, but with Warmee, staying warm has never been easier. 
Tuck into Warmee’s cushy smart throws, blankets, and mattress pads, all fitted with our ultra-thin Invisiwire heating technology. Coupled with temperature control from our mobile app, Warmee brings comfort and convenience to your home in one snuggly bundle.
We believe that when you’re comfortable, you can do anything. Or nothing. Sometimes that’s just as fun.

























Our patented Invisiwire technology is a game changer. All Warmee products are outfitted with this technology, the first to use spiderweb-thin heating wires that are crimp-free and can hardly be felt. Compare our Invisiwire fibers to other competitors' and you won't feel pins or needles with Warmee. Made from stainless steel and insulated with a Teflon-like material called MFA, they're even resistant to moisture and oxidation. 












Inconvenience shouldn’t get in the way of rest and relaxation. That’s why Warmee products aren’t just cozy, they’re also made to be as convenient as possible. The blankets are reversible and machine washable, so you won’t break a sweat getting rid of stains. Even struggling to snuggle with your nearest and dearest becomes a thing of the past when the throws are made much larger than those on the market. All in all, Warmee has got you covered.












You can rest easy knowing that Warmee is better for the environment and for your wallet. Warmee offers up to ten heat settings, so you can turn down the thermostat and curl up under your Warmee blanket or on your mattress pad while reducing your carbon footprint and lowering heating costs.





We’re very determined to help lower emissions that we’re partnering with SeaTrees (https://sea-trees.org/), a non-profit that’s helping reforest the planet’s oceans. When you think about it, turning down the thermostat and snuggling under a Warmee blanket really is a smart way to keep warm and help the planet.












Say goodbye to that bulky controller on your bedside. With Warmee, we want to give every customer the power to control their comfort effortlessly. That’s why we powered our products with Wi-Fi technology and a sleek, easy-to-use app, which can be downloaded through the App Store and Google Play. Now, setting your alarm and your Warmee product can all be done through your phone. The Internet makes it infinitely easier to do a lot of things, so shouldn’t relaxing be one of them? 










Create a more connected home with Warmee’s app where you can control all your Warmee products with just a few taps.





Once your Warmee products are set up on the app, you can control the temperature however you like. The app allows you to control the level of heat and its duration. When it comes to a king or queen sized blanket or mattress pad, you can control where the heat will come from, on the left or right side of your bed.

All you have to do is to secure the connector and plug it into an outlet while pressing the power button. With the app, you can set up the temperature and time! 










For ultimate convenience, the app is also compatible with Google Assistant or Alexa, so you can use voice commands to control your products. And with safety features like auto shut-off, you’ll never need to worry about turning your Warmee product off.
When you’re all set up on the app, you can keep it out of sight and out of mind. After all, you deserve a break.













Temperature is one of the most important factors that impact sleep. Regulation of temperature has been scientifically proven to improve sleep results, increase blood circulation and muscular flexibility. These make Warmee blankets are a great natural solution for certain types of pain relief, to boost your mood, or to simply kick back and relax. 



























































































































Warmee products, developed with the intention of truly innovating the warming experience and the marketplace, were four years in the making. We took our most challenging and creative ideas to our awesome engineering team who spent many hours developing our Invisiwire technology, removing the annoying feel of wires while retaining the same great warmth. The engineering team also designed the control system that gives us state-of-the-art options for the control and safety of the Warmee products. Then we worked with a solid factory team to complete the process and put it all together to build the present, great Warmee experience.






Warmee is composed of professionals in Home Textiles, Tech, and Engineering with a combined experience of 75 years in the industry.





We are driven to develop products that encourage sustainability and assist in helping people relax. To put it simply, we want our customers to feel more at home, in their homes.
With the exciting innovations in home goods now, we felt compelled to develop an all-new, modern collection of heated products that appeals to a new consumer and will change the way they think of electric blankets forever.  And by creating Invisiwire technology, we believe we have accomplished our goal. We can’t wait for you to see (and experience) our products!

Partners



braag - A boutique pre-launch to post-launch marketing agency leveraging data-driven customer acquisition to fuel record-breaking Kickstarters.

record.Creator: MuteMe
record.Title: MuteMe Mini - The Illuminated Mute Button
record.Text:
MuteMe™ Mini is an illuminated USB mute button for virtual calls that increases productivity, boosts confidence and decreases interruptions. 
The patent-pending device is designed to recognize if you're on or off mute by using intelligent software that works with any microphone(s) and syncs with popular video conferencing applications.













Control your mic with the touch of a button. Available as USB-C or USB-A


Knowing when you are on mute or unmute is not always obvious to computer users, virtual meeting participants, or those physically around them.  
When on a computer, the status of the microphone may be obscured by multiple windows being open, a particular program being minimized, or a user may be inattentive to the microphone state by using multiple monitors. 
Typically, knowing when your microphone is muted or unmuted requires locating the online conference window and identifying the condition of the microphone icon. 
MuteMe™ Mini solves this problem.











You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00









































Speaking with anyone around the world through a virtual meeting has become significant during the COVID-19 pandemic. But, frequent video conferencing problems have been the cause of embarrassment because either the person using virtual meetings did not know their microphones were on, or people have walked in on their meetings.  As a result, users and those around the user need to know a conference is occurring and if a microphone is on.








MuteMe Mini Green







MuteMe™ Mini lets both you and those around you know your mic status. With 8 different color options, you can let those around you know when it's okay to engage with you, and when it is not.








Users can select what is mute or unmute from 8 different color options.







Door bell ringing, lawn mower roaring, kids crying, or in any unexpected interruption, being able to react quickly is critical during video conference calls. 
MuteMe™ Mini increases productivity, boosts confidence, and decreases interruptions. The patent-pending device is designed to recognize if you're on or off mute by using intelligent software that works to control the microphone(s) of your choice. 
MuteMe™ Mini works with any video conferencing platform to mute/unmute, and syncs with the most popular video conference applications (Zoom, Teams, Amazon Chime, Webex, Skype, Google Meet, and much much more).   








MuteMe Mini's intelligent software allows the device to sync with Zoom, Teams, Amazon Chime, Webex, Skype and much more!


Users have convenient options that work for them: 

Available as a USB-C device or USB-A device (no adapter needed)
8 color options (color-blind friendly)
brightness control
pulse control
sound options
sleep mode (all LEDs off)
mute/unmute toggle, push-to-talk, or push-to-mute
and much much more

record.Creator: Diego
record.Title: Homesharing
record.Text:
Imagine being in the middle of a big foreign city, having eaten a lot in a good restaurant and being very sleepy. Homesharing is here for you: on this app you can search for other people who will want to make their bed available for you for a short time (half an hour, one hour maximum) !!

Imagine now that you are alone on a Saturday night and want to see a movie in a home, in a family context, with someone else. Homesharing will also allow you to share a seat on the sofa so you can spend a pleasant evening together and maybe find a new friend.

Homesharing is this and much more: dirty public toilets will no longer be a problem, because there will always be someone ready to help you in times of need by opening the bathroom door to you.

Homesharing: because shared is better!!

record.Creator: Peacock Audio
record.Title: PeacockFlight: Professional Monitoring True Wireless Earbuds
record.Text:
FLIGHT is the manifestation of our goal to immerse users in a professional audio experience all while providing the liberating detachment from cables.  




















Unlike other tech manufacturers that put out wireless earbuds as just another product, we at Peacock Audio have dedicated ourselves only to the business of professional Hi-Fi earphones. We don’t make portable batteries or smartwatches. Just amazing sounding audio products. This dedication and experience have allowed us to explore the depths of driver technologies that allow the most efficient and resonant sound outputs.






Two years of transducer R&D work has culminated in our new, proprietary biosynthetic diaphragm horn and ultra-powerful 6mm dynamic coil. Our new driver utilizes a next-generation compound diaphragm manufacturing process combined with the strongest ever magnetic system within a nano-dynamic driver housing. The extremely responsive nature of our driver means the overall sound is full and detailed, unparalleled in definition with any other commercial wireless earbud. Our tuning process has ensured a balanced sound that emphasizes strong sub-bass impact, a natural mid-range, and clear treble. These features unite to deliver a design that immerses you in your music, the way it was meant to sound.





To achieve the most coherent connection and user experience, the FLIGHT features the latest Qualcomm QCC3040 Bluetooth chipset. The latest iteration of its class, the QCC3040 can bring a more stable connection, support higher-quality music transmission, and improve sound quality performance - all while providing efficient battery management. With Bluetooth 5.2 capability, your phone calls can stay more stable, your games and videos are completely in sync with the audio, and you can enjoy a minimum latency experience.





Having worked with numerous professional musicians and sound engineers, we understand that the perfect fit for an earbud is just as crucial as its sound. To guarantee a secure, comfortable fit for every user, we scanned and analyzed hundreds of ears and utilized algorithmic modeling to create a shell shape that best suits the average ear. Medical-grade resin is utilized for each shell for a comfortable and lightweight fit that can be worn for hours on end. Each unit is hand-molded, painted, and polished for the ultimate bespoke experience.





FLIGHT is equipped with a 30mAh battery that can provide up to 6 hours of active listening per charge. Furthermore, each FLIGHT comes with a charging case equipped with a 200mAh battery that can extend the usage to 24 hours of active listening or 200 hours of standby time.





The FLIGHT is also equipped with Qualcomm’s latest Clear Voice Capture (CVC) 8.0. CVC 8.0 is a noise reduction algorithm that effectively filters out background noise to reduce up to 30dB of unwanted ambient sounds during your phone calls. By accurately calculating the position of the caller in relation to ambient sounds, CVC 8.0 allows a pure sound transmission for cleaner and more audible calls.






When FLIGHT is taken out of the charging box, it automatically turns on and connects to the last device used instantly. The super quick and efficient connection mode means less fiddling around on your phone to connect, and more direct listening time to your favorite music. To change or add a new device, simply touch the FLIGHT to easily pair.






Capable of fast charge, just 30 minutes of charging can allow up to 24 hours of listening! To maximize the lifespan of FLIGHT, the device features a new overcharge protection battery cell, which means you won’t have to worry about your chargers growing shorter and shorter. 





And plan to not use the FLIGHT for some period of time? The FLIGHT can fully power off to minimize battery drainage and pick up right where you left off.





The FLIGHT is IPX4 water-resistant, meaning it is safe to be used during exercises and light rain and splashes. Whether you are sweating away at the gym or commuting on an outcast day, the FLIGHT is ready to pump you up with your favorite music.






Secure-fit
Additionally, the Peacock Flight comes with three specifically designed ear tips for use with strenuous exercise - made with medical-grade silicone, these ear tips are ultra-light and safe on the skin. Combined with the custom ergonomic form factor of the shell, the Flight is snug and secure in your ears.  On top of that, we have also designed super-soft anti-irritant ear tips as the campaign add-ons that disperse inner ear pressures to allow long-duration uses without any discomfort to the ear canal.





The new upgraded chip is widely compatible with mainstream Bluetooth-enabled mobile phones, computers, and tablet devices. You can easily and quickly pair and connect with any IOS, Android, or Windows device simply by taking the FLIGHT out of its case. It’s the immediate connection you’ve been waiting for!





The FLIGHT is equipped with Qualcomm aptX™ capable to provide you with High-resolution sound. The aptX™ is one of the best Bluetooth audio codecs for a low-latency transmission. With one of the best latency and transfer rates (up to 24-bit 96kHz music quality wirelessly), aptX™ allows you to experience high audio quality with more efficient power management, lower delays, and better fault tolerances.













































































 Project Timeline















We are proud of our beautiful and unique shell designs, which are only made possible by meticulously hand-painting each piece to create true one-of-a-kind artwork. The engineering and tuning process necessitates hand soldering and testing of each driver component to ensure the greatest precision and quality control. 

In 2018, Linsoul worked in conjunction with  Peacock to release Peacock P1. Continued with the success of Peacock P1, Peacock Flight lands on Kickstarter.










We maintain a strong connection with Chinese HiFi brands in order to offer a curated selection of the very best that Chi-Fi has to offer. We also go a step further in providing customization services so you can acquire a uniquely styled or custom-molded IEM.
The founder of Linsoul realized that Hifi music listening should be inspirational and modernly stylish. It can be combined with sound quality and stylish to express your music style.











We got your back
Linsoul is a company with over 5 years of experience in HiFi Audio providing the best products from China to the rest of the world and has an outstanding reputation with customers worldwide.  The Peacock FLIGHT comes with a 12 Month Warranty*. Please read the FAQ to learn more about our warranty policy.























Enjoy music with unlimited possibilities
Every sound originates from the human heart, the human heart moves, the object makes it happen, and the object moves, so the shape is in the sound, the sound is corresponding, and the result is changed; we give music unlimited possibilities.

record.Creator: Manuel Di Censo
record.Title: Your next budget app
record.Text:
For a long time I have been looking for an app to track my expenses, an app that could tell me how much to spend and help me save.
I never found it.
Other alternatives offer too many unnecessary features, are either bloated or incomplete. So I decided to design my own, based on my needs, which hopefully are also everyone’s.
But for a designer, creating an app isn't easy. I care a lot about quality and I know that without a team of developers it could not be up to my standards, so I ask you for help, to support this idea and this project.





The app will be native, developed in Swift, and it will support widgets, light and dark mode, as well as an Apple Watch app with various complications.

You can add your expenses divided into 3 macro categories: Necessities (for example rent or insurance), Extras (a movie or a dinner with friends) and Savings (money set aside for a longer project).
Each expense can be single or recurring, a dedicated page will collect all the recurring expenses so you know what the monthly / weekly / annual fixed expenses are.
Your remaining budget is automatically calculated based on your income, helping you never spend more than you've earned. Obviously, recurring income and expenses are included in the total calculation. All you need is to enter the expenses you make.
All this for just 10€/year.

record.Title: 8BitCADE Level Up - Learn how to Make Your Own Games
record.Text:
The 8BitCADE Level Up is a fun yet challenging way to learn how to code. It is a combination of hardware (the prebuilt console) and software (the learn platform) that work hand in hand to allow you to learn the fundamentals of coding step by step! From online courses and daily coding challenges to a full fledge interactive emulator, the 8BitCADE Level Up will make you a coding master in no time!















Back in the day, 8bit programmers had to work with very small memory, which resulted in the development of amazing programming techniques to cleverly do more with less. Programming the 8BitCADE challenges users to think smart and use their creative problem-solving skills to find better solutions. Though it takes an immensely large team to code a single game nowadays, the 8BitCADE will teach you the basics of game development!


















Check out Arduboy here!




























 Check out this amazing review here!

The coding community is there to help every step of the way!







 Wireframe for learn platform!





Stage 1 of the learning platform focuses on software development. This is aimed to release by the end of December (Christmas time). This will consist of the:
              • Online IDE & Emulator
              • Daily Challenges
              • Coding courses





Stage 2 of the learning platform focuses on hardware development. This is aimed to release mid 2022 and will aim to deliver a whole variety of online video courses for you to learn more about hardware development!
              • Online video courses
              • Community forums
              • Improvements of Stage 1 based on your feedback





Further stages will be discussed openly with the community before moving ahead. This could be further improvements on the learning platform through additional game making tools such as a pixel art editor/chiptune maker or it could be the release of new DIY kits!



We are ALL ABOUT the community. Join the community and help us build YOUR platform!











Go Digital - Support the development and save the environment by going Digital!





Grab an 8BitCADE Level Up - The BEST way to learn how to code. Make your very own games!





Use the 8BitCADE Level Up to teach your students STEM! We provide free training to teachers and workshops!





We would love to see our products at your stores! Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any questions!





Learn electronics AND coding by building your own game console with our DIY kit first!





Our current aim is to get the first batch out for Christmas! However, due to COVID and the chip shortage, it is hard to predict the exact date in which you will receive your console! We will do our absolute best to get your console to you in time!


We prepared 500 units ready for the Christmas release! If we exceed this goal, they will be sent out after Christmas! More info is updated throughout the campaign.










Hi! I’m Jack Daly and I am a student & founder of 8BitCADE. Ever since I was young I’ve had a keen interest in anything electronic. I have a passion for design, programming, electronics – but also for retro games and consoles.

               The 8BitCADE is my retro passion packaged in a compact, fun and exciting console – providing endless hours of entertainment. I love that I can play games from all over the world, and learn from one of the greatest gaming communities – Arduboy!

record.Creator: 3A Production
record.Title: EMODIS: Voice of Your Car
record.Text:
EMODIS is a device that lets you share messages with or speak your mind to other drivers - and you can say pretty much anything by just typing it into the application this device comes with! 





The device itself is a pixel-dense screen in a frame - it is easily installed onto the rear window of your car by simply sticking the board onto the window.
It is then to be connected to an electic socket in your car via a 2 meter-long cable. Next step - download the app and you are all set!
Turn it on when you want to communicate something, or turn it back off if you wish to stop sharing at anytime.



Some of the equilizer options from the library that work via the integrated microphone










About the App





Manually typed in and saved via App text







 EMODIS application has a lot to offer: it has 4 general presets for the most commont road cases - they are an emergency, learner driver, baby on board and taxi presets.
All of these presets appear as a static image on the pixel board.





EMODIS comes with a remote control so you won't have to get distracted while driving! The remote control has 4 buttons linked to the 4 fields for typing that you are free to create yourself - these fields are 4 squares that are displayed right below the general presets in the EMODIS App.
There is also a long key press on the remote control - using this option you will be able to control the display - on/off and brightness.



EMODIS Remote Control





"Emergency" preset


There is also a demo mode in the App that lets you combine and create sequences of presets and your saved texts to be running at preferred speed,
for instance:
- take one from the 4 general presets; one from fun mode and one - text of your own creation. 
We may then have, for example, the next sequence: - BABY IN CAR - *BLUE CLOUDS* - PLEASE MOVE CAREFULLY. 
Create a combination for any occasion!



Fun and color modes


 Сhoose from our library of colors and sound equalizers that contains more than 50 presets!

Create any text, choose any preset - speak your mind and have fun!
Brighten your days and nights with EMODIS!














Manually typed in and saved via App text

















 - a little sneak-peak into the process of creating EMODIS!



Prototype testing





Prototype testing
















Manually typed in and saved via App text

record.Creator: Eric Lim
record.Title: Quizlarm: Productivity Booster For the Better Future
record.Text:
My Story
Hello, I am 18 year old high school senior seeking to launch my first app. Because of my age, I realize that backers may, rightfully so, be doubtful and consider it a huge risk, so I would like to start by telling my story before introducing Quizlarm.
I have always been an ambitious person with unique goals and dreams. In middle school, I was into classical guitar. I remember playing for hours and hours every day to become what my school called a guitar legend. It was an award given to a student who finished all courses of classical guitar and performed 20 minute recital in front of the school. After 3 years of hard work, I made it. Then, during my Freshman year of high school, I invested tens of hours each week in my school's robotics club. This time, my goal was to make it the world's competition and compete in the international event. Working in hallways by the vending machine everyday, my team and I, for the first time in school history, made it. Then, in my Junior year, after robotics stopped due to the pandemic, I had my first part-time job. Making money for the first time, I studied economy from day to night. This time my goal was to create a sustainable financial asset portfolio composed of growth stocks, dividend stocks, and U.S. government bonds. Finally, in my senior year, I started a community recycling project with group of friends. We dedicated our time to make recycling easy for a community that did not recycle. We distributed 1000 advertisement flyers, trash bags to houses participating, collected the trash bags, sorted aluminums and plastics, removed all labels, and recycled every single items we collected. This time, my goal was to help my community to be more sustainable. I did not list my journey's to just brag and assure you that I am capable. Throughout these experiences, I've learned, what I believe, to be a valuable skills that can guide me through my journey with a Quizlarm project. Guitar journey taught me that diligence and hard work pays off motivating me to always work hard. Robotics taught me to be more efficient and attempt to calculate all the variables that can become risks in the future. Economic studies taught me to manage risks to reduce the chances of failure. Finally, the recycling project taught me execution skills. There will most certainly be hurdles, but I believe I am ready for the challenge.
Introduction and Description
Have you ever had those mornings where you could not wake up? Did you ever miss alarms or used the snooze button too much? Have you ever felt that waking up is just a waste of time? It feels terrible waking up hours after your desired wake-up time, and it feels even worse to feel like you are wasting your time hitting snooze buttons after snooze buttons. I've had similar problems, so I am in process of creating Quizlarm, an alarm app that will guarantee that you wake up with productivity in mind. 
How?
Quizlarm is an alarm app, and the app will give you a quiz each morning. The user will have to solve the question(s) correctly to turn off the alarm. In other words, the user will have to wake up and solve a quiz to turn off the alarm ensuring that the user wakes up. No more snoozes and no more waking up hours after your desired wake up time. 
Productivity?
The app will most certainly wake you up, but how will it provide productivity users seek? Most of the quizzes given to the users will be pre-made simple questions that attempts to make the user think. For example, the app will ask users to spell certain words, copy certain motivational quotes, solve medium difficulty math problems, and etc. However, the user will have an option to create his/her own questions. I believe users are the ones that know themselves the best, and they are the only ones who knows exactly what questions to ask them. For example, if Eric has an important English test in a week, Eric can make questions that he needs to remember for the exam, or if Sarah has an important interview that she can not forget in few days, she can make a question to reminder herself of such an event. However, if the user does not have any important events, the app will simply provide the users with its questions. 
Alarm apps are something people use on daily basis, and if the app reminds you or teaches you an information every single morning, then I believe the user can greatly benefit. Not only will the user wake up on time, the user will start each day productively paving each morning to be the foundation of their success.

Progress
Today, the app's initial UI and significant portion of development is done. However,  because the app is not aesthetically pleasing as of today, contracts with external UI designer will be underway in few weeks to improve the apps overall look. Further, because the app needs to connect to a server, I am planning to contact a developer to help me with the finishing touches of the app. According to current plans, the app will be ready to launch in late December or early January. I've included some screenshots from the app for your reference. 










Research Says...
According to the Harvard online resources in the science of learnings section, there is a quote, "[information] is only kept [in the memory system] through constant repetition" emphasizing the importance of repetitive learning. Further, according to the article "Repetition and the brain: neural models of stimulus-specific effects" written by departments in Stanford University, Cambridge, and National Institute of Mental Health, explains why and how repetition allows the brain to  stimulate a faster response with greater accuracy.  As such, it has been proven that repetition improves learning, and I believe repetitive learnings each morning can be an even greater catalyst than simple repetition. The first thing the user sees and experiences in the morning is what the user desires to memorize or learn. 
We are living in a world where the value of the financial assets are rising faster than the value of labor.  Also, the world's wealth gap is only increasing. The wealth gap between the highly educated and the non-educated population is reaching all time highs.  So, I think my app can attempt to help solve such a societal problem. I believe my app can help our society take one of thousands of step closer to solving our societal problems by providing repetitive learning each morning prompting the users to be more productive and wake up on time. Changes I bring may be small, but I still believe utilizing the wasteful time people spend waking up each morning can be a change in the right direction for our society.
Kickstarter Fund
Receiving money should be followed by responsibility, so I will lay out how the funds will be used including how much I am investing in my project. Further, to ensure transparency, for some backers of my project, financial report will be sent that includes where and why each penny was spent.
As the chart below shows, most of the money raised through Kickstarter will go to pay for external developer who specializes in server side development and UI designer to make the app more aesthetically more appealing. You may wonder if $2000 raised will be enough to fund such a project, but I will be also investing money that I've saved during my part-time job, this additional capital information will be included in the financial report. 





* The above budget is an estimation and it leaves room for error and taxes.
I do not know how much money will be raised, but the exact dollar amount will be recorded and some backers will receive financial report to know that the funds were used to kickstart my project. 
Question
Thank you for reading my story. Please email me at 0329ericlim@gmail.com or reach out in the comment section.

record.Creator: Guan Hock Teo
record.Title: Internet of Things ( IoT ) Energy Saving Smart Farming setup
record.Text:
About the Smart Farming Project
Smart irrigation system is trending for it tailors watering arrangements automatically to meet specific needs, which significantly improves outdoor water use efficiencies.
Smart irrigation systems can optimize water levels based on things such as soil moisture and weather predictions.
This is done with moisture sensors that help inform the system whether the landscape is in need of water.
With the improvement of people’s living standards, the quality and safety of agricultural products are attracting more and more people’s attention. Agricultural products must be safe, healthy and traceable in order to make consumers truly reassured in the modern market competition. Therefore, digital farming consisting of LoRa Technology and the Internet of Things is solving the problem over how to feed a rapidly growing population across the globe.

After the Covid-19 situation, we know that food sources is another concern that we need to be think about.
This Smart Internet of things ( IoT ) system will monitoring the farm required information and then analyse data and will enable the farm to optimse the harvesting of crop.

This pilot project focuses on collecting, reading and visualizing data acquired from several LoRa WAN sensors deployed in a crop health management solution as plants need to be protected from harmful weather conditions when they are still delicate and particularly prone to diseases.
· Temperature Monitoring includes heat, snow, frost warning
· Humidity Monitoring that control bacteria, viruses and fungi developed.
· Sunlight Monitoring as photosynthesis is an important part of plant growing.



Information required for smart farming


Challenge
As a matter of fact, what is fundamentally significant to smart farming crop health management is temperature, humidity and sunlight data (not saying other factors unimportant). However, it will be difficult to manually check data at times as weather conditions may continuously change during the day and also sunlight is changing accordingly.


About the internet of Things system,




Internet Of things ( IoT ) Smart Farming system


The integration will need to take a bit of technical know how to integrate those sensors into the system. It will take a few months to get familiarize and set up.

Deployment of Smart Farming
Step 1:  LoRa WAN gateway is installed on top of a nearby building with a great signal;
Step 2: Temp/humidity and sunlight sensors are placed at equidistant locations within certain blocks and generate data;
Step 3: LoRaWAN gateway collects data from sensors and pushes them to The Things Network platform every 30 minutes;
Step 4: Users check data in visualized graphs on the application developed by Milesight (you can also use a third-party application server or develop your own application). These graphs are useful to farm operators to modify their corp health management system.

Benefits of Smart Farming
Reduce Cost
Big money can be definitely saved on labor costs as this project will greatly decrease the number of farmers needed to monitor and tend the growth situation of plants and streamline their operations.
Increase Productivity
Farm operators are able to adjust their plan of soil- and crop-specific fertilization and plant nutrition based on visualized information (temperature, humidity, water content, sunlight, etc.).

About Myself
Hi, I am Guan Hock Teo, My kickstart project will involve purchasing a set of IoT Agriculture set up kit, and set it up for trial and testing. The things network platform is one of the illustrated platform.  In the process, there are many steps and configurations needed to configure cloud and application server. This project will involve doing up a video clip and user manual , to guide the user how to set up their agriculture kit.

.Eventually linked up this agriculture kit to the network server and its dashboard.
Kickstart funder will have the option of receiving the video clip and soft copy of user manual that I do up. They will also have the option to receive a Pledge to smart farming limited edition singlet.
My linkedln profile is as follows:
https://www.linkedin.com/in/teoguanhock/

Appreciated & Thank you.

record.Creator: Ming-Jack Lin
record.Title: HealthCare Family’s LightSaber Screen Mount
record.Text:
Introducing HealthCare Family's LightSaber 
(Turned RGB Screen Mount!)










In the current world of IoT (Internet of Things), one can say that working and gaming have been almost inseparable from computers in our day-to-day lives, but most people have yet to think about how this affects eye care. As we are spending more and more time on screen, a light that is either too bright or too dim will directly strain your eyes, causing adverse and irreversible effects on eyesight in the long-term. As such, HealthCare Family’s LightSaber Screen Mount was created to focus on eliminating screen glare with its unique light positioning module, providing only the best flicker-free soft lights to protect your eyes from fatigue and allow you to view your screen clearly and comfortably.










We did not just just HealthCare Family’s LightSaber Screen Mount to provide a more innovative way to light up computer desktops via Display Space Light Source Technology. We also aimed at improving atmospheric lighting in and around your screen at the same time, allowing for a more exceptional gaming experience like nothing you’ve ever experienced before! It’s the best addition to serious RGB pc gaming setups!










HealthCare Family’s LightSaber Screen Mount can be mounted on any PC monitor or laptop screen without problem. It’s space-saving design was thought up to avoid occupying any space on your work and/or gaming desk to help keep everything clean and efficient. With HealthCare Family’s LightSaber Screen Mount, you also have the option to have it automatically turn off after a 40-minute use, reminding you that it’s time to rest your eyes. This special function may be disabled if you have no need for it though. The LightSaber Screen Mount also has the ability to either manually or automatically help you find the best lighting option for your room setting, as well as being a smart device, remembers the brightness and color temperature you used the last time, bringing a more user-friendly experience to the table compared to others.










Prolonged Lifespan
HealthCare Family’s LightSaber Screen Mount works with any DC 5V/1A power adapter and outputs power at 4.5W. With a color temperature ranging from 2700-6500K, it has over 68 High Quality Light Beads inside its sharp LED design. It can also be used for up to 30,000 hours straight!





Entertainment has always had a cost but working too hard costs practically the same thing nowadays when we’re all spending so much time on screen. Even now in the post-pandemic era where online classes have been the norm, our children are being affected by the same problems we adults face as they are now also on the screen most of the time, either while learning or gaming afterwards. Don’t let yourself or your family get strained or damaged eyes any further. Let HealthCare Family’s LightSaber Screen Mount care for your eyes for you.





HealthCare Family is dedicated to developing new and innovative ways of improving healthcare for all, and is now focusing on bringing a better lighting experience to screens worldwide with a unique asymmetrically optical design and elegant high quality light beads, scientific counterweight via dual-damping brackets, and super high color matching of up to 6500K! Make both gaming and office life more enjoyable with HealthCare Family’s LightSaber Screen Mount. The one and only RGB LED Light Screen Mount that cares for your eyes. Great for work, best for gaming!

Our sleep is vital to maintaining a healthy and productive lifestyle. Our product, Snoozz, is not targeted at one specific age group.

record.Creator: Almonzer Assad
record.Title: Flip Electric Bicycles
record.Text:
History/Story.
My name is Almonzer Assad from Sudan, African and I’m an Electrical Engineer at the University Of Sudan with an interest/passion for building and designing EV (Electrical Vehicles). For as long as I could remember I loved Bicycles. I loved how they look, the joy it brings people, the community it creates, and the peace that comes with riding bicycles. Growing up Bicycles were the main means of transportation. So I remember how peaceful and quiet it was growing up as the only noises you’d hear are either birds or the familiar bicycle bell ring. Now you can’t even hear the birds as the loud car and motorbike engines took over as the means of transportation.

The name of my company is Flip. What I make is Electric Bicycles. The million dollar question is why bicycles? This idea came after the tragic events that happened/happening in Sudan since 2018. As a massive petroleum/gas shortage hit the country the prices for this good skyrocketed. This led to many people losing their jobs as means of transportation became almost non-existent. Not only were jobs impacted even worse, kids could not go to school as well. The country was shut down and life stopped all because there were no alternatives.  Then people started using bicycles as means of transportation which worked for some and for some it was almost impossible because of the distance they would have to cover.

These events are what led me to this point right now. I decided if I could make electric bicycles that could be affordable for the average household that would not only lead to a cleaner country, it will also mean life would not have to stop if such tragedies occur again The world is evolving at a fast rate and the sad truth is Africa is behind, and so has been the case for decades now. When I watch people like Elon Musk take on the industry and lead the way for a cleaner world I ask myself why can’t I? The world needs change, especially Africa.

The Budget:
As seen in the video I already have a functioning prototype. Most of the money will go into purchasing more bicycles and developing better prototypes.

record.Creator: BOCOOLIFE
record.Title: BOCOOLIFE Ear Cleaner with Irrigation System
record.Text:
#New Review Video Updated













We all know that there’s just no good and safe enough way to keep our ears as clean as they should be—earwax buildup is a serious concern. Q-tips, ear picks, and other accessories may help, but they may also cause some pain and be less than effective.





Healthy ears need to be clean and cleared from accumulated earwax. However, scheduling an appointment with a doctor to have your ears cleaned is not always easy—your busy schedule doesn’t help, or sometimes your family budget will just refuse to stretch.  





With BOCOOLIFE, you can simply use a device with lukewarm water that will clean your ears, making them healthier, without having to waste time and money on appointments you don’t really want to schedule. It also allows you to make sure that your ear won’t be exposed to devices that medical doctors may use on other patients.  





BOCOOLIFE Ear Cleaner works exclusively through its irrigation system that is designed to deliver a safe and effective electrically powered stable water flow. BOCOOLIFE simply uses the volume and pressure of water to push extremely deep and tenacious wax out of your ears. There’s no pressure against the tympanic membrane and no risk to your ears.     





 The safe, pain-free, and extremely effective ear cleaner and irrigation system that keeps your family’s ears clean  










Basically, the person whose ears are being cleaned will feel as if a water stream is flowing into her ear and coming right out. A very mild sensation of discomfort could be experienced—just because the cerumen is being pushed away from the ear through partial dilution and water pressure. The  Q-tip will push the ear wax back into the ear canal which might hurt the eardrum and cause infection.










Different requirements and preferences call for different pressure levels, which is why BOCOOLIFE features four modes that you can choose from based on your needs.   















With 4 LED lights and a transparent acrylic water barrier with zoom function, let you observe the ear canal more clearly, and prevent splash. 










Your ears are delicate and exposing them directly to equipment used by others is not a sterile and recommended way to clean them. That's why the BOCOOLIFE Ear Cleaner and Irrigation System comes with multiple single-use soft ear tips to ensure that each ear tip belongs to you alone and to avoid cross-contamination. 















Using BOCOOLIFE Ear Cleaner causes mostly no pain whatsoever. Its design and way of working are made for a perfectly safe ear cleaning operation that even unskilled users can quickly master. No side effects are to be expected from an ear cleaning intervention with BOCOOLIFE because this device uses only lukewarm water to effectively clean your ears.










Providing an ergonomic water container that fits well on the shoulders and you could place it on your shoulders to hold the water leftover from the ear washing. You will have a better experience if your friend or family could help you with this!











When designing BOCOOLIFE, we wanted to make sure that the battery was one of its strengths. That’s why we equipped it with a 2000mAh rechargeable lithium battery that charges quickly, ensuring lasting charge cycles for multiple cleaning operations. Once full charge can use for up to 8 hours!
Your BOCOOLIFE’s battery is here to help you keep your family’s ears—and yours—clean for a long time!











You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00














































The Conventional need to constantly repeat the squeezing operation and it might take a long time to clean your earwax. Moreover, it is difficult to clean stubborn earwax effectively. It would be dangerous, the ear tip needs to be inserted into the ear canal and is easily dislodged.
BOCOOLIFE Ear Cleaner works exclusively through its irrigation system that is designed to deliver a safe and effective electrically powered stable water flow. BOCOOLIFE simply uses the volume and pressure of water to push extremely deep and tenacious wax out of your ears. There’s no pressure against the tympanic membrane and no risk to your ears—unlike damage that could be caused by other devices, which require an inefficient and harsh manual squeeze and rinse operation.

However, if there's a history of ear perforations, ear surgeries, or ear-related pain recently experienced, then BOCOOLIFE should not be used, and you should consult a medical doctor to have your ears cleaned in a clinically recommended way.




















 The story of BOCOOLIFE began in 2016 when founders Sam(an Audiologist) and Alex( a Design Engineer) met. Their first venture was the BOCOOLIFE Ear Cleaner with Irrigation System, and they started with the mission that  " easy and effective ear care solution" This mission hasn't changed to this day, despite the brand's global success and wide range of ear care products offerings. BOCOOLIFE has believed that ear irrigation or ear syringing is a much better solution than cotton swabs, it's true, clean with cotton swabs merely pushes the wax deeper into the ear canal, causing a blockage. So, it should be cleaned in an easy and efficient way. After long-term market research, BOCOOLIFE team decided to develop an innovative and unique ear irrigation kit -  BOCOOLIFE Ear Cleaner with Irrigation System. It's powerful, durable, easy, and comfortable without hurting to clean ear blockage at home for all ages. The core concept remains the same: A breakthrough in-ear health - cleaning alone is not enough!


Factory Image










This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarter launches with 1,400+ successful Kickstarter projects and over $500M raised in total.

record.Creator: Johnny Farman
record.Title: Adventure Group Finder
record.Text: I am raising funds to start an app that will allow table top gamers to find others in their area to start gaming groups for games such as Dungeons & Dragons, Magic: The Gathering, Munchkin, etc. I am very passionate about getting this app made because it's also an app I need for myself. Last year I lost two brothers and needed something to help me cope. Unfortunately I am not good at meeting new people physically outside work and home. That's when I got the idea for this app. I even worked out specific details on how it should look and operate. I plan on getting this app developed via outsourcing to a developer company. Unfortunately it costs a lot of money to do this hence why I am here. Keep in mind I am raising money for phase 1 and 2 of development.

record.Creator: Francis Chu
record.Title: Blincc Hex : Super Bright, 360, Dynamic, Light and Modular
record.Text:
Blincc Hex
We know how important it is to be seen when cycling in the dark. Blincc Hex is a 360 degree and dynamic reflector that installs on virtually any bike. Blincc Hex will dynamically spin and always be there reflecting headlights. It gets you noticed while still being sleek!

But... Isn't reflective decal already normal? So why Blincc Hex? Good question. Let's take a look at it.










5 Reasons Why:
1. Super durable with an enhanced protective layer.
2. Thin & flexible to follow complex profiles and edges. 
3. Customised 3M micro prismatic brightness.
4. Modular design.
5. Most importantly, simply awesome.



Blincc Hex Gets you noticed in all angle







 Blincc Has Been Seen On: 











MAJOR 3M MATERIAL UPDATE:
Previously we were using glass beads technology which is flexible. However, after more and more tests we managed to find a better option. We are all familiar with the 3M micro prismatic performance. Blincc Hex is made of customized 3M micro prismatic which is super bright yet it is extremely malleable. Normally micro prismatic will crack on sharp bent. However, Blincc Hex custom prismatic can even be folded! it is the best of both worlds :)















Enhanced Protective Super Strong Layer:
We know outdoor can be rough due to particles such as carbon, dust, gravel, debris, and more. So, Blincc Hex is enhanced with an extra engineered protective layer to shield it from potential harm. Would you look at that!















Follows Complex Surfaces:
We love curves. So does Blincc Hex. Have a sharp aero curve and edges? Don't worry, Blincc Hex will fit in.As mentioned, It will even follow folds!










Modular and Dynamic:
Due to the shape, Blincc Hex will appear different just by pasting it slightly differently. your style your move. Additionally, due to the modularity, any broken pcs during use can easily be changed without replacing the whole set. 















Easy Cleaning:
Decided to go off-road for a shortcut on a muddy path? no worries, it is easy to clean.










For Both Types Of Brakes: 
Whether you are rocking on normal brakes or advanced disc brakes, Blincc Hex won't discriminate. Its size allows pasting on tight spaces easily.















Placement:
Worry less about fitting and sizes, We have designed Blincc Hex to fit virtually any bike due to its size and shape. 


























You can still get Blincclip in this campaign as a bundle.

No Early Bird Price? 
Fortunately no. Here is why:
Early birds create a perception of urgency. It may be great for creators' sales but we do not want to trigger your impulsive buying for our advantage. We believe in our product as we truly believe in you. So back us only if you find it useful to you :)

Stretch Goal.
However, early backers and support will definitely help us to reach further goals. In turn, it will open up more exclusive stretch goals (free upgrades) that will benefit you as our Kickstarter supporter. 
















Specs:
Small Hex. 51 x 18 mm at 0.3 grams.
Long Hex 94 x 18mm at 0.6 grams.
Universal size for rims.
Note: For extra small rim, Blincc Hex can be easily cut and trimmed.





Fulfillment And Delivery:
We have created our Hex and it is ready for production. With your help, we can start mass-producing it early and ship it to you before Christmas Day.

20 October 2021 - Campaign Launch.
02 November 2021 - Start Manufacturing.
17 November 2021 - Campaign Ends.
24 November 2021 - Packing.
30 November 2021 - Kickstarter Fund Received.
01 December 2021 - Address Collection.
04 December 2021 - Shipment Process Start.

However please be mindful of delays as world shipment is affected by Covid-19.





Our Previous Project (Blincclip):
The Self Blinking Super Bright Bicycle Reflector.
We had a successful first run with Blincclip with over 450% funded with a lot of happy users. Blincclip was the first self-blinking reflector that hangs on your saddle or virtually any bag with the included universal string.
