record.Creator: Kevin Hedges, CEO & Co-Founder, NannyPod
record.Title: NannyPod - The 'Uber of Childcare'
record.Text:
Parents frequently need childcare! We know... and we have built the solution.





Why We Care
We had family and friends who were continuously stranded at home... with the kids. Every single day of the week. Our parent-friends were always stuck! Date-night, events, parties, dinners... you name it, they couldn't come.
So, we built the 'Uber of childcare'... the super-fast low fee NannyPod app. 

Our Goal
NannyPod's number one goal is to help EVERY parent in the USA instantly access childcare, whether it's for 1 hour or 10 hours! We make it super easy to make requests with family members, friends, neighbors, babysitters, nannies and infant care specialists. In addition, we help childcare providers pick up jobs at their convenience. Be part of our journey and mission!
(If we do not reach our target amount your money is returned)





Who We Are
We care deeply about this industry and our objective is to market the NannyPod app nationwide to parents and childcare providers. We are a team of 5 experienced business people, moms and marketers. 
Check us out: https://www.nannypod.com/team

What We Have Built
Competitor platforms and apps are slow, massively overpriced and some even charge childcare providers exorbitant fees for background checks. Not us!

The NannyPod app is the 'Uber of childcare'. 
It is free to all childcare providers so you can pick up jobs anytime, anywhere.
Parents pay $8/month to make unlimited requests (or $5 per confirmed booking).
Use the app between friends, family and neighbors as well as local sitters and nannies 






Why We Are Raising Funds
In order to make the NannyPod app #1 in the industry for parents, we need to market it in a variety of ways to childcare providers. We use social media influencers, college career websites, sororities, strategic partnerships, Google, Facebook, SnapChat, TikTok and more. 
Our mission is to grow our user-base and help every parent in the USA access childcare in minutes, in every town. If you are a mom, dad, parent, aunt, uncle, grandparent, teacher, nurse or childcare provider, you'll love NannyPod! 
Anyone can help us reach our fundraising goal. Think of it as everyone helping parents, a few dollars at a time. 
(Remember, if we do not reach our target amount your money is returned)

Rewards
We're offering FREE SUBSCRIPTIONS in exchange for backing our Kickstarter campaign. We greatly appreciate anyone who contributes to our mission. 
We can't wait to market the new super-fast NannyPod app across the USA!

Which is the Best Value Reward? 
The best value reward is the FREE LIFETIME SUBSCRIPTION. If 2000 people choose this reward, we will exceed our target. Thank you for your support. The more backers we have, the more parents we can help. 





Our Campaign
This campaign project is about helping EVERYONE who has children. It's about helping the parenting community. Let's shake up the industry and make NannyPod the leading childcare app in the USA. Thank you.

Hello... the 'Uber of childcare' is here. Welcome to NannyPod! 

With love 💛 ,
The NannyPod Team 🙂
NannyPod USA Incorporated. All Rights Reserved. NannyPod™.

record.Creator: Vickie McHugh
record.Title: The Craft Exchange – Buy, Sell, Destash
record.Text:
Help back this pioneering project….  
Are any of you avid crafters? Does anyone (like myself) hoard craft supplies? With the success of some well-known marketplaces online, there is nothing out there solely to buy, sell and destash craft supplies. 
Research suggests there are a large number of different social media platforms, groups, pages and marketplaces where you can buy, sell and destash craft supplies, but no stand alone “one stop shop” designed specifically.  
I would like to change that and create The Craft Exchange. It would be the only marketplace specifically where you can buy, sell and destash craft supplies and not only that, I want to create the Craft Exchange community. A community where like-minded crafters can meet up online and chat about anything craft related, share ideas and tutorials as well as access a selection of exclusive videos/tutorials made by craft influencers and professionals to draw attention to the Craft Exchange brand.  
The Craft Exchange would be a peer 2 peer marketplace where users can sign up and create their “Craft Room”. 
From here they will be able to upload their own items they no longer use or need and also purchase second hand/pre loved items from other users “Craft Rooms”.  
As a user of The Craft Exchange, you will be able to like listings, follow accounts, add ratings and reviews and chat with other accounts about items in their “Craft Room”. There would also be competitions and give always where you can win a number of the paid functions or supplies.   
Phase 2 - With the upcoming success of The Craft Exchange, going forward with a phase 2, there will be 4 extra paid functions:  
The Craft Exhibit – This would boost a user’s “craft room” and increase visibility within The Craft Exchange. It will be visible to more users based on their search/filters/craft. 
“Nudge” This boosts the visibility of single items and would appear in more users item feed/search results making it visible to the right users. 
Star Crafter and The Craft Exchange newsletter – This will give crafters the opportunity to promote their craft/and or business. This would appear on the main page of The Craft Exchange and on the newsletter 
Craft Business Ads – This would give crafters the opportunity to promote their craft business within peoples search engines.  
Also as part of phase 2, The Craft Exchange would also include a member’s area which would have a small £2 per month subscription fee where users can join the community and access exclusive content, crafting forums and offers available to Craft Exchange members only. 
There will also be a newsletter which will be created on a monthly business.  
The Future –   I have enjoyed thinking about the future of The Craft Exchange and I have a great list of ideas going forward so here are some ideas: 
The 5 year goal for The Craft Exchange would include a wide range of add on’s to the system including a bespoke Craft Exchange App as well as merchandise.  Franchise opportunities – The Craft Exchange sales  - selling craft supplies and items at one of The Craft Exchange sales  The employment of staff to support this amazing project and idea  
Taking The Craft Exchange GLOBAL!  
To promote the Craft Exchange, marketing will be done via various online and social media platforms which will include paid ads. Leaflets and door to door drops Stalls at craft fairs and shows, Word of mouth and craft influences.
If you decide to back this amazing and pioneering project, your money will go towards, the build and design of the marketplace as well as marketing The Craft Exchange over various mediums, as listed above. 
It will also help pay for The Craft Exchanges first years insurance because I want its users to have trust in the business and feel secure using it.  
If I am successful in raising the funds for this project, the plan going forward would be first and foremost to raise a social media presence. This will be done via crafting influencers in the UK, paid adds, words of mouth and contacting various crafting businesses asking for collaborations to promote foot traffic to The Craft Exchange on social media. Whilst doing this, I will be having a logo created for The Craft Exchange. 
Last but not least, I will start developing and designing the marketplace with the help of specialist designers ready to go live. The aim would be to get The Craft Exchange live within 6 months.  
If you have any questions, please don’t hesitate to drop me a message, I would be happy to discuss this great venture with you.

record.Creator: Oumua Inc
record.Title: Oumua: AI Powered Personal Breathing Trainer
record.Text:
This is Oumua!
Your lightweight and portable breathing trainer designed to increase your endurance, lung performance, and improve your overall well-being in under 10 minutes a day.
To preorder and make this breathing perfection a reality, click Back This Project — or read on!










Do you also find yourself running out of breath?
It might be from a trip up the stairs… an intense workout… or even getting up too fast! No matter our fitness levels, breathing is always one of the biggest factors holding us back. 
And while traditional breathing practices do work, sessions can be long and may take years to master. On the other hand, the current breathing trainers all share similar problems:

They look bulky and strange. And you look strange while using them
They make you hypersalivate, and cause a stiff lower jaw.
They train inhalation and exhalation at the same time building bad habits, exercising mistakes, overlaps, and pullbacks.

Until now… Oumua was born out of the search for the perfect respiratory muscle training device for everyday use.
We want you to also benefit from breathing exercises — not just the pro athletes and yoga gurus!





Oumua combines a healthy breathing habit, with a perfectly balanced user experience and AI-powered technology - with stunning space-inspired aesthetics. Breathing perfection — at your fingertips.







































Oumua's separated airflow channels allow for faster-exercising results while helping you avoid common mistakes and respiratory imbalances.











Current sports science agrees with breathing practices and traditions dating back thousands of years, that inhalation and exhalation resistance training should be separated, as inspiration and expiration are commonly perceived as two different processes.

Exercising both inhalation and exhalation at the same time is likely to exacerbate the existing imbalances, causing training overlaps and rollbacks. Oumua was designed with this in mind. 
Oumua has two separate airflow channels that allow you to perform the inhalation and exhalation movements separately. By gradually tailoring the resistance levels, you’ll progress faster, and avoid common exercising mistakes from other practices.






All it takes to gain control of your breathing are 5 to 7 mins of inhalation training in the morning, and 5 to 7 mins of exhalation resistance training in the evening. Experience a noticeable increase in your breathing performance with just these 10 to 15 minutes of daily exercising.







Oumua's patent-pending Gradient resistance system guides you through 6 resistance levels, based on your goals, from general well-being to athletic improvement.





Nothing should hold you back from strengthening your breathing experience. That’s why a slight recess in the center makes it easy to switch between the resistance levels, even in the dark, for people with low muscle tone, and if you have compromised fine motor skills. 
Oumua also “clicks” every time you change the resistance level — an intuitive and user-friendly feature for seniors and users with poor eyesight.





Oumua provides resistance levels tailored for both general well-being and athletic improvement, starting from moderately low 8 сm (3.14 inches) of H2O resistance - all the way up to really hard-to-crack 60 сm (23.6 inches), something even trained athletes will find challenging.






Oumua Pro is the world’s first personal breathing trainer with a dedicated app powered by Artificial Intelligence. By analyzing your parameters such as age, weight, and athletic condition, the app guides you through each training session, giving live suggestions, exercise compliance, and tracking progress online.





With Oumua App, you can measure your lung capacity, adjust training sessions based on compliance, get new training programs, and compete with other users during similar training sessions.
It tailors resistance levels and gets performance guidance, helping you avoid respiratory imbalances, overlaps, and pullbacks.






The breathing training sessions are built on several core principles like periodization (micro/meso/macro cycles), dynamic resistance increase, and AI-guided conditioning. You can choose (and switch) between 3 main areas:






















Ready to level up your breathing?
Pre-order Oumua Pro, and select the color (Belize, Rosewood, Azure, Onyx, Pearl, Shamrock, Indigo and add-on colors Blush and Charcoal) via a backer survey after the campaign ends.
Click Back This Project and select your Pledge Tier.
Pre-order now and pay when the campaign ends.




















































Oumua exterior is a reference to nature’s phenomenon, the Nautilus Pompilius, whose shell is a perfect representation of the golden spiral.
Its minimalist exterior reduces undue attention, and there are no added vibrations, sounds, or sensations — it's handily sized, user-friendly, intuitive and discrete.





The name is inspired by Oumuamua — Hawaiian for “first distant messenger” — and the name given to the first known interstellar object to make it into our Solar System. What can we say, we love space :)





















Resistance modes "1" and "2" are optimal for the breathing practice novices, seniors, and users with compromised respiratory function; "3" and "4" offer a moderately challenging training experience that will fit most users; "5" and "6" are suitable for trained breathing practitioners and athletes.
Oumua height is 4.9 inches, the switcher is 1.6 inches wide, the mouthpieces are 0.4 inch; the depth is 0.9 inch. Oumua Pro weighs 2.9 oz.






Oumua is engineering and user experience, perfected — it is hand-sized, lightweight, intuitive, user-friendly, and durable. The assembly process is quick and completely fault-proof.

record.Creator: Taillien
record.Title: Build the prototype for a mobile water treatment system
record.Text:
The goal of this project is to build the prototype for a modular, portable, renewable energy powered (solar and hydroelectric), waste water cleaning and filtration system that can be installed anywhere at a relatively low cost compared to centralized waste management solutions. Part of this goal is to test and install the prototype at the Corazon Y Mar waste dump near Rosarito, Mexico that is currently pumping 80,000 gallons of human and toxic waste into the Pacific ocean each day. 

HISTORY: This project grew out of a toxic waste dumping site that Taillien.com team members found during a clean water project we worked on in Playas de Tijuana in 2020. After researching, we found that there were more than 80,000 gallons of human and toxic waste dumped each day off the coast of Baja California, Mexico about 6 miles south of San Diego. There has been an ongoing project by the EPA and California to resolve unmanaged waste across the border, but this kind of shoreline dumping, in combination with northern directed ocean currents, guarantees that waste will continue to pollute the California shores. For this reason, solutions requiring political and economic incentives are not enough to resolve waste dumping. There is a need for lower cost, renewable energy powered, solutions to clean human, toxic and medical waste.
Our goal is to build the prototype system at the Corazon Y Mar dump site near Rosarito, Mexico. 
Taillien 1 Design
There are a wide variety of approaches to water treatment through processes involving biologics, pyrolysis, electrocoagulation, plasma treatment, chemical additives, detergents, filtration and combinations of each.
For Taillien 1, we plan on using a combination of electrocoagulation and pyrolysis, powered entirely through solar and hydroelectric, to build a mobile water treatment prototype. Testing will be conducted on the sewage passing through the Corazon Y Mar dump site. The prototype uses an initial, gravity fed, electrocoagulation platform with filtration grating to remove ammonia, phosphates and large sediment. The flocculant is then fed into the inline pyrolysis chamber comprised of a Tesla Induction Coil wrapped around steel piping. The incineration phase will eliminate pathogens and the steam is transported through a long inline chamber where additional magnetized copper coils are housed without the steel piping to complete separation. The remaining effluent is then deposited directly into the ocean.
We will be sharing detailed updates of the design, construction and testing of the prototype with our supporters through Kickstarter.

record.Creator: Dr. Eoin Everard
record.Title: BackAware Belt
record.Text:
The BackAware Belt™ is a wearable technology that gives instant feedback on your back position. Allowing for better posture and lifting technique. 
We see so many people doing exercises at home or in the gym with rounded backs and no awareness of their position. We also see this in our daily lives, people rounding their backs to lift objects or just sitting with a flexed spine. 
This is why we created the BackAware Belt™. You can use the BackAware Belt™ in any position for any lift, exercise or even sitting at your desk.



BackAware Belt™ warns you when you are in a poor position by vibrating





Also Visually see your back position with our BackAware App


Overview
The BackAware Belt™ is:

A technique and posture trainer for better lifting performance
Provides you with instant feedback on your back position
Usable in any position, during any exercise and in a range of settings
Useful in a range of other settings: at your desk or during day-to-day activities that involve lifting
Developed by a Physiotherapist and includes training videos and Back Care plans with the free smartphone app.

Better Awareness=Better Technique.





 Poor technique is often caused by a lack of Awareness of your back position. You just don’t sense when your back is in a poor position. 
Even doing core exercises to strengthen your back, unless you are in the correct position these exercises may be ineffective. 
The BackAware Belt makes you aware of your position constantly so that you can have confidence that your are exercising with correct technique.  





Not a Back Belt. 
A back belt will try support your back, thus reducing the need for core muscles to work. 
The BackAware Belt makes you aware of your position. You still need to fire and work your own core muscles to keep your spine in the desired position. 





The BackAware Belt™ provides instant feedback about your back position by gently vibrating at the belt and also you can see your position on your phone. 
Imagine a Physical Therapist or Personal Trainer supervising every exercise so that you never lifted a weight or did core exercises poorly. 
The BackAware Belt™ can do that job for you for a lot less than $100 per hour!



Have Confidence you are doing exercises correctly


Desk Version- Additional Feature





In addition to the original BackAware Belt™. We have developed an additional feature for optimal desk use. The original version of the belt can be used at a desk but we have added features, such as delaying the signal and sending notification to your phone instead of the belt vibrating.
This allows you to wear your belt discreetly in an office. 










Back-Aware App



Android and IOS Apps available to calibrate your belt, track your workouts and daily stats and see training videos.


First of its Kind Technique and posture tracker





All other posture trainers and trackers just tell you if you are upright or not. They do not calibrate to your specific back position. This means you cannot use these when lifting or exercising.
Every person’s back is different, so your BackAware Belt™ calibrates to your normal position during ANY exercise or lift. Meaning you can use it exercising, lifting at home or at your desk.
Track your Gym, Rehab or lifting technique



Use the App to see your back position throughout your exercise. This helps improve technique through BIofeedback


Watch this short video with creator Eoin Everard PhD demonstrate the use of the app.



 Bonus Training



We have recorded technique videos for all the Gym, Pilates and Back rehab exercises you will ever need!


On our Training Page of our App you will get access to:
✓ Better Technique for all the key gym exercises.
✓ Better Technique for Pilates and Physio rehabilitation exercises.
✓ Lifting and bending correctly at home.
✓ Healthy sitting habits.

Key Features





Special bonus for Kickstarter backers





We will offer you a free 8 week Sports Pilates or Back Pilates course worth $100 dollars each. These courses have been extremely popular over the past 2 years with over 60 5-star reviews ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
In addition to weekly Pilates sessions our course comes with follow along home gym workouts, recipes, mobility sessions and more!

Reviews from Experts





 Rewards










We've already completed our first round of  testing the prototype, refined and launched both Android and IOS apps, We have completed pre-production and beta-testing to make sure things run as smoothly as possible. With the help of Kickstarter backers we can now we produce these belts at scale.

Design Process





This project has taken nearly 3 years to get to this stage. From sending ideas over to potential engineers. I started working with an App designer and an engineer who both ran out on me when I paid them Christmas bonuses.
I have since found a great engineering and App development company that have helped me take this idea from my head into a first prototype and then have refined it to the model we have now. We have trademarked the name and have our patent pending. Very exciting.
The design of the belt has changed considerably from the first one that was sent to me! My local fabrics shop in Kilkenny, Ireland (Threads of Green) have supplied all my fabrics and I am using local seamstress companies (Zipyard Nenagh) to make the belts here in Ireland. That way we can make sure each belt is the perfect quality.
Each unit is currently being tested by the engineers and then by our team in Ireland before being shipped.
Shipping
 All shipping fees will be collected separately once the campaign is over. Please see below for estimates: 
Currently we are only shipping to the United States, the EU, Canada and the United Kingdom
Shipping estimates for BackAware Belt:  United States: €20 | United Kingdom: €15 | EU: €10 | Hong Kong / Malaysia / Singapore: Not Available | Rest of the World: Not Available. If interested from Asia please pledge $1 or comment and if we get enough interest we will open this up. 
*VAT/Customs duty will be pre-charged for customers in EU countries. In all other countries the responsibility is at time of delivery for the backer.
For EU backers only: We will be charging VAT duties in BackerKit once the campaign is over. Please see below for duties costs depending on your country.
VAT by country: Austria, Bulgaria, Estonia, France, Slovakia, United Kingdom: 20% | Belgium, Czech Republic, Latvia, Lithuania, Netherlands, Spain: 21% | Croatia, Denmark, Sweden: 25% | Cyprus, Germany, Romania: 19% | Finland, Greece: 24% | Ireland, Poland, Portugal: 23% | Italy, Slovenia: 22% | Hungary: 27% | Luxembourg: 17% | Malta: 18%

About the Founder





At BackAware Belt it’s our goal to get people moving better and feeling healthier. There is nothing more frustrating than seeing people try to do the right things but hurt themselves.
Dr. Eoin Everard is a chartered physiotherapist with a PhD specializing in human movement. He has published several peer reviewed journals and presented at European Conferences in the area of human movement. He is a lecturer and runs his own clinical practice and online Pilates program (everardpilates.com).
He is five time national running champion, has represented Ireland from 800m track to 10,000m Cross country and is Kilkenny’s first and only sub- 4 minute miler and sub 14 minute 5k runner.
Share the Love!
Like what we're doing? Share BackAware with your friends and family!






Share BackAware Belt on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/everardpilatesphysio/

Risks and challenges
This is our first Kickstarter project so we want to start off with a bang! We have gone through a lot to get to this stage the prototypes have been tested, in addition with the APP to make sure it is right for you. We want this product to be great and impact people’s lives.
We are very confident in our timeline, but it's our core belief to never settle for an average product, so we won't be compromising on quality in order to save time. Should any issues arise we promise to keep you updated every step of the way and deliver you the best quality product as soon as possible.
Supply Chain Risk: We have built a very capable team that works hard to ensure smooth delivery of all our products. However, processing delays and unexpected shortages can occur. If this happens, we’ll be sure to keep you informed and work to quickly solve the problem. Quality Control Every one of these products will be tested to make sure it is working. When we are happy we will ship it right to you.  This will ensure that each belt is in perfect condition without defects as it comes off the line. Covid-19 The health and safety of our team and partners is always our top priority. We follow all government-mandated guidelines and always err on the side of caution when it comes to the physical and mental health of our team and partners. Our manufacturing partner for this product is operating at 100% so we are incredibly confident in our manufacturing timeline.
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
  First Edition- First of its kind for a healthier society.  
Will we have other versions of this belt over the years? Hopefully. Will we ever have a first edition again? No. I am hoping this can grow to be something like Fitbit, Peloton or the other great fitness wearables. Imagine owning one of the first 100 Fitbit watches? Or Apple products. That is my hope for this. You will be one of the first to help change the way we lift. Make people aware of their position so that we have a healthier society.



This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 2,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $900M raised between them.

record.Creator: Nicholas Seawater
record.Title: AR & VR Viewer: Help Cover App Design Improvement Costs
record.Text:
Hi everyone, this is Nick! From my early years, I took a great interest in the entrepreneurial spirit,  graphic design, and virtual reality. I found myself quietly captivated by the diverse industrial worlds of portable sawmills, Kinkos, California craft fairs, and trade shows. I was drawn to digital creation tools such as Kid Pix, HyperStudio, PowerPoint, and Macromedia Flash early on. I found myself mystified with visual storytelling of early 3D video games such as Wolfenstein and Red Alert 2, carefully researching every issue of game magazines like GamePro as games evolved  into the massive modern marvels enjoyed today.
I’ve noticed that all sorts of useful things are starting to feel outdated by the exponential evolution of touch-screen mobile devices, for business or even home application. The time has come for pocket computers to uplift the iconic timeless business tools that business people have always relied on while bringing technology into the current age. It’s a lot easier to understand the modern relevance of these essential tools when seen through the lens of the augmented reality app. That’s how I’ve come up with an idea of making one place where vast numbers of unique business cards can be crafted and experienced coming to life telling their owners' unique stories, and providing options to also present game-like 3D graphics. I chose 3 major mobile device business tools that are vital for any business, based on various business books, studies, and online articles.
The rest is history - I researched thousands of educational programming sources looking for coding techniques, concise, and useful info! I have followed the trail to some really hard-to-find corners of the web that had only been engaged in single digits, and of course, used lots of popular online channels and communities where people share the information on a diverse range of coding topics.
To ensure it’s easy to explore the collection of business cards, I consulted with over a hundred AR platforms and applications, and collaborated with a team of talented people who got inspired by the idea, and created AR Tool projects of various cool types of printed marketing materials in different styles.
The AR & VR Viewer accumulated knowledge of many people of the past and present, and is energized by popular novels, 3D games and movies, resulting in the unique artefact beyond time and space. But this is just the beginning.

Our work family love nature and one of their biggest complaints whilst out camping is when you've finally sat down for some food or a hot beverage, your kettle or stove falls over. Finding even and stable ground for standard tripods can be challenging itself and when you're out in the wilderness, you don't need the extra hassle.

record.Creator: Lockedin
record.Title: Vacable Auto Vacuum Canister - Keeps Food Fresher for Longer
record.Text:
Vacable is the perfect solution to keep coffee and dry food fresher, longer.  With the automatic vacuum system, Vacable is able to vacuum the air out and preserve the freshness and nutrition of your coffee and food.  And the coolest part is that Vacable vacuums the canister automatically when it monitors lower pressure.





It also offers large capacity, moisture proofing to reduce mildew, it's made from food-grade material, and comes with a date tracker so you can know how fresh your food is.
And last, but not least, it is easy to clean. Just wipe the surface with a damp cloth after using.
Say goodbye to your stale coffee and always have the freshest coffee and food.
















The apple exposed in the air decomposes much faster than the one stored in the Vacable vacuum condition.


Food will oxidize faster when it encounters oxygen, but in a vacuum environment air is prevented from contacting with food, stopping the process of oxidation.





Now your food will stay fresh for much longer because it's not exposed to Oxygen!  Our vacuum-tight environment keeps the air out and that helps maintain the freshness of your coffee beans or whatever food you decide to put in the Vacable.



Now you can enjoy coffee as freshly roasted everyday with Vocable.


There's also a one-way valve that releases carbon dioxide to extend the life and freshness of your coffee beans and food as well.
It's airtight and perfect for keeping mold away for much longer!








A simple push of the button and air is extracted in three seconds.


The lid won’t open when it's vacuum pressured because of our unique science and technology.





Vacable lids have a unique push-button vacuum seal system that allows the coffee beans to vent CO2 and still keep the oxygen out. That’s that sound you hear whenever you open the lid. The secret lies in the lid!  It's easy to use and put on - just twist it on - and once sealed, simply click the left button to automatically extract all the air! And when you want to take it off, simply push the right button, and the container will be deflated and ready to open within seconds.





Automatically adjust the vacuuming time according to the volume of food in the canister.















 Big Enough to Store 1kg Vittoria Coffee Beans.








Made Of Food Grade Premium Stainless Steel


The Vacable is made from high-quality stainless steel so it's completely safe for food storage, and won't leach any chemicals into your coffee beans or coffee grounds. The canister can be hand washed with warm water and soap, but the lid is not suitable for a dishwasher since it has an integrated pump. The lid should be carefully wiped with damp clothes.
Vacable will help your coffee beans retain their depth of flavor and aroma by releasing CO2. Its lid will keep humidity at bay and make sure the air is locked out, so your coffee beans stay dry and fresh!





You can store any dry food, ingredients (tea, coffee, sugar, flour, dry foods,  beans, rice, cookies, coffee, you name it...)





Last but not least, you can also store your lovely pet food and keep it fresh for your pet.










Track freshness to ensure you always have the freshest coffee for you and your guests. On top of the steel clasp, the seal lid is a calendar wheel. Setting the purchase or expiry date reduces waste and puts a stop to throwing precious coffee in the trash. One of the best features of Vacable that you won't find on other airtight containers is our Date Tracker.
This feature is actually way more helpful and cost-saving than you might think!  Instead of forgetting when you stored your coffee beans or other foods, you'll always know when they were stored and if they are OK to eat.
You'll save tons of money by not throwing away food all the time because it will last longer AND you'll know how old it really is!





Please note:  The mechanical only comes in white, and the digital only comes in black.









































Lockedin mainly focuses on the field of vacuum preservation and is committed to creating reliable intelligent preservation products with qualified quality, prolonging the period of food preservation, and reducing waste.
People often throw away food after the best tasting period expires, and the resulting waste of resources is an amazing amount every year. Strengthening preservation can greatly improve this situation from the root, improve the utilization of resources and alleviate the current situation of waste by prolonging the edible time of food. Practicing a strict economy and opposing waste is not only related to cherishing social resources but also means respecting the labor of others. In addition, there is no doubt that preservation is important to retain food flavor and nutrition. High-quality vacuum preservation products can greatly delay the chemical reaction between food and air and ensure its taste and nutrition.
Lockedin hopes to use vacuum preservation technology to create products suitable for the public, meet various storage needs of users, and make use of technology to contribute to the sustainable development of society while improving users' sense of the quality of life and convenience.








Learn more: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1kFBcdsfSM7D8tF8LaST1f0rXa7QLcvzr/view?usp=sharing

00:00

record.Creator: Rony
record.Title: RONY flashlight - an innovative fusion of metal and light
record.Text:
Creates a directed beam in front of you and a scattered beam behind you.
































Rony lights the way for both you and your friends.







































No batteries needed. Simply recharge Rony with a USB-C cable.









There are many advantages to using Rony with a bike. First, the front LED is as powerful as a motorcycle headlamp. Second, the back LED creates a spot of light on the full area you are moving in. At night, while on the road, you will be completely visible to other vehicles.
















Rony is all about putting you in control, giving you six separate modes that start from the lowest setting of just 20 lumens to the highest at 1500 lumens. A simple touch switches you between the modes, making it easy and quick to adjust.




































Add-On



Under direct sunlight, the panel can charge the flashlight up to 10% in 12 hours



 What`s in the box 
















Rony can be recharged with any power source; just use the USB cable in the kit. The charging starts automatically after connecting. Rony knows when the battery is fully charged and automatically stops charging to prevent battery overheating and overcharging.




























Totally ergonomic shape, small weight, and no useless details make Rony the most comfortable and enjoyable flashlight available. It doesn't take much space in your backpack, pocket, or purse.







 Material: aluminum, carbon
 Battery:  4200 mA·h 18650 3,7 V
 L.E.D:  Cree XP -L (V5) / LED Lamp Biom G4 10w
 Weight: 0.207 lb.
 Charging port: USB-C
 Lumens: Front – 1500 lumens / Back - 300 lumens
 Colors: grey, carbon




























Branded flashlights are durable but high priced thanks to smart marketing. We offer the same quality with many more advantages and a reasonable price.






                            Overheat protection











It’s estimated that an astonishing 80% of all metal ever produced is still in use today. Due to the intrinsic value of metal, once made it is rarely wasted; and with good recovery systems in place, it’s possible to achieve recycling rates of 90%. The entire body is made from aluminum, which is infinite in usage. When the lifecycles of both plastic and aluminum are considered, it becomes clear that aluminum is by far, the most environmentally friendly option. 

















Sometimes you don’t get to choose the environment you will be faced with and when things get wet, you will be glad that you have Rony with you. Rony is armored in premium aircraft-quality aluminum and there is no chance that moisture will penetrate inside and damage the inner components. Snow, rain, showers, or storms won’t take Rony out of service. Rony’s light will lead you through those dark and wet situations.






It started with an idea—the idea of a hi-tech and modern flashlight. After countless discussions, we finally realized how the Rony flashlight should be designed and what functions it had to have. At this stage, our industrial designer started to make the first prototype design for Rony. 

The first model was very angular, hardly ergonomic, and looked ordinary, like most flashlights on the market. However, by trial and error, we finally integrated the design and made the flashlight more laconic, smooth shaped, stylish, and comfortable to carry. The final prototype was better than we could have imagined and now you can see it for yourself.
Our first design ideas: 
















 What’s Inside?
As for transparency, we follow the example of Elon Musk. İt is well-known that the Tesla company offers its findings in the open access.We also don't keep our prototype components a secret. To produce Rony, we use durable and premium quality materials. İt can be described as a technical construction with an eye-catchingl design. We hope that this way, you will feel part of the team and see the birth of a unique item with your own eyes.






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00




























































































Our passion is creating the gadgets everyone will love. With the help of an amazing team of young and creative minds, we build unique gadgets for the community that appreciates innovations and exclusive design. By supporting our passion, you’re helping us as we approach our goal - release the best-designed flashlight. Plus, you get to enjoy the results of our development and innovation first. Thank you!

Quick FAQ
1. Whether the bike mount is included in the scope of delivery. 
- Universal bike light holder is included in the basic Rony kit. It is suitable for all types of bikes as it has a universal attachment. 

2. How water resistant is the Rony. Can I dive with it?
- In our experience, no matter how many tests we have done, we have never been able to "sink" the Rony. At least the flashlight meets the basic requirements of IP67 waterproofing. Theoretically Rony should be able to withstand deep diving, but no such tests were conducted 

3. Rony uses two LEDs, does this mean the battery life will be significantly lower than in a classic flashlight with one LED? 
- We use a sufficiently large 4200mAh battery which gives the torch a high power reserve. In addition the rear LED "biom g4 5v" has a very low power consumption. So overall the runtime of the torch is comparable to top manufacturers like Nitecore or Fenix.

4. Can the battery be replaced with another battery? 
- Rony is a flashlight with a built-in battery. The flashlight can be disassembled into components if you wish, but we do not advise you to do so. Your battery will last a very long time, we use high quality Samsung batteries in the design.

5. Why don't you use replacement batteries? 
- For your convenience. To charge a 18650 battery, you need a separate charger. Thanks to the battery built in the Rony is a battery charger in its own right. Therefore you only need a UCB-C cord and a power supply to power the flashlight. 

6. Will my phone charge if I connect it with a Rony.
- Yes, the flashlight has such a function. Its battery capacity is enough to recharge your phone and not to charge it several times in a row.

7. How long does it take to fully charge the roni?
- It takes approximately 3 hours to fully charge a fully discharged battery.

8. Is there a warranty on the roni?
 - A full one-year warranty is provided on all components.                                                     
The warranty does not cover breakage and physical damage to the lantern.

9. Can I use Rony on my bike in the rain? Is it water resistant?
 The lantern is protected against splashing water and dust from any direction

record.Creator: EmbodyMe
record.Title: xpression camera: breaking the mold of virtual communication
record.Text:
What is xpression camera?
xpression camera is an award winning virtual camera app which enables users to redefine their onscreen persona in real time using cutting edge technology. Whether you’re just not quite camera ready, a seasoned content creator, or simply inspired to change your look, the app empowers you to instantly transform your likeness and take full control of your digital narrative.





Instantly transform your digital persona




















Innovative technology, seamless transformations

























We're revolutionizing the virtual landscape
Since its inception, xpression camera has been inspiring people around the globe to reinvent their image while chatting on apps like Zoom, live streaming on Twitch, or creating content on YouTube.
In 2020, our team of engineers endeavored to create a foundational virtual camera platform that is not only entertaining, but practically useful in any setting and for anyone, whether you’re seeking a breath of fresh air–a much needed reprieve from the constant glare of the webcam lens during stressful work meetings, want to put your best face forward in an online class, produce intriguing video content for social media, pursue your own creative project, or chat with family and friends.


























You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































What possibilities arise when you can be free of worry over a cluttered background, or not wearing make-up during your daily meetings?
Or if you could appear in a suit on camera and in actuality be wearing pajamas?





Have complete control over your persona with one click 





The app’s essential aim gives you the opportunity to reinvent yourself in digital form, and establish your footing within the technologically advanced world on our horizon.





A one-stop shop resource for content creators





xpression camera's powerful and innovative technology also functions as a creator platform, supporting an array of meme, gif, cinematic, and social content generators throughout their journeys, from image and video sourcing to creation, with professional tools that help you produce original content to share with friends, business associates, and followers alike. 

Create original audiovisual content for any platform or scenario










Our 3D Dense Face Tracking technology is trained to recognize the face’s precise shape and expressions of the face while simultaneously honing in on over fifty thousand 3-dimensional points.





Our Neural Rendering technology generates natural looking images modeled after the original. With xpression camera, the process of recognizing the source image and the user's face, as well as producing visual components is all done within 0.01 seconds, ensuring a real time in-app experience.
















Operating System: Windows 10 Anniversary Update or newer; macOS 10.15 or newer
Minimum Hardware: Intel Core i5 9400 or AMD Ryzen 5 2600 with 8 GB RAM; Intel UHD Graphics 630 (Compatible with DirectX 12); a webcam or HD webcam; screen resolution of 1024x768
Recommended Hardware: Intel Core i5 11400 or AMD Ryzen 5 3600 with 16 GB RAM; NVIDIA Geforce 1660 or Radeon RX 580



















































 Follow us on social media and share our campaign!
























You can also find us on the net!






Future Prospects
We are developing technology that will allow users to animate images and videos using just voice or text recordings, which will introduce two new mediums through which you can create content while using xpression camera. These features will eliminate the need for users to utilize a web camera while they record themselves and allow for increased flexibility. So if you happen to be doing household chores, partaking in childcare duties, or even jogging, for example, you can still seamlessly enjoy the app.
We are also developing technology that can control the movements of the entire body with the intent to integrate this feature into future versions of xpression camera. With the current app, only the upper half of the body can be manipulated, but we’re working towards giving users the ability to animate the movements of the entire body of the likeness that they present on screen.





This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 1,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $460M raised between them. 





This project is powered by Kickbooster, the first and only tool made specifically for crowdfunders to manage their affiliate, referral, and influencer network all in one place.






Our Ethical Commitment
xpression camera was developed by a team of pioneering engineers dedicated to promoting a healthy and imaginative community centered on AI driven content, because we believe in a future of unbound creativity, powered by deep learning. We strongly support the ethical and socially responsible use of our technology.

record.Creator: KiCA
record.Title: KiCA JetFan: Cordless High-speed Hair Dryer, Air Pump&Blower
record.Text:
4-speed motor, 86,000rpm
with 86,000rpm JetFan is comparable to a high speed Dyson hair dryer





High-performance electric motor able to build a campfire shortly.























JetFan fits perfectly at the palm of your hand, weights only 220g similar to the weight of an apple. JetFan enables you to travel light anywhere.











With its ultra small size, JetFan can fit easily in your pocket just like an iPhone 12 Mini.











Up to 3.5 hours of running-time with USB-C rechargeable battery for added convenience.
*Test in lab environment under the first gear.











Picnic: cleaning up fallen leaves, twigs, and branches during camping.





Build a Campfire: the best way starting a campfire is with strong wind from JetFan.





Hairdryer: Your first cordless hair dryer. Cheers! 





Gap Cleaning: sweep away keyboard or computer dust easily.





Air Pump: Pack a palm-sized KiCA, and you are ready for a camp.











Matted surface made from premium quality steel that leaves no fingerprints.












The customized nozzle concentrates wind into a singular point for added power.












KiCA JetFan can be an air pump, a hairdryer, or dust cleaner…
JetFan brings infinite possibilities, you name it!























































































KiCA is a new brand presented by FeiyuTech, which is a well-known camera & accessories manufacturer.

FeiyuTech is a well-known camera & accessories manufacturer located in Guilin, China, which was established in 2007. The company was founded by a group of engineers, it is one of the longest-established manufacturers in the stabilizer/gimbal industry and is recognized as a gimbal pioneer.

Our team have been developing gimbals especially even before the establishment, and in 2013 we succeeded in developing the first 3-axis handheld gimbal "G3" for action cameras.

As a part of FeiyuTech, KiCA, we bring our cutting edge electric motor technology to KiCA JetFan’s Turbofan and massage gun.

record.Creator: Pozio
record.Title: Pozio: Privacy Control for Smart Devices
record.Text:
With Pozio, you can easily control when your smart phones and smart speakers can and can’t listen to your conversations. Pozio devices utilize state of the art digital signal processing technology to prevent the microphones on smart devices, including mobile phones, from being able to record, process, store, and upload audio to the cloud. Your conversations are protected because Pozio doesn’t store any user information or recordings - furthermore, it isn’t even connected to the internet.







































































Bringing a revolutionary product like Pozio to market is no easy feat. Our team includes experts in the world of cybersecurity, consumer electronics and audio signal processing who put their collective experience together to create a suite of devices that are extraordinarily easy to use and give you the peace of mind that your privacy is protected. Pozio is launching at a critical time when people rely more than ever on the benefits that AI, machine learning and IoT brings, but have good reason to be concerned for their privacy, security and controlling third parties’ access to personal data. 










June 2015: Privacy problem identified, start solving the problem 
March 2020: Engineering begins 
May 2020: First significant proof of concept achieved. We are blocking!    
October 2020: Fully functioning prototype of Pozio Shield 
January 2021: Design patent filed for Cradle (USA), non-provisional patent application filed for microphone jammer, Pozio trademark filed
June - August 2021: Manufacturing vendors and electronic parts secured and ordered
November 2021: Kickstarter Campaign Begins 
December 2021: Cradle production begins 
February 2022: All Cradle models begin shipping
March 2022: All Shield models begin shipping





Pozio leaders have solid track records in start-ups, consumer electronics, privacy and cybersecurity, manufacturing and operations.










Our objective with Kickstarter is to help a passionate group of tech enthusiasts embrace technology and join us in the privacy revolution. People want control of their privacy so they can keep themselves and their personal information safe. We’re here to help do just that.

record.Creator: Leon Story
record.Title: FoCul
record.Text:
FoCul                              





The Pitch
Today’s plethora of social media apps lack one thing, culture. FoCul aims to change that. Now we love memes as much as the next person and can look at them for some time, however once we’re done, we leave feeling empty handed. 

FoCul will aim to focus more on the culture side of social media, not only do we want to celebrate the individual, but we also want to celebrate their culture. Food, music, dance, art, and locations will be focused upon. The app will work like this; instead of searching for people you will search for places, so let’s travel to the South of France. Once you do so on our interactive maps you will be able to see the people who are there, you’ll be able to view their pictures of said attraction, talk to them while they’re there, and some facts about the location. Want to explore the music scene? No problem, just attractions by music and get a list of local musicians, their history, pictures, work, and if you like them, when you’ll be able to see them playing around the town.


Our Goal
Our goal is to bring a more interactive way to explore the world we live in. Unfortunately, most of us will never get to explore the planet to our content, however, with the help of this app we can see how these places are brought to life by the people living in them. You’ll get to interact with people you’d never otherwise knew existed, see places only the locals know about, and travel the world from the convenience of your phone.

record.Creator: WalTech
record.Title: WalTech Smart RV Thermostat: All-In-One Device for RV Owners
record.Text:
My family and I spent many vacations in campgrounds during hot summers and freezing winters.  We would often leave the RV to go site-seeing, and we would set our thermostat to an energy-saving temperature while we were away.  I always thought, "how convenient would it be if I could control my thermostat remotely (like I can do with my home)?"
Given my 30 years of expertise in the HVAC industry, I was able to complete my own DIY project to remotely control the system in my camper, but I realized there wasn’t anything available for my fellow RVers to do the same.  Thus the idea of the RV Smart Thermostat was born!
With the experience of my co-founder and collaborative team of software and hardware experts, we have spent the last 2 years and countless hours designing and innovating an All-In-One smart device for  RV owners around the world. 
Dan Walsdorf
Founder and President
WalTech International, Inc.













Please view the video on full screen to better understand the device features





Since it's a smaller space, your rig can quickly get to extreme hot and cold temperatures which are highly unsafe for your pets.  This year alone hundreds of pets have been rescued and many pet owners have lost their loved ones.
WalTech Smart RV Thermostat monitors the temperature & humidity inside your RV and quickly alerts you if it goes beyond the acceptable limit. 










 WalTech Smart RV Thermostat is both Wi-Fi and Sim card enabled. 
As an RVer, we understand how unreliable campground Wi-Fi can be.  Even when you are boondocking we want your thermostat to be connected to the cloud so that you can control it from anywhere in the world. 





We want you to have complete control.  So to help you understand better. 
We have 2 connectivity options that will enable WalTech thermostat to stay connected to the internet so that you can control your thermostat from anywhere in the world using your mobile app.
Option 1: WalTech is Wi-Fi enabled. So if you have good Wi-Fi coverage inside your rig it connects to the Wi-Fi and stays online.
What if I do not have reliable Wi-Fi inside my RV?
Option 2: WalTech has a built-in sim card inside the device. So if you are not in a place where you have Wi-Fi coverage it uses the best available network around that area and helps the device to stay connected always to the internet.
Is it connected to my personal sim card?
No, It is a separate global sim card that can connect to any available cell tower to help the device connect to the internet.
What are my monthly charges?
First, You can activate and deactivate the sim card using your mobile app. So you are only paying for the months that you use a sim card internet.
For the months that you use a sim card, there will be an extra charge of approximately $5 per month per sim card. 





Be it home or RV, HVAC systems contribute to more than 50% of energy usage.  You can save energy and money by analyzing and controlling your system while you are traveling and having fun.










 There’s nothing worse than coming back to your RV after enjoying a day out, only to find that someone has stolen all of your belongings.  Be it an RV park, storage facility, or your driveway these incidents are incredibly common. 
WalTech Smart RV Thermostat comes with a built-in PIR motion sensor so you don't have to pay extra for security systems.  It will alert you during any suspicious activity so that you can take immediate action to protect your investment. 















 WalTech Smart RV Thermostat can be connected to one cooling unit and two heating units.  If you have two ACs--one in your living room and one in your bedroom--you can install two separate thermostats and accurately measure humidity and temperature. You can connect both thermostats to the same mobile app and control the environment inside your RV from anywhere in the world.  Wiring details are mentioned below.
Later, check out our two-pack thermostat pricing offers.














Regular Smart Home Thermostats like Google Nest and Ecoobee works on 24V AC only. RVs operate on a 12V DC current so thermostats made for an RV should also work on 12V DC. There are a few old RV thermostats out there that work on a 7.5V DC current as well.
WalTech is the only smart RV Thermostat in the industry with patent-pending technology that can operate from the lowest power input of  7.5 to the highest of 32V in both DC & AC.
The comparison chart on voltage and other smart features








100% Money-Back Policy by WalTech
The biggest problem in crowdfunding after the prototype is manufacturing and bringing the product to the market as promised and What is your guarantee as a backer that you will get the value for your money?
Team WalTech is 100% confident about the production and delivery to its backers. If we are not able to manufacture and bring the product to the market as promised, we will refund 100% money to our backer. 





We have spent countless hours researching and designing these features to make this thermostat truly an All-In-One device so that you don't have to spend money on multiple RV gadgets.  WalTech is the most Kickass investment for your RV.









































































































Shipping and fulfillment will be handled by Easyship Collect.  Due to the current volatility of shipping costs, shipping payments will be collected well after the end of the campaign, close to our ship date.  This will allow us to present the most accurate and up-to-date prices to pass savings on to you, our valued backers.  Currently, the approximate shipping charges within the USA are between $9 to $15 depending on your shipping preference.
In that survey you will be able to:

Pay for shipping costs on the spot
Choose from three different carriers: Cheapest, Fastest, Hybrid (Best Value)
For shipping outside the USA, to avoid delays pay for taxes and duties (if due) on the spot
For shipping outside the USA, have the ability to add shipping insurance to the package
























This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 2,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $900M raised between them.

record.Creator: Kathryn Troy
record.Title: ZEAL Remote App - Elevating Remote Working & Living
record.Text:
Have you ever wanted to remote work abroad but not known how to get started or connected?
ZEAL is an App focused on connecting today’s remote workers, avid travelers, and digital nomads with the everything they need to navigate travel for an extended time. 






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































ZEAL harnesses the power of community collaboration to share everything from the best local shops, sights, and adventures to real-time and relevant knowledge, resources, local events and discussions from global travelers. Add in experience from other Nomads about how to best utilize your time abroad, what tools and software to use, and how to Zoom like a pro so you have more time to experience the local attractions. Together we are elevating the experience and standards as global citizens to enable and empower tourism while working from some of the best locations in the world.

For those traveling with ZEAL, you’ll gain access to approved hotels with all the amenities needed to work productively and connect with like-minded travelers. Members will receive substantial discounts to our hotel partners and unique ways to leverage and rent out their homes and car to subsidize this quality of life and even stay at top hotels. The ZEAL App enables special pricing for reservations and partner products and services through our online shopping features.





The pandemic has turned everything upside down and forced the world to go remote. Fortunately, we are seeing many benefits from this digitally connected workforce. Many workers are now able to work when and where they want as long as they have a reliable Internet connection. THIS is a great opportunity for remote workers to live and work in exotic and exciting locations.





However, currently the vast majority of “remote workers” find themselves stuck working from home because they lack the knowledge and connections to make it happen. There are just so many questions… - Is it possible? Is it legal? Is it safe? Are there Internet and hotel facilities conducive for remote working? Who would I spend time together with? What about language barriers?





Today’s digital nomads often experience two major frustrations. One, they grapple with loneliness, without a community to connect with, but enjoy the destination. Or two, they struggle with taking time from work, both physically and financially, to live the lifestyle they desire.

Yet, the interest in ‘Remote Work’ is greater than ever!





With a multitude of emerging programs, groups, and retreats developing there is just one major issue - where does everyone go to connect? There is no united Community & No Seamless Experience for Travelers to Remote Work.





Until Now... Luckily, you now have the choice to go remote. You now have the chance to ...
 Work... Live... Roam.  
 Anywhere. Anytime. With Anyone! 





We need your help to build the ZEAL App & the world’s largest online community for remote working. We are bringing together the knowledge, regional information, and needed products and services for remote workers to remove all their guesswork and uncertainty.





Imagine working remotely with the same comforts of home ... and adventure waiting just around the ... lobby!

 + Rewards 





 + Stretch Goals 





ZEAL Remote is developing an App that is uniting the largest remote working community of brands, destinations, seasoned digital nomads... everything a Remote Worker needs from A to Z to live this active lifestyle, wherever desired.





Imagine a social platform for ALL things remote - living, working, and lifestyle. Where you could connect with like-minded people around the world with similar interests and hobbies.





Imagine having all the checklists and resources to seamlessly know how to take the leap, whether it be for a month... or a year!

As seasoned remote workers having worked intimately in the hospitality and travel sector, we know that not all hotels are well-suited for an extended stay. The needs and demands of long-term travel coupled with the demands of working remotely require different amenities for this type of traveler. ZEAL is collaborating and offering hotels that cater to this extended stay audience where we can curate a community among like-minded travelers.





Imagine making reservations via the App and then walking into ZEAL-Approved properties that are perfectly suited for the needs of remote workers at a fraction of the cost. Better yet, what if ZEAL could show you how to rent your car and home safely to subsidize an even better hotel for you to adventure from?





Imagine being connected to and even purchasing all the products and brands employees and employers alike need to work productively, remotely WHILE having time and money to enjoy the destination. Better yet, what if you could get access to explore the best attractions and experiences of a destination and even get rewarded for sharing your own?






Now, that’s the type of experience we are creating at ZEAL. 
With a background in hospitality and traveling, and a passion to connect people and experiences, we are elevating remote living and making it more accessible to all.

Having visited a combined 247 countries for some 28.5 years our team has navigated nearly all of the pitfalls, issues, concerns, and awesome adventures a new digital nomad may face. We are translating our missed connections, incomplete paperwork, missing luggage, and lonely overnighters into the communities’ guides for seamlessly and effortlessly navigating how to best travel, work, and play to enjoy our new home away from home.





It is a big endeavor. However, the timing is perfect, the technology is ready, and the benefits are huge. With your help, we can create the perfect symbiotic App and Online Community of remote workers who want more from life while helping tourist-based economies that were devastated by the pandemic.





Support the ZEAL App as a Founding Member and receive lifetime benefits and discounts at our growing network of partner hotels, brands, sponsors, and more.
 
  Don't be jealous of those living this life... Be ZEALous and take charge of your remote working and living lifestyle.





 + How the Funds Will Be Used 
While much of the infrastructure exists for this experience in our web-based platform we need to allocate Kickstarter funds to a few areas that will greatly improve the user experience. 
With the addition of travel features and filters that are built specifically for remote workers by remote workers. The platform will receive a new facelift that makes the experience easy and seamless while also developing an App, NEW Desktop and Mobile-friendly experience across devices domestic and international.

Where we plan on using the funds that are raised, include:

 Mobile App Creation - Create the mobile app version of the experience that encompasses all the new functionality and subsequent designs with the ZEAL design facelift. Familiar to many of your favorite apps with similarly integrated features the ZEAL App will provide remote workers the connectivity, communication, and resources needed to comfortably travel and work wherever you are connected. The App will be available in both Google Play & iTunes App Stores.
 
 Travel Feature Enhancements -  Built for community engagement and connectivity, the platform has many of the features that will unite and excite remote workers. However, the travel and remote working related features we seek to add don’t exist, even on other platforms. Through our experience, we will create unique scoring and rating systems for destinations, attractions, hotels, remote working locations and more. These will assist travelers to more easily make lifestyle choices that fit their needs and preferences.
 

Are you a traveler looking to live the Remote Lifestyle? 
Watch this!
