Our members will benefit from the Kickstarter as some of those resources will be used to add additional infrastructure that is more travel and hospitality-oriented. Based on some 28.5 years of remote working and traveling we are adding filters and functionality to inform members about the quality and variety of options they have to best suit their personal needs.


 Regional Convenience Scores - Where should you go? Regional information regarding walkability, safety, English speakers, cost of living, how family-friendly it is, and much more will give members great insight into what to expect about the destinations they travel to.
 
 Add Location & Business -   Similar to Google Maps meets FourSquare and TripAdvisor, ZEAL will have businesses, attractions, and experiences that members can add and share valuable information with others.
 
 Hotel Booking & Filters -  The demands of traveling beyond a few weeks change the type of amenities a remote worker needs. We are building an intuitive solution to search and identify the right accommodation that fits your needs and interests.
 
 Travel Tokens - Users will receive Tokens for their contribution to the community. We’re connecting the gamification of the token system to cryptocurrency for remote workers around the globe to redeem their Travel Tokens for. Earn them by responding to Q&As, upvoting and engaging with content, inviting members, adding a location, review and much more. Use these as digital cash at our partnering hotels and experiences.
 

UI / UX Facelift  -   In adding the new travel-related features it is advantageous to overhaul the entire design and user experience of the desktop and mobile experience. The ZEAL brand aesthetics, simplicity, and flow will be translated into the new platform design. With agency experience and season development partners we will create an incredible user experience that elevates remote working.

Creation of Resources & PDFs & Videos  -   Consolidating and translating all of the experiences, pitfalls, and successes we are documenting everything that an interested remote worker needs from A to Z. From even exploring where to go, how to get there, regional information, remote working tips for employees and employers, productivity hacks, local gym and event information we are set out to create the ultimate knowledge base for remote workers.
 

 + Existing Community Features 





Currently, the platform has this functionality:

 Chat & Message - Group chat or send messages privately to an individual with the ability to add images, attachments, and more.
 
 Events - Connect online for pre-trip questions you may have or network virtually with people going to the same destination or by a specific interest like diving or coding. ZEAL will also host regional retreats and conferences for our members allowing members to virtually attend too.
 
 Knowledge Base - A database of regional and remote working resources from articles to videos, PDFs, podcasts, and infographics around a wide variety of topics. ZEAL will produce and provide many of these while also moderating user-generated content for quality and safety.
 
 Newsfeed -  A familiar timeline feed of relevant curated content based on your interest, activities, and behavior. The platform will personalize each user’s experience and content by interest and regional content of their liking.
 
 Q&A Forum - Inevitably questions will arise. We won’t have all the questions answered and often it is just nice to get answers and personal feedback to the travel or work questions you may have. Other members can share their valuable insight and even upvote quality answers.
 
 Rewarded Behavior -  As members engage, invite, travel and support the ZEAL community they are rewarded for their contribution. ZEAL TravelTokens are real currency that members can redeem at our hotels and brands as real currency. Simply, get value for being of service.
 
 Profiles -  Each member, business, and attraction will have a profile like it would on Facebook or Google Maps. Search by filters to connect and see what others' experience was like.






 + Creation of Resources & PDFs 
Navigating the trials and tribulations of traveling in remote locations among our community and connections of other seasoned remote workers, ZEAL’s founders have a breadth of experience and recommendations to make this process easier for our members. Members can navigate or search specifically for the information they want as well. A snapshot of some of the resources ZEAL will create include:





 + ZEAL Membership Benefits 
At ZEAL we know that everyone’s desired experience and appetite for travel is unique. So, we are creating the go-to platform for all remote travel, work, and living. Our members can live their ideal lifestyle and personalize the timing, pace, and price tag to their liking.






 Remote Work Resources & Checklists -  Step-by-step guides to explore if and how you can easily work remotely. These have best practices and tips from seasoned travelers as well as featured brands and products for each category to seamlessly support remote working with the same comforts of home.
 
 Control of Your Schedule -  No programs, set dates, or agendas. Your schedule is yours with the autonomy to adventure and explore the world on your own time, whether that is for 1 month, 1 year, or more.
 
 Massive Hotel Discounts -  Members that reserve their accomodations on ZEAL  recoup their membership in hotel savings in just one week. With a typical 27% savings for extended stays and an additional 10% off for our VIPs, our remote workers get the best price available for their extended stay with all the rewards and amenities of our approved hotels.
 
 Active Travel Community -  Our community extends offline, bridging and connecting members around the world to experience a destination and a variety of activities with like-minded travelers. Communities are fostered around activities and interests ranging from surfers, yoga, families, dogs traveling with empty-nesters, and many more.
 
 Peer Recommended Locations -  As the community travels, they will be rewarded for adding destination attractions from cafes to waterfalls and beaches. They can also contribute their feedback, scores, photos, and recommendations for others to enjoy.
 
 Convenience & Destination Scores -  Gaining an understanding of the culture and safety of a new destination or even a local cafe will be easy for remote workers to feel confident about their decisions. From seating, noise, and walkability to WiFi speeds and much more, ZEAL arms members with the knowledge they need to find the place for them.
 
 Partnering Brand & Sponsor Discounts -  Traveling for an extended period while working, requires a different packing list. Aligning with brands and products that serve the remote lifestyle, from smart luggage to extended monitors and VPNs, we are passing these savings on to our members - some up to 45% off from our online store.
 
 Connection to Local Amenities -  As travelers settle into a location and their footprint expands outside of their hotel’s immediate vicinity many yearn to immerse themselves into the culture. ZEAL connects members to local events, gyms, healthcare, transportation, entertainment, and more to fully experience a destination through connection.



 Giving Back -  While experiencing and getting ingrained into a local culture evolves over time, many travelers find themselves wanting to support and give back to the locals. ZEAL’s Love for Locals campaign supports local infrastructures, our hotel network’s employees, and their families when in need as well as several other local philanthropic efforts, from teaching English to clean up and restoration services.


 + ZEAL Comparison & Collaboration 





Within ZEAL there is a place for everyone. We are uniting all individuals, groups, organizations, associations, brands, destinations, and governments for a more seamless and connected travel experience.

Our perspective is that collaboration by leveraging our connected strengths is far more effective than the competition. While each of the evolving communities, remote working hotels, and shared spaces have their benefits, target market, and experience, we know that each of those is just right for the right individual. Providing the hub to access and choose the ideal experience for each ensures that everyone benefits from this overarching community and infrastructure.

Thus, we are taking a different approach here in how we compare ourselves to similar communities and programs. We leverage the strengths that each has while providing the community and platform to educate travelers.





Simply, ZEAL is connecting like-minded people, brands, and destinations for an effortless remote living!

 + Community 
Our experience building communities, communication, and engagement channels for local brands, municipalities, and global travel companies gives our members the ideal platform via an app to engage actively and often.  Within ZEAL we foster communities around like-minded interests, experiences, and regions so that our members can connect, support, and play online and off.

At ZEAL, we are:






 Genuinely Curious - The ZEAL community members have a curious mindset around learning about different cultures, other people, and their growth and betterment.
 
 Actively Engaged - Collaboration is valued over competition in the community. We immerse ourselves into the local cultures, engage with one another’s lives and businesses and show up present and ready to add value.
 
 Connect to Community - Whether it is the native local community or the larger online network of nomads, we encourage social engagement. Zeal members will meet up and share their unique experiences as well as support others in their growth.
 
 Support Local - Light touch. High impact. Leaving the destination in a better place than when we found it takes many forms. From shopping at local grocers and stores to giving back in philanthropic efforts, the community reciprocally supports the destinations they get immersed into.
 

While we typically are attracting 25- 55-year-olds that are seeking this flexible lifestyle we alternatively are seeing those that aren’t looking to work but to play and enjoy their life, test, and explore the world, and the next place or even places to stay for their retirement can be tricky. Troubleshooting multiple types of technology, social platforms, and apps to get the information and confidence needed to travel for retirees, ex-pats, and empty nesters can be daunting and often hinder them from making the trip at all.






 + Network & Partners 
At ZEAL we are not solely uniting members, we are connecting and supporting them by bridging governments, media outlets, brands, and influential leaders. Partnering with governments and regional municipalities wanting exposure to remote workers to come to enjoy their destination, ZEAL is driving travelers for extended stays to bolster regional economies.





 + Expansion & Timeline 
ZEAL will be a global community connected to elevate remote living and working experiences. First, we have to start regionally and develop the community online as well as onsite. As we develop and grow the online community we will be launching our first location for ZEAL members to work together around the island of Barbados. From there, ZEAL will expand throughout the more prominent, in-demand, and tourist-friendly countries throughout Central America and the Caribbean. 

  Following the trends of where remote workers want to live and those that have the current infrastructure to effectively do so, we seek to expand throughout Europe and Southeast Asia thereafter. Initially focusing on the hospitality industry and supporting its return following the detrimental impact from COVID, we also see many benefits to fostering community through events, dinners, and music at the hotels. From there, we will expand to other villas, homes, condos, chalets, and bungalows around the world among other accommodations that allow them for extended stays.

Equally, we see a large opportunity to enable remote working domestically. Many drive-to destinations have a variety of activities that a digital nomad could enjoy while having the flexibility to drive or fly somewhere else, even home to regroup, and live this adventurous lifestyle. From Moab to Jackson Hole, San Diego to Key West, people could spend a month or a season from coast to coast.





  + About ZEAL & The Team 
Having experience supporting the hospitality and tourism industry from marketing to revenue management, tour operator experience to remote working programs, the Founders of ZEAL united through COVID to make remote working simpler and safer. The team at Social Capital Agency left their downtown office in Denver to work remotely in Tulum and support the leaders in travelers’ rebound. Working under lockdown, connecting virtually, and eager to push the boundaries of the industry to be more customer-centric, more valuable, more connected. They recognized the ability for the world to stay connected and productive outside the normal walls of their offices. Working virtually and leveraging technology for communication, we have seen organizations normalize remote working and the benefits are huge. Remote workers are more productive and happier than their counterparts and these are not the seasoned digital nomads that have years of experience.

So, why were we not seeing more remote working? 

  Many people were still traveling, and the trends speak for themselves. Airbnb reported that 26% of their bookings for the first quarter of 2021 were for over 4 weeks at a time. We saw companies like Inspirato have limited inventory and be booked out for months. People were still actively paying for travel for extended periods. Yet, the adoption of remote working for a month or a year is not that common. Many have an interest in it but when asking any network of people, there are typically only one or two people that have worked abroad for any significant time.

What is the missing link?





Traveling for shorter periods is easy. People eat out almost every meal and bring enough clothes for their stay. For longer durations, the lifestyle and habits are very different as a traveler immerses themselves into local culture. The nuances and pitfalls are many and it takes a lot of courage to navigate these uncharted territories.

To us, it seemed natural, effortless. With our experience and network within the industry, we saw a chance for everyone to benefit. Thus, the concept of ZEAL was born. With one simple question in mind, how do we share what this lifestyle is like to make it easier for others?

We’ve found many have had the create it and they’ll come mentality. While traveling for less than two weeks maybe that way it takes showing people what the experience of remote working is like and what to expect. Collectively, we decided we had the knowledge, connections, and experience to normalize remote working anywhere that has a stable internet connection.

As we pursue a traveling series around the world’s best remote working destinations, we decided we wanted to get our community involved and supporting us, provided feedback, and engaging to co-create the best and largest remote working community.

+  Follow ZEAL on Social Media  






 + The Team 
Our seasoned team is composed of some of the industry’s best and most innovative businesses in their respective sectors. Covering expertise from marketing and tourism promotion to tour and hotel partnerships for discounts and community managers with a passion for giving back to the local community, we are eager and excited to elevate remote living for all. 

We are:
Kathryn has been in the hospitality industry since she was 16. She has held various positions in banquets, restaurants and hotels, and resorts. You could easily say that hospitality is in her blood. She believes the world is a big place and enjoys exploring all types of new places as well as revisiting her favorites. Traveling by plane, boat, train, or car she loves it all! So far, Kathryn has traveled to just under 70 countries. Meeting with people from different cultures and sampling different cuisines rate at the top of her must-do’s while traveling. She is obsessed with travel planning and is known amongst her friends for always finding the very best things to do in every area. With a bucket list that grows every day, she is trying to reach 100 countries in the next few years. She has been working remotely for twenty years and loves the flexibility it provides and the opportunities to travel.
 
Trevor learned that hospitality was his passion when he was 16, working at a restaurant in the Canadian Rockies. He then moved into the cruise industry, where he traveled all around the world with the sole purpose of ensuring that all his guests were cared for and having the time of their lives. He later went to work for hotels and resorts and learned and loved it just as much. When not working, Trevor loves to travel. He is a pilot and can often be found landing at new and exciting destinations. His father planted the travel seed early on, leading by example his dad has traveled to over 130 countries! Trevor has traveled to just over half as much as his Dad and is eager to beat the family record. Trevor has been working remotely for fifteen years and is often seen combining business and pleasure during his travels.

Eric and Devon founded Social Capital Agency was founded with the concept of quality of work-life balance, even integration was important. That’s why our motto is 2 Parts Fun and 1 Part Business and we believe that people can be even more productive, healthy, happy, connected, and inspired when they are passionate about the impact they are leaving. With our passion being to empower people to travel and experience the world more easily we work with hotels and destinations to support local tourism economies. As Covid hit and we retreated to Tulum for a month to work remotely we recognized how tough it can be for most to navigate traveling for extended periods and balancing working remotely. 

  We saw an opportunity to share our knowledge, insights, connections, and partners to make remote working more accessible. Supporting hotels and local communities by connecting people and experiences in a seamless way that benefits all may be what our agency does but we are all avid travelers and love connecting with people ourselves. From backcountry snowboarding to scuba diving, climbing and wakeboarding we love supporting the brands that fuel our passion while bringing together communities to support them.
 
Travis and Jason are avid travelers with a passion for remote work and community building. They met as early employees at Remote Year, a venture-backed travel startup redefining how remote workers live and travel.
 
During their time at Remote Year, they worked together to build and manage 60+ communities of remote workers, owned internal and external initiatives to build remote culture and planned and executed a series of offsite events. Most importantly, they met thousands of remote workers and learned what made for successful remote companies.

Bringing a combined 10+ years of remote work experience along with their record of accomplishment of assisting 1,000's of individuals in their transition to remote work, they decided to create Sprawl Consulting to help usher in the new generation of remote-friendly companies, full of long-term, happy and productive employees.






 + Love for the Locals 





 + Development Timeline, Launch & Rollout

record.Creator: Sportneer
record.Title: The World's First Smart Ankle Weights.
record.Text:
The Sportneer TrainNTrack Ankle Weights, a first-of-its-kind product for the fitness industry, are integrated with a motion sensor and heart rate chip to monitor workout intensity and performance level, helping everyone from the beginner to the fitness professional train smarter and more intentionally.





1. Global Industry First 
The Sportneer TrainNTrack Ankle Weights are the industry’s first smart ankle weights to help people of all fitness levels train more intentionally.





2. Highly Precise Motion Sensor 
Heart rate monitors and a 6 axis gyroscope sensor, equipped with 3 axes to measure the rate of turn and 3 axes to measure acceleration, enable data collection and track the movements of a workout with high precision.





3. Big Data Analysis 
The TrainNTrack Ankle Weights have a mega database with a high level of AI learning. The greater the user’s base, the better at analyzing the result of the exercise.





4. Innovative Materials
Soft iron stuffing is not only comfortable on the skin, but it's able to hold its shape without being shifted, providing durability, versatility, and comfort for every training session.










1. In-App Free Training Tutorials
In the current smart fitness market, most systems have a relatively high barrier to entry, especially for the amateur or beginner athlete, with costs ranging from $1,500 to $4,500, not including monthly membership fees for access to classes. The Sportneer TrainNTrack Ankle Weights fulfill the gap of the beginner-friendly smart fitness market and break the high barrier of entry by offering the most accessible and cost-effective equipment and tutorials for amateurs and beginner athletes.
The Sportneer App has 8 different training lessons and offers over 71 exercises. The app is free for every Sportneer user and new lessons are updated monthly.





2. Training Scoring System 
To motivate users to improve, a scoring system is used to provide value to each workout. The higher the accuracy, the higher the score, encouraging users to surpass themselves with each training session through results that are visual and easily understandable.





3. Heart Rate Warning 
A built-in heart rate monitor helps users be more aware of their overall state, performance, and workout fatigue and helps prevent arrhythmia, a sudden cardiac death caused by abnormal heart rhythms. When the heart rate is over the normal interval, the TrainNTrack Ankle Weights will vibrate non-stop reminding the users to take a break, helping them understand when to turn up or turn down the intensity of a workout.

4. Long Battery Life 
The TrainNTrack Ankle Weights were originally designed to last more than 25 hours, meeting daily exercise needs for more than a month. In the new version, we've upgraded the battery life to 35 hours, an increase of 10 hours over the previous version. Further extend the battery life, freeing you from recharging after each training session.





5. Comfort 
Unlike conventional ankle weights, the TrainNTrack Ankle Weights are constructed with innovative materials like soft iron stuffing that hold its shape without being shifted, providing durability, versatility, and comfort for any workout. 





6. Trainer Qualification 
The TrainNTrack Ankle Weights were designed with the science of sports engineering and have been developed and tested by Sportneer’s resident personal trainer.










1. What is a 6-axis gyroscope? 
The technology that supports the scoring system within the Sportneer App is the 6-Axis Gyroscope, which is a sensor with 6 degrees of freedom: 3 axes to measure the rate of turn and another 3 axes to measure the acceleration. To be more specific, it combines the 3 Cartesian coordinate axis accelerometers with a sensor that takes gyroscopic measurements along these 3 axes: pitch, roll, and yaw. Since they are capable of measuring acceleration forces and speed, as well as the orientation of gravity, these sensors are widely used in modern technology, such as in aircraft, digital cameras, unmanned vehicles, and navigation systems.

2. Big Data Analysis 
The TrainNTrack Ankle Weights have a mega database with a high level of AI learning. The greater the user’s base, the better at analyzing the result of the exercise.
Users receive a detailed summary of each workout, including statistics on training education, calories burned, and how accurately the exercises were performed.













Simple yet Effective Exercises You Can Do at Your Desk！





 Are tough and will work your tail off.





 Boxing Workouts with friends to Get You in Lean Fighting Shape.












Product size, colors, and tutorial on how to measure your wrist and ankle and choose the right size.






























Sportneer has been serving professionals and amateurs of all ages who love sports, fitness, and the outdoors. Just like the compound word “Sportneer”, we successfully blend sports and engineering. In the spirit of healthy living and the pursuit of perfection, we aim to provide the best products and services that enable a stronger, healthier, and happier you! Our brand is rapidly growing thanks to our steadfast commitment to these values. Athletic professionals even agree that Sportneer is a reliable, professional sports brand.

record.Creator: Vladislav
record.Title: SMALT: The World's First Interactive Centerpiece
record.Text:
Overview
SMALT is the perfect complement to any meal and a great way to shake up the night! Play your favorite music through SMALT’s impressive Bluetooth speakers and set the mood with multi-colored lighting.  Plus you can track your salt intake for a healthier dining experience. Get a pinch or exact measurement of salt directly from SMALT or with our easy-to-use app. SMALT can also be used with Alexa, so upgrading your health and smarthome is easy!





SMALT is primed and ready to entertain and delight your guests anywhere you choose to dine. It's easy to stream music, switch up the mood lighting, or dispense salt using the device or get advanced features with the app. SMALT can be use with iOS and Android and is compatible with Alexa, so there's more than one way to have fun and interact with this versatile centerpiece.











SMALT features everything you need to enhance your dining experience and add flavor to your meal!

A fun and intuitive salt dispensing system
Crisp & powerful bluetooth speaker to stream your favorite music
Multi-colored lights to set the mood right
App and device enabled functionality
Interfaces with Amazon Echo






Bring the Flavor
SMALT dispenses salt with a shake/pinch of your smartphone screen or simply turning the dial manually, allowing you to be in control of the amount of salt you serve. Simply choose the amount of salt you desire and it will dispense into a small, removable tray. It's easy and SMALT does all the measuring for you!










Pump Up the Volume
Turn it up a notch with one of the best performing portable bluetooth speakers. Stream your favorite music to get the party started or relax at dinner with your favorite Jazz music. Want to take it outdoors? Sure, it’s meant to go wherever you go.





Light Up the Room
Enhance your dining ambiance with color-changing mood lighting.  Transform your everyday dining into an extraordinary experience.





 SMALT - The Perfect Meal Companion! 










1 in 3 Americans have high blood pressure and many more are at risk. Because of this, many Americans have to control their salt consumption. SMALT offers an easy and fun way to monitor and control your consumption using smart tech. Whether it’s a pinch or an exact measured amount, SMALT can be an entertaining way to keep you on track towards a healthier heart.
















Clean and modern, SMALT is ergonomically designed to fit perfectly in one hand. Place SMALT on the dining table, kitchen counter, patio area, rooftop, or take it camping.

The perfect fit at 7.25 X 2.75/3.63
Sleek, modern design makes SMALT a sexy way to entertain
Conversation piece
Rechargeable batteries that last up to 16 hours






SMALT is easy to use with or without the app. Featuring intuitive design, SMALT makes setting the mood with light and sound an easy way to maximize your dining experience.

Single control button on the back makes switching between modes easier.
Bright LCD screen offers a convenient user interface.
A dial on the device allows you  access to all standard features manually. Play music, adjust the lights, or measure & dispense salt all with the touch of a button. Many of the advanced functions are available when used with the SMALT app.
Can be used with Amazon Echo, Alexa and Google.






Use the app for advanced features, as well as a fun way to get the right amount of salt!

Supported by iOS and Android.
Use the app as a hassle-free way to dispense salt.
Adjust the amount of salt from a pinch to a tablespoon and any amount in between






You can also dispense salt virtually with intuitive hand gestures! Simply shake your phone to shake out salt or pinch the screen of the smartphone to dispense a pinch of salt. There’s also a function if you just want to “eyeball” the amount.

SMALT connects with Amazon Echo to provide users with voice interface! Simply ask Alexa to dispense the desired amount of salt and SMALT takes care of the rest!
Use the SMALT app to track your sodium consumption. Users can set the app to reduce intake over time.
















Get ready to rock or mellow out with your favorite tunes streamed right through your SMALT!

High-end Bluetooth speakers
Powerful mood lighting
Control the powerful ambiance light and amazing sound quality from the unit itself or the app
Stream your favorite music with SMALT






One of the most basic human needs is the need for belongingness. For centuries, one of the ways we have fulfilled this need is by gathering around the dinner table, a place where we connect, appreciate and feel appreciated. SMALT is our effort to further enhance this experience - all with the important benefit of watching your salt intake. Our goal is to entertain and engage you, your friends, and family with an enhanced dining experience that let’s you set the mood and monitor your sodium intake











Q: How is salt dispensed from SMALT?
A: Simply use the button and dial system on the device to choose and dispense the desired amount of salt or use the app for more advanced functions. Once the salt is dispensed into the tray below, simply remove it and add salt to your dish or pick up the SMALT itself and sprinkle on your plate.
Q: How is SMALT different from Amazon Alexa?
A: Alexa is a voice interface for connected home devices. Using a simple voice command you can ask Alexa to dispense salt from your SMALT.  SMALT has a built in mood- light and SMALT measures and dispenses salt. Alexa does not have these functions.
Q: Can I put pepper in SMALT?
A: Yes, you can.
Q: How do I change the mood light color?
A: You can control the mood light directly from the SMALT unit by turning the dial or from your smartphone via the SMALT App, which gives you the freedom to choose the desired color and set the perfect ambiance for any occasion.
Q: Do I have to have the SMALT App to operate SMALT?
A: No, all standard functions are available on the SMALT unit itself.  You can change the mood light color, control the speaker, and dispense salt easily with the touch of a button.
Q: Do I need the SMALT app?
A: All standard functions are available on the SMALT unit itself,  but you need the SMALT App to access other additional features such as  the Shake, pinch, and pour feature, mood light programming,  and salt tracking .
Q: How long is the battery life?
A: SMALT comes with a 9.6V rechargeable battery. Normally it takes around an hour to charge the battery and when fully charged, the battery lasts up to 16 hours.
Q: How can I stream music from SMALT?
A:  You can pair SMALT with your phone to stream music through SMALT’s Bluetooth speaker.
Q: How much is the shipping cost?
A: The shipping is free. We will cover all the shipping costs wherever you are.
Q: How can I clean my SMALT?
A: The Best way to clean your SMALT is with a damp cloth.
Q: Can I really shake salt from my Smartphone?
A: Yes, you can!  Using the SMALT app, you can shake your phone or pinch the screen to dispense salt.  With these simple actions  the desired amount of salt gets dispensed in a small removable tray at the bottom of your SMALT.
Q: What different types of salt can I use with SMALT?​
A: SMALT is designed to be used with common table salt.
Q: Can I use SMALT to grind sea salt or other coarser salts like Himalayan salt?
A: SMALT does not grind salt.  You can use any pre-ground with a consistency similar to the table salt with SMALT.
Q: How do I know what setting to use when I am preparing different foods?
A: You can dispense salt in amounts as low as a pinch or as high as one tablespoon with several denominations in between.  The amount you pick is dependent on your taste or dietary restrictions.
Q: How can I track my sodium with the SMALT App?
A:  Every time you dispense salt, the amount of sodium gets logged.  Each serving of sodium is tracked by the app.  You can track each family member’s consumption separately.
Q: How can SMALT help me if I am on a restricted sodium diet?
A: Excessive salt consumption is becoming a big health problem worldwide. Most Americans consume twice as much salt than what’s recommended by the American Heart Association.  When cooking with SMALT, you can choose the low sodium meal setting from your SMALT App.  This setting helps with preparing low sodium meals conveniently as recommended by the AHA guideline.

record.Creator: George Agapiou
record.Title: Samurai by JetProd - Electric Surf
record.Text:
Samurai by Jet Prod
 
The Samurai has been something we have been dreaming before we knew what that would be. Windsurfing has been our summer hobby which we did every day! We rarely missed a sunrise without the cool wind in our hair and the sea in our grasp while we glided through the waves. We thought to ourselves; is there something more to it? Then we started experimenting and researching different ways to make the simple surfboard, something which would revolutionize the industry but as always having in mind the reason we try to tame the waves, have fun!
We at Jet Prod. Want to create a jet-powered wakeboard which doesn't require wind, is easier to control but harder to master. Creating and designing it isn't an easy task, considering the amount of jet-powered wakeboards out there in the market who have a lot more than 2 people making their dreams come true. Our primary focus is the price, speed of the wakeboard and the weight it can carry. Due to the demand of the wakeboards by the surfing community, our designer and engineer is being extremely cautious in to what kind of materials we will use and the cost of said materials. The Samurai will be efficient, capable of *by approximation* no more than 120kgs/264lbs and keep its retail price lower than the industry average.






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































Features of the product
The Samurai board will be equipped with:
● A carbon fiber impeller
● Electronic flaps which will be controlled by the rider on hand and deploy the e-brake (will go into more detail below)
● Hydrodynamically shaped slim wakeboard for optimum maneuvers (will go into more detail below)
● Maximum Velocity 35 knots (64km/h) 200kgs (440lbs) of force
● Jet drive diameter 90mm
Jet prod offers a cozy environment and conducive atmosphere for a great business. We set and maintain the highest standard of quality and ethics in everything we do. We will provide perfect, excellent, and reliable services to our customers. We will work hard in order to earn the trust of our customers, employees, partners, and our community and keep developing our products with the utmost attention to detail. Under the cooperation of a determined and united team of management staff; we are expertly led by an open-minded individual whose dedication to helping others achieve their goals in this extremely important passion.
With many years working hands-on with the technology and components used, at Jet Prod, even with the constant and consistent change in the jet-powered wakeboard sphere, we ascertain that our customers will be provided with best tools to have the fun they are promised when trusting our product. Providing our products at a reasonable price, way lower than our high end competitors, is our paramount goal.
A key factor of business we shall not handle with levity is customer satisfaction. We will ensure the highest quality of services at all time to meet or surpass our customer's expectation. We will ensure that every customer’s needs and requests are duly and properly noted to offer our services to the high standard they should receive. All our services will be customer-tailored and specifically designed to meet & exceed expectations. Up-to-the-minute and workable jet-powered wakeboard production plan will be laid down as elementary as possible for customers to easily comprehend and implement for the company’s success and growth.
Paramount marketing strategies proven to boost business publicity and awareness will be carried out to ensure the necessary awareness and advertisement is achieved for our company both locally and nationally. Social media platforms will be fully utilized; such as Instagram & Facebook as well as the word of mouth which is a powerful marketing strategy even in times like these.

Mission Statement
The electric waterjet industry is filled with various types in many different price points. The wakeboard which we will supply to our customers may not have the same appeal to enthusiasts as already established wakeboard companies have the market cornered. By utilizing the technological knowledge we possess, we will create a product which will have a price depicted by today’s economy but at the same time be of the highest quality. Since, 3D printing has been made available to everyday users, Jet Prod will invest in this revolutionary method in order to create the small items needed to operate the wakeboard Samurai.
We will create the mold for manufacturing the wakeboard and create the water jet by using the 3D printer therefore the cost will be as low as we can possibly so can everybody have access to this experience. The water jets have been made with great success and one of the wake board’s features is the E-brake. Since, not everyone is a professional rider, we will create a mechanism which halts the board the moment the rider loses his balance and falls into the water, the board will be up to 5 meters away from the rider. In addition, the E-brake methodology includes a flap creating a camber line larger than the jet surf axis, increasing the lift factor on the back edge of the surf to minimize the time it takes surfs to start planing in the water.
The wakeboard itself has been designed to be thin and weigh less than 10kgs and the battery less than 15kgs. The weight is the most competitive aspect in retrospect to other wakeboards in the industry. The electric motor which will be used will be 22kw and will produce 12Nm of torque at 6000rpm. The power of the water jet in static mode (This is the mode when the wakeboard is fully stopped, when it’s speeding the power is increasing above the numbers mentioned above) and the water jet’s motor thrusting force will be almost 200kgs.This has been made possible due to the exceptional design of the water jet.
Lastly, this product will be competitive in the market for these three reasons below,

 Innovative design
 
 Mechanically and electrically more weight to power ratio
 
 Price of the wakeboard 60% less than what’s is available
 










In the following video we present some footage of testing the first prototype electric surfboard. Everything its our design and creation except electric motor, battery pack and wireless controller.

Target Market
Our company aims to grow in the thriving market of water sports. The water sports market has a steady upward trend and analysts predict that it will keep its upward trend until 2025. The most popular water sports consist of windsurfing, kite surfing and puddle surfing between ages 15 to 50 years old. The puddle surfing's popularity increased due to the global pandemic which came into effect by the shopping boom worldwide. Although, the past year it is slowly began to not be as trending as the early pandemic days. We aim in making the motorized surfing the leading water sports industry. By creating innovative and new surfboard models but also low prices, we are directly competing with the companies which have a large customer list. The demand for this specific water sport is not that great, due to not being as popular as other ones, which we at JetProd have a big inclination to change that. Creating advertising campaigns which main purpose will be to make the customer keen to try this new mode of entertainment, to accomplish that we will sell the board as a mode of "renting" on touristic attracted areas and make in known both in Greece and other countries.

Sales forecast
According to our research, in the first year the sales will be only from professional water sports rentals in many well-known beaches in Greece. We estimate that in the first year we will have 240 orders at the price of 6.5k€. In the third year we will present a second model SAMURAI II, to increase the number of sales, and recognition by the public. The second model will be sold with a price increase of 9.5k€. SAMURAI II will be high – end board with key features of the automotive industry. At last, the third model will reveal at the end of the fourth year and will be named Aris Pro. Aris Pro will be the first model in the world, with self-charger. With our experience we will include a photo voltaic system on the board, where will powered up the board. Aris Pro price will begin from 10.5k€. In the fifth year the old models’ price will be discounted.





Cash Flow
Observed below is the IRR of five years being operational is 20% and also 29% exponential increasing profit over the five year plan is the Compound Annual Growth Rate. Lastly, we analyzed the risk of having a drop in sales of 30% from year one up to year five the IRR index is still at 10% in the specific five-year span.





Management Team & Organization
A clear mission gives purpose and direction to every team, in order to reach its goals and overcome every barrier and obstacle. JetProd’s team has a clear mission, to produce an innovative solution and an immense service in the field of water sports fun. Furthermore, our vision is to build a product, which has a great value proposition for the customer and gives him/her a unique sea experience, by using our jet board technology. In addition to that, we want to create something new, smart and differentiated from what is on the market, something that will make us innovators. When you are accompanied by individuals, who have the same purpose with you it is more likely to succeed.
George (CEO/ CTO): George has an Integrated MSc in Aeronautical Engineering and a BSc in Mechanical Engineering by the National Technical University of Athens. He has been working for 6 years in his business of Household machines service and is specialized in Technical Research and Business Development. George is the CEO and CTO of JetProd.
Nikos (CFO): Nikos has a BSc in Shipping from Business College of Athens. He has been working in his own business with Space Parfums located in Athens. He is specialized in Financial and Marketing Research. Nikos is extremely interested in technology with an innovative mindset. He is going to be CFO of JetProd and head of R&D.
Nefeli (CMO): Nefeli has a Certificate of Music Production / Music Therapy, and a certificate of Yoga Instructor. She has been working for 6 years in a company of Tourism activity and for 4 years until now she has been working in a Telecommunication company in Athens as a CFO. She is very analytical and has the necessary marketing skills. She is going to be the CMO of JetProd.





This is our team... so far.

Timeline
The following two months will strongly focus on making a friendly workstation for employees and start to design a perfect board. Our target is as long as we design and manufacture the board, we will check it instantly for functionality and about safeties for the rider. At the end of the third month, we will have a tested prototype board where we will start to manufacture this in mass production, and by the time we will start to advertising in social media and in some places with touristic population.





Your Contribution
With the functional design already laid out, all there is left to do is build the prototype to test and double check to see if any last-minute items should be added or changed. Your investments in the Samurai will make that possible and bring this project to life!
Creating new designs of hardware and technology can be expensive the first time around, and generate high initial costs for things like tooling, prototyping, sourcing of material and labor costs.
That is where your contributions take action. Your pledge will be used towards creating the JetProd prototype, for research and development, and eliminating those obstacles of upfront fees.
Once the prototype is created, the tests will involve various  tests that will be documented before the official release date.
Once the Samurai has been tested, tried and proven, the goal is to have it available for ordering online from our website as a final product for all to enjoy on all coasts of the world.
Our overall goal is to source all materials completely from Greece, which will give opportunities to small local shops. Your contribution will help with that as well.
Your pledge will also give us a chance to effectively advertise through social media, businesses, online, and through our local beach stores right here in Athens!
Not only will your contributions help bring the best out of ourselves but you will also give this project and my small business the chance to be seen and heard by others who love to build and create.

record.Creator: RE:BALLS
record.Title: Wooden Mobile Coffee House
record.Text:
WOOD STRUCTURED MOBILE COFFEE HOUSE
Why choose a wooden structure as the main material for a mobile café?  In total, Finnish forests grow more than they are utilized each year.  Wood is a truly ecological option because it is the only completely 100% renewable natural material.
Finland is one of the best tree growing areas in the world.  The growing season is quite short, only 100 days a year.  The growth of a tree from a small seedling to an adult log takes about 60-120 years.  Slow growth produces high-quality raw material;  low and small-branched, straight-stemmed, symmetrical, dense, and straight-grained wood.
The RE: BALLS hospitality unit is made up of a two-level unit where the main floor is used as an entrance hall and bar service with a large terrace. The upper floor has four areas: two offices, a meeting room for 10 people and an open space with three tables and a living room. The awning attached to the truck has approximately 120 square meter and a capacity for 100 people, next to a terrace and a bar area where all kinds of drinks and  cocktails are served.
This hospitality is a very versatile mobile unit, since it can be built only with the main unit for smaller events and the complete assembly, mobile unit with the awning, for events where they invite hundreds of people.
A great way to bring a product or event directly to the customer.  In one shipment, the 45-foot container unit is converted into an almost triple event space with a total of about four 40-foot containers.  It is equipped with air conditioning, LED lighting and other technical features, offering a lavish 120 square meters of space for customers at festivals, markets, fairs and events.



Outdoor draft picture





Second floor draft picture





LVL TIMBER (Main Constuction Material)

record.Creator: Xavian Romeu
record.Title: The Latin Resistance
record.Text:
My dream was always to be able to study Computer Science, thanks to personal effort and the help of my family, a year ago I managed to start studying for this degree. As soon as I started, I realized that many concepts were difficult to understand. The reason is that I grew up in a Spanish-speaking Caribbean country. Many of the terms were difficult for me despite having lived in the United States for almost twelve years and speaking fluent English. I immediately thought the solution is to start looking for documentation in Spanish. I spent almost a week researching different articles and sources from Universities, however, the more I read, the more confusing it became for me. I realized that I understood less in Spanish than in English. The reason is that many immigrants learn to think in English and forget some words and concepts in Spanish. Another reason is that we are mostly exposed to English in everyday activities, such as listening to music, watching TV, spending time with friends, etc. Then I began to learn these terms in Spanish and English and I realized that my brain absorbed the contents faster. Unfortunately, in this school year I have been able to observe many of my classmate's struggle with the same problems, many, although they are very intelligent and disciplined, do not manage to do well in classes due to the language barrier.

That is why I would like to open a YouTube channel, a website, and a podcast where I can do tutorials, and write blogs where I help Spanish-speaking students to better understand classes such as Mathematics, Computer Science, Philosophy, etc.

record.Creator: Walter Dulnigg
record.Title: Hallotag Multi-Media Sticker
record.Text:
Make your Gift Memorable 🤩
Surprise your loved ones like you have never done before. 🎁 With the brand new Hallotag-Technology©️ you can let your gift speak for you 😮 You heard right, your gift speaks for you !!! But how does it work? A simple sticker with a NFC Chip on it makes the magic possible. Simply stick the Hallotag sticker on your gift and record your personal congratulations with the free Hallotag App on it. 🎉 Your loved ones can view and play your multi-media CONGRATULATIONS WITHOUT OPENING AN APP. Let your loved ones experience special moments and you will stay unforgettable.





Memorable 🤩 / End2End 🔒 / NO App2Scan 🚫






Made in Austria 🇦🇹 / With Social Institutions 😀

Play

ABOUT US
Our ambitious vision: Make your gift memorable!
Everybody loves to look for gifts for loved ones, for relatives and friends. We believe that there are many people who have the same problem like us,  it is often difficult to find something suitable that doesn't  just stand around somewhere gathering dust.
But what does it mean to give gifts?
From our point of view, it's about
· Giving a real and lasting memory to them
· Surprising them
· Touching them
· Make them laugh and
Being very close to your loved ones and thus to remain memorable.
And that was exactly the trigger for our innovation, namely to enhance gifts with touching emotions (whether it is vouchers or household aids, billets, etc.) .
In order to realize this vision, HALLOTAG developed an overall solution consisting of
· A free Hallotag app and
· A system conforming to an NFC Hallotag sticker
With the help of the free app, emotional videos, audios, images and texts can be easily recorded contactless.
The one for whom the gift is meant
· DOES NOT need to download an app
· DOES NOT need to start any app
They simply hold the back of his mobile phone to the sticker and the fabulous winter video or the grandchildeb songs are automatically displayed and played.
At this moment the gift is connected to the touching emotions of the winter video, the lovely child's songs. The gift remains memorable.
The development was based on the KISS principle (Keep It Simple, Stupid) and is therefore very easy to use for EVERY age group.
From the beginning it was very important for us that we rely on 100% Austrian added value, from conception and development, graphic design and marketing to production. In the fabrication of the sticker, we work together with Austrian social institutions who manufacture the stickers with enthusiasm.
The development of the Hallotag system started in 2017. In 2019, a number of test phases were executed in the market to make the system ready for the market. At the beginning of 2020 Hallotag was ready for the market and we started online sales in Austria, UK, BRD, DK.
For business partners we developed additional features that are useful for the business partner. We cooperate with, among others, ÖsterreichischenPost AG and wellness gift provider Wellcard.
The company, based in Graz, Austria, has set itself the goal of making Hallotag the global market leader in the field of multimedia stickers.
With a team of 15 experienced engineers, graphic artists, social media experts, social institutions and in close cooperation with the Technical University of Graz, we are already working on future innovations for our vision: "Make your gift memorable"






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































FAQs Hallotag
What are the advantages of Hallotag over other scanning technologies?
o No app needs to be installed or started to read the Hallotag sticker.
o The Hallotag sticker cannot be duplicated by simply photo copying it.
o The Hallotag sticker can be "privatized / encrypted" and only be played back by the person for who the sticker is intended.
o Optical scanning technologies cannot read the scan area anymore due to e.g. dirt, scratches or vandalism.
o The Hallotag sticker can be graphically designed with impressive designs, depending on the customer's wishes.
o Data can be stored directly on the Hallotag sticker
Do I need to register to download the Hallotag app?
NO, the app can be "downloaded" for free from the App Store without entering registration data.
Can the sticker be scanned without an app?
YES, practically all Android smart phones support NFC. Android devices are delivered with an activated NFC interface by default. You can activate or deactivate the interface in the settings / connections.
On iPhone models newer than iPhone 6, the NFC interface is activated by default and cannot be deactivated. For older iPhone models (7,8,X), please install the Hallotag app to scan the sticker and start the VIEW function to view the multimedia elements.
For iPhone models (Xs, 11, 12,…..) there is not app needed the scan the sticker.
Do you need an Internet connection to play or scan?
YES.
How many multimedia elements can be added to the sticker?
Currently 6 images, 1 video, 1 audio and a text message can be added to the sticker.
Can the sticker be used a second time?
When creating the sticker, you have the option of replacing selected multimedia elements with new ones. As soon as the sticker has been created with the final elements and you press the "FINALIZE" button, changes are no longer possible.
Can the sticker be privatized/encrypted for a specific person?
YES, the sticker can be encrypted for a specific person using the "PRIVATE" function so that only that specific person can scan the sticker. The function "PRIVATE" can be found in the menu on the top right corner ⁞ when creating the sticker.
Can the sticker be applied to all materials?
YES, except on metallic surfaces.
Can I answer the "Creator" of the sticker directly when the sticker is scanned?
YES, you can use the “ANSWER” function to reply directly to the “creator” of the sticker.
How do I find the appropriate NFC scanning position on the rear side of my phone?
On iPhone models, the scanning position is on the upper edge of the rear side of your phone.
For Samsung devices, depending on the model the scanning position is located either on the upper edge or in the middle area of the rear side of your phone.
On Huawei devices, the scanning position is on the upper edge of the rear side of your phone.
What is the required scanning distance?
You should hold the appropriate scan position at the rear side of your phone at a distance of less than 1 cm to the sticker.
Can multimedia elements from the gallery be used?
Yes, you either use multimedia elements from the gallery or the elements are recorded live when you add them to the sticker using the Hallotag app.
How do I get a sticker?
The stickers are available in all Austrian post offices or in the webshop (www.hallotag.com).
Where are the stickers made?
In Austria with the help of social institutions. We rely on local value creation.





For example: Make your Fathers Day Memorable
or birthday, wedding, christmas, valentines day, mothers day, and much more...

record.Creator: Tony Marchuk
record.Title: Pu Clock: Distraction-Free Meditation
record.Text:
Meditation is hard. We want to fix that.
A stressed-out optimist and an over-thinking realist admitted to each other that they were both meditation failures. After airing all their excuses they realized that there was a common theme; they were both highly distracted by their phones.



Meet the founders! Tony (left) Ryan (right)



Phones are distracting
Tony and Ryan  tried all the meditation apps, but something about the mere presence of having a phone in the room pulled them away from true mindfulness meditation. 



Phones draw in our focus and pose a serious distraction


They scoured the interwebs for a basic meditation  timer, but everything they tried had a startlingly loud and abrasive alarm or overly complicated functionality which counteracted any benefit they had just received from sitting peacefully.
Let's fix meditation
So they decided to design their own meditation timer that was stripped of fancy features like WiFi and Bluetooth, and had one purpose: meditation.
Our Philosophy
As child philosophers, Tony and Ryan wanted this new venture to create a lighthearted and pragmatic approach to meditation, so they came up with the name Pu. This elicits a giggle from their inner child, but also nods to the philosophical concept of Pu or the “uncarved block.” This is the state of pure potential which is the baseline condition of the mind.
They hope that this clock will help others find the peaceful disconnect they themselves sought as mindfulness meditation practitioners.
As a "Thank You" for your support, you will receive your Pu Clock(s) from the first run funded from this Kickstarter. Then you can join Tony and Ryan in ditching the phone; focusing on the here and now, one breath at a time. 










Full 360 of the PU Clock



Simple, two-button operation
The design is a barebones, minimal cube with two buttons. That's it.You don't need to read a manual or mess around with countless buttons and dials to begin your meditation journey.



Simple and intuitive design




Setting your ideal meditation time
When not in use, the clock shows the time, but push a single button to switch to meditation mode and add minutes to your timer. Then push the start button and begin your meditation with a singing bowl chime. Simplicity is key in a meditation timer and a meditation practice.



Setting the meditation timer



Wake up on the right side of the bed
Ryan keeps a beta version on his dresser and uses the built in ascending alarm feature to wake each morning. Again, simple functionality led the way with this feature, so if you can set the time on your oven then you can set the alarm on the Pu Clock.



Setting the time/alarm













You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00





































Designing the clock
Tony and Ryan wanted to make the clock aesthetically pleasing, so they designed something that they would like to have on their own dresser, desk, or meditation space. 



3-D Design renders of the PU Clock


Revisions, revisions, revisions
Nobody gets it perfect on the first try. The PU clock is no different. Between design flaws, cumbersome interfaces, and less-than-ideal tech, Tony and Ryan have taken the PU clock back to the drawing board over and over until it reached its current state: simple, effective, and elegant.



Prototypes of the PU Clock





The guts of the clock

















Voltage: 5V
Current: 500MA
Work rate: 2.5W
Battery capacity: 1200MAH
Charger Style: USB-C

record.Creator: Donovan
record.Title: The Complete SwiftUI Development Course
record.Text:
Do you have a New Year Resolution? 
How about learning a skill that could help launch your career as a developer. This is a course that is perfect for those wanting to begin their journey in coding and for those with some programming experience who are looking to explore IOS development. You will learn to make beautiful apps in a way that fits into your busy schedule. 
We are in the information age, and there is high demand for programmers. This is a course designed to help you meet that need. No prior programming experience is required. We will start from the absolute basics, and we will walk together through the process of understanding the basics of swift programming in general before we dive into app development with SwiftUI. We will build 4 fully functioning apps as part of this course, and if we reach our stretch goals, we will build even more.
Things that you will learn
Basics of Programming

How to declare and use variables and constants
 
How to define and use functions
 
Declaring classes and structs

App Development

Using Xcode, including breakpoints and debugging
 
Using Github for your git repositories
 
How to create beautiful views in SwiftUI 3
 
 Create 4 apps from the ground up, using SwiftUI



        1) RockPaperScissors - A game against your phone



RockPaperScissors


 
        2) Quizzer - A quiz app that lets you study or have a game of trivia with your friends.



Quizzer


 
        3) InvestmentCalculator-Calculate predicted compound interest growth and view current stock and currency values. 



FinancialCalc


 
        4) Contect - The Contact Manager for making connections



Contects


Things that you will receive as part of the course

The full source code to all of the demo apps
 
Access to all course videos
 
Access to all practice test questions with example solutions to help you learn
 

My Story
When I was about 14, my dad began trying to persuade me to learn to write iPhone apps. There was an obvious need for young people that knew how to code. I got really excited about the idea, but I didn’t connect with a way to start the learning process, and so the idea fizzled, and several years passed. When I was 21, I was again introduced to the idea of learning app making. I jumped on the opportunity, and I have spent the last two years working on various apps every day.
I started learning to program in Swift, and while studying Physics and Computer Science in university, I was exposed to several other languages including C++, Python, Wolfram, Matlab, Javascript, HTML, and CSS. I have spent hundreds of hours writing thousands of lines of code. I have written dozens of IOS applications with varying degrees of complexity, and I am working on bringing my first app to the app store within the next year.
I have more recently fallen in love with SwiftUI, Apple’s sleek, declarative language for building native applications. Building apps has never been simpler. I look forward to helping you to learn how to use this powerful tool to bring your development to the next level.
Stretch Goals
$2,500

Include another Demo app explaining how to use UIViewControllerRepresentable
 
Make a drawing app with PencilKit
 
Incorporate photos into your app with PhotoKit
 

$5,000

1 additional demo app for user accounts and authentication
 
Introduction to Apple’s Authentication Services Framework
 
Introduction to Firebase Auth
 

$10,000

2 additional demo apps using databases
 
Introduction to JSON 
 
Introduction to Apple’s CoreData and CloudKit
 
Use public, private, and shared databases
 
Introduction to Firebase/Firestore database
 

$20,000

1 additional demo app for learning app monetization
 
Introduction to In app purchases
 
Introduction to advertisements in app with Google AdMob
 

$40,000

Learn app design for the user experience so that you can take your ideas and transform them into beautiful apps
 
1 additional demo app with subjects of your choosing. Those who have supported at the $20 tier will have the opportunity to vote on the topics covered in this final app. 
 

What sets this course apart?
Firstly, I have been in your shoes. I have recently been in your shoes, learning how to program, and I have learned from searching through hours of other online sources to learn the things that I have learned. I was often frustrated with tutorials and classes that assumed that I had a lot of background knowledge that I did not have. I felt lost for much of my early experience coding. I want to be able to pass on to you the experience that I have gained from hundreds of hours of learning this material.  I am excited to make your journey into Swift programming as smooth as possible.
Secondly, although I have not been involved in tutoring for Computer Science before, I do have experience tutoring in other technical subjects: primarily Physics. I believe firmly in teaching for understanding, and I will do my best to help you understand not just what the code is doing, but also why the code behaves as it does. I care deeply that you understand the material in this course. You will learn by following along line by line, building the sample applications for yourself, and having opportunities to be creative on your own.

record.Creator: Neil Townend
record.Title: SOMBRILL
record.Text:
THE ULTIMATE LEISURE ACCESSORY
If you are anything like me, you will have suffered while enjoying the sunshine in your garden or on holiday, not being able to easily shade your face. I tried everything from hats to sunbeds with canopies and carefully positioned trees or buildings...
I kept saying to myself: 'I just want something to block the sun from my head, that is simple, inexpensive and easy to adjust as the sun moves'
So I mashed together a bracket and a cardboard disc which kind of did the job - but when using my mobile or Kindle, thought: 'What if I could attach my device to the back of the disc?' That's when the SOMBRILL was conceived.
Three months of samples, testing and discussing the design and we now have the finished, high-quality prototype, poised for production in a reputable Chinese factory. 
SOMBRILL is robust, flexible, attractive and versatile. It can be fixed to almost any sunbed, table or armrest and can hold any device up to a small tablet. It protects your face from the harmful sun, while allowing you hands-free viewing of your screen.
We just need the funding for the first order of 1000 units - and by this time next year, Rodney... (you know the rest).
You can be among the first people in the world to own this exciting invention, while helping us on our journey to bring an improved leisure experience for all. 
Thank you in advance for your interest and faith in SOMBRILL.

record.Creator: Boris
record.Title: Fireflies: lightning vest
record.Text:
Thousands of people died on roads all over the world. Someone was riding a bicycle, someone was going along a road, someone had gotten out of a car. Everyone of these poor people could be rescued. They just had to be more visible on the road. Drivers of cars were not able to see them in the dark. Even the brightest clothes are visible in the semi-darkness of the road only when the distance is really short.  Braking distance of many cars is more than the driver's vision capabilities.

Development of modern technologies lets us change the problem cardinally. Until nowadays, every vest, which is recommended for being visible at the road, is based on the principle of a reflecting light, which is a low-performance solution. Our solution was spied from nature. A miracle, which is created by evolution, is fireflies. They have an ultra-small size of their bodies, but they are visible even in a dark deep forest. These small, but smart creatures are able to attract attention everywhere. As soon as fireflies have appeared at a field, everyone knows it. Firefly is sort of a progressive lighthouse of evolution.

Our Vest is made of special fabric, which is developed specially for bright illumination in the darkness. Thousands of light-conducting fibers transmit the LEDs’ light, therefore the whole vest turns into one big firefly, into a big flashlight, which is impossible not to notice either it’s dark or just cloudy weather. And if several people, who are standing together, will wear the vest, they turn into one big bright spot of light, which is visible at the distance of several hundreds meters in all weather.

The development of these vests is a breakthrough in the sphere of road security.  Vest “Fireflies” works perfectly in any weather, in any temperature. Everything is easy: Dress it up and turn it on and you will be wondered how bright you are and how much attention you have attracted!

Built-in pocket small high-power batteries could be charged as easily as your phone, just connect the charger to USB. The vest is assembled reliably. It lets you take  long extreme bicycle trips or other types of trips. Our vest “Fireflies” is also useful for  children, who will not get lost in a forest. A bicycle trip with children also becomes safe.

The production of vests of new generation is our family business.  Making income is not our first purpose. The biggest award for us would be hundreds of children and bicyclists, who will be lighting up their road in the darkness of the evening like lighthouses. Our mission is creating a safe environment for everyone, who needs to be more visible in the park , in a country, on the road. My children like to ride a bike, scooter, skateboard and they will do it only with vest “fireflies”. Another direction is electric scooters, they have a small size and high speed unlike bicycles. they are less visible therefore riding an electric scooter without the lightning vest is madness. Let the advances of technology protect the safety of your rest.

Your donations are necessary for the acceleration of engineering for the benefits of all humanity. We will purchase a special fabric, make devices for cutting and creating a luminous cloth. We will assemble, pack and ship the finished product. We will create a quality control structure at all stages of our production.
 Our inventions and developments will not leave you unnoticed.

The first vest that produces light.
All other vests are designed on the principle of “returning” of reflected light, our vest is the source of light. It’s designed specially for bicyclists and people, who are on the road at night. The vest is made of luminous fabric. The fabric is made from a variety of intertwined glass fibers, through which low-voltage current flows from the battery, which lies in the inner pocket. The cloth of fabric replaces hundreds of small LEDs connected in one continuous carpet of fire. The battery is securely attached in the pocket. The microswitch allows you to instantly turn on the bright light source. The vest is perfectly visible from a few hundred meters away. The built-in battery will surely last for 6-8 hours of walking. It is possible to increase the working time. To do this, you just need to put another battery. The batteries are charged via the USB connector. The vest is not afraid of moisture, precipitation. It works confidently in a large temperature range. A huge time resource of glowing elements. Three sizes are available for ordering: S, M, XL; adjustment straps are provided on the side.

Take care of the safety of yourself and your loved ones. In the vest "fireflies" you will become more noticeable, you are perfectly visible, even in the worst weather. "fireflies" - a lighthouse in the sea of madness of darkness. The vest is reliably protected and is not subject to shaking and vibration during long walks on a bicycle, scooter, moped. A great innovative replacement for the well-served, but still rapidly losing its position, classic, good old reflective vest.
 Modern technologies will take under their wing the protection of your security.
The new reality requires new solutions.

Our site in the web: http://firefliesvest.tilda.ws/eng
