record.Creator: Yeechan
record.Title: YeeChan: Professional Photography Lens For Your Smartphone
record.Text:
With ever-improving technology, mobile photography is quickly catching up. We believe that the future of photography is in your pocket. The best camera is the one you have with you, and that camera is your phone. YeeChan has created a Depth of Field（DOF） lens specifically designed for Smartphone: the 50 mm  F/1.7  Capture vibrant image quality, superb bokeh, shallow depth-of-field and film-style look and the ability to pull focus manually like on professional cinema cameras. 










The F/1.7 aperture lets more light into the lens, which could effectively reduce the ISO sensitivity and obtain a low-noise transparent to improve your image quality. The circular aperture formed by 11 aperture blades  bring a large foreground and background blur, make the subject more prominent, and can bring a soft picture effect. So you can comfortably shoot in low-light, complex environment or night conditions.





Achieve the perfect portrait with the 50 mm  F/1.7 provided by YeeChan lens, highlighting your subject's features with shallow depth of field to create an intimate visual perspective.






Superb optical performance and beautiful background blur effects
Setting a new trend for mirrorless.
Vibrant images with soft, defocused blur qualities.
Pursuing an unprecedented balance of image quality, light weight and compact size.









Shooting by iPhone 12





Shooting by iPhone 12





Shooting by iPhone 12







 The 50 mm focal length has a field of view close to what the human eye sees, and can be used for composition shooting with a more familiar visual experience. Although imaging does not have the distinctive personality of wide-angle or telephoto lenses, as long as you actively adjust the distance to the subject to change the composition, you can also get refreshing effects. It is precisely because of this that the 50 mm focal length can be adapted to shooting in a wide range of fields such as portraits, street photography, scenery, pets, and food.





















YeeChan uses a durable alloy bayonet and the matte metal silver design is used on manual aperture  the with the camera, it looks magnificent and has a high degree of recognition.










The optical structure of the YeeChan is 11 elements in 11 groups. YeeChan also uses multi-layer coating with good anti-reflection effect, which can increase the transmittance of the lens, effectively suppress the glare and ghost caused by the light source in the picture, and reduce the influence of backlight on imaging. Brings a clear and transparent photo effect.




















The Minimum Focusing Distance of the lens has been shortened to about 0.15-0.2 meters. You can get closer to the subject during shooting, and take small objects larger to achieve a macro-like effect. Coupled with the natural perspective of the 50 mm standard lens, it can provide an effect close to the human visual experience, which is very suitable for shooting food, snacks, small objects and commodities.










Because it is designed to be your most frequently used lens, we made it compact. Now you can enjoy advanced optical performance in a compact size  with a total length of only about 119 mm （4.7in）and a weight of only about  360g. It is good to take it with you when you go out, or hold it for a long time, which contributes to the stability of shooting. Making it easier to use.















YeeChan allowing videographers to make smooth aperture changes while retaining traditional aperture stop for stills photographers. The manual focus ring is incredibly smooth and perfectly damped, allowing for smooth and accurate focus results across the 180 degrees of focus travel.















In order to solve the mechanical challenge of the precise bayonet interface with the space constraints around the iPhone camera. YeeChan employs a threaded connection for a firm, easy to use the connection.















The Moisture-Resistant and dust-proof structure is adopted, and the bayonet, focus ring, switch panel and switch of the lens are sealed to improve the reliability of the lens. In addition, by improving the strength of the lens barrel and redesigning the structure of the part connection, a highly robust lens body structure is realized without increasing the weight as much as possible.










YeeChan compatible with iPhone X and above and Samsung Galaxy S10/S10+ /S20/ S20+.






























The YeeChan lens projects the image upside down. For this reason, we recommend using a third-party app to flip the image back to the normal orientation, such as FiLMiC Pro (Video - iOS and Android), ProCamera (Photo and Video - iOS), Filmakr (Video - iOS), MAVIS (Video - iOS), ProMovie (Video - iOS), Camera 645 Pro Mk 3 (Photo and Video - iOS) or Open Camera (Photo/Video - Android). 





You can also use the YeeChan in your smartphone’s stock/native camera app with the image flipped upside down if you prefer.

record.Creator: OBELAB
record.Title: REPACE: The Revolutionary Scientific Workout Solution
record.Text:
Running is a workout that uses all of the major muscles of our body and develops our physical and mental fitness. People have always believed that going on long, intense runs would upgrade their physical abilities. But, intense/ exhausting workouts only tire our muscles and diminishes our passion for working out.





There are times when we cannot figure out if our workouts are effectively done the right way. If we choose to leave it to our instincts to decide, our physical health might be at risk. And we would need to empty our pockets to check our bodies with professional medical equipment. Now, this is why we need a smart fitness device at times.





But the current fitness devices sold in the market can only calculate our heart rates and burnt calories. The fitness devices we usually attach to our arms or wrists cannot accurately calculate our activity levels as if they were to be attached to our thighs. (As thighs are where the actual active muscles are located). So we fully developed and applied the world's first muscle oxygen saturation calculating technology by attaching the devices to our thighs.















Devices utilizing oxygen saturation levels were initially made for athletes. Still, we wanted to provide the general public access to a workout solution in a more convenient, simple, and professional way.





As REPACE was developed after over 8 years of research, REPACE not only measures the muscle oxygen saturation levels. But, it can provide the users with a personalized running plan based on scientific algorithms and data.





Stop running your longest and fastest miles. With REPACE, get your workout solution to fit your endurance and health levels based on scientific algorithms and data. You will be able to feel the change in your performance like a professional athlete.











Feel Like Heart Rate Checks are Not Enough for Your Fitness?
Want to Prove the Science Behind Working Out?
Want to See Proper/ Time Efficient Workout Results?
Need the Most Effective Workout Solution Based on Your Target?
Need some Motivation for Your Workout?

























Geeky Gadgets






gadgetgram





























You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00




































To measure the lactate threshold, runners needed special equipment, sports medicine experts, additional expenses, and must visit specific facilities. (And draw blood)





But just with REPACE, it can all be done. Just simply fasten it on your thighs, and the users can measure their lactate threshold without having to draw blood and comprehensively analyze their current workout performance capacities.










We realized that our workout performance tests and simple heartbeat monitoring were not enough. With REPACE's very own technological advancements, we developed an algorithm to make constant adjustments to provide more effective workout solutions.




















Based on the LT TEST, REPACE will provide you with the workout instructions in 3 different types based on individual workout levels and purposes.



Fat Oxidation (In Development)


REPACE is more than just a simple running/ testing/ analyzing app. It can measure and provide a workout solution based on its previous records.





REPACE is the world's first workout solution program providing an objective scientific way of working out. We will constantly develop REPACE to support Cycling, Mountain Climbing, and even strength trainings like Pilates and Weight Training based on our backers' feedback and internal system upgrades.





Start working out according to your physical condition and choosing the appropriate workout intensity. You will become more fit and healthy through running.










 It is not easy for us to objectively figure out if we are working out the right way at the moment. But REPACE monitors the users' workout sessions in real-time. Based on this data, it provides vocal coaching guides to work out with.





The compelling voice guides allow (to assist runners in reaching their goals) users to run at a steady speed to upgrade their physical abilities and motivate them to keep running.





With the application of the BLE 5.0 technology, REPACE can save its collected data on to the application without any transmission errors. REPACE also allows users to instantly visualize their upgrading/degrading workout capacities by providing daily, monthly, and yearly statistical reports.





The more you use REPACE, your workout skills will elevate, and you will always have your flawless personal trainer by your side.










We all know that your favorite workouts will burn you out someday. So REPACE rewards the users with medals each time they workout to provide them a sense of new accomplishments. We are planned.










It would feel nice to enhance our physical fitness but, wouldn't it be more exciting to find someone to workout together? You might motivate someone around you and partner up and join you! Start sharing your workout history with your friends on Facebook.
Currently, REPACE is only equipped with the Facebook Friends system. More extra features and upgrades will be carried out based on our backers' feedback. Our lab will take a step further in our journey from our backers' growing love and interest in REPACE.

























REPACE measured the user's muscle oxygen saturation levels through functional near-infrared spectroscopy (fNIRS). By tightening the device onto the user's thighs it can calculate the oxygen saturation levels (SmO2) and calculation





REPACE automatically calculates the adequate workout duration and intensity through its application. Suppose REPACE is attached at a certain spot on your thighs. In that case, it can more accurately measure the exhaustion levels of your muscles. Check your fluctuating muscle oxygen saturation levels yourself.



When checking on your SmO2, REPACE will reverse track the 2mmol/L and 4mmol/L Blood Lactate levels & provide a workout solution.












* When using REPACE outdoors, the users can check their running routes via a cellphone GPS. Users can also work out however they want, not following the workout solutions, and REPACE will check their SmO2 in real-time. 
** REPACE is also pairable with an Apple Watch heart rate tracker and can check the users' heart rates in real-time as well. 



































For accurate testing and a steady fixation, you would need to use the appropriate thigh bands. After the campaign successfully comes to a close, we will send out a survey for backers to receive the correctly-sized bands.





Sit yourself down, place your legs on a chair, and measure the circumference of your thighs located 5 inches above your knee cap. This would be the adequate thigh band size to order when filling out the survey.










For Kickstarter Pledges Only:
We will provide an extra band for our backers! (Total of 2/ size mix & match available ⭕)






























OBELAB is a company initially started in the science lab of KAIST. NIRSIT is a portable device that could measure our brain's oxygen saturation levels with our very on fNIRS technology. 





Our expertise in our self-developed technology has been verified by the relative academia and industry. With our own technologies like these, we developed REPACE to upgrade our users' physical capacities. So, we would like to offer our backers the world's first hands-on experience on our device.





After our Kickstarter campaign, we are planning to develop an algorithm to calculate the ratio of how many carbs/ fats are burnt while working out, based on our backers' feedback. (est. 2nd half of 2022). We genuinely hope to find the path to develop alongside our backers.





OBELAB has developed and manufactured healthcare devices since 2013 and has been safety-approved with different certifications. Our self-developed technology has been developed by cooperating with the nation's top medical schools' algorithms and clinical trials to fully develop a complete device.

The tests were carried out with the nation's expert medical school in sports medicine. They cooperated in academic and scientific certification and collaboration. REPACE is the first device for individual use (not for labs or hospitals). It will be the case where brain science technology has been applied to sports science. We are delighted to present REPACE to our backers, developed with our most extraordinary expertise and efforts. And we will try our best not to leave our backers to stay disappointed.

















This project is boosted by BackerCrew

record.Creator: Moritz Lönne
record.Title: 3D-Printed Oxygen-ABS powered Rocket Engine
record.Text:
3D Printed Oxygen-ABS powered Rocket Engine
 First of all, I would like to mention that we are building a prototype that is not intended for sale.





Hello, and welcome to our project.
We are Moritz, Amelia and Vincent from Landshut in Germany
and are currently studying at the Hans-Leinberger-Gymnasium Landshut.
The idea for our project started with a class competition in our school: The task was to build a small car. The others in the class spent a lot of money on mini car kits on the internet, but we had an idea.
Why not 3D print a drive? It's cheaper, smaller, and stronger. So we made a 3D model and printed it ...





 After we printed the rocket, the first test phase started:






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































We fixed the rocket on a vice and connected it to a bag with pure oxygen. we used a sparkler to light it, then we squeezed the bag with oxygen so that the oxygen flows through the rocket. We found that the exhaust did not come out with a lot of pressure and that most of the rocket's  ABS was not burned. So we printed a new model with a smaller opening and an interior with high combustion efficiency.
Second test phase:






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































After the second test phase was quite successful, we test the flammability of two ABS parts printed in different ways. The part on the left of the video is the outer skin of the rocket the part on the right is made of the same material, just printed differently in order to burn perfectly in the interior of our rocket.
Third test phase:






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































In the next step we exchanged the oxygen bag for an oxygen bottle with 10 bar air pressure to find out whether the pressure of the oxygen plays a role.






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































Through the test, we learned that more pressure is more thrust. The next step is the exact force measurement. In order to remove the human factor from the equation, we have to be able to precisely control the oxygen supply and this cannot be implemented with an oxygen cylinder. So we developed a concept to release the oxygen in a controlled manner: A kind of press that compresses a bag of oxygen.










The model is not yet equipped with technology because it is still a small pre-print. For the problem that comes up now, we need your support: In order to supply a test-ready amount of oxygen, a larger press is required, and we are not able to pay for the technology for this ourselves. We also need a larger and more precise 3D printer in order to develop more complex rockets and the press in the future. We will also make a metal shell for the rocket, which will enable us to exchange the rocket after use and to recycle it to make new rockets from it.
Personal words:
With our project we want to build a prototype. In addition, with this project we are taking part in a German youth research competition, which gives us better chances of getting a renumed university place if we get a good placement.
We hope you like our project :)
All the best,
Moritz, Ameila and Vincent

record.Creator: Mihai Avram
record.Title: Back In Stock Item Tracker and Notifier
record.Text:
Hi everyone! My name is Mihai and I am a software developer who wants to create useful things that add value to people's lives. In the past, I created Fakey (https://fakey.osome.iu.edu/) which is a media literacy fake-news game that has gotten some attention. I also built a lot of other creations in the goal-tracking and automation space which you can find on my website (https://mihaisplace.com)

The problem?
Earlier this year I wanted to buy a new gaming console, and to my chagrin, every time I saw releases being hyped in the news, I was always too late to buy it as it went out of stock very quickly. This was a major pain point for me and I had a vision that this process should be much simpler. A person should be texted as soon as an item is back in stock so that they can increase their chances of buying it. This is how the idea for the Item Tracker was born with the notion of creating a software tool that can ping us as soon as something we are seeking is back in stock. 

Why solve this problem now? 
With the onset of the global pandemic and international supply chains struggling, it has been difficult to get some items that we seek which have been out-of-stock or heavily backlogged. Some clear examples of this that always surface in the news involve the next-gen console shortages where it has been incredibly difficult to buy new PS5s, Xbox Series Xs, and GPUs. I also believe this situation will only get worse as supply chains will further get strained as we use up our planet's supply of raw materials.

What have I built so far?
Currently, the software I built involves sites where someone can subscribe to the new PS5 and Xbox Series S/X. If someone subscribes, they will get a text to the phone number they provide as soon as the console comes back in stock in any stores. With just a few small private and public launches in the last couple of months, these sites have seen hundreds of users, and dozens of subscribers. I can see that there is some value here and it is solving a problem, which is something I am very happy with.

Here is how the sites look below



Tracker Service for the Xbox Series S/X






Tracker Service for the PS5



The ask?
Right now I am providing the service for free and it costs me about $100/mo. to upkeep the servers and technology that can enable the service to work. This will likely not be sustainable for me for long unless I have some funding to justify continuing the service. What's more is that in the future I would like to expand this service to include the new Nintendo OLED, different types of GPUs, trading cards, clothes, and any other supplies that will fall into this category of items that are highly sought after, for which there is very low supply. After building the basic functionality for these services, I would like to create a tool that can help broker a place in line for people who are wanting to buy something of low supply. This way, if someone wants to buy a new item, they can simply pre-fill a request to buy and it will be purchased automatically on their behalf - completely automating the process and removing the burden of having the person vying for a slot to purchase it themselves. Finally, I plan to create a wiki with tips on how people can boost their chances of buying various items they seek that are in low supply.

Here is the timeline for the product
- Tracker service for the Nintendo OLED and popular GPUs (1 - 2 months)
- Item tracker tips wiki (1 - 2 months)
- Tracker service for other sought after items coming from user interviews (3 - 6 months)
- Fully automated item purchaser service (6 - 12 months)
- Improving the services to be as quick, fair, and secure as possible (1 - 2 years)

In conclusion,
I hope you consider working alongside me on this product. You can see from the Rewards section that I plan to build alongside all of you and really help you drive the effort or features via 1 on 1 conversation and focus groups. I am simply here to serve and solve your problems in getting the items you seek. Finally, I will share all the details of the process and adopt a mindset of building in the open with transparency in mind. 

Thank you for reading this far if you have, hope you have a great day regardless of whether you fund this project!

Warm regards,
~ Mihai

record.Creator: Hercury Company
record.Title: Ligh up your day with the Sheels
record.Text:
Hi, my name is Matteo Prasso, and here's my friend Haris Bashir. We always wanted to create something from scratch, so we met online during the 2021 Covid lockdown, and  started working on this project. We met then in real life and became good friends and co-workers.





We are prototyping a pair of shoes with two electric motors and four wheels with detachable shafts. The product will include both the electronic/ tech part and the footwear, attached one on the top of the other.  

Talking about tech things, we designed it with two electric motors that give high speed and high torque, in order to reach 12 kph or 7.5 mph. Each shoe will have a battery under the center of the foot, the transmission, and two detachable shafts that connect to the four wheels. You will be able to control the speed thanks to the pressure sensors put inside the sole.

One of our goals is to make this product easy and comfy to wear everywhere, so we studied the detachable shafts that permit you to use the Sheels also indoors. 
For example, in many places like schools or offices, you can't wear rollers skates and you must have a pair of common shoes to use there, so you need a place to put the skates when you are not using them. With this product you will forget these problems; once you enter into a structure you can remove the wheels, and put them back when you leave. Another of our goals, that we will reach with experience of prototyping, is to make a foldable, but stable, sole that will help you in the step.




The case for the working model










Display model










3D printed electric motor's case


On the aesthetic appearance, is our goal on the final product to make every pair unique. We are currently designing a lot of customizable parts that will integrate a basic model. You will be able to choose between different options of led lights designs, colors, the lateral bumpers, the designs of the wheels, and much more. We are doing this because we want the user to find an identity in this product and stand out.




Here's an artwork of the concept







 We want to share with the people our idea of freedom of spirit. Many times happens in the commuting life that the trip becomes just "necessary"; we start seeing it as a boring thing we have to do to reach our destination. We died of boredom from this for years,  so we asked ourselves what could change this everyday routine.  We wanted to create real emotions that could help people live better the day.  Something that was more than a simple pair of shoes; something that could give speed, fun, and excitement. Imagine a life where you can move around at a certain speed with just your feet,  feeling free from all the things that stress you, and reach your destination with a free spirit and ready to start. How would it be?






 We are currently designing our first prototype, and very soon we will 3d print it; this will help us to give a representative shape of the product and will become the display model. At the same time, we are building the first working prototype, with actual motors, battery, controls, and wheels. For this one, we are using a simple shoe bought in a shop and the case will be printed again in plastic.  For the component, we already invested money, and every time we want to develop we have to use more.

 As the project rises, also expenses do. To obtain the best result possible we need the best materials and the best components. We want to keep the product the lightest possible for perfect use, to do that we need a carbon fiber case for example, but also the electronics must take less space, and also the battery could be more powerful with less weight.  So we are doing a campaign on Kickstarter to make something unique, perfect and create a community with which we can connect and share our passion for this product.






We want to pursue our dream and goal to create something good and fun for people. We can see the potential of this product to unite and make people share time together. Thanks to the speed, people will be able to race, make obstacle courses, and go downtown or to skateparks together. We imagine groups of friends sharing times to choose their perfect customization of a pair of Sheels, or also family members designing together their most liked style. We all know after Covid, how important and precious is the time spent with the people that make us feel good, so we want to give opportunities to have something to share with the people we love the most.

 Contacts and social media:
Here's our Instagram to follow the progress: @hercurymotion 
For more infos please contact: hercury.company@gmail.com

record.Creator: SUNUO
record.Title: SUNUO, the World’s First Intelligent Water Flosser
record.Text:
Now, you can say goodbye to blindly maintaining the cleanliness of your mouth. With the introduction of the SUNUO water flosser, you can clean each individual tooth with precision. Featuring a 5MP camera with a 360° field of view, no plaque, particles, or grime will escape your sight.










Maintaining oral care is essential for your overall health and wellbeing. With the SUNUO, completing this task has never been easier. No matter where you are, SUNUO will take care of all your dental cleaning needs. With a 180 ml water tank, high pressure water flow, and dual 200-280nm wavelength UV sterilizers, you can be assured that your mouth will stay fresh and clean.





 Enter the SUNUO, the all-in-one water flosser. You can say goodbye to the difficulties of brushing your teeth and flossing. With this device, cleaning between your teeth has never been easier. No longer do you have to carry around floss in your bag, now, all you need is the SUNUO and some water and you are good to go.





Whether it be at a party, on a date, or at work, due to the portable, compact nature of the SUNUO, you can always keep your teeth clean and healthy.















The SUNUO is a big step up from traditional flossing and other modern water flossers. Equipped with a 5MP camera, 6 LED lights and a wifi connected app, we provide an experience like no other.





As you are using the flosser, you will be able to clearly see every area that needs cleaning. With some smart technology and programming, none of your problem areas will be left untouched. Braces, for example, are no match for the pulsating water stream of the SUNUO.















You can control the SUNUO Intelligent Visual Water Flosser in our App.
 3 different camera modes





Water flow pressure adjustmen





Choose water flossing mode and turn the SUNUO on





Moreover, you can choose to take pictures in black and white or color, as well as flip the images.





You can download the proprietary app via QR code or the link on the instructions. Once you download it, choose your language and begin the best water flossing experience of your life.










Featuring a water pressure which can reach around 140 PSI, SUNUO produces a thin, precise water stream. Unlike other water flossers, ours pulsates the water stream at around 1600 pulsations per minute. This helps to effectively remove any food particles that may be stuck, or dental plaque that’s usually difficult to clean.





Driving the water flow is a frictionless pump. The settings of the water pressure can be adjusted to fit the needs of your individual mouth.










For a tool that will touch the inside of your mouth, it is important to maintain cleanliness. The SUNUO uses UV sterilizers, one is for sanitizing and cleaning the nozzle, the other one is for sanitizing and preventing bacterial growth. Through this redundant system, there is no way for bacteria to remain, thus keeping your mouth safe and healthy.










The SUNUO is equipped with 3 different nozzles, which aims for satisfying the needs of anyone who may use our product.





Standard nozzle: For daily cleaning and oral care
Periodontal nozzle: For cleaning the gums. A soft and narrow nozzle





Orthodontic nozzle: For those with braces. Since there are more gaps and dead angles around braces, it is hard to clean properly with a toothbrush. The orthodontics nozzle is professionally designed with narrow and tiny brushes.





3 Pressure Modes: gentle, standard, and spa modes are supported, allowing you to choose a suitable water pressure.















The design of the SUNUO brilliantly hides its nozzle. You only need to gently pull out the nozzle to use it. This keeps the nozzle tucked away for hygienic purposes, as well as for more compact storage.










One of the main features of the SUNUO is the large 180 ml water tank. The reason we can make the capacity so large is due to the collapsible nature of it. When in storage mode, the water tank won’t take up any extra space in your purse or bag. When you need to rinse your teeth, just pull on the water tank, fill it up, and rinse away.





We want to give you the freedom to choose how to clean your mouth, so we’ve also added the option to use mouthwash instead of water.










The SUNUO comes with a 2000mAh battery. This amount of power is enough to use for 50 minutes at one time. No matter if it's a wall adapter, PC, laptop, or  power bank, you always have an option to keep your SUNUO fully charged.










The waterproofing level is IPX7, so you can use it while washing your face or taking a shower.


































































You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00




















































 The SUNUO team is dedicated to improving oral hygiene and maintaining cleanliness. We believe and support healthy habits and lifestyles. We’ve turned our passion for cleaning products into cleaning of teeth and gums. This product turns out to be easy to use, comfortable and most important of all, an effective solution to maintain your oral hygiene. Therefore, in terms of product design, the inventing process, or the choices for accessories, we have maintained a very strict standard throughout the whole process. We’ve worked really hard to bring better products to our customers.





Q1: What are the causes of itching or gum bleeding?
A1: You might bleed because your gums are not used to this high water pressure, your gums are weak, or you have periodontal disease. However, if it hasn’t stopped after one week or you still feel pain, please consult your dentist.

Q2: What is the suggested mode for a beginner?
A2: We suggest you use the soft mode for the first time.

Q3:After using the water flosser, do I still need to brush my teeth?
A3: Our water flosser is not a substitute for a toothbrush. On one hand, a toothbrush can clean out most of the plaque on the surface. On the other hand, the water flosser is mainly used for cleaning the dead angles and blind sides where a toothbrush cannot properly reach. So, this product is complementary to the toothbrush.

Q4:Will the water stream hurt my gums if the water pressure is strong?
A4: The SUNUO Intelligent Visual Water Flosser uses pulsating pressure technology, which creates a soft water stream and ensures cleaning effectiveness. When used properly, it won’t hurt your gums.

Q5:How can I replace the nozzle?
A5: You can simply loosen it like a screw and it should come right off.

Q6:Why can't I turn it off right away after usage?
A6: The pump will activate sleep mode every 2 minutes while not in use. The light signals will be off. If there is no connection for Wi-Fi, the camera and Wi-Fi signal light will be turned off after 2 minutes.

Q7:When I use it, does it make any noise?
A7: When in use, some noise will be generated and will stay within the 70dB range.

Q8:Should I only use cold water?
A8: You should use water lower than 38°C (100°F).

Q9:How can I properly operate the water flosser?
A9: Hold the water flosser upright and extend the nozzle into your mouth, aiming for gaps or gums. Clean along the teeth, slowly and sequentially.

record.Title: SECURE KEY
record.Text:
The strongest system to protect your business or personal data.
Thanks to Securekey you will only use strong and secure passwords to access your accounts and without the hassle of memorizing them.






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.

You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.

It does not store the passwords, but rather generates them when you need. For this reason you never lose any password even in the case of device destruction.
When you compose a specific Key Pad sequence, you will obtain the same password every time.










The masked password is Secure Key’s proprietary technology which allows you to protect your real password. How? It's simple.





You simply type a short numeric sequence into the keypad (called a masked password) and Secure Key will generate the corresponding, unique complex password.
For example, if the "masked password" for your Facebook account is "A12", your Secure Key will generate a complex password when you dial "A12". 





But this is where the magic happens! If someone steals your masked password and dials "A12" on his or her Secure Key, the password will be totally different, as each device generates a different password with the same "masked password". This means that you are still safe, even if someone has access to your masked password file.

"The best way to protect your passwords is to always have access to them without ever saving or storing them anywhere."
That's exactly what SecureKey allows you to do.





There are many cases of stolen passwords causing enormous trouble and damage.
This happens often as we save online many important things online. Frequently we protect our entire online life with the same simple password for convenience.
SecureKey helps you to avoid this mistake, providing a service that allows you to use strong and secure passwords in an easy and fast way. In a few seconds you will create your password without having to remember or store it anywhere.


Securekey is ideal for personal use 





Protect your privacy and accounts including:

Personal data
Bank accounts
Crypto wallets
Google drive account
Social accounts (Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, Linkedin...)
Photo, Video.......All the important things in your life which you don't want other people to access


Follow the Secure Key guidelines to avoid identity or data theft.


As well as for professional use





You can use Secure Key in your daily job to:

Protect your customers' accounts and data
Help your company with compliancy and high security standards
Store your professional passwords
Save time on storing and finding passwords
Guarantee a better service for your customers and colleagues



ALWAYS WITH YOU 





SecureKey uses the highest quality materials to ensure it can withstand the wear and tear of long trips or a typical day. Securekey's aluminum case makes it both robust and durable. It doesn't use batteries to operate and powers up at the moment you plug it into your device meaning it will never be out of power.





Check the video to see how to access your pc in a safe and fast way with Secure Key.

record.Creator: Gordon L Miles.
record.Title: Solar Powered Hot Cup Prototype 2 Virtual Concept
record.Text:
Hi this is Gordon L. Miles aka Baba Yatahma.  I'm presenting a opportunity for you to donate through my Kickstarter Campaign to raise $40,000 to bring Solar Powered Hot Cup Prototype 2 Virtual Concept to fruition.  View the video and make your pledge.  I'm considering  converting donations into shares as one of the rewards for your support.  Become an innovative pilot ushering in a new era using the Warm-A-Matic heating system.   The cup has thermal insulation that keeps liquids cold or hot for 85 minutes before using the solar system.   When in use, the lithium battery generates energy transformed from the solar cells into electricity. The sun energizes the cells that charges the  battery which activates the Warm-A-Matic system heating up the liquids in the cup.  The sun energizes the cells so the cup can be  turned on during any outdoor activity.
The present invention, in one embodiment has a double pole throw switch and can be used for hot or cold use.   Also, it has a automatic shutoff  thermostat that prevents the liquids from boiling over.  It can be charge while in use, to prevent the liquid from becoming cold.  The switch can be turn on to maintain the tempenture of the liquid in the cup.  The cup is designed to fit into a car cup holder.  
Currently Innovative Licensing & Promotions, Inc. has been hired to present the concept of Solar Powered Hot Cup to companies that may be interested in productions and distributions of Solar Powered Hot Cup.

record.Creator: YOBYBO
record.Title: X-BOAT PRO : 1st Open-Casing TWS Earphones with LDAC
record.Text:
TWS earphones. Familiar names, boxy looks, and the old-fashioned popping-hood design. It’s the golden formula of mediocrity. We are here to re-write the formula. You want all the features, we give them all, plus a design from the future.
We are talking deep here. Earphones from the future aren’t just limited by the looks, but the open-casing that makes wearing the earphone in just 1 second; the half-in-ear design yet active noise cancellation; the LDAC codec that plays CD-level quality music into your ear and finally, the combination of space aluminum material and Anti-Glare glass that packs every wonder into small and streamline-shaped TWS  earphones





We combine creative design, sublime comfort, and unparalleled audio performance together,  making X-BOAT PRO quite different from other TWS earphones. 





Popping the hood is normal for earphones. But why bother when you don’t have to?
With an open-casing design, we eliminated the drop-top hood. Taking the headphone is just a slide away instead of case-opening and buds fumbling. Enjoying music is only one slide-to-unlock away.





With a single-hand operation mechanism, you can wear earphones with ease in any busy-hand environment like taking the subway, working, shopping, phone calls. 





Easy to use does not mean easy to drop. With integrated magnets, the earphones stay light but firm in the case. Light tipping or 180° flipping, this pair is staying.





With the open-casing design, you will never have to pop the hood to check that if you are bringing both earphones or not. Everything is in a glimpse.










It's easy to find ANC earphones these days---when they were full-in-ear ones. There’s nothing wrong with such a design, except when you put them on for a long time, the shape starts to block the ear canal, adding unnecessary pressure. We took a harder yet different approach, the half-in-ear solution. 





X-BOAT PRO combines the most advanced ANC algorithm and large drivers to bring you a new listening experience from true wireless audio. This means you can hear less noise and more music playing.





The earphones are ergonomically molded to precisely fit your ear.  It's just 3.9g each, offering a weightless way and more comfortable wearing experience even after long hours of use - Survivor of the fittest, winner of the quietest.





Why X-BOAT PRO can deliver CD Audio quality. We know you can’t hear now. But data will tell you





The most common audio codec for earphones is the SBC codec, with which the maximum sample bit-rate is still lossy 320 Kbps.  With LDAC, your Bluetooth audio device can now transfer up to 3x the data consistently compared to SBC---in short, you can enjoy non-stop 100% CD audio quality on your X-BOAT PRO.





The large 13 mm LCP dynamic driver inside each earphone delivers bass you can feel in your bone. lets you experience the soaring melodies and rich timbres of all your favorite tunes.





Plus, the Integrated Class AB Hi-Fi amplifier can bring optimal audio performance and power efficiency. 





We built the charging case of X-BOAT PRO under the same material as a phone. The touch feeling is quite different from other TWS earphones.
With CNC, we get to carve the shape out as one perfect piece of metal with zero gaps. The Anti-glare Glass processing adds one extra layer of texture that leaves no fingerprints but millions of colors under the sun. 





With a built-in Airoha 5.2 chip, X-BOAT PRO is able to adapt smarter power management during the playing process, achieving a stunning 40-hour playback time. You might forget to charge it quite often simply because you don't need to.     





Plus, You can plug the X-BOAT PRO into your phone (Type-C port) for charging. Connect the headphones for just 20 minutes, and you can expect the X-BOAT PRO to run an additional 5 hours.





 With long battery life, you can keep X-BOAT PRO everywhere with you. Never worried run out of juice while on the go.


























Timeline





Design Story  
Lotus awaiting for blossom is, in our eyes, the perfect combination of body curve and visual lightness. The design of XBOAT PRO chased our fantasy for such beauty with its unique earphone holster structure and 100% stream-lined shape. The charging bay of Xboat is largely covered in aluminum with meticulous machining of 5-axis CNC to mimic the shape of nature, while the ever-glowing color flying through your eyes. The design was a huge challenge. Not only did we have to get the shape right, but also we must adjust the sizing of earphones for both charging bay and ear fitting. 




Charging case crafted by CNC


In terms of sound quality, we managed to level up the game even higher: we chose LCP dynamic driver instead of titanium diaphragm driver for better sound quality and, later, we built a connection with SONY officials for a product review. They eventually gave permission to authorize the LDAC codecs to X-boat Pro for its overall performance. 





The outcome of all the efforts costs more to make the product but also gives a better user experience to customers. Our vision is to build a set of people’s earphones with supreme music performance while looking good when putting it on. With the front side representing the future, the back pays tribute to the past. The Anti-glare glass with PET filming cast a mist to create a mystical contrast between itself and the shining body, like a sexy creation from Hajime Sorayama in a modern mask, blending the sci-fi past of industrial design to a flattened, more simplified future. On top of visual language, we also tried very hard in making a perfect front chamber---like twenty times iteration hard---to achieve absolute comforts when you put the earphone on, and the smooth feeling when you slide the earphones in or out of the charging bay. As for the earphone, we chose vacuum plating + skin-like coating to make it feel elegant, look sharp, yet keep stealthy when in use. Xboat is our attempt to express technological beauty with nature language---metals are cold, but humanity isn’t.
About Us
Spending years of time in the earphone business taught us a tough fact: from concept with exceptional design to production-ready stands a wall of sacrifice lists for higher efficiency and yield rate. By the time customers got their hands on the actual product, what they see would become a bland, mediocre product lacking beauty or basic user experience. YOBYBO wasn’t born to be this way. Our goal is to give birth to a design that follows our hearts from the very beginning. Instead of simplifying the process for the industry, we chose to keep the precious creative design as it intended to be, no matter how much harder it would be to build. The product we built is the mirror of our vision.






The higher our guidelines would be, the more procedures we had to go through. We set up more product inspections for a more reliable industrial renovation to make sure our products meet the global standard for a good one. If we had to choose between the cost and quality, we would definitely go to the latter one.
We were the creators of the world’s thinnest TWS earphones---CARD20, which won the Reddot and iF design award of 2020. Our push-to-unlock NOTE20 won the Reddot design award as well.





We reviewed our entire streamline of the production of these two products: from concept to engineering, development, till the final manufacturing. All the problems were put under the telescope for improvements of our next-gen product.
Now here we are with X-boat Pro. A better statement for a better time.






This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 2,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $900M raised between them.

record.Creator: Hunter Humeston
record.Title: The Practical Batsuit: A DIY Prototype
record.Text:
There was an idea...
This world, now more than ever, needs heroes. People who are willing to fight injustice no matter its source, people who are willing to put the lives of others above their own. This world needs its Batman. There are many out there who have gotten close to truly emulating the look of the Dark Knight, but we want to be the first to create a Batsuit prototype that not only looks and feels authentic, but one that offers the functionality and protection of the real-deal. It should be able to stand up to bladed attacks, have fire and chemical resistance, provide protection from most melee-based attacks, and maybe, just maybe, even limited bullet resistance. We are simply college students looking for funding to complete an educational, fun, and challenging design project and we need your help. Eventually, maybe a non-Batman themed version of this suit-design could be used for first responders and/or soldiers as protective suits in their dangerous fields.

record.Creator: OXAMA TEAM
record.Title: THE FIRST SPEAKING OXIMETER COMPUTER DESIGNED FOR FREEDIVING
record.Text:
This is OXAMA ! 



OXAMA wearable device





OXAMA wearable device on your face





OXAMA wearable device with your diving goggles or under your diving mask


 What is OXAMA? 
OXAMA is the first wearable speaking oximeter computer that goes beyond the limits of all classic wrist computers. It is equipped with biometric sensors and a voice assistant.






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00
































Oxama consists of:

a sensors module
an audio module
a soft silicone face mask

The sensors module contains a biometric sensor that reads the heart rate and the blood oxygen saturation, a pressure sensor and an accelerometer sensor that measures the depth and the freediver movements. 



The sensors module prototype


The audio module accommodates a bones transducer which generates a human voice sound directly audible into your head without the use of any earphone.



The Audio Module prototype


The silicone face mask is a comfortable and easy to wear face mask provided with two pockets to maintain the sensors and the audio modules in contact with the face.





 Why do you put OXAMA on your face? 
OXAMA represents a real revolution in the freediving world and it will make your immersion a unique and amazing experience. 
During freediving, blood moves from the peripheral areas of the body (hands, arms, feet, legs) towards the center of the body. This means that the only area where vital signs can be reliably measured remains the face.
So, we developed Oxama with a patent pending technology to be worn on the face for two main reasons: 

Oxama is designed to measure the PPG signal directly on facial blood vessels that are much less affected by low perfusion or movement artifacts, allowing for very reliable blood oxygen saturation and heart rate measurements even during deep dives.
The best location of a sound exciter to be heard is obviously closed to ears and in particular in contact with the skull: the sound propagates just through your bones and tissue and is directly perceived by your eardrums.

For this reasons OXAMA has been designed to fit into your diving mask or under your diving goggles in comfortable contact with your face.   





How comfortable is Oxama?
We tested OXAMA on many subjects, female and male, with different ages. We found that, depending on the subject face shape, OXAMA is very comfortable with several underwater diving and freediving masks for each subject and in some subject with all the tested masks. All subjects reported no water leakage and no impact on visibility  during the immersion.  Moreover, OXAMA can be used also without a diving mask, being compatible with many types of diving googles.






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































 Which parameters does OXAMA track? 
OXAMA tracks your performance recording both biometric and environmental parameters, and reproduces them with an adjustable voice assistant.



Biometric and Environmental parameters recorded by OXAMA device



 Blood oxygen saturation: it is a relative measure of the concentration of oxygen  dissolved or carried in the blood as a proportion of the maximal concentration that can be dissolved in the blood (%).
 Heart rate: it is the speed of the heartbeat measured by the number of contractions (beats) of the heart per minute (bpm)
 Time: it is the measure of the duration of the dive time (s)
 Ascending / Descending Speed: measure of the speed during the diving ascent / descent (m/s)
 Acceleration: it is the measure of the acceleration during the dive(m2/s)
 Temperature: it is the measure of the water temperature (°C)
 Depth: it is the measure of the real-time or max depth during dive time (m)
 Head angle : it represents the measure of the head orientation with respect to the horizon for the posture control (degrees)


Why is it important to track the Blood oxygen saturation and heart beat rate during the dive?

custom recovery time estimate based on recorded values
correlation between performance and biometric parameters during training . By looking at the data during training, divers could learn how to extend their dive time, how to stay calm and focus better, and thus reduce their body’s draw on its limited oxygen supplies.
greater awareness of your own health conditions


OXAMA speaks to you!
You don’t need to read any display, stay focused on your immersion!
OXAMA informs in real-time on measured parameters. OXAMA uses with the most non-stressing and natural way possible to communicate to the diver: a quiet human voice clearly heard directly in your head thanks to a sophisticated bones transducer that converts the audio messages into sound mechanical waves through the skull. Language, level of detail, thresholds and frequency of all  vocal messages can be simply defined by the user through the smartphone OXAMA app.  



The four OXAMA voice modes


 You can set OXAMA on different voice modes, as you prefer. You decide the parameters and the the moment in which you want to listen their values as the following voice modes: 

 MUTE: OXAMA records all the parameters during dive time but doesn't speak to you
 QUIET: OXAMA records all the parameters during dive time and speaks to you  at the beginning and at the end of the immersion
 ALERT : OXAMA records all the parameters during dive time and speaks to you only for the thresholds programmed by you.
 CHATTY: OXAMA records all the parameters during dive time and speaks to you both for the thresholds and every 15 seconds for all the parameters programmed by you .   

Which problems does OXAMA solve?   
Together with many other freedivers, we found that classic wrist computer are hard to be read during freediving immersion, and moreover, they do not offer information about the diver's health conditions (for example blood oxygen saturation and heart rate).  The solution introduced by OXAMA is a vocal assistant that provide to you both environmental and biometric data. So you can stay focused on the immersion and improve your performance.



The problems that Oxama solves: diving computer are often hard to read (left) and don't offer information about the diver's health (right)


Which freediving disciplines are managed? 
OXAMA is able to manage pre-set programs for static, dynamic, deep immersion freediving and spearfishing with dedicated diving parameters and different behavior for each discipline. Each program can be personalized by setting which parameters are communicated, with which frequency or threshold value for each parameter.



Freediving disciplines managed by OXAMA device


You could be interested in exploring your biometric parameters like heart rate (HR) and blood oxygen saturation (SpO2) during for example a static workout session, so you will be surprised to visualize your mammalian diving reflex or your SpO2 recovery rate.  



HR and SpO2 measure during a static workout session.


Or for example you can track your head angle during a dynamic workout session in order to improve your diving posture to reach the optimal hydrodynamics.



SpO2 and Head Posture Angle during a dynamic workout session.


And finally you will track not only the classic depth parameter, but also the descending and ascending speed during a deep dive in order to take under control the energy and oxygen consumption.



Depth and descending/ascending speed during a deep or a spearfishing session.


So ... Who is OXAMA for? 
OXAMA for the beginner.  A virtual coach always with you! OXAMA accompanies you during freediving providing you with the confidence that only your coach can give you. 






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00
































OXAMA for the spearfisher.  Do not look away from your fish, keep the maximum focus on your target. You don’t need to look at the wrist computer, you can hear all the information you need while remaining focused on the fish. And when you come out of the water, you have recovery time assessment based on your current physical conditions. 






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































OXAMA for the pro freediver.  With OXAMA you can improve your performances because you are awarded of your physical conditions. You can consult all the freediving parameters and analyze graphs, statistics and correlations. Through data control you can improve the performance! 






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































 OXAMA makes freediving more social!
OXAMA makes freediving more social!  You can install OXAMA app on your IOS or Android phone and once out of the water download all data from the OXAMA device using a simple Bluetooth connection. The fun now begins! You will find your immersion data and you will be able to analyze in detail the chart of each parameters. You will be able to zoom or do correlations between parameters.
You will find all your personal records and if you want you will share any chart or result on your preferred social network. You will live again your immersion experience also out of the water and you will be able to plan a data based workout to improve your performance. There’s nothing better than friendly competition to keep you motivated.  



The Oxama app


Why was OXAMA born?
OXAMA was born under water, from the need of three freedivers (Vincenzo, Massimo, Claudio) eager to know their vital parameters during freediving and consequently to improve their performances on the basis of measured and analyzed data. The path has been long and we need the help and support from all the freedivers community !

Where does OXAMA name come from?
The OXAMA name comes from OX, short for oximetry, and AMA, the traditional Japanese women divers famous for collecting pearls.  



Japanese ama pearl diver


 Which are the components OXAMA is made of? 
Biometric sensor. A non-invasive optical 4-wavelength photoplethysmography (PPG) sensor measures heart rate and blood oxygen saturation continuously during the immersions, the two most important parameters to track the health conditions and to improve the safety and the performances of the diver. The measurements are collected directly on the face of the diver to overcome the issue of arm and finger low blood perfusion in deep immersions.
Environmental sensors. A digital high precision pressure sensor measures depth and temperature, while a digital 3 axis accelerometer sensor measures acceleration and the head spatial  orientation. Based on data collected by sensors, many useful parameters are calculated: depth, ascending and descending speed, head XYZ posture angle and acceleration.
Vocal assistant. A sophisticated bones transducer put on the face converts the audio messages into sound mechanical waves through the skull. The sound propagates just through your bones is directly perceived by your eardrums. 



Rendering of OXAMA components explosion





Rendering of Oxama Sensors and Audio modules inserted into the pockets of the Face Mask 


Design technical specifications 



OXAMA design technical specifications


 OXAMA CHARGER 
Oxama is equipped with lithium rechargeable battery, So you can recharge OXAMA device using the USB-C OXAMA charger.  Just 1 hour for a full charge and you will be ready for a new immersion! 



The OXAMA USB-C charger prototype


OXAMA KIT
 Oxama comes with a complete kit composed by:

Sensors module
Audio module
Silicone face mask with pockets for the sensors and audio modules
Charging docking station
USB-C cable
High-quality shockproof storage casing










The full Oxama kit into the casing prototype

 Claudio, co-founder, CEO. Claudio is an experienced electronic technician, owner of  a business in the installation of industrial and residential security systems for 27 years, and he is a passionate freediver for 15 years.

 Davide, Senior Firmware Developer. Davide is a TLC engineer and senior embedded system developer with a strong experience in hardware design and multitasking microcontroller firmware.




OXAMA Team

record.Title: Tacticlip® | Mini Multitool Hair Clip | Iridescent, EDC Tool
record.Text:
Front & back of Iridescent Tacticlips - Tactical Hair Clip Mini Multi-tools


Revolutionizing the hair clip... now in iridescent.
Utilitarian raptor claw tip, serrated edge, wire-stripper, screwdriver, & more.
Concealable. Safe on hair. TSA tested.
The ultimate tactical hair clip for unpredictable lifestyles.

 HAIR IS KEPT CONTROLLED: The barrette easily snaps into place
 POINTY TIP, NO SHARPENED EDGE: Designed to be TSA security friendly
 VERSATILE: The ultimate every day carry (EDC) multi-tool
 COMFORTABLE & LIGHTWEIGHT: Clip & forget... until you need it

Stainless steel, electro vacuum plated. Free USA shipping. 🇺🇸📦
You have made our last 6 Kickstarters a huge success, and so we are back with our famous tactical hair clips…
Now in cyberpunk, iridescent color.



Safely slips into the hair as a snap hair clip


Improve / Overcome / Adapt
Comfortable, concealable, & quickly deployable.
Our patent pending design takes the cheap 'multi-tool' hair clips and integrates a raptor-claw-style point, full-length serrated edge, file, wick holder, wire stripper, mini-screwdriver, and ruler. The chameleon color is simply epic. 
This hair clip is for anyone who values that extra level of minimalist preparedness.
The stainless steel Tacticlip doesn't rely on pockets, purses, wallets, or tool belts. 



Built within this tactical hair clip is a mini multi-tool


The Next Level Hair Clip

 SAFE ON HAIR: Does not cut hair
 TSA FRIENDLY: No razor edges
 THICK HAIR: Holds thick hair in place
 JEWISH HERITAGE USE: Perfect for yarmulke and kippah
 STAINLESS STEEL: Always improving, our current Tacticlips are 100% immune to rust and highly durable
 ELECTRO-VACUUM PLATED FINISH: The chameleon, rainbow finish is scratch resistant and is ready for anything the urban (or battlefield) warrior can throw at it
 LASER ENGRAVED: The markings are meticulously laser engraved, meaning they'll never wear off
 NOT A TOY: KEEP OUT OF REACH OF UNDER-AGE CHILDREN. SMALL PARTS, CHOKING, AND SHARP POINT HAZARD FOR CHILDREN.

This inspired our desire to create Tacticlip® - It is the only everyday carry (EDC) multi-tool that you will forget... until you need it, then it's on hand.



Tacticlip - Rainbow hair clip piercing packing tape


Comfortable, concealable, & quickly deployable. Our patent pending design takes the cheap 'multi-tool' hair clips and integrates a raptor-claw-style point, full-length serrated edge, file, wick holder, wire stripper, mini-screwdriver, and ruler.





This hair clip is for anyone who values that extra level of minimalist preparedness. Our Tacticlip® doesn't rely on pockets, purses, wallets, or tool belts.






Hair clip
Raptor Claw point tip
Serrated Edge (does not cut hair)
2x Rulers (inches & metric)
Wick Holder
Mini-Screwdriver
Wire stripper

...and whatever your creativity can throw at it.  








Seen on a worksite in Mexico


How our innovative field testers have used the Tacticlip: 

Flint blade
Saws through zip ties
Zip tie lock pick
Money clip
Non-sliding bookmark
Chip-clip
Pressure point kubotan
Fidget toy
Tiddlywinks drinking game

...and many more uses. For example one field tester (and older bloke in his late 50s) actually magnetized his Tacticlip® to float on water using the surface tension. This effectively turned it into a compass. We were impressed with his innovativeness.
 How will you use your Tacticlip? Last tag we saw on Instagram, a fan bent and used his Tacticlip as a fishing lure. 



Rainbow Hair Clip Multitool - w/ Tough Electro Vacuum Plated Finish








 Ultra-Light Weight:  3 grams
 Length: 2 inches
 Thickness: 1mm
 Serrated Teeth: 17
 Serrated Teeth Style: Shark tooth
 Materials: Stainless Steel
 Color: Iridescent  











This isn't our first Kickstarter rodeo; we've tested and re-tested the production sequence by producing and reserving a limited number of iridescent Tacticlips. 
This Kickstarter is our last step in presenting our new, iridescent design to our fans (you), which we will allocate our limited reserve to you, our first-come, first-serve fanbase. That's how we're able to deliver fast, on-schedule. 

 Kickstarter: Oct 22-Nov 20 @ Midnight | 2021
 Kickstarter verifies funds & deposits: Completed by Dec 4 | 2021
 Blitzkrieg First-round Production Completed by Dec 6 | 2021
 Shipping for Early Adopter Backers: Completed by Dec 6 | 2021
 Rewards arrive in USA homes: Dec 8-15 | 2021
 Rewards arrive in Int'l homes: Dec 10-22 | 2021
 Launch on Amazon & Shopify with remaining inventory: Dec 15 | 2021
 Celebrate with rum: Dec 25 | 2021

If we are able to raise above our anticipated Kickstarter goal, we will schedule more production runs, which we will update our fans as our Kickstarter progresses.  



We have upgraded our finish to electro vacuum plating, meaning it's now scratch resistant: the finish will never wear off (and even if it does, we'll send you a free replacement pack, no charge).





One reward tier includes our custom curated art of our Epic Battle Unicorn. He will be delivered as a 3x3" inch die-cut decal... on holographic sticker material, while supplies last. Just claim the tier that includes the decal, and we'll send it along with your cyberpunk Tacticlips.








This will be our 6th successful Kickstarter.
We are EDC designers, based in Enumclaw WA, right at the base of Mt Rainier, just 45 minutes sooth of Seattle, WA. We've been in operation since 2018 and have been instructing in street self defense since 2010, with a huge emphasis on BJJ. 
We field test every element of our gear, from the jungles of Guatemala to the summit of Mt Rainier. If there is anything out of the ordinary, simply email us, and we'll make it right:

We love our fans and our fans love us

record.Creator: TPL
record.Title: The Right Choice for the Children’s Safety, MOFIT
record.Text:
Mofit is an attachable smart light you can easily attach and detach to the helmet. Children who are not proficient with riding a bike can simply tilt their heads to make turning signals. Also, in a case of emergency or danger, Mofit sends the location of the children to the parents through the connected app. Mofit notifies and allows parents to make fast action in the case of accident and will always protect the safety of the children.












Mofit is designed to be attachable to the helmet children always wear. The simple and light design prevents discomfort when attached and also provides a clean look. It can also be attached to the parent’s helmet; thus, the whole family can use it together. 






Instead of just the helmet, Mofit can be attached to the bike or a kickboard as well.












Children may not be familiar with riding a bike, so there are many cases where they lose control and fall down while riding when they try to signal a turn using a hand. However, Mofit provides a solution to this problem by allowing a turn signal by just tilting the head to the turning direction.

















No problem even if an accident occurs! Mofit, connected to the app, will notify the parents if the children are immobile for a set period. The location is sent right away to the parents allowing a fast action from the parents and preventing more problematic situations.












The Bluetooth connected Mofit allows the parent in lead to make a turn signal and send the identical signal to the children in the back. This allows much safer riding since the children can simply recognize the signal and follow the lead.












The character in the Mofit app recognizes the rider’s movement and provides various quests and items you can collect to add more fun while riding. It can make Mofit more plausible and fun for children who prefer to not wear a helmet.












We are exposed to many dangers as we ride a bike, a kickboard, and others. When the children ride together and try to make manual hand signals, accidents may occur and the children will not be able to react instantly and make the correct actions. To prevent these situations and provide safety for children when riding, Mofit was created. Children who are not familiar with riding a bike or riding together with friends or family, and parents who worry for their children can all enjoy safer riding with Mofit.












Mofit can be easily attached to all kinds of helmets.












Connecting Mofit to the phone is easy. Simply open the app and turn the Mofit device on and it will connect automatically through Bluetooth.

DEMO VIDEO






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00










































































TPL Technology has been constantly developing sports mobility related products. The development began in effort to prevent the children from getting hurt through an accident while playing.  There are various products being sold in sports mobility market. Many unique and creative ideas and products are there, but TPL Technology aims to complete the development of the product focused more on safety.
TPL Technology, with the heart of a loving family, has completed the development and created today's Mofit. Our goal is to help everyone enjoy sports mobility safely. We are confident that we will be able to accomplish our goal for sure.

record.Creator: Ravinder
record.Title: Pico Sense HAT - Monitor Your World with Pico
record.Text:
Pico Sense HAT is designed for environment monitoring with four sensors to measure Temperature, Air quality, humidity, color. It would make things better for the user to create a safe environment for our future generation. Pico Sense HAT comprises of sensors

SHT31(Data Sheet) - The SHT31-DIS-B is a Humidity and Temperature Sensor builds on a new CMOSens® sensor chip that has increased intelligence, reliability and improved accuracy specifications compared to its predecessor.
SGP40(Data Sheet) - The SGP40 is a new digital VOC (volatile organic compounds) sensor designed for easy integration into air purifiers or demand-controlled ventilation. 
BME280(Data Sheet) - The BME280 is a humidity sensor especially developed for mobile applications and wearables where size and low power consumption are key design parameters. The unit combines high linearity and high accuracy sensors and is perfectly feasible for low current consumption, long-term stability and high EMC robustness. The humidity sensor offers an extremely fast response time and therefore supports performance requirements for emerging applications such as context awareness, and high accuracy over a wide temperature range.
TCS34725(Data Sheet) - This device provides a digital return of red, green, blue (RGB), and clear light sensing values. An IR blocking filter, integrated on-chip and localized to the color sensing photodiodes, minimizes the IR spectral component of the incoming light and allows color measurements to be made accurately.

















































































There are many people that might ask that why should I care about the environment monitoring?” which is a valid question. With the changing environment global warming, air pollution, water pollution etc. becoming the most dangerous problems for us. With the constant monitoring of the environment, we would get the data of the air pollution that would help us to take proper measures. 





"If you are a Tech-enthusiast, a student, or a Tech-Hobbyist, this is the place for you."
We provide custom Raspberry Pi devices as well as controller-based application design and development. We are a UK-based company with a terrific and dedicated team who employ cutting-edge tools and machines to finish the procedure with precision. We've established ourselves as one of the top DIY inventors thanks to our innovative products and creative efforts.





We are proud to tell you that our only aim is to enhance the curiosity of people towards electronics products to make a great future for our world. We initiate our projects with the idea of creating and developing things that would develop enthusiasm in a user towards the technology.

record.Creator: Keck Jones
record.Title: Fuel Bus
record.Text:
Fuel Bus is the most convenient way to fill up your tank. Whether you are at work and need gas in your vehicle, or are in bed and realized that you don't want to wake up early to go fill up. We will be there to fill up your tank. We can be used in a variety of ways. Its not just vehicles that we solely fill up. Its everything from a boat to a push mower. Not only do we offer the ability to purchase gas, but also to receive a snack from the convenient store. Just select your desired product and the delivery driver will bring it to you.
What makes us different from our competitors is the ability for our employees to work Whenever they want. You may compare us to apps like Uber. Our employees must obtain  a certain can that can be placed in their car to be filled and delivered to the desired destination. When I mean anyone can work for us, I mean it. Its a simple process of signing up putting your gas can in your car, then turning on the app to see who needs gas.

record.Creator: Jake Queue
record.Title: House Management App
record.Text:
AntsLabor is an innovative property management app modernizing real-estate oversight. We are automating residential property management through the web app AntsLabor.com where a digital replica of each individual house will be created as the online profile.

 We started from an online platform for property management to enhance the living condition of off-campus college students. Our services range from employing machine learning to automate the numerous utility accounts, to deploying AI to facilitate customers’ personal development in various aspects. We are also exploring sustainable construction materials and world-class design for the next generation of smart houses and CleanTech via IoT.

 We transfer insightful self-help books into a comprehensive web app. Apply scientific approaches to unleash the potential of undeveloped and underdeveloped human capital. We deliver an information infrastructure that allows us to transition toward the Third Industrial Revolution with a near-zero marginal cost of clean energy.

 Our team is solving a social problem by creating new technology. We, humans, have made tremendous progress from enslaving animals and fellow human beings towards utilizing heavy machinery like a railway, an airplane, or a dishwasher. Let's continue the technological improvement of living standards while delegating more tasks to computers. Let computers do what computers do best so that we can spend more time enjoying our lives.
