record.Creator: Fast As A Rocket
record.Title: Rocket | The Social Media That Helps You Focus
record.Text:
It's time to stop letting your phone control your life
Never get enough done?
Always distracted?
Like picking up your phone 150 times per day?





Social medias are designed to extract as much of our attention as possible. Our brains are up against teams of engineers who design products that use your psychology against you... Without even ever triggering your awareness.
We have no natural cognitive defence against this.

Why we can’t afford to do nothing
We are already distracted, unproductive and stressed. Big Tech is pouring billions into making their products more addictive and manipulative. This world is our reality now - there is no escaping the attention economy. Each and every day it becomes easier to fall into a life of distraction. 
Do you want to find out how your life will look when you're picking up your phone 300 times per day?

Introducing Rocket, the new social media that helps you focus 
Social media is the most powerful psychological tool out there. We have carefully designed Rocket to help you harness this powerful tool to unlock your full productive potential - getting you off your phone and helping you focus on whatever you need to do.





Rocket is built specifically for young, high-output individuals who want to control and protect their attention - people who can’t afford to lose any time.
















How it works (the short version) 
Before you can see the posts on Rocket, first you have to get off your phone and focus for around 25 mins ⏳. We call these Rocket timers, and they subtly nudge you to be more accountable with yourself and to avoid distractions.
It seems so simple, but this is what Rocket can do for you...

#1 Turn some of the times you pick up your phone into 'Time Well Spent' 💡 
Rocket is great at capturing your attention with posts and notifications, just like any other social media. What it does from there is obviously very different though.






#2 Boost your productivity ⚡
Get more focus out of your day and get work done faster, as you’re always only one notification or tap away from Rocket's effective focus timers. Rocket makes it such a mentally easy decision to get started on some work (and actually do it).






#3 Turn work into flow 🌊 
Rocket helps you rethink your work as a challenge rather than a chore. This makes you much more likely get you into what psychologists call ‘flow’ (it happens when the challenge of a task and your abilities are perfectly matched).






#4 Grow more aware and in control of your tech usage 👁️
Disrupt existing bad tech habits. Over time Rocket helps you become more conscious of how much you use your phone and more aware of the effect of behavioural design on your actions.






#5 Improve your ability to focus 🏋️ 
Just like with any other skill, you can train your focus. At the end of each timer you're prompted to ask yourself if you were focused or distracted. This forms an instant feedback loop that trains your mind to avoid the things that cause you to become distracted. We also give you tips to help you build better habits around your tech use.






#6 Exchange ideas with and learn from other super smart and focused people 🧠 
Being the place of focus, Rocket is naturally a hub of thoughtful people, great ideas and insightful reflections. See beyond what you usually see on the surface.






#7 Be good to the environment and your mind 🌱 
We donate to offset 1.2kg of CO2 for every hour of focus on Rocket. So far we have contributed towards projects that provide clean drinking water to Rwandan communities & help bring new innovative waste management practices to Vietnam. See more here.






#8 Feel more fulfilled 🧘
Completing a timer of focus feels SO satisfying. Rocket also helps you celebrate the small wins by rewarding you after every timer and every task you complete :)












What using Rocket looks like 






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































You can use Rocket for anything from 30 mins of focus per day to a full day of focus. Since it fits right in with your existing productivity tools, it's not a hassle to set up and you don't have to rely on using it all the time.






Rewards










Note: We will never sell ads, and never sell your data. So Rocket will cost $10/month to keep us running.
Available on iOS and Android. Should run smoothly on any smartphone less than 3 years old.







Timeline 












Success so far
Our early testers have collectively focused for more than 70000 minutes so far out of just ~75000 minutes of Rocket timers (yep, people are very rarely distracted when using Rocket).

We have also been actively involved in the local startup community here in Sydney, Australia. We've been learning heaps, participating in a bunch of courses, programs and pitch nights.






Our story
Hey I'm Cameron, the young solo creator of Rocket. It's been an amazing yet incredibly challenging journey so far. I've been playing the 3 startup roles all at once. This is possible as I am lucky enough to be alive at time where building a business can be done solo (albeit not easily) and in a part of the world with an abundance of resources and opportunity.





Thank you to my incredible support network of mentors, advisors and everyone else who has helped along the way!

What got me started?
I never imagined that one day I would build a social media. Truth be told I've never liked social media that much. This all began as I was simply interested in improving my productivity. I was never good at being able to focus on my work unless I had a tight deadline breathing down my neck. This was always stressful and I lost a lot of time to procrastination.





Through around 2 years of research and experimentation with multiple ideas it became clear to me that the biggest problem most of us face is distractions. Our 200 000 year old brains have not evolved to handle the vast amounts of information and context switching that we experience 24/7 in the Information Age. We pick up our phones 150 times per day on average (once every 6.5 minutes). Our ‘attention residue’, a term psychologists use, is spread everywhere, drastically reducing our cognitive performance. One study even found that it takes us on average 23 minutes to get focused on a task after a distraction. But that’s just the start of the rabbit hole...

Why make Rocket?
We happen to live in an attention economy, where there is a strong economic incentive for pretty much all products – apps, websites, social medias, media, etc – to battle for your attention through whatever means possible. Our phones are a gateway to our attention.





Technology is improving at an amazing rate, and every year our phones become a larger part of our lives. It follows that technology is manipulating away more and more of our attention.

At what point do we lose control of our attention completely? What will that mean for humanity?

We’re simply not doing enough to avoid this catastrophe waiting to happen. We can’t wait for regulators to step in or wait for Big Tech to grow a conscience. I believe it is a necessity to do something about this before it’s too late. With Rocket I think I can play a part in helping drive some consumer awareness and build more demand for better technology that respects our attention.


Why we need your support!
Venture Capital is great for some startups, however it necessitates aiming for crazy never-ending growth / profit above all else (and yes, sometimes profit above customers' wellbeing).





We believe we have to do things very differently, and that includes not taking the conventional Venture Capital path. We are really relying on your support to get off the ground. Not going to lie - we currently have a shoestring marketing budget, so we are relying on the proceeds from this campaign to kickstart our marketing and launch.


If you believe your attention should be yours, don't wait until it is too late.
To take a step to stand up for our attention, please support our Kickstart campaign.







Links
























Fast as a Rocket's Terms of Service can be found here.

record.Creator: dottwav
record.Title: dottwav
record.Text:
Dottwav is a music streaming platform for independent musicians.
"We created dottwav because we wanted independent musicians to finally have a streaming platform that catered to their music, not the music signed to major record labels."
With both founders being independent musicians themselves, they know what independent musicians need from a streaming platform in order to succeed. They also know how the current music streaming platforms available do not help independent musicians, and only make it harder for consumers to find new undiscovered talent. 
We are in the final stages of building dottwav and we are grateful for your support. We will be using the funding to finish the design, flow, and functionality of the mobile app, website, and desktop player.

THE PROBLEM

No music streaming platform exists that solely helps independent musicians get more plays, grow their fanbase, and gain critical insight on their music’s analytics.
No music streaming platform exists that connects consumers/subscribers solely with independent musicians, and undiscovered musicians.
No music streaming platform exists that pays musicians for their streams, fairly, efficiently, and easily.
No music streaming platform exists that is a direct to upload type platform solely for independent musicians.

THE SOLUTION (DOTTWAV)

A music streaming platform/service solely for independent musicians.
A mobile app where consumers can listen to and discover new and fresh independent music daily.
A direct upload to a web portal where independent musicians who are subscribed can upload their music for mobile streaming. Musicians will also have access to their streaming analytics, their catalog, and the money they make on the platform.
A desktop streaming player for consumers who like to stream independent musicians on their computer. 

















With the help of your funding we will be able to finish our mobile app/website and officially launch our beta version! 
Creating a platform that will help millions of independent musicians is our goal, and we are grateful for your help!

record.Text:
The smallest and most portable charging cable you could ever have. The 6 in 1 charging cable has all the standard connectors to charge whatever device you are using to whatever power source you have available. The connectors and adapters slip nicely into it’s stylish metal casing to protect them on your key chain.






































































There are magnets as a holding place for your adapters when the other connectors are in use. The main cable is USB-C to USB-C to support fast charging and data transfer. All of these features wrapped into an elegant accessory for your keychain.





High Six is available in four stylish colors: Black, All Black, Silver and Rose Gold










Making on-the-go charging easier with one compact accessory on your key chain.





The new design is even smaller than High Five. Lighter, smaller, and more secure. It is the direct successor of High Five. During the design process, we incorporated the feedback we received from the user experience.





For example: The cap for High Five, proved it was not capable of surviving the daily wear and tear on a key chain and often got lost. That is why High Six has a sleek metal case to secure the adapters in place as you go about your day.

record.Title: City Run VR the best fitness app for your Oculus Quest 1 & 2
record.Text:
You can run, jog and train in VR!
Do you want to running, jogging or simply stay fit with with your Oculus Quest? Now You can! We are developong City Run VR, the first and most realistic simulation for jogging, running and walking in a realistic and immersive virtual 3d environment!
The App will be totally compatible with your Oculus Quest VR headset (1 & 2) and very soon it will also be compatible with all the other VR viewers and the smartphones on the market.
The virtual environment will reproduce reality faithfully. You will have the feeling of running in a real urban environment with traffic, pedestrians, voices, ambient sounds, streets, buildings, etc.
The experience will include many different variables including: complete day / night cycle, synchronization with the time and weather conditions of the player's location, wind, rain, clouds, sunrise, sunset, traffic, pedestrians, for an ever-changing and engaging game scenario!
You will be able to train in many different conditions (night, day, sunrise, sunset, rain, wind, busy city, deserted city, etc.) just like in reality!
We are working hard to create the most innovative and realistic jogging and running simulation ever made. You will be able to train in an effective and fun way from the comfort of your home whenever you want.
Do you want to stay fit jogging,running  or walking  in the comfort of your home? Do you want to do physical activity when and how do you want? Do you want to play sports without going to crowded places or risking unnecessarily at the health level?
With our Virtual App you will comfortably  stay fit  in a safe, fun and engaging way at home  at work or anywhere else you want at anytime of the day and  whenever you want!
Thanks to the AI each workout will be different from the previous one and you will be able to train in a setting that is always new and engaging. The AI recognise also the time (e.g. if you train in the evening it will also be in the app).
You will be able to run or walk in a totally immersive virtual environment also monitoring your progress in real time (steps taken, distance travelled) You will able  to  train  in a  effective and fun way  with a pleasant and motivating background music  in an absolutely realistic virtual environment with your VR headset (Oculus Quest 1 & Oculus Quest 2).
Features:
■ You can run at home
Limited time? Bad weather? No problem! With our App You can run confortably at home.
■ Stunning experience
The first and most realistic simulation for jogging in a  immersive 3d environment.
■ Stay fit with music
Train with an energetic and motivating soundtrack that changes everytime.
■ Each traning is unique
Each training session will be fun, engaging and different from the last thanks to the AI.
■ Track your progress
You can monitor your progress in real time every time (steps taken, distance travelled)..
■ No need of costly gear
Forget expensive gym membership or costly equipments, you need only the Oculus viewer  that you already have.
■ A real training in VR
Each training session wil be absolutely effective, you will burn almost 636 calories with an hour training session.
■ Too out of shape to run?
You can simply just walk and loosing weight while having fun.
-----------------------------------------------------------
Some of the great features that will be included in the app !!!
1) Faster loading times 
2) Very fast framerate on Oculus Quest1 and Oculus Quest 2
3) The locomotion system will be realistic and responsive both when you run and when you walk
4) An artificial intelligence routine whereby pedestrians look in your direction when you pass them (as in real life)!
5) A smart navigation system of the various game elements
6) A smart AI system that manages traffic and cars
7) A variable system that manages the various weather conditions (rain, sun, wind, clouds, etc.)
8) Some cool fx effects
9) Numerous neon advertising signs in the urban environment (great to see when jogging at night!)
10) A circular bar (audiometer) that pulses to the beat of the music - cool!
11) Great  fluidity and speed of running (you can run ... like Usain Bolt! :))
12) A clever artificial intelligence engine
13) A beatiful background (forest / trees)
14) Various animated elements (crane, wind turbines, etc.)

record.Creator: Elasto Inc.
record.Title: Elasto | Ergonomic Light Click Mouse
record.Text:
INTRODUCING
The Elasto Mouse
Our patented elastic click design removes the bottom of the mouse and frees your hands from the very uncomfortable experience of batting your finger against a hard surface hundreds of thousands of times.




















These are not renderings, but real photos.








01. You click too much.



This is your hand, enduring tens of millions of clicks over a lifetime.




02. You go "ouch this sucks, this is very uncomfortable".







03. Actually, you haven’t been clicking but crashing against a hard surface thousands of times a day. 



This is your hand, clicking a brick-hard mouse button.





See? Your finger and wrist joints are in a 'mouse crash accident' every second.



04. A little googling will confirm you that yes, repeated crashing onto the hand causes stress. 



Structure of a traditional mouse


The above shows the skeleton of a typical mouse. The kind of mouse you have been using from your first encounter with a PC until now. Microswitches are located at the front of the mouse. They are the components that make the crisp click sound when you press down the mouse button.

THE PROBLEM IS that the switches lie below your fingertip. So when you click the button, your fingertip collides with the switch. Subsequently your finger, hand, and arm are injured.

In jargon, actuation distance and travel distance (there is a Glossary down this page!) are almost the same. This structure makes bottoming out so easy. In other words, it makes you slam your finger on the button. This is what we call an incident of a 'mouse-crash'.


05. So we took the tension away by removing the hard stop. 



And herein lies our great discovery and genesis for the bottomless mouse.



06. Now you can click lightly.
Elasto's bottomless structure involves the Principle of the Lever.




Lever of a typical mouse (left) and Elasto (right)


So you need to apply only half of the actuation force to click the Elasto.

Well, what about when you double-click?



High impact forces with a typical mouse (left) and low smooth forces with Elasto (right) when double clicking


As the above graphic shows, double-clicking the typical mouse produces high and somewhat impact forces. In comparison, double-clicking the Elasto mouse produces low and smooth forces. This is because Elasto has a longer overtravel distance and uses the principle of the lever. 

You can click lightly with Elasto. More lightly than you can ever imagine.


07. Back our Kickstarter to get an elastic, light clicking mouse. 
We promise ELASTO will save your hands.



Woo!

















Among ergonomic mice, the most widespread type is the vertical mouse. The vertical mouse has an interesting concept of rotating the orientation of the hand to 45° to 90° compared to the typical mouse. Manufacturers claim that a typical mouse places your wrist in unnatural angles while the handshake position of the vertical mouse is natural.

Some people love the vertical mouse. Since their arm and hand positions have changed, previously overused muscles come to a pause. So their wrist pain is somewhat relieved.


Did vertical mouse really solve your issue? I mean, really?

Can you click a vertical mouse without using your thumb?
No.
The vertical mouse will not stay steady unless your thumb supports it while the buttons are being clicked. In other words, your thumb and index finger must be involved in a 'pinching grip' to click. No wonder why my thumb was sore using the vertical mouse.






Scientific findings support this. 

Dr. David Rempel¹ and his colleagues conducted a series of research to examine factors affecting carpal tunnel pressure. They found in 1997 that carpal tunnel pressure increases when the wrist position is in unneutral angles and when the fingertip is carrying out a pressing task². A year later, they found that carpal tunnel pressure was even higher when pinching than simply pressing³. This means that clicking-and-dragging is worse than just clicking because a pinching grip is sustained.

This leads us to conclude that vertical mice can actually increase wrist tension. This could answer why wrist pain did not go away even when you changed to a vertical mouse.

¹ Dr. David Rempel is a Professor Emeritus in the Department of Medicine at UC San Francisco and Faculty in the Ergonomics Laboratory at UC Berkeley.
² Rempel, D.M., Keir, P.J., Smutz, W.P., and Hargens, A., 1997. Effects of static fingertip loading on carpal tunnel pressure. Journal of Orthopaedic Research, 15(3), pp.422-426.
³ Keir, P.J., Bach, J.M., and Rempel, D.M., 1998. Fingertip loading and carpal tunnel pressure: differences between a pinching and a pressing task. Journal of Orthopaedic Research, 16(1), pp.112-115.











If you answered ‘yes’ to any of the questions above, we strongly encourage you to try the Elasto mouse. Elasto’s buttons are awesome. Not only do they provide amazing comfort, but they feel satisfying. Bouncy, chewy, resilient, elastic - you define it when you get it. You’ve got to feel it to judge it. You will be amazed at how light Elasto’s buttons are!







POWER MODE at your convenience
Your Elasto will arrive with an AA battery installed for you. However, if you would like to enjoy the benefit of a rechargeable mouse, we devised the Elasto so you can easily switch mode to a rechargeable mouse. Insert a rechargeable lithium-ion battery and set to Li-ion mode on the Elasto. Charge with a USB-C cable to keep it going. (Note: Li-ion battery and USB-C cable are not included.)

WIRELESS MODE of your selection
Elasto provides Bluetooth freedom. No Bluetooth? No problem. Plug in the provided 2.4G USB dongle and you’re good to go.


















a. Travel distance
The distance from the top of the button (unpressed) to the bottom of the button (when pressed all the way down to fully bottom out). Travel distance is the sum of pretravel and overtravel distance.

b. Actuation (actuation point, actuation distance, actuation force)
When you push downward the mouse button, in most cases with a tactile bump, the switch is actuated. Actuation point refers to the point when electrical contact is made (i.e., the switch turns “on”). Actuation distance is the distance from the top of the button (unpressed) to actuation point. Actuation force is the force needed to reach the actuation point. You must press the key to this amount in order for the switch to be recognized. Mouse switches with high actuation force require stronger force, while switches with low actuation force are light to press. This value depends on the switch manufacturer such as Omron, Kailh, etc.

c. Applied force
Applied force is the amount of force used to press a button. When applied force exceeds actuation force, this suggests excessive strain or bottoming out the button. Minimizing applied force by all means is strongly recommended for sound hands. This can be achieved by clicking gently (your job) or devising a mouse with a low actuation force (click switch or mouse manufacturer’s job).

d. Pretravel
Before reaching the point of actuation, the button descends some distance. This is ‘pretravel’. This prevents erratic switch actuation.

e. Overtravel
After the point of actuation, the button may be able to move further downwards. In this case, electrical contact is made (i.e., the switch turns “on”) before the button is fully depressed. The additional distance that the button can continue to be pressed after actuation is ‘overtravel’. Overtravel means that buttons do not have to be struck hard or pressed all the way down. When overtravel is provided, chances of finger fatigue are low particularly when using the mouse at a high rate of speed. Elasto’s bottomless structure using the lever allows the longest overtravel among any button-clicking mouse.


















The birth of Elasto dates back to 2018. Elasto’s founder Unice was troubled with her puffy sore index finger joint, numb forearm, and tension in the hand after working on the computer mouse 16 hours a day. She tried alternative mice – including ergonomically vertical mice – but after a few days of seeming relief, she felt pain again in different parts this time.
Her loving father Sang heard Unice complaining about her discomfort. As an engineer who devoted his life to the study of mechatronics, he immediately figured out what the problem was in a typical mouse.
Collision = Shock = Harm to hand. (Newton’s third law)
He found an aged-to-yellow mouse from the storage. He adjusted it so that the mouse button had a longer travel distance than what the default Omron microswitch provided — longer overtravel distance, to be precise.



This crude prototype supported Sang’s idea: short overtravel harms the finger while long overtravel saves finger.


Unice began using the reformed mouse. Some weeks later, she surprisingly found that she had completely forgotten about finger pain. Her arm was also improving. At last Unice’s hand was safe. However, as time passed, there were some issues regarding durability. So the prototype was modified multiple times before Unice and Sang decided to make mice as a business.

Unice and Sang are specialists in observing and releasing bodily tension. They both are certified Alexander Technique (AT) teachers. For a total of 13 years, they have been helping numerous students refrain from engaging in harmful habits of posture and tension and guiding healthier ones. According to AT, you are eligible to consciously inhibit yourself from pounding on the computer mouse. If you are careful, you would click gently with little tension. No doubt that this is true in all circumstances. However, not all of you are trained to consciously control how you live your body. For instance, it is close to impossible to consciously control your clicking habit when you are in a state of mind completely immersed in what you are doing on a computer. 
As ‘tension releasing specialists’, team Elasto designed the invention so that your hands don’t get tense without having you even know it. Count on us.

record.Creator: Vanessa Outland
record.Title: Support the completion of an App for Event Professionals
record.Text:
From the Home Screen, users will be able to select the type of event they wish to have.





Users will see all of their active events in this screen





Service Providers can view all potential clients here


Hello, and thanks for taking the time to read my story. I'm Vanessa, a 39 year old single mother of two beautiful children; 14 year old girl and 11 year old boy. For all of my adult life I have been the planner/organizer of events in the family. I am the last of 10 children so...very big and lively family! I've planned, coordinated and executed events big and small from birthday parties, to most recently, weddings. I thoroughly enjoy doing this kind of work so I thought to create an events management business that would allow me to put my talents to good use and also create a legacy for my children. Just as I was gearing up to get things going (began my Master's certificate in Event Management program), the COVID-19 Pandemic hit the nation. 
With COVID came the state and country-wide mandated "stay-at-home orders." I realized that this climate may not be the best time to start my business as envisioned, for the very simple fact that its success relies heavily on people gathering together for these different occasions. I was able to complete my Event Management Master's Certificate program this past July (2021) and I felt reinvigorated to get my first endeavor started. I set out to see how I could do something else (in the meantime) that would satisfy a need that has gone unmet for a number of years. With the help of my two little ones, and after a lot of hours brainstorming and consulting with the people I trust; I landed on the idea that I am bringing to you all now. 
A mobile application. One that will provide a means for Event Professionals (Event Managers, Planners, Caterers, Decorators, Photographers, etc.) to network, collaborate, and better meet the needs of their clients. I landed on this idea for a few reasons: 1) because after years of planning various events, my experience (which was in line with the market research) was that there was no seamless way to acquire event professionals or vendors outside of google searches and/or utilizing existing relationships; 2) There were various apps out there that aid in the event planning process, but nothing that directly focuses on connecting event professionals and their clients ; and 3) Even with COVID, I saw a steady uptick of in-person events around the country; toward the last quarter of the year folks began having their events. The events were looking a little different due to the observance of the COVID-19 safety guidelines, but they were still being held. 
I saw the need for my App grow as it would assist in filling the gap and helping those in the industry like myself, and their clients get connected more efficiently. To that end, I wrote out the details of what I'd like the features of the App to be and I began scouting for App Developers. 
App Features and Functionality
- Users will be required to sign-up/register on the app, they will create a profile either as a client or an event professional. Event professionals will pay a subscription fee to join, Clients will be able to sign up for free. 
-Clients will be able to create a post detailing the services they require for their event 
- Event Professionals (service providers) will be required create a profile for their business/service that provides clients with the business name, a description of services, ratings and reviews from past customers, a portfolio, and any packages if available. 
-Event Professionals will review clients' job posts and submit a proposal for service.
-Clients will review and compare all proposals directly inside the app. They will be able to contact the service provider via the application and select the package and scope of services in the application. 
- All services acquired for a specific event will be housed in the app under that event posting. Clients will be able to connect and communicate with all their service providers in one place via app chat for each of their events. 
- Clients will be able to submit ratings for each vendor at the conclusion of their contract. Ratings will be added to the service providers profile. 
- Service providers will be ranked on the app according to these ratings. Highly rated service providers will get more exposure on the app and therefore more job offers.
I connected with four companies for development. After reviewing proposals from each, I decided to go with the company offering the best quality and most comprehensive service. I am currently in phase 3 out of 4 of development and I am requesting your support to push through to completion and marketing. I believe that this app will have a significant impact on this industry and I'd like you to be a part of it. Thanks in advance for your generosity!

record.Creator: BluAct Technologies GmbH
record.Title: BluAct water purifier | Go beyond water pitchers
record.Text:
If you live in a place where tap water is considered potable, you are either:
i) Drinking water from the tap (with no post-treatment)
ii) Drinking post-treated tap water. Post treatments can be multiple (from simple devices like a water pitcher to reverse osmosis)
Whether you are in scenario i) and ii), we have two questions for you:
1) Do you really know what is in your tap water?
2) Are you using the right water post-treatment?
Difficult questions, right? Don’t worry, you don’t need to answer. We will give you the answer to these questions.
The quality of your tap water at home can vary and depends on many factors such as the region where you live, your municipal water supply, etc.…Think about the distance traveled by water from the outlet of your municipal water treatment plant to your kitchen’s faucet. You have probably already heard about water lead contamination due to old pipelines, or plastic microfibers pollution due to legal or illegal discharge of containers in water sources, or even organic pesticides. Pollutants can leak out of wastewater treatment and industrial plants and enter the water supply.
Therefore, tap water can contain pollutants as microplastics, pesticides, heavy metals, chlorine, fluoride, lead and even radioactive compounds. These pollutants can be harmful for your health if not maintained at low concentrations or traces. Even when kept at the level of traces, pollutants can lead to long-term health issues.
Do you really know what's in your tap water?





 The problem with Water pitchers 
Many people across the globe use a water pitcher to filter and store tap water before drinking it.
Did you know that most of the water pitchers available in the market (including most famous brands) are not capable to filter most of the pollutants that might be in your tap water? Some pollutants are partially removed, most not at all.
Ok you maybe knew that…but did you know about the breeding ground problem in water pitchers? Did you hear about secondary water pollution?
Let us explain…city water contains bacteria coming from biofilm (bacteria that grow in the surface) in the pipes. Water pitcher cartridges are playgrounds for bacteria and microorganisms to grow and develop. This increased concentration of bacteria can threaten the safety of your water. While your pitcher cartridge is filtering some pollutants from your tap water, it is adding and increasing bacteria and microorganisms in your tap water.












You are probably asking yourself…what’s now? How can I drink my tap water being sure that all the harmful pollutants and bacteria are filtered out?
The solution – The BluAct “All-in-one” for ultimate water filtration
BluAct Technologies has the solution for you. BluAct All-in-one is a water filtration system capable to filter all the pollutants you might find in your tap water and to protect your water from secondary pollution.







 The technology behind The BluAct “All-in-one” solution 







The BluAct All-in-one solution instantly filter out all the contaminants you could find in your tap water, from pesticides, passing through heavy metals to bacteria… everything is removed. How? With a four stages filtration cartridge: 1) a plant-based washable fabric take care of macroparticles and dust, 2) a coconut carbon block take care of your water taste, smell and microfiltration, 3) the BluAct patented granulated media with milk proteins remove the heavy metals and organic pollutants, and 4) a last stage hollow fibers take care of the microbiology of water.
This is called the ultimate purification.










Just filter what you need, when you need it. With the diverter valve attached to the faucet, you can choose when to filter water. Use clean filtered water to prepare your favorite drinks, from your coffee/tea in the morning to your detox waters to stay hydrate all day long. Don’t’ forget to use safe filtered water to rinse your veggies and fruits.  















Wherever you live around the globe, connect BluAct countertop to your faucet and drink tap water safely.





The Product is certified by the world health organization (WHO) under the household water treatment system (HWTS) scheme, at the NSF international laboratories in Michigan, USA, Swiss government and it is in compliance with food contact regulations. 
Single-use plastic water bottles are polluting our oceans, rivers, streets, landfills and poisoning our air when they're burned in incinerators. One million plastic bottles are bought around the world every minute. Experts predict that there will be one pound of plastic in the ocean for every three pounds of fish by 2025.






The product is available in chrome and white color.

record.Creator: Filip Sendziak
record.Title: Emood
record.Text:
My name is Filip, I’m founder and CEO of emood, whilst being a father and husband and until 2017 I had a regular job and life but just one day on my way to work I had a blackout and first epilepsy attack which meant being taken to hospital.





  The outcome was that I have two brain tumors, one 4.5 cm in the front and the second 3cm in the 4 chamber in the place where all neurons are connected. 
Suddenly in that moment I was totally depressed and hopeless, but after a few days in hospital I started to change my thinking and decided to not give up, because my wife and daughter have nobody except me, and I still have to take care of them.

                       In January 2018 I had my first of three surgeries, after being in hospital for three weeks and it was a very difficult and lonely time. ( even support of wife and daughter in this kind situations is challenging because I have to hide my emotions in front of them)





The second and more dangerous brain surgery back in June 2019, again leaving my family for a few weeks in hospital meant I was alone ( alone with thoughts that I did not want to show to my family ) again and with feelings of fear, stress and not-knowing what would happen meant I was so scared for my life and what my family would go through.





  The third surgery in January 2020 which then after battling a strong infection in the part of the skull and AGAIN weeks’ in hospital I kept getting knocked back down and feeling like my life was over and what else could possibly be next!
Living with depression, and even when I knew that I still have my wife and daughter by my side who without them I wouldn’t have made it through.

                       All the countless weeks in hospitals show me just how important is to be able to talk to someone, not only the people I know, but with anyone, meeting people on the ward, and expressing things that sometimes even the family may not have time to talk or would not understand would give me the release or a thought process I needed to go on and keep battling on for them.

                       Of course I had my phone, but social media is not really the place where we can start conversations with strangers (who often judge on the basis of photos, videos) who use social media to share how glamorous our life is at a moment or a photo of a beautiful holiday in the sun.

                       I wasn’t going to share or talk to someone about what I was going through as honestly nobody on those platforms cared and it wasn’t private enough as I didn’t want it shared around the world, 
I wasn’t looking for attention or likes... I just wanted to talk.

                       So that is why the world needs emood. simply just to talk, no judgement or people sharing for likes or getting attention. It’s about connecting people so they are never alone if they have a phone, or not able to share what they feel with loved ones or friends as we don’t sometimes need their judgement.






This is how the idea for emood was born;

                       2020 January - Beaumont hospital (emergency surgery - very bad infection)
               After the evening meal, Nurse ( I do not even remember her name ) came to me ( she usually works in different ward but that day she was at St. Mary's ward - night shift) we talked for a while ( she was doing exams and bloods in the meantime)and she asked me "do you have Netflix? - watch secrets. At the end she said goodnight and I have never seen her again.
                       I watch "Secret" then research YouTube all night , I realize that lot of people live with this motto, and I knew that everything was going to be alright.
                       I didn't have easy life but I always was want to do something good ( be remembered as someone how give a smile more than sadness, to help people around me, create opportunities for them and be happy with their success, smile and happiness.)
                       But living on weekly basis with such a small chance to ( create something that can make dose dreams to come true)
 
Secret "law of attraction" - I knew it all my life. But I really started to ( believe ) that day in the hospital.
                       Believe mean - start to risk and take chances, not every time you will win but have to still believe and constantly think about life success for you, your family, friends and community. You will achieve what you want.
                       This is how I understood the secret.
 
      I start to think positively and really believe and visually that I still have an opportunity to make it happen. I knew that opportunity would come, I just needed to (catch) in the right time and take a chance. At this point I didn't even know what this could be.
 
     One day at my regular daily walk ( rehabilitation) I start to feel very lonely and want to talk with someone who not know me, not judging me, " just don't give a f..k " and just talk, like in hospital where everyone is after a serious illness ( cancer, amputation) but when I was with these people we were not judged, not looking by our illness, nationality, gender, we just talked about different things and we were happy.
                       I started to miss the hospital and this careless talk. because at home we haven't had a great situation since 2017 when I had my first epilepsy attack and in hospital I found that I have quite big 2 brain tumors.  I couldn't give up because I am responsible for my wife and daughter. But those 4 years were very hard. Even after those weeks in hospitals and 3 brain surgeries, and all other things happened through all this years, I am always trying to find good things in these moments and situations. Learn from those experiences and I know that all those things bring to this point.
                       I am grateful for every good and hard moments in my life and especially the last 21y with my wife and daughter.

                       That day February 2021, I started to think about mobile application where I can chat with people being absolutely anonymous, where I can just chat, not showing pictures what I eat or what I have - for all those things are different platforms.
                       If I show my picture at present ( after surgery) I will be automatically treated more gently or arouse regret or at least I will think that way.
                       So I wanted the place where I will only be held accountable for what I say from what I said.
                       Where I can ask for objective feedback, where I can communicate in my native language, because not everyone speaks English.
                       Where I can practice my language skills by talking with real people.
                       Where I can meet people with the same interests and discuss ideas, change opinions.
                       And where I can ask for help or help someone who is in difficult situation and not be afraid of own opinion as we all are the same and equal but everyone has own individual character ( personality ) and That's making us so special.

                       So We invent emood application and create emood project, it's not only mobile application (communication tool) but also concept of emood nation where people can share their real emotions, worries, happiness, sadness. Because we all have a need to be connecting each other.
                       Especially now when the situation around the world is like this with lockdowns and restrictions.
                       More and more people are spending time on the Internet, but not everyone is ( brave enough to show himself in social media) - - or be afraid to be ( judging, hate).
                       Even famous people sometime would like to hear real opinion about their new movie, song ,new restaurant, sport success or falling.
                       I want to create community and brand which going to be ( synonymous to - careless and unafraid place to talk )
                       Where you are not alone ever again.
                       I decided to act, for a month I was doing market research, designing applications and functions that I would like to be available to everyone.





    Having no financial resources to implement my project, I started looking for people with whom I could create emood.

               Now we are a team ( more like family who take care for project as parent care about a baby) of 3 people with passion to do something good and positive, who spent 9 months making the emood app. 
 
     We believe the world needs emood.  Simply just to talk, no judgement or people sharing for likes or getting attention. It’s about connecting people so they are never alone if they have a phone, or not able to share what they feel with loved ones or friends as we don’t sometimes need their judgement.































                       That's why we created the emood project.
     Project because it is not just a communication platform that ensures anonymity.
 
      Our goal is to create many additional projects based on the same assumptions.
 
  We are currently working on the 2nd and 3rd version of the application, which will have additional features that will allow the user for many more interactions, while remaining anonymous. ( ready project waiting for implementation ) 
                       You also have a project to create games that will be based on the characters that represent emood.
 
These are the principles that guided us in creating emood.
1 . "do not judge - do not hate" Just Talk
 
2 . "we are all equal and at the same time each of us is unique - each with its own personality and history" Just Talk
 
3 . share only emotions, knowledge, experiences from life, joy in life, sadness that sometimes affects everyone.
 
Because what is really valuable is what we have in our heads. And we can only share it with words. For this you do not need photos, videos, reality filters.
                       When we use words, it is impossible to judge anyone in terms of - wealth or poverty, skin color, appearance, or anything that each of us tried to hide from others, even though others might not even see it.
 
emood is not meant to be a competition for Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, but an alternative where you can talk carelessly without being exposed to everything you would like to avoid in social media.
 
     Of course, we are cheering on all the social platforms that help to provide the wider community that uses the Internet "smile, knowledge, hopes, views, everyday events".
                       Sometimes we just need to talk and that's why we don't compete, we only give the opportunity to contact all those who sometimes want to remain anonymous.
                       We ourselves will use social platforms where we want to create a community that will support and share a smile. 

For this purpose, we have created 10 characters who have a personality like us. 






                       Anyone who wants to can identify with such a character.











You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.

00:00
































                       We are a small group of people who want to create something that we feel can help many people, especially nowadays. 
Now emood app v1 BETA is available on Play Store ( Android ) as we are doing last tests.

 emood app available for download on Play Store ( Android ) and App Store ( Ios ) version 1 on 29/10/2021

      We want our application to always remain free, so if you use or just want to support the emood project, you can buy a product with our logo or donate via PayPal, swift or simply go to our (Facebook, Instagram, TikTok) give a like and share.

record.Creator: Luis
record.Title: Rutealo App
record.Text:
Hi, first I want to thank you for taking the time to read this and check out my kickstarter.  We are raising funds to develop Rutealo, a platform that I think is missing in our new digital age.  We are young entrepreneurs inspired by promoting technology and employment at the same time.  We are focused on creating a system where people can place their orders or orders from their home or work from an application where they can choose different options for restaurants, pharmacies and supermarkets.  The person will not have to go out to pick up their order since the order will be delivered to the place where the person is at the time of placing their order or to any other place that the customer wants their order to arrive.
Currently there are many people who cannot or do not have the resources to reach the shops, many of them people of legal age.  With this platform, any person or family member can place an order and send their purchase, medicines or other necessary items to them or to people who cannot reach a store.

    All the funds collected will be used in their entirety to carry out the necessary App along with the relevant programming so that their functions work according to what is needed, acquire equipment to be able to carry out the work and hire employees to work with this great project.

record.Creator: Kieron
record.Title: MY WALK - Turn a walk into a Full Body Workout
record.Text:
Turn a walk into a Full Body Workout
MY WALK, is an electronic portable handheld device designed to encourage a walking style that achieves more benefits in less time than normal walking and engages more muscles, 90% as opposed to only 40% standard walk.
MY WALK works in harmony with your body and smartly prompts you to excel intuitively.
Think Nordic Walk, without the cumbersome poles.



MY WALK device





In Action





Full Body Workout








You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































How does MY WALK work
• The key MY WALK's effectiveness is it helps you to execute proper form more often than not, a full rep.
• A walk is vastly improved to burn more calories and engage more muscles by encouraging the user to properly and fully elevate the forward swinging arm to a pre-determined level. Thus working not only the lower body but engaging the upper body torso, arms, back, neck, shoulders and hands.
• When the forward arm reaches the pre-determined level an alert is emitted from the device, either flashing light, sound, vibration or a combination of these. Also the full rep is added to the counter so at the end of your walk workout you can see how many full reps for each arm.
• The higher the elevation the faster a person will intuitively walk, propelling the user forward naturally and subconsciously. Pace and stride length instinctively increases also triggering proper/better posture, straight back, raised head. MY WALK works in harmony with the body and in sync with the user's ability.
• MY WALK somewhat mimics Nordic Walking but surpasses it by having a greater range of elevation and ensuring the user is performing the forward arm swing to proper form and full rep.




















Benefits both Mind and Body
The benefits of walking are well proven, documented and accepted globally.
Superboost your walk with MY WALK and gain more benefits, swiftly and easily.
Low impact, easy to do, fun, suitable for everyone, only 10 – 30 minutes a day.
You decide pace and place.
Feel good, fit, trim, tone and healthier faster.

20 benefits, 30 minutes daily walk



20 Benefits of a 30 minute daily walk


How it all started
After years of immense stress at work, an endless travel schedule to clients, meetings and trade-shows, and ignoring all the warning signs, my mind and body finally and severally showdown. My acute burnout happened in Australia, as far away from family and home as I could be. When I was finally discharged from hospital I made my way back home on mentally torturous long flights back to Sweden. Once home my doctor strongly recommended that I take up some form of regular exercise to aid my long road to recovery. In 2015 I took up walking after years of a sedentary lifestyle.  I am now 61 years old and have never been fitter in both mind and body, nor more toned, this I greatly attribute to the MY WALK device. The inspiration came to me on a regular walk around our local lake. After much R&D, prototype testing, first mould batch testing we now have 2000 pairs of MY WALK ready to full test the market. MY WALK was a major factor in my recovery and I hope that it will help others no matter what their motivation or goal is.



MY WALK





Low impact exercise

MY WALK the Multi Award Winning Product
MY WALK won two prestigious awards, one from ALMI and the other from Landstinget.
1/ ALMI is a government organisation that assists entrepreneurs and local businesses through both financial and advisory support. ALMI helps with business development and encourages innovation. MY WALK won the ALMI award for innovation .
2/ Landstinget is a regional council responsible for the Health, Care and Culture within their region. MY WALK won the award for innovation within healthcare.
The money from both awards was used for further R&D and mould tool production.





We all like a Freebie
We are offering useful free gifts with some of our awards. Don't miss out, be quick and grab them.
The double pocket expandable Sports Belt with reflective strips, useful for carrying your cellphone and keys while out doing your MY WALK Full Body Workout. After your workout ideal to store your MY WALK devices in the Sports Belt.










The highly versatile MY WALK Neck Tube Gaiter, can be worn multiple ways including as a neck warmer, beanie, ear warmer, desert scarf, mask, balaclava and much more. The MY WALK Neck Tube Gaiter provides comfort and protection from the elements.

We have come a long way from the first prototype


MY WALK come in pairs with batteries and straps included. Each MY WALK device is driven by 2 x AAA batteries that powers the gyro-sensor, control panel, LED, speaker, rep counter and vibration motor. 
The gyro-sensor is programmed to the 3 exercise settings, moderate, brisk or intense. When the forward arm reaches the pre-determined level (exercise settings, moderate, brisk or intense), an alert is emitted from the device, either flashing light, sound, vibration or a combination of these. 
The full rep is added to the counter so at the end of your MY WALK Workout you can see how many full reps for each arm. Make every step count!

InstaCook
Created by TAK Innovations
This Idea started 4 years ago when a friend of mine Dennis we were thinking what would be great to have in everyday life as neither of us have much time to cook, I first thought of a portable machine with an AA Battery 1.5 volts to heat up pre prepared meal then eat it, I tried it, it did not get far then I tried it with a 9 volt battery and a capacitor that almost worked but it was not enough power, I plan one day to head back to the 9 Volt design with capacitors or using a high amount of electricity from a small battery just like a camera flash for short term fast cooking.
Anyway, I went through 4 years of building and failures I have tested over 5000 times with 3000 failures I would work a 10 hour shift and come home and do experiment after experiment for 8 hours each day until I found the magic combination to how it can heat so high for so long without having a massive battery. Its not the 9 Volts I wanted but it works perfectly.
I honestly said this will take me 4-8 weeks at first it took almost 4 years of hell to create it so I am proud all that hard work paid off now I have the prototype hopefully it can be mass produced sold and help people all over the world have a hot meal with no kitchen needed.
I was the designer engineer and the whole team only Llewyn from PRINT-3D.COM.AU Sydney he was amazing supportive and the only 3D designer that cared and put hard work in without breaking the bank as other 3D designers wanted an arm and leg I’m still in contact with him to this day.
This all exhausted me and sent me broke and I used up all my money on parts batteries tools it was all made by me except the 3D plastic casing I designed it and had it built for the final prototype, I have a second earlier prototype it’s pretty ugly and crude but it works.
I am currently broke and scraping through week to week to acheive my dream.

The InstaCook business plans starts off with a great one-of-a-kind portable 5 side heating cook pot the base and 4 sides heat and cook evenly making a faster and better meal with the lid on it is a 6 sides spere heated capsule, patented portable battery powered cooker the battery can run from 10 min to 1 hour (standard battery runs 26 min) of cook time that can be taken everywhere like work, parks home, mobile homes, cars, camping, schools and for military use by soldiers, it is great for student or any anyone in a small living place or at work It does not just heat like a microwave it can heat or cook from scratch fast anywhere anytime, with no radiation.

I am my own management, I have worked in many companies finance telecommunications, Beverage, technology and plenty more over the last 20 years, I have been inventions since I was 7 years old, My parents abused and tortured me for over 20 years they destroyed all my inventions and designed and did horrible things to me it took me a long time to get over the trauma and get back into my inventions, I want to build TAK innovations into a empire and I want to help all the people that need help and get them away from domestic violence and all forms of abuse so people can be the best people they can be without having to live in a hell or fear that they don’t know they can get away from, I don’t want to be rich and famous for the glory but I want to invent create and make this world a better place so people don’t have to live in fear and pain, inventing creating building and helping it is my love and passion and I now want to dedicate the rest of my life to, I have had a lot of business experience, my loves and engineering all science it is what I was born to do, I am my manager, inventor, designer builder, accountant and tech R&D.
InstaCook solves the problem of trying to get through there busy days with having something as important as a hot meal without a kitchen, where they can take it and re heat or cook at their desk at work while working while others 20 people using the microwave, It will solve the problem of Uni student living in their small shared boarding house and being able to cook or heat in there room, it’s also great for people camping, picknick or military
People who want to cook but don’t have a kitchen in there small living space. Uni Students can take last nights dinner to class. City living office workers who only have 1 microwave & 20 people. The military soldiers who want a hot cooked meal. Young to middle-aged people who have busy lives. Campers who want a cooked or heated up meal. Picknicks, the elderly that are forced to like in small shoe box city unit with no kitchen in a boarding house.
I want this product for everyone’s use that may not be possible as most people suggest camping, There are so many other uses I have used it my self-living in a boarding house where the kitchen was filthy and they would was there cloths in the sink, I would like to aim this at office workers, students, camping picnic and construction workers basically anyone who does not have a lot of time space, & wants to save money by putting last nights or pre made meals
I will advertise this product for all use that may not be possible as most people suggest camping, There are so many other uses I have used it my self-living in a boarding house where the kitchen was filthy & they would was there cloths in the sink, I would like to aim this at office workers, students, camping a picnic & construction workers basically anyone who does not have a lot of time space, & wants to save money by putting last nights or pre made meals.
I have calculated a minimum amount of $110000 to cover the project and get it in production in a couple of months and the full manufacture over 24 months for this version, The $110000 investment will be for 11% of the business and raw profit turning it into a raw $1017663 within 24 months.
The estimated cost of the high-quality unit will be $50 per unit sell wholesale $129 and the marketable RRP of $179 giving us with a raw profit of $79 per unit

I plan on advertising radio TV online, I honestly don’t use social media yet as I have a very busy work life between work and working on this and some responsibilities, I have not used media even though I know its very effective and important.
I want to start selling it online on my website, eBay Amazon I also will like to get it into stores like Jaycar and Kmart and possibly infomercials I believe this will work and word of mouth will also spread.

I honestly want to make the world a better place for people and animals with the money I make from this project and future company I dont need much money to live I really want to use the money to help others and animals as I have a passion for helping animals and people as I take in abandon animals and re habilitate them and return them to nature but if they cant I keep them, I volonter on my days off rehabilitating abused dog that people are scared to help I have been bitten over 500 time but its worth it once you see the dog finaly realised he is safe loved and can now he held patted and re homed or continue the rehabilitation.

record.Title: Injection machine Make plastic parts cheaper, easier, faster
record.Text:
Now you can have your own factory at home.





7 generation of our injection molding machines. We have learned of our previous mistakes, our machines always have worked, but always there is room for improvements. In this generation we develop our machines to be more durable, with more pressure, increasing the speed of the process, making them easier to use. Use your free time, you can generate an extra income, identify a necessity develop something for that necessity, use our machine to manufacture it, and build a very lucrative business around plastic.
How does it work?

Main advantages

























 Our injection machines vs 3D Printers. 











You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00































A 3D printer is mostly used to make prototypes. A manual plastic injection machine is made to make the parts in series. Don’t waste your money with failed 3D prints, expensive and delicate materials.
A lot of people have the idea that a 3D printer is autonomous, but it is not, you have to make the file and send it to the printer (for each piece or set), you have to take off the pieces once they are ready if they have supports you have to trim them, you have to change the filament, and there are some common issues, jams, gaps, everything is delicate. If nothing goes wrong for example at the end of the day, you will have 10 pieces… with our machines 10 pieces is a matter of minutes, the same time you spend on the setup. Don’t use your 3D printer to do parts in series there is a better solution for that (our machines).
Our machines are more than 40 times faster on average than a traditional 3D printer. The materials on average for our machines are 25 times cheaper. With a bigger variety. Lower power consumption. Power consumption is almost the same, but with our injection machines at the same time, you can make a lot more pieces, so the power consumption per piece is less with our machines.
Better quality and presentation, less extra prosses. If for some reason one piece is damaged or without the quality or any error, you can easily recycle it, with our machines there is no waste.
A 3D printer is by far noisier than our machines.
Common questions
What can I inject with these machines?
Our injection machines are ideal to inject small plastic parts for many industries. Some products that you can inject are toys, kitchen accessories, pet toys, bathroom accessories, gears and mechanisms, accessories for phones, ornaments, make prototypes, mixing colors, and do plastic-color tests, self-defense products, sex toys, dental prosthesis, spare parts, automotive spares, complements for furniture, bicycle spares – parts, motorcycle spare – parts, fantasy jewelry, construction complements and more. 





What kinds of plastic can I use?





You can use any plastic with a melting index above 12. You can find that index, in the datasheet of the plastic. You can use mainly: Polyethylene (LD - HD), Polypropylene, TPU, SBS, ABS, TR, Impact PS, crystal PS, PVC flexible, nylon, polyamides, compounds with fiberglass, and more. You can use almost every recycled plastic from injection parts, always do your tests first.





What colors can I use?
You can make any color you want. You can use masterbatch or dust pigment, each has advantages and disadvantages, masterbatch is slower but cleaner, dust pigments are faster to use but they are dirtier. when you change the color, the plastic will be mixed, so you have to waste some plastic, inject parts until the color is uniform. There are specialized purges to help to clean the machine, purges are useful to change color or the type of plastic.
Molds





Molds are not included with any perk.
The molds for a manual injection machine are by far cheaper than the molds for a hydraulic machine. Because the molds weigh less than a traditional mold, is easier to work with a small piece of metal. Molds can be easily done in a CNC machine, if you don’t have access to a CNC machine, we will implement a service for you, where you can send the file and we make the mold for you, and if you have a CNC machine we will sell blanks, pieces of metal that you can mill, to make your mold.
 How many pieces am I going to inject a day?
Well first is a manual injection machine, it doesn’t work by itself, you can work 1 hour or 10 for example. Also, depending on the practice you have and the kind of plastic that you use. But the thing that influences the most is the size of the plastic part that you are going to inject. You can make 30,000 a day or 300.
For example, in the video we inject 4 pieces every 3.5 minutes, more or less, without considering the first 15 minutes, to make it easier let’s say 4 minutes. If you work 8 hours and maintain that rhythm of injections, you can make 480 pieces, with a 3d printer that work will take you 320 hours or 40 days considering 8 hours a day (making one by one, if you make the maximum of the size of the bed it will take more time because the nozzle has to travel more) imagine that in the bed of the 3D printer can fit 10 pieces like the one that we injected on the video. Imagine that you are at ¾ of the work and it fails…you will lose a lot of time, and money. So, choose wisely, if you need to make plastic parts in series, with that number we can say that injecting a part is 40 times faster than 3d printing a part.





 Mold blanks.
Is a piece of metal, with one face milled, in the other face you can mill the cavity that you want to make a useful mold. Mold blanks are made of a special alloy, zinc-based. This alloy is very used in the mold industry because leaves a metal without pores, and allows milling the mold easily (metal chips won’t stick to the endmill), with the necessary resistance, with a good cavity finish, and is easy to polish. we have many sizes available. With these blanks you forget the foundry process, you just place the blank in your CNC and mill the cavities of the mold.





Test mold available as a complement
It’s a mold with 4 cavities, with this mold you can test different kinds of plastic, different temperatures and learn how to use the machine. The piece is a “padlock” for bags. You can add this complement to your existing pledge. 





Different models





One solution for your needs and budget. Our machines are ideal for: developers, engineers, Hobbyists, a plastic laboratory, small manufacturers, small workshops, entrepreneurs.
Basic – Ideal for the ones how wants to have the first contact, with manual injection, great for small productions.
Professional – Ideal for the ones how need more production and faster, bigger screen.
Premium – Ideal for the ones how need bigger productions. More capacity. Tactile screen with different setups.
Industrial - Ideal for the ones how wants to, the biggest capacity for an injection manual machine 180 cm3, reenforced materials, for harder work. Bigger mold holder. For bigger plastic parts that consume more plastic, with thicker walls more than 2.5mm.
Industrial images will be updated in a few days





Development and Tests
For years we have used the previous models of our machines, to make our products or more of our machines. With that base that we have from previous years… the mission was clear: better quality, make them more durable, improve the time that takes to inject a piece. It was a complicated mission but I guess it was accomplished. Everything was planned, tested, and modified until it works as planned. With time it may not look as new but it will still work fine.
