record.Creator: Latiff
record.Title: Loolla Learning Network
record.Text:
At Loolla, we believe that learning is not just about collecting scrolls, certificates or badges.  And whilst there are skills and knowledge to be learnt from the accomplished masters, experts and academia, there is much to be learned as well from the have-beens, the experienced, the explorer, hobbyist, the doers and even learners. Fundamentally, the real value of learning is the direct, relevant and positive impact on one's life - beyond who delivers it.  

Please click on the link to get the slide deck on About Loolla.



With One Account, Members Can Be Both Learner and Trainer / Tutor / Instructor





Loolla started out as a project by a dad wanting to better help the learning of his young school-going children.  Whilst social messaging platforms are now commonly used these days to aid in learning, they can be disruptive, disorganised and inadvertently divert the focus away from the learning process itself.   He simply wanted to create a better option - beyond the disruptive messaging platforms - for his young schooling children to safely connect with the online learning community; to learn from those who know or have-been there and to share their knowledge and abilities with the world when they are ready for it.



Online learning is more than just watching fancy videos, consuming interactive content or obtaining online badges and certificates.  

Be it about solving a maths problem from school, working on a group assignment, performing a task, picking up a new hobby or building a skillset; many of us - young and old -  inevitably depend on a network of people who provide useful guidance and wisdom that support our learning and discovery. Without this network, it can be difficult sometimes to locate, reach, sieve through and understand the information, answers and guidance we seek.



 Your learning network is the multiplier that amplifies your learning.  
Whilst there are many messaging platforms out there for communication and exchanges, and a multitude of online learning courses, one is hard press to find a tool that can easily build and grow an individual's personal learning network to support learning and discovery over time. A personal learning network (or PLN, in short) is a dedicated space, where one can easily initiate, participate in and spread learning of ideas, knowledge, skills, wisdom, experience, tools and tips.

With Loolla, you can easily build, grow and develop your personal learning network - with relevant people, on different subject matters, at your own time and in your own pace.  



Loolla brings together the useful features of communication technologies that allow online group formation, interactions and sharing, with the power of learning management systems that allow you to create, publish and sell online courses.  With Loolla you can :


Create online learning groups
Participate in learning discussions
Create online courses
Share your online courses
Sell your online courses
Connect your online groups with your courses
Receive and award digital certificates
Track your learners/students progress
View your course earnings


Carry your personal learning network with you, always.  





Accessible via desktop and mobile devices, you carry your personal learning network all the time with Loolla. You can chat with your group members or create your own course whilst on-the-go. Explore the groups and forums that interest you and join the discussion anytime convenient for you.


You'll learn when you interact
You'll learn when you do
You'll learn when you teach

Ever encounter having difficulty tracking or finding the "thread of conversations" or "shared content" over social messaging platforms. More often than not, you have to spend some time scrolling through the list of messages and conversation's threads to find the message or thread that you are looking for. With Loolla, you can easily go to the relevant groups and discussion forums or courses to get to it. Social messaging platforms are good for quick communication, but they are not meant to be your repository of learning resources and to grow your learning network. Loolla helps you achieve both.







When you are in Loolla, you are in a pure learning zone.
Attach learning resources such as links, media and documents for your course learners/students or group members and have them easily accessible.
Loolla does not seek to replace the spectrum of online courses or online forums that are already out there designed for structured and formal learning.

Loolla embraces the fact that learning is a social process.  
Loolla accepts learning for what it is  - a social process.  We give recognition to the fact that in this digital age, Everybody Can Learn From Everyone and Anybody Can Teach Anyone.

You don't have to be a professor or an expert to teach the world.
You don't have to be a pro to start a group and learning forum.


TEACHERS. TUTORS. INSTRUCTORS. COACHES. MENTORS
  Teach and guide on-the-go  

Create a learning group and share learning content online through the Course Creator.
Communicate as a group or one-on-one through private messages with your students, coachee and mentees.
Conduct an online virtual meet within Loolla.
Sell your ONLINE and ONSITE course or offer them for free
Set your course or tuition fees to be recurring or one-time payment
Link your tuition class or group(s) to your course or tuition programme
Schedule events in your course / tuition group

GROUP ASSIGNMENTS. PROJECT TEAMS. LEARNING CIRCLES. INTEREST GROUPS
  Amplify your learning with groups  

Start a group for the assignment or project.
Create forums where group members can easily share ideas, media, documents and links.
Share and invite others to join your group
Schedule events in your group
Make your group private or accessible to everyone.
Manage the group yourself or get your friends to help you.







STUDENTS. LEARNERS. CURIOUS MINDS
  Grow your personal learning network  

Join and participate in learning groups.
Follow the discussion forums that interest you.
Find courses, programmes, tuition, teachers, tutors, instructors, mentors and coaches.
Subscribe and undergo courses, tuition programmes or lessons that help you in your study or learning.
Share useful and interesting groups, courses and lessons with friends and family.

record.Creator: Alexander Bridgeforth
record.Title: COOL PEOPLE NETWORK
record.Text: As a kid, coming from the community I was raised in we are only taught to do a few things in life to be successful. Sports and music were the only level of success those around me knew of that seemed realistically achievable. It's like adversity was a part of the lease agreement in most of our neighborhoods.  Despite the disadvantages I managed to pick up the one thing I felt to be a quick fix to distract me from all of life struggles. Although I"m convinced it was nothing more than a distraction.This addiction led me to play middle, high school, and college basketball. Throughout my college journey I've always had the idea of doing something big. I wanted to showcase my creativity, but also set the tone thinking outside the box. I fell in love with technology as I became obsessed with reaching my goal. I planned to write a book but I said to myself, how valuable would I be if I gave people something they could start and finish? So I decided to deliver who I am as a creator in a way that could live forever. It may seem complicated but overall I'm just a kid from a small town Kinston, NC. The youngest of 6 siblings and always felt the coolest no matter who I was around or where I was at. For some odd reason I began networking in college expanding the idea of who I wanted to become. Today I am presenting everyone with Cool People Network. My Blog was designed to present education over entertainment because I wanted to change the narrative. Anything is possible if you surround yourself with right people and change your mindset when it comes to success. If this campaign isn't backed 100 % I still wanted to say I appreciate the opportunity to even share my story and idea amongst so of the worlds coolest creators and supporters.

record.Creator: Soulsfeng
record.Title: Fire Team Heating Boots High Black
record.Text:
Soulsfeng was formerly known as Future Footwear Technology Corporation (FFT), an original equipment manufacturer. Since the last five years, FFT start their own brand Soulsfeng specialised in graffiti art and high-tech area.
Soulsfeng slogan: Do Whatever You Can Do!





Upon noticing so many people got cold feet, and some people feet get hurt during outdoor work, Soulsfeng decided to help these people by designing an heating boots not only flexible but also with lightweight,  built these boots strong so people can use for out door work and sport,  and need to pay attention to every details make sure it is comfortable, because we invest too much money to develop these boots, we hope you guys can help us crowdfunding to produce this boots.

























These boots are special made for outdoor in winter, for those whom feet can be easily hurt by cold weather, these boots will help them a lot. It is carbon fiber heating, apart from  resistor heating which will cause partially overheating, carbon fiber heating is far infrared heating, and will make the whole shoe warm averagely.

Function and Details:

Wireless charge, 4 hours fully charged.
3 heating levels in different colors of indicator( Red: 45 ℃ , Blue: 42 ℃ , White: 40 ℃ ) Fully charged battery can lasts up to 8 hours on highest heating level.
Wireless charger comes with product. The indicator turns into green when it’s charging, and go off automatically when it is fully charged.
Switch on the side. Long time pressing to turn on and off, push to switch heating level.
Cow Leather upper
Side Metal Zipper
Ripple rubble sole with good anti-skid effect sole

record.Creator: Charles Davi
record.Title: Black Tree Automatic Machine Learning
record.Text:
I've created an incredibly powerful library of A.I. software that allows cheap consumer devices to solve complex problems in a small fraction of the amount of time traditional deep learning techniques, like neural networks, typically require. The accuracy is comparable, and at times better than traditional methods, and because it's AutoML (i.e., automatic machine learning), you don't need a data scientist to run it -
Anyone can use it, since it's point-and-click software, that runs on its own.
This will save companies enormous sums of money, as they no longer need to spend hundreds of thousands of dollars per year paying data scientists to solve routine problems in deep learning, since they can instead have relatively untrained employees use my software, which will in some cases cost just a few dollars per month.
The reason this pricing works is because I already wrote the software, and stand to profit more from making my software cheap, and widely used, rather than expensive, and limited to enterprise clients.
In addition to saving enterprise clients money, it would also allow anyone with demand for deep learning, from restaurants and hospitals to entrepreneurs, to make use of what would otherwise be prohibitively expensive software. 
The goal now is to make the software available on the Apple App Store, which will require rewriting the software in Mac's Swift Language.
I've already started this process, and a very basic version of the prediction software is already complete in Swift, with more obviously to come.
Funding is needed to cover the costs of registering with the app store, creating a professional website, a professional email account, and personal daily expenses until the software is commercially available.

record.Creator: Thorsten Koerner
record.Title: ScamScan FREE Travel App
record.Text:
Scamscan is your personal smart travel assistant. Be it navigating concrete jungles or conquering remote islands. Scamscan checks the area for dangers or scams and helps to reach your destination – safely. Receive current updates or warnings per location. Benefit from reports shared by hundreds of other travellers. Share your experience with others in coming versions.





Stay safe, go far!
ScamScan is an app for travellers by travellers, designed to help you to reaching your destination – safely. No matter if its a business-, honeymoon or adventure trip.
We want to make travelling a little safer for adventurous people like you. Our app is designed to warn you about nasty surprises and provides useful tips.
Based on your current location you receive all necessary information to stay safe and avoid any scam.

About this project
We travel to experience the wonders and secrets of our world. To marvel at places where the sky somehow shows a beautiful set of colors, where the air smells differently somehow. We leave our comfort zones to seek adventures, small ones or bigger ones. No matter why we travel, wanderlust, recreation or a business need – there should be no doubts about for safety concerns. But it´s proven to be difficult from time to time.

Protection against Scam Theft /Violence
ScamScan helps to avoid fraud and tourist traps. This app can become your travel companion, a guide to avoid any hazards in the area.





We want to supply a multi-language support to make ScamScan user friendly for everyone around the world. For the initial version English and German will be supported.

And the best: it will be FREE.
Inform yourself about popular methods of fraud against tourists and business travelers. Don’t be an easy cash grab for scammers.





“I would`ve never thought this could happen to ME!” – predators might try to lure anyone with little to none local knowledge into dangerous situations. Avoid falling victim of theft or violent crimes. Experience voluntary adventures only ;). ScamScan informs you about reported situations from reliable sources via GPS-localization. If you prefer to deactivate GPS or can´t connect to the internet, the latest updates are available offline. Currently our database includes more than 600 reports from 112 countries.





Community
However, the best is yet to come: Due to the experience of the ScamScan community the database will be constantly updated and growing. Therefore, every user can share their experiences and make contributions to the protection of other travelers. After Go-Live, ScamScan will begin to develop its full potential, by recording, verifying and providing messages of the community. Thus, all valid experience reports, whether experienced by themselves or received from a reliable source, can be collected in one place.





ScamScan grows with the community. Tell us what is going on during your travels, don't leave us in the dark. At the end of the day we need the COMMUNITY support from you. With your feedback we will be able to improve the app that we love constantly.

Updates?
We are already developing content for our first major update. The “Save Places Marker” will provide you with the following updates to your ScamScan map::
- Show police stations
- Highlight safe zones
- Show Tourist Information points
- Setup Community function
Also the idea for a live scam warning function is in our mind…





About us and Team
We are a small team of globetrotters. We love to travel and would like to avoid some stumbling blocks and any unpleasant surprises in the future. Those can really spoil the pleasure and can also become expensive. The idea of a location-based app came up during our trip through Barcelona .
Together we are better:
Thorsten Körner Founder
Julia Design & Illustration
Phil Creative Text Support
Rolf and Kyung Jae Text Editor German and Korean





Remarks on the searching methods
The project has been in progress for almost two years. Initially we have collected a huge amount of information to compile our offline database of 800 entries so far. Our project is build on this base of data. We collect data worldwide, our sources are news and newspapers secondary – primary is our own experiences also from all the travelers around the world.

Timeline and project plan
Transparency is crucial for ScamScan user. Therefore we share our high level project plan with you. A valid project plan is significant for the success of our application. Our project is divided into four work packages for 2021 and 2022.











 Costs
Where does our baker’s money go? We have developed a cost plan with our programmers. We would like to share it with you because transparency is significantly important for us. There are costs per work package. Here you can see clearly how they are spread.





 Thank you!

record.Creator: Mei Chi Lo
record.Title: Booka Local Language and Pro Bono Services App
record.Text:
Booka Local Language barrier app between foreigners and Native German speakers and Pro Bono Services to international visitors who are sexually assaulted in Germany.

Hi, I'm Mei Chi Lo, the creator of the Booka Local app, knows all too well the challenges non-German speakers face when navigating various processes. I was sexually assaulted in Germany and found it difficult to file a report due to language barriers. I got the support needed through the help of my German fiancé that bridges the language barrier.  I also faced other daily challenges as a non-native German speaker living in the country, such as speaking to customer service representatives. Thus, I got a challenging spirit to put these traumatic and frustrating experiences to work for a positive cause—creating a service that connects people looking for help navigating language barriers with local helpers who speak the language and understand German bureaucracy.
Booka Local App
Booka Local website was launched in November 2020 in Germany. Via the site, international visitors and immigrants who may not speak German proficiently can request assistance with various tasks that may require translation. Some services that helpers can provide are making phone calls with utility companies, scheduling appointments, and filling out bureaucratic paperwork such as visa applications. The site has gained traction and overwhelmingly positive reviews since its launch nearly a year ago. Because of Booka Local’s popularity, the team is now focusing on launching and marketing its app, giving users access to local language helpers at the tip of their fingers.





Why Booka Local
Completing tasks that require communication can be difficult and frustrating for millions of people living in and visiting countries where they may not speak the local language proficiently. Booka Local, a new translation services app available in Germany, is looking to give non-native German speakers a way to break through language barriers by connecting them with locals who speak German. Once connected to a language helper, the user can get the translation assistance needed to complete a wide variety of tasks that otherwise may be difficult due to limited language skills.
Booka Local users pay an hourly fee to their helpers for assistance via the platform. But one selling point of the app is that the rates offered by Booka Local helpers are far less than those of professional translators. The Booka Local team also takes great care to ensure the safety of their customers by screening the local helpers carefully before making their services available on the platform. And for those looking to be helpers, the team also takes utmost care in ensuring their personal safety and that their feedback is heard and taken into consideration. All the local helpers are insured by Booka Local.
“In creating Booka Local, I wanted to deliver something impactful that would ensure that international visitors or immigrants with limited German language skills could avoid the frustrations and embarrassments I experienced in trying to navigate everyday life and government bureaucracies.



Booka Local App


Pro Bono Services
I wanted to be sure that no other sexual assault survivors have to experience roadblocks with navigating bureaucratic and legal processes because of language barriers. That’s why Booka Local offers pro-bono services to international visitors who are sexually assaulted in Germany. They can now secure the needed translation support to file the appropriate reports. We help the victims navigate the language-related procedures such as filing a police report, for free.
Services available on Booka Local

Phone calls in German
Appointments at government offices
Paperwork

As it takes time to learn a foreign language, we step in and provide those having troubles with the German language by providing language-related services like attending appointments, phone calls, or even document checking.
Our Ebook
One of our main goals is to help internationals integrate within German society. That is why we have also been working on producing an ebook with questions we asked the locals. We plan to distribute these to the internationals for free so that they have a better idea of how the locals think or what they would normally do in certain situations. We want to break the stereotypes internationals might have about the Germans and the German culture.
Why Crowdfunding?
My team has dedicated our services to a good cause in bridging the language barriers but we need to improve this app usage because, what is worth doing, is worth doing well. 

 Better Booka local App development and improvement: Simple version of the app has been launched thus we the need to upgrade and fix some bugs and also some features planned to be developed to improve the remote language assistance.
 Expanding to other cities or countries: Currently, Booka Local in-person service is only available in Berlin. We have received great recommendations and feedbacks to extend this services to other cities like Hamburg, Leipzig, Frankfurt am Main and so on.
 Pro-bono services: On average, people who receive our free help need 2hour assistance and these local helpers are paid by Booka local and which we didn't set limit on the hours we offer to those in need.

Help us achieve the best version of Booka local and Pro-bono services.
Thank you

record.Creator: Juan Gutiérrez
record.Title: Nade
record.Text:
Nade nació por un sentimiento que todos hemos sentido e algún momento de nuestras vidas... La soledad.
Mi nombre es Juan y soy de Cantabria, España. Hace dos años, tras pasar por un momento complicado en mi vida, y con ese sentimiento de soledad a flor de piel, surgió una idea que se apoderó de mí: 
La soledad es algo que todos hemos sufrido alguna vez de una forma o de otra, y con todos los medios de los que hoy en día disponemos, el sentimiento de soledad es cada vez mayor en la sociedad actual.
Por ello me aventuré a crear Nade, una red social en la que los usuarios pueden hablar sobre sus inquietudas, sus problemas, sus experiencias... Un lugar donde encontrar a gente que les entienda y que les pueda ayudar, al igual que ellos podrán ayudar a otros.
El lema de Nade es "Todos tenemos algo que contar", y es precísamente porque todos tenemos nuestras experiencias, vivencias, conocimientos... Y por eso cada uno de nosotros puede aportar algo a alguien en un momento dado, como también le puede aportar algo otra persona en otro momento. Y gracias a la tecnología, esa persona puede estar en tu misma calle, en tu misma ciudad, o al otro lado del océano.
El objetivo de Nade es crear una comunidad en la que los usuarios sientan que no están solos, que los problemas que ellos tienen, los tienen otras personas o los han tenido en algún momento de sus vidas. Que tengan la tranquilidad de saber que hay un lugar donde se pueden desahogar, donde pueden preguntar esas cosas que a veces no se atreven, y donde pueden ayudar a otras personas, porque la sensación que te da haber ayudado a alguien es de completa plenitud, y es algo que muchas veces olvidamos y que nos llena por completo.

Por otra parte, el proyecto ya está lanzado desde hace unos 4 meses. Hay más de 4.000 usuarios entre España y los países hispanohablantes, y el feedback que recibimos es en su gran mayoría muy positivo. Mucha gente afirma que es una App necesaria.

El proyecto ha supuesto cerca de 100.000€ de inversión, todo ello ha sido abordado con presupuesto personal, que fue invertido en el desarrollo de la App y de la web, y en la elaboración de planes de marketing y ventas.
Los fondos recaudados serán empleados en algunas ampliaciones en el desarrollo (20% de los fondos aprox.) con el fin de mejorar la App, en un plan de marketing y ventas (60% de los fondos aprox.) con el fin de dar a conocer Nade y comenzar con la facturación, y en gastos generales (20% de los fondos aprox.) como pueden ser el mantenimiento del servidor, las tarifas mensuales, los gastos en material, personal...

Esta es nuestra página web: www.nadeapp.com , en ella presentamos Nade, explicamos su funcionamiento, y desde ella se puede acceder a descargar la App en diferentes plataformas, o a acceder a la versión web de la App.

record.Creator: Jamaal Johnson
record.Title: Dog Training Made Easy
record.Text:
WHAT
A unique and accessible dog training app for owners with video library and written handouts to train your dog.  Proven methods developed by one of the USA top training centers on your smartphone. 

We are expert trainers with various training backgrounds, from service dogs, shelter dogs, to dealing with severe behavior challenges. The community is also full of fellow dog lovers who enjoy learning from one another. The community is meant to be inclusive, fun, friendly and smart. Through sharing real stories of the training process and life challenges of the life of your dog. We are here to walk this journey together sharing “what works,” and build a healthy relationships between you and your dog.











WHY?
Consider how convenient it would be to have your own personal dog trainer available whenever and wherever you require assistance.
Every year, around 2 million dogs enter shelters in the United States due to behavioral disorders, with approximately 355,000 of them being euthanized. Those dogs were formerly loved, but some of their owners didn't know how to keep them from developing behavioral problems that made life difficult for both of them. Despite the fact that training is critical for having a happy pet-owning family, many owners do not have the time or resources to provide their dogs with the training they require.
That is why we created the dog training app to assist in the creation of a beloved companion rather than a statistic. You get clear instructions and specialized training help directly on your phone.
With video instruction and troubleshooting tips, this is a unique and accessible dog training program for owners. On your smartphone, you can use tried-and-true methods created by one of the leading training centers in USA



THE APP

  Access to Your Own Community & Join Groups That Meets You & your Dogs Needs 
Direct Support from Jamaal & the Bark For Attention Team
 Bark For Attention Community Support with Feed & Chat 
 Access to Video Bark For Attention Video Courses 
Access to Bark For Attention Video Group Coaching
Attend Exclusive Monthly Webinars & Office Hours
 Access a Growing Video Library of Recorded Training Materials 
Access to blogs & forms with educational information about dog training
 Free Doggy Journal Downloadable handouts and E Books 




Your Community 












It necessitates extensive video production, photography, and local resources, as well as intricate back-end development. Self-publishing such a large project is a significant undertaking.
The money we raise will be used for a marketing effort to promote the app to users all over the world, in addition to covering the cost of the app's development. Any additional cash raised will be utilized to create videos for our own YouTube channel and to develop future app bolt-on modules.
Our goal is to create a community of dog lovers who believe that the most important aspect of ethical dog ownership is educating your dog, which is a lifetime journey. We want to build a platform on which owners can benefit from our experience, but also share their own ideas and tips to one another.  

 HOW IT WORKS

 Expert Certified Trainers and pet parents come together to share the wonderful training process and life long journey with our dogs.  
1 Check out your News Activity, participate and be active in the community and use all the resources available to you including dog trainers. 

 2 Join the groups and forums that you are interested in to ask questions, post pics, videos, and share your love of your dog with the world. In these Channels there is expert advice, step by step training guides and handouts and more importantly real life experiences.  
3 Share with the community about you and your dog We encourage you to introduce yourself and your pet or pets. Share and be active by posting photos or videos, your goals, challenges, and especially let’s celebrate any progress and achievements together.

record.Creator: Tribus Elementis
record.Title: Wireless campervan electric system
record.Text:
Introducing ADCOUT
ADCOUT is a wireless 12/24V switch that includes advanced features. This is developed for the control of electronic devices in campervans and 4x4s. With a simple Android application, you can control up to eight devices, monitor the current consumed by each of them and check the battery voltage.
ADCOUT stands for Adjustable DC OUTputs.
It was designed to be quick and easy to install. The system is ready to operate, no configuration is necessary.


 Features





ADCOUT can be supplied with a voltage ranging from 10 to 30 V, so you can use either a 12V or 24V battery. Each of the eight outputs can be controlled and monitored individually. Using the app, you can ajust the output power and check current consumption. Here is an example simulating a LED light connected to one output of the board :



Adjustable DC outputs examples


 Here is a more precise description of the application :



Application description


The device includes two USB chargers. Each USB power supply is generated by a high efficiency 5V converter.

Security is an integral part of the system. It will be used in a vehicle, then it is essential to avoid any risk of fire or even overheating. This is why there are nine fuses to avoid overcurrent: 

8x 10A fuses : one for each output
1x 3A fuse for bluetooth control and both USB chargers

The system has a temperature sensor to detect any overheating.

You will receive you ADCOUT ready to work. Altough it is very easy to use, we will provide a complete user manual and a guide to help you comply with the standards.










You have the choice of three options :

 Full remote : the cheapest option. You do not have the possibility to manually control the electrical outputs. You have to use the app. it is advisable if you plan to place the board in an uninhabited space
 Half remote : four outputs, in addition to being controllable by the application, can be controlled by a switch on the board. It may allow you to turn on some devices without using the app
 Full manual : eight outputs, in addition to being controllable by the application, can be controlled by a switch on the board.












Technical specifications
ADCOUT datasheet can be donwloaded here.




3D vue of the board







If you have any question, feel free to join the facebook group by clicking here.


Credits :

Music: « Creative Minds » from Bensound.com

record.Creator: Jacob
record.Title: SCHOOLED℠
record.Text:
SCHOOLED℠ is a digital service which seeks to reinvent learning for the next generation students by offering videos created by teachers and creators from across the nation. We believe that the ability for students to pair themselves with a myriad of teaching styles grants them a greater opportunity to understand material and be more confident in their coursework.
Using SCHOOLED℠, teachers can post short videos about important components of a topic to a subject-specific feed that is viewed by students who are looking for assistance. Students may search for a topic they don't understand, or simply have videos related to that weeks coursework recommended to them, and scroll through a feed of videos to find one that suits them best. Students can rate videos for others, leave feedback on the content for the teacher, and even ask questions for clarification. We also hope teachers will view posts by other teachers for fresh inspiration in their own classroom. Every user in our community has the ability to network with each other one on one or in groups to discuss topics using our chat feature.
We wish to use the campaign money to support our upcoming pilot program, as we will be launching our service in local New England High School to understand its effectiveness across a variety of measures and increase our attractiveness to investors and schools. This money will be specifically used to pay the content creators on the platform to reward them for aiding not only us, but the next generation of learners, through our service. If you want to learn more about us, our website is https://schooled.info/
We are a team of 5 students currently attending Northeastern University in Boston with varying backgrounds with one common goal: work for the betterment of education. The money raised from our campaign will be used to compensate educators financially for their hard work, as well as launch and maintain our software for our upcoming pilot program in January.

record.Creator: Powerward
record.Title: Powerward- The Most Versatile Ultra-Capacity Power Station
record.Text:
Electricity is one of the most useful inventions that science has given us. It plays a pivotal role in the modern world and we surely can’t live without it. However, life is unpredictable and full of uncertainties and we have to keep ourselves powered up 24/7. With the goal of bringing you constant energy and vitality, Powerward arrives with versatility, reliability, and ultimate power.





Powerward, featuring 2000Wh high capacity, 3×2000W AC outputs, Car Power output, and 800W Solar Charging with the AC adapter, is a solid backup power station for your domestic appliances, small home devices, and electric cars. Meet Powerward, your ever ready power station for modern life!





When it comes to charging devices, Powerward has established itself as a chief in the industry. With an unparalleled 2000Wh capacity, Powerward is capable of persistently powering up all types of home appliances. With Powerward as your companion, worries about power outages are eliminated forever!
















Not only does Powerward supply power, but it can provide endless entertainment with its built-in Bluetooth Speaker. This special individual feature empowers Powerward to serve you with catchy music while chilling and partying outdoors. Powerward does it all…and more!










Most people don’t know that Thomas Edison, the inventor of the light bulb, was afraid of the dark. Light is super essential for daily lives. Featuring a liftable 360° rotating Light, Powerward can light up your life!










Summer is the perfect season for overnight camping. However, the high temperature can make it hard to sleep. With an intelligent cooling fan, Powerward can conquer the summer heat in an easy-breezy way!










Unlike some burdensome power stations, Powerward is compact and portable. Traveling around with Powerward is convenient and flexible. With an individual luggage-style design, you can take this powerful companion anywhere. Whether you are hosting a music festival, camping outdoors overnight, or charging cars for a journey, your circumstances will always be filled with electrical energy!










Powerward is versatile and almighty beyond your imagination, featuring 10 different outputs including Car Power, USB-C, USB-A, DC, and 3×AC electrical outlets. The 3×2000W AC outputs are especially useful and are more efficient when increasing or decreasing the voltage using transformers, while minimizing power loss in electrical transmission. Powerward is proficient in powering large electrical appliances simultaneously, such as refrigerator, air conditioner, rice cooker, and more.





















As electric vehicles are becoming more widespread, the concern of running out of electricity on the road is an issue for many. In addition to powering devices, Powerward can also charge electric cars like Tesla. Instead of searching for a charger in hard to find areas, prepare ahead of time by taking Powerward along with you.










There are many devices and equipment in the workshop that need to run 24/7. An unpredictable power outage can cause serious financial losses. Featuring multiple electrical outlets and a massive expandable capacity, Powerward ensures that your tools run continuously.










A lot of medical devices for saving people’s lives such as breathing machines or home dialysis equipment require a long-lasting power supply. In order to guard against power outages, Powerward makes a reliable backup plan for emergency situations.











The speed of recharging is unbelievably rapid. Powerward 1000 can be recharged in multiple ways in only 1.6 hours, the efficiency of the recharging speed is mind-blowing!











Multiple options are available for recharging your Powerward - use the AC wall input for up to 1.6 hours or 10 hours through the car input. There is also a compatible solar panel that lets you recharge Powerward in 6-12 hours by simply soaking in the sun. What if you want Powerward to be full of energy again? Easy! After recharging it with multiple methods simultaneously, a vital Powerward will be standing in front of you!











Powerward is designed with black PC-ABS materials for the shell which combines the superior strength and heat resistance of PC and the flexibility of ABS. With a durable 1500 cycle lifespan, Powerward is committed to being your lifetime partner and cheers you up with its crazy energy!










The safety of users is always our priority. Powerward fully supports short circuit protection, high & low voltage protection, overload protection, etc, and has earned essential international qualifications including FCC, CE, ROHS, and PSE. Regardless of what country and region you are based in, you can power up with maximum confidence.
























































 We are a team dedicated to bringing energy to power all sorts of home appliances of the world. With the intention of bringing new fresh air to the power station industry, this premier product designed by us is powerful, durable, and customer-oriented. 

We are here looking forward to eliminating everyone’s worries about the power outage and stopping you from living off the grid!

record.Creator: Regonesi Giuliano
record.Title: Sublime Plus - Solutions for Healthcare
record.Text:
Did you know that doctors recommend cleaning or changing the mask after each use?
This is true. According to Johns Hopkins University, you must cleanse or change the mask after each use. But who actually does it? You simply do not have time to quit washing every day, or change your mask several times during the day. By changing the mask, we increase the amount of waste, but we not always carry a spare mask with us and during the day we take off our mask more than once and put or hang up somewhere, thereby accumulating microbes and viruses in the object that protects us.
 In the face of the current pandemic, we have drastically changed our hygiene practices. You will see that more and more people care about the cleanliness of the surrounding air and things. As a result, we tend to carry more cleaning devices with us than ever before, and until now we have not seen anyone make a product that can combine all of these functions and make it more convenient. Therefore, we would like to present our new invention - Subleme Plus.
Subleme Plus is a highly portable solution to your contaminated mask woes:
 - Pop it in  your pocket
 - Keep it in your car
 -  Put it with your masks at home
 - In the foyer
 - At the office
 -  Anywhere where you might need a mask!







With concern about our health and the health of loved ones and relatives, we came up with a new device Subleme Plus. With the Subleme Plus we can safely disinfect our everyday items that we use so often.





How is it work:
Microorganisms multiply by replicating genetic material in the nucleus of living cells, and ultraviolet light can alter and rearrange the helical structure of DNA / RNA, stopping cell division. And because our LED is in the range where DNA / RNA is most sensitive, Subleme Plus can perform better in cleaning than other products. Today, all microorganisms, including viruses and bacteria that have become resistant to antibiotics, are vulnerable to UVC rays.











With the UVC LEDs in the device that radiate in the wavelength range of 200-280 nm, it ensures the sterilization of items such as masks, pens, keys, jewelry in a brief time like 10-20 seconds. The inside of our device has UV-C rays and it provides a sterile environment for storing the mask when we need to take it off. It is very easy to use, all you have to do is place your belongings, close the lid and press the button. After the process is completed, the light on it will turn off.










Subleme Plus offers various advantages over the traditionally used mercury lamps and UV lamps. It is the most effective, environmentally-friendly, and chemical-free way to keep your things clean.





Subleme Plus is fully rechargeable. Thanks to new technologies, one charge will last from 15 to 30 days of operation. And the microprocessor itself, which generates UV-C rays, lasts for 90,000 hours of operation without stopping. 





Subleme Plus is completely portable and easy to carry, you can put it in your shoulder bag or in your pockets, always protecting it from harmful microorganisms.


























This is not just a disinfection device, it is our health, a person close to us. The disinfection process is very simple and absolutely safe.












Subleme Plus is made from a high-strength aluminum alloy that does not harm human health or the surrounding nature.
Every year, more than 10 million tons of garbage get into our oceans and surrounding nature. We believe that waste reduction must come together to cope with the global pollution of our planet.


























Subleme Plus will be made with high quality and durable materials to ensure a long lifetime and to be a reliable companion on all your adventures, indoors and outdoors.
We are ensuring recyclable by only using suitable materials for Subleme Plus and its packaging (solely cardboard and no plastic).
The materials mentioned above are not only recyclable, but are in combination with the long lifetime also a sustainable choice. Where possible (e.g. packaging) we are not only setting a focus on sustainable materials, but also on reducing the use of materials as much as possible.
Factories that we will chose for mass production will be carefully evaluated regarding compliance with environmental regulations. Emphasis will also be put on social conditions as health and safety, working hours, minimum wages, labor practices and discrimination.

record.Creator: Energize Lab
record.Title: Eilik - A little Companion Bot with Endless Fun
record.Text:
Alone, what Eilik can do is limited. Together, it has infinite possibilities. Sing, dance, play, laugh! Let the party begin!
















We created an extremely rich expression system for Eilik in order to make him more lifelike, including laughing, yelling, crying, depressed, speechless, disappointed, cute, funny, wronged, cursing, angry, and so on. In addition, Eilik can express himself vividly thanks to dynamic animations and a 25 fps OLED screen. 





Our in-house animation team is hard at work behind Eilik's real-life expression to make Eilik more vivid and fun. Every action necessitates the coordination and cooperation of screenwriters, storytellers, animation producers, and voice actors, before being shown to Eilik by the software engineer.





Regular updates are available via Eilik's cross-platform software, so that he will be smarter, get more expressions, and download more plot content. Every update will make Eilik a better bot for you. 





In order to make Eilik's arm and body more flexible and dexterous, we have designed a new servo motor especially. EM3 is 100% self-developed, from the gear layout, circuit board, to the control algorithm. Compared with the traditional 9g servo, the torque of EM3 can reach up to 3kg.





EM3 can efficiently protect gears and offset external force with its overload clutch protection function. Position, voltage, temperature, and current feedback are all supported by the EM3's comprehensive control protocol, which uses a universal serial communication interface. Basic current-loop control is also available. A specific control and debugging software is also included with the EM3. 





































We've cooperated with international carriers like FedEx, UPS, DHL, and USPS. Kindly note that the price above doesn't include shipping costs, taxes, or additional duties. COVID-19 is still delaying international shipping in many places, but things are better now, and we hope that by the time we start shipping, the delivery time can be back to normal. We will update you with the whole shipping process continuously.










Energize Lab is an innovative startup focusing on robotics technology and products, including robot joints, control systems, servo motor, BLDC motor, and consumer robot. With our own patented robot technology and experienced animation experts, our team is committed to creating a robot with soul and endless fun.


















Our team is formed by a group of experienced engineers, designers, animators, and developers. As robot passionists, we have been working hard to make Eilik come true in the past two years, and we are glad that we have finally made it here. We chose to launch Eilik first here as we believe that this awesome community can give us more inspiration and incredible ideas. We look forward to having you as our co-creator, and let's make Eilik a better bot for everyone.

record.Creator: 4Privacy
record.Title: 4Privacy App
record.Text:
A Deeper Look Into What We're Building



We want to help you achieve more privacy in your digital life.
We’re nearing the completion of an app that lets you store, organize, and share information privately. 
By supporting our Kickstarter, you’ll be one of the first people to get the app and help us further our mission of creating a more private digital world. 
Check out the details below to learn more about our first product that's powered by the 4Privacy Engine.


Our Product






Store and organize everything that matters 





Quickly access everything you need - passwords, insurance cards, estate plans, and more.

Securely share and privately communicate





Ensure the people in your life have the information they need, when they need it. Revoking access is simple, and you can change your mind anytime.


Get your life in order with in-app guidance 





Helpful resources and tailored suggestions make it easy to tackle important tasks - even the ones you've been putting off.



Available on Mobile and Desktop with both light and dark mode.


Linux is on our roadmap and, depending on the level of interest, could be released early next year as well.

How we keep your information secure  



1.) Industry Leading Encryption  2.) Completely Private, Even from Us  3.) Authorized Access Only


Our Principles
We believe you have a right to:

digital privacy
 
a safe place to store your digital information
 
control your own data (who can access it, and when)
 
have conversations online with the same privacy of being alone and in person
 
not be monitored by big tech, the government, or anyone else
 

 Our Technology: The 4Privacy Engine
We're working on technology that:

is end-to-end encrypted with AES-256
 
is distributed
 
has a strong, passwordless identity system
 
facilitates easy and secure data storage
 
gives you control of your data even after it has been shared with others
 
is zero-knowledge - no third parties can see your information, not even us
 
generates your encryption keys on your device so they stay private and only accessible by you
 
affords you the benefits of the cloud, while preventing cloud providers from seeing your information
 
can improve and change as cryptography and technology evolve
 
doesn't make you choose between ease of use and strong security
 

To learn more, check out the technology page on our website. There you will find our plans to open source the 4Privacy Engine and more. 
 
Thanks for your support 



Destin's feature video on Smarter Every Day
How We’ll Use the Funds
We’ll use the proceeds to continue developing our privacy technology and bring our first product to market.

record.Creator: Jackie
record.Title: Those Who Travel
record.Text:
What Is:  Those Who Travel?


Those Who Travel is a mobile application for iOS and Android meant to connect solo travelers to other travelers and locals. Don't leave epic connections to chance! 






You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00




































BUILT FOR US- SOLO-TRAVELERS BY A SOLO TRAVELER
WE DESERVE BETTER! 
Back in the day, you went to a hostel, met new people, and went on epic adventures. Now, we stay in Airbnb’s and if you want to meet other locals, you have to download apps that don’t work OR Tinder, Yuck! 


Those Who Travel is an app to connect solo travelers. You can use it on journeys to meet other travelers and locals OR in your city to meet travelers passing through. 
We offer a unique safety precaution by requiring every potential user to go through a quick interview to make sure they are real and safe. If a user violates the user rules, they will be removed.

KEY FEATURES:
🆗  SAFE: Every user must be verified and accepted via interview
✅  Not a dating site, if romance blossoms, so be it but that is not the intention
🔎  Search people based on interests: Food, art, culture, extreme (bungee jumping), nightlife
🔒  Set privacy to only allow people you already liked to be able to message you


MEMBER BENEFITS
- Exclusive deals from partners
- Community 


MY STORY -





I had the privilege to travel the world, one of the things I hated was not being able to connect with people in the same location as me. I thought how great it would be to grab a coffee with a local or traveler. Or be able to share a car ride to a more remote sight out of the city. I tried downloading travel apps, but any of them were broken, or sleazy... That’s when I had the idea💡 and Those Who Travel was born.










Who knows how many more nights like these I missed out on because I didn't have Those Who Travel? 

Who Will Download and Use Those Who Travel?
This is built by me, a solo traveler for other solo travelers. My goal is simple not easy-  creating a community by connecting travelers and locals. There are no requirements other than being who you say you are, and keeping the community safe. 







WHAT IS COMPLETE

✅  NAME SUBMITTED TO US PATENT AND TM OFFICE
✅  LOGO IS SUBMITTED TO US PATENT AND TM OFFICE
✅  BUSINESS PLAN
✅  SOCIAL AND WEB ASSETS thosewhotravel.io
✅  Prototype and functionality

WEB: thosewhotravel.io 
INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/thosewhotravelofficial/ 
SLACK CHANNEL: https://join.slack.com/t/thosewhotravel/shared_invite/zt-qzgf6vc6-juP_lRe2Tt9JxLSZI1XHcQ

PEOPLE MAKING IT HAPPEN

Founder:
Jacquelyn Clifford
Designer, Head of Marketing and PR, Customer Support

CTO, Lead Developer
Awais Ali

POST-DEV ROADMAP
Roadmap: Once Dev is done, we will proceed with the below steps:
1- Three weeks of Testing/Quality Assurance and bug fixing. (with sandbox details). Same time, while working on Testing/QA, we will set up the accounts on Google Play store & Apple store. So accounts can get approved on time.
2- After that we just need one week to do the followings:
a) Changing Sandbox details with Live details
b) Deploying of apps on Google Play store & Apple store (as we have already approved accounts on Google store & Apple store)
c) Waiting for Google store & Apple store to approve the apps.
d) Apps get approved by Google store & Apple store

Press articles: 

 Vinci ebike looks a little bit retro, and a little bit modern art - by Ben Coxworth 
 If Leonardo da Vinci Had Designed an E-Bike, It Might Have Looked Like This - by Cristina Mircea 
 The Vinci E-Bike Gives You Comfort & Sustainability by HENRY GARNETT 
 A Mechanical Engineer's Designey Take on an E-Bike  By Rain Noe 
 If you are looking for a more unique electric bike you may be interested in a new start-up and product designer that has created the Vinci. by Julian Horsey 
 The Vinci electric bike maintains an aesthetic that calls to mind motorcycle designs, but features a functionality that doesn't require a license to be rode to make it more widely applicable for consumers. by Michael Hemsworth
 

View more media on
 Instagram: @vincimotorbike



@vincimotorbike



 WEB: vincimotorbike.com 



 VINCI Electric Motorbike Designed for Style and Comfort: 
The design for the VINCI Electric Motorbike is based on research that shows the most comfortable riding position for a motorcycle. This research defines the ideal dimensions for the location of the seat, handlebars, and foot pedals to achieve the most comfortable riding position.













































 This video shows a person who is 6ft tall riding the VINCI Electric Motorbike. 









You'll need an HTML5 capable browser to see this content.





Play

































Replay with sound









Play with  sound












00:00


00:00









































Prototyping:





Creator's Words:
For me, it was never about getting from point A to point B; it was about how I got there.
Riding a bike creates that feeling of my adrenaline rushing and my dopamine spiking.
My first connection with a bike was when I was 16. I took that my cousin's bike to open an empty back street, and I still remember that sensation.
I am not reinventing electric bikes. There are plenty of them available in the market.
But I didn't want to have a lame electric bike with some electronics slapped on a regular bike, or an older Bonanza mini bike frame. I wanted something special.
Since I was a kid, I have been obsessed with cars and bikes, and sketching them. This bike design is my favorite and I have been planning it for a very long time.
After studying and working in mechanical engineering, I finally gained the necessary skills to bring my favorite bike to life.
I wanted to get around town in style, so I chose components that have enough power, can get me through the daily commute and have some extra power leftover to have fun, and of course, it had to be street legal. I wanted to design a bike that speaks to me that ties together simple, clean and timeless design. The bike that I would like to keep forever.
As an artist, I came up with a design that satisfies my requirements of style and comfort, and now I want to share this design with the world.

record.Creator: Colin Renaud
record.Title: //Phrism, a pocketable laptop alternative
record.Text:
Since 2017 I have been wondering how to improve a product that we all know, the laptop, the latter tends to be big and quite heavy, why wouldn't it be light, thin and small enough to put it in your pocket ? that's why I came up with the idea for //Phrism, a futuristic pocketable computer that uses projectors for the screen and keyboard.

I remember my first laptop and how much I loved it.
It was thin, fast, beautiful, had a great battery, it was cool.
It was a macbook 2007, and it was amazing
Things evolve and like everything my awesome macbook became old.
At the time it was my main machine. But now, my main machine is my smartphone, a Galaxy note 10 plus
I never find myself a laptop computer that give me the same feeling I had before with my old mac.
I now use my phone, samsung DeX and a screen for doing my "computer stuff"
But what if I can do these things on the go, my phone will be the only computer I'll ever need!
Introducing Phrism, the first glimpse of the future of computers
Phrism is a pocketable alternative to a laptop how does it works?
Just watch
First, we need to detach the two sides and connect it with the strong magnetic connection.
Phrism uses high resolution projector with DLP technology for the screen and a laser keyboard, so you can have the screen size you want.
The colors are vibrant and the screen is luminous enough to be seen all day
After using it, we reattach the solid slide connection and we can slide it in a pants' pocket
Phrism is made with a great looking true wood and high-quality biodegradable plastic.
It is compatible with Samsung DeX Huwawei EMUI, Windows PC sticks, nintendo switch and so on.
Conectics are usb 3.0, usb C, hdmi and, believe it or not, headphone jack
Phrism starts at the cost of 449$ but with this kickstarter campaign you can hold
the future in your hand for only 249$
Now I can finaly say I have a thin, fast, beautiful and pocketable computer with a great battery. It is cool.
My Phrism is amazing,
maybe you will say it too!

record.Creator: Oasis-X
record.Title: Oasis-Grow
record.Text:
Hey, you!
Are you growing mushrooms in your closet? How about herbs in your basement? Perhaps you've got flowers in a greenhouse, or some tomatoes in the garden? Whatever it is you're growing, we want to help. After almost 2 years of prototyping, we've decided to launch a Kickstarter campaign to fund and pre-sell the mass-production of Oasis-Grow, our first line of environmental monitoring tools and automated container growing systems for hobbyists gardeners, underground cultivators, and small farmers.  

Why Oasis-Grow? 





Oasis-Grow, developed by Oasis-X, is our first fleet of products consisting of camera, remote sensing, and environmental control modules aimed to help smaller and medium-sized growers save time, measure what matters, and produce more with less. This lineup of growing automation products includes hardware and software modules for computer vision, environmental sensing, and AC equipment control as well as a few ready to grow container farming systems. 





How does it help my growing?



Mushrooms fruiting in a system controlled by oasis-grow modules


Oasis-Grow is a modular, easy-to-use set of tools for growing more with less. It is designed to enable controlled environment agriculture but can be applied to other areas as well. Deploy a simple camera to track harvest-readiness of fruit, add sensors to diagnose problems in your environment, plug in a controller to create the perfect conditions, or skip all of this with a ready-to-grow system. Our products collect images & data over time, actively regulating temperature, relative humidity, airflow, light, oxygen, and water cycles. Sensors, cameras, and programmatic alerts can monitor your growing system, allowing you to catch and prevent problems before they occur.  Users can set variable targets for feedback response and tune the system's built in PID controllers to create more desirable environments. With the ability to deploy plug-and-play containers or hook up 3rd party AC appliances in a chosen space, growers can more easily create the perfect environment for their application. Our system can be used offline and is secure with data encrypted at rest and in-transit. 

Built for beginners & pros alike.  



Plug & Play: Oasis Family Container Farm


Get started using a ready-to-grow container farming system, or outfit your existing grow with one of our environmental helper modules.





By Growers, for Growers 



Timelapse of MicroGreens in Sprouting Chamber with Oasis Camera





Fruiting a mushroom production block


We wouldn't sell a product we wouldn't use, which is why our prototypes are tested extensively on our demo farm installation. Our technology has been used to build real systems that grow real crops, which we encourage you to check out on our website and instagram!



Treating explants for tissue culture


Open Source, Mod-Friendly, Powered by Raspberry Pi. 





Our open-source control software can take pictures, sense environmental factors, and command a variety of appliances to regulate your system. This means that you can modify core, extend with 3rd party electronics, and contribute new integrations + ideas! If you've ever used a Raspberry Pi or programmed a microcontroller, you'll be right at home accessing oasis-grow modules using the command line. Visit our GitHub to deploy your own configuration of our firmware. Build from scratch or add powerful new capabilities to an existing Pi setup.

Simple Interface, Setup, & Remote Monitoring 





 On-device buttons & an LED status ring light interface can be used to start/stop the control cycle, connect to wifi, or run the drainage pump. This is in addition to the dashboard, where you can view images and data sent from a unit, adjust settings, update firmware, and run other tasks.  Adding a new device to your network is as easy as pressing a button, waiting a bit, connecting to the hotspot, and entering your credentials:



Data Collection & Analysis 



24-Hour Oasis-Grow Sensor Data Plot


Our cloud dashboard (for which we will release an open-source version soon) aggregates visual & sensor data to generate actionable media & analysis. Assemble time-lapses to share, save data for traceability, and learn from the past to improve future harvests. We plan to implement even more sensor options and integrate some of our community-contributed AI projects into the core remote image monitoring system.



Machine Learning Prototype: Ripe Fruit Identification


Who are we?
Oasis-X was founded by two engineers and long-time gardeners in response to food shortages during the COVID-19 pandemic. We have backgrounds in computer science, hobby electronics, business management, product design, ecology, and biotechnology. Our team is passionate about making the future of farming accessible in every neighborhood!



Mike





Avi


Almost Two Years In The Making
We have have been iterating on designs for this idea since the beginning of 2020. It has been incredibly rewarding to see our hardware go from concept drawings, to functioning proof of concept prototypes, to rugged hand-assembled beta units. Next steps will be to smooth out the edges and update our existing prototype designs to optimize manufacturability.   



Prototype Evolution: Vision, Sensor, & Control Module  





Prototype Evolution: Oasis Family Container Farm





Prototype Evolution: Vision & Sensor Module


Why are we doing this? 





The rapidly increasing consolidation of farmland over the past century has resulted in a centralized food system that pushes out small farmers and is fragile, wasteful, and damaging to our environment. To feed a growing global population, we’ll have to intensify these traditional farming and distribution methods which intensely pollute our atmosphere, soil, and water.

We believe that buying and selling local is the solution for many problems which plague our food system. We have the opportunity to embrace an alternative which allows us to eat healthier, use fewer resources, connect with our food, and cultivate confidence in where our products come from.

   In pursuit of this, our goal is to equip every cultivator with unprecedented control and visibility into their harvest. We aim to unlock the kind of productivity & resource-efficiency previously only achievable by those with capital to invest or deep technical expertise.

record.Creator: Impartial
record.Title: Myriad: The Electric Car Company
record.Text:
Motivation : Freedom and Savings
We all know that the fossil fuel market is controlled by a handfull of people, that is why everyone is going electric.
Electric vehicles are less expensive to fuel than gasoline powered vehicles. The average person drives between 10,000 and 15,000 miles and spends between $1,300 and $1,900 on gasoline per year. In comparison, the cost of electricity to power Myriad over the same distance is up to four times lower. Over the six year average length of car ownership, that's between $5,500 and $8,200 in gasoline savings.
We've assumed a fuel economy of 21 miles per gallon for a comparable gasoline powered premium sedan. We've also assumed the national average of $0.13 per kilowatt-hour for electricity, 10% charging on Tesla’s Supercharger network and $2.85 per gallon for premium gasoline over the next six years.

Our first car will be a SUV with solar pannel roof.
 It will have a 2673 mm wheelbase, it will be 4500 mm long, 1650 mm wide , 1750 tall.
It will be available in 2 configurations , one single motor with rear wheel drive and one dual motor with AWD.
The single motor version will be equipped with 85 kWh battery pack and the dual motor with 100 kWh battery pack.
The power produced will be arround 400 hp for the single motor and 520 hp for the dual motor.
Now we are at the stage of merging the software and hardware together.
We dont have a working prototype so we cant show it to you.
We have renders of how we wish the car to look but we cant share them because of kickstarter`s policy. Maybe we will be able to add them in an update.

Thank you!

record.Creator: Jason Clarke
record.Title: Dating 4.0 - The Only Dating App You Need - No More Swiping!
record.Text:
Click here to view a slide deck (email required) 

Hi, my name is Jay Clarke

•Over the years my life has taken me across many countries and multiple cities – Cardiff, Swansea, London, Newcastle, Brighton, Sydney, The Gold Coast, The Sunshine Coast, Perth, Adelaide, Brisbane, Bangkok, Kiev, St Petersburg (Russia), Tokyo, Hong Kong, Shenzhen, Shanghai, and Ho Chi Minh City, and a few more.

•What I have realised is that during that period of work and travel, my hobby of meeting people from online services in my spare time has become something that I hold expertise in.

•My ability to apply knowledge and experience to be able to near guarantee a good offline meeting from an online service has become one of my biggest assets.

•Arriving back to the UK in August 2021, I realised it was time to pursue my one true passion – to build the best dating app in the world.

•There is no doubt in my mind that I can build the best app that would be available in the market by a significant margin. I am utterly flabbergasted that daters have been left with tinder as our main option for such a long time.

•The swipe novelty was great at its launch but over the years it has taken a toll, with poor innovation and then a monopoly forming in the market, explained later.
•It is time for change.

•The dating market is for the big boys. Big investment reaps huge rewards. It is impossible to launch something half-heartedly.

•To win in this market you have to compete with the Americans using their rules…big pre-seed and seed funding, big valuations, big sales.

•I bring this presentation to you to seek investment to bring significant income, employment opportunities and funds to make charitable contributions for our communities.

A slide deck for this appeal is presented here;
 Slide Deck

record.Creator: OneClock
record.Title: OneClock: Wake Up Better
record.Text:
OneClock is not an alarm clock
Let’s save the alarms for fires, burglaries and submarines. We researched the best tones, tempos and frequencies to wake you up. Then we asked Jon Natchez from The War on Drugs to create a collection of musical compositions to lift you out of sleep in a peaceful, more natural way. 
OneClock is as much a piece of art as it is a functional household object.  








- Japan, Canada, EU, UK, Australia, Norway, Switzerland - 







Featured In:





Sleep is great, but waking up is better
We believe the only thing better than sleep is waking up. Because that’s where all the love starts. We believe in waking up better, so you can live better and breathe better and think better.





Take back the bedroom
Make your bedroom your sanctuary, without all the gadgets and devices that seem to sneak stress and distractions in between the sheets with you. OneClock is designed to disconnect, so all you have is you, your thoughts, and perhaps a significant other in bed with you - human, canine, or feline.  





Sonic science to start your day
There’s a growing body of sonic research outlining the importance of waking up correctly and its effect on our mood and behavior. OneClock’s sounds are designed to wake you gently and reliably.





Music composed by Grammy-winning artists
You deserve better, so we created a new way to wake up with Jon Natchez, renowned composer and multi-instrumentalist of The War on Drugs. OneClock’s compositions are original recordings, not available elsewhere, and feature 20+ instruments that create a warm, organic and non-digital soundtrack to start your day. 





Jon won a 2018 Grammy as a member of The War on Drugs, was formerly a member of the acclaimed group Beirut, and has performed and recorded with David Byrne, St. Vincent, Taylor Mac, Father John Misty, and Liza Minnelli, among many others. He has composed scores for numerous films and has contributed to over 100 albums, composing and arranging as well as playing more than 30 instruments.



Listen to the music samples





















AI music generator
Humans can suffer from alarm fatigue and become desensitized to sounds they hear over and over. When OneClock’s alarm is activated, our AI music generator will randomly choose one of the songs stored on the clock’s solid state memory and remix it by adjusting the levels of each instrument or vocal for infinite combinations. It’s subtle, but noticeable and you will never hear OneClock’s songs the same way twice. Ever.





Timeless analog design + slow-tech philosophy
Warm, organic, minimalism meets an analog and tactile experience that’s built to last a lifetime with high quality, sustainably sourced components. In our current culture of Amazon/Walmart convenience, the approach we took was unorthodox. We prioritized design and quality over price to create a product that is enjoyable to experience amongst other cherished heirloom objects in your home.  



Extruded, precision machined, solid aluminum enclosure. Available in black, red, and white powder coat (raw aluminum coming soon). Solid rift sawn white oak, natural hand-oiled finish.


Multi-function waking knob 



Seamlessly toggle between the current time and waking time. Set, activate and turn off the alarm. Located on the front of the clock (where you need it).
Swiss designed clock movement    



Stepper motor technology used in automotive gauges, offers precise and silent operation.


Speaker  



Waking music plays through a high dynamic range BMR from Tectonic Labs  (4 Ω / 10 Watts / 100Hz – 20kHz full range).


Clock face 



The glass face is scratch resistant, low glare, and easy to read. 


Screen-free   



We left out the touchscreens and buttons in favor of knurled, solid aluminum knobs that provide a tactile, analog feel and precise control reminiscent of high-end audio components.


Night light   



Touch sensitive enclosure activates a low-light, warm glow, that turns off after five seconds. 

Alarm indicator   



Low-light integrated LED assures you that your OneClock is set to wake you up. It's just bright enough to see at night, but not any more than you need. 

Reliable power 



Power is supplied by a fixed USB cable with a two-prong standard wall outlet AC adaptor. In the event of a power outage, OneClock has an internal backup system that stores your time and alarm settings for up to two weeks.













What people are saying    





Specifications & Production 










The ability to oversee design and production in our backyard allows us to deliver a high quality product while also supporting local craftsmen, partners and communities across the US. We’ve been fortunate to collaborate with LINK PD and HWI to ensure that our engineering and production game is on point. With over 50+ years of experience across countless products, they allow us to move forward thoughtfully and confidently to bring our vision to life.





Warranty 





Lifetime warranties typically come with a lot of fine print that often amounts to nothing more than a marketing ploy. We’re matching our high end materials and hand built quality with a robust and straightforward policy. Our 20 year warranty ensures OneClock will be free from defects in materials and workmanship and operate as advertised.

Our team
We’re veteran musicians, strategists, creatives and artists that understand the value of waking up beautifully. Between us we have won Lions, Grammys, Emmys, Effies, Pencils, Coup de Couers, and other hard-to-win awards with weird names. And we have woken up each day for the past 25+ years to shape culture through products, campaigns, environmental initiatives, soundtracks, live performances, and the creation of vibrant, sustainable businesses. 







Timeline






Why Kickstarter?
Crowdfunding gives us the freedom to run our business exactly how we want. The revenue we generate here makes it possible for us to continue developing products without seeking outside funding. This allows us to focus on doing what we love: designing and bringing our visions to life, supported by an incredible community of like minded individuals that appreciate our philosophy.
We also deeply value the ability to have the Kickstarter community influence our products (who’s our next musician?!?) through feedback and direct participation in our design process.

Shipping and sales tax
We will ship complete units from our fulfillment facility in Denver, CO to anywhere in the US. All units will be shipped in a custom container engineered from high density cardboard and recycled protective foam.  Packages will be sent via UPS Ground, tracking included, for 1-5 day delivery at a cost of $14/clock. 
If state sales tax is applicable on your purchase, we'll follow up with you post-campaign with the cost and a method of payment.

International orders
OneClock will be available for delivery to select countries around the world. As shipping, handling, local charges and custom fees vary from country to country, please select your reward to see specific details about your location.
Customer is responsible for all applicable taxes or duties that may occur in your location. OneClock is shipped delivery duties unpaid (DDU).
You can find a complete list of the shipping costs per pledge as well as full shipping and handling details in our FAQs section. If you’d like to back the project but your country isn’t listed in the dropdown menu upon checkout, or if you have any further questions about shipping, please feel free to contact us. 

Support
























Further reading 
Here are a few of our guiding lights that helped inform the design of OneClock:
Why Sleep Matters
Why Snoozers Are Losers
Blue light has a dark side
71% of Americans who own smartphones sleep with them
One in three kids under 18 wake up to check their mobile device at least once a night
More on alarm fatigue
Devices create a mental state of “threat vigilance” in the bedroom
Waking sounds and sleep inertia







 This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarter launches with 1,400+ successful Kickstarter projects and over $500M raised in total.
http://jellop.com/?utm_source=Oneclock
